author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: When something is gained, something is lost. It's difficult to live after something like that. What is lost will never return. Important things, irreplaceable things. But what is needed to keep those things is in the firm will, packed into one bullet. Man knows... he knows that nothing will begin unless he speaks, and that nothing will change unless he moves.

author: Mitsuya Majime
title: Fune wo Amu
text: The vast ocean of words. Without a means to cross the ocean, we can only stand and watch keeping the words we desperately want to express inside. A dictionary is a ship that is able to cross that ocean.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: What ever may happen to the order, we'll still be us. As long as we keep moving forward for what we believe in, it will be all right. We'll all end up smiling in the end.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: You must not hope for society to change for you. Do not reject society. To put it bluntly, that is simply a waste of time.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Meikyuu
text: If all you do is feed your dog, you'll get your hand bitten eventually. Let him out for a walk every once in a while.

author: Killua
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Meikyuu
text: A romance won't keep itself going forever. Eventually, you lose that all-important spark. Love has to be nurtured if it's going to last. If you want to be with someone forever, you need to put effort into the relationship... Great, now I'm talking cliches.

author: Seiji Aino
title: Renai Boukun
text: People who can get back on their feet after learning their weaknesses are strong and admirable.

author: Principal
title: Silver Spoon
text: So you feel negative about the idea of running away. You may feel guilt over having run away, but what about what happened here? The people you've met? How's it all been? Were they negative experiences? It's ok to run away in order to live. It really is ok. You're different from farm animals who have nowhere to run.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: We ruin the countries we govern and the people in our care. We slaughter our enemies and sacrifice all our allies. We'll keep killing till there's nothing left but to destroy ourselves. It will never be enough.

author: Soul Eater
title: Soul Eater
text: In the end the shape and form don't matter at all, it's only the soul that matters, right? Nothing else.

author: Ooga Kazuomi
title: ReLIFE
text: I'm still a man too, I wanted to look calm and composed in front of everyone. Especially in front of the one I'm in love with.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass Extended Edition
text: Clausewitz, he pointed out that no matter how carefully one plans, on the battlefield, even the smallest of details can cause setbacks. Regardless of how well-thought it is, armchair strategizing only works in the realm of theory. Unexpected troubles, or uncontrollable factors such as weather. Operations face those sorts of troubles. They are the cause of strife on the battlefield.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Because of the existence of love - sacrifice is born. As well as hate. Then one comprehends... one knows PAIN.

author: Ran Mouri
title: Detective Conan
text: Courage is a word of justice. It means the quality of mind that enables one to face apprehension with confidence and resolution. It is not right to use it as an excuse to kill someone.

author: Nona
title: Death Parade
text: Everyone Makes Mistakes. But people's feelings can manifest through the most subtle of expressions.

author: Hei
title: Darker than Black - Kuro no Keiyakusha: Gaiden
text: The truth is everyone is going to hurt you, you just got to find the ones worth suffering for.

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Slowly, by spending time together with that person, your love for him will grow bigger.

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: It's best to go up against strong guys, if you want to get stronger.

author: Tsukihi Araragi
title: Nekomonogatari: Kuro
text: Mistaking lust for love shows that you're caught in an inflationary spiral of sexual frustration.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: The inexperienced draw attention by acting differently.

author: Tanya Degurechaff
title: Youjo Senki
text: You should try persuasion when people are mentally defenseless. The fascist who proposed that was a demonic genius.

author: Ryuunosuke Akutagawa
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: The words of your past are fundamentally unrelated to who you are now.

author: Father
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Humans who would dare to play God must pay a steep price for their arrogance, that is Truth.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul √A
text: "Never trust anyone too much... Remember the devil was once an angel..."

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: A world where everyone is equal and receives the same treatment. No such place exists. If there was a world of equality, where talent and aptitude didn't matter, we would all be equally snubbed there.

author: Sena Kashiwazaki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai NEXT
text: There are two kinds of girls in this world. Lovely girls who can get along with me. And all the bitches who can't

author: Lieutenant Colonel Yuuki
title: Joker Game
text: Women tend to kill when it's not necessary. They kill for reasons of passion. For trivial reasons like love and hate.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: If I try, I fail. If i don't try i'm never going to get it.

author: Yuu Otosaka
title: Charlotte
text: DEATH is so unfair. It comes to those who don't need it. But not the people who are asking for it.

author: Yuu Otosaka
title: Charlotte
text: In this world, nobody is free. Even the flying birds are chained to the sky.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gekijōban Gintama Kanketsu-hen: Yorozuya yo Eien Nare
text: Even if you lose all memory in your head, the ones engraved in your heart and the ones that exist in your soul will never disappear, no matter what happens.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks

author: Sakunosuke Oda
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: I'm not interested in fighting. What I'm interested in is living.

author: Tanaka
title: Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
text: Then, if he accepts who you are, it doesn't matter if you're perfect for him or not. Rather, he may prefer you just the way you are now.

author: Komari Kamikita
title: Little Busters!
text: Losing something is sad. Even when I lose something as tiny as a worn-out eraser, I feel pretty down for a day or two. That's why I'm looking for him.

author: Komari Kamikita
title: Little Busters!
text: There are all sorts of mysteries in this world, like snacks and candy and sweets falling from the sky!

author: Zeref
title: Fairy Tail
text: If this world continues to reject me, then I shall reject the world.

author: Tachibana Hotaru
title: Aoharu x Kikanjuu
text: "... Although this won't happen instantly, as long as you have the thought, you will have a chance. Because at the moment you want to change, you have already taken the first step to changing."

author: Souhei Saikawa
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: Luxury means something with no meaning at all

author: Junko Enoshima
title: Danganronpa The Animation
text: For me, despair is not a goal, or a set of principles, or a lifestyle, or even an instinct... It's what defines me as Junko Enoshima! It's just my characterization! That's why I'm able to pursue despair with such purity!

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: It doesn't matter how much trash you pick up. You just have a pile of trash.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: Is that all your feelings have to offer? Go ahead. Try to wrench open my heart. That's the only way you'll get me.

author: Gin
title: Hotarubi no Mori e
text: When I'm away from you, even though I can't be around crowds, I want to go see you.

author: Karma Akabane
title: Assassination Classroom
text: Even if the questions change, it makes no difference to me.

author: Shalnark
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: But the big difference is who I work for. I'd rather die than be a yes-man to someone I don't even like.

author: Gildarts Clive
title: Fairy Tail
text: Fear is "evil", it tells your weakness. If you can know your weakness, people become strong and gentle.

author: Kotori Itsuka
title: Date A Live
text: The closest thing to being cared for is to care for someone else.

author: King Bradley
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: "Why must everyone make such a fuss over the death of a single soldier? The moment a soldier dons his uniform, he accepts the reality that he might be buried in it."

author: Shido Itsuka
title: Date A Live
text: Even if people refuse to accept you, it doesn't change the fact that I accept you and don't want you to leave.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: It isn't even interesting fighting against someone who doesn't have their own goals.

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: You've finally realized that the one thing you want, something greater than money, it can never be yours.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: You can't do anything about what doesn't exist. In the end, humans have to settle for what's in front of them.

author: Yūya Sakaki
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: Forgiveness is the only way to end the war.

author: Yuzu Hiiragi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Connected souls will never lose to the strength that only relies on control! Dueling is the same! Only strength alone doesn't speak to anyone's soul!

author: Shido Itsuka
title: Date A Live
text: Do they love you, or the mask you put every day?

author: Tsubasa Hanekawa
title: Owarimonogatari
text: Nobody can make someone who isn't trying to be happy into someone that's happy

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: The moment you put it into words and tell someone, it starts to diverge from your feelings. Words are nothing but lies and nothing but cheats. No matter what the truth, the moment it is told, it becomes dramatized.

author: Hakuryū Ren
title: Magi - The Labyrinth of Magic
text: Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do is erase the ones you hate!

author: Clow Reed
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Seasons change just like the passing of time. We all have out destines and then we must move. That's they way it has always been.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: The world isn't something that is all planned out. It's something you make yourself.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: I can conquer the world with one hand as long as you are Holding the other

author: Hidenori Tabata
title: Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou
text: There's no reason to pretend to be cool. Let's show our lame sides. That's who we really are, after all.

author: Yumi Iguchi
title: Shirobako
text: Learning and copying are the same.  Everyone starts out copying someone else. Every last person.

author: Togame
title: Katanagatari
text: Of course, if you lose in fighting it'd be a problem, but it's also a problem if you lose in character

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: That's right! Whatever the tragedy or the blunder is, only the things that actually happened are written in stone!

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: The weaker person is the more he gets hung up on other people's pain and then he self-destructs

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: That's ridiculous. People usually have a stereotypical idea, or an assumption like that and that's what creates a blind spot

author: Rei Kiriyama
title: 3-gatsu no Lion
text: In this small universe, it's an endless cycle of winning and losing until you begin losing your mind.

author: Yashamaru
title: Naruto
text:
Physical wounds will definitely bleed and may look painful 
but over time they heal by themselves and if you apply medicine, 
they will heal faster. What's troublesome are wounds of the heart. Nothing is harder to heal. They're a bit different from physical injuries. You can't apply medicine for one thing and sometimes, they never heal. There's only one cure for a wound of the heart. 
It's a bit bothersome and you can only receive it from someone else. What is it? Love.

author: Taiyou Natsuki
title: Seishun Forget!
text: A real man never goes back on his words!

author: Higuchi Seitarou
title: Yojouhan Shinwa Taikei
text: No one knows what the future holds in life.  We must take that endless bit of darkness and turn it to our advantage.

author: Koutarou Amon
title: Tokyo Ghoul:re
text: What is right... what is wrong... you can't easily tell the difference. That's why you must keep thinking, whether what you are doing is right or not. That act itself, alone, can be called right.

author: Sakunosuke Oda
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: People live to save themselves.

author: Sakunosuke Oda
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: Be on the Side that saves people, if both sides are the same, become a good man.

author: Kamina
title: Gurren Lagann
text: Don't believe in the me that believe in you, don't believe in the you that believes in me, believe in yourself who believes in you!

author: Dio Brando
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders
text: Advantages and disadvantages come hand in hand. That is inevitable

author: Kisuke Urahara
title: Bleach
text: Yes, we have no destiny. Only those swallowed up by ignorance and fear who take false steps, shall plunge us into the waters called “destiny”.

author: Yasaburou Shimogamo
title: Uchouten Kazoku
text: As long is you still draw breathe, there is no way to escape having to bid others farewell.  It doesn't matter if you're human or not...we all have to say good-bye.

author: Yasaburou Shimogamo
title: Uchouten Kazoku
text: When saying good-bye to this world, our great father split his blood into four: the eldest inherited only his sense of responsibility, the second eldest inherited only his easygoing personality, the youngest inherited only his innocence, and me, well, I inherited only his idiocy.  What held us diverse brothers together was the love of our mother, deeper than the sea, and the farewell we bid our great father.  Sometimes, one profound separation can unite the ones left behind.

author: Dong Taebin
title: Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything
text: Haven't you ever thought that life would be better if it was a game?

author: Dongtae
title: Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything
text: Game!? Is life a game to you?...Life is not a game!!

author: Crusch Karsten
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: Stand up! lift your faces! Take up your weapons! Look at that boy. He's so weak and fragile a breath could blow him away and he's unarmed! He is a powerless boy, whose defeat I have seen with my own eyes! He's weaker than anyone else here! Yet he's shouting louder than anyone that we can still do this so how can we sit down, with downcast gaze? If our weakest man has not given up how is kneeling in defeat acceptable for us? Did you come this far to wallow in shame?

author: Taki Tachibana
title: Kimi no Na wa
text: I wanted to tell you that… Wherever you may end up in this world, I will be searching for you.

author: Taki Tachibana
title: Kimi no Na wa
text: Why does the scenery of a town that no longer exists wring my heart so?

author: Mitsuha Miyamizu
title: Kimi no Na wa
text: If I suddenly showed up, would I bother him? Surprise him? There's no way we could meet. But what if we did? What should I do? Would I annoy him? Would it be awkward? Or maybe… He'd be a bit glad to see me?

author: Taki Tachibana
title: Kimi no Na wa
text: Once in a while when I wake up, I find myself crying. The dream I must've had, I can never seem to recall...But the sensation that I've lost something lingers for a long time after I wake up.

author: Hitoha Miyamizu
title: Kimi no Na wa
text: Treasure the experience. Dreams fade away after you wake up.

author: Kou Mabuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: I can't surpress my feeling anymore. When she gets confused, I will still her back. Yes I know I am selfish, I don't care.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Your unconditional trust is more than I'm willing to bear.

author: Lebanon
title: Darker than Black: Gemini of the Meteor
text: "Isn't it okay? Even if you and someone meet for just a moment, that moment passes by...You might meet again somewhere, isn't that okay?"

author: Tsukamoto Tsukushi
title: Days (TV
text: But maybe life isn't about counting all the things you've lost.

author: Maki Nishikino
title: Love Live! School idol project TV 2/2014
text: Nobody thinks they're cuter than others unless they're conceited.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Hotaru, do you think the day will come that I'll lose it (the ability to see spirits) as well?  A one-sided visit and troublesome days...is that freedom? or...At that time, a small firefly (Hotaru) passed by and whispered something to me.  But I could not understand the words of a bug.  Farewell, Hotaru.  I wonder if that person understood...just that person.

author: Natsume Takeshi
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: We probably are.  I can't explain it very well, but it seems that lately it doesn't matter, human or spirit.  If your hearts touch, it's the same thing.  When you're all alone, you get lonely, and the first step is always scary.

author: Masahiro
title: Whistle!
text: Little man! Don't talk small , and say your goal is to become like me. You should become a master of your own game.

author: Three Days of Happiness
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: People who've had lots of failures talk about those failures as if to imply that if they have another life, they'll be a big success. After facing all that hardship, they think they won't mess up again. But they're all - me included, of course - making a fundamental mistake. Failures know a lot about failure, sure. But knowing failure is completely different from knowing success. Fixing your mistakes doesn't mean success takes their place - you've just got a point to start at, is all. That's something failures don't understand.

author: Kahoko Hino
title: La Corda D'Oro - primo passo
text: "If you close down the way to your own path, it will always open up. That's why this isn't a song of ending. It is a new encounter. A song of beginning."

author: Erika Shinohara
title: Wolf Girl & Black Prince
text: I really do like you. You pissed me off, so I considered giving up for a minute, but I'd never lie about my feelings. So I won't quit. Even if you don't believe me now, I'll keep saying it until you do! I'll keep trying! This isn't over!

author: Yumi Iguchi
title: Shirobako
text: Better to ask and be a fool once than never to ask and be a fool forever.

author: Makarov
title: Fairy Tail
text: There is great value in the time spent in ones own company, but a life time of total isolation is a fate no one should endure.

author: Shō Kazamatsuri
title: Whistle!
text: I won't be defeated because I know how awful it feels to lose after doing my very best!

author: Guts
title: Berserk
text: If you're alone... if it's just your life, you can use it however you please/ Wear yourself out, get cut to ribbons, doesn't matter. But when there's two, the blade grows heavy. Fighting like death doesn't concern you becomes a thing of the past. It's no longer just you. I threw away my way of life, relied on the strength of others, and somehow pushed on.

author: Takano Miyo
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: Every phenomenon that happens in the human world is caused by people for their own convenience.

author: Nao Tomori
title: Charlotte
text: The scars that you can't see are the hardest to heal.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: You can run from your past all you want, but it will always follow you. Forever and ever and ever and ever.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: Having too many bonds causes one to lose focus, weakening their strongest wish, their greatest desire.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: The moment people come to know love, they run the risk of carrying hate.

author: Kunio Yaobi
title: Tamako Market
text: There are times like that music can convey more than words.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: Trying to improve by learning from others that is what calls friendship.

author: Charles Beams
title: Eureka Seven
text: Freedom is something that you need to actively acquire. It's not something that's given with no strings attached. To be free means to take responsibility, and to prepare yourself for what's to come.

author: Kiyotaka Ayanokouji
title: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e
text: All people are nothing but tools. It doesn't matter how it's done. It doesn't matter what needs to be sacrificed. In this world, winning is everything. As long as I win in the end...That's all that matters.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: Evil expects evil from others.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.

author: Glenn Radars
title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
text: Humans are creatures that always get hurt and feel regret whenever they make a choice on something.

author: Rikako Oryo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths, and yet it's pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity, a form of death that people have wished for.

author: Link
title: Legend of Zelda
text: A sword wields no strength, unless the hand that holds it has courage.

author: Shouya Ishida
title: Koe no Katachi
text: Things would have been so much better back then... If we had heard each other's voices. I hate myself. I was selfish, and I never thought about anyone else's feelings. Since then, my classmates have all looked down on me. I've lived for seventeen years, and I haven't lived one of them as a good person. The only time I heard your voice was when we got into that fight. And what pisses me off the most is the fact that I haven't changed at all since back then! But.,. But now, I think I can understand what you were saying... Nishimiya. Me and you... Can we be... friends? Shit!! I went way too far!! I was just gonna apologize and get out of here! Why the hell did I end up asking her to be friends?... Why did I even say that?! Jeez, that's so embarrassing! How can you even say that?

author: Takasaki Misaki
title: Koi to Uso
text: Just your touch... gets me excited. It makes me so happy. But those feelings will all turn into pain. The happier I am now, the more it'll hurt. I know how cruel this is... but no matter how hard I try, I can't rid myself of this. Nejima-kun... I... don't know... what love is.

author: Uno
title: Nanbaka
text: *to Jyugo* You're such a gloomy Gus, aren't you? You're so gloomy, indecisive, and so pessimistic. You're also dull, have bad handwriting, can't learn, insensitive, weak, a slow runner, a poor talker, and a poor liar. You really can't do anything other than break out of jail. Also you have short legs. But... that means you have lots of character traits, right? That's all you need to know for now, don't you think? If you don't know something, we'll teach you. We're gonna make your life more fun. It doesn't matter whether we're in jail or hell. If we live happily, we win. So let's take it slow and make sure you'll enjoy tomorrow.

author: Shouya Ishida
title: Koe no Katachi
text: Back then, if we could have have heard each other's voices, everything would have been so much better.

author: Nejima Yukari
title: Koi to Uso
text: Even though you like someone already, your partner is decided for you... and you can't do anything about that crush. Because everyone keeps getting in the way... and saying you can't... But... when you're the one in love... the only thing that feels true... is that feeling.

author: Uno
title: Nanbaka
text: There's more to a real man than just his good looks!

author: Yoake Ryou
title: ReLIFE
text: If I'm going to disappear no matter what, I at least want to leave them having fun and smiling.

author: Nisaka Yuusuke
title: Koi to Uso
text: If you take someone at puberty, a teen... introduce him or her to a member of the opposite sex around the same age and say, "This is the person who was meant for you"... and then go on to spend a lot of time together... why wouldn't you fall for them?

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: I want you to please understand the scales of my heart will always be swaying back and forth. But there is something you should know. I will never lean to one side or the other due to the weight of gold coins.

author: Onoya An
title: ReLIFE
text: Even though everything is going to disappear, it isn't supposed to be meaningless. It's exactly because you know you're going to part ways, that now and only now is your only chance.

author: Takasaki Misaki
title: Koi to Uso
text: I don't really want you to understand... I just don't want you to be like, 'Oh, is that all'? I don't need people to get it. These feelings... are important to me, and they're just for me.

author: Akasaka Ryuunosuke
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: It's a programmer's job to make the most of limited resources to turn an impractical idea into reality.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: Making sure I have no regrets... that would just be self-serving, nothing more. It's all right. I mean, this is a great memory in itself, right?

author: Yūki Hase
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: There are things I don't want to forget... Memories of time spent with friends. Memories of time spent with her alone. Memories are important. But there's something even more important... That's to continue making memories.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: I have no fear of watching you grow old while I remain young. I'll even watch you on your death bed. I am no stranger to death. But your heart is like that of an innocent child. It has always accepted everything about me, without hesitation. Because of that I am very afraid.

author: Kazuma Satou
title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
text: I yearn for true gender equality. I have no patience for one who talks about female privilege when it suits them, and then complains about someone "not being a man" when it's convenient.

author: Ichijou Raku
title: Nisekoi
text: But... If you're the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone, then I'll bet you anything there's someone out there who'll fall in love with you.

author: Shougo Kiryuu
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: Yeah, if I saw her smiling to herself while reading this, I might think it was creepy. But there's something wrong with people who talk trash and laugh behind another's back, too.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Stop pouting! You learned something valuable. Remember the lesson, not the disappointment.

author: Ichijou Raku
title: Nisekoi
text: You're right. Whether I ever see that girl again or not, that doesn't change the fact that this promise is important to me. I'm gonna go on treasuring it.

author: Kamiyama
title: Mayoiga
text: Lies are told prevent yourself from getting hurt.

author: Kanzaki Nao
title: Liar Game
text: I believe that there's not a single person whose heart is evil.

author: Takasaki Misaki
title: Koi to Uso
text:
What is love?
Its when your eyes start following someone, and you look for them if they're not around. You get excited thinking you might run into him when you're putting your shoes on in the morning. And when you don't it's a little disappointing. But then you pass by him and that makes you happy for the rest of the day. It feels like you can handle anything. Seeing him is enough to make you happy.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: I do not want to wake from my dream and discover that I am all alone. I am tired of being alone! I do not want to be cold! I do not want to be lonely!

author: Ichijou Kagetsu
title: Koi to Uso
text: People don't fall in love based on looks. And that's a scientific fact.

author: Celica Arfonia
title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
text: The ones who accomplish something are the fools who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing are the wise who cease advancing.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: I am Horo the Wise Wolf, and I am a very proud wolf.

author: Glenn Radars
title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
text: Just walk the path you believe in. And don't forget, you're the main character of your own life story!

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: I am not so grand, not as a god. I am Horo, and Horo is all that I am.

author: Favaro Leone
title: Shingeki no Bahamut: Genesis
text: To hell with living a life of revenge, I'm me! I live for myself! You're not my sworn enemy or anything else. You're nothing but a putrid demon!

author: Megumin
title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
text: Explosion!!!

author: Jabami Yumeko
title: Kakegurui
text: The only one who can decide your worth.. is you. If you want to earn something, you need to reach out for it. Pro-athletes give up their teenage years to train. Business owners put up collateral to borrow money. That's how it always works. To make your ambitions come true, you have to take risks. The larger the ambition the greater the risk. That might involve time or enough work to affect your lifespan... So make your choice. Live in peace as a wannabe or risk losing it all to reach the very top. You're the one who needs to decide.

author: Makoto Sunakawa
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: Who'd want to date girls that talk smack about your friends?

author: Esdeath
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: I have so many things I want to say, so many things I want to ask you, but... When I see your face... None of that matters anymore!

author: Jabami Yumeko
title: Kakegurui
text: The amount of money one owns ultimately decides the victor. This doesn't stop within the walls of a casino, or it's cash flow. It's a rule that forms the basis for a capitalist society!

author: Leone
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: The lifespan of a human is certainly way too short. That's why you've got to make the most of it and live your life to the fullest.

author: Koichiro Oota
title: Gunbuster
text: It's true that you're lacking in ability. That's because you don't work at it. However, you have a natural potential. That's why I chose you.

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: People who are still tormented by their consciences are still worth saving.

author: Yokoya Norihiko
title: Liar Game
text: That's people for you. Trusting one another, helping one another- it's all a fantasy. Humans are creatures that will always betray.

author: Shō Kazamatsuri
title: Whistle!
text: Why do I want to win so much...? Everyone takes up soccer for different reasons. But we all have a passion for the sport... That drive carries us through a game, even if we lose. If we win, it pushes us forward to the next game. The winners of the game honour the losers by playing with everything they have... and until we hit a wall, until a better team beats us, we should try our best, instead of running away. That's what I want to do!

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: I want to reply with a long message, but if it's too long, that might be kind of revolting. But if it's too short, then I might come off as cold instead. Feeling apprehensive of what to do, I decided to reply back with a similar word count instead. This was what they called "mirroring" in psychology. By emulating the actions of the other party, your affection levels would increase!

author: Jotaro Kujo
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders
text: A road is something that you make yourself.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text:
If what I wished for was granted to me, if what I wanted was given to me. Then, as I thought, I wouldn't wish for anything nor want anything. Because the things you were granted and the things you were given were surely shams that would one day be lost. 

The things you wished for had no shape and the things you wanted were untouchable. Or possibly, they might be the most wonderful treasures that would become nothing if you were to touch them.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text:
It' because you were embarrassed, frustrated, bitter, and jealous. If there's a time when those ill feelings surfaced, then there's also going to be a time where you restrained yourself, smiled, and then cut your relationships afterwards.

Being aware of your eventual break up was a rather complicated thing. If you wanted to graduate with a smile, shouldn't you avoid approaching your friends too much? And that's where having no friends was super convenient!

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: I don't think I'll learn anything if I don't try to do something about it on my own.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Meikyuu
text: If you've got energy to spend on feeling guilty, then use it to show your gratitude.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: To realize a mistake. To not lie. To love one another. To not kill. Those are very simple things, but these times won't allow for them. There is no green on this planet, even though we want it... though we want it so badly. A place where we can live peaceful days with no wars nor stealing. A sacred place where people can live as people. Yes there, that place is called Paradise.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: Compared to failing without even trying, I'd rather take action, even at the risk of a mistake.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: No matter what you're doing, the most essential thing is to not give up. Fail as many times as it takes. Keep trying persistantly untill you can call yourself 'avarage'. If you can collect a nice group of avarage-level skills, that's already above-avarage. You've created your own sort of 'talent'.

author: Glenn Radars
title: Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records
text: It's easy to say "choose so that you'll have no regrets," but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path, you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings, it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret, right?

author: Yukino Miyashita
title: Octave
text: Someone told me this: "Nothing is "forever" in human relationships". That might be true, but it sounds awfully lonely. But I realized today... If there really is no such thing as "forever"... Then having someone important is the happiest thing one can attain in life.

author: Haine Wittgenstein
title: Oushitsu Kyoushi Haine
text: Instead of judging others based on rumors and gossip articles, I must look and feel for myself. You cannot know anyone without coming face-to-face with them.

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: If at some point in life, you made a mistake or keep failing over and over again, and you can't help but think it's useless and you're a good for nothing; Remember, you're only taking a detour. And I'm sure further along your path will come a day where you think, "It was a good life experience". That's why it'll be fine.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: Success is harder than failure for many things in this world.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it. Yes, some ghouls walk a path that leaves sorrow in their wake, but just like humans, we can choose a different path altogether. We have a lot to learn, both your kind and mine. We need to stop fighting, and start talking. Because when it comes to the state of the world, you can't point your finger at ghouls or humans. We're all to blame.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Even if we walk on different paths, one must always live on as you are able! You must never treat your own life as something insignificant! You must never forget the friends you love for as long as you live! Let bloom the flowers of light within your hearts.

author: Eren Kruger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: There is no such thing as truth in this world. That is our reality. Anyone can become a God or a Devil. All it takes is for someone to claim that to be the truth.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!

author: Ei Sei
title: Kingdom
text: People's lives don't belong to anyone. Anyone, except themselves. But people have a path. The path of how to use that life.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Unfortunately, I don't have a nice eyeball like you, that can see this and that. All I can do to pursue one thing in front of me. So whether it's the abyss of death or an empty void, I won't fight for the manju offered to my grave. I'll fight for tomorrow's breakfast. That's all.

author: Leticia Draculair
title: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
text: You shouldn't judge something without trying it first. Having a variety of experiences is what makes life worth living.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru.
text: Well it's not like the world is full of sunshine and daisies. If society was only shaped by the view that one must be happy-go-lucky all the time, Hollywood wouldn't make tear-jerking movies, would they?

author: Rouka Numachi
title: Hanamonogatari
text: There isn't anything that's evil to everyone. Even the worst evil saves something. On the other hand, even the greatest good hurts someone. The phrase "There are no absolutes in this world" means there isn't any absolute good or absolute evil.

author: Tanaka
title: Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
text: Being angry consumes energy and makes me tired. So I'd rather apologize, even if I'm not at fault. Besides, we get along, and we both want to stay friends. Prolonging an awkward situation out of stubbornness is just silly.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: You're absolutely right. I can't do anything alone.  Everyone has their flaws and imperfections, but that's what drives us to work together... To make up for those flaws. Together, we make the perfect main character.

author: Tanya Degurechaff
title: Youjo Senki
text: Miracles are illusions caused by insufficient observation and understanding. They're just... glorious misunderstandings.

author: Rintarou Tatewaki
title: Magic-Kyun! Renaissance
text: Smile. Not for anyone else, but for yourself. Show yourself your own smile. You'll feel better then.

author: Satoru Fujinuma
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: Every day, the words cross my mind.  "If I had done this back then..." but they don't take the sincere form of regret.  The words are just an excuse that come to my mind then disappear.

author: Sakagami Takumi
title: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterunda.
text: I'd talk, but... I fell into the habit of not saying what I really felt, somewhere along the way. And then I started believing that there wasn't anything... that I really wanted to tell anyone.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Nekomonogatari: Kuro
text: It's not like people only look for help by saying "please help me." In similiar vein, it's not like you're only in love with someone if you say "I love you." Everyone has things they can't say on impulse.

author: Duke Tōgō
title: Golgo 13
text: Pride is an eminent trait, but too much will cause arrogance. That is when it becomes disgusting.

author: Eureka
title: Eureka Seven
text: It's not like something is going to happen because I believe in it.  Sometimes you end up worse off because you believed in something too much. There are times it's tough to believe in something.

author: Shouya Ishida
title: Koe no Katachi
text: I intended to listen to your voice, but it really was nothing but intentions. It's pretty obvious, huh? Of course there's more going on than what people choose to tell you... But I convinced myself that was all there is to a person. I knew that, but still I interpreted the stuff I didn't understand about you in ways convenient for me... That's just how I am.

author: Tooru Oikawa
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: Today might be the chance to grasp the chance to let your talent bloom. Maybe tomorrow, the day after, or next year... Maybe even when you're thirty. I'm not sure if physique has anything to do with it, but if you think that it will never come, it probably never will.

author: Shuu Tsukiyama
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it, literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so, we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text:
The universe has a beginning, but no end. — Infinity.
Stars, too, have their own beginnings, but their own power results in their destruction. — Finite.
It is those who possess wisdom who are the greatest fools. History has shown us this.
You could say that this is the final warning from God to those who resist.

author: Handa Seishū
title: Barakamon
text: Simplicity is the easiest path to true beauty.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: Stop pitying yourself. Pity yourself, and life becomes an endless nightmare.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: For a pregnant woman to give birth, she's gotta feel the pain of pulling a watermelon out of her nostril. For an Artist to create a masterpiece, he's gotta feel the pain of pulling entire galaxies out  of his ass.

author: Shougo Kiryuu
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: You can only become friends by talking to people and finding out whether you get along.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: Anything I would never want to lose is always lost. It is a given that everything that is worth wanting will be lost the moment I obtain it. There's nothing worth pursuing at the cost of prolonging a life of suffering.

author: Mei Aihara
title: Citrus
text: The two of us aren't so different. My whole life I've desired from others. I felt bitter to the people around me and I closed off my heart...and a heart that lets nothing in..will become empty before you realize it. But in this world, you'll sometimes meet meddlesome people who will, even without asking, give you the love you need. And for someone like you or me, meeting such a person is very blissful.

author: Shin Woo Baek
title: Teen Spirit
text: You can become happy right now." I won't say these types of absurd lies. However, if you get through these current hardships and survive - a time where you can be happy will come.

author: Jinbei
title: One Piece
text: It may be hard right now... But you must silence those thoughts! Stop counting only those things that you have lost! What is gone, is gone! So ask yourself this: What is there... that still remains to you?!

author: Satsuki Kiryuuin
title: Kill la Kill
text: A castle that vanishes at the first gust of wind is worthless. A skyscraper within your mind will never fall down.

author: Escha Malier
title: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky
text: What's important is not what's right, but what we believe is right.

author: Minako Kanou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Unlike in manga and anime, in real life, no heroes can save you when you're down.

author: Shinra Kishitani
title: Durarara!!
text: Even if everyone in the whole world dies, I won't care, as long as my beloved survives.

author: Ja Wangnan
title: Tower Of God
text: I believe the difference between those up there and me is the question of whether you have given up or not.

author: Ryner Lute
title: The Legend of the Legendary Heroes
text: People don't kill people, really. Monsters do. Monsters like war, hungry nobles, and greedy kingdoms. And monsters like me, not you.

author: Akari
title: Karneval
text: Our lives become a reality through the most meticulous calculations. Doing our best to continue living is a resolution ingrained in all of us. And this shapes the right future for us. You could say it is life's greatest mystery. I want to observe the destination reached by the many lives that are created.

author: Jun'ichi Hoshiyama
title: Welcome to Irabu's Office
text: This world offers no guarantees for the future.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: It's times like this that I wish I could come up with an appropriate response.  I hate myself for not being able to reply properly.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text:
Leaving my mother's body, for the first time I learned the chill of cold air and the warmth of human hands.
Cradled by my father and carried out of that room, for the first time, I learned the extent of the
sky and the vast expanse of the world.  Stepping off my everyday path, I learned my own laugh
which I'd never yet heard. Beyond...Beyond this planet..To learn what I still don't know. One more step beyond...
Closer to you.

author: Chris Yukine
title: Senki Zesshō Symphogear
text: And the one person who I thought understood me was just using me all along. No one ever treated me as an equal. Adults are all trash. They didn't listen when I said that it hurt. They didn't listen when I told them to stop. They didn't listen to anything I said!

author: Kyouraku Shunsui
title: Bleach
text: That's just the way it is. Change is inevitable. Instead of resisting it, you're better served simple going with the flow.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs 2nd Season
text: Man fears death and yet, at the same time, man is drawn to death. Death is endlessly consumed by men in cities and in literature. It is a singular event in one's life that none may reverse. That is what I desire.

author: Yogi
title: Karneval
text: While it takes time to recover from the loss of a loved one, having an opportunity to take your mind off things helps too.

author: Higuchi Seitarou
title: Yojouhan Shinwa Taikei
text: The root of all your evil is in always relying on one of your other possibilities to get your wish. You must accept that you are the person here, now, and that you cannot become anyone else other than that person.

author: Reiji Akaba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: No matter how careful your risk hedging is, there will still be holes in your plan! Realizing them and making sure that they are promptly dealt with, is the duty of those who stand at the top.

author: Yuzu Hiiragi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: Smiles are what connect people! It allows them to communicate through their souls! Souls that are connected... Will never lose to power that only relies on control!

author: Twenty-Fifth Baam
title: Tower Of God
text: Your god is a fragment of your imagination from your weakness.

author: Takeo Gouda
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: I have no idea what you really want, what you're really thinking, or what the right thing to do really is. But I'm your friend. Let me stay.

author: Seiya Kanie
title: Amagi Brilliant Park
text: Anyway, here's my point. Trivial setbacks like yours and mine are nothing but common occurrences in everyday life! Getting hung up over pointless crap like that shows that you're a joke! A complete and utter joke!

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Remember that a sword held by someone who is about to die… will never be able to protect anything.

author: Tsukamoto Tsukushi
title: Days (TV
text: Life isn't about counting all the things you've lost, It's about increasing the number of important things in it.

author: Dio Brando
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood
text: Jojo, being human means having limits. I've learned something. The more carefully you scheme, the more unexpected events come along

author: Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryusai
title: Bleach
text: Do not live bowing down. You must die standing up.

author: Jotaro Kujo
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders
text: Evil is when you use the weak for your own gain and crush them under your foot.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: Are you afraid? You don't want to die, do you? Not just Abarai, if anyone… acts upon the thought of not wanting you to die, you will suddenly begin to fear your impending death, right?

author: William A. Zeppeli
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Phantom Blood
text: Courage must know fear and make fear its own! Fear upsets breathing! Conquer fear and your breath will never fail you! Hamon breathing comes from courage! A good human is a brave human! Courage is a marvel of humanity!

author: Vorona
title: Durarara!!
text: A city far away from my homeland.  There, after becoming acquainted with strangers, have I changed, perhaps?  That uncontrollable impulse I harbored within me...Has it faded away now, I wonder? What exactly am I doing here in this city?

author: Soujuu Matsushita
title: Whistle!
text: Each one of them has something to improve. Victory doesn't come from technique or power alone. In the end, what's needed is a heart that won't give up. The only question is -- Do they have what it takes to push beyond their limits?

author: Ryou
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Have a dream that you can achieve within your lifetime!

author: Oubu
title: Reikenzan: Hoshikuzu-tachi no Utage
text: Old techniques created by others will never be your own. Only what you create and experience for yourself can become your own.

author: Kuklo
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
text: All the people I saw from my cage...All the things I saw from my cage, that was the whole world to me. At first, all I could sense was the hostility of the people looking at me from outside...And their feelings of fear. Piercing gazes, hurled stones, whips, sticks...Everything outside the cage was frightening, a source of pain...But eventually I began to realize something. I began to see their other emotions, not just their hostility and fear of me. They were the emotions of families, lovers, and friends who came to the sideshow...Emotions meant for each other.

author: Dordonii Alessandro Del Socacchio
title: Bleach
text: Don't hesitate to cut the enemy. Don't falter to finish them off. Much less heal their wounds. That's unspeakable, nino. Leave the chocolate here. Become a demon, nino. As strong as a demon. As wicked as a demon. You have to learn that the only way to stand up against ruthlessness, is to become ruthless yourself.

author: Hange Zoe
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I want everyone to feel safe again soon...I want this to be a world where people can without fighting each other.

author: Shinra Kishitani
title: Durarara!!
text: Those three are best friends.  They have their respective secrets.  And they're deliberately trying not to give themselves away.  But neither Orihara or Shizuo had any secrets whatsoever.  And that resulted in the complete opposite kind of personal relationship.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: You are fighting out of obligation, not out of hatred. You will never reach me like that. Battle without hatred is like a bird without wings. You'll never defeat anyone like that. You powerless friends are just weights that will break your legs.

author: Kuruwa Kimiharu
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: You see, I really hate the word "responsibility" saying something or doing something "it's your responsibility" "take responsibility" making a "selection" always comes with "responsibility." That's why I abandoned "selection" therefore, I don't have to bear any responsibility anymore.

author: Akisame Koetsuji
title: Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
text: You cannot go into battle believing you will lose.

author: Ikta Solork
title: Alderamin on the Sky
text: I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Don't be so stuck-up. Just enjoy this! Killing and being killed. They are just a way to pass time.

author: Kouhei Inuzuma
title: Amaama to Inazuma
text: Sometimes things go badly, even if nobody really did anything wrong.

author: Chiaki Nanami
title: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
text: It doesn't make a difference whether you have a talent or not. I mean, that isn't the end goal. You have greater freedom than we do. All I have are games. But you can go anywhere and become anything.

author: Seiya Kanie
title: Amagi Brilliant Park
text: You guys sure are a worthless bunch. If you wanna wallow in your tears, save it for after you've done everything you can!

author: Makoto Sunakawa
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: Who wouldn't want their friends to be happy? That's just normal, man. It's nothing amazing.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2
text: As a human, what kind of achievements will you leave behind?  I bet you'll leave behind a legacy as a psychotic killer, and that thrills me!

author: Kou Kazamatsuri
title: Whistle!
text: Charging from the front isn't the only way to cross a wall. If pushing doesn't work, why not try pulling? Try thinking from the opposite direction, you might be able to find a new way out.

author: Johannes Mimir Faustus
title: SERVAMP
text: i'm on a little boat. I'm going against the current of the river, downstream to upstream. If you want something more, you move forward with all your might. If you try to stop, you fall behind. Humans can never stop moving. If they do not yearn for something... Right! Nothing begins without action! You gain nothing if you do nothing! Satisfaction is stagnation! Stagnation is death! I want to know! See! Feel! Experience! Understand! This monster is amazing, but we know nothing about him! This monster strength was amazing. He won every battle he fought! The ultimate soldier! Now it's a war between vampires? I have to thank the Servamp of Melancholy! In every era, wars have created progress!

author: Shirasagi Yuki
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: In some ways, the more one thinks, the closer one feels to getting the answer...but in the end, it's hard to tell what is really the safe answer. I started to dislike being like that at one point, and my motto is, "make quick decisions and act fast." I choose the first answer that feels "right" to me.

author: Father Willibald
title: Vinland Saga
text: Let those who seek death find it.

author: Takane Saibara
title: Takane to Hana
text: Having everything handed to you on a silver platter doesn't necessarily equate to happiness. There are too many choices that you don't even want...

author: Historia Reiss
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: We need to stop living for others. From now on...Let's live for ourselves!!

author: Thorkell
title: Vinland Saga
text: I love fighting, but even more than that, I hate losing! I only fight to win!!

author: Gajeel Redfox
title: Fairy Tail
text: After everything I've faced.... Having a future with you snatched away from me ...is definitely the most terrifying thing I've ever had to endure....

author: Vorona
title: Durarara!!
text: Love. I myself have never loved another person.  Most likely, I don't even love myself.  I do have knowledge of it.  But I am incapable of determining whether or not it is vital in my life.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: It's a battle of life and death, and I'm still alive! So I'm not going to give up, and I'll keep living. I'll keep living until I die.

author: Takane Saibara
title: Takane to Hana
text: In order to achieve something there are some things that you have to be unsatisfied with in the first place. Having a complex is the source to greatness.

author: Naru
title: Girl Friends
text: If I'm not at my limit, means I'm not trying as hard as I can!

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: There are only so many lives I can value. And...I decided who those people were six years ago. So...You shouldn't try to ask for my pity. Because right now, I don't have...Time to spare or room in my heart.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Kill me. Make it quick. I no longer have the strength left in me to even walk. If you do not cut me down now, then this will go unsettled for eternity.

author: Vorona
title: Durarara!!
text: If there's any possibility that I might visit this city again...Then I challenge you to a duel.  I wish to speak with you head-on, to within an inch of my life...To actually experience the joy of existing in this world...that is my desire.

author: Ylva
title: Vinland Saga
text: Well, if they're dead, then that's the end of it. Crying about it gets you nothing but an empty stomach

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: We fall into a routine and make careless mistakes because of that. Maybe it'd be good for us to have some excitement or be under pressure once in a while.

author: Francis Scott Key Fitzgerald
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: Wealth is a nightmare. With each coveted thing we buy, we lose a thing we dream about.

author: Ymir
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I want to survive...And see her again. As a person, I'm really lower than shit...But she knows that, and she smiles kindly at me anyway.

author: Bishamonten
title: Noragami
text: You are human, are you not? You are allowed to make mistakes.

author: Father Willibald
title: Vinland Saga
text: Love provides the worth of everything in the world. Without love...gold, silver, horses, and women...all are worthless.

author: Blue Owl
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: A true hero is a sage with a clean heart, a fake hero is a fool with an ignoble heart. The sage will be saved and the fool will be punished.

author: Mary
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Okay. I will protect all of you. I will never let another friend die.

author: Kazuma
title: Noragami
text: I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me, I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again, because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you, but this was the only way I knew how.

author: Takuan Sōhō
title: Vagabond
text: You keep your nerves on edge and you're always ready to lash out. You distance yourself from everyone. It's because you are afraid of people. YOU are the weakest person in this village.

author: Cardina Baumeister
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
text: Not all people in prison are criminals

author: Kai
title: Suicide Island
text: If all life is so important, then the most evil of all beings on this earth are without a doubt humans. If there weren't any people on earth, the environment and conditions that all living things live in would be drastically better. Even if there were no school to teach us the stuff we know, it would still be obvious to everyone, wouldn't it? Just think of all that's happened to the earth due to our desires and ego.

author: Blue Owl
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: There's no master who deliberately lets his birds escape from his birdcage

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Yeah, we've become friends. When you're in the same party, there will be times when things don't go smoothly, when you get angry, and when you fight. But they really are your precious friends. It doesn't matter why you became friends, but that you are friends at this moment.

author: Thorkell
title: Vinland Saga
text: Doesn't it ever get boring always being on the winning side?

author: Bishamonten
title: Noragami
text: You asked me if I was ready to carry on. In all honesty, I am not sure of myself. But there is something that must be done now. And I will do it.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Yhwach. You desired a world... Where fear would no longer be a burden. But... In a world without fear of death... People will never attain the hope that is to be found from casting their fears aside and preserving through them. While it is true that people can continue to press forward through the simple act of living... That is no way comparable to marching forward in the face of death, while doing their damndest to keep it at bay. That is why... That is why people have given that very march a unique and special name. "COURAGE."

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I have no Strength, but I want it all. I have no Knowledge, but all I do is dream. There's nothing I can do, but I struggle in vain

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Mongrels though they may be, they're still figures of some slight renown

author: Takuan Sōhō
title: Vagabond
text: So you want to die honorably? You are being selfish. Each and every person you killed had his own life. Whether that life was blessed or not ... everyone is born into this world ... they grow up ... some people have family ... some are alone in this world ... some have young children ... some are engaged ... some have pets ...some people have high hopes and great dreams ... other have no ambition at all and you ended everything for them Takezo

author: Dr. Kuseno
title: One Punch Man
text: You are calm and intelligent, but youth can invite disaster. Do not fight alone.

author: Atsushi Nakajima
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: People need to be told they're worthy of being alive by someone else or they can't go on.

author: Kai
title: Suicide Island
text: How can you work so hard? There might be something really bad waiting for you ahead. How can you still make yourself move on despite that? The older we get...the number of annoying and troublesome things we have to face only increases- and wonderful things stop happening. In the days ahead of us... we have to bear each painful thing one at a time, conquering them...overcoming them...the power to do that just doesn't spring out of me. The power to move ahead.

author: Blue Owl
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: "Selection" is important. Even in life. Living, dying, killing are all the results from your selection. Bad luck? Poor fortune? Poor judges of character? You're wrong. It's a selection error for not thinking thoroughly and choosing the answer without proper consideration.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa under the Bridge × Bridge
text:
Waiting for you. Waiting for your knock. The only thing that stands between us is a single door. Shining
my shoes and placing a piece of eternally fresh bread in my pocket, I prepare for my journey.
When you're ready, just look up at me.  Right now, I'm just waiting for you...Waiting for your knock.

author: Soujuu Matsushita
title: Whistle!
text: It's okay to make mistakes. In fact, you should. Making mistakes is how you learn to do it right. Getting a good result isn't the only thing. What matters is that you play your best during the game.

author: Shinohara
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I understand the pain of losing a comrade. I've experienced it, too. Please do not forget the pain. You will move forward while holding on to that pain. Please treasure the comrades you have now. Once they are gone, they will not return. Usually, you don't realize this until afterwards.

author: Thorkell
title: Vinland Saga
text: I'd had fifteen years to think about him. And I realized that it wasn't a matter of the life or death of flesh. What's important to a warrior is the soul...And where it lies.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Surely there must be limits to which one may sink.

author: Canute
title: Vinland Saga
text: The world...God's divine creation...Is so brimming with love...Yet there is no love in the hearts of men.

author: Takuan Sōhō
title: Vagabond
text: Live on and endure the shadows! There is no light for those who do not know darkness.

author: Hiyori Iki
title: Noragami
text: If you're in a position to save people, you should never even joke like that. My father...The doctor...Would never abandon anyone. He'd never give up on a person's life, even if they tried to throw it away.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: Look, you.  All this talk about monsters...that's what people have called me ever since I was a kid.  I've snapped and lost sight of everything around me, and I've made trouble for Celty more than once or twice.  Even so, she still heard me out, without interrupting.  And so now it's my turn to hear her out, all right?

author: Leif Ericson
title: Vinland Saga
text: Not all warriors fight on the battlefield with a sword in hand. A sailor makes his living battling the sea

author: Hayashi
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: The more battles we fought, the more our confidence grew. We weren't afraid of anything back then. But the difference between victory and defeat is paper-thin. We didn't realize this and were arrogant.

author: Hyoudou Kazutaka
title: Kaiji
text: Kings do not become kings by themselves. If the poor raise up together, declaring that they don't want any money, kings will be overthrown. However, poor seek money so that they can become kings themselves. Which in turn only strengthens the position of the current king.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: You brake the law and I'll punish you, there is no room for discussion.

author: Makoto Sunakawa
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: Studying is for people to get the knowledge they need to not screw up in life.

author: Fujitora
title: One Piece
text: If you were to be troubled over something as trivial as losing face, then it's better to not have it at all.

author: Canute
title: Vinland Saga
text: Where in this world can a sane man be found? We're the same. We're all the same. None of us understands what it means to love all. Or the meaning of life...Or the meaning of death...Or the meaning of our own battles.

author: Gai Tsutsugami
title: Guilty Crown
text: The world offers up a choice to live or die. The survival of the fittest that's the only governing law this world recognizes.

author: Yuki Takeya
title: Gakkou Gurashi!
text: There are days when nothing goes right. There are days when you stumble and fall. There are days when you just want to cry. To cry a lot. To sleep a lot. Or even eat a lot. It's alright, as long as you pick yourself up again.

author: Shirasagi Yuki
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: I believe that people have the individual right to decide how they want to live. So whether you just listen to what others say, or get stuck a lot of times...and cause trouble to others, it ultimately comes back to yourself.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I know we can't immediately treat her as part of our group, but if we always think of her as an outsider, she'll never have a chance to become part of our group.

author: Mizuno Tatsuya
title: Whistle!
text: That kid's good point is that he feels he doesn't have much skill. It's this kind of person that will keep on improving.

author: Bishamonten
title: Noragami
text: If you hurt me, then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain, as well.

author: Askeladd
title: Vinland Saga
text: Only those who do their jobs on the battlefield get the rewards they desire. That's the life of a warrior.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Being strong isn't just about having power or move, it about one's spirit

author: Matahachi Hon'iden
title: Vagabond
text: No matter how many years it's been since they met, brothers are brothers, aren't they? Even without having seen, I can tell.

author: Kintarō Tōyama
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: If your failing, then keep trying until you don't.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Even if there's nothing here today, there might be something tomorrow.  It's a caring heart that's important.

author: Nyanta
title: Log Horizon
text: People...At least, all children are born into a world that seems unreasonable and crazy to them. No one is asked at birth if they agree to come into the world. Everyone is born that way.

author: Erwin Smith
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer.

author: Shinra Kishitani
title: Durarara!!
text: These days, I feel more comfortable in dark places.  I look at these shadows as a part of you.  They absorb all the light.  There's no one in the world who has this color but you.

author: Thors
title: Vinland Saga
text: You have no enemies. No one...Has any enemies. There is no one...That you should hurt

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: It doesn't matter what you were like before. Nobody cares.

author: Brittany
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Living has it own challenges. I'll give you just one piece of advice. Don't quit. Yes, when you die, you die. But if you give up, you're definitely going to die. That, I am sure of.

author: Atsuko Chiba
title: Paprika
text: You're fat, slow and sloppy. It's not the outside that counts, but there's a limit to that too.

author: Makoto Ōgami
title: Ghost Hound
text: Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the the most lonely one.

author: William Massachusetts
title: Log Horizon
text: A man's come all the way out to the end of the North to ask for my help. Wouldn't it be rude to wait to hear what he wanted?

author: Karren von Rosewald
title: Tokyo Ghoul:re
text: The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself.

author: Askeladd
title: Vinland Saga
text: You're young. Time is on your side. You'll grow up and I'll grow old. Someday you'll likely beat me. It's only natural. Even the strongest man must die.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text:
The present isn't everything, but there are things you can only do now, things you can only find here. 
It's now or never. Think, Writhe, Struggle and agonize. If not, what you are going through isn't genuine.

author: Rurumu
title: Adventures of Sinbad
text: Smile. Even if you're facing an enemy, people can't attack others with a smile.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: Look, all it means is that when I lose it, it's cause things make no sense.  If there was any logic to it, then I wouldn't get pissed even if I got shot or stabbed.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: You mongrels. By our next meeting see that you've culled your numbers. Only a true hero is worthy to look upon my glorious presence.

author: Askeladd
title: Vinland Saga
text: A fight you can't win becomes an obsession

author: Gajeel Redfox
title: Fairy Tail
text: You taught me what it means to love, and for that I will be eternally grateful.

author: Manato
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I'm the one who is grateful. That's because you're all willing to be my friends. For that, I'm grateful.

author: Shinra Kishitani
title: Durarara!!
text: He may seem cold-blooded, but he's more human and his heart is more brittle than anyone else... so much so that if you filled it with human love or betrayal, it'd break easily... which is why I think he chose to avoid it all from the start: to love humanity. Do you understand? Not to accept it, not to face it, but he chose to avoid it.

author: Carly Stratmann
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Lost Girls
text: They don't know that once you lose something, you can never get it back again.

author: Bors Elder
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: We've never worked together before, so don't worry about teamwork! Just stay out of each other's way. Fight the way you want to fight!

author: Ranta
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I'm a man who makes precise choices about time, place, and people. Pleople call me Master of Choices. I'm gonna be the King of the Choices!

author: Haschwalth Jugram
title: Bleach
text: Even if doesn't alter or change the end result in the slightest, making decisions based on convictions that you believe in and walking your own path has its own merit and worth. There's something to be said for not having... even one regret.

author: Mr. Blouse
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Those who don't fulfill their obligation to others 'ave no right to ask 'em for such privilege...

author: Ouka Kashima
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: I don't want to be a loser who can't do anything but talk. I don't want to be somebody who can sacrifice others, but won't risk himself.

author: Barbara
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: If you have enough breath to say you don't have energy, I haven't push you far enough!

author: Mia Grand
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: When you're just starting out, put all your energy into surviving. No matter how pathetic you feel, or how people laugh at you, if you come back alive, you win.

author: Gendou Ikari
title: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance
text: People live on by forgetting their memories. But there are some memories that should never be forgotten.

author: Kubota Yoshinobu
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: I understand now... What I really need to protect isn't myself, much less my money. It's my pride.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: As for me, I have a lot of things that I'm not good at and that I need to work on. My comrades make up for those weaknesses by help me out, and maybe that's how we've found a balance in our party.

author: Yoake Ryou
title: ReLIFE
text: If someone always follows the perfect path without ever facing hardship... Is it really what's best for that person?

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: Life and death are like light and shadow. They're both always there. But people don't like thinking about death, so subconsciously, they always look away from it.

author: Thors
title: Vinland Saga
text: The only reason I must rely on this sword is because I am imperfect. A true warrior...Needs no sword

author: Hwan Sung-Gong
title: The Gamer
text: Tell me, if you have something more important than your life, and you have to give up your life to protect that, what would you do? In that case, isn't there only one answer? Give up your life.

author: Sei
title: Suicide Island
text: Right now, we're all really only taking it day by day. Even if we can't get used to things, even if we can't win at something, even if we don't have any excess...In order to live day by day, we work, we fail, and we succeed. Sometimes we laugh. For the blessing before our very eyes, for our friends, we're thankful. Who knew that people could feel happiness just from living?

author: Trowa Barton
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
text: I've continually fought, and with each battle I've been killing my own heart. And my heart has been completely void of feeling for quite a long time now. Maybe my life doesn't have value anymore, but I have to keep on living.

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: If you keep on hiding your true feelings, who is going to be happy? If you are sad, you should say it out loud!

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: If you don't face each other with honesty, what kind of family is this?

author: Marlowe Sand
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: They'll learn that a man without reason is no different from an animal who defecates wherever it pleases.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: Once the thread of fate is tangled, it cannot be undone.

author: Heero Yuy
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
text: I can't stand the weak, They're always nervous about when they might next be attacked. They can't trust anybody and they never have an opinion of their own. I can't stand such people.

author: Ymir
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Living this way is my way of getting revenge!! I'm going to be living proof that your fate isn't decided at birth!! So what about you?! You're going to kill yourself, the ultimate act of submission. Is that how much you want to please the people who treated you like a nuisance?! Why are you trying to hurt yourself?! If your will is that strong... Then shouldn't you be able to change your fate?!

author: Sengoku the Buddha
title: One Piece
text: Don't try to find a reason for somebody's love!!

author: Askeladd
title: Vinland Saga
text: A man, slave to gold, holds a whip...And beats the slave he bought with that gold as if to claim HE is the master. He just doesn't see it for himself. Every living human being is a slave to something

author: Akari Koumoto
title: Jitsu wa Watashi wa
text: Love is more afraid of change than destruction.

author: Ymir
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Just because you want other people to think of you as someone who'd literally die for another... dragging someone else to his death just for that... only a bad girl would do that, right?

author: Shin Hyuga Shaing
title: Code Geass: Akito the Exiled
text: Belief in others is an illusion concocted by the clever to exploit the stupid.

author: Tanaka
title: Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
text: The weather's nice and the breeze feels good. The little birds are making their cute chirping sounds. Perhaps people nowadays have forgotten how wonderful nature is... Yes, don't you think it's a waste to not feel it with your entire body like this?

author: Hange Zoe
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Even in moments of the deepest despair... I guess we can still find hope, huh?

author: Kaidou Haru
title: Super Lovers
text: But... When I lost the whole foundation of my happiness in one instant, I realized that I was the biggest coward in the world.

author: Biba Amatori
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: We humans are miserable creatures. We reject what we fear. We attack because we don' t understand. Human cowardice... breeds war.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: If you really want to be strong... Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Lost Girls
text: All day, I've had to sit in the stench of cigarettes and alcohol. Every single person I met today was drinking and smoking. If they weren't, they were doing drugs. Well, except for Wayne. I've... had enough of it.

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Lost Girls
text: Sometimes you have days like this. Days where the most trivial little thing... Ends up getting you wrapped up in some big, annoying trouble.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: (To Ichigo Kurosaki) You are a fool, Ichigo Kurosaki. You willingly seek to challenge an opponent so much more powerful than you that it strikes a primal fear into your being. Incomprehensible.
