If this is the work of the 'heart' that you people speak of, then it is because you possess this 'heart' that you humans bring hurt upon yourself, because you possess this 'heart' that you lose your lives

author: Hange Zoe
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Even if all we accomplished were small steps forward... We continued to give our lives if it meant that one day... humanity would be free from this terror.

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal, either. People like you... get called special.

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: Man or Child, Strong or Weak, None of those matter once you are out at sea!

author: Kubard
title: The Heroic Legend of Arslan
text: The world won't always go the way you want it to. Better not take it to seriously.

author: Arslan
title: The Heroic Legend of Arslan
text: The one who holds power has no self-awareness of his responsibilities and the one aware of the responsibilities has no power at all.

author: Arslan
title: The Heroic Legend of Arslan
text: Zealotry and prejudice more than anything, bring harm to the people of the land.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: Love is not necessary, power is the only true necessity.

author: Goltas
title: Magi - The Labyrinth of Magic
text: The chains of fear are easily broken with the blade of courage.

author: Hakuei Ren
title: Magi - The Labyrinth of Magic
text: To force obedience by the sword now will only invite bloody rebellion later.

author: Kenshiro
title: Fist of the North Star
text: The  pain on these wounds will last only a second. The pain of your death would last a lifetime.

author: Gantz
title: Gantz
text: The Killer instinct is not perceived by words, but by look

author: Kei Kurono
title: Gantz
text: Yeah, so I don't appear to be the brightest crayon in the box but I still look down on the rest of the world.

author: Takada
title: Aoi Bungaku Series
text: Still I've never thought of myself as an unfortunate person. Of course I am not a fortunate person either. In the first place a fortunate person could never write plays or novels. I write while loving my misfortune almost as if I'm tasting it.

author: Wolfgang Grimmer
title: Monster
text: You can't just erase people's feelings. It's as if my emotions were lost somewhere hundreds of miles away. It's as if they were sent long ago, in a letter that was always intended for me.

author: Junko Enoshima
title: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen
text: Hope is harmony. A just heart, moving toward the light. That is all. Despair is hope's polar opposite. It is messy and confusing. Despair swallows up love, hatred, and everything else. Because not knowing where you will end up is despair. Despair is what even you cannot predict. Only despair's unpredictability will save you from a boring future.

author: Nao Yasumori
title: Shiki
text: My new family is just so kind. It's almost if there's been some kind of mistake... like, I'll have to pay back for all this happiness later on.

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin: Lost Girls
text: What must be done... Must be done. No matter what. Complete your mission. You were born into this world so that you could complete your mission.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Even if they're only a year older, shouldn't we respect and serve our elders?

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: It seems like we spent a long time together, but it wasn't. It was actually pretty short. Too short. So I kind of know, but I kind of don't know what I want to say. He was friendly, easy to talk to, and smart. He could do anything and was reliable. I thought he was perfect. But maybe I just didn't realize what his faults were. He might have been hiding his flaws.

author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: Vagabond
text: Pray not for the future. Rely not on the future or the past. Just stay in the Now.

author: Pariston Hill
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Normally, as people love and are loved, they feel happiness. When I am hated by people, that is when I feel happiness. And then I want to tear apart and inflict unimaginable harm to the things I love. But is that really all that strange, I wonder?

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: I actually don't think something like perfection exists. That is I think why we are born able to absorb things... and by comparing ourselves with something else we can finally head in a good direction.

author: Hidehito Nomura
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: I think I finally understand... As long as there's someone who'll grieve, it's wrong to want to die.

author: Ranta
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: So now we know her past. So what? It doesn't have anything to do with us. We have to be nice to her just because she's had a rough past? You've got to be kidding.

author: Sweet Mask
title: One Punch Man
text: A hero must be tough, strong and beautiful... As well as able to promptly and splendidly eradicate evil.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: So long as I don't give up, the possibility of winning will never fall to zero.

author: No Game No Life
title: No Game No Life
text: This blank space represents infinite potential. One day, it may become anything.

author: Yayoi Kanbara
title: Gekijou-ban Kyoukai no Kanata -I'll Be Here- Mirai-hen
text: Youmu or Spirit Warrior... In the end, none of that really matters. Nor does the question of who you are. All that matters is to be close to the ones you care about.

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Nobody knows what will happen in the future. Something even better might happen tomorrow.

author: Han Jee-Han
title: The Gamer
text: If you ask what life is to me, I'd answer endless days of homework and pain. Why you ask? The amount of homework, it's too much.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Mankind is a very intresting species.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: People cannot show each other their true feelings. Fear, suspicion, and resentment never subside.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Owarimonogatari
text: Even if mistaken, even if cruel, even if stupid, if many people acknowledge it, I found out that it can become the right thing. I found out that righteousness was able to be infinitely mass-produced. I found out that righteousness was established by the number of people. I found out that maneuvering for a majority was everything.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Those painful memories are what help us make it to tomorrow and become stronger.

author: Bell Cranel
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: I can't forgive myself. I wanted something to happen without doing anything myself! I have to do it. I have to do it all... Or I can't even stand by her side!

author: Arato Hisako
title: Shokugeki no Sōma
text: If there's something you want to go through with, you should stick to it without keeping up appearances.

author: Hayabusa Shou
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: I'm here because I don't like to be tied down. So you should decide for yourself who you want for your friend.

author: Ranta
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Why do we have to be okay being friends with someone who won't treat us as friends?

author: Ryu Lion
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: Humility is a virtue, but do not insult yourself.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: (To Ichigo Kurosaki) Do not allow yourself to be shaken. Do not weaken your stance. Open your senses. And do not let your guard down for an instant.

author: Crona
title: Soul Eater
text: I hate, hate, HATE everyone. But that's okay. I can use my screams to blow them all away. I'm sure dead people are a lot easier to deal with.

author: Fukase
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Don't you think forcing people to help with something pointless is far more cruel?

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: You have yet to see what form your soul has taken. That's what it actually means when you claim that you lack joy in your life.

author: Tet
title: No Game No Life
text: What do you think about your world? Is it fun? Is it easy to live in?

author: Goku Black
title: Dragon Ball Super
text: I am looking at things from a much higher perspective than you. I observe this world, this universe, the truth of all things. And I have come to realize that humanity must be destroyed. Out of all which the Gods have made, humans are their sole failure. They are a disease that must be vanquished. A filth that must be cleansed. They have no place here, in this universe, and if I am to make it a utopia once more, then I must take upon the grand task of removing humanity forever, in place of the Gods who refuse to admit their mistake.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: You said that she's no different from us, right? So if we don't try to get to know her, she won't try to get to know us either. If we don't treat her as a friend, she won't treat us as her friends either, right?

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: When you aim to reach high places, you may find yourself on narrow footing and feel disheartened. And then your confidence will falter, and you will find it ever harder to believe in yourself. If you ever feel that you can't believe in yourself, please believe in your friends.

author: Sakagami Takumi
title: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterunda.
text: Well, singing, or music... I think by nature it was always meant to convey something. So if there's something you want to say, don't you think you should try singing it?

author: Marco Bodt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You're not a strong person, so you can really understand how weak people feel. I mean... Most humans are weak, including me... But if I got an order from someone who saw things like I do, no matter how tough it was, I'd do my damnedest to carry it out.

author: Ranta
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: We should be driven by things like our desires, instincts, and impulses. That's how it should be.

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: No matter how much despair awaits them, I wish that at the end of their story, the gentle light of hope will shine on them...

author: Fukase
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Looking back on the past is a dangerous thing. It's nothing more than an attachment.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: After today, tomorrow will come again. Maybe I've been taking that for granted. But now... It's not easy, huh...

author: Reiner Braun
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: There are times we can't run away, no matter how bad the odds are. When the people we're supposed to protect are threatened, we have to enter the fray and shield them. And it doesn't matter who or what the enemy is. We need to master skills and get stronger, with artillery as well as hand-do-hand combat. I think that's our responsibility as strong soldiers.

author: Eina Tulle
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: Listen, girls like guys who are strong and can protect them. So if you keep working hard and get stronger, she just might like you back.

author: Naruse Jun
title: Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterunda.
text: Don't tell people to disappear like it's nothing! Words can hurt people! You can't ever take them back! Even if you regret it, you can never take them back!

author: France
title: Hetalia The Beautiful World
text: The government is the sails, the people the wind, and the time the sea. As long as there is people to repair the ship, it can be used forever.

author: Hayabusa Shou
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: However rough the waters in the outside world may be, to find your own lighthouse and swim for it is only logical, isn't it?

author: Manato
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Everybody has things they aren't good at or can't do. We cover each other's weakness. That's what a party's for.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You're only resorting to physical abuse because you can't prove that I'm wrong.

author: Hestia
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: In the end, guilt is just the question of whether you're capable of forgiving yourself or not. If you've really changed, then prove it with your actions.

author: Tooru Oikawa
title: Haikyuu!!
text: If you think too hard when you don't have a brain, you're going to hurt your head.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
text: The many lives lost during long years of conflict... because of those selfless sacrifices, we are able to bathe in peace and prosperity now. To ingrain this history within the new generation will be a vital cog in helping to maintain the peace.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: At times, you will probably lose sight of your life goals, as well. When that happens, instead of panicking, why not try indulging in a hobby? Then a new, or perhaps an old, goal might grow stronger, and stronger, into a rousing fortissimo.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The lesson you need to learn right now, can't be taught with words... only with action.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Are our enemies the kobolds? No, our real enemies are our overly weak selves.

author: Bell Cranel
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: I wanted to save you because you're you. I didn't want you to leave, because you're you. I can't find another reason. I don't need another reason to save you.

author: Tooru Oikawa
title: Haikyuu!!
text: If you're gonna hit it, hit it until it breaks!

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: All of the Arrancar follow me... because they see me as fearless and the only individual who can actually bring forth the new world... the new future where you can belong. Without me, that dream can't be fulfilled and without me the gotei 13 will destroy you all...  Do you see it now from my point of view?

author: Rock Lee
title: The Last -Naruto the Movie-
text: A hero is not the one who never falls. He is the one that who gets up, again and again, never losing sights of his dreams.

author: Hayabusa Shou
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: If I have to win through underhanded means, I'd rather just stand right here until I die.

author: Ranta
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: Don't sweat the small stuff. You'll only tire yourself out.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I think there are times people have to die... even if I don't like it.

author: Ikta Solork
title: Alderamin on the Sky
text: If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.

author: Hephaestus
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: Don't make yourself weigh your pride against your friends.

author: Atsushi Nakajima
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: After being driven out of the orphanage, I had nothing to eat, nowhere to sleep, and, as one might expect, not a cent to my name. Yet, I lack the courage to commit theft. That is how I've arrived at my current predicament... However... if I wish to live, I have no choice but to steal and take from others!

author: Ai Astin
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text:
On a Monday, God created the world. 
On Tuesday, God drew the line between Order and Chaos. 
On Wednesday, God arranged each and every number. 
On Thursday, God permitted the ebb and flow of Time. 
On Friday, God explored every nook and cranny of the world. 

On Saturday, God rested. 
And on Sunday, God... 
forsook the world.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: There's no such thing as a painless lesson, they just don't exist. Sacrifices are necessary, you can't gain something without losing something first... Although if you can endure that pain and walk away from it, you'll find that you now have a heart strong enough to overcome any obstacle... Yeah... A Fullmetal Heart.

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: Maybe worrying about the future partings so much that you miss out on happiness in the present is a waste.

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: A good book is always good, no matter how many times you've already read it.

author: Han Jee-Han
title: The Gamer
text: Adults say you shouldn't do things half-heartedly. But in reality, you can get by with doing just that. Of course, it would be great to stand out. But how many people can live like that? It's really hard to be exceptional.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: When faced with a decision... At such times, we must choose only one option and it can be very confusing. When that happens, simply using your head and charging straight into the obstacle is a fine option.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: A lot of the times, you're going into a situation you know nothing about. So what you need is to be quick to act... and make tough decisions in worst-case scenarios.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I now have things that I don't want to forget, and things that I shouldn't forget. And I don't plan to ever forget those things, as long as I live.

author: Tomoya Aki
title: Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata
text: When an otaku goes all-out with his mind set on something you better not underestimate him.

author: Bell Cranel
title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
text: If I don't stand up here... If I don't reach higher here... When am I ever going to do it?

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: The fact that you consider yourself as an equal to me, is being arrogant in itself.

author: Zeno
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: I might be the ugly duckling of the group, but I'll make sure that I'll protect all of you with all my might.

author: Yona
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: I know that I have no strengths to offer. It irritates me how weak I am. But let me protect them!

author: Riboku
title: Kingdom
text: The purpose of an alliance is not simply for the sake of preventing an enemy from attacking you. Rather, importance lies in what one can obtain after the alliance. As well as your actions after the alliance.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Now listen up, any power that surpasses reason, still comes from reason, right? Magic isn't some kind of miraculous power. It is a talent that only works when the flow of energy inside of us and the flow of energy in the natural world are in perfect synchronization. To perform magic one must have a strong mind and the ability to focus. It should take over your being and come pouring out of your soul! If all we do is worry about following rules, then our magic will never progress.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: No matter how hurt someone is, they're meant to overcome it and try to go forward.

author: Fujitora
title: One Piece
text: If you lose credibility by just admitting fault, then you didn't have any in the first place.

author: Mary
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: There are wounds that even magic can't heal, but... even though it was painful to hear you talk about it, it was okay. That part was okay.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: Accomplishing a shared goal under tense circumstances causes distance between people to naturally close.

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: If I can't even manage a polite smile, I'll be in trouble in the real world.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: When people are faced with a situation they don't understand, it's easy for fear to take hold.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: Prophecies don't ever come true.

author: Manato
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: If you guys weren't here, I don't know what would have happened to me. You can't live in this world alone, no matter how you look at it.

author: Sakamoto
title: Sakamoto desu ga?
text: If you have no money, I believe all you can do is work.

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Someday we'll part. Maybe be forgotten. But we're living in the moment. So... make lots of friends, fall madly in love, and enjoy every moment to the fullest.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: That's right... This world... is cruel. It hit me that living was like a miracle.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: Heroes and the police don't do their jobs because someone says "please". Right?

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: If we had spent more time together, maybe I would have seen another side of him. I wish I knew him more. I wish I knew more about what kind of person he was. I wanted more time. If we had more time, we would've gone through things together. Maybe we would've gotten annoyed at each other and fight. Maybe we would've disliked each other, or liked each other more.

author: Netero
title: Hunter × Hunter
text: Ant king , you believe I cannot pray with a single arm? A prayer comes from the heart. If the heart achieves the correct form, it becomes emotions and emotions can be manifested.

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: My name is Dracule Mihawk! Find your self, true world, become stronger! No matter how long it may take, I will wait for you in my strongest form! Surpass this sword! Surpass me! Roronoa Zoro!

author: Han Jee-Han
title: The Gamer
text: What use is strength in modern society? You have to be smart.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul:re
text: Donato has to keep proving himself. He wants to prove just how valuable he is. Isn't that the case with you as well? Because you are the same as Donato. All you're doing is indulging in this twisted self-value that you have to yourself. And if you don't, you won't last. Eventually, you will break and become useless. Once that happens, you'll break and become discarded.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: I wont stop fighting when im tired, i'll stop fighting when you've shattered my heart into a thousand pieces

author: Rogue Cheney
title: Fairy Tail
text: I want to become a man who treasures his friends.

author: Porco Rosso
title: Porco Rosso
text: Trust? I hate that word, but coming from you it sounds different.

author: Akatsuki Kojou
title: Strike the Blood
text: I know, someone like me can't just go out and change the world on a whim.

author: Kyoko Mogami
title: Skip Beat!
text: No matter the reason, I don't think anyone who loses consciousness in the battlefield has any right to survive!

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If praying does not work, and words are ineffective... what's left is to fight.

author: Akatsuki Kojou
title: Strike the Blood
text: You probably weren't wrong, but you went about it the wrong way.

author: Usui Haruaki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: I no longer pay attention to other people's skills. It doesn't matter; at the end of the day, you can only do your best.

author: Hange Zoe
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Ever since I joined the survey corps, I've had people dying on me everyday. But... you understand, don't you? One day or another, everyone you care about eventually dies. It's something we simply can't accept. It's a realization that could drive you insane... It's painful... so painful... I get it. And still... we must keep moving forward.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: Sometimes you have to fight to get your point across.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: This silence belongs to us... and every single person out there, is waiting for us to fill it with something.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: But being optimistic isn't a bad thing, is it? It's not like you're doing anything bad. It's also not like you're cheating either.

author: Shindo Iroha
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: One can evoke "extraordinary" abilities if one focuses all energy on just one point.

author: Kyoko Mogami
title: Skip Beat!
text: I would no longer fight against my feelings because I realized how useless and ineffective it was to fight them.

author: Mikaela Hyakuya
title: Owari no Seraph
text: The vampires don't really care about humanity in general. It's only specific humans like you that concern them... The kind of humans who will stop at nothing to acquire more power.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: If there's someone you wish to see, then you are no longer alone.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Nisemonogatari
text: But they say a woman is better off with an unloved man, versus a man who loves her.

author: Usui Haruaki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: You can't cause a change without some courage and determination.

author: Frederica Bernkastel
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 8: Twilight of the...
text: Humans are pitiful beings, walking forward their backs to the future gazing at the past. This is why they fail to notice the simplest pitfalls and stumble tragically and comically.

author: Reki
title: Haibane Renmei
text: There is no such thing as forever. Everything ends sooner or later. Just as it should. Because now is only now. And this moment... is so precious.

author: Mikaela Hyakuya
title: Owari no Seraph
text: In the end, the best way to live down here is to be smart. You've got to be clever to survive.

author: Suruga Kanbaru
title: Nisemonogatari
text: It's easy for girls to take advantage of your kindness, so be careful.

author: Otonashi Maria
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: There's no despair that can't be overcome by everyday life.

author: Taichi Mashima
title: Chihayafuru
text: It doesn't seem right to let a girl choose me. I would rather choose the girl I devote myself to.

author: Ittetsu Takeda
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: Birds with the wind in their wings are flying across the great blue sky right now. And all of you should be able to make it! To the highest limit, to the farthest limit!

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Nisemonogatari
text: The impostor is an impostor because it can't be distinguished from the real thing. The proof of its falsity is in its resemblance to the real thing.

author: Shindo Iroha
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: The purpose of practice is to improve your power. The purpose of the real race is to win.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Sometimes people put up walls, not to keep others out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.

author: Kusonoki
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: I don't put much trust in words like "personality" or "disposition" or "character." Those things all change depending on the situation. Looking at it in the long run, what changes people is what situations they get into. People put a lot of faith in consistency, but it's something more superficial than most people think.

author: Hoshino Kazuki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: I believe that love is much deeper than that. It's much more irreversible. It exceeds just caring for each other and continues until both parties become entangled and inseparable. They combine to form a single concept. They become one. Neither of them must come apart. THAT'S LOVE.

author: Sumire Kanō
title: Toradora!
text: Haven't you already lifted your foot, preparing to step forward? Then you only have one option! Finish taking that step!

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Being rivals does not mean being an enemy.

author: Kusonoki
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: You appearing before me was the best thing that's ever happened in my life. The worst was when you left my sight. …And depending on your reply now, I might have a new best or worst.

author: Usui Haruaki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: "Because I won't die if I miss." I can totally understand the words of that slugger. We won't die just because our dreams and efforts prove futile, nor do we need to despair. We both faced much greater despair, so we aren't afraid of the obstacles that lie before us. We can easily bet on a coin flip while others are too frightened to even pick heads or tails.

author: Girl
title: Tabi ni Deyou Horobiyuku Sekai no Hate Made
text: The three pleasures of life are "eating", "bathing" and "sleeping"!!

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: The more fun I have, the more it'll hurt when we part ways. I know that all too well.

author: Kusonoki
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: However happy or sad something is, you'll soon forget it if you don't get a chance to recall it. What people don't realize is that they've forgotten about forgetting. If everyone really preserved the happiest memory from their past perfectly, they'd only be sadder living in their relatively hollow present. And if everyone preserved the worst memory from their past perfectly, well, they'd still be sad. Everyone just remembers what it's inconvenient not to remember.

author: Otonashi Maria
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Do you know why you are making the mistake of sacrificing yourself? It's because you're weak. It's because you can't face reality.

author: Odagiri Nene
title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
text: Why can't I steal him from her? There are no rules in the game of love!

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Studying is important, but I think love is too. It's the last summer of high school. It's a precious time that won't come again.

author: Kusonoki
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: Re-explaining my memories through words made good memories easier to savor, and bad memories easier to accept.

author: Otonashi Aya
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Giving people what they want only results in temporary delight, and that you can only make a select few people happy that way.

author: Miyamura Toranosuke
title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
text: Girls' hearts are reflected by their underwear's color...!!

author: Yoake Ryou
title: ReLIFE
text: Fight with all your might. With those young kids, give your mind and heart a solid workout. Let your heart, which had dried up and gotten stiff, beat once more.

author: Miyagi
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: There can be no going back once you come to love someone.

author: Otonashi Maria
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Cry when you're sad. Laugh when you're happy. Get angry when you don't like something. Depend on someone when you're depressed. Care for yourself before you care for others. Don't hate anyone. Be proud of yourself. Stay loyal when you fall in love.

author: Yamada Ryū
title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
text: Is there some rule that says I have to give up just because I was rejected?!

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Please, let that iron guard down for a minute. It's only hurting you. I know when you've hit rock bottom, people trying to cheer you up can be really annoying. "What would you know?" "Just leave me alone." But what if someone you're pushing away is really worried about you? That'd be a shame.

author: Kusonoki
title: Three Days of Happiness
text: I'd rather have my physical pain exceed my mental pain than the other way around. By hurting myself just enough, I could turn my attention to that.

author: Hoshino Kazuki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: If I abandoned you, I would be released from this pain. I would live on. But before long, I would end up seeking you again, for all my actions are ultimately devoted to you and only you. All I want is to stay on target and walk straight ahead—ignoring the losses and opposition, and even the results. That's all I can do. Some people might call it an obsession, others may deem it a miracle—but to me and many others, my driving rationale couldn't be more obvious and natural. There are people who understand this and there are people who don't, and I simply happen to belong to the first group. The only difference is whether they have noticed that they don't need boxes to make their wishes come true, and what it means to fulfill a wish. My commitment to find you comes with great suffering. Not once have I thought it's easy. For your sake, I laughed, cried, and yelled. Because of you, I destroyed my heart, my body, and the world. Still, I'm only really alive when I'm touching the fragment of you that I carry within me. Even if I don't reach you in the end… Even if I know the horrible outcome that awaits me… I will keep searching for you, who dwells inside Maria. I'm going to vanish. Maybe I'm getting my just deserts for being too greedy with my wish. To be honest, part of me regrets that we met, but if I were to choose between a life in which we met and a life in which we didn't, I would always pick the former. Always. I'm sure of that, even though I may be hesitating over, wavering about, and regretting my choices all the time. I will not have accomplished anything by the time I vanish, and I'm certainly not mature enough to say that I can accept that. Even now, I'm still dreaming— …that my efforts might be rewarded with some kind of happy ending.

author: Hoshino Kazuki
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Life has no weight in itself; it's a concept created by the observer that does not have a definite form. Essentially, life does not entail multiple instances but is just one massive wobbly lump. However, we tend to refer to the bodies that were formed out of that giant lump as “lives”. The essence of life is in all of us and can't be “stolen” or “born.” As long as the essence of life exists, life does not decrease or increase, and it certainly won't disappear.

author: Sarushima Maria
title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
text: Knowing what's in store for me means I have nothing to look forward to. If I know something good's going to happen... then when it does, I'm only half as happy about it because I knew in advance. And then when I know something bad is going to happen... when it does, I get overwhelmed with this sense of defeat... and feel even worse.

author: Touka Kirishima
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: After you've gobbled him down you'd be left alone to regret it while covered in blood and guts. That's the hunger of a ghoul. That's our destiny.

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: But there's something a little sad about them [fireworks], too. They're so flashy, pretty and exciting, but as they fade, you feel sort of lonely.

author: Five
title: Terror in Resonance
text: You should just steal the things you want.

author: Yamazaki Haruma
title: Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
text: You can erase the memories, but you can't erase the feelings behind them.

author: Tanaka Misumi
title: Bokurano
text: When surviving today is so simple and matter-of-fact people tend to forget. They forget what it means to eat a pig. They say all life is equal, but how much life is consumed to keep them alive everyday?

author: Renji Yomo
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: All we can do is live while losing things.

author: Edel
title: Princess Tutu
text: Truth is a shy little thing. If you approach it, it will hide. Truth is a lonesome little thing. If you move away from it, it will give chase.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: It's okay to live, even if there's no greater point to living.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach the Movie: Hell Verse
text: People are all evil. In order to falsely believe yourself to be just, you must inevitably falsely believe that someone else is more evil than you.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: As my fingers and toes re-grew like fingernails or hair over and over and over and over... and over again, every single time I got the feeling that I truly, truly truly was a monster.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: No matter how big the place is, we'll eventually reach the edge if we keep moving forward!

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: I don't understand what I say that makes people so mad. I don't understand how they feel. I know that's because I haven't properly socialized, I've tried to learn. I've tried to study up on it, but I just don't know what's right.

author: Shikishima Kiriko
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Getting kicked out of school won't kill me, but losing my way of life most certainly will.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel.

author: Nine
title: Terror in Resonance
text: Falling is just another way of flying.

author: Ooga Kazuomi
title: ReLIFE
text: I thought that without you, everything would be so boring. The idea of someone else touching you... was just not okay. I only realized this recently. But I think... I've loved you for a long time, too.

author: Tsubaki
title: SERVAMP
text: It's not that I don't trust you all. It's the opposite. I'm going because I believe in you all. You all know this well, right? No matter who betrays me, I won't betray anyone.

author: Eraserhead
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: They've been exposed to the outside world, up close and personal. They've had that fear planted in them. And they've endured it. Overcome it. Each has grown from that experience... and forgotten how to hesitate.

author: Yoake Ryou
title: ReLIFE
text: I think it's a good thing, you know. You're paying attention to those around you. You don't just notice, you take action to help. I think it's one of your strength. But don't you wonder? Is getting rid of all the thorns in someone's path really what's best for them? While they're still young enough to be allowed to trip and fall, it's important for them to learn the pain of it and how to pick themselves up again.

author: Watanuki Sakuya
title: SERVAMP
text: I don't want to lie anymore. The words "I believe in you" is a curse. No, it's a spell. If the one who hears it feels cursed, they are.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: The slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don't... It'll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society.

author: Izayoi Sakamaki
title: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
text: I'm not only allowing my comrade to continue to their deaths but I will also follow her footsteps. It's clearly a show of irresponsibility... But those that did not even intend to take the responsibility in the first place can only be called cowardly and despicable.

author: Ooga Kazuomi
title: ReLIFE
text: I can't just leave a crying girl alone and go home. I'm too wimpy to carry you, but I can lend you a shoulder, and get you down the stairs.

author: Lawless
title: SERVAMP
text: You don't know anything. What the hell is up with you? Trying to be the hero? Feel like some all-powerful main character? So annoying! Why? When? Where? What? How will you do and just who will you become? You're just pretending by spouting your ideals! You have nothing! You won't become someone.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: The most inflated egos are often the most fragile.

author: Mishima Lisa
title: Terror in Resonance
text: I'm so stupid. At that time, I thought I could escape. I thought I'd be taken somewhere out of this world. I got my hopes up a little. But that's impossible isn't it? I'm not playing by the rules. As if anyone would just take me away when I wanted them to. I'm so stupid.

author: Saiki Michiru
title: ReLIFE
text: Knocking others down to gain an advantage is a fruitless endeavor. It means they've given up on winning any other way.

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: You're just too busy comparing yourself to others to see. Those comparisons aren't the only measure. Don't say it's all pointless. You've work hard and made yourself better. That's what you got in return. So don't put yourself down like this.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: Yeah, I'm being stupid.  I know that it's out of question. I know how this will end. I'll be left with nothing.  Even so, I want us to think, writhe, struggle... and find... [something genuine].

author: Izayoi Sakamaki
title: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
text: Not taking the initiative to secure your future but just waiting for luck to come your way, wasn't that just the definition of being lazy?

author: Enishi Yukishiro
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: The only atonement you will ever realize will be that of you're own death. You will be justly and severely punished, before you ever find the peace you seek Kenshin. That is the meaning of 'Jinchū'. Those who live must act in the place of those who have died. YOU ARE A CRIMINAL SO DIE LIKE ONE! I will make you suffer and scream, you took my sister... You destroyed her happiness... SUFFER KENSHIN, DIE! YOU MISERABLE DOG!!

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: I want to defeat the me that's dragging this failure around. I don't want to forget my failure. But if I carry it with me as a bad memory and keep running away, I will never change.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Just as stand users attract other stand users, loners seems to have an ability to attract other loners as well.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: However far I fall as long as there's so much as a thread left I will use it to climb. I'll take hold of it. I refuse to give up while I'm still human I can do that much. But every person must decide on his own whether to grab it.

author: Izayoi Miku
title: Date A Live
text: Even if I lose my "voice". Even if everyone else doesn't turn up to hear me sing — as long as you're there, then, that's enough. If it comes to that… I will sing, just for you.

author: Atsuhiro Maeda
title: Tari Tari
text: Whether you get mad, whether you laugh. The sun will set, morning will come. Each and every time, I'll just start over again.

author: Frau
title: 07 Ghost
text: If you don't believe in history... Just believe in the world you see with your own eyes.

author: Khamsin Nbh'w
title: Shakugan no Shana III
text: It's still a form of love. To those with the emotion of love, acts of rebelling, anger, cursing, fighting, and killing do not work in contradiction to that emotion. Rather, too strong a love could quicken them. What the other wishes is not all there is to love.

author: Adlet Mayer
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: In order to accomplish something, first you had to believe in yourself that you could do it.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Just because you die... doesn't mean that the people you killed will come back to life... instead using this sword to save just one more soul is repentance in true sense.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru
text: A lone warrior surviving hundreds of battles, when it comes to losing, I'm the strongest.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: We're going to be moving forward! If we move forward, we'll get stronger, both physically and mentally.

author: Fay D. Flourite
title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: People do peculiar things when it comes to love... Our own safety doesn't seem so important.

author: Licht Jekylland Todoroki
title: SERVAMP
text: I had a lot of dreams as a child. I wanted many people to listen to the piano. I wanted to fly. I wanted to communicate with animals. Those dreams have all pretty much come true. Right now, I have a different dream. What mankind can imagine is what mankind can make into a reality. The imagination is a weapon. It is far superior than anything else in the world.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: When there's nothing to be gained, rising to the challenge at those times... is surely the mark... of a true hero!!

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: Trying to knock others down a peg just means lowering yourself. Don't go trampling all the hardwork and trust you've build up. It insults the effort you put in.

author: Mayu
title: Elfen Lied
text: I envy you just for having someone who's worried about you.

author: Victorique de Blois
title: Gosick
text: On the one hand, humans seek out new stimuli with insatiable desire. On the other, they're also odd creatures that value old and very rare things.

author: Ayumu Kato
title: Gantz
text: Just because you're tough doesn't mean you can do whatever you want, right?

author: Millions Knives
title: Trigun
text: If you keep saving butterflies, spiders will starve to death! But... wanting to save them both is a contradiction. What would you rather do? Keep deliberating? The butterfly will be eaten in the meantime.

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: Love does not hurt when you're loving the right person.

author: Genos
title: One Punch Man
text: If this is the path you choose to walk... I will not interfere. But if you turn the people against you... Will you be able to function as a hero? This worries me. But if you ever get in a tight spot... I will be there.

author: Shigaraki Tomura
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: Heroes and villains both thrive on violence, but we're still categorized. "You're good." "You're evil." That's how it is!! Symbol of peace? Hah!! In the end you're just a tool for violence, made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence.

author: Kotoishi Naru
title: Barakamon
text: You ain't gonna know unless you climb up yerself. Ain't no way to look if you don't try.

author: Licht Jekylland Todoroki
title: SERVAMP
text: It's not about wanting to do something that you can do, it's about what you do. It's not about wanting to become someone, it's about who you want to become.

author: Agata Katsuhira
title: Kiznaiver
text: It's okay if you don't understand, just stay with me, watch me, and slowly come to understand.

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: It's ineffective to deal with many problems at once.

author: Lawless
title: SERVAMP
text: Life's but a waking shadow. A poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage And then is heard no more. No matter how hopelessly they struggle in the light, they all die without meaning. Licht-tans's piano skills are amazing, but see... be it you or anyone, it's impossible to become anything. Human life is so meaningless...

author: Maki Honoka
title: Kiznaiver
text: It's because we don't unterstand! It's because we don't unterstand that we wonder what the other is thinking and try desperately to unterstand every word they say... You end up thinking too much about the other person, and being close to them becomes painful so you try to distance yourself... I believe you become friends with somebody by doing that over and over, and that's how... As much as I hate to admit it, it's how I became friends with these guys.

author: Kaizaki Arata
title: ReLIFE
text: There is no right answer for getting along. Different people require different answers.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit remember for what cause you clench your fists... remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.

author: Shirota Tooru
title: SERVAMP
text: Reaching out to someone is simple.  All you need is the resolve to say, "I'm your ally no matter what." "I believe in you." That's all the resolve you need. It's okay to make mistakes. I grew up by making mistakes. Don't have any regrets. Your justice may be completely different from someone else's. You are completely different people after all. But you still live on together. People always look for ways to do just that.

author: Hishiro Chizuru
title: ReLIFE
text: If I don't understand how a friend feels, am I not allowed to worry about them? If I don't experience what you do, am I not allowed to worry about you, my friend?

author: Midoriya Izuku
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: People... are not born equal. That's the hard truth I learned at age four. But that... was my first and last setback.

author: Kawafuji Takao
title: Barakamon
text: The role of the young is to break new ground without fear of failure. Remain in memories, not record books! Lose the battle, win the war!

author: Yomogawa Ayame
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: No, order exists to protect the people. We must not aim our guns at the wrong people. What we should eliminate are our doubting hearts and minds.

author: Handa Seishū
title: Barakamon
text: If we continue on the same path, we are likely to meet again.

author: Twenty-Fifth Baam
title: Tower Of God
text: The heart moves where the heart wills.

author: Fate/stay night
title: Fate/stay night
text: The storyteller may fall silent, the music may cease, but the story will not end. Be it tragedy or comedy, as long as there is applause, the story will not end. It is just like the multitude of human lives. Warm blessings to we who were not rewarded, and we who are still on our way. Our travels continue on.

author: Mike Zacharias
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: We will have lost only the moment humans give up and stop fighting. As long as they keep on fighting, our defeat is not certain.

author: Biba Amatori
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: What is important to survival isn't the ability to hide and protect yourself, it is to stand up and fight the Kabane.

author: All Might
title: Boku no Hero Academia
text: Whether you win or lose... You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience.

author: Hannes
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You couldn't save your mom because you... weren't strong enough. I didn't face the Titan... because I wasn't brave enough.

author: Leonardo Watch
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: When things seem beyond help, if you open your eyes and take a really good look... It's a lot better than turning your back and hiding your eyes.

author: Zed O'Brien
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: You've always seen yourself as just a normal kid, and you're right, that's exactly what you are. You're normally caring, normally cheerful, and you're normally nosy. You've a strong moral compass, concern for your friends, and honor. I know you don't see this, but what's normal to you, well it's far from it. Everyone else would call it courageous and noble. It's because of the person you are that you don't think twice about your own safety when it comes to helping your friends. 'Cause that's just normal to you.

author: Nobuo Terashima
title: NANA
text: When you fall in love with someone, you want everything from them. Its only natural to feel that way... but real love can only happen when you want what's best for the other person and never ask for anything in return.

author: Kyoya Ootori
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: It's fine if he holds bad judgements without trying to get to know me. The real point is letting just the ones who want to understand me know my real self.

author: Eiichirou Maruo
title: Baby Steps
text: I shouldn't think about losing before the match has even begun.

author: Assassin
title: Fate Grand Order
text: Dragons are just bigger swallows.

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: Sometimes, it's necessary to look back at the past in order to move on to the future.

author: Wilhelm van Astrea
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: Even if you have regrets, even if you have remorse, you must fight. If you have made the decision for yourself to fight, to struggle, then fight with all you have. Do not give up for one second, one moment, or one instant. Cling greedily to the victory you have within your sight. If you can still stand, if your fingers still move, if all your teeth have not broken, stand and fight. You must fight!

author: Sunda Granitz
title: Fractale
text: Leave people to their own thoughts, and sooner or later they start questioning the powers that be. If you're in a position of power, the last thing you want folks to ask is whether or not the way things are, is the way they have to be.

author: Mita Ratsufu
title: Atrocious Fairy Tales for Adults
text: Being an actress is about satisfying people's need for fantasies...as an escape to reality. When someone is affected by the movie or drama; whether it be happiness or sadness; it is a great honor for us.

author: Jaune Arc
title: RWBY
text: My mom always says, strangers are just friends you haven't met yet.

author: Yuzu Hiiragi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: A world created through oppresing others with brute force has no meaning!

author: Ukai Keishin
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: You need someone else to become more disciplined. No matter how hard you try by yourself, there´s a limit.

author: Sōma Yukihira
title: Shokugeki no Sōma: Ni no Sara
text: Even if all the confidence and pride you've built over the years is blown to pieces by a major failure, even if you've had a soul-crushing experience, you still have to open the shop the next day. That's who chefs are.

author: Adlet Mayer
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: I thought that would be the only way I could become the world's strongest man. But you know... It didn't work. Your heart isn't something you can get rid of. If you're trying to get rid of your heart, your heart is making you do it. You can never abandon everything to get stronger. The one thing you can never stop is falling in love with someone!

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: The people laughing are laughing at their own ignorance.

author: Fremy Speedraw
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: Liars always say the same things. "I'll believe in you. I'll protect you. I care about you." I'll never believe that again... No one will ever protect me. I won't even think about it. I'll fight alone, live alone, and die alone. I know... I've felt it on my skin and in my body... That it's better not to believe in anyone than believe and be betrayed!

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: Oh? What are you surprised about!? Do you think that I'm someone who would give up after being rejected just once!? Hospitalized or not, I shall continue to polish myself and become even moooore of a spectacular lady, and return to you!!

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Ah, that's right. Me hating that her hard work wouldn't be rewarded was just my secondary reason. My motivation was actually much simpler-- from the first time I met this girl, I just wanted to see her smiling face.

author: Adlet Mayer
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: I was able to become strong because I still believe those words. That a man can't become strong for revenge's sake. He becomes strong because he believes in something.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: To enjoy my youth properly. She might've been talking about something like this. To live without thinking about consequences or what's around me with all my strength. That's what it was about...

author: Takashiro Masaharu
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Yoshii Akihisa-kun, when a person with ability, but is unfairly treated, tries to get back the position he deserves, will you step in to interfere?

author: Hans Humpty
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: Humans can lie with words. And they can deceive with actions. You can't trust their eyes, voices, or expressions. But when they're about to die, their faces show the truth, no matter what.

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: I confessed you know!? Many, many times! Even though I knew the answer from my mouth... with my voice! I confessed you know!? Have you ever looked at Raku straight in the eyes!? Is that all you've got for Raku!? At least for the last time, you need to be a little more truthful to yourself!! If you really liked him, then you can't just pretend like nothing ever happened!!

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Everyone has their own talents, and strong wills that won't lose to anyone else.

author: Rory Mercury
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: More than anyone else, humanity is a species which looks forward to tomorrow. Because of their dreams, they can bear with the unjustness of the present.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: The length of time you've been in love isn't the only thing that matters, right?

author: Shimada Minami
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Once a person is ready to die, anything is possible.

author: Lelei la Lelena
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Only humans, with their short lifespan, are driven to solve every problem they encounter. It is how they live.

author: Tachibana Chika
title: Nisekoi
text: Traditions that don't benefit people today are worthless.

author: Chie
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: When you are feeling sad... smile, even if you have to force yourself... If you cry when it gets painful... it will only get more painful.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Listen up you guys! This is the final battle! Grit your teeth and get ready to go with all your might! We're only aiming to win! It doesn't matter whether we're idiots or ordinary people or smart people! Everyone's to do whatever they can do! We're definitely... going to win this battle! Just watch, 3rd years...! I'm going to smash those heads of yours and show you how capable these idiots you look down on really are!

author: Itami Youji
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: A mission's one thing, but I can't put them in danger for personal reasons. The only life I can do that to is my own.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: So you feel like you're being dishonest or something? That's not true. It's a great thing to come to like someone. If you ask me... The important thing here is, that you have to make a clear choice between the two of them.

author: Wakabayashi Hatsuna
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Humans easily betray others. That's just the nature of them.

author: Shimada Minami
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: I can't let myself not like the person I like.

author: Rory Mercury
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: To a girl, a man who's nice to everyone... hm, I suppose that works as an example, to a man, it would be like a woman who opens her legs to anyone. People want companions so they can swiftly satisfy their need for love and affection. A woman wants a man who only shows his love to her.

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: I won't come to hate you! Never! Regardless of what happens in the future!

author: Tokou Nanami
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: People don't simply disappear from this world when they die. They only truly die when they are forgotten by those who are alive. That's why it doesn't matter whether I lived or died. No one knows of my existence, and I don't have I don't have a single friend. But... if you all won't forget about me... that is enough even if I die. With just that... I would be more alive than I ever have been.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: The most important thing when fighting and running away is to defend. It is not about beating the enemy in front of them, but to retreat while buying time for their comrades to retreat.

author: Lelei la Lelena
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Someone who can be deceived by others will be deceived again and again.

author: Onodera Kosaki
title: Nisekoi
text: Why did you run away, Chitoge-chan? No... I don't want this... I won't be happy with you just giving up... To end up liking the same person. It's painful, for sure but Chitoge-chan, you like him enough to not be able to face him again after that, don't you? Regardless of who ends up with him, I want to be satisfied when it happens. I thought for sure that you think the same way. Is there a reason why that can't happen? Tell me Chitoge-chan...

author: Wakabayashi Hatsuna
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Don't forget, our existence is a fragile and uncertain one, knowing that any one of us could die at any moment. In this short time that we have, we all have one or two wishes that we'd like to fulfill. Losing the most important wish... is like losing your reason for living.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: The dead can't talk.

author: Rory Mercury
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Girls are happier when they're the only one you're nice to.

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: Holding in your own feelings like that... ye think tha' no one's gonna get hurt since ye're not lettin' it show to anyone? Tha's just the same as goin' 'round hurting everyone anyway!! What ye're doin' isn't ye keepin' everyone dear to ye!! Ye're just protectin' yerself!!! Ye're just 'fraid of gettin' hurt! Losin' yer nerve! Ye're just scared!!

author: Kazumi Schlierenzauer
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: You don't call someone a friend when they just remember you. You're friends because you like each other.

author: Kouta Tsuchiya
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: ...Don't treat me as a fool, you pervert woman ...Why do I have to prioritize you over my friends?

author: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Battle was a thing which was won by living and which was lost by dying.

author: Kanakura Yui
title: Nisekoi
text: Once you find out whom you made the promise to, will you really be able to fall in love with her?

author: Makina
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Only a foolish human would attempt to rationalize emotion.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Most of the winning results in war is caused by pursuit. Do you know why? Leaving aside modern times, it seems during the era of bayonet warfare, the worst losses always, arise from the moments when the losing side is being pursued.

author: Itami Youji
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: If you don't have the resolve to take responsibility for her until the very end, then don't do anything unnecessary.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: It's just... a love that's continued for many years without straying is something that, to anyone who sees it, is beautiful and impossible to fault. But... Though it may be short, and it may be something that's become crooked and bent partway through, if they're serious about the way they feel... then I don't think that's something that isn't beautiful.

author: Onodera
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Those who are granted great power lose all self-restraint when among the weak. Oranges don't start out rotten. It's the container that makes them rot.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: If she lost because of a difference in ability, it can't be helped. If she worked hard and didn't get what she wants, she can just work harder next time. If she gave her all for this, it's acceptable even if she lost.

author: Rory Mercury
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Some questions with no answers cannot be answered even by those who live forever. Yet, the absence of a correct answer does not mean the question cannot be answered. If you want to know how I felt about the complete ban on some culture and art that I could not understand, was not interested in, or could not accept, in the name of preventing the violations of others' rights or other trumped up charges, I believe that would be taking us onto the road of discriminating against others. If we define culture as that which is healthy or humane, and defend that decision in the name of justice, once any part of that system collapses, it will cause an unimaginable number of problems for society. For instance, if I drew a line in the middle and erased one side, the next day, a new line will appear in the middle of the side that is left. I think suppressing the instincts and thoughts of the human spirit is bad. The desire for purity and wholesomeness, when taken to an extreme, is harmful.

author: Tachibana Chika
title: Nisekoi
text: You have no intention of reciprocating my daughter's feelings, do you? So what gives you the right to speak in that way? Perhaps you wish to appease your guilty conscience. Would you not call that "hypocrisy"?

author: Shimada Minami
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Aki, you can't lie when you confess to someone. I'm trying to comfort you know, but if I just wanted to comfort you, I won't confess to you. I confessed to you like this because I really like you. But I do find it a little annoying how you fidget around like this, and I really hate you for blaming yourself and regretting your actions. -- and I really hate you when you said that a girl, who summoned all her courage to confess to you, is lying.

author: Lelei la Lelena
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: If a member of one's family is killed by a thief, then one should hate the thief. But people will miss aim their hatred — why should they go to where the thief hides? If one loses a family member to sickness, then one should hate the disease. It is not the doctor's fault; yet people will hate the doctor.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: I'll tell you a way that I heard to figure out if you like someone or not. Imagine, when you find a rainbow, when you found a shooting star, when you found a cafe you like, when your change is 777 yen or something. If it's Raku, it's fine to imagine the first time a leaf stood up in your tea. When you found a beautiful sunset, or if you found your taste in music, or if you win a pretty good prize in the lottery, those small things in everyday life. When you encounter those small happiness or luck, who is the very first person you want to tell that to? Whose face came into your mind?

author: Makina
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Men select women based on emotion. Even if there's a reason, it's only secondary. However, women select men based on reason. Either by something like his class ranking or his standing in society.

author: Ichijiku Chisato
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Killing for your own ideas... even a bandit could do that if it's killing a complete stranger. However, it's a completely different thing when it comes to killing a relative or a friend. Desire alone isn't enough. You need indomitable will and unwavering beliefs.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: There's no need to worry about trivial things like vocal rights or working together. If nobody's going to accept me, I'll make them obey me, whether it's by threat or by assassination. This is my-- our F class modus operandi.

author: Kurokawa Mari
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: People can face tomorrow because they can see reality and accept it. By denying reality, you cloud up the present, and tomorrow will never come. No, you can cloud it up, but your tomorrow will be that much crueler.

author: Bang
title: One Punch Man
text: You are too young to worry about failure. In a pinch, just muddle through. The outcome won't change, so that's best.

author: Himeji Mizuki
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: I'm sorry for not saying this to you, Akihisa-kun. I know I shouldn't hide this from you, but I was wondering whether I should tell you this. Because if I told you that, you'll definitely tell me "you should go", or something like that. I understand you'll say that for my sake, but I don't wish to hear you say anything like a farewell to me, Akihisa-kun. Because-- I like you, Akihisa-kun!

author: Yao Ro Ducy
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Revenge is a rite that restores one's spirit after it has been ravaged by the anger and hatred of loss. That is the only way to heal one's soul and stand up again to face reality. That is the only way we can have a tomorrow.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: Who decides limits? And based on what? You said you worked hard? Well, maybe you need to work a little harder. Is that really the limit of your strength? Could the you of tomorrow beat you today? Instead of giving in, move forward.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: This is a case of personal feelings: there's no way to force someone into saying that he or she loves someone. Besides, only the person knows whether the love truly exists. Even if it's said out with false feelings, it'll just cause damage on both sides.

author: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Trying to change someone else's thinking is sheer arrogance.

author: Hammerhead
title: One Punch Man
text: Why do you have to pay money to eat?! Can't we all just share?! Where is freedom in the world?! All are slaves to labor!! The rich grow fat... While the poor die!!

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Pawns? Isn't that such an ugly term to use? We should call them the foundation for our futures. But it's a fact that they'll be sacrificed.

author: Itami Youji
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Did you know? If a colony of ants gets rid of the laziest one, another one will just start being lazy instead?

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: You may be able to get stronger with simply the right attitude. In other words, train your spirit before worrying about strength through power and technology.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: If so many people believe in this, the lies will become reality. That's the so called group mentality.

author: Duran
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Sometimes, you'll run into a situation which is dangerous, but which you can't run from. Sometimes, you know you'll lose, but you have to advance anyway. If you can't be a smart man, then you should be the stupidest man of all. What do you think?

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: In exchange for gaining strength, have I lost something more important as a human being? Emotions used to swirl within me when I fought. Fear, impatience, anger... But now... Day after day, after one punch I go home unharmed and wash my gloves.

author: Nishimura Souichi
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: We teachers have to be role models for you students. If we can't face you all head on, what can we teach you!

author: Gray Co Aldo
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: It is a shame for a knight to have one's trust in him withdrawn halfway.

author: Kurosu Etsurou
title: Ana Satsujin
text: There would be no happier death than being killed by the woman I love.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: No matter what, anyone would hate to be weak as they get plundered. But if there's a chance, even if humans fail to get what they want, they can unexpectedly accept such an outcome.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Deceive your other self. Deceive the world. That is what you must do to reach the Steins Gate. Good Luck. El Psy Congroo.

author: Kurosu Etsurou
title: Ana Satsujin
text: What we cannot speak about, we must pass over in silence.

author: Himeji Mizuki
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: I've always been wondering, even though you've been treating me carefully like a princess, are you just trying to keep your distance away from me? You praise me so much and belittle yourself, so I feel that you're trying to keep your distance away from me...

author: Miyaichi Rio
title: Ana Satsujin
text: Bonds are what they are because they can be cut.

author: Rem (re:zero)
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: No matter what painful things happens, even when it looks like you'll lose... when no one else in the world believes in you... when you don't even believe in yourself... I will believe in you!

author: Kinoshita Yuuko
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: When people focus on what they want to do, they'll show off an inexplicable charm.

author: Miyaichi Rio
title: Ana Satsujin
text: Don't you ever worry about it? Wonder if there's something wrong with you? When you're always alone... you start comparing yourself with others. You want to make sure you're normal. But... when you're around lots of people, you don't compare yourself with them. You want to be yourself. It's okay to be weird... You want to be special. That's how it balances out.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: If it's almost there, it means it's still not complete.

author: Kurosu Etsurou
title: Ana Satsujin
text: Whether you're alive, dead, or living dead... Loneliness is still loneliness... It's the same thing... Nothing changes. There are no different categories of loneliness. It's just loneliness.

author: Rem (re:zero)
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: Ever since that fiery night, my time has been stopped. But it was you who melted my frozen heart and kindly made my stopped time begin to move forward again.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text:
No, I do want to be the hero... But since it's a rare chance, I want to repay what I borrowed. Uu... how should I say it? I'm really troubled. I bet everything on such an important match, yet I didn't accomplish anything before this thing ends. I can only wish that others can finish off this wish that I would never give up on. Should I be depressed, or angry, or is it an inexplicable feeling... I don't know how to express it, but anyway—
            I'M JUST UNHAPPY THAT I'M NOT THE PROTAGONIST TODAY!

author: Rem (re:zero)
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I can always tell when you're lying. I also know that you cannot tell me why you do so. So there is no need to convince me, or wrap everything in lies, or try to take the blame on yourself like that. Because I have complete faith in you, Subaru-kun.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: If I feel lonely when someone is leaving, it means that the person is very close to me.

author: Rem (re:zero)
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: When you said that you hate yourself, it made me want to tell you all the wonderful things I know about you.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Do exactly as you like. That is the true meaning of pleasure. Pleasure leads to joy and joy leads to happiness. Your path is now clear, Kirei. So clear there is no longer any need to hesitate.

author: Historia Reiss
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: There are many ways of thinking as there are people.

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: So don't be afraid to open your hearts to others. It's pointless to keep testing people. All you're doing is hurting yourselves.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Stop it! How dare you disrespect an opponent that fought you with all he had!?

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: It doesn't matter if you grew up without parents, and it doesn't matter if you don't believe in God. There's someone out there watching over you.

author: Nishi Joichiro
title: Gantz
text: In order to save a life, you must throw another life away.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I have a dream at last. The butterfly trapped in spiderweb has no wings. That butterfly is... me.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: Stop living in the past like an old man.

author: Ittetsu Takeda
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Is "defeat" proof that you are weak? Isn't "defeat" more like a trial to overcome? Of whether you can stand up and walk again after falling to you knees? If you remain on your knees like that, then it would be a sign of weakness.

author: Wolfgang Grimmer
title: Monster
text: As long as we are under the same sky, we shouldn't be sad when we part ways.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: What does it feel like, having your own death right before your eyes? That grand kaleidoscope glimpsed in the moments before death... What could be flashing through that perfect mind of yours?

author: Shirota Mahiru
title: SERVAMP
text: What is an adult? Does coolly drinking black coffee and spouting logic make you an adult?! If that's the case, I'll stay a kid that likes drinking orange juice.

author: Naruse Kakeru
title: Orange
text: If you endure too much, it'll be your loss.

author: Shiroe
title: Log Horizon
text: If you're going to give up that easily, we have no hope.

author: Shirota Mahiru
title: SERVAMP
text: If I'm bad at doubting others, I'd rather believe in them! If I get tricked, I'll think about what to do when it happens! Things are simpler that way!

author: Karasuma Tadaomi
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: "Every experience is a tool to clear your path." It was none other than those students who taught me that.

author: Ikoma
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: We are weak Mumei. But, that doesn't mean we just roll over and accept our fate.

author: Karasuma Tadaomi
title: Assassination Classroom
text: If something is possible, carry on as planned. Even if it isn't possible, do it anyway.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/stay night
text: If a couple curses stopped me, what kind of hero would I be?!

author: Asano Gakuho
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Well I do have abilities you haven't yet been given, just like not everyones has the strengths you do.

author: Ikoma
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: Look. Look at me! Watch as the man you cast out spills his blood and dies. Take a nice long look! I will save you all. I want you to live the rest of your lives knowing the man you abandoned saved you. And I will laugh at you from the afterlife. And tell you that it serves you right!

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom
text: To kill is an action which overflows in everyday life. In actuality the more you try to be accepted, the more you kill your unrestrained self.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: I study too, you know. How could I teach anyone if I didn't grow and learn day by day. Now let's get rid of this dangerous cloth. Experiencing my Absolute Defense Form over summer vacation taught me yet another skill: compressing not my whole body, but a portion of my tentacles to release a burst of energy. Remember this Itona, I say assassination is education. The assassination classrooms teacher will get stronger every time he teaches!

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Isn't the foolishness of the few a more precious commodity than the wisdom of the masses? There are those who were born human but harbor wishes that man was not meant for and have renounced their humanity in its pursuit.

author: Sailor Chibi Moon
title: Sailor Moon
text: Just 'cause you're a girl, it doesn't mean you have to wait for a prince to come along on a white horse. You can go out and find Prince Charming yourself. It is up to you to find the right boy.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: There are two kinds of arrogance. One where you are unequal to the task and one where your dreams are too big. The former is commonplace stupidity... but the latter is a rare species that is difficult to find.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
