text: We're not Demons or Gods. We're just humans.

author: Yukimura Tooru
title: Aoharu x Kikanjuu
text: Why are you acting like you're the only one hurting when you pushed him away?

author: Shirayuki
title: Akagami no Shirayukihime
text: If you're helping someone and expecting something in return, you're doing business not kindness.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: The night is in its darkest just before dawn. But keep your eyes open. If you avert your eyes from the dark, you'll be blinded by the rays of a new day. So keep your eyes open, no matter how dark the night ahead may be.

author: Zen Wistalia
title: Akagami no Shirayukihime
text: Red is supposed to be the color of fate, right? Even if it's annoying now, it might connect to something good when you least expect it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Death is like being born, but backwards. It only hurts for a little while, then a new life begins. A life with no sorrow, no pain, a glorious new beginning. A beginning that will last an eternity.

author: Reika
title: Nani made nara Koroseru
text: How far can you kill? Things like ants, spiders, and other bugs, we can squish without much thought, right? But if it's a fish, we feel a little reluctant when killing it. We begin to feel pressures of taking a life. It gets worse if the fish is replaced by an amphibian, and even more so if the amphibian becomes a reptile. The pressure is worse if the reptile becomes a bird, and even worse when the bird becomes a mammal. The higher up the chain we move towards the more advanced creatures, the more we hate to kill them. And eventually we hit a hurdle too high to overcome. We're unable to kill anything beyond that point. I think the highest hurdle would be... people.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: That's right. It's not like I ever felt superior to anyone else because I could see ghosts. And I never planned to take it up as a profession. Hell, I never even felt the need to use my ability to help others. All I ever wanted was the normal life I couldn't have. I've finally achieved what I always wanted.

author: Tsuchimiya Kagura
title: Ga-Rei:Zero
text: In a real fight, there is no next time. You can't choose your opponent's strength. Losing would mean death. If a duty-bound person dies, a hundred more innocent people would die. We exorcists cannot die easily, and that is a responsibility.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: No matter whether you win or not, there's no meaning to war.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: You give up your future, lose your dream, are stained with despair... yet at the same time, you shake off you past, fight reality, and never lose your nobility.

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: My treasure... you can see it, but you cannot! So I can´t show it to you! It´s friendship! We can see it in each other, but you can't see courage itself, right?

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: Death is to good for trash like you. This is your punishment which is even harder than death. Atone for your sin by living... A life of fulfillment.

author: Gintama
title: Gintama
text: A prison, you say? You think you'll be free if you go to the world above? A girl like you can never be free no matter where you go. After all, we humans are apes put in a cage called Earth. There is no difference between the world above and the world below. The only difference is which is bigger or smaller. People who pout about how confining the cage is can never be happy. They live their lives only seeing the iron bars. A true lack of freedom is when you cage your soul.

author: The Will of the Whole Misaka Network
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Relationships do not always improve... Sometimes they decline... But... it still counts as a victory if it all works out in the end... Let's keep it at that...

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: Don`t you... decide everything by yourself!! I don`t care about being pathetic or getting anything in return... People cannot possibly choose their own birthplace, but they can choose their own death that's why I became a "Code Breaker".  I`ll burn down all evil as long as I`m still alive... to the very last second of my life... nothing more than that!!

author: Ei Sei
title: Kingdom
text: Every single one of them died while furiously giving off the light that resided within them and that light is then inherited by the next person where it will go on to shine with an even greater radiance. And thus people are connected together... allowing us to work towards a better tomorrow.

author: Momoka Hanai
title: Koi Dano Ai Dano
text: People struggle to find an answer even in things like math where there is clearly only one answer. So there's no shame in struggling through something that has no right answer.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama' TV 2012
text: Will you choose that ticket and live on as a man? Or will you choose this one and go back to being a woman? No matter what you choose, I'm sure you will continue to waver. But what's wrong with that? Manly? Womanly? Are those random values that others made up really what you were striving toward? If things were so clear cut, then neither men, women, you, or me would be leading such painful lives.

author: Shirota Mahiru
title: SERVAMP
text: I was curious. Mikuni-san and Tsuyuki-senpai are the same. You say you'll "destroy" vampires. You never say "kill". Senpai. You've never seen a vampire playing games while lazing around the house, have you? A vampire crying that they're "sorry for lying" and regretting... A really bothersome NEET vampire who fought to protect a human he had just met too! I've seen a lot more than just their bad sides. They're all my comrades. You know, it'd be good if you just talked about what's bothering you too. Neither humans nor vampires need reasons to want to protect or save something. If they find C3 is weakening, the balance between humans and non-humans will collapse. If we suffer major damage from Tsubaki's side and asked you all for help, can you guarantee that none of the other vampires would attack C3? I don't really know... what the situation between vampires and C3 is, but, simply put, we need to protect it all, so that nobody gets hurt!

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo Kurosaki, all of the battles you've fought, were all part of my plan.

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: I dislike things. When a person dies, their things are left behind. I`d like to take care of mine ahead of time.

author: Dantalion
title: Makai Ouji : Devils And Realist
text: Always the same... Every age, every generation. Human beings are infinitely more cruel and selfish than any demon in hell.

author: Karuta Roromiya
title: Inu X Boku SS
text: Eating together makes food taste better and makes friends grow closer.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Even when the answer's obvious, making one wait for it is the worst thing you can do.

author: Rachnera Arachnera
title: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou
text: So you're trying to accept everyone and their feelings, aren't you? I think you already know this, but if you keep trying to do this "accepting" thing with everyone, you're liable to be torn to bits.

author: Miyamoto Musashi
title: Vagabond
text: There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself.

author: Vincent Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Love is a magnificent thing but, incidentally, it can also give birth to dreadful tragedy.

author: Hisomu Yoshiharu
title: Kiznaiver
text: If you don't know what state you wounds are in, of where you're hurting if you don't know that for yourself, there's no point in trying to share it with others, is there?

author: Maki Honoka
title: Kiznaiver
text: There is nothing more expensive than something free.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I finally remembered why I'm here to begin with. I'll kill you, you shitbag! I won't let you play your trump card! I'll blow you away and get a happy ending.

author: Kou Mabuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: We want the ones we can't have and ignore the ones that want us but then, we end up with none in the end.

author: Daiki Aomine
title: Kuroko no Basket: Mou Ikkai Yarimasen ka
text: There's is no such thing as a useless player.

author: Kurogane Ryouma
title: Rakudai Kishi no Cavalry
text: If you have the guts to not give up,you can be anything you want to be.We're living creature that don't have wings, but still went to the moon.

author: Twenty-Fifth Baam
title: Tower Of God
text: Those who try to step over someone else and go up higher... are actually only running away from some fear that they cannot see. Trying to step over someone is an cowardly action. It means you're not confident enough to face the opponent and speak to them with the same viewpoint. It doesn't matter how much power I have in me. By using that "power" that's taking over you. I do not want to become such a cowardly person. I will fight and get hurt in order to survive....

author: Miyuki Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: Wiping out any and all injuries as if they never happened. A spell like that... Do you really believe he can cast it without paying any price? In order to rewind the Eidos changelog and make a full copy,the stored information must be read in its entirely. Needless to say, that includes the pain and suffering experienced by the injured party. Not only that, but it's transmitted instantaneously in condensed form. For example, from the time that Isori was injured until brother cast his spell, roughly 30 seconds had gone by. Whereas the time Brother spent reading the Eidos changelog... was approximately 0.2 seconds. In that blink of an eye, my Brother's mind felt 150 times the pain and suffering experienced by Isori, condensed. Everytime Brother heals someone's wounds, that is the price he pays. Do you really mean to say that he should still use that power for others?

author: Faye Valentine
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: You know the first rule in combat? [Empties sub-machine gun through closed door] ... shoot them before they shoot you.

author: Londes
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: The souls that God has given us, our spirits. Our spirits, which found a way to swim through the immense network and live in the infinity of space. Is not the human body a mere shell? A form of existence all too small and weak for consciousness with such vast reach and potential.

author: Minerva Orland
title: Fairy Tail
text: Power is not the only connection you can have.  This world is filled with much warmer things.

author: Kazkis Hauer
title: Ergo Proxy
text: All those who wander in the darkness seek the light, but when they reach the light, they turn away their eyes from the blinding glare.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: In their heart, everyone has faith that their victory exists. However, in the face of time and destiny, the act of faith is fruitless and fleeting at best.

author: Jihou
title: Da Capo II
text: Everyone becomes an adult by learning how to give up on things.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: In this world, evil can arise from the best of intentions. And there is good which can come from evil intentions.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I must spill yet more blood, so the blood already split will not be in vain.

author: Magata Shiki
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: Of course. Humans can be kind because there are things they do not understand. If they knew everything, they would attempt nothing. If they attempted nothing, nothing new would happen. Humans seek answers to the things they do not know. That is how kindness, nostalgia, joy, and fun are born.

author: Ginjo Kugo
title: Bleach
text: Time will try to constantly try to catch up with you. And with a roar, it will overcome you. Do not look ahead. Hope only lies within the unforeseeable current that will close in from behind.

author: Magata Shiki
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: I think I would like someone else to kill me. I want someone else to interfere with my life. Is that not what wanting to be loved means, Saikawa-sensei? No life is born of it's own volition. Isn't the instinctive desire of beings, born not of their own volition, for their lives to be taken in the same way?

author: Tanaka Saeko
title: Haikyuu!!
text: There are some flowers you only see when you take detours.

author: Souhei Saikawa
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: Whenever I get up in the morning, I always think to myself, "Am I really the same person I was yesterday?" For example, just as a computer loads its OS into memory and boots up each time it restarts, is it possible I'm just booting up the person called "Saikawa Sohuei" each morning and trying to play that role?

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: Do you know what a scientist fears most in this world above all else? It's oblivion, my friend. A scientist measures our lives in the ways we develop and expand our knowledge through myriad variations. Nothing can take its place. It's our very soul. I have done the worst thing one scientist can do to another: I have altered your thought process. When my drug takes effect, you will find your mind has lost the ability to think.

author: Souhei Saikawa
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: Seeing nature and thinking it's beautiful is what's unnatural. That means the life you lead is an unclean one. If you can cut yourself off from mother nature and still survive, doesn't it mean you have enough inner beauty to allow you to do that?

author: Isozaki Itsuki
title: Sakurako-san no Ashioto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
text: Listen. Right now, you're trying to shoulder someone else's life. That might be the right thing to do, but that act requires a lot of resolve. It'll become a thorn that can't be removed, and it'll continue to hurt you forever. The briar will continue to grow, but it'll never flower. It'll only hurt, it'll only cause you pain.

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: Forget him. Forget his name. Forget his face. Forget his kiss, his warm embrace. Forget the love that you once knew. Remember he has someone new. Forget him when they played your song. Remember you cried all night long. Forget how close you once were. Remember he has chosen her. Forget how you memorized his walk. Forget the way he used to talk. Forget the things he used to say. Remember he has gone away. Forget his laugh. Forget his grin. Forget the dimples on his chin. Forget the way he held you tight. Remember he's with her tonight. Forget the time that went so fast. Forget the love that moved, it's past. Forget he said he'd leave you never. Remember he has gone forever...

author: Ryōhei Arisu
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: Just as water can overfill a container. Madness is all the same.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: All those times I got hurt, all the crying I did, all the pain I felt, all the fighting I did with my life at stake... And my reward was her name and a single smile. Jeez... Talk about unequal compensation.

author: Riruka Dokugamine
title: Bleach
text: If you ask anyone to name a universal rule that governs animals and humans alike, I bet you most people would answer "survival of the fittest". There are strong people and there are weak people. At a glance, it looks like the difference is pretty clear-cut. But the truth is, there's a lot more to it than just a simple battle of "strong" against "weak", of kill or be killed. You must understand what I'm talking about too, right? The true meaning of "survival of the fittest" isn't as simple as all that.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I guess, as long as I have life, all I can do is fight with all my might.

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: My heart was taken by you, broken by you, and now it's in pieces because of you.

author: Dlanor A. Knox
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 8: Twilight of the...
text: Too much curiosity kills both dreams and hopes...

author: Run
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: ...There are two ways to change a country. Destroy it from the outside, or correct it from the inside.

author: Claire Bernardus
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
text: Love is a delusion. If both have the same delusion, that love becomes real. However... if the feelings of each one is different, that is nothing more than a joke...

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Koyomimonogatari
text: In romance, you tend to end up looking for someone who resembles you.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: The school takes no responsibility of your future! You are fully responsible for your own future! That is why you have to find what you want to do! You are all free!

author: Genma Shiranui
title: Naruto
text: When captured birds grow wiser, they try to open the cage with their beaks. They don't give up, because they want to fly again.

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: I'm tired if trying, sick of crying, I know I've been smiling, but inside I'm dying.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: I'll always be by your side. You'll never be alone. You have as many hopes as there are stars that light up the sky. The wind that brushes your skin is a presentiment of tomorrow. Come, lets walk in time with the song of the fairies...

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: The worst way to miss someone is to be sitting right next to them and know you can never have them.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Unfortunately, a psychotic virgin, starved for love and likely to fall for anyone who would be a little nice to her, has set eyes on you.

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: No guy is worth your tears. When you find one that is, he won't make you cry.

author: Rem (re:zero)
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I love it when you stroke my hair. I feel as if we can understand each other through the contact between your hand and my hair. I love your voice. Just hearing you say one word makes my heart feel warmer. I love your eyes. Normally, they look stern,  but when you're being kind to someone,  I love the way they soften. I love your fingers. For a boy, you have such lovely fingers. But when they clutch me, I know they are the strong, slender fingers of a man. I love the way you walk. When we walk together, I love the way you occasionally turn, to make sure I keep up. I love the way you look when you sleep. You look unguarded, like an infant, and your eyelashes are on the long side. When I touch your cheek, you calm down... And when I playfully touch your lips, you don't even notice... And it makes my heart ache terribly. I love you.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: It was rough. It was so painful. I was so scared. I was so sad. It hurt so much, I thought I'd die. I tried so hard... I tired so hard! I was so desperate, so desperate to make everything right! It's the truth. I've honestly never tried so hard at anything in my life! Because I loved this place... Because it was so important to me! I was so desperate to get back. I was scared... I was so scared! I didn't want those eyes looking at me like that again... And I hated myself so much for feeling that way!

author: Gasai Yuno
title: Mirai Nikki
text: I'm crazy!? What's crazy is this world that refuses to let me be with you!!!

author: Ikta Solork
title: Alderamin on the Sky
text: People started growing crops because going hunting without knowing if you'd catch anything was a pain. People dug wells because going all the way to the river was a pain. Laziness is the mother of human progress.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: I thought that when I grew up, I could reach more and more. The delicious looking fruit beckoning from the highest branch.The beautiful shell hidden in the sand. If I could only stretch out my hand a little more…. But…. As everyone passes through the junctures of their life, they no longer stretch their hand to the sky, or crouch to the earth. Embarrassed, they ignore what they'd desired for so long. Will you reach out and grab me, grown up as I am?

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: If I were to compare a human's heart with the ocean, the water would be stagnant. If I were to name the ripples on the water surface….Would it be happiness? Or anger? No. For this ocean, such a description is too shallow. If I want to know what lies upon the deep ocean floors… I would have to open my eyes in the stagnant water. Then swim downwards while enduring the icy deep kicking through the cold and heavy ocean waters. If I truly want to know the human known as myself….even if.. there is nothing there.

author: Horobi
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: Those who underestimate their enemies will not last long in this world.

author: Ryōma Terasaka
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Some of us showed a strength we didn't expect. Some of us went ballistic like we thought they would, some got all fired up for next time and some irresponsible- lookin' types turned out to be crazy serious. The guy we thought was just a little runt turned out to be a genius assassin, and a guy we thought was a genius was secretly workin' hard all along. With all these different skillsets...we just might be able to handle any challenge that comes our way.

author: Ikoma
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: Can we really be proud of our own survival that's predicated on sacrificing our own? There lives aren't all we lose.

author: Ikoma
title: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri
text: Perhaps the souls of those we couldn't save, will eventually find their way to my sister. If they do, could they relay a message for me? That I promise to live for her too. And even if she feels a little lonely, just wait there for me for a little while longer.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: I'll use my flames for a better purpose!

author: Leonardo da Vinci
title: Nobunaga The Fool
text: The truth can be concealed by the position one chooses to take,but can also be revealed once more.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Spring will be here soon. Spring, the season I met you, is coming. A Spring without you...is coming.

author: Gon Freecss
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Being able to cry for his companion. I was thinking you couldn't cry, nor did you have a heart. But in that case why... even a little... don't you share that feeling... with all the people you kill !!

author: Hajime Iwaizumi
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: Someone who can't see the opponent before them can't see the opponent lying beyond.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: It doesn't matter if we're wrong...because every time we go wrong, we'll continue to look for the right answer.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Take advantage of what you have, while you have it.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Only those who have suffered long, can see the light within the shadows

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: The time is almost here. Go and lay the groundwork. A world where only true pirates can survive will soon be upon us. Those without power, flee while you can. The tide will bring those of unmatched power and the New Era will begin!

author: Leon Sōryū
title: Cardfight!! Vanguard
text: Those who wallow in power are destroyed by it.

author: Ikta Solork
title: Alderamin on the Sky
text: Chasing someone is tiring, and being chased is mentally exhausting. But making someone chase you can be fun.

author: Nagisa Shiota
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Examined from another angle, your faults and weaknesses can be weapons.

author: Ikta Solork
title: Alderamin on the Sky
text: A barbarian punches someone when he feels like it, a soldier attacks when it's time to attack, and Ikta Solork says everything he wants whenever he wants to say it.

author: Kiyomasa Senji
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: If you are weak, don't bare your fangs.

author: Kureo Mado
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: As long as it's for the right cause, there's nothing wrong with playing dirty.

author: Maria Cadenzavna Eve
title: Senki Zesshō Symphogear G
text: I kinda like that about you. If only everyone had the guts to fight for each other like you do, the world might have been a better place.

author: Hattori Zenzou
title: Gintama
text: It's quite easy for humans to become adults, but to always have a child-like heart that makes everything joyful isn't such an easy task.

author: Mishakuji Yukari
title: K: Missing Kings
text: You'll never be able to go anywhere unless you learn how to let go.

author: Nico Robin
title: One Piece
text: Fools who don't respect the past are likely to repeat it.

author: Scythe Master
title: Phantom: Requiem For The Phantom
text: This has nothing to do with will. There is neither an egg that refuses to hatch nor a seed that evades it's eventual sprouting.

author: Saruhiko Fushimi
title: K
text: The day when you'll finally understand me... will never come.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Fool… I belong among the heavens? Yet you would have me trod upon the ground?! Your impudence has guaranteed your death! Mongrel! When I am through with you, nothing will remain of your corpse!

author: Adlet Mayer
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: What do you think it means to be the strongest man in the world? The strongest man in the world has power, skill, wisdom, heart, and luck.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: So, you would question me, you filthy mongrel? Me, the one true king? If you cannot now discern my identity in the presence of my magnificent glory, then you're ignorant blindness will serve to seal your doom!

author: Sei
title: Suicide Island
text: I... the society I was in- says that if you don't have anything you want to do, then you're no good. That if you don't have dreams, you're no good. If you don't win, you're no good. If you can't get a nice life... if you can't accumulate a lot... then you aren't happy, they said. And yet... and yet, mom... I... I just wanted you to say that I'm fine how I am. That's all.

author: Mukai Hitoshi
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Babies are jobless when they are born too! It's just that they are tainted in the large bathtub called life after that!

author: Jae-ha
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Having my fate decided for me from the time I was born goes against my view of beauty.

author: Marga
title: Magi - The Labyrinth of Magic
text: If you live after giving up on the things you want to do and the world around you doesn't sparkle, it's the same thing as being dead. If you don't give up, even if it's short, it'll be a fantastic life!

author: Akatsuki no Yona
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Geniuses don't understand the feelings of people who aren't able to do something.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: I'm not sure what you're talking about, but to atone for that you got mad and decided to do this alone? Rem... Super slap! For starters, are you dumb? No, you are dumb! Listen, where I'm from there's a saying, "3 heads are better than 1." Wait, is it 2 heads? Whatever, the point is, 3 heads, thinking together are harder to break than only 1 arrow. It means you should rely on those around you instead of thinking about stuff alone!

author: Ichijou Raku
title: Nisekoi
text: I'm used to gettting clobbered by her and all. But damn. A slap on the face hurts so much more.

author: Renji Yomo
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: We can only live while we lose.

author: Aquarius
title: Fairy Tail
text: Quit acting like a spoiled child. What's important, the memories? The keys? The feelings of guilt? No. It's the power to save your friends. That's the power of a celestial spirit wizard.

author: Fujisawa Ayana
title: Fukushuu Kyoushitsu
text: It just so happens that I was caught in a web. A web known as malice. Whether you put up with it, or put up a fight, it makes no difference. In the end, you get killed. If you don't like that... risk your life... and retaliate.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: It is the role of a parent to stand in front of their children... and protect them even if their legs were to give out at any moment.

author: Aoyagi Ritsuka
title: Loveless
text: They call each other friends, but they are either using others or being used themselves.

author: Subaru Natsuki
title: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
text: While we talk,  look forward to making up for all the time you've wasted looking back! We can start by talking about tomorrow. You can say anything like, whether you'll make Japanese or Western style breakfast tomorrow, or whether you'll put on your right or left shoe first. It can be something silly like that. No matter how silly it is, you can talk about tomorrow because you have a tomorrow.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Fun times are bound to end.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: As you go through life, the might current of society is bound to get in your way and there will certainly be times that things don't go as you'd hoped. When this happens, don't look to society for a cause. Do not renounce society. Frankly, you'd be wasting your time. Instead just say, "That's life!" and muddle your way through with frustration. Once you're past it, consider: If society's swift current is tossing you around, how should you be swimming there in it's midst. You should have learned how, here in the E class, in this assassination classroom. You don't always have to stand and face it head-on. You can run and you can hide. If it's not against the rules, you can try a sneak attack. You can use unconventional weapons. Stay determined - not impatient nor discouraged - and with repeated trial and error, you're bound to reach a splendid outcome eventually.

author: Nejima Yukari
title: Koi to Uso
text: Sometimes, I wonder why people fall in love. Why do we abandon ourselves... to these painful and burdensome feelings?

author: Kouta Tsuchiya
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: A wedding is a man's grave.

author: Shiro
title: No Game No Life
text: Fulfilled people are just an urban legend.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: If the dark sky is me, then the sparkling stars are Tsubaki.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Youth is both a lie and a form of evil.

author: Kaede Kayano
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Not even your closest friends get to see your true blade.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: The natural enemy of the strong is the weak, but the natural enemy of the weak is not the strong - it is the ones that are even weaker.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: In fairy tales, when the protagonists end up in a different world, they do their best to get back home, right? But who would want to go back to a world like that?

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: The past you've lost will never come back. I myself have made so many mistakes... But we can learn from the past so we don't repeat it.

author: Haruhiro
title: Hai to Gensou no Grimgar
text: I'm different from who I was yesterday. I wonder what I will be like tomorrow. Day by day, we live in the today and keep living to meet our future selves.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Is anything ever truly wasted?

author: Yayoi Kanbara
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: As long as our love is stronger than the hatred within us, we can keep it sealed away.

author: Fate/stay night
title: Fate/stay night
text: Dreams are more beautiful if they stay as dreams.

author: Itami Youji
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: I work to support my hobby. So if you asked me which I'd choose, my job or my hobby, my hobby takes priority.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: If I wasn't prepared to be flexible as the situations demands, I wouldn't have become a teacher.

author: Hinazuki Kayo
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text:
When I get bigger, big enough to go somewhere by myself, I want to go to a land that's far away.
I want to go to a faraway island. I want to go to an island that has no people. I want to go to an island that has no pain or sadness.
There are no adults, children, classmates, teachers or my mom on that island.
On that island, I can climb a tree when I want to climb, swim in the sea when I want to swim, and sleep when I want to sleep.
In the island, I think about the town that I left behind. Kids go to school, as if nothing has changed.
Adults go to the office, as if nothing has changed. Mom eats, as if nothing has changed.
When I think about the town without me, I feel a sense of relief. I want to go far, far away.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom
text: The world will always be filled with injustice. If you have time to give up or hold a grudge against that injustice, then use that time to enjoy battling those injustices instead.

author: Garou
title: One Punch Man
text: If you weren't here, I would have become the world's absolute evil. Unbiased terror scattered throughout the world that can establish real peace. Don't think that all children are waiting for heroes. There are even kids around the world waiting for a great monster to take the stage. Can you save them? Can you follow the ugly kid being picked on in the park? I can. I can save the whole world with terror! While humanity is fearing Garou the Monster, everyone's hearts will unite to survive. Is there any peace other than this? Can you create peace? Can you, unbiased, save the world with that flimsy cape? Do you have the means to stop the unseen tragedies? You're strong... but so what? You may defeat me, but can you handle it? The responsibility. Well? If you're going to defeat me then answer the question! What will you accomplish? Why will you kill me now? Do you have a sense of duty like mine? Why are YOU a hero!?

author: Nagisa Shiota
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: If that treetop is school, and the ground is this place here... we all found our strength down on the ground. While looking up... and getting looked down on... we learned plenty about how scary heights were before we started climbing. That's why we can go our own way now. Still... Somewhere along the way we forgot our fear of heights, so we do still fall to the ground every now and then. So learn here. You can go on to school once you have a game plan. That's my secret lesson, from me to you.

author: Fujinuma Sachiko
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: Thinking it's your fault after the fact is just pointless.

author: Garou
title: One Punch Man
text: The phony peace that heroes create will dye people with evil. That's why I'm doing this. I will be the Count Devil that plunges humanity into terror! In a world with no room for survival, evil will disappear. And so will bullying, and discrimination, even war! What this world needs is not biased Justice but unbiased, absolute Evil! I'm fighting for world peace. No justice will be able to overthrow me. I will be stronger than anyone! I will be an absolute MONSTER!

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: You may have grown too strong. Drunk on your own power, you forgot to put yourself in the shoes of someone weaker than you. That makes you no different than the student in the main campus.

author: Satoru Fujinuma
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: To get what you want, you put up with something, make an effort, learn a skill, and inspire yourself. Is that how it is with Hinazuki too? Right now... I can tell she's enduring something. Just the opposite of me, she is pretending to be indifferent. She pretends to feel nothing, but a 10 year old girl isn't that strong.

author: Hinazuki Kayo
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: While I'm performing it feels like it'll become real somewhere along the line.

author: Garou
title: One Punch Man
text: The popular will win, the hated will lose, it's such a tragedy. Then I won't lose to anyone. I will become the strongest monster ever and change this scenario.

author: Yashiro Gaku
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: The essence of good deeds and evil is the same. They're both no more than a person's actions to make up for a defect in themselves.

author: Garou
title: One Punch Man
text: This strength doesn't make any sense. It's not fair. It's like he's made up of the world's unfairness. As if he is the personification of justice... of course. Didn't I already know? This world is unfair. Justice and evil are decided by others. That's how the world is. To oppose the unfair power known as justice, I have to obtain the unfair power known as evil. To defeat the unfair beings known as heroes I have to become an unfair being myself!

author: Jack
title: Mayoiga
text: All adults are the same in the end. At first they are kind and sympathetic to make you drop your guard, then they try to kill you if you don't do as they say. That how adults always are. They're losers. The damn bastards!

author: Reiji Akaba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
text: This is your world. As an outsider it may be out of place to say this... But I want to make one thing clear: Mere observers have no right to decide the future!

author: Osamu Dazai
title: Bungou Stray Dogs
text: Justice is a weapon. It can be used to cause harm, but it cannot protect or save others.

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: There is a difference in the look of the ordinary vagabond and that of a determined man.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Be Yourself because an Original is worth more than a Copy

author: Takashi Morinozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Every time you hurt others, you're the one who end up being hurt.

author: Jurai Andou
title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: Anyone can cheer for you and your dreams, but only the people closest to you can worry about you.

author: Juuzou Suzuya
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Why should I apologize for being a monster? Has anyone ever apologized for turning me into one?

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: I don't care if no one likes me. I wasn't created in this world to entertain everyone.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Like God, you mean? That might be pleasurable in its own way, but unfortunately I'm not into being an umpire or a referee, as I can't genuinely enjoy the game unless I'm part of it. And I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart. That's why I'd like to continue to participate in it as a player, forever and ever.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: You don't abuse and use people for your own convenience.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2 Ten
text: The harder you try to see the good in people the easier it is to fake you out.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko's Basketball TV 3
text: Victory is everything in this world. The victory is acknowledged, and the vanquished is disavowed. Because I am victorious overall, I am always the just.

author: Ludenberg Celestia
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: No matter who the enemy may be, those who can't adapt will be the first to die.

author: Porco Rosso
title: Porco Rosso
text: A pig who doesn't fly is just an ordinary pig.

author: Ei Sei
title: Kingdom
text: People fall into darkness because they have lost sight of the true nature of the light within them. Unable to find that light they flounder desperately while suffering in agony, only to give birth to tragedy. And there is no greater cause of tragedy, no greater source of darkness, than warfare.

author: Kazuya Kujō
title: Gosick
text: You've really got to hold on to what's important to you.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: Broadly speaking, there are two reasons a person feels the desire to teach something: Either he wants to pass on his successes or he wants to pass on his failures.

author: Jean Kirstein
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I just really don't wanna meet a disappointing end, with someone burning my bones without even knowing who they belonged to.

author: Esdeath
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: I don't understand the feelings of the weak. The law of the world is survival at its fittest. Its how the weak are weeded out. It just means those people that died were too weak. Its only natural for the weak to perish.

author: Satsuki Kiryuuin
title: Kill la Kill
text: I understand now. The world is not cut from the same cloth. It is because it is overflowing with inexplicable, unidentifiable things that the world is so beautiful.

author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: A person who can't care about himself can't protect anyone, I think.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Oppression. Rule by fear. dictatorships. It's a strange thing. Throughout history, for some reason, the lives of such rulers have always ended in the same way: Assassination by someone who isn't even part of a combat unit.

author: Tsukushi Makino
title: Boys Over Flowers
text: Is being silent and suppressing  your own feelings really being thoughtful of the other person?

author: Featherine Augustus Aurora
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 8: Twilight of the...
text: The writing end when the writing ends... No... Accurately said, it is not written to an end. If you write a story to a certain point, can you say it is fully written? This has been paining me in all those long years as someone who writes. The journeys of humans make for such interesting stories, yet... But where does the journey start and where does it end... Even I do not know an answer to this...

author: Satoru Fujinuma
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: "Believing in someone." That's a weird phrase, isn't it? After all, if you truly believed in a person, you wouldn't need to say, "I believe you." It's like saying, "I believe in air." I don't mean to say that "believing in something" is like a lie. "Believing" is really a term of hope of wanting to believe.

author: Satoru Fujinuma
title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
text: The future is always blank. Only your willpower can leave footsteps there.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom 2nd Season
text: All of the connections we encounter in this world serve as teachers who nurture us.

author: Kayo Senju
title: Black Bullet
text: If you're ever lost in the darkness, follow the compass in your heart.

author: Ushiromiya Lion
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 8: Twilight of the...
text: So because you think you got the ending, you're giving up on viewing the whole play? Even though it could still lead to a climax that you weren't able to predict?

author: Tooru Oikawa
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.

author: Kouen Ren
title: Magi - The Labyrinth of Magic
text: If you want to stand with your own will, you don't have any other choice than to let the illusions you have lost remain in the ideals you were following in the past.

author: Etoile
title: Arslan Senki
text: Doing this and that for your country is surely not your job, but the kings. But taking action for your country and her people - your parentage has no bearing on that. It is a most noble thing.

author: Claire Bernardus
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
text: And yet, at the end of the day, we are just like tree leaves dancing in a whirlpool. No matter how we dance, we are only swallowed by the whirlpool and disappear...

author: Beatrice
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
text: When a human, gives birth to a child, they give it a form. When they give it a name, they recognize it. And when they raise it in the world, they deepen it's existence.

author: Ryūnosuke Tanaka
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: Even if you put aside regret, you´ll end up feeling it anyway. Right now, you need to make sure you grasp this good feeling and never forget it.

author: Sakurako Kujō
title: Sakurako-san no Ashioto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
text: At times, I feel as though the whole world is gray, as though time is standing still. But time never stops. It moves forward endlessly, as surely as bodies buried in the ground will one day become white bones. Listen, it's always you who stops time. If you stop in fear of the future - you gain nothing, and nothing begins. You spend your life as though already dead. Whether you wish it to or not - time never stops. That's why there is nothing more interesting than this world. Don't be too negative. You haven't become ashes just yet. You have your flesh and blood, and your bones are supporting you.

author: Drosselmeyer
title: Princess Tutu
text: Stories aren't always guaranteed a happily ever after.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: Being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to sense other people's love.

author: Tsugumi
title: Guilty Crown
text: Sympathy only gets people hurt.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: To take responsibility is to take pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistakes! If you ruined someone's silver tableware, you must repay with gold tableware. The president of a polluting manufacturing plant must live beside the plant's chimney. That's what taking responsibility means. However the people in so-called high positions never see the consequences. When mistakes are made, they will casually bow their heads and apologize. They think that's enough. Are you one of them too?

author: Shana
title: Shakugan no Shana
text: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art. It has no survival value. Rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.

author: Russia
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Accept me for what I am today, don't reject me because of what I was yesterday.

author: Wakana Sakai
title: Tari Tari
text: But for me, just having fun wasn't enough. The support of my friends was equally important. They encouraged me through my struggles. They're all so different from me, but they're honest and determined. We fought, but we also worked together. I know my mother had a friend like that too. Someone to have fun with. Someone to share her worries. Mom, I have finished the song we promised to write. Sorry it took so long. I'm glad I could create this song with you and my friends. I'll treasure it always for bringing us together.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Nothing can be communicated without words but if you really care about someone, even the smallest details are important to notice.

author: Sakurako Kujō
title: Sakurako-san no Ashioto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
text: Don't be too negative. You haven't become ashes just yet. You have your flesh and blood, and your bones are supporting you.

author: Matsu's Husband
title: Gintama
text: Matsu, you said that people and fireworks bloom like beautiful flowers for an instant and then fade away. That may be true, but Matsu, even if it's only for a moment, I want you to bloom by my side and when you fade away... do so at my side. In return, I will... make beautiful flowers bloom by your side again and again.

author: Kano Shuuya
title: Kagerou Days
text: Ah, my most ugly heart. I hate, hate, hate it, so I can't help but sneer all the time.

author: Sakurako Kujō
title: Sakurako-san no Ashioto ni wa Shitai ga Umatteiru
text: The skull is one of the most eloquent bones in existence. If you just ask, it will tell you many things.

author: Atsushi Murasakibara
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I don't like practice. I just hate losing even more.

author: Satsuki Kiryuuin
title: Kill la Kill
text: Those who lack resolve are incapable of even wiping away their own tears.

author: Satsuki Kiryuuin
title: Kill la Kill
text: Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! These are the truths of this world! Surrender to those truths, you pigs who fawn over clothing!

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text:
There are no inherently bad people. Everyone believes that, myself included. I don't doubt the existence of virtue. And yet people bare their fangs when it seems they can profit. People will rationalize their own behavior whenever they become tainted with evil; they're not supposed to be evil. In order to preserve their own twisted integrity, the world becomes twisted. 
Someone you praised as “cool” until yesterday is “stuck up” today; someone you respected as “smart and knowledgeable” is now scorned as someone who “looks down on bad students”, and “energetic vigor” becomes “annoying and overly carried away”.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Was I able to live inside someone's heart? Was I able to live inside your heart? Do you think you'll remember me at least a little? You'd better not hit "reset!" Don't forget me, okay? That's a promise, okay? I'm glad it's you, after all. Will I reach you? I hope I can reach you.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: Really, what a joke. I just didn't understand what these nice guys were thinking about. Because they were so in love with everyone getting along, they ended up opening up other problems when they try to fix one. I didn't even ask to be thrown into that circle either.

author: Shuuko Murao
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: If you still love her, I can't help that, but don't meddle with her half-heartedly. If you can surpress your feelings, then leave it.

author: Wave
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: When a man of the sea falls in love, he dives in head first!

author: Subaru
title: .hack//SIGN
text: Your own path is for you to find out on your own.

author: Femt
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: When I want to do something, I do it, regardless of the rest of the world. When I don't, I don't, and that's that.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I prefer to have my nightmares with open eyes.

author: Kyōko Kirigiri
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: It's odd, isn't it? People die everyday and the world goes on like nothing happened.

author: Fremy Speedraw
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: Adlet, I hated you. I hated the fact that I was starting to believe in you. I still hate you. The more I talk to you, the more I hate you. I believe you, even though I decided to never believe anyone again.

author: Atro Spiker
title: Rokka no Yuusha
text: If you want to be strong, smile! He who can smile, even when he's so sad that he wants to die, when it's so painful that he wants to give it all up and run away, is the one who becomes strong.

author: Yuri Lowell
title: Tales Of Vesperia
text: I think there are some things that you have to do, even if they're a crime. Someone has to do them, even if it means taking the blame.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: We do not stop playing games because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.

author: Miju
title: Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything
text: Huh? DO whatever you want without DICE? As if someone like you could understand. What's so bad about wanting to reach higher than yourself? After all, you're already up there. The place where I've always longed to be. If anything, isn't this world at fault? There's plenty of proof this world was created unfairly. The Crime rate's higher than ever. Wealth is the determining factor in life, and so when the most prestigious universities held an experiment, "Does appearance affect the outcome in a trail?" When comparing the results of the beautiful and the plain, the beautiful ones were declared innocent more often. Looks decide your worth. LOOKS, SEX, AGE, ETHNICITY, EDUCATION, JOB, once you realize that there will always be a 'High' and 'Low", the goal is clear. Higher... and Higher! I'm sure that looking down from the highest place will be beautiful sight, so I must reach higher!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: There is more than one way to win a game. You can win without fighting!

author: Ainz Ooal Gown
title: Overlord
text: Death by sword. Death by broken bones. Death by crushing. There's not much difference, right? You die at the end.

author: Shiho Fujimiya
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: Regretting the past forever won't solve anything.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: I'm not your weapon, demon king, or savior! I'm Rin Okumura! And when I'm done, I'm going to be the best exorcist you ever laid your eyes on!

author: Inori Yuzuriha
title: Guilty Crown
text: Believe you can do it. For sure. Because I... belong to you now.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: Is that really... the limit to your power? Do you honestly think that you won't get any stronger for the rest of your life? Instead of sitting around frustrated, it's better to keep on moving forward.

author: Mumen Rider
title: One Punch Man
text: I know no one expects much from me! And I know better than anyone how useless a C Class hero is! I know I'm too weak even for B Class! I know more than anyone else that I'll never beat you! But I must fight you anyway! I'm the only one left! It's not about winning or losing! I just have to stand here and face you!

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to!

author: Fuyumi Utsuromiya
title: Life is Money
text: After all, most human beings are completely selfish. Eventually, they will meet their desires and try to help others. However, that isn't their only desire, they wish to stir people up. It is simplistically easier to do so anyway, they think it is a stupid ideal to show love to anyone but themselves.

author: Riō Satomi
title: Hakkenden: Eight Dogs of the East TV 2
text: If you can't remember something, it is merely because it was not worth remembering.

author: Alibaba Saluja
title: Magi - The Kingdom of Magic
text: No matter how crazy it may be, or how dangerous it may be, even if it's something personal, it doesn't matter! Anything that you're worried about, I'll worry right along with you and think of a solution! Just like you did for me all those times!

author: Misa Kurobane
title: Charlotte
text: Forget about me, and starting tomorrow live your own life. Don't keep dragging the dead into your life, otherwise your life would get screwed up and you won't be happy in the future, okay?

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: We will never laugh at ourselves. Just as earthworms do not fear darkness and penguins are not ashamed of their inability to fly. That's the meaning of life, is it not?

author: Togame
title: Katanagatari
text: By abandoning offense, even without winning, the result will be effectively victory.

author: Itami Youji
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: If you can't see something through the end, then don't do anything.

author: Yuki Takeya
title: Gakkou Gurashi!
text: If you bottle up your sadness too much, you'll forget what's really important.

author: Takeo Gouda
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: Suna, maybe people all have a hot, molten core inside their hearts, but they just live their lives, never showing it to the world, as if nothing is really going on.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: You idiot. You'd gotten yourself up in a tizzy about romance, right? "Love" you experience in that state is just self-delusion. There's no point in getting depressed over love like that.

author: Kyubee
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
text: On this planet you call females who have yet to become adults, girls. It makes sense then that since you'll eventually become withes, you should be called Magical Girls.

author: Cardeas Vist
title: Mobile Suit Gundam UC
text: If you trust in the possibilities within and try with all your might, the path will show itself to you!

author: Urisu
title: Selector Spread Wixoss
text: All things shine at their most brilliant when they're being broken.

author: Umetarō Nozaki
title: Monthly Girls' Nozaki-kun
text: You can't trust people who call themselves your friends after you've just met them. This is a trap. I know it. A friend who gets close to the protagonist like this is actually the boss, bullying them from the shadows, cornering them into utter despair. And then comes this line... "The truth is I've hated you from the moment I met you!"

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Everyone's the same, no exceptions.  All of them, equal before god.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: Kara no Kyoukai
text: The human psyche goes out of whack so easily with minor elements, such as wall colors and staircase placement. Those who use them every day would be affected more dramatically.

author: Shimura Shinpachi
title: Gintama
text: There's no short-cut to becoming strong. Even if you try to look strong on the outside, that thin layer will soon fall off.

author: Mutta Namba
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: It only took a moment for everything to click. In that instant, I understood. A leader is somebody who can bring a sense of calm and excitement at the same time.

author: Hiroomi Nase
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: If you keep trying to reason with yourself instead of listening to your feelings, you'll never be able to feel true happiness.

author: Koichiro Marito
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: Sins you've committed cling to your soul and then continue to haunt you forever.The sins that have gone unpunished don't get forgiven until you die.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again, but what you throw away you'll never get it back.

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man. As long as there people who seek freedom in this life, These things shall not vanish from the Earth.

author: Alibaba Saluja
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don't need them and their selfish ideas.

author: Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.

author: Makishima Yuusuke
title: Yowamushi Pedal Grande Road
text: Your emotions have nothing to do with winning or losing,  but they're motivating us more than you might expect.

author: Gin Kurobe
title: Torikago no Tsugai
text: Life is all about "selection". There's no such thing as a life of being pushed around by circumstances or a life of doing as one is told.  It is you who selected to be "swept along"

author: Rinne Higaki
title: Katanagatari
text: Looking at your own memories is recognizing the parts of you that you don't want to face.

author: William Twining
title: Makai Ouji : Devils And Realist
text: As long as humans are not virtuous beings, desire will always win over the fear of punishment. What's necessary is not punishment, but to deal with that desire.

author: Takeo Gouda
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: The important things in life, like feelings, hearts, and souls, are all things you can never see. The more you try to reassure yourself that they exist, the more you feel they don't exist at all. But right now, I know for sure that they do exist. They're so close, you can almost touch them.

author: Murasaki
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: Human emotions are just black or white sometimes there and consistent and can even be contradictory, but that's all right.

author: Sougetsu Ootori
title: Taimadou Gakuen 35 Shiken Shoutai
text: The smell of blood, gunpowder and iron. This is what humanity's all about. Well then, the man in charge must always lead from the front. And yet be the last one to die.

author: Matsuoka Masamune
title: Aoharu x Kikanjuu
text: They are two types of people. Those who let go and those who are let go. How many times have I watched people leave up until now? I may have been able to reach them if I'd reached out, but I was afraid of being pushed away, so I simply watched them disappear into the distance.

author: Nobuchika Ginoza
title: Psycho-Pass
text: No matter how severe the situation is, if you continue to stay there, you'll accept everything as a everyday life.

author: Ensei Rou
title: The Story of Saiunkoku
text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Even though each step is small, you never know if you'll end up achieving your major goal.

author: Adolf Reinhardt
title: Terraformars
text: Even if I found happiness, my weakness can't be discarded. But, even so, I'm sure that we took the right path to move forward.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: These girls are pixels. Data. I know that. So how would you describe the girl you like? Protein? Calcium? A pointless argument. What's important is that there's love. Isn't that what you people always say?

author: Hikari Hanazono
title: Special A
text: The end result is important. But what's truly important... is the journey to get there.

author: Riruka Dokugamine
title: Bleach
text: Survival of the fittest' is just a pretty lie that they tell you. A lie to make weak people believe that if they try their best, they can come out on top. Truth is, it isn't the weak that get eaten. It's not about strength, it's about numbers. The ones who stand at the top of the food chain are the brainless dolts. The loudmouths. Because there are so, so many of them. You know it's true. Everybody does. You all just turn a blind eye and pretend not to notice.

author: Izayoi Sakamaki
title: Mondaji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou Desu yo?
text: Silence implies consent.

author: Yakumo Saitō
title: Psychic Detective Yakumo
text: Souls of the dead are like a bunch of leftover feelings from those who've died.

author: Aikurō Mikisugi
title: Kill la Kill
text: One who relies overly on a single skill will be brought low by that very same skill.

author: Takamura Mamoru
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: No matter how much talent you have, if you aren't the best, you're nothing because there can only be one king. If you're in his shadow, then history won't see you.

author: Magata Shiki
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: It is right for me, but not for you. Either way, the concept of "right" means no more than that.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Whats the probability of drawing the ace of spades from a deck with no jokers? Normaly it would be 1/50. But what if its a brand new deck? The position of cards in a new deck are typically identical, so that means if you take out the jokers and draw the card at the very bottom, it's the ace of spades almost 100% of the time. Oh that's right! I didn't say a word about it being a new deck. Rather, you didn't ask. Being in the "no" gives you the power to turn the probability of winning from 1.92% to 100%. The more knowledge of a party will be the inevitable victor.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I am the God placed here to save the weak and create a perfect world.

author: Tobio Kageyama
title: Haikyuu!!
text: The last ones standing are the victors. Only the strongest. If you want to be the last one standing become strong.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: A victor must speak not of the current state of the world, but of how it should rightfully be.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Black Butler II
text: Once drowned in the depths of darkness, you lose sight of light. When that light has dispersed there is no return. My light has died out long ago and so there's nothing back for me to go back, or look forward to I shall continue to indulge myself in this darkness until it completely consumes me, then I will be nothing but an empty course left on this cold & cruel world to rot.

author: Ikkei Ukai
title: Haikyuu!! Second Season
text: There's no match you can't win, and there's no match that you'll win for sure.

author: Kurokawa Mari
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: People can't live for the future without accepting reality.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I'll sooner die than become burden.

author: Magata Shiki
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: Every individual human affects the surrounding environment. But humans do not exist for the things and people around them. Often, they mistakenly think that they wish to exist for the sake of others, or to help everyone. They can not accept that they don't know why they exist, yes? They always want an answer. That is the nature of the animals called "humans".

author: Magata Shiki
title: Subete ga F ni Naru
text: No one fears death. They fear the life that leads up to death. If one could die without suffering, no one would fear death, right? Being alive is, itself, an exception. The natural state of things is death. And life is, itself, a kind of sickness. When the illness is cured, your life vanishes.

author: Shun Izuki
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Does math bring out your wrath?

author: Mikazuki Augus
title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans
text: I've never been victimized for anything. I am just doing what I can for me and my comrades. And right now, you're in my way.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Do you know the phrase “enough specks of dust creates a mountain”? Or maybe “three heads are better than one.” In other words, when people gathered together, they become even stronger and more secure. However, we were a group of failures who had gathered to do pointless things.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: If you realize you made a mistake with the way you've been living your life, you just have to take the next moment and start over.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: God would never put us through all this suffering if he didn't think we could bear it.

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: If you let yourself get depressed, you'd be making light of the people who trust and follow you.

author: Zen Wistalia
title: Akagami no Shirayukihime
text: Red is supposed to be the color of fate, right? Even if its annoying right now, it might connect to something good when you least expect it.

author: Mikoto Mikoshiba
title: Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun
text: There's nothing more satisfying than conquering all types of girls.

author: Len Tsukimori
title: Kiniro no Corda: Blue♪Sky
text: The sounds you find pretty, and the sounds the other members find pretty... Are they really the same?

author: Shū Ouma
title: Guilty Crown
text: No, but I can learn. I'll bathe in blood. If that's what it takes to protect my friends, I'll take it. All the hatred, the disease. I'll take it as my own and end it.

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: How many people you killed, or how many you let live, it doesn't matter to me. You people incurred my wrath... That's reason enough, for you to meet your demise.

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: To put things simply, if your past makes your present... Then your present can and will make your future. When you think about it that way... You absolutely have the potential to be anything you want to be, don't you agree?

author: Taichi Mashima
title: Chihayafuru
text: Love is when it isn't fun to be with that person. It's when nothing goes the way you want. When you're not having fun... and yet you still want to be with that person.

author: Coco
title: Toriko
text: Whether it's disappointing or not depends on the person. Things like uneasiness or indecision are in everyone's lives. What's important is to appreciate and grow from every kind of result. If you can grow from them, you can understand that all events are for the purpose of growing and you can appreciate them.

author: Daichi Sawamura
title: Haikyuu!!
text: We're basically developing at this point, and we don't know the limits of our potential. Even if we felt those limits we would still keep aiming higher.

author: Tobio Kageyama
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Y-you actually used your head??? You're going to get a fever!

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text:
But now we can fight. Even if they read us or catch up to us...
We can fight!

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I'm bothered by the very fact that people exist, but you're an exception.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I can, I'd like to bring back what she has lost, what she threw away.

author: Gouenji Shuuya
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Unnecessary thoughts will only interfere with your plays.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: I'm not highly aware. I'm highly self-aware.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works
text: Unfortunately... being a hero is a limited-time thing. When you grow up, it becomes harder to call yourself one. I wish it hadn't taken me so long to realize that.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: I'll keep my promise, I'll save the world.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: Human beings are strong because we have the ability to change ourselves.

author: William Macbeth
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: Death is a privilege of the living. A destiny without reason, continually roving on, evermore. How fleeting a thing it is. One cannot live and forget about death. The despair that is me, forgotten by death, can at least embrace my yearning at twilight, and sleep.

author: Amagiri Ayato
title: Gakusen Toshi Asterisk
text: I wouldn't call myself a saint, but I think I do alright. My mind's about as sharp as the average person. When it comes to an iron will or noble spirit, well... I might have to ask you to turn a blind eye there...

author: Nana Osaki
title: NANA
text: I always thought that life was about standing your ground, no matter how strong the current was. But going with the flow isn't so bad after all. As long as it takes you forward.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: People should be doubted. Many people misunderstand this concept. Doubting people is just a part of getting to know them. What many people call "trust" is really just giving up on trying to understand others, and that very act is far worse than doubting. It is actually "apathy".

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: There are things that we don't want to happen, but have to accept. Things that we don't want to know, but have to learn. And people that we can't live without, but have to let go.

author: Shuntarou Chishiya
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: Do you know the origin of the word "utopia"? The English philosopher, Thomas More, created this word with intense irony in mind. In Greek, it means "A place that does not exist".

author: Mai Taniyama
title: Ghost Hunt
text: Having the love of your life break up with you and say "we can still be friends", is like your dog dying and your mom saying "you can still keep it".

author: Farangis
title: The Heroic Legend of Arslan
text: The throne itself does not half a will of its own. Depending upon who sits in it, it can be the seat of justice or it can be the seat of inhuman cruelty. As long as it is a man and not a god, doing the governing, he can never be perfect. But should he neglect to make efforts to reach for perfection, a king will surely tumble down the slippery slope towards evil with no one around to stop him.

author: Zen Wistalia
title: Akagami no Shirayukihime
text: I don't think it's all that bad to be surrounded by people who don't care much about authority or social status. It's good to know that there are various various ways of thinking.

author: Kai Sudo
title: Tsumi to Batsu: A Falsified Romance
text: Does this world feel like hell to you? Of course it does, because it is. So take it all in, don't even blink, Miroku. There's no place like hell! We made it so. With our lust, and greed. It always comes down to this. Life is desire. It's what we do. When desire meets desire, the stronger survives. The predator will eat the prey. It's dirty, and cruel. But just look around you, there is so much beauty in this truth. And yet you still look away. And you waste all your time alone in your head. Don't deny your desires. Hell is the real paradise. And we, my friend, are in paradise! Don't look away, Miroku!

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2 Ten
text: Oh, please. This world is so entertaining because it doesn't do anyone's bidding!

author: Kyohei Kadota
title: Durarara!!
text: If you want to run from your past, fine. But whatever you do, don't run away from your present or worse, your future.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Maybe there's only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going. Believe that the stars will light your path, even a little bit.

author: Sayuri Kurata
title: Kanon
text: The same melody repeats itself as the song grows richer and more beautiful. Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could live seemingly constant lives while experiencing changes bit by bit?

author: Shirogane
title: Monochrome Factor
text: There's always something one can't explain even if one has experience with it.

author: Takeo Gouda
title: Ore Monogatari!!
text: Why won't human emotions, not even my own, work out the way we want?

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: I'll leave tomorrow's problems to tomorrow's me.

author: Haruka Nanase
title: Free! Eternal Summer
text: A dream? A future? Stop going on about other people's futures when you haven't even decided your own!

author: Rory Mercury
title: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri
text: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.

author: Rachnera Arachnera
title: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou
text: Pretending to get along is just hypocritical. If you don't like me, that's fine. People are free to like and hate what they want.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Don't act because something is interesting, but act because you want to find something more interesting! In this world, there are so much interesting things. Do something that you don't want to do, you don't have even a second for it.

author: Alicia Florence
title: Aria the Animation
text: I'm sure that things that are truly fun can't be compared. Back then, now, and from now on, in the time you spend with others, lots of small fun things are born and disappear. If you are able to capture each of them, you'll never run out of fun things. Forever and ever. And here's one point of advice. Thinking that now is fun is what makes it the most fun.

author: Saitama
title: One Punch Man
text: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.

author: Toriko
title: Toriko
text: In this world, there's no such thing as "failure" in the first place. The one who knows the "ways to win" more than anyone is also the one who's experienced the most "mistakes". In other words... You could say "failure" is equal to "success"... Couldn't you?

author: William Macbeth
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: Me? A liar? That's almost hurtful. I just don't feel like telling the whole truth.

author: Mary Macbeth
title: Kekkai Sensen
text: Everyone dies eventually, whether they have power or not. That's why you need to think about what you'll accomplish while you're alive.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2 Shou
text: Let's say I posed this question to you: “Can all human souls be bought with money or not?” Now remember, the keyword here is “all”. The answer is “There are times when you can buy them, and other times, not,” right? The human being… sometimes he'll uphold his pride and conscience even if he's offered ten billion yen, and other times he'll murder someone over one yen.

author: Umaru Doma
title: Himouto! Umaru-chan
text: You never appreciate the irreplaceable things in life until they're gone. Like summer vacation... or brothers.

author: Karma Akabane
title: Assassination Classroom
text: People with talent often have the wrong impression that things will go as they think.

author: Tachibana Hotaru
title: Aoharu x Kikanjuu
text: I never thought about winning making me cool, or losing making me uncool. But you're right. If anything... Giving up before you even try is kind of uncool. That's why I want to be someone who'll fight as many times as it takes, and never give up. That's got to be way more cooler.

author: Tachibana Hotaru
title: Aoharu x Kikanjuu
text: I may not be able to beat you, even if we play a hundred more games. But if I have a chance of beating you the 101st time, I'll challenge you again and again.

author: Urutori
title: Utawarerumono
text: It's alright to feel sad. When you're sad, you should experience that sorrow fully. It's not too late to move on after that.

author: Eri Ochiai
title: Perfect Blue
text: How do you know that the person you were one second ago, is the same person that you are right now?

author: Peppo
title: Gankutsuou
text: If people could become friends simply by sharing bread and salt, life would be simpler.

author: Furudo Erika
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: ...Without love, it cannot be seen? ...Hah. That's backwards... Because of love, you end up seeing things that don't even exist.

author: Gaap
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Don't deny your dreams, ok? There is no point at all in taking a first step, if your eyes are closed and you don't gaze at the future.

author: Minori Kushieda
title: Toradora!
text: Crying is a nosebleed of the heart.

author: Gajeel Redfox
title: Fairy Tail
text: It's not a sin to fall in love. You can't even arrest someone over that.

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: If I ignore a friend I have the ability to help, wouldn't I be betraying him?

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: Don't just mindlessly judge people as you please.

author: Montana Max
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: There is one thing that makes a human a human... and that is their will.

author: Moral
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: If providing people with what they desire is a sin, then all mothers are sinners, and the world is bereft of love.

author: Murasaki
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: Sometimes, I just think... this world has surpassed its capacity. It's overflowing. Our day-to-day lives are replete with both happiness and misfortune. Yet, because we cannot see the excess from the inside, we still feel unfulfilled. Given that we are capable of acknowledging neither excess nor deprivation, we might as well not exist. In other words... you can't withdraw coins from an ATM. That's common sense.

author: Minori Kushieda
title: Toradora!
text: Even when the sky's so dark you can't see a thing, there are still stars shining out there. So if she can learn to shine brighter, we'll be able to see her.

author: Moral
title: Hamatora: The Animation
