text: If you don't want to be taken from, stop taking.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: I don't give a damn about the real world.

author: Hansode Shiranui
title: Medaka Box
text: It's pointless to force people to do their best if they don't want to.

author: Nana Komatsu
title: NANA
text: No matter how much we think we want - it's never enough. I just want one thing to go right for me. I just need something to give me the energy so I can keep going.

author: Trafalgar Law
title: One Piece
text: You can't see the whole picture until you look at it from the outside.

author: Mei
title: Arashi no Yoru ni
text: Life eventually ends. But that doesn't mean that the fact that we met, or the time we spent together will disappear.

author: Nana Komatsu
title: NANA
text: Why is it that making our dreams come true, and being truly happy are often two separate things?.. I still haven't figured that one out.

author: Furudo Erika
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Without love, people could exist without knowing truth and falsehood. By knowing it, they cry and grief and get lost. I was the same back then.

author: Virgilia
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Real magic is the power to repair, to revive. To call back happiness which has disappeared, to call back love which has gotten cold. And it can call back a forgotten smile to a princess' face.

author: Ushiromiya Kyrie
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: They often say that stupid thoughts are no better than sleeping.

author: Enomoto Takane
title: Kagerou Days
text: When people immerse themselves in their own world and other people around them start doing something, they can't help but feel very lonely.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: No matter how small the problem is, how small the thing is, it always affects the people around you.

author: Kawashima Sapphire
title: Hibike! Euphonium
text: Music speaks to people's hearts, all throughout the world. I believe it's a powerful language.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: There are some people who don't want a solution. Some want things to stay the way they are. There's no way to make things convenient for everyone. So the only option is to find a compromise.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Having people acknowledge your existence is a wonderful thing.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: The opposite of boredom is not pleasure... but excitement. People will gladly seek out any kind of excitement, even pain.

author: Akito Wanijima
title: Air Gear
text: The frog in the well can't communicate with the ocean creatures, as it knows the depth of the sky. It's because the frog lived inside a cramped and small space, so he knows better than anyone, how precious freedom is.

author: Kurapika
title: Hunter x Hunter 2011
text: There are two things that collectors always want. The first is any item of extreme rarity. The second is colleagues to whom they can brag about their collection.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: A person's mentality and feelings aren't always equal. There are times the conclusion you arrive at is completely irrational and the reason is because of that.

author: Yasushi Takagi
title: NANA
text: In the end, people are all alone, and no matter how close they cling together, they can never be one. It's impossible to make someone belong to you.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: A perfect plan doesn't mean having everything go within expectations. A perfect plan is achieved when it has the plasticity needed to flexibly deal with troubles.

author: Fuuko Kurasaki
title: Accel World
text: A scar indicates that something is missing. You lost something important, and there's a hole in your heart. Having that empty hole can lead to anger, hate, despair, or... it can make you reach for the sky.

author: Kuroyukihime
title: Accel World
text: A clever retreat? Throw that to the dogs! Once you've dived into the battlefield, you can only devote yourself to the fight, regardless of your opponent!

author: Sinbad
title: Magi: Adventure of Sinbad
text: It's impossible to share everything. No one can become someone else. It's natural to envy someone who's more wealthy or who has higher standing. That's how conflicts begin. However, being blissfully unaware of this, relying on whatever someone provided without thinking, and only seeing things as "black" or "white" with such overly simplified thinking... Isn't that a sin as well? People need to think for themselves. For this reason, someone "grey", someone between "black" and "white" is essential. I will not gloss over the flaws in my ideals. It's not possible for all of mankind to share the same kind of thoughts. However, everyone is capable of thought. Everyone can learn, share, and decide with their own strength. A world built upon an understanding of that. If this is a "dream", if I don't realize it, who will?

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Your happiness is your own business. Its a promise you make to yourself. It is a reward you give yourself for accomplishing what you set out to do, for achieving what you strive for. But if you fail to reward yourself for what you have accomplished, then you are essentially breaking a promise to yourself. Its like a breach of contract, compensation must always be made. You must pay all of the debts that you made, even to yourself.

author: Hanyuu
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: I'm prepared for anything! Up until now, I have been running away from every fight, afraid of losing. But running away is even worse than losing. Unless one continues to fight, without succumbing to the pain of defeat, it is impossible to achieve victory. That is what people I love taught me.

author: Chiyuki
title: Death Parade
text: I'm sure it's not wrong for people to want to understand each other. And even if it is, I want us to understand each other.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text:
Question: Why can one keep living as a hikikomori?
Answer: Because one's food, clothing and shelter are assured. It's because one is permitted a lukewarm bare minimum of a life that one can keep living as a hikikomori indefinitely. Being able to live as a hikikomori was in itself very much a luxury. Without the assurance of food, clothing and shelter, unless you're prepared to die, there's no other way but to work.

author: Furudo Erika
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: All truth is meaningless. In the end, 'meaning' comes from the mind of each individual human. Even when there is a single truth, it can mean different things to different individuals. The truth has no meaning in itself!

author: Lambdadelta
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: There's only one difference between heroes and mad men. It's whether they win or lose.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: No person can become a replacement for another. Not even the past version of themselves.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Nothing good comes from digging up the past.

author: Fujimoto Shirou
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: You'll never be able to move forward if you're afraid of soiling your hands.

author: Ageha Shiroi
title: Velvet Blue Rose
text: When you love someone, sometimes your head hurts. And it's so agonizing that you want to burst into tears. But even the smallest thing can bring you happiness. It's complicated, but simple. Perhaps all these emotions are irreplaceable and precious.

author: Beatrice
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: You can catch a mouse that's shut in a cage. However, catching a mouse in a field is like trying to catch a cloud.

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun
text: Why not just try hard again? Quit mopping around. Stop lying to yourself and try once more.

author: Akito Takagi
title: Bakuman
text: If I follow my dream and it shatters - I can accept having to regret that. But I don't want to regret not pursuing it in the first place.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Even if you have two of the exact same person, they could change enormously depending on their upbringing.

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: Tell me, what do you think is the ultimate fear? I really thought I'd already reached the darkest of the dark, but then, ahead of me, I beheld a darkness even greater still.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Most non-NEET people in the world don't realize that human nature isn't scalar, but vectorial.

author: Subaru
title: Houkago no Pleiades
text: If there's no eye to see, there's no difference between the darkness and the light.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: If you could calculate feelings, then we'd be in a digital age by now... The remaining answer that you couldn't calculate is what they call the feelings of people.

author: Touma Kikuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Change can only arise from fluctuations, right? That's why going back and forth between confidence and weakness, if you're shifting then you're changing, I think. Like that, little by little, everyone is changing probably.

author: Juuzou Suzuya
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: If an angelic being fell from the sky and tried to live in this world of ours, I think even they would commit many wrongs.

author: Sinbad
title: Magi: Adventure of Sinbad
text: Don't be frightened by the waves. If we read the flow of the waves and accept them, we can overcome it. There's no wave that can't be overcome!!

author: Agito Wanijima
title: Air Gear
text: To reach the top we must crush their dreams and climb atop their shattered hopes. The will to win at any cost, to obliterate the enemy if necessary, without ambition there is no way to move up.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Does the world hate me or something? I've always rejected it in an exceedingly friendly manner.

author: Rika Noyamano
title: Air Gear
text: In truth everyone gets their wings the day they are born, and if one has the courage to spread those wings, then he'll fly for sure

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: Maybe there are copies of me on countless world lines. Maybe all their minds are connected, forming a single "me." That sounds wonderful, don't you think? Being in all times and in all places. A strong love for someone... a strong belief in something... a strong desire to convey something... If all those things go beyond time to create "you"... ...then that would be magnificent. So don't think of it as letting me die. Even if the world line changes, as long as you don't forget me, I'll always be there. ... I'm sure that from now on you're going to suffer. You'll be in a world where no one but you remembers me. You care more about your friends than anything else, so I think it's going to be painful for you. I'm so sorry. But that pain will mean a lot to me. Whenever you're sitting around in the lab, whenever you sip a drink, whenever you walk around town ... it doesn't have to be every time - one time out of a hundred is fine. All I ask is that you remember me ... because I'll be there. I'll always be there.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: Don't understand? Then think more. If you can only think by calculating, then keep doing so until you can't. Think of all the answers you can and destroy them one by one with the process of elimination. Whatever remains is your answer.

author: Itsuki Minami
title: Air Gear
text: Keep flying higher so that others are inspired to fly with you.

author: Erwin Smith
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If you begin to regret, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that's left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Everyone has something they hold dear, something they never want to lose. That's why they pretend. That's why they hide the truth. And that's why they lie.

author: Ginti
title: Death Parade
text: Humans all behave the same way, like idiots. They all forget that someday, they're gonna die, so the moment they come face to face with death, they cling to life.

author: Dante
title: Devil May Cry
text: It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.

author: Yozora Mikazuki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: It makes you sad when someone suddenly just up and disappears without a word. If you're just going to end up hurt in the end, you're better off not forming any bonds at all.

author: Subaru
title: Houkago no Pleiades
text: Even shining stars that seem very close are actually far, far apart, separated by many light years. Perhaps we're like the stars we all gaze upon, shining alone in the empty void of space. Having faith that one day, our light might reach someone.

author: Yūzan Yoshida
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: If you don't hold any regret in your choice, that means you must've made the right decision.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Those bound by superficial rules who do not use their pawns to the utmost are fools.

author: Koala
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: I was trying to take the easy way out by running away from everything. No matter the pain, I will keep living. So when I die, I'll feel I did the best I could.

author: Inferno Cop
title: Inferno Cop
text: People like you will never understand... Although it is true that many humans are stupid, immature, and high school drop outs... But! Humans possess the power of possibilities!

author: Miwa Ichigen
title: K Project
text: The final curtain falls at the very moment a person gives up.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: If you're gonna have great happiness, it requires great effort in exchange, that's called compensation. For the good things in life, there are the bad. For the bad things in life, there are always the good. In order for you to be happy, you must be willing to accept a burden of a equal amount of unhappiness in exchange as your payment. The more you achieve, the greater the demands will be placed upon you in return.

author: Death Parade
title: Death Parade
text: There aren't many things you can believe. That's how human beings work. They only care about themselves, and no one else really matters. They get caught up in their own lackadaisical dialogue, lying their way through life.

author: Shiro
title: Neko no Machi no Ko
text: I wanted to be a cat. I was jealous of them. They're liked by everyone... Even though they don't do anything at all. I just wanted everyone to like me.

author: Moeka Kiryū
title: Steins;Gate
text: People... need to be needed by someone in order to live. If a person isn't needed, they're worthless!

author: Pain
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: Even innocent foolish children will grow up in the face of pain, until their thoughts and beliefs are the same as their doubts.

author: Bakemonogatari
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Oddities are the world itself. They're linked to the world, unlike living beings. Science alone cannot shed light upon them, as there will always be people who'll be afraid of vampires. Although all forms of darkness could be lit up, darkness will never cease to exist.

author: Hollow Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: I'm going to keep getting closer and closer to you. And not just day after day, oh no. It's going to happen much faster than that! See I'm already closer to you than I was a moment ago. And I'll keep getting closer and closer to you, until I swallow you up and then, you'll disappear. Things are not turning out well for you at all, are they? (laughs) See you around.

author: Shinnou
title: Naruto Shippūden: Kizuna
text: People are weak. They have no fangs or claws. All they can do is cry. And yet, how was it that this world came into the possession of humans? That's because...  among all living things... they are... the cruelest!

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: In order to measure a person's worth, you must do more than push them. The real way to test their worth is to give them power. When they gain the freedom to act outside the boundaries of law and ethics, you can sometimes see their souls. When the weak become strong... When good citizens become free to engage in violence... I'm interested to see what is the outcome of that.

author: Kuro Fukase
title: ib: Instant Bullet
text: No matter who you are, some things, once lost, can never be regained.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: School trips are simply a simulation of adult social life. If you ever go on a business trip with your boss, you won't get to choose where to stay or what to eat, but if you compromise, you can still have a modicum of fun. School trips train you to trick yourself into that kinda mindset.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: People in reality spout off all in unison about love and friendship but in fact it's a dirty little world full of lies and desires, isn't it?

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: Getting into trouble is not a bad thing. It's proof that someone is watching you.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Come wa Machigatteiru. Zoku
text: When a girl calls someone a "nice guy", it means she couldn't care less about him.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: People live in order to be satisfied. And they hope to die while still satisfied. So, not knowing how to make yourself become satisfied is very tough.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Always trying to make myself seem strong... So I locked my own heart in a suit of armor.

author: Ushiromiya Kyrie
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: I never like to work based on trust. It takes hard work to build up trust, but only an instant to lose it. There's no less profitable investment.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: There is a history to humans. Humans are shaped by the experience obtained from living as time continued to wind and wind. To be reborn meant being rid of that history; complete annihilation. However, that just wasn't possible in reality. That's why the only thing you could do was to continue living on, bearing the scars on your body and holding the weight of the sins on your back, without wishing for reincarnation.

author: Maes Hughes
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood OAV
text: I will do anything it takes to be the man she loves. I will survive this war. And when I return home, I will swallow every horrible thing I've done here, and I will smile when I'm with her. I swear on my life.

author: Frederica Bernkastel
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: You're nothing but a piece. Your absence wouldn't hinder my progress in this game in the slightest. If you can't think of any other theories in particular, please just go back to the piece tray and gather dust or something. It's painful to even remember useless pieces.

author: Kuro Fukase
title: ib: Instant Bullet
text: Any event is a personal episode, where only those involved comprehend what's happening.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I couldn't confess my feelings for you, so I watched you from afar, being happy with someone else.

author: Ushiromiya Kyrie
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: What if that fruit you've worked so hard to nurture gets pulled off the branch the next morning? You'll regret that you didn't choose to harvest it the previous day instead of complaining. That regret really hurts. It'll make you crawl through hell.

author: Ushiromiya Kyrie
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Love really is like playing with fire. Anyone can play easily and lightheartedly. But when you mess up and get burned, that scar stays with you your whole life.

author: Kougami Shinya
title: Psycho-Pass
text: When something impossible happens, there are only two possibilities. Either your assumptions are wrong, or you have gone crazy.

author: Boa Hancock
title: One Piece
text: Whether I kick a kitten... Tear off your ears... Even slaughter innocent people... The world will never cease to forgive my actions! Why, you ask? That's right, it is because I am... Beautiful!!!

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The only times we're fated to lose are in fictional stories. This is our drama! We decide what the plot will be!

author: Nona
title: Death Parade
text: The truth is, there are no lives that are nothing but pretty.

author: Tamako Love Story
title: Tamako Love Story
text: The present will always be different from the past. That's what makes life good and at the same time sad. That sadness in turn gives our everyday life some flavor. Just like coffee.

author: Tamako Love Story
title: Tamako Love Story
text: Youth is fleeting. Young people can't even wait for a spoonful of sugar to dissolve and bitter regret is proof of that. But by bit, you get a taste for it.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji: Book of Murder
text: Yes, my lord. I devote my entire being to you. Until the day... that lies become truth.

author: Ik-su
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: No matter how foolish or incomprehensible, some love cannot be discarded. You may try to stop your heart, unable to forgive yourself, but there will be times when you lose hope and your heart is moved again.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji: Book of Circus
text: Unlike demons, you're base, you harbor a complicated malice, you lie… You struggle desperately, knocking down others in your way… You steal and are stolen from, you make endless excuses… And still you strive to get over the hill and far away. I suppose that's why humans are so interesting.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji: Book of Circus
text: Don't cry; it's pathetic. Crying won't change anything. The world is never kind to anyone.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji: Book of Circus
text: Words are cheap. There's no guarantee she won't tell anyone. Humans lie without a second thought. Including me, of course.

author: Rakka
title: Haibane Renmei
text: Somewhere, that's not here, in a place I can't remember, I was obsessed with the idea that I was all alone. I thought that nobody would care, or even miss me if I vanished from the face of the Earth. I wanted to disappear. Then I had a dream about falling from the sky. I just remember that the bird was in the dream with me, and that the bird was someone in the form of a bird, trying to call me back. I now know that I was never alone.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: A lump of steel, like a shooting star. Just seeing the same sky as you makes familiar scenery look different. I swing between hope and despair at your slightest gesture, and my heart starts to play a melody. What kind of feeling is this again? What do they call this kind of feeling? I think it's probably... Called Love. I'm sure this is what they call love.

author: Ichinose Kotomi
title: CLANNAD
text: Those who seek out the truth must not be arrogant. You must not laugh at miracles just because they cannot be explained scientifically. You must not turn away from the beauty of this world.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Isn't it funny how the most unforgettable scenes can be so trivial ?

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Everyone will always question your ideals. That's simply reality.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Hold on. Don't go! Let's argue again. I'll bribe you with a canelé. I'll call you to kill time. I don't mind being Friend A. Please don't go. Please don't go. Please don't go...please don't leave me behind.

author: Inaho Kaizuka
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: Giving in to despair is a foolish choice.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
text: Do you value your life? Do you think that your family and friends are important to you? If they are, then you should never think of changing yourself. Otherwise, you will lose everything that is precious to you.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I just long for a world in which ordinary things are done in an ordinary way.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: If you keep bad-mouthing someone, you might feel like as if you are on a higher position than that person. But in actual fact, its completely wrong to do that!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Just because someone is important to you, it doesn't necessarily mean that, that person is good. Even if you knew that person was evil... People cannot win against their loneliness.

author: Ittetsu Takeda
title: Haikyuu!!
text: When 'colors' mix, they become muddy and messy. But when they all blend together, the final result is the color that wins against all others... Black.

author: Shinichi Izumi
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: In the end, I couldn't see things from the parasites' perspective, never mind from Migi's. Of course not. It wasn't possible from the beginning. As two different species, we may at times take advantage of each other and kill each other, but it's impossible to understand each other. Actually, you shouldn't even think that you've figured out another species based on your standards. I think it's human arrogance to think we understand how other life forms feel. There may be no other life forms that are truly a "friend" to man. Still, even if we can't comprehend them, they are, without a doubt, neighbors deserving of our respect. We protect other species because humans themselves are lonely creatures. We protect the environment because humans themselves don't want to go extinct. What drives us is simply self-gratification. But I think that's fine, and that it's really all there is to it. There's no point in despising humans by human standards. That's right. So in the end, it's hypocritical for us to love Earth without loving ourselves.

author: Makoto Hijikata
title: Psychic Detective Yakumo
text: Even if it doesn't pay off or you're laughed at, go down the path that you believe is right.

author: Isshin Saitō
title: Psychic Detective Yakumo
text: All humans are loved by another and build up emotions with them. That's nature's providence. There's no way around it. And it's pointless to question it. A bug with wings has no idea why, but it can't help but want to fly. When two people can't help but seek one another out, I think, in essence, it's exactly the same scenario.

author: Yakumo Saitō
title: Psychic Detective Yakumo
text: Every human has another personality that they keep hidden from others.

author: Tatsumi
title: Death Parade
text: In order to accomplish anything, sacrifices must be made.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: No idiot would want to be friends with an unmoving, unspeaking telephone pole. However, unmoving and unspeaking is exactly what you'd want from a telephone pole.

author: Moritaka Mashiro
title: Bakuman
text: Those who don't give up no matter how many walls they run into, those are the ones who'll make their dreams come true.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball Z
text: *To Android 19* Just as I thought... you're nothing. Silly robot, you really think you have a chance against a super saiyan like me? Your brain must be malfunctioning. Fresh out of the factory with no warranty and already broken. What a pity.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I led me by the hand, as if to fill the niches in the memories in my oozing brain fluid. Without even a destination, we kept walking. Disgusting clouds were floating in the sky. I already know what will happen to me the next time I wake up.

author: Tokyo Ghoul
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: The bird fights it's way out of the egg. The egg is the world. Who would be born, must first destroy a world.

author: Moritaka Mashiro
title: Bakuman
text: Manga that's born from people taking responsibility for their own work, banging their head in frustration, feeling cornered, and like they want to escape, and then using that extreme situation, mental ability, stamina, and panic to create... would never lose to some soul-less manga that's just made up of other people's ideas without any kind of resolve!

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Skipping school for one day might not be a problem, but if you skip for three days in a row, it'd be really hard to convince yourself to go back.

author: The Author
title: Kino No Tabi
text: Classification of fantasy and reality is itself a fantasy that humans created... Life begins when you make a distinction between yourself and others. From that moment on, the world becomes a stage for the story in which you are the main character. All humans live in a fantasy in which they are the main character. But the world doesn't recognize you as the main character at all. What nonsense. Everyone lives their entire life tormented by this confusion. There's only one way out of this hell. To place yourself in a position that is neither the main character nor a supporting role. In other words, the author.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Happiness depends on each person. If you think you're happy, then you must be happy.

author: Inspector Lunge
title: Monster
text: Even a child that receives one bit of praise has the ability to excel in a single talent, and those who receive regular encouragement can feel confidence, achieve success, and become leading members of society. Because they don't believe they are worthless, they don't need to raise a fist and have vengeance against fate or the world at large…

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Curiosity is like a cockroach. It likes to stumble upon secrets that are supposed to stay hidden.

author: Kuro Fukase
title: ib: Instant Bullet
text: Let go of me. It'll all be in vain anyway. No matter how gently you hold onto me. No matter what kind of expression you look at me with. In the end, you guys are... only my imagination. I have a slight addiction to fantasy. I sometimes mix the reality that I don't want to face with warm illusions. That's why I can think of "that" as one of those moments.

author: Labrador
title: 07 Ghost
text: True happiness comes from overcoming suffering. No one can shoulder your burdens for you.

author: Minato Arisato
title: Persona 3 The Movie #1 Spring of Birth
text: Is dying that scary to you?

author: Zarik Kajiwara
title: Rakuen Tsuihō - Expelled from Paradise
text: The first one to panic is the first one to lose. No matter if they're the hunter or the hunted.

author: Dong Taebin
title: Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything
text: Just because you look a little better, everyone comes running at you screaming and pretending to be friendly... Just because you look a little worse, everyone ignores you and uses you as a plaything or a slave... Isn't life so unfair?

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text: I... don't know why I'm alive. I have no reason to live. I have no interest in others. Living without concern for others... That's the way to live. Working a job that earns me just enough to eat... A life like that was enough...

author: Dongtae
title: Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything
text: The world is very boring. Everyone tries to live like a normal person without a second thought.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Maybe... just maybe, the light can reach even the bottom of a dark ocean.

author: Jae-ha
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: If you simply obey orders without question to protect your master, that isn't your greatest wish, but your greatest tragedy.

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text: My life after losing her... Is it over as well? The days I spent satisfied with the happiness I never noticed... Those times had passed away. For me... There's nothing left at all.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: You're you. "To be like you..." - it's not so ambiguous as that. No matter what you do, no matter how you change, it doesn't mean a thing. you're just you, no matter what.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Sure I'm okay. Because that's how I was built, after all.

author: Frontier Setter
title: Rakuen Tsuihō - Expelled from Paradise
text: When receiving an illogical favor from others, one should do the same to return the illogical favor.

author: Zack Fair
title: Final Fantasy VII: Crisis Core
text: Embrace your dreams...and whatever happens, protect your honor...AS SOLDIER!

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text: Watching TV or playing games alone is more fun. Playing along with your friends' hobbies... Laughing at their jokes when they're not funny... All that does is tire me out.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: Whenever people see birds flying through the sky, it's said that they get the urge to go on a journey.

author: Tobio Kageyama
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Being the best decoy ever is as cool as being the ace.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: The reason we hurt others is because we don't understand their pain.

author: Hollow Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: You can't spell "slaughter" without "laughter."

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: The year may end, but some things never do. You may not see them with your eyes, but when you look with your heart, you can.

author: Teddie
title: Persona 4
text: The truth is unattainable. It will always be shrouded in fog. Though you reach the murk and the gloom to grasp something, you have no means to know it is the truth. In which case, why...? What sense is there in yearning for the truth? Close your eyes. Lie to yourself. Live in blissful ignorance... it is a much smarter way to exist.

author: Saeko Busujima
title: Highschool Of The Dead
text: Protecting a man's pride… is a woman's duty.

author: Decim
title: Death Parade
text: I say... that people do not live just so that they can someday die. It is because they are alive that they someday die. There is no point to living. The same goes for judgment. Judgment must be performed hand in hand with both life and death. It is something that must be performed hand in hand with humans.

author: Irimi Kaya
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I know I haven't always made the right decisions up to now... Whether I was right, or whether I was wrong, may not even matter in the first place. However, running up against my sins like this-- all of the choices I've made up to this point-- today, being able to die for someone-- is something I'm glad for...

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: So ephemeral and weak. But its shining with all its might. Thump, Thump, like a heartbeat. This is the light of life.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: After the first note resonated through the hall, You became everything I yearn for.

author: Hisoka
title: Hunter x Hunter 2011
text: Love and hate are two sides of the same coin.

author: Haruna Nagashima
title: Highschool Debut
text: Of course I'm insecure. Of course I'm lonely. Of course I wanna see him. And of course being so far apart sucks, but the thing is, nobody else could ever take his place. So it doesn't matter if I don't want a long-distance relationship. I don't have a choice, but I have to do it. I love him.

author: Gasai Yuno
title: Mirai Nikki
text: I'm selfish, I know. But to keep you only mine, I will do everything I needed to do, even if it's illegal.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Even the most ignorant, innocent child will eventually grow up as they learn what true pain is. It affects what they say, what they think… and they become real people.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.

author: Hotaru Takegawa
title: Hotarubi no Mori e
text: Time might separate us some day. But, even still, until then, let's stay together.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar.

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Kindness can sometime translate to hostility.

author: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
title: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
text: I don't want to die, either. But I'm an aristocrat. It's an honor to die for one's people. You make fun of it, but is it that insignificant to die for everyone else?

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: One ought to experience loneliness at least once or twice in life. No, you have to experience it. The idea of being chained to another person without reprieve is far more abnormal and disquieting. One has no choice but to learn about loneliness. I'm sure some things can't be experienced without it.

author: Saito Hiraga
title: Zero no Tsukaima: Princess no Rondo
text: It's only natural for a man to protect the girl he likes.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: If there are things you learn with friends, there must also be things you learn without friends. They must be of equal worth, two sides of the same coin.

author: Yukari Yukino
title: The Garden of Words
text: A faint clap of thunder, clouded skies; perhaps rain comes. If so, will you stay here with me?

author: Junko Enoshima
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Despair is contagious. Everyone catches it.

author: Chiyuki
title: Death Parade
text: Everyone lives with the sins they've committed.

author: Ushiromiya Battler
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: The longer the days go by without them, the worse the sadness from losing someone gets...

author: Mikhail Petrov
title: Monster
text: What is education? Isn't education meant to create a person that conforms to society? What kind of education must be administrated to create a human being that meets the society's demands? Education is an experiment.

author: Minagi Tohno
title: Air
text: Is there any purpose to wings that can't fly?

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: There is nothing less amusing than destroying those who have no will to live.

author: Daichi Sawamura
title: Haikyuu!!
text: We'll never win if we don't believe we can.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Such a cruel boy. Telling me to dream one more time. I thought I was satisfied because my dream had come true... And I'd told myself it was enough... Yet here you are, watering this withered heart again.

author: Riza Hawkeye
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.

author: Wolfgang Grimmer
title: Monster
text: It's impossible for humans to forget their emotions.

author: Masumi Seki
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: With such nice weather, I start thinking about useless things much more than usual. Humans are free. Although we can't fly through the skies all alone, if we can think it, we can do almost anything. We can sleep when we're sleepy. We are free to start or stop anything whenever we wish. Of course, it is a bit hindered by common sense, moralities, and the rules of society. Walking nude out in the streets, stealing from the elderly, and even killing, we can do all of this as long as we throw out our morals. Which is why they drill these laws in our head when we are children. And yet, people still continue to fight, deceive, and steal from each other. And so, people suffer because they live. Even now, there are events of happiness and unhappiness going on all over the world. …What can we do to make everyone happy? Of course that's impossible for me to know. If the answer to that could be found in the shallow wisdoms of a kid, wars would have stopped long ago. But I also dislike just leaving that problem up to society or the government. After all, a great person is just one who follows the popular will of the people. In this world, the essence of a frank honest human is just an idealization. I'm sure that there's nothing that can make everyone happy. Happiness is relative, and that's how people want it. Evil is also relative. Mothers can become demons when they do anything to protect their child. Yet it's usually seen as admirable. But when a person does anything for the country he loves, wars break out. Isn't it all the same thing? No matter how much a person pretends to be good and kind, he will still have negative aspects. But nobody really tries to notice that fact. Why is that? They all try to place the blame on others, and never even consider the possibility that they themselves may have played part in the problem. Just what the heck am I thinking? The world isn't going to change no matter what I think. Then what should I be doing? I don't really want to do anything. I don't want to order nor trouble anyone. That's just laziness, I guess. I don't go to school nor do I work and I've been wasting my time away since noon. Look at me, talking about the freedom of humans when I'm just some suspicious punk in this town. In conclusion, I have nothing.

author: Lucy
title: Elfen Lied
text: All this time, I've lived in hope of telling you how sorry I am, I've fought armies, just to have this chance, but now, there's nothing I can say.. That's good enough.

author: Rentaro Satomi
title: Black Bullet
text: Just what is right and what is wrong...? To begin with, just who is the enemy I must defeat?

author: Yotsugi Ononoki
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: To ask is a moment's shame. Not to, lifelong.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: If you lose something, just build it again. And this time, with a greater care.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: The piano is meant to be played like you're embracing it, right?

author: Yotsugi Ononoki
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: But still... Not trying to undo misunderstandings is the same as telling a lie.

author: Rea Sanka
title: Sankarea
text: If my own happiness will lead the misfortune of others then being unhappy is probably the wisest choice.

author: Hiroko Seto
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: We're all connected. Just like the notes are intermittently connected. It's shared by us all. Through music, with the people you know, with the people you don't know, with all the people in this world.

author: Boogiepop
title: Boogiepop Phantom
text: Human nature denies the past in order to justify the present. But do you believe there is anything in the present worth justifying?

author: Tatsumi
title: Death Parade
text: It's only obvious that the world is a cruel place. If you can't change the world, then you have to change yourself!

author: Kou Mabuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Sometimes your biggest effort will be ignored, but your smallest mistake will be judged.

author: Claire Stanfield
title: Baccano!
text: There's no such thing as a limit on being the best. You can always go for more. That's what it means to be human. No... That's what it means to be me.

author: Chiyuki
title: Death Parade
text: It's not just grief. There are as many emotions as there are people. The fragility of someone who lets their anger get the best of them... The strength to overcome fear because of love... You can't comprehend anything about them.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: Keep on living your life in such a way that love doesn't fade away. I shall work... so that love may shine brightly, even today.

author: Ushiromiya George
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: You need three types of power to control the world. One is influence. One is wealth. The third is... force.

author: Cosette Sara
title: Excel Saga
text: Things learned as a child stay with you forever.

author: Ushiromiya Battler
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Victory isn't something you are given. It is something you take.

author: Touka Kirishima
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: There's no way someone who can't even protect himself can protect anyone else, is there?

author: Nona
title: Death Parade
text: Do you know what the most primitive emotion people have is? It's fear.

author: Chiyuki
title: Death Parade
text: People aren't as complex as you think they are. They're simple, and they get sad or angry over simple things. That's how they are. They're quickly affected by the littlest things, and live without knowing where they're going to fall down. That's who people are!

author: Oomine Daiya
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Only someone that's prepared to devote oneself to others' happiness, without caring about his own, is allowed to become a king.

author: Ronove
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: They say the temperature of tea and a women's heart are difficult in any age.

author: Death Parade
title: Death Parade
text: Country of birth, time period, parents, location... various factors make people's lives unequal from the very beginning.

author: Ushiromiya George
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Fortitude is about staying cool and calmly analyzing your opponent. Do you know why? It's to counter, to give back exactly what you got, to make them not want to take another pass at you, to make them cover their face in tears and snot and forget to wash it off, to make them want to rub their forehead on the ground and apologize over and over, to completely, perfectly, thoroughly beat them until they can't get up!

author: Ushiromiya Jessica
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: No matter how hard someone's heart is, if you keep on talking to them, little by little, it'll eventually start to crack! I believe it! I believe that useless effort doesn't exist in this world!

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I was wrong. I wasn't eating ghouls. I'm the one who was being eaten.

author: Ushiromiya Kyrie
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: When people have an overwhelming advantage, they sometimes take on a little risk to try and show off their superiority over the losers.

author: Ushiromiya Battler
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: In the limited time we have between our births and our deaths, we live life with everything we've got.

author: Ushiromiya Jessica
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Doesn't even think about giving up just because it's useless! The moment you give up is when your life ends.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: People tend to push the pain they're burdened with onto other people.

author: Inspector Lunge
title: Monster
text: If you don't want to be betrayed anymore, then start by doubting the person you want to doubt the least.

author: Chihiro Shindou
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: I want to break up while I can still say I love you.

author: Éclair Farron
title: Final Fantasy XIII
text: Fighting without hope is no way to live. It's just a way to die.

author: Shio Sakaki
title: KenIchi the Mightiest Disciple
text: The moment between life and death is where a true man shows his color.

author: Natsu Tanimoto
title: KenIchi the Mightiest Disciple
text: Justice? Truth? More than anything else existing in this world, those things are a burden! The things that are needed are "acting" to deceive people and "power" to control others.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Human relationships are chemical reactions. If you have a reaction then you can never return back to your previous state of being.

author: Asaba Yuki
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: I don't intentionally ignore anyone. Their words simply don't resonate with me.

author: Decim
title: Death Parade
text: Life is never fair. I'm sure you're well aware of that.

author: Monokuma
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Disrupt law and order, and you get punished for it. Isn't that how society works?

author: Shinichi Izumi
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: When you feel your life's on the line, your true nature surfaces.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I have long forgotten how to laugh as if I were having fun.

author: Shuntarou Chishiya
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: No matter what you do, it's all futile in this world.

author: Princess Zelda
title: The Legend Of Zelda
text: Shadow and light are two sides of the same coin... One cannot exist without another.

author: Cloud Strife
title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
text: Anyone may claim that he will act in the direst times, yet only a brave man acts in times great and small.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Those who know despair, once knew hope. Those who know loss, once knew love.

author: Ushiromiya Battler
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Well, who you love depends on the person. Isn't everything fine as long as it's someone who's fun to be with? Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with incomplete feelings.

author: Ushiromiya Ange
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Criticism of yourself as you're observed by others doesn't matter. If your existence is firmly acknowledged by you yourself, that's enough. If you can live with confidence in yourself, surely you can accept any kind of lifestyle.

author: Ushiromiya Maria
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Truth can change its form depending on the observer.

author: Fuyumi Irisu
title: Hyouka
text: Those with talent who aren't aware of themselves cause pain for those who have none.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: You have to fool your own people before you try to bluff the enemy.

author: Asou Renji
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: Human beings are cruel. Even though it's heartbreaking, I feel hungry. Even though it's painful, I feel sleepy. And, even though it's painful for me, I still eat and sleep peacefully. I can't forgive myself, and hence it becomes even more painful.

author: Claude
title: Nisekoi
text: To us, you are more valuable than any jewel. Would you be at ease if you left your most treasured valuable outside the bounds of your own home? A treasure is something you keep with you at all times. It is common sense.

author: Hikawa Renko
title: Psycho Love Comedy
text: Don't start thinking of killing just when the slightest thing doesn't go your way! How selfish are you!?

author: Crow
title: Sugar Dark
text: Now it's not just your heart, but also your breathing, your brain, your nervous system, and everything else… See, the human body is in some way always moving from the time they were in their mother's womb until the last moments of their life. Even when someone is asleep, fainted, or unconscious, their body never stops. In other words, the concept of stopping is precisely how humans are able to perceive death.

author: Shouta Kazehaya
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: If you're at a loss for words, you don't have to force yourself. That in itself is a form of comfort.

author: Squall Leonhart
title: Final Fantasy VIII
text: Right and wrong are not what separate us and our enemies, it's our perspectives that separate us. Both sides blame one another. There's no good or bad side, just two sides holding different views.

author: Tifa Lockhart
title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
text: Words aren't the only thing that tell people what you're thinking.

author: Vivi Ornitier
title: Final Fantasy IX
text: How do you prove that you exist...? Maybe we don't exist.

author: Squall Leonhart
title: Final Fantasy VIII
text: Why do people depend on each other? In the end you're on your own.

author: Éclair Farron
title: Final Fantasy XIII
text: It's not a question of can or can't. There are some things in life you just do.

author: Oerba Dia Vanille
title: Final Fantasy XIII
text: Maybe we'd fall short. Maybe we'd never even come close. But someone, someday would know we've tried.

author: Aries M
title: Freedom Wars
text: Regret... It's a heavy burden. You can't help wondering if maybe you chose the wrong path. Because once you've chosen, you can't change your mind.

author: Noctis Lucis Caelum
title: Final Fantasy XV
text: Fools set the rules in this world. Just take a look around. It's undeniable.

author: Helbram
title: Nanatsu no Taizai
text: It's troublesome if the villain doesn't show their evil. Villains are necessary to make knights into heroes.

author: Joutarou Kawasumi
title: Inu X Boku SS
text: People become themselves through their encounters. With different things, people, and emotions.

author: Rabat
title: Vandread
text: Compared to one million proverbs, just one word from your heart can prove victorious!

author: Suiboku Kuroki
title: R-15
text: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration! In other words, believe in your inspiration and fight to the end! Perspiration without inspiration is worthless! No matter what others say ignore them! Trust your talent! Follow your own path!

author: Root
title: Tales from Earthsea
text: In ages past, dragons and men were one. Those who lusted after wealth chose the land and the sea and became men. Those who cherished freedom, became dragons and chose wind and fire.

author: Gasback
title: Trigun: Badlands Rumble
text: Instead of picking fruit when it's green, you should wait, wait, and wait until it ripens. When they reach their peak, you pick them off! Even though the action itself is the same, they taste totally different.

author: Anastasia
title: Brave 10
text: Do you think you're the main character of some kind of sob story? You don't want to see people get hurt, so you cover your eyes and ears. Using your grief to hide the suffering is the easiest path to take. But I won't forgive you if you do. You're a Brave aren't you? Do you intend to live as someone who's always protected by others!? Fight! What will you solve by running away? The ability to keep going forward is strength as well! Physical strength is not all there is to it!

author: Agatsuma Soubi
title: Loveless
text: I hate butterflies. I hate them for being pretty. I hate them for being easy to catch. And having pins stuck through their body and being turned into specimens is what I hate most.

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The only lucky item you'll need is already within - CONFIDENCE.

author: Kanako Sakurai
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: I believe being an author is a lonely line of work that asks you to pass through a narrow gate alone.

author: Nobita Nobi
title: Doraemon
text: You'll stumble many times in the future, but when you do, each time you'll have more strength to bounce back.

author: Shinguji Sakura
title: Sakura Taisen
text: Destiny is what you create with your own will.

author: Silver Knight
title: .hack//GIFT
text: Those who stand above others, must have noble ideals along with the most noble intentions. Anyone that cannot manage the will of the masses is not fit to serve as the leader. You say you're punishing someone for standing up to you? That kind of justice is a lie.

author: Kirie Kanoe
title: Dusk maiden of Amnesia
text: Saying that people's personalities are products of their pasts isn't totally wrong. The way people live depends on their experiences.

author: Major
title: Major
text: At first, people only play as dots. But when lines of trust and friendship connect those dots, the lines become a circle and that circle is teamwork. As long as you keep playing as a dot, the others won't trust you either.

author: Shinichi Izumi
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: You shouldn't mouth off when you don't know shit.

author: Basara Tōjō
title: Shinmai Maou no Testament
text: There are some scars that never fade.

author: Shinichi Izumi
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: If talking won't resolve matters, maybe inflicting some pain will.

author: Jing
title: Jing: King of Bandits
text: Shining brightly even for a split second is better than living a dull-grey life for eternity.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: People have many different ways of thinking. Even if you make a mistake, if you realize it was a mistake, You can always fix it. Then if you turn around, you will see the future. This must be realized by oneself.

author: Yuyuka Nekota
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: At times like these, you shouldn't depend on people's advice, but think about it thoroughly by yourself and make a decision. Because there's no right answer when it comes to love. Whatever your answer is, if it's your own choice, then it's right.

author: Satsuki Shishio
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Don't judge me if you don't stand in my position.

author: Chihayafuru 2
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: Charm is reserved for dealing with people with more power than you.

author: Elizabeth Midford
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Weak in order to love, strong in order to protect, both in order to stay at your side.

author: Rei Ryugazaki
title: Free! Eternal Summer
text: Being free can mean many different things, but I think it's truest meaning is having a free heart that can't be bound by anything. So no matter what choice you make, as long as you remain who you are, you will forever be free.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.

author: Hiroko Seto
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: It's not just allies who support each other. From your enemies, you learn so much and gain so much. Until the day you meet again... Just knowing they exist helps you to withstand the loneliness. Those who compete, even if they're enemies, help each other out.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: We are searching for a place where we can live our lives in peaceful days. No wars, no stealing; a place that isn't run by fear; a place where people can live, and actually trust other human beings.

author: Rem Saverem
title: Trigun
text: If you keep your vision clear you will see the future. What happens in our future is our own responsibility.

author: Sora
title: Kingdom Hearts
text: Although my heart may be weak, it's not alone. It's grom with each new experience. And it's found a home with all the friends I've made. I've become a part of their heart, just as they've become part of mine. And if they think of me now and then, if they don't forget me, then our hearts will be one. I don't need a weapon. My friends are my power!

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Facing irrationality doesn't mean not feeling fear, but rather possessing eyes that gaze upon fear and standing against the world.

author: Daiki Mamura
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: How will you live if every little thing from your memories always hurts you easily?

author: Yuyuka Nekota
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: "My heart controls the world." But who can I control if I'm the only one living in this world?

author: Odette Bouquet
title: Noir
text: To be sure, love can kill, but always remember, hate can never save. Never!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Fear. That is what we live with. And we live it everyday. Only in death are we free of it.

author: Daiki Mamura
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: The most annoying thing is that I can't do anything for you, even though you're crying.

author: Haqua du Lot Herminium
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Human hearts are complicated mysteries.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Books are information. And information that isn't correct is worthless.

author: Mizufa Trudy
title: Log Horizon
text: The strong use their strength as their weapon. The weak use their weakness as their weapon.

author: Griffith
title: Berserk
text: I feel no responsibility to comrades who've lost lives under my command. Because they chose to fight in each battle.. Just as I chose this. But if there is something that... I can do for them. Something I can do for the dead... Then it is to win! I must keep winning to attain my dream. The same one they clung to, and risked their lives for!! To realize my dream, I will perch on top of their corpses.. It is a blood-smeared dream, after all. I don't regret or feel guilty about it.. But to risk thousands of lives while never getting myself dirty. It's not a dream that can be so easily realized!

author: Yuyuka Nekota
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Thinking about whether it's because of jealousy or just saying it out loud by accident, aren't they all part of love? Love isn't always sweet.

author: Hidehiro Harada
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: Luck of the draw isn't about luck. Luck doesn't decide a match!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.

author: Shimura Tae
title: Gintama
text: Some lies are necessary for giving children dreams.

author: Gowther
title: Nanatsu no Taizai
text: What I desire is a heart... A heart that understands emotions.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: I refuse to stand by and watch you give up. I won't lose you, I can't. We'll walk away from this battle together.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Neither one nor the other, not a demon, but not a human either, no place no belong… I thought the only way was to carve out your own place, by force; that's how I survived. And by the time I knew what was happening, I was all alone…

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: I know the loneliness of being a prisoner. I know the joy you feel when your friends come to rescue you and the fear of them being injured and defeated.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I do not allow anyone acting against me to look down upon me.

author: Elizabeth Midford
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Poetry over philosophy. Embroidery rather than cooking. Dance instead of chess. Be an unknowing angel. Every girl born in the country of roses is raised by these three words.

author: Yuyuka Nekota
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: I'm the one who selfishly decides who's my friend and who's not.

author: Aoyagi Ritsuka
title: Loveless
text: People who use others are stupid, but people who are used are even more stupid.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Have faith in your inspiration. Feel the imagination!

author: Yuusei Nishida
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: You can't stop fighting to play. Once you've lost that drive, you'll start to lose your edge.

author: Hidehiro Harada
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: That's something you can't know until you've tried it, and you still won't understand after you play. I've been playing for 45 years and I still don't understand. I've never been able to figure it out. That's why I keep playing.

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: Clouds... come here. Drops... fall here. Drive out the flames... tell him... that despite all of this... the world is still beautiful.

author: Kanade Ōe
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: It's not difficult to compose poetry. You just have to translate your feelings into meter.

author: Anna Kyouyama
title: Shaman King
text: Humans only can reveal their true potential during an absolutely critical situation.

author: Yuuri Makita
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Different people have different perspective. So, I won't deny the fact that some people are annoyed with the way I am. In exchange for those negative feelings, I just want to be the person that I am in love with the most.

author: Zeref
title: Fairy Tail TV 2/2014
text: Over the course of several hundred years, I've seen many ages end, conflict between people, hatred, wicked hearts. I always have hope that the new age will purify all of that. How many times has it happened? People repeat themselves. They commit the same mistakes, over and over.... They haven't survived, not in true sense. The precious race called people has become extinct.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Girls are more fragile than you think. They can be hurt by the smallest things.

author: Ritsu Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm a complete failure. At everything I do, I'm absolutely worthless. I know this, and yet I continue to burden the human race with my presence. Every day I rob the world of valuable air by breathing. I'm a thief, and I hate myself for it. I don't deserve to exist. But even though I know it's the right thing to do, I'm such a useless coward. I don't even have the courage to jump!

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: I'm not afraid of the times I can't see him. When I feel pain in my chest, my song grows... The scenery feels closer. The next time I see you... I will, once again, fall in love.

author: Tomoe
title: Kamisama Hajimemashita
text: Watching messy troubles from the sidelines is a hobby of mine.

author: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: The fun things, the painful things, the things that happened, the things we've cried about, the things we've smiled about, when we remember them, everything will be glittering.

author: Ryuuguu Rena
title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
text: Even if you lovingly collect every last piece of a shattered cup, pieces are still pieces. Once something breaks, it can never return.

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: What you learn at your school is more important than where you go to school.

author: Sora
title: Kingdom Hearts
text: It doesn't matter how much we see each other, but how much we think of each other.

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: If you run now, you will be running for the rest of your life.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Then just become stronger. I have my ambition, you have your ambition too. Which means you should just keep walking forward towards that goal.

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You won't know if you don't give it a try.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: We have walked through the darkness of this world, that's why we are able to see even a sliver of light.

author: Bianchi
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: If you can no longer believe in the person you love, then test him until you are satisfied.

author: Yatori
title: Kamisama Hajimemashita
text: They say that ill weeds grow apace, but... You know, the nice ones don't live long.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Whether I go or not, I'll die anyway. I have an organ more important than my heart. Although you can't see it, I feel it going through my head down to my feet, and I know it exists within me. It lets me stand on my feet, it lets me walk forward without trembling. If I stop here, I feel like it would break... My soul will break.

author: Atsushi Murasakibara
title: Kuroko's Basketball
text: All these things you guys seek....hard work, guts, faith....I'll crush them all.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: I was too bent on fulfilling my objectives… I failed to see things from a larger perspective. I failed to build up a good relationship with them.

author: Arima Teppei
title: Princess Lover!
text: The more material you possess, the harder you'll feel the loss.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: There is no telling what kind of pain will come  after me, but... if I stop believing because of that, if the hero should change, it'll turn into another story from the one my master left behind. Then it wont be Naruto! I can't write novels like my master did. That's why the sequel has to come from the life I live no matter how great the pain, I'll continue walking because that's who Naruto is!

author: Lain Iwakura
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: People only have substance within the memories of other people. And that's why there were all kinds of mes. There weren't a lot of mes per se, I was just inside all sorts of people, that's all.

author: Gi-gan
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Sometimes we women must fight too, don't underestimate us!

author: Tsumugi Motohashi
title: Pochama ni
text: When I was little, I was teased because of my weight. I tried dieting, but diets always failed. Little by little I started feeling gloomy. I got to the point where I couldn't make friends, and I started hating myself more and more. I became completely unable to smile. I thought, no one in the world would ever like me the way I am now. But at the same time I also thought, if that's the way it is, then I should at least like myself.

author: Kenzo Tenma
title: Monster
text: I was only able to get back to being a real doctor by saving your life! I realized that human lives have equal value by saving you! Nobody has the right to take another's life! I've been living as a doctor with that engraved upon my heart for years!

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: No one really starts out kind. All we know how to do at first is want. We want food, we want attention... It's just natural survival instinct, I guess... But kindness is something that we all have to learn as we go. It's something that grows and develops slowly over time... The same way our bodies do...

author: Sumire Hanano
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: Humans have always spent a lot of time on love. I'm not too interested in karuta, but I'm willing to work hard for love.

author: Inaho Kaizuka
title: Aldnoah.Zero 2nd Season
text: Right, It's too late for doubts now. There is no returning from this place I've come to.

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: The rain, the wind, the sun... you bring them all with you. Every time our eyes meet. You bring the world to me.

author: Katsura Kotarou
title: Gintama
text: If you have faith, your dreams will surely come true.

author: Yuyuka Nekota
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: You wouldn't get an answer no matter how much you think about it. Love is not Japanese nor Math. It doesn't need thoughts of reasons. You will be aware of it when that person is next to you.

author: Chapel the Evergreen
title: Trigun
text: Life is an incessant series of problems... all difficult, with brutally limited choices... and a time limit.

author: Tamura Reiko
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: I've been thinking... for a long while. For what purpose was I born into this world? Whenever I resolved one question, another would arise in its place. I sought the beginning. I sought the end. I've just been walking and walking, thinking all the while. Perhaps nothing will change, no matter how far I go. If I'm to stop my journey, that is fine, too. Even if I were informed that everything has reached its end, I'd just accept it. But even so, I found an answer to yet another of my questions today.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: If you lose something big, that nothing can replace it... Then it's okay if you have more than one, right? Even if the number is small, whether it's 10 or 100, if you gather them up then you will have a reason to go on!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Even if you're a main character, you can still die... I better be careful-ttebayo.

author: Shuuko Murao
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: The feeling of not wanting to lose, everyone has it. If you find it unfair, you'll have to work harder yourself.

author: Sonozaki Mion
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: No one can say they grew up in a sterile room, never failing or making mistakes. Life is an ongoing process of trial and error.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: I've no interest in a "Reality".

author: Daiki Mamura
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Even if I'm an outsider, even if I'm hers for only a moment, I wanted to become someone special to her. Just by being together with me, just for a little while, I wanted her to be happy.

author: Kou Mabuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: We can no longer go back though, I'm totally different from that person in the past, you too. That was just a brief reminiscing of our past, that's all.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: The "tsun" personality is an armor that protects purity. An iron virgin.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: You're like a cat. If I get close, you'll ignore me and go far away. If I get hurt, you'll play around to share the pain.

author: Ryuuguu Rena
title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
text: There's only one world for us, and things in it are set up so that we can find happiness in it.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: I'm only attracted to girls in games!! Reality is just a shitty game.

author: Elusia de Lute Ima
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Love is the best way to fill a gap in the heart.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: The World God Only Knows
text: Yes, I have no reason to take part in the Absurd and Unreasonable real world.

author: Ryuuguu Rena
title: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
text: A flower raised in a greenhouse is still beautiful, even though it knows no adversity. But a flower growing in the field that has braved wind, rain, cold, and heat possesses something more than just beauty.

author: Durandal Tobari Kumohira
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Because it has powers that surpass everything, a king must cut off his own desires and never use it.

author: Kamisama No Memochou
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Songs are great. They reach people no matter how far they are. Even to people dear to you, who are no longer here.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2
text: To enjoy an ordinary life, you must constantly evolve.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: They come without asking, and then they leave just the same. But once you meet them, even if nobody ever knows it, that encounter will change your life for the better.

author: Decim
title: Death Parade
text: I do not think humans are foolish. I have respect for people who live fulfilled lives.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Whether we move forward or stop, we're going in different directions little by little.

author: You Miyagi
title: Junjō Romantica
text: I don't believe in destiny. I always thought that it was nothing more than an overlap of coincidences. But if a meeting changes from chance to inevitable, that's what we call destiny.

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Sometimes I think delinquents are people… Who still have hope that things still can get better if they just put up a SOS sign. But I don't even have the will to lift that sign anymore.

author: Ryūichirō Isaka
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: There are some people who possess certain things that money cannot buy... as if it as as natural as breathing...

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: I don't know what you're aiming at, but you can't expect to be perfect right off the bat. You have to build up your confidence… by achieving small tasks one by one.

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: If I give my best and am told that I'm useless, then that's my own fault. But being considered useless, without having even tried, is something I can't allow.

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: You're not the first person I went out with... But you're my first love.

author: Shōta Kisa
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Love in real life isn't as smooth as in manga...

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: When I'm shown something so pure and innocent, I'm forced to see the filthy part of myself even more and it pisses me off.

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Since then… I've started to think…about things with the worst case outcome first. By doing so, even if you did get hurt a little bit, it wouldn't end up being a lasting wound.

author: Shōta Kisa
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: My problem is probably that I don't have any confidence about anything I do. Even if the thing I want most is right in front of me, I can't help but imagine a future where I'm being rejected by it. I'm scared of getting hurt, so I run away from the people I love. What a good-for-nothing loser.

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: I can't shake the feeling that I've met you before, but I can't remember where.

author: Shōta Kisa
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Why do I always do this? I fall in love with someone, then I get all these and then I feel brokenhearted. And It's always my fault.

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: God, my face hurts from forcing smiles all night...

author: Masamune Takano
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: I knew that it was pointless to hope for anything. I was so apathetic because of this sort of upbringing.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: If you don't feel anything for me, just leave me alone. I don't want your tepid kindness.

author: Tooru Kouno
title: Princess Princess
text: When things change, isn't it better to get used to the new situation quickly? If that's the case, it's better to know what you have to do. Rejecting everything and doing things half-heartedly won't make it any easier. Hanging onto your pride will only weigh you down. So, to make life easier, sometimes it's best to go along with what other people want. As I said, it's just like the old saying: "When in Rome, do as the Romans do". Instead of others forcing it upon you, it's easier for you to want to do it yourself, right? You should try it, Mikoto. You'll be happier.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: When you said that we were scary, that means deep down, you had started to care about us! The thought of losing someone again… That's the scary part, right?

author: Tamura Reiko
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: You all underestimate humans. Individually, they may appear weak, but that is not the case. What we need to recognize is that humans are a single life-form comprised of millions of individuals. Besides their individual brains, humans possess a different "brain" of enormous magnitude. The moment we act in opposition to that brain, we will lose.

author: Marie Mjolnir
title: Soul Eater
text: An apple a day keeps any one away, if you throw it hard enough!

author: Zeno
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: People are mirrors. If you smile, a smile will be reflected.

author: Amano Yukiteru
title: Mirai Nikki
text: I'm pathetic. I was observing the world from a safe distance. I was just scared of being hurt. I was lonely.

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: You own the world, but you've never looked at any of it. What a waste.

author: Mikan Sakura
title: Gakuen Alice
text: To me, death is not the scariest thing at all.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: We're searching for a reason of existence. With our own strength, because maybe the truth is that there's no reason for life from the very beginning. Everyone hopes and tries so hard to find a reason of existence. The reason of birth, of staying with someone, of existence, believing we have to find them all with our own hands.
