Like finding a place for ourselves in dreams, in jobs, in people. The reasons we conclude may be indefinite and fragile. We may lose it too, but even so, we want a reason. As long as I'm alive, I want it too. If possible, I want to find a reason of existence within a person, within someone.

author: Megumi Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: There are things that take a long time to acquire. Friends. Love. Really, nothing has been a waste.

author: Sumire Hanano
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: I won't accept it! I want to have a choice, too! I don't want to write poems about regret.

author: Iraha Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: Destiny is a mysterious thing. It lets people reach their intended destinations.

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: Any harm that comes to me because of you is harm that I need. I want to share your pain. So I want you to let me fight. With you.

author: Livius Orvinus Ifrikia
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: The world just exists to hurt people and to be conquered. To survive, you mow down your enemies and take what you want.

author: Izumi Yukihira
title: Gakuen Alice
text: You always seem to look back. The scenery in front of you, the people near you, don't you see it? Live right now. That's what life is.

author: Yuu Tobita
title: Gakuen Alice
text: There will be some who give up because they are dissatisfied... But some feel unsettled and are lonely. So if... one day we could all laugh freely together... We, who are all in the same circumstances, can help each other... I think that will be more comforting than anything else and will also chase away loneliness.

author: Mikan Sakura
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Work together with everyone, motivating one another...even though they may not be your close friends, you can still understand each another. I'm looking forward to bonding with more people.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Will you stay by my side? Will you watch as we uncover a harsh truth that was meant to remain buried, and share in the pain that comes with the act?

author: Teito Klein
title: 07 Ghost
text: I used to think that eating was only consuming needed nutrients. I never thought it could fill the emptiness in me.

author: Haruka Nanami
title: Uta no Prince-sama
text: A light comes out of the darkness. A heart that makes a flower bloom in the wilderness journeys through the sky. Music changes the world.

author: Taichi Mashima
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: I know that I'm not alone, but I want to be strong even when I am.

author: Kanade Ōe
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: It's vulgar and foolish to spend all your time thinking about love!

author: Tatara Phoron
title: Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica
text: Humans and spirits. We're indeed different beings, but that is why understanding each other is meaningful.

author: Livius Orvinus Ifrikia
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: I don't need some ring or some throne! If it means that I won't lose you... I would throw everything away!

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: What you need are feelings and experiences. The feelings of the person seeking the rain must be in concert with those of the person making it.

author: Natsume Hyuuga
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Don't bother coming to the darkness that you don't need to see... I don't want to show you the darkness that doesn't belong to you... Don't let yourself be hurt so much anymore... Rather, let me be your strength.

author: Amane Rui
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Crying over ill luck won't do you any good. You must believe tomorrow will be better than today and smile.

author: Haruka Nanami
title: Uta no Prince-sama
text: Songs move people's hearts and make them passionate.

author: Kurusu Syo
title: Uta no Prince-sama
text: Those who aren't geniuses only have effort. All you can do is use effort to compensate for a deficiency of talent.

author: Artier
title: Liar Game
text: The society you all live in has long since turned into the Liar Game. Still, what all of you demonstrated through this game is that 'Believing' is by no means, an easy path to follow. Sometimes, taking it means allowing yourself be deceived or suffering heavy damage you will not ever recover from. And yet, 'Trust' born when you forget your personal interests and join forces to fight against the odds together holds tremendous power.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: Don't succumb to panic. Only those who see the bigger picture win.

author: Yokoya Norihiko
title: Liar Game
text: The question is what does it take to be the one in control? Money? Brains? Strategic Prowess? Of course, all three are very important. However, there is something that outshines them all and provides a faster and more effective way to victory. And that is... information. The one in possession of information will be able to easily become the ruler of the liar game.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: A former teacher of mine, Okabe-sensei, was always saying this to me: 'To believe people is to doubt them.'... meaning if you keep doubting people and searching what's inside them, sooner or later you're bound to understand something about them. And when you do, you'll be able to entrust something to them. That is what it means to trust and believe.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: Accident or amnesia, you can't rewind your life and start again. If you struggle, you'll just hurt yourself, and the people around you.

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Do you need a reason to not want to lose?

author: Shijima Kurookano
title: Nabari no Ou
text: The most precious thing is different for every human. They resist and kill each other because of their difference. It has nothing to do with the inability to sense the other's most important thing.

author: Inu X Boku SS
title: Inu X Boku SS
text: It is a tasteless life if you don't have something you regret.

author: Ichinose Hayato
title: Uta no Prince-sama
text: Maybe everything you wish for won't become stars, but if you have a dream to believe in, they'll be thousands of the most glittering jewels in the night sky.

author: Shining Saotome
title: Uta no Prince-sama
text: The beating of a heart is the first source of music!

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: If we love someone, we need to tell them about it. That way, we'll feel relieved and a lot stronger.

author: Chihaya Ayase
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: I never knew until the first years came, that we all cared about different things.

author: Tsutomu Komano
title: Chihayafuru 2
text: I've been in your shoes. I was also given a chance. There's no rush. You'll get better very soon.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: There were many tears, many unsure times, and many troubled moments. The fun memories were only a few, but even so, those memories will shine bright like stardust and continue to shine on in my heart.

author: Satsuki Shishio
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: I knew this was a losing battle. Even though the outcome was obvious, I still wanted to bet on that one millimeter of a possibility.

author: Yona
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: I always wanted to become stronger. At first it was to protect myself. Next, it was to protect Hak, who gave up everything for me. Now, it's to repay my friends, who enabled me to live.

author: Chizuru Ooshima
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: I'm always just waiting. Waiting for someone to reach out to me. But at the same time, I'm really self-conscious and a coward.

author: Balalaika
title: Black Lagoon
text: Justice. I can't think of another word more loved by the people. It does have a nice ring to it. However, without ever exercising your own strength, you seek the death of others at the hands of someone else. Well, the justice you refer to smells pretty rotten to me.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: To turn someone down and to be turned down by someone... To be hurt by someone and to hurt someone... A love where no one gets hurt doesn't exist.

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Even though I'm expressionless, being told that I'm annoying still hurts.

author: Shuntarou Chishiya
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: In this world with only despair, how do you live?

author: Suzume Yosano
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Our minds don't work the way we expect them to.

author: Daiki Mamura
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: Honestly, someone who asks someone else to convey their feelings for them is the worst.

author: Daiki Mamura
title: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
text: If I'd known that the end would come so fast, I would have said so much more.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Does it really matter that people don't like you?

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered." Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered.

author: Kenzo Tenma
title: Monster
text: Even if you can forget, you can't erase the past.

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: Hatred is born when people gather together.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm not sure why I've decided to do this. I'm not any stronger than I was, and nothing else has changed. But all the same, this time I'm not going to run away. It's okay to feel weak sometimes. It's okay to be afraid. The important thing is that we face our fears. That's... that's what makes us strong.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Black Butler: Book of Circus
text: The hungrier one is, the more satisfying one's dinner.

author: Yoite
title: Nabari no Ou
text: If it's a wish that can be fulfilled, then fulfill it. If there's hesitation and worries, then remove the sources of worries altogether.

author: Luka Crosszeria
title: Uragiri Wa Boku No Namae Wo Shitteiru
text: An illusion is darkness. Those who cannot see the darkness cannot resist its sweet temptation and are stained black. Eventually the darkness envelops the light controlling everything.

author: Madoka Shishito
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Human beings don't feel pain with their bodies. The brain is the thing that transmits the pain to the body.

author: Saori Shibuki
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: With death staring you in the face, you truly understand what it means to be alive.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: To leave the first tracks, we must go somewhere nobody's been yet.

author: Saitō-sensei
title: Nerawareta Gakuen
text: Phones, the internet - having the means alone doesn't lead to communication.

author: Jinno Yuu
title: Nerawareta Gakuen
text: I wonder if our hearts really do determine our feelings. Or are they just some sort of aroma in the air?

author: Jinno Yuu
title: Nerawareta Gakuen
text: What about when you reciprocate someone else's emotions? Is that still coming from you… or is the air connecting you to one another?

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Why are you looking for something when you can't even remember what it is?

author: Seki Kenji
title: Nerawareta Gakuen
text: There's no such thing as a person who doesn't belong. You're here because there's someone who wants you to be here.

author: Suzuura Natsuki
title: Nerawareta Gakuen
text: Embrace that feeling. Love's never rational.

author: Tadashi Isogai
title: Living for the Day After Tomorrow
text: Romance is just trying to convey your feelings to another person.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: It would be cruelest to keep your hopes up when I already know the answer.

author: Natsume Asako
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: There's nothing more repulsive than being touched by a guy you don't like.

author: Yun
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Inability to overcome fear is human.

author: Juuzou Suzuya
title: Tokyo Ghoul √A
text: Whether we die or not, isn't really that big a deal.

author: Yun
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Prodigies don't understand how the incompetent feel.

author: Usagi Yuzuha
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: Life is built upon the taking of another life. If you have the resolve to kill, then you have the obligation to eat.

author: Saori Shibuki
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: When the guarantee of safety is dangled right in front of their eyes, humans will turn their eye from probability.

author: Shuntarou Chishiya
title: Imawa no Kuni no Alice
text: Whether it's on the other side of the planet, or right in front of one's eyes, as long as one is safe, it doesn't matter how many others die. Isn't that humanity?

author: Seto Kaiba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Games are not boring. Games purify our souls and leave room for new development that challenges the mind! They are the products of human wisdom!

author: Decim
title: Death Parade
text: Life really is a mysterious thing. Each and every life spins its own, totally separate tale, yet they become intricately entwined in each other. And no one knows how they will end up.

author: Ik-su
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: There is strength in words... Sometimes, they become words of power. I thought that if I said I'm fine, then I really would be fine. But it's no use... It doesn't work.

author: Su-won
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: A heaven that only watches has no meaning.

author: Hak Son
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Making a fuss won't fix anything.

author: Tsuyoto Hiiragi
title: Shōnen Hollywood - Holly Stage for 49
text: Even if they were mistakes, all you have to do is keep walking down that mistaken path. Simply assume that nothing lies before you except mistaken paths. Just so you know, the "right" path can be surprisingly dull. There are times when it's right to take the mistaken path. The moment you decide a path is right, all of the paths behind it become right, regardless of what it originally was.

author: Kazuma Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: You're afraid to face what you know you must. So instead... you run away. The air that you said was smothering you... you know that it can also heal you. But you refuse to let it. You refuse to let anyone see you for your true self. You're too afraid of what you might lose. You're running away because you're afraid to admit your feelings even to yourself.

author: Jinbei
title: One Piece
text: You can't bring back what you've lost, think about what you have now!

author: Madoka Shishito
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: This is the law of conservation of mass. Somebody's "happiness" is somebody else's "unhappiness". That's why I tried to be a "rubbish bin" for those guys who played othello on my back using white and black thumbtacks. My crying and screaming meant something, 'cause they were laughing... But I was wrong. It doesn't make sense, does it? If I enjoy being unhappy, that "happiness" will make someone else "unhappy"!

author: Ayumu Kasuga
title: Azumanga Daioh
text: If you tell a bald man his head is useful in the dark, you'll get punched in the face. Santa Claus says such cruel things.

author: Adashino
title: Mushishi
text: People derive their happiness in a variety of ways, even though it might seem cruel.

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I think that "truth" is something that is covered up most of the time.

author: Gen Takekura
title: Eyeshield 21
text: When a man bleeds freely for the sake of other people, it's only proper to pretend that you never saw it.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: I want to hear it again, yet I don't want to hear it again. I want to see her, yet I don't want to see her. What do you call this kind of feeling again?

author: Corticarte Apa Lagranges
title: Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica
text: There are times when people who are different cannot understand each other. Even if you think you understand the other person, you really don't. And what awaits in the end, usually, is despair.

author: Rize Kamishiro
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Whose fault is it that things ended up like this? Coincidence? An accident? Fate? There's no such thing as fate. It's simply a combination of one circumstance and the next. And who is it that creates those circumstances? Who is it? It's you.

author: Yakumo Oomori
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: All suffering in the world is born from an individual's incompetence.

author: Kaito Kuroba
title: Magic Kaito
text: Everyone is the main character of their own life.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: As of this moment, you're my official assistant. Your arms, your legs, your eyes, your ears, your throat, your nails, your teeth, and your tongue. Even the last drop of your blood. They all belong to me now.

author: Castor
title: 07 Ghost
text: There are many things in this world that can't be protected simply by thinking of them or praying for them. To protect our lambs from having their dreams stolen and fading into despair, we Bishops bear arms and fight.

author: Frau
title: 07 Ghost
text: As long as you keep anything about me within you... Always, my heart will be with you.

author: Kokoro Yome
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Help can come from unexpected corners.

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: To truly love someone, is to always put their feelings before your own... no matter what.

author: Tomio Ookawa
title: Shiki
text: In this world, there are crimes too depraved to ever be forgiven.

author: Dog
title: Blood-C
text: Evil doesn't always seep out. It's possible to hide it if you're careful and skilled.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: It is pointless to question who someone really is. All you can do is believe and accept. Because the way you perceive someone is their true identity.

author: Kazuma Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: Just as no matter how hard you try to keep it away, despair will attack you again and again. In the same manner, hope will return to you. Again and again.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: God spares no salvation to those who would beg for it. Nor is he merciful to those who would beseech his benevolence. These petty requests are no invocation to god. They are your death.

author: Yoshimura
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: We're always trying to justify our actions with ideals. But ideals cannot give grounds for killing another person. The act of taking a life will always be considered... evil.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: When you get anxious about the future, it is better not to think about it. The more you think about it the more anxious you'll get. Of course it's important to think about what lies ahead, too, but if you only look at what's down the road, you'll get tangled by the "laundry" by your feet and fall, won't you? You see, it's also important to think about what you can do now. What you can do today, and if you keep washing things one at a time, you'll be done before you know it. Sometimes the anxiety will start to well up, but when it does... take a little break. Read a book, watch tv, or eat soumen with everyone.

author: Lan Fan
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost as well!

author: Kazuki Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: If someone lives, they will surely die. That is the absolute rule of this world.

author: Teito Klein
title: 07 Ghost
text: I've always lived in a world of deceit. And amidst the lies, I was able to find my true treasure.

author: Kazuki Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: There are always lazy people to deal with when you act as a group. Splitting into pairs and handling out jobs is more efficient.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Because of our weakness, we trained our eyes, ears and the ability to think. Learning how to survive, that's our trait as humans! The human species can't use magic and can't even perceive it—but because we are weak, we have the wisdom to run away from magic and the intelligence to see through it! We don't have any extraordinary senses. But because we are weak, by learning and gaining experience, we gained the wisdom to achieve the unachievable—to predict the future...Rejoice! We are humans; we are the most talented people! Precisely because we were born without any ability, we can achieve anything. This is the will of the weakest race!

author: Kazuki Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: I believe that "I could have done something" is the most frustrating regret of them all.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't think anyone is born with a reason to live. It's something you have to find for yourself.

author: Kazuki Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: That makes four time. Listen. The more you say, "I'm sorry", the lesser it's worth.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: A life that lives without doing anything is the same as a slow death.

author: Mikami Teru
title: Death Note
text: In this world, there is only good and evil, that was the first universal truths I grasped from observing the world around me when I was a child. Every human being without exception ends up falling into one category or the other.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: I'd rather die with someone than let that person die before my eyes. More so if she's a girl like you.

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: Those who win are not strong. It is those who lose and crawl back up who are strong.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You see, the world will not change through naive talks.

author: Najimi Ajimu
title: Medaka Box Abnormal
text: God, just how long are they going to squabble over such pointless things? They are all the same in my eyes. Nothing but a bunch of trash. Light and Darkness. Good and Evil. Poison and Antidote. Winning and Losing. Strength and Weakness. Black and White. Success and Failure. Happiness or Sorrow... They're all the same after all. Why hasn't everyone realized this already...

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: There was no reason for me to get attacked by you. And therefore, there was no reason to dodge.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: You think something like that would hurt, after all I've been through?

author: Mononobe Yuu
title: Juuou Mujin no Fafnir
text: I could give you baseless hope through empty encouragement, but you'd just make the same mistake again. You won't live long if you don't own up to your failures.

author: Alicia Florence
title: Aria the Animation
text: There are some people who are rich and stay in beautiful places but are still unhappy. There are some people who are poor, but happy. In the end, happiness or sadness, only the person can determine.

author: Korosensei
title: Assassination Classroom
text: Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a water ditch, so long as it continues swimming forward, it will grow up beautifully.

author: Lichtendahl Tsery
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: People can only truly understand things that they've actually experienced.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: This is something my master used to say. "Kids who are too obedient and never think of themselves are the hardest to watch."

author: Makina Irisu
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: When cats are near death, they leave their owner's side, right? I'm sure that's exactly how I feel. I want to disappear while they can think, "What a noisy, stupid girl she was, I wonder if she's doing okay."

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: At that point in my life, I couldn't find any value in anything. I was a brat who may as well be dead.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: Sometimes living can be hard! But it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry, and be happy!

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: We humans can indeed lose again something we've lost already.

author: Fuyou Kaede
title: Shuffle!
text: I'm not asking you to love me. No, actually, please don't love me. But please let me be in love with you.

author: Guts
title: Berserk
text: People who perish in other's battles are worms… If one can't live their life the way they want, they might as well die.

author: Slaine Troyard
title: Aldnoah.Zero 2nd Season
text: Most birds fly, but there are some species of flightless birds. I suspect that Princess Asseylum might say that she find it sad that they cannot fly even though they have wings. But their inability to fly does not trouble them in the least. On the contrary, perhaps the ones to be pitied are the birds who can fly, but kept in a cage.

author: Nike Lemercier
title: The World Is Still Beautiful
text: The sun may be wonderful but can you live on that alone? We all live because of the wind, the clouds, and the rain. They're not things you can throw out just because they're temporarily inconvenient, right?

author: Broken Blade
title: Broken Blade
text: There is nothing shameful about running away. Some things are just out of people's hands. If you think you're gonna die, just run.

author: Zess
title: Broken Blade
text: History books are rewritten with the changing of times. At any rate, classroom lectures are worlds apart from the battlefield.

author: Baldr
title: Broken Blade
text: It is far more difficult to capture an enemy than to kill them. Capturing a soldier involves three times the effort and three times the danger. If you wish to save the life of an enemy soldier, remember that you'll lose three of your own in the process.

author: Narumi Fujishima
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Broken promises, regardless of how horrid transform into rage that stinks to the ocean floor. Through those bonds, we're drawn together countless times.

author: Borcuse
title: Broken Blade
text: Fear deals a crippling blow to soldiers. Be it a single man or a million soldiers, it makes no difference. Man can deny neither hunger nor fear.

author: Momo
title: Shinigami no Ballad
text: It looks like you're wishing you had died instead of someone else, but... isn't it wrong to think that way? No one can take the place of another. Each person has his own destiny.

author: Ryūto Sakurai
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: Have you ever imagined how it feels to be treated like you don't exist? You're right there, but you get treated like you're not. You're denied everything - every day your heart gets carved up and you experience disappointment again and again, but you have to smile anyway. Do you know how that feels?

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: One thing I'm especially good at is finding Yano, whenever or wherever he may be. Because he's the one I love.

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: No one actually knows what's best or what the future holds. Until you actually see the results, no one ever knows. So at the very least, why don't we rely on what we do know. Let's keep the feelings that we have right now precious. Even though it seems like our lives never change, they slowly do. And just like how we never notice... the changing of the seasons... the same goes for our hearts.

author: Miu Asakura
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: Readers betray their authors.

author: Atsushi Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: Even if a fool dies, he won't be cured.

author: Rokka Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: Sometimes not lying can be a sin too, can't it?

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: It's not over yet. If we don't end it, nothing can start. Even if nothing at all begins, we must still put an end to it.

author: Hakaze Kusaribe
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: What's wrong with wanting to keep the man you love out of harm's way?

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: If I got angry at every little thing, my body wouldn't be able to hold it all.

author: Izumiko Suzuhara
title: RDG: Red Data Girl
text: It's not like we lost anything when there was nothing between us to start with. We could never really be equals. I've always been alone.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Snowdrop. I also don't know what I'm looking for. What does the future hold? Will I be able to not forget what I have found?

author: Hakaze Kusaribe
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Even if he hates me, being able to die with the knowledge that the one I love will never forget me… there is no greater happiness a woman could desire.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: O anger, turn to heat, dry up my brains! This mad thirst for vengeance must be quenched… no matter how cruel and merciless I must become!

author: Hakaze Kusaribe
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: To lose the woman you loved, not even being able to grieve… if not a tragedy, what is it?

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Forty thousand brothers could not, with all their quantity of love, make up my sum.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Profit could warm his coin purse, but never his back.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: One can hardly lose what one does not already have.

author: Saya Irino
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: It's good to not have any enemies, but it's normal to unintentionally make a few along the way.

author: Mato Kuroi
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: To me, nothing is painful. There is no such thing as anguish. Even if some things seem like they hurt, deep down, everyone is a nice person. We can understand each other, or so I thought; or so I liked to think. I didn't want to wallow in misery. I didn't want to become spiteful. I just didn't want to be hurt. I didn't want to be hated.

author: Nyx
title: Neo Angelique Abyss
text: Noblesse oblige. You have the power but not using that power is a sin.

author: Angelique
title: Neo Angelique Abyss
text: It might be ridiculous to save the people. But when there are sad people in front of us... we can't just ignore them.

author: Kai
title: Neo Angelique Abyss
text: A smile is a seed of happiness. Anything can be made with it.

author: Jet
title: Neo Angelique Abyss -Second Age-
text: Are you not your own master? You should walk the path you desire. No one else should be able to stop you.

author: Ryōsuke Hazuki
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: My hands can cultivate the earth. They can plant trees and sow seeds. They can even carry the manager. But will I ever be able to make her smile like that?

author: Ryōsuke Hazuki
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: If there's a start, there's a finish. There's no rain that doesn't stop falling at some point. Not as long as you're alive anyway.

author: Atsushi Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: When it's time for the flowers to bloom, they'll bloom. When it's time for spring to come, it'll come.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: I called his name again and again. And I learned that each time, nothing called back. I learned that no matter how much you want something, how many times you scream to it, sometimes it's out of reach. I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.

author: Rokka Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: Live a pleasant life in the unpleasant world.

author: Atsushi Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: Life is short, so fall in love, dear maiden, before your youthful ardor cools off, for there is no tomorrow.

author: Atsushi Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: At the end of my life, it was just the two of us... You told me not to leave then so I decided not to go anywhere.

author: Atsushi Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: Without a body, I can't even cry. Why am I here? I can't go anywhere. I'm neither here nor there. Who am I here for? What am I here for?

author: Kenji Harima
title: School Rumble
text: Now, now, these things happen to everyone... EXCEPT ME!!!!! That's for making fun of my masterpiece! If there's one thing I hate, it's criticism!

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Until just recently, the stars were something I only saw by myself.

author: Madara
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: When you go easy on the ones with just a bit of power, they give you more trouble than anybody else.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: This frustrating happiness... Days so warm it almost makes you dizzy. By this time next year... It may be time for me to stop looking away and know for real. Since I've decided to protect the Book of Friends... Since I decided to accept what I hear and see.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: I don't have much power and I'm trying to get stronger. But I'm not afraid of sharing my heart...

author: Yobiko
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: If the words are of rage and hate, I must accept them. I've run for so long but I can never forget.

author: Hiiragi
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Was he the kind of master who would leave you behind? If you decided in your hearts to serve him, then believe in your master.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: It's strange isn't it. The two groups, which looked like they hated each other, are now shining the same color as they vanish into the distant sky.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: There are still times when our different ways of thinking make me hesitate but I feel like there are ways we can balance each other because we're different.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: There are things you can't have no matter how much you want them. So it's easier to just forget them.

author: Kaname Tanuma
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Don't lie if you don't have to.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: When I look at their kind smiles and thought that I was supposed to be there smiling too... I couldn't stop crying. It hurt so much that I wanted to forget.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: They're part of who I am. No matter how much they hurt, they're important to me.

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: It feels like time is passing so quickly. Damn you, Einstein! Your science is crowding in on our kiss! He was right. The passage of time depends entirely on where you're standing. Relativity Theory... it's so romantic. But it's just so tragic too.

author: Yūgi Mutō
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: When we first met, you set my heart ablaze. When I see you, all I can do is gaze. Gaze at the beauty and wonder that is you. The constellation Gemini will make me think of me and you. You are my Yami and I am your Hikari. I love you, my Yami. Now and forever.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: If you don't do something because you think you can't do it, you'll never be able to do anything in the future.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: There were two kinds of strength. One was the strength that came with having something to protect. The other was the strength of having nothing to lose.

author: Kido Tsubomi
title: Kagerou Days
text: Meals are always better with lots of people at the table.

author: Saya Irino
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: Even if your heart feels like it's been stabbed, it won't bleed or leave a scar behind. There'll be someone who'll help you bear the pain. It'll all work out, so don't brood over it. No matter how much it seems to hurt, it's all just a trick of the mind.

author: Saito Hiraga
title: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
text: So what if you're an aristocrat?! Dying for the sake of honor is something an idiot does!

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: A lie that can't be disproven is no different from the truth.

author: Tateyama Ayano
title: Kagerou Days
text: Even if you want to tell him and want to be with him, sometimes, that's not enough.

author: Strength
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: No world is more painful to live in than this one.

author: Mato Kuroi
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: You can't get hurt without also hurting others.

author: Tateyama Ayano
title: Kagerou Days
text: Even when you want to say something, there are times when you'll lose the chance to.

author: Henrietta de Tristain
title: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
text: The more you rush, the less careful you become. Even a cautious rat will show its tail.

author: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
title: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
text: Death comes at the very end, doesn't it? Until that time comes, do your best at living!

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Damn. My eyes are naturally drawn in her direction. Is this the unibreastal law of gravitation? Leave it to Sir Isaac Newtit.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: I'm not rude... I just wasn't taught to politely pretend to be nice to people I can't stand.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: Colors and lies both get blacker as you add more. Add enough red, and it'll turn black too.

author: Basara Tōjō
title: Shinmai Maou no Testament
text: Even if it is a game... There are some things I just can't lose.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: At this point, no matter how I change, the things I've lost won't come back.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?

author: Yukino Yukinoshita
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: We do not give a starving man a fish. We teach him how to fish and make him independent.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Maybe life has no equal trade, maybe you can give up all you got, and get nothing back. Even if I can't prove it's true, I have to try, for your sake, Al.

author: Rabō
title: Noragami
text: Loathe me, o fierce deity. Accept and awaken to your maelstrom of hate...god of calamity, Yato!

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: Duh!! There's no such thing as free wish.

author: Seiken Tsukai no World Break
title: Seiken Tsukai no World Break
text: I believe that hope exists in the despair of certain death. Like a speck of gold dust buried in a gray gravel.

author: Sayaka Miki
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Whenever we pray for someone's happiness, someone else must be cursed in exchange.

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: You should treat me with awe and wonder!

author: Reiko Mikami
title: Another
text: Talent is a key factor, of course, but without some luck on your side you're likely to fail.

author: Takaki Tohno
title: 5 Centimeters per Second
text: I wonder when I got into the habit of writing messages to nobody.

author: Yuuya Mochizuki
title: Another
text: It doesn't do any good to pretend you can't see what's going on.

author: Gildarts Clive
title: Fairy Tail
text: I find no fault with you when it comes to standing against your enemy with courage. However, every few have the strength to sheath their sword once it's out.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Music speaks louder than words.

author: Hikari Sakishima
title: Nagi no Asukara
text: No, things can change. But things don't have to change. Whatever is fine.

author: Nagihiko Fujisaki
title: Shugo Chara!
text: People usually fall in love based on looks. But their true self might be very different from how they look.

author: Uroko
title: Nagi no Asukara
text: Being in love is a difficult situation. Too much to bear, you can't help it. You can't control yourself to the extent that you're sad and in pain, and your heart is full.

author: Moroha Haimura
title: Seiken Tsukai no World Break
text: There are no lives in this world that shouldn't be valued.

author: Shū Ouma
title: Guilty Crown
text: I was wrong, kindness is pointless.

author: Moroha Haimura
title: Seiken Tsukai no World Break
text: There isn't a chain in this world for a person to chain down another.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: Those who do well, respect their chances. Those who pass on chances, may never be presented with that chance again.

author: Kouichirou Marito
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: Well, dying for honor isn't such a bad thing. Because it's hard to survive and live in misery.

author: Chihiro Iwasaki
title: Again!!
text: What's wrong with change? In life, if you don't take shortcuts, you're the only one losing out.

author: Hattori Heiji
title: Detective Conan
text: To deceive your enemy, begin with your ally.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: The spell always breaks in the end. Girls will always transform back into their original shabby form. After that, you only have your own strength to rely on to accomplish anything.

author: Dietrich Saucken
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Admirals without soldiers are equivalent to fixed stars without planets. Their lights will only illuminate the darkness without any effect.

author: Junjou Romantica
title: Junjou Romantica
text: No matter how much is in your heart, if you don't tell that person, then it's meaningless.

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: We don't have time to waste asking for the things we don't have, we can only look for the best way to fight with the things we do have.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: It's just like changes in the notes and passports. You may find it hard to adjust to at the beginning, but you get used to it eventually. Time is very depressing after all... Both happiness and sadness fade away with time.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I should just do what I'm able to do. No matter how small it is, there's no need to feel ashamed.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: What's the use of looking towards the past? If past data dictates reality... then our 33,1 winning percentage last year means we shouldn't even be playing the Mariners and their 66,7 winning percentage.

author: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei
title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei
text: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.

author: Voices of a Distant Star
title: Voices of a Distant Star
text: There is a word "world". Until about the time I was in middle school, I vaguely thought the word meant the area where the signals from my cell would reach.

author: Mikako Nagamine
title: Voices of a Distant Star
text: You can take a picture of something and it never does it justice... I think about that sometimes when I see a picture of you.

author: Tieria Erde
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 2nd.Season
text: "I'm different.", "It has nothing to do with me.", "It's all happening in a different world." Turning away from reality like that is just a kind of inadvertent malice...

author: Yūgi Mutō
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: The past is gone, you can not change it! But the future is based on the decision you make!

author: Ahiru Arima
title: Princess Tutu
text: My name is Duck. Yes, like the bird. Take it up with my parents. They never loved me!

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Water, 35 litres. Carbon, 20 kg. Ammonia, 4 litres. Lime, 1.5 kg. Phosphorus, 800 g. Salt, 250 g. Niter, 100 g. Sulphur, 80 g. Fluoride, 7.5 g. Iron, 5 g. Silicon, 3g. And fifteen other elements. Those are the elements to make an average adult human body. You can buy these elemental ingredients at the market with the pocket money of a child. Humans are made so cheaply.

author: Akira Fujieda
title: Again!!
text: Listen up! Youth doesn't last all that long! These precious three years of your youth will zip by and you'll be left with nothing but regrets if you spend them running away in delusions and fantasies, so you have to make it clear whether you like someone or not!

author: Claude Claudel
title: Croisée in a Foreign Labyrinth - The Animation
text: Only one thing separates dangerous people and safe people: whether they know you or not. If they think you're a good person, they will all smile back at you.

author: Rika Yoshitake
title: Genshiken: Second Generation
text: You don't dress stylishly or put on makeup to impress guys. You do it to keep other girls in their place.

author: Athena Areios
title: Appleseed
text: What a strange creature is man, who would cage himself so willingly.

author: Harriet Bartholomew
title: Argento Soma
text: Happy encounters and bittersweet memories, if there is nothing meaningful in the meeting itself and it's all about having met him, then what would be the true meaning of actually meeting him and the significance of wanting to meet him again?

author: Kim
title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
text: Humans are nothing but the thread from which the dream of life is woven.

author: Dr. Franken Von Vogler
title: Giant Robo
text: The future has shown us with its glorious brilliance the time to seize our destiny and conquer all our fear is now! In ancient times, man rubbed sticks together and created fire, then they slaughtered the whales and battled one another for oil. After that, came the atomic age. In every chapter of our history, we've danced with danger. But now, for the first time in existence, we will be delivered from fear. Finally, we will escape the prison of our illusions and the beautiful night will embrace us all. It's already too late! I will live by this and I will die by this!

author: Guibu
title: The Heroic Legend of Arslan
text: To live is to undertake a journey - no, to undertake a journey is to live. To face the wind or to follow it, all journeys lead to the gates of death... The light in which all journeys are taken is deceptive - not hopeful, but sorrowful. And the struggle never ends. Everywhere on the earth is fleeting life. We are blown by the wind. The words we write in the sand disappear and finally, when we are swallowed by the sea we do not hear the waves. The humblest of creatures must face these dreadful barriers. No-not barriers, but challenges rather...

author: Cossette d'Auvergne
title: Le Portrait de Petit Cossette
text: If someone were to drown in the seas for my sake, then I would be released from stone and return to life... to live once more. But if I were to return to life one day, which would give me the most important thing - I would then cry alone. I would cry longing for my stone. Of what use would my blood even be if it were to ripen like wine for it would not be able to bring back the one who loved me most from the water's depth.

author: Sakura Hiraga
title: Masquerade
text: Living forever means that the suffering of life also continues forever.

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Oh, you're one of those guys... You don't care if somebody beats the crap out of you, but if someone lays a finger on a family member, you completely freak out. What a waste...

author: Guts
title: Berserk
text:
Look, look around carefully. Strain your eyes. At the darkness around us... At the darkness... around me. You said, "anywhere but here". This is where. Here at the border. Gathered by the winds. Those who've met their final destiny hanging between jealousy and regret. Those who failed, swept together here. You say "It doesn't matter where". If you follow me, this is where you'll go! This is your Eden!

You run from it. It is no Eden.
If you follow me... to this place... the entire world... is a battlefield.

author: Lemrina Vers Envers
title: Aldnoah.Zero 2nd Season
text: It is actually more difficult to trust those who have no talent for scheming.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: An unreasonable situation deserves an unreasonable solution.

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Before my eyes, it blocks my path. A high, high wall. What sort of scene is on the other side? What will I be able to see there? “The view from the top”. A scenery I will never be able to see on my own. But if I'm not alone, then... I might be able to see it.

author: Cardfight!! Vanguard G
title: Cardfight!! Vanguard G
text: There is no encounter without meaning. I've encountered many people on my journey, and those meetings meant something.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: For some time researchers have understood that moderate stress has beneficial effects. It boosts the immune system for example. Stress motivates and prepares us for action. It compels our body to survive. However, routine psycho pass checks take away the stress from us. There are patients whose stress reaction is so numb, they can't even recognize the basic stimulation of their senses. Once that happens, it's a neurological downward spiral, they become like living corpses. Eventually their autonomic nervous system stops working and their vital functions shut down.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: Instead of humans who lie and cheat each other to get richer, I prefer animals who hunt to survive.

author: Irina
title: Akuma no Riddle
text: Death is not the end of life, it's the completion of life.

author: Inori Yuzuriha
title: Guilty Crown
text: I'm afraid of myself, because... I'm a monster.

author: Shougo Kiryuu
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: Who a person hangs out with is their choice. And I couldn't care less about rumors. Until I tried talking to them myself, I wouldn't know...

author: Mitsuyoshi Jubei Yagyu
title: Jubei-Chan 2: The Counterattack of Siberia Yagyu
text: The way of the sword lies in one's heart. As long as you have your heart, you can live even without the sword.

author: Kō Ōsaki
title: Shōnen Hollywood - Holly Stage for 49
text: The way you perceive yourself doesn't match the way others perceive you. Those who work hard despite that discrepancy shine brighter than anyone else!

author: Baby Steps
title: Baby Steps
text: The winner should not question his victory. If anything, your actions were responsible for making your own luck.

author: Daisuke Aramaki
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: Just like wine, some human relationships need time to mature.

author: Motoko Kusanagi
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: If a technological feat is possible, man will do it. Almost as if it's wired into the core of our being.

author: Miharu Rokujou
title: Nibari No Ou
text: When you go to save someone you have to consider yourself, as well. If you can't all say “Thank Goodness” together, then those who are saved aren't saved.

author: ef: a tale of memories
title: ef: a tale of memories
text: “Miracles don't exist in this world. All that exists are accidents, inevitabilities and the actions that one takes.” That's Himura's favorite phrase, isn't it? But sometimes the outcome of your actions, which becomes inevitable, will overlap with accidents, and fulfill your dream unexpectedly. I don't know if that can be called a miracle, but there's one thing I'm certain about. Nothing will happen if you don't wish for it.

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: Whether we live or die isn't a big issue. If you focus on being alive, you develop fear. Your eyes get clouded. But if you have no such feelings... you are capable of fighting right to the end of the world.

author: Eriri Spencer Sawamura
title: Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata
text: Sketching a scene as you see it gives you a sense of being there, that's totally different from painting a copy of a photograph.

author: Slaine Troyard
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: It is a poor knight indeed who slays one who defies him. The key is to show yourself to be superior that they will not defy you in the first place.

author: Adolf Reinhardt
title: Terraformars
text: No matter how scared you are, it is important that you learn about what you fear.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Humans cannot reject temptation. When they are plunged into the depths of despair, likened to hell, they will hold on to anything that may help them escape from the situation they are in, even if it's merely a spider's thread, no matter what sort of humans they are.

author: Gilbert Dullindal
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny
text: Power is necessary, because conflicts continue to exist.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: My mother told me something long ago. She said “The world belongs to you just as much as you belong to the world”. For you were born and that gives you the right to exist.

author: Rokka Shimao
title: Natsuyuki Rendezvous
text: The warmth of another person's flesh is scary. It thaws out the loneliness that you had forgotten about so easily.

author: Donten ni Warau
title: Donten ni Warau
text: History is always made by the wisdom of the old and the passion of the young. Pave the way for a new age, youngsters of the next generation!

author: Jurai Andou
title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.

author: Jurai Andou
title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: Even if you're trying to protect someone, you must never use your power to hurt others.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Nature itself is absurd. Humans are the only ones who whine about it.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Once you've been loved once and have loved once, you cannot forget it.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: What the hell is with everyone telling me to change? I don't want other people telling me who I am.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul √A
text: All the liabilities in this world are due to the inadequacies of the person involved.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online II
text: I thought that the closer the real and virtual world got, the better the future would be. But the more the boundary between them blurs, the more it starts to trick people.

author: Kei Enomoto
title: Hatsukoi Limited
text: And what of it? If you're good on the inside, then looks don't matter!

author: Touma Kazusa
title: White Album 2
text: We finally became friends. I've said everything I wanted to say. Now we know everything about each other. Though, from the moment we become friends, we'll never speak to each other again.

author: Kitahara Haruki
title: White Album 2
text: It's not whether you can or not. You just do it.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text:
A "Wish"
It isn't a shimmering glass ball that will shatter if grasped firmly.
It's a darkly lustrous ball of mud which only firms up when one squeezes it.
It's form may be uneven, but its the form of one's own fingers.
Not to make it a beautiful gem someday.
But to make it the world's most beautiful ball of mud.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: Sometimes the things that matter the most are right in front of you.

author: Yui Ikari
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: As long as one person still lives...it shall be proof eternal that mankind ever existed.

author: Shirotsugh Lhadatt
title: Royal Space Force: The Wings of Honneamise
text: Can anyone hear me? I'm the first man in space. If you look up, well, maybe you'll see it. Or at least please listen. We've left the oceans and climbed above the mountains. I'm flying. We've found the untouched realm of God. You have to look now, it's your only chance. Nothing is here yet, not even air or water to ruin. Soon the next man will follow to touch it, and another, and in all the rush, we may again destroy it. Maybe our killing comes from the madness of being confined. Please listen, there's no more reason to kill because we don't have any more borders now! Can anyone hear me? If you can hear me, then pray. The humblest of all things, the most noble – pray for each step you take. Make a path that is safe so that those who follow you will never stumble. Dear God, please give us your mercy - mercy for we are lost. Forgive the irresponsible, the trivial men who beg you from the dark for the forgiveness of your light.

author: Haruka Shitow
title: RahXephon
text: The individual exists because there is a point of reference to identify itself.

author: Nana Komatsu
title: NANA
text: Even though it's painful sometimes, if you keep on living then good things can happen.

author: Tatsuhiko Ookuma
title: Again!!
text: It's okay to set your goals high; that's what we call a dream!

author: Ultear Milkovich
title: Fairy Tail
text: I always cursed my own life. The anxiety, anger and hatred I couldn't suppress. However, when I stopped to look at the sky... I realized just how small I am. There is an endless world spreading before me.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Samurai X: Trust & Betrayal
text: The moon pierced down on the diseased world. There is no cure for the disease. An entire race falls mindlessly into destruction. Not even a man of colossal power may be able to prevent the inevitable. Death no longer terrifies men. The smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums, so he creates slavery and savagery which surpasses the horrors of dying. These can only be fought with more bloodshed and the cycle never ends. My sword is guided by the reasoning of Hiten Mitsurugi, but when all is said, a sword is a tool for destruction not salvation. The only way I can retain my humanity is to bury its victims.

author: Cruhteo
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: When a dog soils the carpet, its master is responsible.

author: Yuuri Shibuya
title: Kyo kara Maoh!
text: I'm saying that love is not something that you're only supposed to give to a single person and not another. Love is something you're supposed to give equally to everyone.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Huh? What are you, retarded? I'm super thoughtful. That's why I stay in the corner and don't cause anyone trouble.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: It's better not to look for more meaning than there is in a name. You'll lose sight of a lot more than you notice.

author: Aki Natsuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: You did it because you had to protect someone else. In medicine, there are times when you must pick who lives and who dies. Of course, that doesn't mean it's okay to kill someone if you have a good reason. But everyone involved has the right to consider the lives they saved. You have the right. You have the right to save yourself, by thinking of the people you've saved.

author: Yuuki Aito
title: The Comic Artist and His Assistants
text: If you lose your uniqueness for fear of being disliked, then no one will ever love you.

author: Akagi
title: Kantai Collection: KanColle
text: Don't hesitate to tell the people you care about the feelings you have for them, because they may not be there tomorrow.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: You got in an accident. You couldn't do anything afterward. It's okay to feel ashamed about that. But don't run from that shame! You have to carry that humiliation with you and live on!

author: Rachnera Arachnera
title: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou
text: I'm just letting you know, I'm not telling you this because I want your pity! I'm just fed up with humans, that's all! They tell lie after lie, only accepting people who are the same as they are! Humans are such hypocrites!

author: Kuroko No Basket
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Human minds are not designed to accept negative statements like 'don't do this' or 'I can't do that', 'we can't make any mistakes', 'failure is not accepted'. These kinds of thoughts only serve to counter productively stress the body and lead to further mistakes. And if just one mistake is made, it turns into a vicious cycle. The more they think about it, the more mistakes will be made, and the more the quality of their plays will drop.

author: Tatsuya Himuro
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: What are you good at, what do you like… You need to show something that makes people understand who you are.

author: Yūma Kuga
title: World Trigger
text: (referring to his father) There are three lessons he taught me when I was six. Lesson one: Protect yourself, by yourself. Parents can't protect you forever. Work out or think hard and figure out a way to take care of things by yourself. Don't get close to things you can't take care of. Use your imagination to avoid danger. Lesson two: There's more than one answer. Things can be resolved in many ways. On the contrary, there's no answer in some cases. Don't get hung up with one way. And finally, lesson 3: Don't think your parents are always right.

author: Shinku
title: Rozen Maiden
text: This is what's inside your heart right now. A sky that has become this lovely, will not always remain sunny. There will be times when rain will fall and storms will carry on. The scenery will change, but if it is left alone, it will stay changed forever. For that, you must continue to fight, because that is to live. To live is to fight.

author: Inaho Kaizuka
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: Human beings aren't known for remaining calm and rational.

author: Kirakishou
title: Rozen Maiden
text: My heart is a cold cage where lies a person far more than my self, with an eye that can see the truth but reflects nothing, a cold stare from a distant person that use to know how to smile.

author: Record of Lodoss War
title: Record of Lodoss War
text: There once was a boy, who dreamed of being a hero, who sincerely believed in the battle to banish darkness from a world of light. But light and darkness are equals and where one exists, so too must the other. When the boy finally realized this, that was when he started the path to becoming a true hero.

author: Shiroe
title: Log Horizon
text: It's true that there's a lot we don't know about this world. But that's why we must go forward and do what we can. One thing at a time.

author: Jirou Hatori
title: Zettai Shonen
text: This world is far more complicated, rich and full of mystery, than people think.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi
text: Just live normally. You'll be better off if you can catch some fish. Dig up the caves so you can set sail whenever you need to. It wouldn't be easy. But you have an endless amount of time ahead of you.

author: Tama
title: Gintama
text: It's true that your luster may not have been as bright as gold. You only shined on occasion. You were always arguing and fighting. You have wavy hair. You were lazy. You were the king of sexual harassment. You never paid the rent. You paid your people late. Still, you were brighter than the fake glint of gold plating. When you were angry, your entire soul was enraged. When you laughed, you laughed with all your heart. Your silver was much more beautiful.

author: Rikuo Nura
title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan
text: Immersed in ecstasy from killing weak things... A burdensome corpse with no benefit to people. Someone like that... I can't possibly forgive!

author: Rikuo Nura
title: Yokai Rise Of The Nura Clan
text: Light is radiant because there is darkness. And darkness is sublime because there is light.

author: Jodie Starling
title: Detective Conan
text: Relying on someone else without exerting any effort of your own is just not right. Because the one you rely on most, can disappear, at any time.

author: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei
title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei
text: Hope is like a treasure, which you cannot carry alone.

author: Kasuka Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!×2
text: I'm always being told that I don't understand other people's feelings, and also that I don't understand what others are thinking. And I agree. But... If you don't try to stem the tears of a girl crying out for help, you're the lowest kind of man.

author: Nagakura Imari
title: Absolute Duo
text: No matter what your power is, no matter how strong your opponent, lose once and it's over. That's the kind of world that's out there waiting for us. And once you lose, there's no do-overs.

author: Makoto Isshiki
title: Chuunibyo Demo Koi ga Shitai!
text: You don't need a reason to love someone.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: If I'm around you, I don't think I'll ever be bored.

author: Quon Kisaragi
title: RahXephon
text: The beginning exists for the end and the end exists for the beginning.

author: Jōichirō Yukihira
title: Shokugeki no Sōma
text: Everyone wants to think like this: "It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.

author: Rem Saverem
title: Trigun
text: The choices we make in life have unlimited possibilities.

author: Ame
title: Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road
text: Without what you call absolute power, we'll be able to live free and strong... That's why I have to end this. Humans often betray, fight and do terrible things to each other, but if I can feel this heat and this pain in my heart, a future where everyone will be kind to each other will definitely come some day. I can believe in it now!

author: The Count of Monte Cristo
title: Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo
text: I no longer even dream, for I no longer sleep. So I had this golden enclosed garden made. However, now the only place where I can be myself is in this room. And my wealth is just this one glass of water.

author: Jiro's Dad
title: Hajimete no Aku
text:
What is evil? Is it the bad side of society? Breaking the Law? Indeed, those are evil, but the true essence of "evil" is different.
Both justice and evil require you to carry out your own ego, in this there is no difference.
It's simply a question about the majority against minority.
In today's world, the majority follows the rules. That can't be helped.
So does that mean we, the minority, are wrong? No. Even if it means the entire world is our enemy, we persist. That is "evil".

author: Konjiki No Yami
title: To Love-Ru Darkness
text: Love always happens without warning. At that time, the gears of fate will start spinning. Just like the hands of a clock, two people's hearts will separate and meet again. Eventually, they reunite.

author: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
text: Life and death come and go like marionettes dancing on a table. Once their stings are cut, they easily crumble.

author: Tamahome
title: Fushigi Yugi
text: Don't ever forget that with each step a person is able to take on their own, they have become that much stronger.

author: Galatea
title: Bubblegum Crisis: Tokyo 2040
text: Infinite wisdom requires infinite perspective. Only by experiencing each element, each moment separately and in their own time, does the beauty of the whole become apparent.

author: Juzo Okita
title: Space Battleship Yamato
text: Those who close their eyes to the past, become blind to the future.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Laggan
text: Don't be distracted by the what-if's, should-have's, and if-only's. The one thing you choose for yourself - that is the truth of your universe.

author: Hokuto Sumeragi
title: X
text: In this world, there is no such thing as "absolute"!

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: If you truly desire greatness, you must first know what makes you weak!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto Shippuuden
text: It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.

author: Kyouko Houin
title: Kodomo no Jikan
text: The opposite of love isn't hate, it's apathy.

author: Yukari Hayasaka
title: Paradise Kiss
text: Loving a person isn't about logic or reason.

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: If you can't understand the darkness in your opponent's heart, you will never comprehend the pain and suffering of others.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: We are nothingness. Our head is a void. And without anything around us, we are nothing. We become what we perceive.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: If you were given the chance to redo your life, would you take it?

author: Edel
title: Princess Tutu
text: The beginning of a story is a sudden event; the start, a happy accident, the end, the fate for which it's meant. A story that never ends is a sad fate.

author: Junko Kaname
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
text: That sort of thing happens all the time. You get drunk on your own “correctness,” and the more stubborn you get, the further happiness flies away from you. It's a bitter pill to swallow.

author: Yahiro Takigawa
title: Shinmai Maou no Testament
text: The envy of a man runs deeper than a woman's, surprisingly.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: If you truly loved her, you'd save her even if you were weak or it would be painful. That's the pride of a man

author: Miwako Sato
title: Detective Conan
text: Justice isn't something that you can just proclaim. It's a feeling you should keep near your heart.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Trying to not hurt others is something you can't do. People are creatures who hurt others just by existing even if they're not aware of it. Whether you're living or dying, you'll always be hurting someone. Once you're involved, you'll hurt someone, and even by not being involved, you might be hurting someone else as well…

author: Kaori Fujimiya
title: Isshūkan Friends
text: Math is like a puzzle or a game. There's a clear answer, and you're going on a journey to find it. But there are many ways to reach that answer. That's why it's so fulfilling when you find the solution. There are ways to find an answer promptly, or more freely. Even roundabout methods can bring you to a definite solution. The method may not be pretty, but when the answer you worked hard to discover is right, it makes you happy.

author: Yoshiyuki Nakajima
title: Silver Spoon
text: There are things that you can only learn by facing the unknown, be it a different species, different values, or upbringing.

author: Juui
title: Silver Spoon
text: In all things, I think having a dream requires having the resolve to struggle with reality.

author: Rio Kazumiya
title: So Ra No Wo To
text: A dream? That's right. Because there was the past, there is now the present. And because there is the present, we can believe in tomorrow and pursue our dreams.

author: Rachnera Arachnera
title: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou
text: You're free to like or hate whoever you want.

author: Maou
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: If it's the army's job to end a war, it's the king's job to find a place for it to end.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: Girls who push their kindness onto others. I hate them to death. "I have a really beautiful heart, so please fall in love with me!" I'm only surrounded by these types of girls and they piss me off. But it's not that simple. In the end, they are just making a fool of themselves. But you... You're different from the other girls. You don't have ulterior motives or anything to gain. You've always been easygoing. That's why to you, I thought It'd be okay to at least say thank you.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Remembering something that no one else can is a painful thing. You can't talk to anyone about it. No one will understand you. You'll be alone.

author: Alicia Florence
title: Aria the Animation
text: Have you heard this story before? When a certain traveler left on a journey in search of what he desired, he was told by his teacher: "You mustn't lose your way, because if you make one wrong turn - you will never find what you were searching for". But, unfortunately, the traveler lost his way and hung his head in dismay... But when he raised his head again, what he saw before him was a world even more magnificent than what the traveler was searching for. It means if you don't make mistakes, there are things you won't discover.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: If it's possible for one person to be hurt by another, then it's possible for that person to be healed by another.

author: Cordelia
title: Romeo x Juliet
text: There are times when all we can do is stand aside and watch.

author: Franz d'Epinay
title: Gankutsuou
text: As far as I'm concerned, I think I'd rather know the truth. Even if learning the truth changed who I am.

author: Rainbow: Nisha Rokubou no Shichinin
title: Rainbow: Nisha Rokubou no Shichinin
text: Bruises and fractures heal with time, but the wounds in people's hearts do not heal as easily.

author: Ichi Terakado
title: Gintama
text: There's no such thing as parents who don't think about their children. But there are few children who understand their parents feelings.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: The greatest freedom is the freedom not to get involved.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: For as long as human history goes on, the past will continue to accumulate. History isn't just records of the past. It's also proof that civilization has continued to advance to the present. Our present civilization is the result of our past.

author: Dante (Fullmetal Alchemist)
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: People can say there is a balance, a logic that everything happens for a reason... But the truth is far less designed. No matter how hard you work, when you die, you die. Some spend their entire life trying to scratch their way to the top, and still die in poverty. While others are born into wealth without ever working at all. It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.

author: Luciano Bradley
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I think being able to openly take away the most important thing people have... "life"... is the best thing that ever happened!

author: Aoi Yamada
title: Working!!
text: You don't waste your time following someone around unless you like him. Stalking is a sign of love.

author: Aki Mikage (Silver Spoon)
title: Silver Spoon
text: Remember how you're supposed to let go right away when you fall off a horse and hit the ground? You don't need to hurt yourself for no reason. If you don't let go, you'll get dragged by the horse and get hurt.

author: Nana
title: Golden Time
text: Life is suffering, pain, and misery.

author: Yutaka Hasebe
title: Servant X Service
text: Everyone has something they like, something they have to do, or something they want to do.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: Boyfriends and girlfriends just want to be flooded with feelings of "Aah, I feel such fulfillment". They don't really love their partner.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: Saying things like "It would be troubling for her" are just really convenient excuses for yourself. If you can forgive yourself like this, then you can just enjoy staying in your comfort zone, right?

author: Tooru Miyagishi
title: Hanasaku Iroha
text: You may come to a standstill or get irritated because things don't work out the way you want them to, but what you gain from hard work will never betray you.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: If there is such a thing like happiness in this world, it should resemble the endless nothingness. Nihility is having nothing and having nothing to lose. If that isn't happiness... then what is?

author: Tejirof
title: Aoi Sekai no Chuushin de
text: Nobody will admire you just because you are strong. People respect the ones that choose the difficult path, even if they're weak.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: This is a world where people's hearts are filled with hatred... where fingers have no purpose other than to pull triggers.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: First you must decide, then you must follow through. I believe that's the only way you can get anything accomplished.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: I look like I'm suffering, huh? That's not good... But of course I'd be suffering. I mean, I'm gonna sail in uncharted waters, right? Both, taking on a challenge and creating something. It is painful, but it's fulfilling.

author: Sonora Kashima
title: Stella Jogakuin Koutou-ka C³-bu
text: It may seem like we're all playing the same game, but in our minds, it is totally different.

author: Midori Imai
title: Shirobako
text: I just realized I love learning things that I don't know anything about. It sort of feels like I'm one step closer to my dream.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: We're all afraid, you know.. to get up on stage. Maybe you'll mess up. Maybe they'll totally reject you. Even so, you grit your teeth and get up on stage anyway. Something compels us… moves us to play music.

author: Ryuuichi Kazama
title: Ping Pong The Animation
text: There's no shortcut to victory. You have to climb that steep mountain one step at a time. There's an abyss down below and it never ends. Your only choice is to keep climbing!

author: Honoka Kousaka
title: Love Live! School Idol Project 2nd Season
text: Since I was a little girl, I acted before I spoke. Sometimes I inconvenienced those around me. I wasn't very good at expressing myself and was awkward... But that's when I found songs! Songs allow you to honestly convey your feelings. By singing, you can feel the same as others. By singing, you can connect with others. That's why I love songs. I love singing!

author: Riki Naoe
title: Little Busters!
text: People can never truly understand each other! That's why we communicate and try to understand. We can only understand ourselves through being with others!

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: I don't care what normal people do anymore. I'm going to live my life the way that I want to.

author: Taichi Yaegashi
title: Kokoro Connect
text: What you can't accomplish alone, becomes doable when you're with someone else.

author: Ryuuzen Gotou
title: Kokoro Connect
text: You'll discover that problems have a way of working themselves out if you talk to your friends.

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: My, my! Do I really need to spell it out for you? There is nothing that you can acquire without making a move on your own. It's the same with romance - your only hope is to be more aggressive.

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: In the world of sports, quickness doesn't necessarily mean having the fastest time. It could also mean the acceleration from zero to maximum speed or the deceleration from maximum speed to zero. This is known as agility.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: It's interesting, isn't it? The way that when someone expresses something, someone else always shows up to interpret it.

author: Grandmother Sawatari
title: Tamayura
text: A great enough sorrow can stop time, but someday, time will start moving again. No matter how many years may pass.

author: Ginbei Haruomi Sawatari
title: Onii-chan Dakedo Ai Sae Areba Kankeinai yo ne!
text: I don't want someone that can easily be replaced by others. What I need is... what I really want is... someone that will be with me no matter what. A best friend.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: When boys get to a certain age, family becomes a bother. That's how they become independent.

author: Mr. 2 Bon Clay
title: One Piece
text: Even in the depths of Hell... blooms a beautiful flower of friendship... leaving its petals as mementos... bobbing back and forth on the waves... may it one day bloom once more...the Okama Way.

author: Daiki Aomine
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I won't say you'll definitely be able to do it if you don't give up. But if you do give up, then there'll definitely be nothing.

author: Juugo Yama
title: Ryuugajou Nanana No Maizoukin
