text: Don't make decisions on your own without saying what's important.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You were wrong on two counts. Even the hardest substance can be broken, when crashed into itself. And the ability to feel pain is not a weakness. It's a strength. Pain tells a creature its vulnerabilities, and not you expose them to attack. Your robot is dead. And so, I'm afraid, are you.

author: Alcor
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Why have I come to have this conscience? If it's this agonizing, I shouldn't have had it. Just what am I?

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: I care not if you call me an enemy. I shall bring you to submission.

author: Fumi Kanno
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: This is all that remains of the world. Though we knew it was coming, it's pretty shocking, huh? The disappearance not of matter but of awareness, of ideals. Not death. Something even more pure. The fact that we life-forms ever existed…… Our past, present and future, it will all disappear.

author: Devil Survivor 2
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: What is Living? Living is continuing to make choices. Living is enjoying oneself. Living is continuing to make choices. Living is expressing one's will. Living is enjoying oneself. Living is continuing to search. Living is eating. Living is continuing to fight. Living is being lost. Living is preparing oneself.

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Our world is like a terminal cancer. Saying you'll change things through individual will is the rambling of a peace-loving fool. Why don't you understand it's too late for humanity?!

author: Mikako Nagamine
title: Voices of a Distant Star
text: We are far, far, very, very far apart... but it might be that thoughts can overcome time and distance.

author: Ichijou Kazuomi
title: Mayonaka Ni Kiss
text: People who can't love themselves are the ugliest.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Life is too bitter, so coffee, at least, should be sweet…

author: Ban
title: The Seven Deadly Sins
text: Let me tell you something... Real sin is something you can never atone for.

author: Sawada Iemitsu
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Keep in mind that there are those who get hurt and those who try to heal the hurt ones. For those guys, it's not funny to have something they value so much be brushed off so lightly. How can a man protect another if he can't even protect himself?

author: Kuroko Shirai
title: A Certain Scientific Railgun
text: If you have the will to follow through with your beliefs, the results will follow naturally.

author: Nozomi Tōjō
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: Do you know what's the most important thing about climbing mountains is? It's not about having the courage to challenge it, It's about having the courage to back down.

author: Eli Ayase
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: If we give up before we try, then nothing is going to happen.

author: Tet
title: No Game No Life
text: In reality, the least interesting answer is usually the correct one.

author: Abeno Sousei
title: Donten ni Warau
text: You're always above everyone else. But you make decisions and move forward by yourself, and no one can keep up with you. Even the much-loved sun is alone if no one can reach it.

author: William A. Zeppeli
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
text: What is "Courage"? Courage is owning your fear!

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: Memories of someone who's passed away remains beautiful forever and a person's heart will linger over them, they say.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Dying means to be gone. And what goes, is not your pain, but your existence itself. But in your mind, you think that you'd have a sense of “nothing” after you die. How can you call that “nothing”? In other words, you don't even have an idea of what death is really like.

author: Angelina Nanatsu Sewell
title: Mashiroiro Symphony - The color of lovers
text: You're like big umbrella. You're the shade from the strong sun's rays when the weather is good. And you're the shelter from the cold rain when the weather is bad. You're always protecting others.

author: Sana Inui
title: Mashiroiro Symphony - The color of lovers
text: I guess I just want the person I love to be happy. I just want to do something for him.

author: Rentarou Kurahashi
title: Love Lab
text: Girls who are pretty and pure only exist in fantasies.

author: Rentarou Kurahashi
title: Love Lab
text: Girls are so annoying. They're always stubborn and full of jealousy, gossiping about who gets along with whom and who loves whom. Violent too.

author: Da Capo III
title: Da Capo III
text: As long as you keep thinking out of the box, you'll probably discover that imaginary situations you find in manga and games are already happening in real life.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: No one's going to criticize you if you get excited for something, or you laugh with all your heart! And if someone does, I'll beat them up!

author: Togusa
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: It's not like I had aspirations to be a hero or anything. However, I'm positive we followed a code of justice that all of us believed in without condition or compromise.

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: Even though we are going to shatter thousands of lives, wearing white is gonna make the blood look so pretty.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: A life with no changes can't be called life. You can only call it experience.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Once you have a power, sometimes you are put into a situation which make you carry extra burdens, and live all your life with pain.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: Even if I'm not around, nothing will change, you say? It's not as if I'm living my life to prove something silly like that! We live our lives to see how the world changes around us, don't you think?

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: But I think it's natural that not everything you try will go well, right? So, I'm gonna start again from scratch.

author: Cher Degre
title: Wolf’s Rain
text: You know I think I understand now why you and I never had children…on some level we knew the world was ending, it may of seemed like we had found something else to obsess over but the truth is we'd given up on the future. That's the real reason I was never able to get pregnant.

author: Hazama
title: BlazBlue: Alter Memory
text: This whole world is nothing but lies, lies! Lemme show you what I like to call the truth, the truth called despair!

author: Hakumen
title: BlazBlue: Alter Memory
text: I am the white void, I am the cold steel, I am the just sword, with blade in hand shall I reap the sins of this world, and cleanse them in the fires of destruction! I am Hakumen! The end has come.

author: Yūsei Fudō
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: The future isn't written yet. There's still time for things to change!

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: I hate waiting, but if waiting means being able to be with you I'll wait for as long as forever.

author: Himeko Inaba
title: Kokoro Connect
text: Never forget that kindness can hurt instead of help.

author: Himeko Inaba
title: Kokoro Connect
text: If I show people how weak I am, they won't need me anymore.

author: Toshiki Kai
title: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Link Joker Hen
text: Right now, I'm going to fight the person who freed me from being Reversed and saved the world. The strongest fighter... My best friend.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: With out strong opponents, living isn't fun. It's perfect if I can't win.

author: Masafumi Takeuchi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: If it's going to be a relationship of hardship and mental agony, you should put an end to it.

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: How should I put this... There are times when you begin to hate everything around you.

author: Norie Okazaki
title: Tamayura
text: Even if it's a coincidence, it's wonderful when someone understands how you feel.

author: Shin Meguro
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: There are those people who are born aloof and prefer to stay away from groups. In such a case, others should just leave those people alone. It's not a matter of sympathy.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: The pain of getting hit, the frustration of loosing, the joy of winning, all of that. They've been driven into this body, fists, and this head. It becomes my strength in the next fight. All of my battles up to now, those memories, they are all of my power.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: As far as relationships with other people go, they don't just end because one person decides that it's over.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: If we're going to regret it either way, then let's regret doing something fun that we wanted to do.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: Don't go thinking that there's a world where it's natural to be happy! Even if you start complaining, nothing will change! You need to make things fun by yourself!

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: If you're too lucky, people will get jealous of you.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: In this world, who knows who might kill who.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: There's no use. There's no such thing as a victory that can be won through effort. It doesn't exist.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: They say time and a people's heart are inversely proportional. The more it passes, the more they grow apart. It seems there are some rare exceptions though.

author: Jun Isurugi
title: True Tears
text: If a person could so ideally control their feelings... how carefree would life be?

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: So, yeah. Strong animals don't gather in herds or anything like that. Do they not know the expression “a lone wolf”? Cats are cute and wolves are cool. In other words, loners are cute and cool.

author: Yashiro Isana
title: K Project
text: Regardless of who I was in the past or what I did, I feel like "me" of the present should take responsibility.

author: Meiko Inoue
title: Solanin
text: The scenery is so peaceful, you'd never think that wars were happening and people were dying around the world. If only this scenery could continue forever. But even if a time should come when I can no longer enjoy this scenery, as long as everyone is with me, I'll be fine. That's what I think today.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: It's pretty hard just to survive as a human being. The world's a big place and there's a lot of stuff I don't understand, but I think there must be something important out there. I mean, that's what I want to believe. If I keep believing that while playing music, then maybe I'll be able to change the world just a bit.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: Sorry, a trick is nothing but a puzzle mankind came up with. If you use your head, you can uncover the logical answer. It's disappointing. No matter the explanation I think of, I cannot understand why one person would kill another. Even if I can see why, I can't understand why.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: That's right. Worried about being discovered, living in fear. It's a painful thing.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Men are not men on the battlefield. We turn into some other creature. You can do the cruelest things... It doesn't even matter if it's an order or not. To protect yourself, your mind shuts out any emotions you have. It's like a steel door. But once the war is over, you can't keep it closed forever.

author: Anarchy Stocking
title: Panty And Stocking With Gaterbelt
text: We're always serious. We're seriously joking around.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I mean, think about it. If someone pointed to a classmate of yours and asked you what they meant to you, how would you answer? What would you say?

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Rejection is a part of any man's life. If you can't accept and move past rejection, or at least use it as writing material - you're not a real man.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!×2 Shou
text: You know how they have parameters in games? Like, you're good at magic, but your combat skills blow, or you're a great fighter, but you lack in the brains department.

author: Kishou Arima
title: Tokyo Ghoul: Jack
text: Events that happen in this world, are a continuous series of trifling things, and within those myriad pieces of puzzles, there is always a fragment that leads to the truth.

author: Yasushi Takagi
title: NANA
text: Being alone and being lonely are two different things.

author: Nana Komatsu
title: NANA
text: Nobu is idealizing me, that's why he fell in love with me. If you knew the real me, it would shatter your illusion. Then come on. Shatter my illusion. Because I don't know what else I can do to stop loving you.

author: Tatsumi
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: Everyone has their own reasons to fight! Sometimes, you have to settle it yourself or there's no way forward!

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: Everybody loves somebody. In time, everybody falls in love with somebody. Just as I found you.

author: Harumi Sakuraba
title: Rokujouma no Shinryakusha!?
text: Regardless of whether your friends believe, you still care for them, correct? Isn't that why you feel so sad?

author: Hyuuga Junpei
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: “Your hard work will be rewarded.” What kind of idiot came up with that nonsense?

author: Kiriha Kurano
title: Rokujouma no Shinryakusha!?
text: I don't like hurting others. But that doesn't mean I won't bear arms to protect places and people dear to me.

author: Nanana Ryuugajou
title: Ryuugajou Nanana No Maizoukin
text: I won't lose to my own decisions, no matter what. That's the proof that I'm me.

author: Takaki Tohno
title: 5 Centimeters per Second
text: I'm just trying to live my life, but it seems as if sadness always piles itself up around me. It's in my bed, the toothbrush in my bathroom, and the memory of my cellphone. Over the past few years, I've wanted to move on, I've wanted to take hold of something I couldn't reach. What that is, I have no idea. Not knowing where such obsessive thoughts were coming from, I simply drowned myself in my work. Then one day I realized that my heart was withering, and in it there was nothing but pain. And that my beliefs, that I once held so passionately, had completely disappeared.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: It's because we help out when they're in trouble that we can count on them to come running when we need it.

author: Hidehiro Harada
title: Chihayafuru
text: Frustrations will not last forever. Nobody can keep on going without some measure of reward.

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: People who aren't doing anything themselves, shouldn't be so quick to tell others what to do!

author: Kinichirou Imamura
title: Again!!
text: What I hate the most in the world is when I'm already trying hard and I'm told to try harder!

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: The ability to understand others just by touching definitely exists. There might not be any reason to be afraid of touching and being touched by others, or hugging and being hugged by others.

author: Kiyomasa Senji
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Only frustrated adults and naive kids believe themselves to be special.

author: Mine
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: No one would help me. And that's when I understood... That only I could help myself.

author: Daichi Muroto
title: Kotoura-san
text: Words are shallow. Just talking doesn't bring world peace.

author: Sawako Kuronuma
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: Because we can't understand each other, it makes us want to make things clear even more.

author: Yokodera Youto
title: Hentai Ouji To Warawanai Neko
text: You don't need something from someone else. What you need is to make your heart stronger. If you act naturally, people will naturally like you. And I'd like you more that way too.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Ironic, isn't it? How people without truly important things know about them more than those who have them.

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: But I suppose it's not so bad that an old friend is the same as ever.

author: Ichiya Vandalay Kotobuki
title: Fairy Tail
text: Everyone makes mistakes, but then you recover. Look at all of the friends you have here who adore you. It would be difficult for anything to change that. If you keep that in mind, you should be able to get back on your feet any number of times.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: When you're in love, you start to worry about the most trivial details. It should feel really restrictive, but worrying about this kind of thing makes me really happy instead.

author: Youichi Tanaka
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Your high school life will be over before you know it. There are things you can only do now. You should do as many of them as you can.

author: Hikari Sakishima
title: Nagi no Asukara
text: Having feelings for someone just brings sorrow to someone else. Someone always gets sacrificed and suffers. If this is what it means to fall in love, then falling in love is terrible.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi Zoku Shou
text: If you throw your life away, you won't even have the capacity to feel regret.

author: Sion
title: No.6
text: Where do people stray off the path? When do they begin to obey their greed rather than their ideals? Or are ideals just prone to morphing easily into greed?

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I'm not very good at sensing people's boundaries. Without knowing how far is too far, I gradually get closer and closer. It's terrifying. Being unable to sense that is terrifying.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: He who lies to make things beautiful is probably someone who admires pure feelings much more than anybody else.

author: Osamu Mikumo
title: World Trigger
text: I am not a hero. I can't make anyone happy with any result. I can only do what I deem right with me not hating my choice at a later point.

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: If you're gonna kill me, then kill me. If you're gonna execute me, stop waiting. Until then, I live by my own rules!

author: Nagi Kengamine
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: The only people who make me feel remorse are those that do not possess any willpower.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: Why do you still want to be my friend? Is it because you feel comfortable being with me? Because I understand your awkward and useless self, and yet still love you? Quit acting so spoiled. When you rejected me, you lost the right to want those things!

author: Nagi Kengamine
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Even if they're not your own child, you can't, as an adult, overlook their wrongdoings.

author: Amane
title: Mushishi
text: If you could see everything but couldn't change any of it, or if you could live in freedom in darkness... Which do you think is more fortunate? I think it might not be that bad living in the dark, remembering the light.

author: Hayashida Nana
title: Golden Time
text: You were like a bomb, one wrong move and I might have lost you again.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: The Present is ending. Here, countless versions of our past selves are always crying, laughing, falling in love, getting hurt, joking around, feeling happy and suffering. These feelings are born all the time and in the next moment, they became the past and die. It's over now. This is the end, but the truth is everyone's time is like that. Right after it's born, every moment becomes the past and dies.

author: Kaga Kouko
title: Golden Time
text: Worrying about rejection may be the same as rejecting yourself.

author: Kaga Kouko
title: Golden Time
text: If a person you love doesn't love you back, you're worthless. That's what I always told myself.

author: Kaga Kouko
title: Golden Time
text: I want to spend a lot more time with you! But I don't want you to think I'm annoying, so I'm holding myself back. When you're away, I always wonder what you're doing and thinking.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: I may be unreliable, and I may not be able to do anything, but I'm here. I'll always be with you. I'll be always by your side.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: When you want to scream or cry, I'll be there. I'll share your feelings and stay with you.

author: Tada Banri
title: Golden Time
text: Even if you think I'm a nuisance, no matter where you go, I'll find you. I'll always be listening for your voice. When the rain falls, when the wind blows, when the flowers scatter, when shadow looms. In every sign, I'll search for your voice.

author: Kaga Kouko
title: Golden Time
text: I don't want to waste a single second or meter. From your first step and second of the day, I want to be with you.

author: Nana
title: Golden Time
text: You meet someone and then part ways. It's a natural part of the human experience. No one can promise they'll be together forever.

author: Haimura Kiri
title: Dansai Bunri no Crime Edge
text: If you don't interact with the people around you, it'd be hard for anyone to approach you.

author: Haruto Kirishima
title: Kimi no Iru Machi
text: I have to be her place to belong. I need to be a steady, reliable man whom she can trust.

author: Haruto Kirishima
title: Kimi no Iru Machi
text: Aren't we family? Aren't I like your family too? So it's okay to cry if you're having a hard time. Then I'll do anything to help.

author: Yuzuki Eba
title: Kimi no Iru Machi
text: As long as I can be with you, I dont care what anyone says or how much I'm detested. As long as I can be with the one I love, that alone makes it okay. That's what I longed for.

author: Aizawa Yuuichi
title: Kanon
text: In this world, there are things you're better off not knowing.

author: Futaki Kanata
title: Little Busters!
text: It may be better to go and regret it rather than staying here and regretting it. If you don't move forward, you can't gain anything.

author: Noumi Kudoryafuka
title: Little Busters!
text: I'm a very lucky person. I was able to meet people I love.

author: Kamikita Komari
title: Little Busters!
text: No matter what, I'll be always be your friend. No matter how far you go, I'll be thinking about you everyday.

author: Bastien
title: 07 Ghost
text: Only a genuine wish makes one's own soul shine beautifully in this life. That light is a messenger from heaven lighting the way for our unwavering souls to be brought to the God's side.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online II
text: No one dies alone. When someone dies, the part of them that lives inside someone else also dies. You already live inside me.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I don't believe in crap like coincidence, fate, or destiny.

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: I don't want to change. I want to change. We all hold in our hearts conflicting feelings, each back to back. And so, we live our days.

author: Kozakura Marry
title: Kagerou Days
text: The others taught me something. That one needn't fear the future. That one needn't hate the world. From now on, the world will not simply be my fantasy. It will be our one and only, real future.

author: Nana Osaki
title: NANA
text: People say that if you fight, it means you're close to someone; but in the end, a fight is just a collision of egos. People don't learn to understand each other just by laying bare their feelings.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: It's like an automated vending machine for canned juice. You'll get what you want so long as you have the money, but… You get nothing in return without it. You can't buy your way into the hearts of others.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: There are two things people fear... those are death and embarrassment. Those who try to overcome death are just idiots, but I won't laugh at those who try to overcome their embarrassment. I like those kind of idiots.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Something that's supposed to die and doesn't will eventually rot away, whether it's a man or a nation.

author: Hattori Heiji
title: Detective Conan
text: Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: There certainly are things that cannot be told in words, but that can only be said by people who have exhausted their use of words. Words are like icebergs that are floating on the ocean called "heart". The parts that show above the sea surface are small, but they still let us perceive the larger parts that are hidden below the water. Use words deliberately. If you do, you'll be able to convey more things more accurately than if you were to keep silent. Right judgement can only be made with right information and right analyses.

author: Yozora Mikazuki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: You don't need to make a hundred friends. Just make real friends that you care about a hundred times as much. Even if you only have one, so long as they're a friend you really care about.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: If what you lost was too big and you can't replace it with something else, you don't have to replace it with just one thing, right? If you get ten small things or a hundred small things, all together it will be enough of a reason for you to keep going!

author: Saki Watanabe
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: We have to change our way of thinking if we really want to change the future.

author: Nagi Kengamine
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Everyone's fighting for their own kind of freedom. It seems small; but in their hearts, nothing is more important. With such hopes, I won't have enough time for revenge or fear, right?

author: Yuiko Kurugaya
title: Little Busters!
text: I don't mind getting in trouble. But I won't let my friends' kindness go to waste.

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: Every story has an ending. One day, we won't be able to stay together.

author: Yuuki Shinjuurou
title: Un-Go
text: People get corrupted. Not even saints and heroes are safe. There's nothing you can do to prevent it. That's our salvation.

author: Vincent Volaju
title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
text: Of the days that I have lived, only those I spent with you seemed real.

author: Hinagiku Katsura
title: Hayate the Combat Butler
text: There are times when there's a great pleasure waiting at the end of laments, pains, and near-death experiences.

author: Aion
title: Chrono Crusade
text: Even at a time like this there's not a single word of rescue from the one you worship. You see? That is the truth of this world. He doesn't watch anything and doesn't save anyone.

author: Morgan Le Fay
title: Ah! My Goddess: The Movie
text: If things were to change, do you think you could ever fall in love with me? Or fulfill a dream for which I long? The world is about to change. That's why I'm here now. I've come and this will mean a new beginning for my life.

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: It's not that I'm a tolerant person. I just don't want to think about these troublesome things.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: He realized that he had lost sight of something important. No matter what turn he took he should have kept singing. Even if his songs couldn't save the world, he could still sing songs for her. Don't ever lose sight of what's important to you.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside.

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: You'd better not (rip my mask). Like Pandora's box, you want to open it because you don't know what's inside. But if you know what's inside before you open it… It's boring, isn't it?

author: Saiga Jouji
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Charisma has three points. The nature of a hero or prophet, the ability to simply make you feel good when you're around them, and the intelligence to eloquently talk about all sorts of things.

author: Yūko Ichihara
title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicles
text: It is called the memories of the body. When the mind forgets, the body remembers for it.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Someone who cannot hate something, cannot love something, either.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: I understand your feelings of wanting to bring the bad guy to justice, but do bear with it. It also requires courage to hide oneself.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: The right thing is… to have faith in life, until you're sure of death. That's what makes a great detective.

author: Subaru Okiya
title: Detective Conan
text: If you force me to pick one… It'd be black. It covers up the things inside of me that I don't want to be known about. Well, for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.

author: Flandre Scarlet
title: Touhou (Project
text: The world is a big cradle of lies where people lay their heads on pretending nothing is wrong. A cycle where mortals dwells upon to...for a cursed one like me happily watch them from darkness savoring each moment a human dies due to their ignorance...

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: The moon does not mourn over the dead. What it does is shine light on the truth.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: All this time, I seriously thought that it's better to die than to live your life alone.

author: Maria Akitsuki
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: Once the kiln is opened and the pottery inspected, all that are crooked or bear cracks are fated to be smashed. If all that awaited us was the fate of smashed pottery, then we decided we would rather run away in the hopes of finding a different future.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: You hit me with everything you had, so I decided I could trust you with everything I had.

author: Ichijiku Chisato
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: It's a foolish thing, the human heart. Sometimes we fail to operate logically, and act on emotions.

author: Touma Kyohei
title: Midnight Secretary
text: I am ME. No matter, what I say or do, I'm still ME. The things I feel, the things I do, being a vampire, being a man, being betrayed by my mother. When all those things come together, they make up ME. But I'm none of these things taken separately.

author: Puppet Master
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: Life perpetuates itself through diversity, and this includes the ability to sacrifice itself when necessary. Cells repeat the process of degeneration and regeneration until one day they die, obliterating an entire set of memory and information. Only genes remain. Why continually repeat this cycle? Simply to survive by avoiding the weaknesses of an unchanging system.

author: Rin Matsuoka
title: Free!
text: No amount of natural talent trumps hard work.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: Even if it is shameless and vulgar, somewhere I seek some sort of connection with people.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: The shadow of your former self won't vanish.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: No matter how hard you try, you cannot exceed your true capabilities.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: Even if this is a twisted way to go about it, even if a guaranteed way to save our hearts cannot be found, even so, it doesn't mean that people like us don't try and struggle.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: If it's this world behind the eyelids, anybody can become the person I imagine them to be.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: I never wanted anybody to hate me. I don't belong to any groups, and I have to fight and struggle to build myself up. In the end, all I want is just to not be hated by everyone.

author: Kakeru Kurosawa
title: Onanie Master Kurosawa
text: I'm prepared for it all. Even if my chest hurts, even if I'm ripped apart, I won't let myself taste any regret.

author: Keigo Oonishi
title: Texhnolyze
text: If the only way to be granted life in this world is to surrender my body and soul to insanity, then I shall choose to meet my doom!

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: You see, for as long as we draw breath into our lungs, we shall keep hope alive inside our hearts.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: They are those who come and go as they please. Even so, once you come to know them, even though there's no one else who notices them, it's a precious encounter that will keep your heart strong.

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Not killing people is really hard. Clean living is tough.

author: Ryoma Echizen
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: You know, a lot of people make excuses when they lose.

author: Yozora Mikazuki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: It's not like I'm desperate to have friends, anyway. I just don't like being looked down on as that sad person with no friends.

author: Yoshii Kazuho
title: Texhnolyze
text: True freedom can't lean on anything. It's transient, lonely, and arduous.

author: Seiichi Kirima
title: Boogiepop Phantom
text: The brain is a microcosm, creating its own stories. People then live out these stories.

author: Millenium Earl
title: D.Gray-man
text: You think I'm making demons simply as weapons, but demons are created by the human soul.

author: Kouichi Aizawa
title: Nabari no Ou
text: The strength of life lies in the possibility of dying.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: There's probably no one who's more of a realist than the unpopular loner. I have lived my life with the Three Nevers of the Unpopular: Never to hold (hope), Never to open (your heart), and Never to treasure (sweet words).

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: What does it mean to be a winner? Is it the last one standing? It means to climb over a mountain of corpses to get to the top. By no means is it a glorious sight to behold, in fact, it is extremely cruel. Even so, if you still wish to seek victory... then you must become a devil.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Dictatorship itself isn't absolutely evil, it's just another form of government. The point is how you can run it for the benefit of society.

author: Hildegard von Mariendorf
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Maybe humans are capable of committing far more shameless acts than they imagine they are. If they hadn't faced adversity, they might have gone without discovering such ugly facets of themselves.

author: Seiichi Kirima
title: Boogiepop Phantom
text: Time does not exist. Only the illusion of memories exist.

author: Noe Isurugi
title: True Tears
text: Even in the darkness, I'm sure it's reassuring to have someone there to walk with you.

author: Tenka Kumō
title: Donten ni Warau
text: Listen here. Don't say you can't. Words bind you the minute you say them. Believe in yourself! You can do anything!

author: Kaishou Rinroku
title: Un-Go
text: If all humans were saints and sages, all truths would be exposed. And every just cause, expedient, ideal, and lie would no longer be necessary, yes?

author: Nagato
title: Naruto
text: If you don't share someone's pain. You can never understand them.

author: Yukino Yukinoshita
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: If all you're good for is breathing in and out, then even an AC unit is more useful than you.

author: Rouka Numachi
title: Hanamonogatari
text: Even the worst evil saves something... even the greatest good hurts someone.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: It's meaningless to just live, and it's meaningless to just fight. I want to win.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Love breeds sacrifice... which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.

author: Vermouth
title: Detective Conan
text: I wonder if there really is a God... If such an entity really existed, wouldn't all honest, hard-working people be happy?

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: Be as swift as the wind. Be as quiet as the forest. Attack as fiercely as the fire. Be immovable like a mountain. Move like the lightning. Be as impenetrable as a shadow.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: Admiration is admiration. It's the same as viewing flowers from afar. When you get too close - it becomes like Icarus, who lost his wings and plunged into the earth after flying too close to the Sun. Disaster befalls oneself.

author: Fukuda Nanjirou
title: Nisekoi
text: There are two kinds of people in this world. Those who eat the things they hate first, and those who eat them last.

author: Shigaraki
title: Gugure! Kokkuri-san
text: People are born alone and die alone. But there isn't a single person who can keep standing alone forever.

author: Motoko Kusanagi
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: Who can gaze into the mirror without becoming evil? The mirror does not reflect evil, but creates it.

author: Shinsekai Yori
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: Arrogance can plant a seed of sin. And loneliness can serve as its nursery.

author: Chisa Yomoda
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: There was no reason for me to stay in the real world any longer. In the real world, it didn't matter if I was there or not. When I realized that, I was no longer afraid of losing my body.

author: Wataru Takagi
title: Detective Conan
text: If it's an important memory, then you shouldn't forget it. Since those who aren't with us only live on in our memories.

author: Nanana Ryuugajou
title: Ryuugajou Nanana No Maizoukin
text: If you don't like how things turned out, then try to change it. And then if it still doesn't work out, that's when you can be depressed.

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: How weak the mind is when it wants to forget. Maybe you didn't forget. Maybe you're lying. Is it a lie you tell everyone around you, or perhaps a lie you tell yourself?

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: The sea's blue reflects because of the sky's blue. Just like detectives and thieves. We're all toying with the human mind. But the one who pries for others' secrets is the one who's truly impolite.

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: It's better trusting someone than to die doubting people altogether.

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass 2
text: Society doesn't always do what's right. That's exactly why we ourselves must live virtuous lives.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Perhaps in this universe, there exists a solitary, absolute truth. Perhaps it clarifies every question. But that's beyond the reach of these short hands.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: What would you ask a grave, which can never reply? What do you pray for? Saying anything after someone's death is far too late.

author: Renmei Communicator
title: Haibane Renmei
text: Perhaps this is what it means to be bound by sin. To spin in the same circle, looking for where the sin lies, and at some point losing sight of the way out.

author: Kuu
title: Haibane Renmei
text: Inside my mind, there's a beautiful cup. A very beautiful, clear cup. And tiny drops kept falling into it: "drip, drip, drip", slowly but steadily, everyday. And today, I felt the cup had finally become completely full.

author: Paul von Oberstein
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: All heroes have established their thrones atop, not just their enemies. But a large quantity of allied corpses as well. There are no monarchs with clean hands.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Children don't grow up looking at perfect parents. Rather, using their imperfect parents as anti-teachers, children nourish a spirit of independence.

author: Alex Cazellnu
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Love and the human mind can't be analyzed with formulas. It's not so unusual for love to make you forget the sense of care and respect for others. There's no logic. It's an uncontrollable urge. To tell you the truth, it'd be worrisome if you became like that. Your mind is keen, and your character is good. But passion has nothing to do with mind or character.

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: You can't perform the same trick twice with one audience. If performed only once, the magic leaves a strong impression. It will then blossom into a beautiful miracle in their hearts. But, when used twice, rather than the audience enjoying the magic, they focus on unraveling the trick. As such, the chance of it being unveiled is high.

author: Kaworu Nagisa
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: Humans constantly feel pain in their hearts. Because the heart is so sensitive to pain, humans also feel that to live is to suffer.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.

author: Takaaki Morofushi
title: Detective Conan
text: Give advice and good guidance, then halt if such is of no avail. Do not disgrace yourself for it.

author: Gen Fudou
title: Sousei no Aquarion
text: A misty moonlight night washes over the land and though darkness ebbs with the glow of the full moon, shadows still remain. They conceal an evil which exists just beyond our grasp. Sides are chosen. Lines are drawn, ones that we dare not cross. But in the distance a ray of light shines to expose our path. It is then that we realize that some things in life are better left unseen.

author: Serial Experiments Lain
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: History is not merely a linear collection of points that we pass through on a timeline. They are connected by a line. No, perhaps it is more accurate to say that they are made to connect.

author: Kourin Shimizu
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Swords exists for just judging and killing. They can never save others.

author: Su-won
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Do you want to kill me? It's only natural that you do. But I cannot die right now. Because there is something I must do.

author: Masaru Ōfuna
title: Hanayamata
text: Coming together and working hard with everyone is a really fun thing!

author: Toma Epanort
title: Sousei no Aquarion
text:
On that day twelve thousand years ago, on the summit of clouds reaching the stratosphere, remember that evening when we watched the prominence rise from the sunspot together…
Entrusting our bodies to the Earth's love, we listened carefully to the memories of the sea etched in every droplet of the falling rain that morning. When we looked up at the ocean's singers who had gathered at the swaying great temple, the voices of prayer…
That day, under the Tree of Life, we entrusted the beginning of the world to those reverberations… Remember that brilliance.

author: Mei Tachibana
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: They'll use you as much as they want; then once they're done with you, they'll all disappear.

author: Gen Fudou
title: Sousei no Aquarion
text: At night the moon shines with daylight. Our dreams are an ocean… each wave is the dream of an individual. The tide is controlled by the pull of the moon… it illuminates our dreams. If you open the moon, you will discover the path to dreams. When one finds death, they are submerged in the ocean of dreams. At the end of life's path is a door that leads us to this ocean. Our dreams transcend the self to reach this sea… connecting us all within its lunar tide.

author: Hong Lihua
title: Sousei no Aquarion
text: Misfortune… that is my symbol. Unluckiness… that is my identity. I am a woman who looks best dressed in solitude and misfortune. That is who I am.

author: Mikage
title: 07 Ghost
text: I swear to God that when we die, we'll die together.

author: Shuu Tsukiyama
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Isn't it arrogant to put a price on whether life is "higher" or "lower", Kaneki? We are just bags of meat. The weak bow down and the strong devour them. Rather, if you compared them to all living things, it's humans who have shaved away the most lives. We are different than them.

author: Shuu Tsukiyama
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: You don't need to blame yourself just because you've hurt someone, just like when you're walking you can't really blame yourself to crush some ants... that's what being stronger ones means.

author: Jae-ha
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Taking away someone's freedom is the ugliest thing one can do in this world. People like that ought to decay into dirt and come back as thorny roses.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: There were sad days, and painful ones and there may be more. Even so they're treasured days that I'll never forget.

author: Koujirou Sasahara
title: Nichijou
text: The ordinary days that we live in may, in fact, be a series of miracles.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: You need to accept the fact that you're not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing.

author: Shuu Tsukiyama
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I'm not going to protect you by being your shield or armor, but I'll be the dagger hidden below your pillow.

author: Su-won
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: Kindness is not a crime. But sometimes it awakens the weakness and greed in others.

author: Ritsu Kawai
title: Bokura wa Minna Kawaisou
text: Even though I don't mind being alone, I don't want others to think I'm lonely.

author: Kazunari Usa
title: Bokura wa Minna Kawaisou
text: I realized once again that my life is stuck on hard mode.

author: Jurai Andou
title: Inou-Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: No matter how much this world may change, I shall always remain myself.

author: Mine
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: People who abuse power they were born into piss me off more than anything else.

author: Ein
title: Phantom: Requiem For The Phantom
text: If this world wasn't a complete hell for me, that's because you were alive.

author: Ryosuke Takahashi
title: Initial D: Fifth Stage
text: No matter how strong the pain is, it's our duty to move forward. You're wrong for running away from reality.

author: Shinji Ikari
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: I still don't know where to find happiness. But I'll continue to think about whether it's good to be here... whether it was good to have been born. But in the end, it's just realizing the obvious over and over again. Because I am myself.

author: Taro
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: The truth has power because it's the truth. And because it is the truth, that makes it just. It's persuasive, isn't it? Don't you want truth like that?

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text:
My severe injuries had healed and the sweet taste of blood coated my mouth. I kept walking, my goal vague...trying to dispel the building unease in my chest... Upon entering an open area was the scent of rotting flowers and in the middle of the flowerbed, he stood... Without anyone saying a thing, without his name given, like an unsolved puzzle falling into place by itself, just by seeing that figure, I--understood exactly who I faced. The CCG's reaper. The undefeated ghoul investigator. A cold, vivid gaze. There, stood the God of Death. Why was it that I was seeing beauty in death rather than life? Strangely, I thought he was beautiful... Disoriented, I had failed to comprehend the scene before my eyes. It was not anything like flowers but a large amount of "Death". Had he done this alone?... It's a lie... Koma...Irimi...After all that... No matter how I tried to rouse my will to fight with hatred, more than sorrow, more than rage, the emotion that arose within me was despair. 
Because 'my turn' was next.

author: Lain Iwakura
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: No matter where you go, everyone's connected.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: I don't need to believe in God to believe in myself.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Samurai X: Trust & Betrayal
text: The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone, would be the moment you understand love.

author: Gen Fudou
title: Sousei no Aquarion
text: How can he hope to stand back up, when he is still in the process of falling? Let him fall, all the way to the very bottom, before telling him to stand up again.

author: Mikage Celestine
title: 07 Ghost
text: God doesn't give us trials we can't surmount. So someday all your wounds will heal and the day will come when you've surmounted all your pain.

author: Yoshimura
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: ...The act of taking is equally evil. We, from the moment of birth, continue to take. Food, connections, even fellow blood. Living to utmost. Continuing to slaughter, kill, take. Life is to constantly sin. Life is evil itself. I am aware I am evil... And so are you all. Now, come kill me. And I shall do the same!

author: Kureo Mado
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: You only need a strong will and a clear purpose.

author: Rito Yuuki
title: To Love-Ru
text: If you smile once when you're feeling down, you begin to feel better and become more cheerful.

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: You shouldn't judge a person based on circumstantial evidence.

author: Nanana Ryuugajou
title: Ryuugajou Nanana No Maizoukin
text: Everyone wants to have someone else's attention, and to be noticed. But the same thing goes for the other person too.

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: It is meaningless to distinguish between the beautiful and the ugly, or between the talented and the ordinary. Every human struggles to survive.

author: Uka-no-Mitama-no-Kami
title: Inari Kon Kon
text: Dressing up on the outside won't change what's on the inside.

author: Izayoi Sakamaki
title: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
text: A fight isn't won once a victor is decided, it's won when someone loses.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I lie all the time. Who cares if you know something, but you say you don't? Forcing something out of someone without permission is worse.

author: Choi Yool
title: Gaussian Blur
text: ...and even if you were to hate yourself as much as you want, you have no choice but to live with yourself forever. Other people just go by. Eventually what's left to you at the end is only yourself. Even if you can't seem to like yourself, shouldn't you at least compromise?

author: Choi Yool
title: Gaussian Blur
text: There's nothing known for certain. Adolescence is like that anyway. It's like a train ride with no destination and nobody. There's no destination and outside everything is flashing by so you can't see anything.

author: Fe-chan
title: Nichijou
text: If you're always positive, good luck will eventually find you.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.

author: Saul Jaguar D
title: One Piece
text: There is no such thing as being born into the world to be alone.

author: Manabu Takasaki
title: Nichijou
text: Necessity knows no law!

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: When you come to hate something you liked it is incredibly painful.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: If we give our best in something we love, we'll enjoy the victories from the bottom of our hearts.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: If I'm protecting someone, I won't let her die, and if I'm attacking, I'll cut you.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Don't start a fight if you can't end it.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: I'll do what I want till the end. Cut me down if you want.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I like myself. I have never once hated myself. My high specs, my half-decent looks, my pessimistic, realist point of view... I don't hate any of it at all.

author: Eli Ayase
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: I'm saying that practically nobody feels that they're talented. That's what makes us strive to improve. As we strive to improve, we notice the people around us improving too, which makes us work even harder. I guess you could say friends are like rivals, in a way.

author: Nozomi Tōjō
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: Why don't you give it a try? You don't need to come up with a reason, you try things because you want to. Isn't that how you start doing things that you really like?

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Tears and rain, fall down on my face, my body is unable to stay yet my heart is unwilling to leave.

author: Tama
title: Gintama
text: If I were to survive, but couldn't protect what was important to me, then I might as well be dead.

author: Yuuko Aioi
title: Nichijou
text: If I'm getting in trouble no matter what I do, I may as well make a grand frontal assault and fight to my last breath.

author: Kuroko No Basket
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: * The Zone * In this state of extreme focus, all unnecessary thoughts disappear and the athlete becomes absorbed in his play. Only those who have practiced and practiced earn the right to stand before the door, and it only opens unpredictably. It is the ultimate domain, open only to the chosen.

author: Sakagami Tomoyo
title: CLANNAD
text: I've already decided. Getting good grades and listening to teachers can take me somewhere high and far away, but what if that's not where I want to go? Right here, by your side, Tomoya, is the only place I want to be.

author: Nico Yazawa
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: Listen, an idol's job isn't to show people their smiles, it is to make people smile. Never forget that!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I'm scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing.

author: Tsubasa Hanekawa
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I don't know everything, I just know what I know.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: It's unbearable to die hating someone.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: Doesn't seem to matter how far I travel, my destiny is always followed by blood and gunsmoke. The result is always the same every time, mountains of death and debris.

author: Sunohara Youhei
title: CLANNAD
text: You're trying to stay unscarred, aren't you? If you've come this far, you'll have to hurt someone. The more time you take to decide, the deeper and more it'll hurt. For all of you.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: Clannad After Story
text: The days I spent with you were a lot of fun. I realized for the first time that it makes me so happy to be needed by others. I thought I'd get along well with you like this. But I can't. I was being a jerk. While I was with you, I was looking at someone else. I kept it to myself even after realizing that. I was taking advantage of your kindness.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: I will fight for my friends than watching them get hurt, I will fight for those I love.

author: Kyōko Kirigiri
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: I guess not knowing someone doesn't mean you don't understand them.

author: Yukina Himeragi
title: Strike the Blood
text: Being too rigid makes you fragile. You'll end up breaking yourself and those around you.

author: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi
title: Hentai Ouji To Warawanai Neko
text: Getting close to someone half-heartedly can cause you suffering.

author: Honoka Kousaka
title: Love Live! School idol project
text: Getting used to it would be quicker than trying to work around it somehow.

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.

author: Kyouya Sata
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: Romance is like an extra in life. I don't mind having it, but I'm not in the mood to chase it.

author: Lacie Baskerville
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I despise common sense. I've seen the world from every possible angle. This cruel, ridiculous, beautiful world.

author: Hidehiro Harada
title: Chihayafuru
text: Some people think the act of investing efforts, trying your best is more precious than the result. But for mentors as well as their pupils, that approach feels bitter. 'I did my best', 'the fight was close'... words like that blow past and die out like a wind. Only the result is a stone. The stone you can reach by doing your best.

author: Kanzaki Tomoyo
title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: Where will we be in five or ten years from now? No one knows. All we know right now, all we can see right now, is what's right in front of us. That's why we'll always live our 'right now' to the fullest!

author: Kaoru Nishimi
title: Kids on the Slope
text: Sometimes life is like jazz, and goes in an unexpected direction...

author: Tobirama Senju
title: Naruto
text: Grown-ups are idiots. If they really want to bring an end to this endless fighting, they need to sit down with one another and reach a truce.

author: Monkey D. Dragon
title: One Piece
text: There can be no happiness in a world where the undesirables are thrown away.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Feelings can be controlled, but tears never lie.

author: Hidenori Tabata
title: Daily Lives of High School Boys
text: There's no need to pretend to be cool. Let's show our lame sides. That's who we really are, after all.

author: Kaworu Nagisa
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: Humans cannot create anything out of nothingness. Humans cannot accomplish anything without holding onto something. After all, humans are not gods.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I've been around longer than you have, kid. And I've seen my share of troubles. You're not the only one who knows what it's like to lose somebody. It looks like neither of us has led a charming life, have we? Still, it's not that bad. At least you and I have been lucky enough to find new comrades to help fill the void.

author: Tohno Kyouko
title: .hack//Liminality
text: Every society places the world in order, by the concept of opposites: inside and outside, religious and secular, celestial and worldly. The opposing concepts organize the world as it is today, but none of those can be distinctly separated. There is always a grey area where it is ambiguous.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: We cannot be satisfied until we have eliminated all others. It has nothing to do with reason. It is instinct.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: For those who have come to power, wealth and glory not by their own strength and effort, but simply through inheritance, what right do they have to complain? The very existence of such blood-lineage dynasties is disgusting. Power is the property of one generation. It shouldn't be transferred, it should be seized.

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: If you plan to continue being a detective and using words to entrap people, inscribe this in your hearts: Words are like knives. When used incorrectly, they turn into foul weapons. You have to understand the opponent's heart and use them with discretion. No matter who it is you're dealing with.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: From a different perspective, an imposing wall is just a large door.

author: Hidemi Hondou
title: Detective Conan
text: Our contribution will never come into light, but the failure will be noticed immediately.

author: Motoko Kusanagi
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: There are countless ingredients that make up the human body and mind, like all the components that make up me as an individual with my own personality. Sure, I have a face and voice to distinguish myself from others, but my thoughts and memories are unique only to me, and I carry a sense of my own destiny. Each of those things are just a small part of it. I collect information to use in my own way. All of that blends to create a mixture that forms me and gives rise to my conscience.

author: Hideo Kuze
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: Just as water runs downhill, the human heart also tends to revert to its basest instincts.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: No matter how many more points you have at the end of the game, if you're not happy, that's not a victory.

author: Kouzaburou Touma
title: Psycho-Pass
text: There's a limit to the amount of pleasure a person can obtain. But pleasure brought out by intellect is infinite.

author: Shun Aonuma
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: All problems come from the human mind. In the mind, one's consciousness is just the tip of the iceberg. What lies beneath the surface... the subconscious... is far more vast.

author: Takatori Kotori
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Is it so strange to do something for someone else? If the people I love can stay smiling tomorrow... then you can call me foolish or whatever you want.

author: Tokou Nanami
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: People don't vanish from this world the moment they die. Their true death is when they are forgotten by the living.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Don't break anyone's heart, they only have one. Break their bones, they have 206.

author: Keiko Ayano
title: Sword Art Online
text: It's impossible to work hard for something you don't enjoy.

author: Meryl Stryfe
title: Trigun
text: But you're wrong, no one ever has the right to take the life of another person. No one, no one ever has the right to take the life of another. No one. And everyone, everyone deserves a future. Don't you think that's true? Please, please, it's time to stop the fighting now. It's up to us to end the cycle of hatred. If we don't work to end the sorrow this time, then the cycle of pain will just continue on. When we were all born, were any of us made to steal or cause others harm?

author: Rosso
title: Monster
text: Killing's easier than you think; you just have to forget how sweet the sugar is.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: People's feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: Do you resent me? If you do, then keep on living and come kill me. I'll remember you. I'll never forget you.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Walls are an unavoidable part of youth.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: By looking at what's blocking our way, with an open mind, a wall can be turned into a wide-open door.

author: Yuuko Aioi
title: Nichijou
text: Today, everything's shining brightly! The air, the people, and even this classroom; because today, I actually did my homework!

author: Ran Mouri
title: Detective Conan
text: When people make a mistake, it is nice to give them advice, but... if they don't listen, just leave them alone. Otherwise you'll do yourself a disservice by wasting your time and effort.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: Love is an emotional thing. I will say nothing in praise of it... It is antagonistic to clear reasoning. It's the same in tennis. Love is 0. No matter how many zeroes you add together, you'll just lose miserably.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: The longer one holds on to a memory, the longer one lives in the past. The deeper the memory they hold onto, the more beautiful the past will become. The beautiful memories will eventually turn into hate. Even if they look ahead, they lose the ability to walk. As long as the heavy chain called revenge continues to bind the heart, the tears of sadness will continue to flow.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately she is a mother and we should respect her.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: The concept of lateness being evil is wrong in the first place... The police don't mobilize until after an accident happens, and it's standard for heroes to show up late. But would anyone condemn them for being late? So, speaking paradoxically, lateness is justice.

author: Ayato Kirishima
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: The world runs on power. Everything is determined by the superior power. You are weak. That is why you lose.

author: Maria Akitsuki
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: I think there are many things in this world we are better off not knowing. Sometimes the truth is the cruelest thing of all. Not everyone can bear it.

author: Sawako Kuronuma
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: There's no knowing how others are feeling unless you ask them. And your feelings can't get through to others unless you tell them directly.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text:
You've underestimated me, snow woman. When you thought you couldn't beat me, you should have run. Of course, there are things that I don't wanna cut. But... let me ask you something.
Have you ever seen a fierce animal you were sure would never bite? Because I haven't.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: (To Ichigo Kurosaki before getting shot point-blank by his Cero) I see. So you show no mercy. Just like a true Hollow. I care not. Defeated by you as I stand, my existence holds no further meaning. Do it.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I think that the people who come to like and understand you, like you not because of your outward appearance, but because of your own feelings that aren't lies.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: It's not good to expect too much, but you can't do anything if you're being overly pessimistic. If you just wait thinking it's useless, nothing will come of it.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: People's feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.

author: Tsume
title: Wolf's Rain
text: I don't trust anyone, so no one trusts me

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Humans are easily tempted. When they are poised on the edge of hellish despair, and a spider-thin thread of salvation presents itself, they will invariably grasp it. No matter the human.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: Words are like swords. If you use them the wrong way, they can turn into ugly weapons.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: The cycle of life goes only one direction, not even alchemy can change that.

author: Takamura Mamoru
title: Hajime no Ippo - Champion Road
text: For a man to stand up again, he needs one thing... "To make excuses".

author: Kaworu Nagisa
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: Are you afraid of other people? I know that by keeping others at a distance you avoid a betrayal of your trust, but you must endure the loneliness. Man can never completely erase this sadness, because all men are fundamentally alone. Pain is something man must carry in his heart, and since the heart feels pain so easily, some believe that life is pain.

author: Katsuragi
title: Assassins
text: People are strongest when they have got nothing to lose.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: If you believe it was destined to happen it is most likely to happen, if you believe nothing has been decided then most likely nothing has been decided.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Winning is everything in this world. The victors write history. The losers are wiped from it.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: It's like I'd want to ask what justice is doing right now if it existed in this world. Well, justice is empty and ineffectual.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: How can someone who seeks a reason from another person be right? While you're forcing that reason on someone else, how can you take responsibility?

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Each person has his or her own way of having fun.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Brush my teeth and go to sleep at night. Wake up and eat breakfast in the morning. People do those everywhere. When I realized that everyone did all these things on a daily basis, everything started to feel so boring.

author: Shiori Shiomiya
title: The World God Only Knows
text: The real world is scary. It's pain to deal with other people.

author: Aoi Yamada
title: Working!!
text: Mere scores do not measure a person's worth.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: No matter how ugly something is, if you look at it in a cute way, it'll seem dear somehow.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: To the me back then, you don't need to worry. You'll soon find something you can do, something you can set your heart on.

author: Kaishou Rinroku
title: Un-Go
text: You can't extract a god out of a human. However, by kowtowing to the thing that is considered to be a god, it is possible to create a god and shove it down the throats of people.

author: Yūsei Fudō
title: Yu-Gi-Oh 5Ds
text: Nothing in this world is free. Be thankful to those who speak strict word to you. Watch out for a person who talks too nicely.

author: Mother Araragi
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: People can run from the things they don't like all they want. But if they're just averting their eyes, they're not running. As long as you think the current situation is okay, no one can help.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: To have something you detest is about as important as having something you love. Yet you accept everything that comes in your way. Because if you like anything and everything, they all end up being the same thing in the end.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: The beginning is what comes after the ending. Carve out with your own hands a future, filled with hope.

author: Truth
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Despair to the ones who become swelled with pride.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: With a keen eye for detail one truth always prevails.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: There is great satisfaction in fighting for the sake of gaining power, but it's joyless to fight for the sake of maintaining it.

author: Olivier Mira Armstrong
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Obeying a superior you can't even believe doesn't make you loyal. You're just fooling yourself.

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass
text: It is not society that determines people's futures.  It is people who determine society's future.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: But the mass we call "world" keeps turning, ignoring our individual desires.

author: Suzaku Kururugi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: To desire some results, one must take actions.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Shut up! I did what I had to do. People lie to survive. No one is blameless.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Death may be my only freedom.

author: Makoto Hanamiya
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Break them and they're all just trash.

author: Reo Mibuchi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: It's not about doing what it takes to win. Sei-chan told me before "Winning is just like breathing". Victory isn't something that Sei-chan seeks. It's a natural part of his life. It's a basic bodily function.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: It's not the time to be scared. Of course it's better if the opponent is strong rather than weak, right!

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Don't you know the saying 'Man proposes; God disposes' ? First, you do your best and then fate will decide how it will turn out.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: There's no meaning if you win alone!

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Even if other people think it's meaningless, it's disgusting for me to quit, even when the possibility is 0. Therefore, I will never... Give up !

author: Kise Ryouta
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: If we have time to get upset, we should have used that time to move on… Even if just one step forward!

author: Uta
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: We need to have a mask that we never take off.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: If it's a fight between a man and man, choose the path you believe is right. Only a fool would stand indecisive after being frightened at the thought of being soiled by the mud.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: What value does your will have? I asked you what price it carries. If money is enough, is your will for sale? A will that can be bought with money... what's the meaning of that? If your will can be bought with money... then it will vanish along with that money. Am I wrong?

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: When a man faces fear, his soul is tested. What he was born to seek... what he was born to achieve... his true nature will become clear.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Memories. They are recollections of the heart. If those who are not human come to possess memories, people begin to fear the result.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: If you only feel fear after knowing both the abilities of your enemy and yourself, flee with your tail between your legs. However, if you're going to stand firm and fight with a focused mind, you will definitely have victory within reach.

author: Ougi Oshino
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: When the world is filled with red lights signaling danger, the world is safer than usual. But when it's filled with green lights signaling safety, it creates a place more dangerous than anywhere.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: No person exists that is just virtuous, and kindness is only something piled on the outside. There are no humans with just virtue and fairness. Rather, they try to be that and just build up stress.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
text: People save themselves on their own. Nobody can ever save anyone else.

author: Ling Yao
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Friends are connected by heart! You can't just rinse off something that's stained on your soul!

author: Homunculus (Character)
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Humans are inconvenient creatures, aren't they? The species can't live on unless they all create a community and expand.

author: Scar's Brother
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: If many negative emotions gather, they will end up influencing the entire world. But on the other hand, it is also possible to gather positive emotions and lead the world in that direction.

author: Soramaru Kumō
title: Donten ni Warau
text: Everyone worries and suffers, but they still go on with their lives. I'm expecting to be able to laugh again, so it's too early to despair!

author: Abeno Sousei
title: Donten ni Warau
text: Who decided that if you cry, you're weak?

author: Kanoko Naedoko
title: Warau Kanoko-sama
text: You can't be strong not because you can't throw away your weakness, but it's because you don't face your own weakness.

author: Kurumi Tokisaki
title: Date A Live
text: You were ready to kill another creature, yet you're scared of being killed yourself. Don't you think that is strange? When you point a gun at a living thing… this is what that act means.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: I haven't done anything yet. Getting depressed and losing confidence is way too egotistical.

author: Kirijou Mitsuru
title: Persona 3
text: There are times where we cannot stand without the support of others.

author: Nyaruko
title: Haiyore! Nyaruko-san
text: It's not a crime if no one knows about it.

author: Aki Ogasawara
title: Kanojo wa Uso wo Aishisugiteru
text: In exchange of being able to get something that normal people can't have... you must let go of what normal people have.

author: Takaya Kurisu
title: Amagi Brilliant Park
text: You find a glimmer of hope, only to lose it. That is when your despair tastes the most divine.

author: Sylphy
title: Amagi Brilliant Park
text: Sometimes one must lose the battle in order to win the war.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: "Obey the ones with power". That's the true meaning of the law of the jungle. If you don't wish to be bound by that, obtain greater power. Because there's always times one must fight power with power.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: There's no telling when this war will end. No matter how many troops the country deploys, the desert just absorbs them like water. We suffer, conquer, and what's left? Nothing but sand.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: If you'll cower at the sight of the great foe before you, leave at once, coward. If you'll lose the strength you believed in, then fall to the ground, weakling.

author: Ling Yao
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: The king exists for his people. Without his people, there is no king.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: There's no point in dwelling on the past, so I'm trying to think of the future instead.

author: Yuuki Shinjuurou
title: Un-Go
text: People die. Things break down. Nothing is unbreakable. And of course, I will break as well.

author: Yuuki Shinjuurou
title: Un-Go
text: Everyone has desires they can't tell anyone about. It goes without saying.

author: Yuuki Shinjuurou
title: Un-Go
text: People are beings where a love of what's right goes hand in hand with a desire to do all manner of evil acts.

author: Arata Hinohara
title: Arata Kangatari
text: There's no one the world would be better off without.

author: Lubbock
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: It isn't like I understand what you want. You want to change the world, huh? I understand, everyone feels that way... But it doesn't give you the right to treat other's lifes like toys. You can't just destroy what you want!

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Even in the depths of the darkest oceans, some light always pierces through.

author: Hiroko Seto
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: When you say you "can't hear the sound", doesn't it really mean you "aren't restrained by the sound"?
