Rather than the sound you hear with your ears, an image inside you is boiling up from the depths of yourself and taking over without you even knowing. The sound inside, the landscape in your heart, your wishes, a sound loaded with your thoughts; didn't you feel it, even for a moment? "Not being able to hear the sound." That is a gift.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: You know, I discovered something. Everyone has something... Something deep inside their hearts. For some, it might have been enmity. For others, admiration. Wishes, a craving for the spotlight, feelings that one wants to deliver, feelings for one's mother. Everyone was supported by their own feelings. I realize now that, perhaps, no one can stand alone on stage.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: By exchanging notes, you get to know one another, to understand one another. As if your souls were connected and your hearts were overlapping. It's a conversation through instruments. A miracle that creates harmony. In that moment, music transcends words.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Didn't you know... girls are greedy?

author: Hiroko Seto
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Defiance toward parents is an establishment of one's self; it's a sign of independence.

author: Hiroko Seto
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: As a musician, in the process of learning from a teacher, your differences breed a sense of discomfort which you should cherish. It's because of those differences that we have individuality.

author: Lubbock
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: There is no way to train your heart to be invulnerable.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I've always been alone. The only one that can bring warmth into my life, is you.

author: Road Kamelot
title: D.Gray-man
text: Bonds that are too strong create flaws over time.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I do want to be useful for something and to be of help to people, but I want to decide what that "something" is by myself.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Sticking through with a lie to protect someone, is probably harder than telling the truth.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Nothing good ever comes from a man interfering with women's problems.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I think that having no relationships with others is the loneliest thing in the world.

author: Mashiro Shiina
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: It's more interesting when the future's uncertain.

author: Bulat
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: You won't survive if you just let your boiling blood dictate your actions.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I never once thought that the world was fair, but some things will never change. If you want things to change, don't wait for someone to do it for you, go change it yourself.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: There isn't anything more painful than to have someone say that he doesn't believe you.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: You don't have to try to get along with someone that you aren't interested in.

author: Shin Fukuhara
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: At times, the truth can be cruel.

author: Aria Link
title: Tegami Bachi
text: The closer you get to the sun, the darker your shadow will be.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: One human only has the power to do so much. That's why I'm going to protect...even if it's just a handful of them...the ones most important to me.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: According to my master, when you're a kid, just being a fast runner makes you popular. In middle school, it's holding your own in a fight. After that, brains make you popular. Her point seemed to be, "Run fast, hit hard, and read books."

author: Watari Ryouta
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Setbacks are inevitable to superstars. Adversity is what separates the good from the great. After all, stars can only shine during the night.

author: Riko Aida
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: When one thing ends, another begins.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: Music is freedom.

author: Blue
title: Wolf’s Rain
text: If I can be with you when the world ends, it'll be enough for me.

author: Kiba
title: Wolf’s Rain
text: Everyone's gonna die. It's a natural part of life. But if life has no purpose, you're dead already.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: The more I concentrate, the more I get consumed by my performance. The sounds I play fade away from my reach, tangling up like flowers seized by the spring wind and vanish.

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, evil for evil.

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: The notion of set fate is ridiculous. Cause and effect can be bent through strength.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I have to accept that who I want to become and who I can actually become are different.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I always wished to be accepted by my surroundings. I tried to change myself for that reason. But, I don't care if I'm disliked. I don't care if I don't have a place where I belong. I don't mind if everybody rejects me starting tomorrow. I will even become a devil for the person who is trying to protect me.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Wrongly placed jealousy is ugly when it goes too far.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: To unite dreams beneath a banner of conquest. I praise your efforts. But, warriors... did you not understand? That all dreams must disappear when the dreamer wakes. Every last one of them. Therefore, it was inevitable that I would stand in your way. King of Conquerors, know the end of your eternal dream. I, myself, shall show you harsh reality. Now awaken, Ea! A worthy stage has been set for you! Look up and behold... Enuma Elish!

author: Kiyora Miki
title: Nodame Cantabile
text: Play to the last note, and leave no regrets.

author: Lacie Baskerville
title: Pandora Hearts
text: If you accept everything you're told without question, you'll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: There are things you can only share with someone by fighting. For instance, how serious you are.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: Life isn't just doing things for yourself. It's possible to live in such a way that other people's happiness, makes you happy too.

author: Asada Shino
title: Sword Art Online II
text: If it's just a game, at least be brave enough to run towards the guns and die!

author: Karan
title: No.6
text: You know, in the end, people come home to the people they love most.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If we are to die one day, wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: If you feel like crying you should not hold back your tears. You should let it all out while you still can - because when you get bigger sometimes you can't cry even if you have something to cry about.

author: Sakagami Tomoyo
title: CLANNAD
text: Time and titles do not matter in the bonds between people.

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: Meeting you was the best thing that ever happened to me. You made me so happy. I don't want you to be lost or afraid or anything like that. From here on out, I know things might be hard sometimes. But no matter what may await, please don't regret meeting me.

author: Akatsuki
title: Log Horizon
text: Games are fun because you can do things you couldn't in real life, right?

author: Misaki Nakahara
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: People who neglect to make efforts or who don't take any actions at all are always the ones who dream that someday they will suddenly become wildly successful.

author: Shiroe
title: Log Horizon
text: Stealing someone's name is never all right. It means you're unwilling to recognize them as human.

author: Boris Konev
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: A student who is too loyal to his master has no chance of surpassing that master... A mutinous spirit is the source of independence.

author: Misa Amane
title: Death Note
text: I can't even imagine a world without Light.

author: Hajime Ichinose
title: Gatchaman Crowds
text: If you need to run, you should run the best you can! Then you can just take your time to think.

author: Porco Rosso
title: Porco Rosso
text: I'd rather be a pig than a fascist.

author: Porco Rosso
title: Porco Rosso
text: A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig.

author: Shawn
title: Karigurashi no Arrietty
text: When I saw you, I just wanted to find a way to protect you.

author: Arrietty
title: Karigurashi no Arrietty
text: Human beings are dangerous. If we're seen, we have to leave. My parents said so.

author: Shawn
title: Karigurashi no Arrietty
text: [his parting words to Arrietty] My heart is stronger now, because you're in it.

author: Arrietty
title: Karigurashi no Arrietty
text: Sometimes you have to fight for the things that are worth fighting for.

author: Shizuku Tsukishima
title: Mimi wo Sumaseba
text: When the afternoon air currents mix, we can even touch the stars without fear!

author: Shizuku Tsukishima
title: Mimi wo Sumaseba
text: I'm no man's burden! I want to be of use!

author: Noboru Yamada
title: My Neighbors the Yamadas
text: The reason the Yamadas get along fine is because all three adults are nuts. If one of you were normal it would unbalance the rest.

author: Claymore
title: Claymore
text: The weak always cling to words, and those with power die for those without it.

author: Riful
title: Claymore
text: Tell you what… I'll carve you up until you find yourselves cursing the fact that you have such resilient bodies.

author: Claymore
title: Claymore
text: From the moment I first saw you, you've looked so sad. Your face shows so much pain. Your eyes were like mine. They looked so sad, so hurt, so lonely… as if you couldn't stand it.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: We're going to explore the outside world someday, right? Far beyond these walls, there's flaming water, land made of ice, and fields of sand spread wide. It's the world my parents wanted to go to.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: People are crazy for believing that these walls will protect us forever. Even though the walls have been intact for the past 100 years, there's nothing that can guarantee they won't be broken down today…

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: You're not God, nor are you a sister. But it's because I feel that you're much closer to me than God, I'm much more afraid of being hated by you.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: Lies are like colours. The more you pile up, the blacker things get.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: What takes reason a hundred years to build a bridge to only takes the wings of faith a single night to reach.

author: Charunee Kusakabe
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: (Her dad) He'd always tell me that family isn't about being related by blood. Living under the same roof and caring for each other is what family is all about.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Ever since I was little, I've always been curious. Why doesn't the witch, who can use her magic to transform a shabby girl into someone lovely, cast a spell on herself? If she used her magic on herself, she could become lovely too. The witch does not use her magic on herself because she knows the emptiness that follows when the spell breaks.

author: Yuichi Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: I despise myself... because others are too kind to me...

author: Isogi Toshio
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: As long as the kindness received from others... is returned back, it's fine even if it takes time.

author: Isogi Toshio
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: There are always chances in life.

author: Isogi Toshio
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: I think that what people who've committed crimes need isn't punishment, but rather the knowledge of the pain of being forgiven.

author: Kuranosuke Koibuchi
title: Kuragehime
text: Every girl is born a princess, some of them just forget is all.

author: Yuusuke Kanda
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Anyone can say that he likes himself best. When you say that you like someone, you just end up liking yourself in the moment of being with that person, right?

author: Yuusuke Kanda
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: I think that no one wants to see others' sins.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: It's the most powerful words in the world. No just argument or eloquence can stand a chance against it. It's… ”So what?”

author: Olivier Poplan
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Even if the clothes are too large in the beginning, they'll fill out as you grow. The same goes for courage… The secret of not getting killed by the enemy is to underestimate life's difficulties.

author: Sakuya Tougane
title: Psycho-Pass 2
text: My role is to darken souls, even pure ones, until they become pitch black. By doing so, you can stay beautiful and shine bright, Mother. I do everything because of my love for you.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: You disappointed me. So I have to give you a punishment. Regret your helplessness and feel despair.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: So how long will it be, then? How long before you're no longer cursed to walk the earth...?

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: So laugh... demon... Laugh that arrogant laugh of yours... And remember, I beat you to it...

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: I want nothing more than to be a bayonet; a bayonet wielded by the hand of God. I would have been happy to be born a storm, or a divine threat; a mighty explosion or even a terrible hurricane. A divine force of nature without heart or pity. And if this relic can transform me into such a thing...then I am happy to abandon my humanity.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: Hold your tongue, the dead don't speak.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: Your voice sounds so lovely when you're whimpering in agony.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, let them be accursed at His coming. God save you from your fate. Amen!

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: What are humans' desires? What I think the most troublesome desire is the desire for attention. It's the source of jealousy and relationship problems, too.

author: Berserk
title: Berserk
text: Providence may guide a man to meet one specific person, even if such guidance eventually leads him to darkness. Man simply cannot forsake the beauty of his own chosen path. When will man learn a way to control his soul?

author: Berserk
title: Berserk
text: Dreams, ambition, love, hope; in this world, could the glories of a youthful heart be.. forbidden?

author: Dusty Attenborough
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: What we need now is not the diary of the past, but instead the calendar of the future.

author: Dusty Attenborough
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Either way, the only ones who can die tomorrow are those who survive today.

author: Berserk
title: Berserk
text: Dreams. Each man longs to pursue his dream. Each man is tortured by this dream, but the dream gives meaning to his life. Even if the dream ruins his life, man cannot allow himself to leave it behind. In this world, is man ever able to possess anything more solid, than a dream?

author: Griffith
title: Berserk
text: While many can pursue their dreams in solitude, other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds, even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. Dreams breathe life into men and can cage them in suffering. Men live and die by their dreams. But long after they have been abandoned they still smolder deep in men's hearts. Some see nothing more than life and death. They are dead, for they have no dreams.

author: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Humans always pursue things they can't reach. Doesn't it single-heartedly symbolize such yearnings?

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: Friendship might begin with getting picked, but I don't think that you can stop picking for yourself either. But in order to choose, there are things you need to know. And in order to get picked, you need them to know certain things.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: I'd rather fight and regret it than not fight and regret it.

author: Kawai Maria
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: "Those who believe will be saved". It's just that I wanted to find out whether you'll be saved if you believed. If such a thing were true, I feel like I can change myself too.

author: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: One victory greedily demands the next set of victories from the victor, until his death.

author: Shin Meguro
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: If you're friends with everyone, you become a popular guy in return; but then, you wouldn't have a place where you can be who you truly are.

author: Oskar von Reuenthal
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Regardless of the color of eyes or skin, the color of blood is the same for everyone, isn't it?

author: Yuusuke Kanda
title: Akuma To Love Song
text: To me, Kawai-san is like a mirror. A mirror that reflects all the bad parts about you. A devil-like mirror that contaminates your heart.

author: Kousei Arima
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: But I wasn't slacking at all. I practiced till I passed out. I gave my all. And if I still turned in a sloppy performance after all that, then... That's who I am now. It's the current me, playing with everything I've got.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Everybody has to display a certain loyalty to their paycheck. I was the same way. It isn't just a piece of paper, but a chain that binds people.

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: If you can move on, then you should.

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: Nothing can stay unchanged. Fun things… Happy things… They can't possibly remain the same.

author: Ichinose Kotomi
title: CLANNAD
text: The day before yesterday, I saw a rabbit. Yesterday, it was a deer. And today, it's you.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: Humans can't reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You'll be punished.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: Sometimes feelings get tangled together with deductions, forming a veil that hides the truth.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: Humans live behind masks.

author: Bulat
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: The hot blood that flows through my body... is not something that can be suppressed by other people!

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: Life comes at a cost. Wouldn't it be arrogant to die before you've repaid that debt?

author: Chihiro Sengoku
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: If you forced someone to do something they didn't want to do, they'd just end up hating life.

author: Jin Mitaka
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: You need to decide where you belong before anything else. If you can do that, you can decide what you want to do.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Neither terrorism nor occultism have ever impacted history in any constructive way.

author: Pharos
title: Persona 3
text: Time brings an end to all things. Even if we plug our ears and cover our eyes.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: In the long flow of time, living things know nothing of their ancestors, except for the genes they've inherited. Only mankind has history. Having a history differentiates mankind from all other living species. That's why I wanted to be a historian.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Perfection is a fairly nonexistent thing. If you couldn't do it, it was probably impossible for anybody else, too.

author: Olivier Poplan
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: One cannot live by jokes alone. But if there were no jokes, I'd rather not live.

author: Himeki Chifuyu
title: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
text: Listen up, Cookie. Summer break is a break. We forget about homework. That's common sense. Understand?

author: Hana N. Fontainestand
title: Hanayamata
text: See, "empty" just means you have plenty of room to take in all kinds of new things. Fun things, precious things, painful things, things you've never seen before!

author: Jonathan Mar
title: Jormungand
text: There are so many weapons scattered across my path that it makes me wonder if this world is made of little more than lead and gunpowder.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: <About Ciel> He turns his back towards the light without hesitation. That figure that charges into the abyss at a dignified pace. How beautiful and foolish.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: Put a steel mask on your face and armor on your heart.

author: Birthday
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: I just think we're missing out if we're not trying different things and having fun. Life's too short.

author: Punpun Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: I always believed that everyone in this world was far nicer and smarter than me. That no matter how unlikeable they seemed to be, they still had a good conscience and had justifiable circumstances for acting the way they did. That's why I hated myself for being so timid and depressed when I didn't even have any good reason for doing so. …But now I see that there actually are people who're despicable in every way and don't blink twice at ruining another's life. Now that I think about it, it's almost strange. Why don't most people try to kill other people? How can they just stand by and let the scum have their way without the slightest indifference? Maybe my expectations were too high. I'm only disappointed because I expected something from them. But the answer was quite simple all along. There's no such thing as a decent human being in this world. Not a single one. I did what I had to do. And I feel quite refreshed after doing it. That's why I can say that this world could afford to be a little more chaotic.

author: Konno Yuuki
title: Sword Art Online II
text: I always say what exactly what I'm feeling, and if they don't like me, that's fine! It doesn't change the fact that I was close to their hearts.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that.

author: Meiko Inoue
title: Solanin
text: I never knew that spending an entire day doing nothing could be so terrifying. A plague of what-ifs assaults me, spinning and whirling, even though thinking about them makes no difference.

author: Juri Arisugawa
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: There is only one person who you can each truly love. It's too bad that you can't change who that person is. If you could, the you both would be a lot happier.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Humans must think about living on. And, must also understand death. Most important, we must learn to understand the truth.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Instead of regretting what we cannot do, it is better to do what one can. Even for example, what you do has nothing to do with results, you must forge forward.

author: Rue Kuroha
title: Princess Tutu
text: The depths of despair…. I feel so calm here. I won't be tricked by anyone anymore, and I don't have to resent anyone. There's nothing here. Not even loving. Nothing but to keep dancing until I die away.

author: Oyasumi Punpun
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: Although Punpun didn't really want to think about what the point of having dreams that could never come true was… To have dreams and worries that you could talk frankly about… In a way, that was probably a more fulfilling lifestyle than his own, Punpun admitted. Being cool was merely a paper-thin difference away from being empty.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: The main reason I got stronger was so I'd be able to survive.

author: Chiaki Nanami
title: Super Dangan Ronpa 2
text: Believe in yourself... If you don't have that... it doesn't matter how many talents you have, you still won't be able to hold your head up high...

author: Sakuya Tougane
title: Psycho-Pass 2
text: My will is society's will. My eyes are society's eyes. Since you vowed to respect the law, you cannot deny me... no matter how much you despise latent criminals.

author: Jouji Saiga
title: Psycho-Pass 2
text: If the being casting judgment is perfect, then it has to judge itself as well.

author: Monk Zuikou
title: Samurai Champloo
text: Freedom, isn't something earned through suffering or pushing yourself. You must accept yourself just as you are and live according to the flow of things; that is true freedom.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: Even if it's dangerous, even if it lasts until the ends of the earth... I need to walk my path.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: If comrades that you trust gather around you, hope can take physical form and become visible. That`s what I believe...

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: Even if you're made a fool of by someone, even if the future becomes so dark that you can't see what's in front of you, even if the place we get to is the very end of the world, you and I are still together.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: Why shouldn't you quit, if that's what you really want to do? Everything will work out somehow.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: Nothing will progress while you can't make up your mind.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: You know why people stress over things? Because there aren't any easy answers.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: It'll still feel better to try and regret, than regret not trying at all.

author: Ritsuko Ayukawa
title: Solanin
text: I realized it one day. The lyrics I struggled to create are only made up so I would have something to sing. Nothing genuine can come out of these flat and boring and ambiguous lives we're living, out of faking your worries for the sake of it.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: Yeah, it might be totally stupid, but it's sad that you can't know yourself without being compared to others.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: Yeah, I know there's no right answer. All I know for sure is that time keeps on flowing like a river, and a river eventually leads to the ocean. Maybe I will try swimming against the current.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: No matter how well you get along together, sometimes the smallest of cracks turn into a lethal abyss in time.

author: Naruo Taneda
title: Solanin
text: We've got no light of hope in our future! Nothing is going to happen! Our lives will be as dull as rocks! Maybe it's a life of boring happiness! But I don't want to be an adult who pretends to be satisfied with it!

author: Kato Kenichi
title: Solanin
text: When you lose something, you gotta find something to take its place. I guess it's just time... for me to move forward for once.

author: Kato Kenichi
title: Solanin
text: Once you see a guy ignore the light in order to cross the street, you just can't stand still.

author: Jirō Yamada
title: Solanin
text: Why did I fall in love with music in the first place?

author: Jirō Yamada
title: Solanin
text: A band isn't so simple... that you can just mess around and keep it going.

author: Saeki Ryutaro
title: Solanin
text: I might seem to be on the losing side to you, but I'm still fighting... Not all battles happen in the brightest, flashiest spots.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: This town is overflowing with people, and each has their own worries, big or small... How many of them can truly say that they're happy?

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I'm begging you, don't make me a killer!

author: Luciano Bradley
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Do you know the truth of the battlefield? Kill a man normally, and it's considered a crime. But kill many on the battlefield and you become a hero!

author: Yugo Kuga
title: World Trigger
text: Know how strong you are... and do what you can do. If you misjudge your abilities on the battlefield... you'll get yourself killed.

author: Yukino Yukinoshita
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: People aren't all perfect. They're weak, ugly, and they get jealous and try to bring others down. Oddly enough, the better you are, the harder it is to live. That's why I'm going to change this world and the people in it...

author: Merlin
title: Nanatsu no Taizai
text: When some things contradict each other, you should look at the opposite side of everything. And when the meanings behind the seemingly unnatural actions are made clear, a completely different answer might be reached... Justice can become evil. Reality can become an illusion. Meaning can be found in something that appears meaningless. Think. And find the answer for yourselves. A human ceases to be once he or she stops thinking.

author: Yukino Yukinoshita
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I think, if you want to improve yourself, you should challenge your own limits.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: It's hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.

author: Bismarck Waldstein
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: War is merely one method of diplomacy. However, it is the least efficient one.

author: Charles Zi Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Only fools wage war.

author: Shirley Fenette
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Lelou? I'm glad that I could talk to you in the end. You know? When I got my memories back, I was so scared... A fake teacher... Friends with no memories... Everyone was... lying to me... It was as if... the whole world was watching over me... Lelou, you've been fighting... all by yourself against this world... All by yourself... So that's why... I wanted to become the one thing truthful to you... I love you, Lelou. Even when I knew you killed my father... I couldn't... bring myself to hate you. Even when you tried to make me forget everything... I still fell... in love with you again... Even when my memories were altered... I still fell in love again... No matter how many times I'm reborn... I'm sure I'll... fall in love with you again, Lelou... This... is fate, right? So, it's okay, right, Lelou? That I fall in love with you when I'm reborn... No matter... how many times... I'll... fall in... love with you...

author: Satomi Rentarou
title: Black Bullet
text: The scariest thing about killing people is getting used to it! When you kill someone and realize you won't be punished... That's when people forget all about punishment!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Throughout all of history, no wise king has ever forced his army to obey him through oppression. People will only truly fight for what is right. And there is only one thing that is truly right in this world! The one true, unchanging righteousness in the world is... cuteness! Cute makes right! All our needs, desires, and instincts seek cuteness, and it is for cuteness that we will give everything we have! That's just the way men are!

author: Bulat
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: You'll have some painful, despair-ridden experiences. In fact, most of them will be tragic. But we chose to walk this path. We'll take on the dirty work. And change the world. After we finish, we can disappear.

author: Wave
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: Protecting the powerless is simply a soldier's duty!

author: Syamaya Saki
title: Psycho Love Comedy
text: Everyone shows their true face on death's doorstep. Even a noble-minded gentlemen will cast away his principles to beg on the ground. Even a cordial and gentle lady will start cursing with a face like a demon's. Even a frivolous and humorous man will accept death without any punchlines... That is what I believe--The instant just prior to death is when all sorts of true natures will be revealed. Using fear and suffering leading straight to death, baring naked hearts to be admired at one's leisure... This is also one of the wonders of murder.

author: Kamiya Kyousuke
title: Psycho Love Comedy
text: Pull yourself up after falling and advance with resilience.

author: Kamiya Kyousuke
title: Psycho Love Comedy
text: Whether in a brawl or anything else, bones can be broken but the spirit must not yield. Once a decision was made, it must be upheld until the bitter end.

author: Kamiya Kyousuke
title: Psycho Love Comedy
text: Love is never without trials and tribulations--precisely because of that, there's bitterness. What do you think? The feelings from liking someone... cannot be satisfied by your own efforts alone. It's not the same as simple anger or sadness. One-sidedly declaring your feelings... this doesn't bring satisfaction. Only when the other person feels the same way... Only when two hearts love each other is fulfillment achieved.

author: Maou
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: I think that education will prove the most powerful force in this world.

author: William Massachusetts
title: Log Horizon
text: We lost. We got wiped out. We may be finished. Maybe it was all a waste. Like they always said... We're idiots who've wasted our time on something as pointless as games. Game junkies who never leave their houses. Vegetables. But who cares? We knew that all along. We knew it, and we do it anyway. But we love games. We chose this. And sometimes we'll win, and sometimes we'll lose. So what? We've dedicated our lives to it. So it's real!

author: Hak Son
title: Akatsuki no Yona
text: When you protect someone you want to keep safe, do you always weigh your own life against theirs?

author: Yui
title: Sword Art Online
text: Everyone smiles, when they are with you. Please... from now on, go and help people in my place. Share your happiness with them.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: You stole this world and it's people. You're a king of thieves, alone upon a stolen throne!

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: If  you are lookin' back all the time, you'll never get ahead!

author: Maou
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: Do evil, get caught, then claim demons were brainwashing you. A common way that human politicians evade responsibility.

author: Maou
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: Keeping all the wealth for yourself may make your rich, but it won't make you prosperous. You give people money, and they spend it. True prosperity comes from a free flow of wealth and goods.

author: Rika Suzuki
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: If people want to, they can become angels or demons themselves.

author: Rika Suzuki
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: There's no way of telling what people will do when their entire world gets turned upside down. There are people who selfishly take advantage  of the chaos and nice people who try to help others before even worrying about themselves.

author: Ashiya Shirou
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: Sometimes it's necessary to courageously retreat.

author: Chiho Sasaki
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: I fell for you out of my own free will. So if I ever fall out of love, that'll be my own decision too.

author: Emi Yusa
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: The peaceful world I'm fighting for is one where everyone has a smile on their face, not one where I have to pretend I didn't see you make my friend cry. I don't think that kind of peace is worth fighting for. And I don't think it's worth making sacrifices to achieve it.

author: Puppet Master
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: Life is like a node which is born within the flow of information. As a species of life that carries DNA as its memory system... man gains his individuality from the memories he carries. While memories may as well be the same as fantasy... it is by these memories that mankind exists.

author: Puppet Master
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: All things change in a dynamic environment. Your effort to remain what you are is what limits you.

author: Puppet Master
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: And can you offer me proof of your existence? How can you, when neither modern science nor philosophy can explain what life is?

author: Kurama
title: Elfen Lied
text: Regret is the domain of those who have earned the right to look back at the past. All I have is shame.

author: Kiyotaka Ishimaru
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: There is no greater accomplishment in life than pushing yourself to the limit, always! Isn't that so? That's all there is to it!

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: The city is changing. Our surroundings, and even ourselves. And then one day, just about everything will change…

author: Fujibayashi Ryou
title: CLANNAD
text: Please don't apologize. If you did, and I forgave you, then it'd be like it was all a lie. I want to hold those memories we had dear. The fun times… The painful times… All of it. So please, don't apologize.

author: Sunohara Youhei
title: CLANNAD
text: You're the spore of a flower. You'll be going on a trip, taken away by the wind. To go to new places and meet new people. You shouldn't always rely on your sister. Even if you're apart, your bonds still remain. That's what family is.

author: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: It's good that good friends can say their true thoughts out, as it shows how good their relationship. It's something worth celebrating over… but things just won't be that smooth sailing. Some things are only 'good' once they're hidden. Once others know of the truth, what's left in the heart may only be regret.

author: Sagara Misae
title: CLANNAD
text: If you get all worked up yourself, you'll always get someone who'll rebel. Being too eager brings negative results.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: What's important is not losing sight of your path.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Who'll give up when it comes to such a mere setback? We haven't lost yet! We'll kneel on the floor and regret only after all possibilities are exhausted!

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: People normally say that mood and body have a close relationship. As the heart becomes weaker, the body will fall ill; and as the body falls ill, the heart becomes weaker. Thus, when humans are weak, they will have negative thoughts.

author: Yoshii Akihisa
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Fear comes from within, and isn't something that can be conquered psychologically in such a short while.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Nobody will be happy being told off for something they never did.

author: Mine
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: Only I can help myself, and in the future, I can make up for all my misfortunes and change the world into a place where there's no irrational discrimination and that's why there's no way in hell that I can die here!

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: When you are experienced you can become overly confident and such confidence can prove fatal.

author: Crusty
title: Log Horizon
text: Living your life to the fullest 'til the moment of your death, this is the rule to live by in any world.

author: Diethard Ried
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: At times the life of a single man is worth more than that of a million, I thought that'd be common sense to a soldier.

author: Hisoka
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi
text: Between dreams and reality is the vault of your soul. No one could see the “Dream World” without this path.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi
text: On this hand, imagine that these four fingers represent the animals, and the thumb represents plants. Then let's say people are here... On the tip of the middle finger, farthest from the heart.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Legend Of Korra
text: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.

author: Satone Shichimiya
title: Chuunibyou Demo Koi Ga Shitai!
text: The moment you say a word of parting, you've already parted. So long as you and I are both somewhere in this world, we haven't parted. So long as you don't say it, you haven't parted.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: What a laughable attempt. You should just stay where you are, groveling at my feet.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I am the shadow that has overcome the light.

author: Meruem
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Violence is the greatest power of the world!

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: That's right. I'm nice. After everything that has happened in my life, I still haven't gone after anyone or anything in revenge. If I were normal I would have destroyed the world by now. In a sense it makes me a savior of sorts.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Knowing more means having more shit to deal with, you know.

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: Loneliness is peaceful, but there'll be no one to share happiness with.

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: This world is full of secrets meant never to be disturbed.

author: Mato Kuroi
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: This is my darkness. Nothing anyone says can console me.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: In this world, when you face forward, that's the future. When you look back, it's a memory. And if you clip a part of it out, that becomes a story.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: Being indebted to someone is nothing to be ashamed of. Not repaying that debt is.

author: Yuuji Kazami
title: Grisaia no Kajitsu
text: I was feeling down, but you distracted me by subjecting me to your selfish whims. There are times when selfishness can save a person.

author: Solf J. Kimblee
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Good… death is chasing me. Ones who kill are also chased by death, always living alongside death… Jobs that risk one's soul are truly beautiful! How rewarding… my battlefield!

author: Akiyama Sou
title: Ushinawareta Mirai wo Motomete
text: It's not that I'm not sure or anything. I actually don't want to think about it. It's not that I don't care about the future, but I'm mystified as to why I should have to be in a rush to narrow things down right this minute. It's not that I'm trying to escape from it, but I want a little more of what I have now, easy and... or rather, spending time having fun. That's kind of how I feel.

author: Sasaki Kaori
title: Ushinawareta Mirai wo Motomete
text: The closer you are to someone, the more you have to put things into words to get your feelings across.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text: Seeing them as the same is wrong. It's a touchy subject, but the weight of something you bear with your own power and with someone else's are different.

author: Maiko Shuu
title: Nisekoi
text:
In the end, mustering the courage to confess is up to the people 

concerned.

author: Gensei
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: If a person continues killing, their heart changes into that of a demon without them even noticing.

author: Gensei
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: Old, young, man, woman,  a life is a life. Sinner or Saint it makes no difference at all.

author: Sheele
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: No matter how many good deeds you perform, your past sins cannot be erased.

author: No-Sense
title: Coppelion
text: The world is a dark place... because you have a gloomy look on your face.

author: Kurome
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: To kill the one you love... If someone else will do it anyway, I'd rather do it myself.

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Nanika, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?

author: Nenji Kashiwazaki
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Who falls for who depends completely on the person. If there are a hundred people, there are a hundred ways to love... There never is one absolute form of love.

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Once my stomach settles down... You better be prepared, 'cause we'll really give you something to cry about in the mat... ugh... ch... uughh...

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text: It's true that I'm not very tall. However! I can jump!

author: Yuu Nishinoya
title: Haikyuu!!
text: I kept the ball in the air, it's not your place to give up.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: Magic is not meant to be used to kill people... but without power we can't even protect the ones we love...

author: Tobio Kageyama
title: Haikyuu!!
text: You don't win alone. That's just how it is.

author: Shōyō Hinata
title: Haikyuu!!
text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Kiyoko Shimizu
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Little by little, what you've begun will naturally become important to you. What you need at the start is a little bit of curiosity.

author: Mako Fujisaki
title: Brynhildr in the Darkness
text: Lives are never of equal value. There is always a ranking order.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: You came without fear. Don't have any regrets, no matter what happens. This is the duel you wanted.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: You just went for my head, didn't you? You know you could kill someone by hitting a vital spot in their head, right? If you know this, then you were trying to kill me, right? So whatever I do next is what you deserve, right?

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Because they saved me from myself, they rescued me from my loneliness. They were the first to accept me for who I am. They're my friends.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: They all grow up, the youths that are going to live in this era. Go forward, youths. Like a wind on a field. Your burning blood, sweat, and tears... are as beautiful as a parasol. Show no fear, youths.

author: Wendy Marvell
title: Fairy Tail
text: The fact that I'm standing here means that I'm resolved to fight for my guild. I do not need your sympathy. As long as I'm still standing, please come at me with all you've got! Please do!

author: Furukawa Akio
title: CLANNAD
text: It's natural that men have things they need to protect.

author: Kanade Tachibana
title: Angel Beats!
text: Truly and deeply, thank you for giving, my life to me.

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: You shouldn't stop like that. If you can move forward, then you should.

author: Teppei Kiyoshi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Team isn't just something to be protected. A team also protects you. We don't support each because we are a team. We are a team because we support each other.

author: Akame
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: As the survivors, we carry the feelings of those who've passed away on our shoulders.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: It's kinda scary how much people trust me.

author: Mine
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: Wrong or not, I'll follow my own path!

author: Murasaki
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: People like you disgust me. You can't even face your own weakness.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: In this crazy-ass world, there's no point in playing the blame game.

author: Ai Kotani
title: Solanin
text: When people truly get serious about something, all you can do is stay quiet and watch.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: When you close your eyes and look at the world, what do you see?

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: I, Okazaki Nagisa, will no longer cry. No matter what painful things I face, I'll hang in there and overcome it. But, I might cry during moments of happiness. I hope that you can get along… with someone like me.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: Ashes to ashes. Dust to dust. We are nothing, but dust and to dust we shall return. Amen.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: Violence is never the right answer, unless used against heathens and monsters.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji: Book of Circus
text: We mock their desperate wishes, and trample them like insects! Cowardly, base - we're more demonic than demons are! I'm just like them. I'm full of the same ugliness they were. This is how humans are. It's how we are, Sebastian!

author: Five
title: Terror in Resonance
text: Playing a game by yourself is boring. You need a loser to crush so badly they can't recover.

author: Lain Iwakura
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: What isn't remembered never happened.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: The Bird of the Hermes is my name, eating my wings to make me tame.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: The moment a person says he's working hard without thinking, he's still being naive. He is not trying at all!

author: Elliot Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Your so-called "self-sacrifice" only satisfies yourself. Do you think you can save people with it? You're only protecting yourself! You don't know the suffering endured by those left alive. With your childish actions, you're only pushing the pain onto other people!

author: Kyōko Kirigiri
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: If you make light of other people's emotions, it will surely come back to bite you.

author: Monokuma
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Every living person is bound to have embarrassing memories and things that they want to keep secret.

author: Kiyotaka Ishimaru
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Girls could never understand the passionate bonds that we men share. Male friendship is a bond that runs thicker than blood!

author: Mondo Oowada
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: A man's weight consists nothing but what he burdens himself with.

author: Hattori Heiji
title: Detective Conan
text: Humans are suspicious and jealous creatures. When they see something perfect, they wanna find a flaw.

author: Himeko Inaba
title: Kokoro Connect
text: Don't forget that kindness can hurt people too.

author: Teshigawara Naoya
title: Another
text: Don't mess with things that don't exist! It's dangerous!

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: He who is blessed with strength should become the guide. That is all.

author: Arata Kohata
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: You know… When something bad happens, I don't like thinking it was someone else's fault. See, if it's someone else's fault, then there's nothing I, personally, can do about it. I want to think it's all up to me. If that's the case, then I can do something about the things that go wrong. Then I can always run and always fly.

author: Mato Kuroi
title: Black Rock Shooter
text: You're wrong! None of that makes any sense! Grief and suffering isn't something that can be taken away by dying in a fight! You have to resolve your problems by talking and explaining your points of view. Relying on others for it is wrong!

author: Fujibayashi Kyou
title: CLANNAD
text: Isn't there something strange in becoming friends because you're asked? Friends aren't given; you're supposed to make them.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: What are you so hesitant about? It's your dream, isn't it? It's right in front of you and you're wavering? You gotta be reckless, and take whatever you can!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: You are who you are. You have to do what you can.

author: Saitama
title: One-Punch Man
text: The true power of us human beings is that we can change ourselves on our own.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Loneliness is a sickness that leads to death.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Sometimes, the questions are complicated - and the answers are simple.

author: Takumi Usui
title: Kaichou Wa Maid-Sama!
text: Love, passion, why do we get caught up by such troublesome feelings? The mind couldn't ever get things straight, and you lose control to know what is sensible. Deep down it's all so vexing.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you love someone, they could make you sad. They could even make you feel lonely sometimes. But, that someone can also make you happier than you'll ever be.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi
text: The sun rises today and sets again. A flower that bloomed in the morning, falls from its stem. The sun sets today and rises again. Flowers bloom to fill the land, but not the flowers of yesterday...

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text:
People... humans are the being who look for happiness. What the Britannian boy, Lelouch, wanted to have was nothing but a small happiness. It's nothing special. At least at the root of his motives, there were only humble wishes that were simply natural to any human. Who could ever disclaim such dreams and such vows? Who could ever have the right to do that? However, whoever you might be, without choice, you have to deal with others and with the world, and have yourself be regulated and set down. Therefore, in the face of the world's wills, your personal speculations are so ephemeral they can't help being overwhelmed. Sins and punishments, destiny and judgment. What stands in front of Lelouch is the past he brought forth by himself. Is it a hatred resulting from the fact that humans are humans? Nonetheless, for now, we should be grateful... Yes, at least, to the fact that humans are the beings who look for happiness. 
A remaining piece of hope, a faint sign of wishes will be born from despairs.

author: Yakumo Oomori
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Doing what one likes is the right of the powerful.

author: Mana Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: No matter what happens, no matter what, never stop, always keep walking.

author: Yuzuru Shino
title: Seven Days
text: It's human nature to judge by appearance. It's not just males who are superficial. No one bothers about things they cannot see... like the heart.

author: Mei Misaki
title: Another
text: There are no guarantees. But if there's a chance it could help everyone avoid the calamity, isn't it worth it? It's sad when people die.

author: Reiko Mikami
title: Another
text: But if that's what you want to do, you might as well try. It's just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.

author: Reiko Mikami
title: Another
text: That's important, isn't it? Whether you look good or pathetic in your own eyes.

author: Noriko Paku
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: I don't like someone who makes a fool out of earnest people.

author: Fujimoto Shirou
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: Little fool, demons exist, all right. They're inside our hearts.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.

author: Rize Kamishiro
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: There are times when you have to give up on one thing to preserve the other. Your mother couldn't. That isn't kindness. That's just being weak.

author: Kishou Arima
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: Sometimes good people make bad choices. It doesn't mean they are bad people. It means they're human.

author: Akari Mizunashi
title: Aria the Animation
text: Mysterious things, when you were a child you used to think "They exist for sure!", but all of a sudden it changes to, "It would be nice if they existed." I wonder when and why you stop believing.

author: Rayneshia El-Arte Corwen
title: Log Horizon
text: Protecting someone means giving them a place to belong. Giving them a place where they can be happy.

author: Itoshiki Nozomu
title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei
text: People tend to show off their act of kindness. It is not an act of good will, it is a demand because they are expecting a word of grace as a reward.

author: Makino Fumito
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: The brighter they shine, the darker the shadow grows.

author: Tetsudō Hisakawa
title: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
text: Goodbyes aren't a one-sided affair!

author: Nagi Sanzenin
title: Hayate no Gotoku!
text: Forgiving someone and being forgiven, that's what binds people together.

author: Kouta Hirano
title: Highschool Of The Dead
text: Humans don't see what they don't want to see. No one wants to be put down. That's why people do nothing even when they do know something is happening.

author: Hidetora Toujo
title: Beelzebub
text: A world where power is everything. A world where the weak are trampled on and crushed. That's why I… prayed to get stronger. To be strong like him.

author: Nagi Sanzenin
title: Hayate no Gotoku!
text: Words are imperfect. Putting it in words will just create misunderstandings. Words are the root of misunderstandings.

author: Aladdin
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: If you follow your rage into battle, I have a feeling that terrible things can happen.

author: Kuroyukihime
title: Accel World
text:
You're always in my mind and it makes me both happy and sad.
I guess that's what it feels like to be in love.

author: Chiriko Tsurumi
title: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
text: I'm not the same as you. I'll never dream about things that I know won't come true.

author: Taichi Mashima
title: Chihayafuru
text: Love is hating someone but you still want to be with them.

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: What good are dreams, if all you do is work? There's more to life than hitting the books, I hope you know.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Every time I deal with another person, I'm reminded how little control I have over my life.

author: Tōdō Kaoru
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: When you're upset, try making the intelligent decision. And then, you might actually get something you want for a change.

author: Tetsudō Hisakawa
title: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
text: People do change, little by little.

author: Io Otonashi
title: Acchi Kocchi
text: The briefest glimpse of your smile is far more dazzling than any fireworks display.

author: Minagi Tohno
title: Air
text: People can't live without their memories. But hey can't live on their memories alone either. They have to wake up from their dreams. Those dreams will become sadness if they don't. Even if you wake up from your dream, your memories will still be there. So please smile. I want our memories to be happy to the very end. I wish everyone would keep smiling so that everyone could be happy and everybody could be warmer.

author: Yukito Kunisaki
title: Air
text: There is a meaning for wings that cannot fly! It's a precious memory of when you once flew in the sky.

author: Sogiita Gunha
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: ...And the unbreaking bonds will... The bonds will... Ah, what was it? Ah, well. There was a bunch of stuff about the unbreakable bonds that you'll have to deal with while your guts overflow! Show the results of your everyday training and guts! Show off that splendor and guts to those weaklings without it! To make this tournament the best memory ever! By overcoming all sorts obstacles through trial and hardship and getting up everytime we fall down! OVERCOME EVERYTHING WITH GUTS!!

author: Tendou Kisara
title: Black Bullet
text: It is not justice that can oppose evil. It is an absolute evil that overpowers evil itself.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: God gave us eyes at the front of our heads so we can look forward to the future.

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: I have someone I like. I never had the confidence and I've doubted my feelings countless of times. But, when she stays by my side and smiles with me, I feel like I can do anything.

author: Fay D. Flourite
title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: Crying when you need to cry is another way to show strength.

author: Doumeki Haruka
title: xxxHOLiC
text: One day a man had a dream. He dreamed that he was a butterfly. He fluttered and fluttered, flew and flew. He so loved the feeling of freedom that he decided that he was a butterfly. But when he woke up, he wasn't a butterfly. He was a human after all. Then the man thought, "I wonder if I, The Man, dreamed that I was a butterfly or if this moment is truly the dream. Maybe the man I am now is a dream that a butterfly is having.

author: Irisviel von Einzbern
title: Fate/zero
text: I am who I am because I learned your ideals and took your prayers to the heart. You've guided me. You've given me a life a mere puppet wouldn't have. You need not to pity me. I am a part of you.

author: Zeniba
title: Spirited Away
text: Nothing that happens is ever forgotten, even if you can't remember it.

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: They may all look the same to you, but there are different kinds and different levels of evil. A first-class villain doesn't target honest lives.

author: Hiro Hirono
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: It doesn't matter what the essence of it is. The truth is what's hidden inside.

author: Nobuchika Ginoza
title: Psycho-Pass
text: As a leader, you need to learn from the mistakes of others, not your own.

author: Mitsuki Sarue
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: No matter what troubles you shoulder, remember that in time, things will change. You shouldn't blame yourself when things don't go your way.

author: Seiya Kanie
title: Amagi Brilliant Park
text: If you wanna make people dream, you've gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: Children, this is the only gift I can give you right now. A formless gift you call a memory. I don't have any money and I can't give you something tangible. But even so, even if it isn't tangible, a memory is something that will continue to be with you. That is what I believe…

author: Sumeragi Lee Noriega
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00: A Wakening of the Trailblazer
text: Strong emotions are what connect people. If you truly want to understand each other, don't stop thinking about them.

author: Kuu Hizuri
title: Skip Beat!
text: If you find a raw diamond, wanting it to become polished is natural right?

author: Kureo Mado
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: When you're in front of the enemy, even if your hands are trembling - fight.

author: Kyoko Mogami
title: Skip Beat!
text: I think that loving someone is utterly useless. The more you want to be loved the more it will make you miserable

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You can't change the world without getting your hands dirty.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Don't use such strong words. It'll only make you look weak.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Our crying for them won't bring the dead back to life.

author: Hikari Sakishima
title: Nagi no Asukara
text: Whether you like me or not, the fact that you're precious to me won't change, no matter what.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: After spending most of my life trying to live as someone else wanted, I'd apparently forgotten who I was.

author: Haku
title: Spirited Away
text: You still haven't noticed that something precious to you has been replaced.

author: Ayato Naoi
title: Angel Beats!
text: No matter what kind of past you had, don't lose sight of yourself.

author: Ribbons Almark
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Whether you like it or not, time will leave you behind. In the same way that your beauty will wither away with time. In order to cling to the glorious past, people achieve peace by hurting others. People know it isn't the right thing to do, but they're unable to stop any of it. Wouldn't you agree that someone needs to teach them a lesson?

author: Saji Crossroad
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: No one knows what's going to happen to the world. But I believe we have the ability to deal with that. Although we cannot change the past - we can change the future. We can change it into the world we desire.

author: Lockon Stratos
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: I came to believe that a world where people can understand each other isn't impossible. That's why even if the world rejects me... even if the world blames me... I'll keep on fighting.

author: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Reflecting upon death, one appreciates life. If that's the case, does it take a mistake for people to choose the right path? Behold the brilliance of the heavens burdened with sin.

author: Ribbons Almark
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Even since the industrial revolution, humanity has used its technological knowledge for conflict and repeatedly risked its own extinction. Though great leaders appeared at times, they'd reach the end of their lives in a few decades... and the world would return to a state of chaos.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text:
Kabuto: Isn't acknowledging what you can't do the same as giving up?

Itachi: No, it means to forgive yourself for what you aren't able to do. Your comrades are there to make up for what you cannot do and to prevent you from ignoring things that you actually might have been able to do.

author: Mondo Oowada
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: It's okay to feel depressed. It takes time to overcome things. And then, by taking that time, you just start moving forward again. That's just what humans do.

author: Gon Freecss
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: If you want to get to know someone, find out what makes them angry.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If you stick to a "lie", it'll eventually become the "truth".

author: Minami Ryusuke
title: Beck
text: The stronger a person looks, the weaker he is.

author: Tsukihi Araragi
title: Nekomonogatari: Kuro
text: You can come up with any number of reasons why you love someone. Like they are cool, or kind, or tall, or rich. There are all sorts of reasons you can say, but those are all lies. They're just excuses you tell yourself to rationally justify your emotions. Well, not so much excuses, as tricks. It's like a ladder you climb, based on the conclusion that you love them. When you feel like you want to be together forever, that's love.

author: Ferrari Akira E.
title: Aria the Origination
text: If there are people you would call naturals, because they were gifted with talent, and if my two rivals (Florence Alicia and Glory Athena) are such naturals, then I just need to have a talent that exceeds theirs, through hard work. Yes, I just have to become a prodigy.

author: Ana Gram
title: Phi Brain: Kami No Puzzle
text: I think... memories never disappear. Just like the paint I use. Even if I mix it with a new color. The old one still remains. Forever.

author: Akane Senri
title: Rewrite
text: Love is nothing more than a cultural idea attached to our pre-existing genetic needs to reproduce and gain recognition from our peers.

author: Integra Hellsing
title: Hellsing
text: You want me to roll over like a dog? Give up, and accept defeat.. Ha! That seems to be the sort of language that your kind is used to using. Language for cowards who forfeited their humanity, because they were too weak to survive as such. Don't look down on humans, you monsters. Come on. I'll send you all to hell.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Once you question your own belief, it's over.

author: Ryōsuke Kirishima
title: Sket Dance
text: Friends are treasures, help each other and value the bonds you have. Even if someone betrays you, never betray anyone yourself. And if someone's in trouble, don't just walk on by.

author: Goyle
title: Blood Lad
text: The past is not what needs to be rectified. We learn from the past to rectify the future.

author: Kyoko Mogami
title: Skip Beat!
text: If a sorry could resolve everything, why would there be a need for hell in this world?

author: Haruki Aritomi
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: The Idealist says, everyone is born equal. We are all of equal worth. The sportsman screams, no effort goes unrewarded. Work hard for your dreams! It's about how you play the game. Obviously all untrue.

author: Akuto Sai
title: Demon King Daimao
text: Living your life sympathizing with others in your everyday life is more powerful, than living your life based on a religious belief or some story.

author: Jet Black
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Humans were meant to work and sweat for their money after all. Those that try to get rich quickly or live at expense of others - all get divine retribution along the way. That is the lesson. But, one thing about humans is that they quickly forget the lesson they have learnt.

author: Kyoko Mogami
title: Skip Beat!
text: I think that loving someone is utterly useless. The more you want to be loved the more it will make you miserable.

author: Kou Mabuchi
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: Caring for things brings a lot of trouble.

author: Kouta Tsuchiya
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: ...Who decided a student can't win against a teacher?!

author: Kirishima Shouko
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: I just like those who try their best, even when they're afraid.

author: Setsuna F. Seiei
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Anyone can smile if you give them something to be happy about.

author: Emi Yusa
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: You don't have to be reasonable when you're in love.

author: Kirishima Shouko
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Love hurts. But it can hurt worse if you allow your eyes to wander.

author: Saruhiko Fushimi
title: K Project
text: The day when you'll understand me... will never come...

author: Sumeragi Lee Noriega
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: I'm sorry. But, you know? I'm only human. It's natural that I'll fail on occasion.

author: Sakamoto Tatsuma
title: Gintama
text: Planets are just places for people to stand on. Planets are just rocks. It takes people to make it a world. You can have as many "Earths" as you want. I only care about what's inside.

author: Rin Asogi
title: Rin ~Daughters of Mnemosyne~
text: I can't promise you that good things will come to your life, but I do know that no one but you have the power to give meaning to your life in this world.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: If you believe in it, it is real. If you do not - it is fiction.

author: Tenka Kumō
title: Donten ni Warau
text: Cry... yell... act tough... be proud of the way you live... LAUGH!

author: Hallelujah Haptism
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Don't push your feelings onto others. No matter what pretty words you use, your kindness is just hypocrisy. You're pretending to be nice only to make yourself feel better.

author: Motoko Kusanagi
title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
text: We weep for the blood of a bird, but not for the blood of a fish. Blessed are those with a voice. If the dolls could speak, no doubt they'd scream, "I didn't want to become human".

author: Renya Kagurazaka
title: Kamisama To Unmei Kakumei No Paradox
text: Our fates... can be changed. All we have to do is try.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Forget about revenge. The fate of those who seek revenge is grim. It's tragic, You will end up suffering and hurting yourself even more. Even if you do succeed in getting revenge, the only thing that remains is emptiness.

author: Susanoo
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: No matter how sturdy something appears, it should have some weakness.

author: Esdeath
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: The weak are destined to lie beneath the boots of the strong. If that angers you, overcome your deficits.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: It's certainly good to be smart, but I think it's better that there are all kinds of people in the world

author: Saya Minatsuki
title: Black Cat
text: A guy with only a cat for a friend won't look attractive by playing cool.

author: Kayo Senju
title: Black Bullet
text: Once you expect something in return, your good deed is no longer just a good deed.

author: Yuca Collabell
title: Immortal Rain
text: If reality is nothing more than what is in our mind, then what is the difference between this world and a dream?

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.

author: Sai
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: Even if I force myself to smile. It seems I'm the type of person who ends up being hated.

author: Taishi Ichimiya
title: Servant X Service
text: The longer you keep a secret, the harder it becomes to say it.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Dedication is a talent all on its own.

author: Mitsuki Nase
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: Individuality that stands apart from the rest is a great asset.

author: Zeref
title: Fairy Tail
text: There are things in this world that you cannot oppose, no matter how hard you try.

author: Saji Crossroad
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Search out the facts, then string them all together... and that's when the truth will be revealed.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: My childhood was filled with blood and strife. I have never needed love. Not then, not now.

author: Wave
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: If you see a girl lookin' unhappy, be a man and help her.

author: Kaneki Ken
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: What's wrong isn't me, what's wrong is the world!

author: Akame
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: It's because I loved her the most that I wanted to kill her as swiftly as possible.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Goodbyes are only one side of the coin. You can't say goodbye until you've said hello.

author: Brian Jay
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: "Are you prepared to die?". Most astronauts answer with a simple "yes", but you can say anything. It's just a weak yes. You shouldn't be prepared to die. Instead, you should have the resolve to live until the very end! If there's someone who replies "no", you can trust them.

author: Fairy Tail
title: Fairy Tail
text: Sincere feelings transcend time and connect hearts.

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Don't give up! There's no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: If you can't see what's important, then it's because you're too ashamed to open your eyes.

author: Toto Sakigami
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Weak humans are sly and irresponsible, they always put the blame on and hurt others.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: Don't you think that true memories are a combination of fun ones and painful ones?

author: Akasaka Ryuunosuke
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Being able to realize your own fault is a virtue.

author: Kousaka Kirino
title: Ore No Imouto Ga Konna Ni Kawaii Wake Ga Nai
text: Cheer up. No matter how hopeless you are, even if everyone else abandons you, I'll always be here for you.

author: Shiki Tohno
title: Shingetsutan Tsukihime
text: You don't understand death at all. That's why you can't kill me, and why you're only able to kill a weakened woman. If you could see death, you couldn't maintain your sanity. All you can perceive is the part which keeps things alive. If you could see death, you wouldn't be able to even stand... It's like the world on the moon, a desolate wasteland. Being able to see the "death" of things means you are forced to see the world's uncertainty and fragility. The ground is like it's not there, and the sky seems about to fall at any moment. You don't know of the illusion that the whole world could perish in an instant. That is what it means to see death. These eyes, this power isn't something you can boast about like you did. Do you see your mistake, now, vampire? Life and death may be back to back, but they will never face each other. I'll show you. This is what it means to kill something.

author: Donquixote Rosinante
title: One Piece
text: I'll die smiling! Because if you ever think of me in the future, I want you to remember me smiling.

author: Kousaka Kyousuke
title: Ore No Imouto Ga Konna Ni Kawaii Wake Ga Nai
text: Even if I know you'll reject me, even if I'm afraid you won't accept me, even if I know it will really hurt if you dump me - I still have to tell you how I feel!

author: Mizuki Hayama
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: After all, lying for someone's sake doesn't make it a lie.

author: Mizuki Hayama
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: No matter how much you treasure them, both people and things will die someday. The bonds, the feelings, the memories, the hearts, and the lives. There's nothing in this world that won't die. There's nothing that won't break. Happiness is nothing more than a fabrication; a false mirage. That's why... That's why we should treasure them. So that we can face the farewell that'll one day visit us without regret. Because it'll break, it is precious. Let's make it precious.

author: Amamiya Yuuko
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: A miracle never comes to those who seek it.

author: Kidou Eita
title: Ore no Kanojo to Osananajimi ga Shuraba Sugiru
text: None of that will ever happen. I hate myself! But still, I have to keep these fantasies going! If I have a thousand of them, at least one of them might come true one day. If you stop fantasizing, you have no choice but to be crushed by reality.

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: Every brilliant day should be lived for those who passed away.

author: Inori Yuzuriha
title: Guilty Crown
text: Even if everyone calls you a liar, even if you hate yourself, I'll be on your side.

author: Kairi
title: Kingdom Hearts 2
text: Thinking of you wherever you are. We pray for our sorrows to end, and hope that our hearts will blend. Now I will step forward to realize this wish. And who knows... starting a new journey may not be so hard, or maybe it has already begun. There are many worlds, but they share the same sky... one sky, one destiny.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: You should realize that there are people whose hearts break each time they see you hurt yourself.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I can't tell you that… You have to figure it out. Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them. You're strong enough to make your own path.

author: Rayneshia El-Arte Corwen
title: Log Horizon
text: Adventurers are free. They are more free than we are. It's true that we may be weaker than they are. But that doesn't mean that, in our weakness, we can become aggressive. We don't have the right to take advantage of our weakness and use them as tools!

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Monogatari Series: Second Season
