text: Humans have a desire for truth or they have a desire to what they know is the truth. In other words, what the truth is exactly second to that. Be careful of what is the truth and what is lie. In other words, always doubt yourself. Harbor an inner devil as you read along... and I won't forget to add that by that point, you might have already fallen into my trap.

author: Saya Kisaragi
title: Blood-C
text: I make my own decisions, and see them to the very end. I had to find my resolve, so I could remain true to myself.

author: Ging Freecss
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.

author: Kaori Miyazono
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: If you can't move with your hands then play with your feet! If you don't have enough fingers, then use your nose as well! Whether you're sad, you're a mess, or you've hit rock bottom, you still have to play! That's how people like us survive.

author: Inori Yuzuriha
title: Guilty Crown
text: I'm fine with being a monster. I'm fine with having fake emotions. But I'll protect Shu. Because I am me! Even if I'm just a fake… To me, I'm the only… real one!

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I will do what I can, even if my chance of passing is minuscule, if that will allow me to move forward.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And to us, this simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I lost my pawns, my knight, my rook, my bishop, and even my queen. But, it's not checkmate, just yet.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Even if I can't see you… Even if we are separated far apart from each other… I'll always be watching after you. I'll definitely watch over you forever…

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: In that case, you have nothing to fear. Mistakes aren't made by locking your feelings away and holding back… They're made while wearing your heart on your sleeve.

author: Ukai Keishin
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Because people don't have wings... We look for ways to fly.

author: Meliodas
title: Nanatsu no Taizai
text: Everyone has to die someday. But what they believed in will never fade away as long as someone protects it. Once you've resolved to take on those principles, no matter how much blood and tears you shed, you follow through with it! That's what it means to be a knight.

author: Shio Sakaki
title: Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
text: Life isn't about what can and can not be done, it's about doing it or not doing it!

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Listen up, brats! Today's defeat is the seed for tomorrow's victory! We'll rise up and show them! We don't know the meaning of giving up!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Comrades are comrades because they help each other out.

author: Saki Morimi
title: Eden of the East
text: Most people are irresponsible, changing their opinions easily based on unconfirmed information or convenient rumors.

author: Yuri Nakamura
title: Angel Beats!
text: We have no choice but to accept the one and only life we're given, no matter how cruel and heartless it might be.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: There is no such thing as perfect in this world. That may sound cliche, but it's the truth. The average person admires perfection and seeks to obtain it. But what's the point of achieving perfection? There is none. Nothing. Not a single thing. I spit on perfection! If something is perfect, then there is nothing left. There is no room for imagination. No place left for that person to gain additional knowledge or abilities. Do you know what that means? For scientists such as us, perfection only brings despair. It is our job to create things more wonderful than anything before them, but never to obtain perfection. A scientist must be a person who finds ecstasy while suffering from that antinomy.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Revenge that involves unrelated people isn't valid at all. All he's doing is hiding his vengeful hate with the title of God's representative and acting sublime.

author: Hayato Furinji
title: Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
text: When going on an adventure it's hard to stay calm. As humans, even if we know the adventure will be full of pain and sorrow, we still choose to go on it. Real adventures are not like the ones depicted in games or comic books - they're neither easy nor quick and they can break a person's heart. Real adventures can torment people. They can make you regret ever going on them. But still, that's the true meaning of an adventure. If that's so, then why do we, as people, choose to go on them? Why is that? Because we want to be heroes. Real heroes don't give up, even in front of pain or sorrow or regret! Rather, they want to live a full life. That's what real heroes are!

author: Happy
title: Fairy Tail
text: They are your words! This is your heart! Our desire to help our friends belongs to us!

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: There were many times I felt on the verge of giving up… And many times when I met with big trouble, and met with some really tough opponents… But during that time, he would always be there. And so would everyone else from the guild. Crying together, laughing together, so many of these things. Well, a lot of things really did take place… I'm sure that's the way it should be… I'm sure that everybody carries a certain burden of their own. But even then, everyone tries their best to keep moving forward. That's what makes Fairy Tail what it is. I really joined the best guild ever.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: If someone here were hurt or lost their life because of me, I think I would also be in pain much like Loke. But, it'll be all right. If everyone works together and unites in power, we can overcome any pinch ahead, right?

author: Kurusu Keigo
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Think of your shivers as excitement rather than fear. Cover the anxiety on your face with a smile.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: In life, it's better to assume that bad things will happen to you rather than good things. You can't look at someone else's success and assume that it will happen to you. There are a lot of people in the world, so it makes sense that one or two of them are going to be fortunate. But there's only one of you. Assuming that good fortune will come to you is no different than pointing a finger at a random person and predicting the same for them. But do you think that prediction would come true?

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: The important thing is to think of something nobody else is thinking of. "Ignorance is a sin" is not about knowledge - it's about wisdom.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: While it may be that ignorance is a sin, it's impossible to know everything.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Stories are better when they have an ending, are they not?

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: When the time comes, I may need to borrow your chest to cry upon. That's one promise I'll need from you.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: The world is indeed full of malice, but there are some pitfalls one can avoid as long as one knows of them- ignorance is a sin, after all.

author: Gai Tsutsugami
title: Guilty Crown
text: If you value your peaceful everyday life, protect it for yourself.

author: Tsugumi
title: Guilty Crown
text: When someone does something nice for you… shut up and accept it!

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: Life's a bitch, so if it's easy, you're doing it wrong.

author: Jet Black
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: You were always there for me, and that's all I needed. Just you. For some reason, I didn't feel sad or broken up, it just didn't seem real. But slowly I realized it was real – that you were gone. And little by little, I slowly felt something inside me go numb.

author: Funny Valentine
title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
text: Suppose that you were sitting down at a table. The napkins are in front of you, which napkin would you take? The one on your 'left'? Or the one on your 'right'? The one on your left side? Or the one on your right side? Usually you would take the one on your left side. That is 'correct' too. But in a larger sense on society, that is wrong. Perhaps I could even substitute 'society' with the 'Universe'. The correct answer is that 'It is determined by the one who takes his or her own napkin first.' …Yes? If the first one takes the napkin to their right, then there's no choice but for others to also take the 'right' napkin. The same goes for the left. Everyone else will take the napkin to their left, because they have no other option. This is 'society'… Who are the ones that determine the price of land first? There must have been someone who determined the value of money, first. The size of the rails on a train track? The magnitude of electricity? Laws and Regulations? Who was the first to determine these things? Did we all do it, because this is a Republic? Or was it Arbitrary? NO! The one who took the napkin first determined all of these things! The rules of this world are determined by that same principle of 'right or left?'! In a Society like this table, a state of equilibrium, once one makes the first move, everyone must follow! In every era, this World has been operating by this napkin principle. And the one who 'takes the napkin first' must be someone who is respected by all. It's not that anyone can fulfill this role… Those that are despotic or unworthy will be scorned. And those are the 'losers'. In the case of this table, the 'eldest' or the 'Master of the party' will take the napkin first… Because everyone 'respects' those individuals.

author: Sawako Kuronuma
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: It was like you brought color to my life. You changed my life, all by yourself.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text:
Look well at Integra's “battle”, Police girl! Integra cut herself open, shed her own blood… and chose to fight for her life. Giving up kills people. When people reject giving up… they finally win the right to transcend humanity. “Never give up, even if it means death”… that is the pride and dignity of our 
master.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: Police girl… Enjoy this. Enjoy the massacre. This alone will make you strong.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text:
No, you're the maggot underneath the garbage! Look at you! That cheap outfit isn't even fit for a carnival. What do you think you're doing? Wearing a priest outfit, you don't even know the meaning of shame. That's what makes you trash! You're a narrow-minded king… who creates a host of ghouls to keep as slaves. You're a coward incapable of acting on your own. Even Hell wouldn't accept you! Your instant vampires are cockroaches! Multiplying everywhere before you know it. I can't stand your kind… half-ass vampire without the slightest bit of self-respect! You don't even know what you are! By the 
way…  I have my reasons for serving humans. But of course, it's not a story for trash like you.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text:
In order to obtain something, there must be something of equal value. It is the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Back then, we believed that it was the truth of the world. However, the real world isn't perfect, so there is not just a single law that governs everything that happens within it. It is the same for the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Even so, I believe that people cannot obtain something without paying a price. The pain we felt was surely enough of a price to pay. And anyone who pays the price known as hard work surely gains something. The Law of Conservation is not the law governing this 
world. Until the day I meet with him again, that is the promise… Ni-san and I made.

author: Yahiro Samukawa
title: Guilty Crown
text: I'm not going to apologize. This is an absurd, unfair world.

author: Crusty
title: Log Horizon
text: Failing to act, for fear of the risk, is no different than a living death. No matter what world you're in.

author: Tojuro Hattori
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Humans lose focus of the big picture when they're drunken in the midst of their feelings.

author: Dune
title: Casshern Sins
text: I am content with just being a flower, blooming and withering away… that's all I ever needed.

author: Gantz
title: Gantz
text: Despair… It hides away propagates, expands, and finally explodes.

author: Gantz
title: Gantz
text: There comes a time when we can no longer tell the invaders from the invaded. That is what we call “War”.

author: Akari Mizunashi
title: Aria the Animation
text: Lots of things change with the flow of time. But there are things that never change. Things that are precious because they change, and things that are precious because they don't change… Both are precious. Don't you feel the same?

author: Grandma Akino
title: Aria the Animation
text: Isn't it okay to consider sad or hard times as the seasoning that lets you enjoy life? You can change them inside yourself so that you can enjoy anything. It truly is a wonderful thing, living each day.

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica: The Different Story
text: I never wanted to save the world or make everyone happy. I never wanted to play God like that. If I could just save my family, and my friends… If I could just be a hero like that, I'd be happy.

author: Ittetsu Takeda
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Does losing prove that you are weak? Isn't losing difficult for all of you? A challenge where, after ending up on your hands and knees, you must see if you can stand up again? If you stay on your hands and knees, that proves that you are weak.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: When a human is victorious is when they're most vulnerable.

author: Ryuuguu Otohime
title: Okami-san And Her Seven Companions
text: A woman's jealousy is blacker than the oceans deepest chasm. You may all begin screaming now.

author: Abel Nightroad
title: Trinity Blood
text: This eternally cursed power. This extremely disgusting existence! May this wretched body help me protect the things most important to me now! This is the only power that makes atonement for my sins possible! Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust, Earth to Earth! Amen!

author: Casshern
title: Casshern Sins
text: What people seek when the depths of despair and death are upon them, may be the silhouettes of the ones they love.

author: Khamsin Nbh'w
title: Shakugan no Shana III
text: For those who love another... To disobey, to rage, to curse, to fight, to kill... None of these disproves that love. A love that's too strong may even make those more likely.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: I killed many people to act on my ideal. I killed so many that I stopped caring about innocent people and I saved a thousand times as many as I killed.

author: Avenger
title: Fate/hollow ataraxia
text: Was I not clear? Then lemme give you an example. Say that somewhere, there's this guy who's suffering the absolute worst fate in the world you could possibly think of. You get wind of this guy somehow and hearing what he's going through really upsets you. That would be meaningless sentimentality I'm talking about. This is a far-off, distant world we're talking about, one you shouldn't concern yourself with. So even if someone in this far-off world leads such a sad existence, it won't keep you from living every day with a smile on your face.

author: Lancer
title: Fate/zero
text: Do all of you really want... to win that badly? You all want the Grail that desperately?! You'd crush the only wish I have in my heart... do none of you feel any shame at all?! I won't forgive you... I? won't forgive ANY of you for this! All of you monsters who'd disregard a knight's honor for personal gain... let my blood taint your dreams! Let the Grail be cursed! Let the wish it grants bring disaster! And when you fall into the pits of hell... remember the rage of Diarmuid!

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/zero
text: Pleasure is another thing that I lack. I seek for it but cannot find it.

author: Assassin
title: Fate/stay night
text: A warrior would rather die, than survive defeat.

author: Kaminski Natalia
title: Fate/zero
text: If you cut a thread, and then tie it, the thickness will be different where you originally cut it, right? In that sense, it means irreversible change.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: People remember their high school days as the high point of their lives. People say these things because everyone holds fond memories of their time in high school; however, I doubt that every high school student would want to remember their school life that way. For example, if neither studying, nor sports, nor socializing are of interest to someone, what then? What if there are students who prefer to keep a low profile? Though I guess that would be a pretty lonely way to live.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: People who are confident in themselves never talk about expectations. "Expectation" is a word rooted in giving up. It leaves you with no other choice. It makes it obvious that you're powerless.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: The best way to tame a mystery is with another mystery.

author: Amamiya Yuuko
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: No matter how important a person is, some day you will lose them. No matter how much you desire it, eternity is one thing you will never possess. It's the time you do spend with that person that's important, so that you can meet your parting without regret.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text:
Even if I'm not perfect… Even if I'm not the ideal me… He says that I'm still my own person.
The point of life isn't to be perfect.
It's to do want you want to do, to be who you want to be.
That's how I should be trying to live.

author: Yuichi Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: But once you grow old, you become afraid of even losing things without any value.

author: Wolfgang Grimmer
title: Monster
text: Do you have any idea how terrible the things you did really mean? Do you understand what it means to destroy a human being's sense of good and evil? Can you even begin to comprehend what happens when you awaken the monster inside each us? People should know in their hearts that food tastes good. They should always look forward to having picnics and wonderful places on their weekends. They should think that beer tastes good after a hard day's work. People should know how they should feel, that they're suppose to grieve, from the bottom of their hearts when they have to bury their own child.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: Whether here or in the real world, you can cry when it hurts. There's no rule that you can't show feelings just because it's a game.

author: Akihiko Kayaba
title: Sword Art Online
text: In every world, once you die, you're gone.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: When I began thinking of him as I fell asleep, I stopped having nightmares. I began to look forward to seeing him. For the first time since I arrived here, I was happy.

author: Alice
title: King Of Thorns
text: To protect themselves, human souls can merge fantasy with reality.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: How much weight can a simple promise carry?

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: Fragility is always lurking behind our peaceful day-to-day life. Terrible things don't only happen in places far beyond our reach.

author: Gasai Yuno
title: Mirai Nikki
text: A half moon. A bright half and a dark half. Just like me.

author: Ergo Proxy
title: Ergo Proxy
text: We are the sum of our memories. Erasing the memories edged in oneself is the same as loosing oneself.

author: Nanami Aoyama
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: There are some things you can't say to someone, no matter how close you are.

author: Mashiro Shiina
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: This area feels weird, it's been throbbing hard since that time. When you told me not to go. When you held me so tight. It won't go away. Your voice is still in my ear. What happened to me? Is this... love?

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: What is the point if those with the means and power do not fight?

author: Ymir
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I too used to believe that the world would be a better place if I hadn't been born. I was hated merely for the fact that I existed, and I died for the happiness of many people. But there was one thing I wished for with all my heart... If I'm ever given a second chance in life, I want to live for only myself. That is my sincere wish.

author: Historia Reiss
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Even if you have your reasons and there are things you can't tell me, no matter what, I'm on your side.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I was, I am, and I remain a soldier, sworn to devote my heart and soul to the restoration of humankind! There is no greater glory than than dying for that belief!

author: Furukawa Akio
title: CLANNAD
text: We didn't give up on our dreams! We changed our dreams into your dream! That's what parents do! That's what a family does!

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: I hate this town. It's too filled with memories I'd rather forget. I go to school every day, hang out with my friends, and then go home. There's no place I'd rather not go ever again. I wonder if anything will ever change? Will that day ever come?

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: Isn't it fine as long as you find it? Isn't it fine as long as you find the next fun and happy moments again?

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: Even if I could redo the past, I must not take back what has already happened, because if I do that, everything would be a lie: those tears, that pain, those memories, that cold reality that hurts my heart, all of it. There were people who died in pain. There were people who risked their lives to save others. There were people who mourned for the deaths. But then, if everything were taken back and it did not happen, where would all of those go? The dead people would not come back. Reality cannot be overturned. To continue on remembering the pain and the weight… isn't that how lost things remain? People will eventually die and death itself is sad, but pain shouldn't be the only thing that remains. A death is painful, but it also leaves behind bright memories. As I am bound by these people's deaths… As I am protected by my memories of Kiritsugu... I believe memories become constraints and change the people living now... Even if... They are memories that will eventually be forgotten.

author: Maebara Ichirō
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: There are many kinds of fights in this world, but if you don't stick to the rules you won't win support from the people around you.

author: Gene Smilas
title: Code Geass: Boukoku No Akito
text: A skilled dictator is much more beneficial to humanity than a democracy of ignorant people.

author: Goro Shigeno
title: Major
text: A guy who can't do what needs to be done today, definitely can't do it tomorrow.

author: Acnologia
title: Fairy Tail
text: I will acknowledge you as my enemy and destroy you.

author: Mard Geer
title: Fairy Tail
text: I particularly dislike this emotion you call ANGER. It makes me lose sight of myself, you know. Just thinking of what happens to me if I'm not MYSELF. Disgusts me to no end.

author: Goro Shigeno
title: Major
text: 'Goodbye' is the word that I've come to hate the most.

author: Harumi Shuntarou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: People change. And as the years go by, so do our environments. I think it's alright for there not to be a "proper" way of living. But I do believe that instead of trying to be satisfied on just one answer and blocking out the rest, searching for more answers, despite the pain they may bring, is a much more honest way of living.

author: Wolfgang Grimmer
title: Monster
text: Everyone in this world carries around their own sins, and they never go away...but that doesn't change the fact that we do what we must.

author: Rika Shiguma
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: You don't like being lonely, but you're afraid of people expressing their affection towards you. You pretend not to notice. You run away. You brush it off. You cover up. You reject. You even lie to yourself, convincing yourself that no one has any feelings for you.

author: Celestin
title: Aah! Megami-Sama
text: The system created by the divine ones segregates every single person into his living assignment in the world, determines his roles and controls them...the melancholy voices of those born into this world have pierced the depths of my heart. I feel the need to do something for them without discriminating against anyone.

author: Shuichiro Keido
title: Guilty Crown
text: The double grief of a lost bliss is to recall its happy hour in pain.

author: Shio Sakaki
title: KenIchi the Mightiest Disciple
text: Well, everyone's unsure of their fighting abilities. When that happens, just train more! When you're afraid, just train! When something doesn't feel right, just train! When you don't believe in yourself anymore, just train! The only thing that won't betray you is your training.

author: Seiko Miyazawa
title: Tough
text: Even the most noble of the sacrifices is based on "self satisfaction". Jesus Christ himself was crucified for the sake of his people for "self satisfaction". That's why you shouldn't expect anything in return when you help someone. Because the moment you expect something, your act would become worthless.

author: Saber
title: Fate/zero
text: Only brute warriors find glory in destruction!

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: A king must live a life more vivid than any other and be figure for all to admire! The king is the one who collects the envy of all his heroes and stands as their guide! Therefore, the king is not alone! For his will equals that of all his followers combined!

author: Taro Raimon
title: Eyeshield 21
text: A miracle something like that won't come if you're waiting for it. A miracle is something you work for!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Only two kinds of people exist in this world, those who steal and those who are stolen from.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Time never comes back once it's gone.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Is it really worth saving this sad and ugly world, when there is nothing left after it is saved? With all this death, cruelty and sadness, do you still want to become a hero?

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: We're all the same. No one really remembers the day he was born. We all have to trust another's word on the matter. It doesn't matter if it's true or not. Just having a birthday makes one happy I think.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!

author: Akihiko Chuuzenji
title: Mouryou No Hako
text: Let us talk about the brain. The brain is said to be the place where our consciousness resides. As we speak, each of us possesses our own distinct consciousness. We are all experiencing reality through our own point of view. To each of us, reality unfolds as a unique story as a result of our consciousness. However, looking to the outside from this box called the self, reality is subjective.

author: Abel Nightroad
title: Trinity Blood
text: Dear me - how pitiful. A monster like me, lagging from such a small wound?

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: Do you think your sin will disappear if you lie?

author: Akagi Shigeru
title: Touhai Densetsu Akagi: Yami Ni Maiorita Tensai
text: People who can see get to choose... if you want them to know you can see. To pretend to be able to see, even when you can't... Or to pretend that you can't see even when you can.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I am not so noble that I would stake my life for someone else. Nor am I so forgiving that I would sit by and allow someone to trample me. I am selfish... and self righteous human being! That's why! I... to clear my own shame... I used your power. Not for anyone else! But for myself!

author: Ayumi Sanda
title: Ookami Shoujo To Kuro Ouji
text: You don't get to choose who you fall for. The heart doesn't always work the way you want it to. You should just follow your feelings honestly. You'll be happier that way.

author: Igor Neuhaus
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: No matter how you look, as long as your judgement is clouded you won't find the truth.

author: Yukio Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: The best way to succeed is to use your own abilities to the fullest.

author: Sachi Nanjou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: Such shallow emotions evoked by simple and cheerful stories won't solve anything! What people need is a more tangible sense of values with which to resolve the conflicts of everyday life! Even if that causes others to think of you as warped, as long as you can remain true to yourself until the moment you die; that is what I believe true dignity is!

author: Junko Enoshima
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Wherever there is hope, there is most definitely despair.

author: Saruhiko Fushimi
title: K Project
text: I hate people with a big heart. All they do is look down on you from above. They don't give a damn about the petty struggles of the people serving under them. If that's what it means to be a king, then that's just sad and pathetic.

author: Kuroh Yatogami
title: K Project
text: Not many can do the “right thing” when it counts.

author: Minori Kushieda
title: Toradora!
text: We all live under the same sky. If each of us learns to shine, it won't matter how far apart we are. We'll be able to see each other.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: As long as no one got hurt, it's all good. Who cares who saved who?

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: You don't need a good reason to save a friend. If you want to save them, then save them. I know someone who kept saying those stupid things even when he was driven to the brink of death, and he really did save over 10,000 people in the end. And that idiot that saved so many people is trying to save someone today like always. I know I can't stop him. No matter how much I don't want him to do anything dangerous, seeing him off with a push to the back is the sign of a good woman!

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: If you want to do something and have the power for it, then do it!

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: I can only say that the human curiosity is something completely irrational.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: Those stars look like they're close to each other, but they're actually very far away, aren't they? It's like Kitamura-kun and I. The things you see aren't always real. How hard must I try in order to understand the unseen truth?

author: Netero
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Human potential for evolution is limitless.

author: Dante
title: Devil May Cry
text: There are people out there who would say there's nothing more important than love. But is love really that great? There are women, who because of love, get chased around by men. And there are men, who because of love, get killed by women. To put it down, for love to be so great, there's gotta be something else behind it that's even greater.

author: Sheik
title: The Legend Of Zelda
text: Time passes, people move. Like a river's flow, it never ends. A childish mind will turn to noble ambition. Young love will become deep affection. The clear water's surface reflects growth. Now listen to the Serenade of water to reflect upon yourself.

author: Sachi Nanjou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: Risks are just an unavoidable part of life. Even if you realize the danger, nothing's gonna come from always running away. That way, even when you die, you can be content that you gave it your all.

author: Sachi Nanjou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: It's fine even if you're useless right now. As long as you keep looking towards the future, I'm sure a day will come when you'll find your worth.

author: Sachi Nanjou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: Even the hardest of things can shatter when one little crack appears.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: There is one thing I've learned here. To keep doing your best, up until the very end.

author: Mirai Kuriyama
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: Somewhere along the line, I had decided that I can't interact with others. That I have no choice but to be alone, but I've found a new reason to stay. It's because everyone is alone, senpai. Everyone is all alone.

author: Akihito Kanbara
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: Just as there is a light at night and darkness in the day, there will always be darkness in the world. At the same time, the world will never be engulfed by the darkness. In that mix of ambiguous colors, everything moves on: our fates determined...

author: Hiroomi Nase
title: Kyoukai No Kanata
text: A person can work for their ideals. But if you lose sight of those ideals, when things don't work out as you hoped, you'll never accomplish anything! You won't be able to protect yourself or those dear to you.

author: Sora
title: Kingdom Hearts
text: The heart may be weak and sometimes it may even give in, but I've learned that deep down, there's a light that never goes out!

author: Kaoru Yamazaki
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: A drama has a progressive thought, an emotional climax and a resolution, but our lives aren't like that. All we get day after day, are a bunch of vague anxieties that are never really resolved.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: If you don't see her, you won't fall in love. If you don't fall in love, you won't get hurt.

author: Jack Atlas
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
text: Stop trying to change things that can't be changed. The past is the past and you have to let it go and embrace the future.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: There's something that cannot be expressed in words: human emotion. Emotions of the heart can't be just tucked away in a closet. There's a way to know the emotions: look into the eyes. The gentleman lied to me when I trusted him, but the moment I looked into his eyes the angel of destiny began to unravel the truth. Just look into their eyes, there is only one truth.

author: Kyōko Kirigiri
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: A hint is one thing, but simply sharing the answer it leads to is dangerous.

author: Saya Minatsuki
title: Black Cat
text: A pistol's job is what its handler chooses. If I don't wanna shoot, then I won't.

author: Konoha Inoue
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: If there's an ugly truth, a beautiful truth must exist too. Stories aren't purely ugly. They're not purely tragic or sad either. There are tender things and beautiful things in there.

author: Konoha Inoue
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: I believe that some truths should never be known.

author: Amano Touko
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: What is true happiness? Everyone seeks the land of happiness as if they're on a pilgrimage. They try to walk there. Still, no matter who they are, at times they become tired. Stories exist for those times. If you open the covers, you'll encounter someone else's imagination. If you feel lonely on your own, try reading a book. Try to imagine what the author was thinking, what he wanted to say. Then you might be able to obtain something wonderful.

author: Yuichi Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: I just don't understand the reason why humans continue living on all the while as our individual egos hurt each other...

author: Aiko Tanaka
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: I wonder why it is, that people fall in love with others? I think that to seek out love even when you already have a nice family is being greedy. No matter how much you like another person, you can never be with that person forever... But I dislike that. I don't care if I have to throw away everything else. I just want you to look at me.

author: Yuichi Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: True happiness only lasts for a brief time, so you better enjoy it while you can, right?

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: The difference in ability... What about it? Do you think I should give up just because you're stronger than me?

author: Keisuke Urashima
title: Love Hina
text: Memories - they can sometimes become vague and foggy and there are times when they disappear altogether. Therefore, because there are many things I don't want to lose track of, I will record everything in here (his diary) for the sake of those moments that should not be forgotten.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: It is only through the eyes of others that our lives have any meaning.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Don't believe in the you that believes in me and don't believe in the me that believes in you. Believe in the you that believes in yourself.

author: Coyote Starrk
title: Bleach
text: I want to become weak and if that's not possible, then I at least want to make friends that are as strong as me.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: If you give me wings, I will soar for you even if this whole land sinks down to the water. If you give me a sword, I will fight for you even if this whole sky shoots through with your light.

author: Miu Asakura
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: I wanted to hurt you, make you suffer, and make sure that you'd never forget me.

author: Miu Asakura
title: Bungaku Shoujo
text: In my family; Father, Mother, and Grandmother all hated each other. I was the trash can into which they dumped their hatred. That's why I only thought about beautiful and warm things, fun things. But after I met you, I understood. No matter how many beautiful stories I made, they were all lies. Because the person telling the stories, me, was an ugly and dirty creature.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Don't underestimate me! I don't quit and I don't run! You can act tough all you want! You're not gonna scare me off! No way! I don't care if I DO get stuck as a Genin for the rest of my life! I'll still be Hokage someday!

author: Shū Ouma
title: Guilty Crown
text: The right to use my friends as a weapon, that is the sinful crown I shall adorn.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: No matter how colossal a power you obtain, no matter how gigantic an army you bring with you, I ain't scared. While you've abandoned a hundred, I've connected with a thousand. While you've destroyed a thousand, I've been helped by ten thousand. So what's an army of a few thousand? We have protected everything as just three people. We're the Yorozuya.

author: Natsu Tanimoto
title: Kenichi: The Mightiest Disciple
text: People can be so mean, no matter what you've done for them they will believe the first cheap rumor they hear. In the end they only care about themselves.

author: Yuichi Onodera
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: What do you think are the most important things in life? Money, dreams, sympathy towards others... Yes, they're all important things as well... But the most important thing is responsibility for your own actions.

author: Sachi Nanjou
title: Oyasumi Punpun
text: There're a lot of people who want to be in despair just so they can pity themselves... But I think it's a waste of time, that's all. After all, you're the one who wishes to be left alone and refuses to share your pain with anyone else.

author: Aeolia Schenberg
title: Gundam 00
text: I hate it when knowledge is misused by people who have lost sight of reality, due to biased perceptions and prejudices. It is the source of misunderstanding, ignorance and conflict. I want us to understand each other.

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: Sometimes the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run I'll lose something important.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi's blessing. But because, I'm enlightened by my intelligence.

author: Zack Fair
title: Final Fantasy VII
text: Embrace your dreams. If you want to be a hero, you need to have dreams.

author: Alcor
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: If all things are in fact preordained, then why... why is humanity able to think for itself?

author: Berserk
title: Berserk
text: In this world is the destiny of mankind controlled by some transcendental entity or law? Is it like the hand of god hovering from above? Perhaps men have no control even over their own will.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: You trusted me, so I'll trust you too. That's what being friends means, doesn't it?

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.

author: Pain
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.

author: Asura
title: Soul Eater
text: There's nothing unusual here… The appropriate one stands in the appropriate place after the inappropriate ones have collapsed to the ground, defeated. There is nothing unexpected or odd about it. Because this is reality. Not one shred of uncertainty exists here. Not even fear, of course…

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I don't want fear for a future, that may not even come, to stop me from acting today.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it. If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!

author: Asura
title: Soul Eater
text: Sitting there in the dark, I had the chance to think about a lot of things, including the nature of the world itself. And after lengthy consideration, I realized something; When all is said and done, this world is an unknowable place. On the surface, all appears rational, orderly. But what lies beyond that thin veneer of reason? Stability and reality? Or chaos and madness? What are we really made of in the end? Is there truly any meaning to the lives we lead? Or are we nothing more than hollow vessels? These are questions we can never answer, because we cannot hope to see beyond the world's fragile layer of skin. So we live our lives filled with uncertainty, never knowing who or what we truly are, or what the future will bring. All we can do is imagine. Life becomes an unsolvable mystery with any number of twists and turns awaiting us. And that's enough to fill any soul with terror.

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: There is no inherent right or wrong in this world, those labels are just artificial constructs. Right and wrong are held by positions of authority. That is the way it's always been, so how then could anyone know this truth you speak of? Don't you see the reality is that truth long ago became nothing more than a shadow of itself; it's a mere echo of the past now... The world is one big moral gray area, it just makes you feel safer that it can be categorized into good and bad, but that's not how it actually works.

author: K
title: Aoi Bungaku Series
text: Those who do not want to advance spiritually are fools.

author: Watari Ryouta
title: Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso
text: It's only natural for the girl you're crushing on to be in love with someone else. Since you're in love with her, she sparkles in your eyes. That's why people fall so irrationally in love.

author: Osamu Mikumo
title: World Trigger
text: Rules make the world work. They don't protect you.

author: Migi
title: Parasyte -the maxim-
text: Upon researching the concept of demons, I believe that, among all life, humans are the closest thing to it.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Be more confident despite your weaknesses and failures.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: I choose my own battlefields. Not by my blood, but by my heart! I stand on the battlefield to protect what's important to me. And if anyone stands in my way, I don't care if it's one of my kind, my brother or anyone else… I'll crush them all!

author: Furude Rika
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: You can change fate as long as you believe you can.

author: Maebara Keiichi
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: If you just submit yourself to fate, then that's the end of it.

author: Ash Ketchum
title: Pokémon
text: Everybody makes a wrong turn once in a while.

author: Sakagami Tomoyo
title: CLANNAD
text: No matter how cold and distant people may become, on the inside something warm and precious always remains, something that never changes. To me, that's what family is like.

author: Mana Ouma
title: Guilty Crown
text: If you hurt someone, you must be prepared to receive the same amount in return.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: (About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her and likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.

author: Featherine Augustus Aurora
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: The weight of a sin depends on the person measuring it.

author: Teppei Kiyoshi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: They say some defeats are meaningful and losing makes you stronger. Do you understand what that means? For living creatures victory is life, and defeat means death. It's an extreme example, but humans retain that instinct. Those who know the terror of defeat, hunger for victory.

author: Haruyuki Arita
title: Accel World
text: It's natural to want to stay in the game world and hope the game will never end. However, I've learned one thing from playing all those online games. There's nothing lonelier or sadder than the end of a game with no ending. More and more players get bored and move on to other games... And one day, even NPC's like your favorite blacksmith or landlady disappear forever as they smile. I've experienced that moment and cried many, many times. That isn't how games should end. It definitely isn't!

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: The real fun is in constantly pushing beyond your limits. So if you're thinking of everything as a game, you won't be able to fully experience it.

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: I've only just started to understand it myself. That by depending on others, and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals.

author: Yahiro Samukawa
title: Guilty Crown
text: People make a lot of mistakes, and strength is necessary to straighten those out.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: You're too kind. Remember this and take it to heart: kindness sometimes leads to even greater tragedy.

author: Monokuma
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: I came to realize something. Parenthesis are amazing! No matter how negative something sounds, if you throw "LOL" in some parentheses behind it - it becomes positive!

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Don't just accept loss or defeat! Accept it after you're dead. If you lose without dying... it means that luck is on your side. If that happens - focus on surviving! Survive and Kill the one who couldn't kill YOU!

author: Uta
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: If you like, you can stay over here tonight. If you're lucky, you may see some cannibalism and that's always fun...

author: Uta
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: I  can neither live with you. Nor without you.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: The longer you live... The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness...

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: If failure is the hallmark of being young, like they say. then someone who has failed to make friends must be at the peak of his youth, right? However, I'm sure they will disagree. All of this is just their double standards at play and nothing else. Here's the bottom line: Fools that enjoy their youth should go kill themselves.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: About marriage or about future, I don't know what will happen in the future. In this world, it's normal that when there's a preparation, then a new grief is born, but everyone has the right to desire happiness. Our efforts need to be held for the sake of our future.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Forcing yourself to like something you don't like brings sorrow.

author: Nyanta
title: Log Horizon
text: Any treasure you attain without anyone ever working for it is no treasure at all.

author: Gasai Yuno
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Everything in this world is just a game and we are merely the pawns.

author: Jin-Ie Kwon
title: The Breaker
text: When people get close to death they change.

author: Chun-Woo Han
title: The Breaker
text: In order to learn you may have to risk your life... no, even your soul.

author: Chun-Woo Han
title: The Breaker
text: Courage is the mindset of not surrendering even if you lack the strength.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: I didn't choose you. Don't you see this is all just an accident. You actually thought you were chosen because you're so smart or something? Don't be so vain. It just happened to fall around here and you just happen to pick it up, and that's all there is to it.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Only I could do it! I was well aware that killing people is crime in itself! Yet at that point it was the only way to make things right! I thought to myself that someday people will come to realize this as much, and regard it as an act of justice! I had no choice but to act as Kira… it was the destiny given to me. I was chosen to renew this rotten world, to bring about true peace – a utopia.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: This world is rotten and those who are making it rot deserve to die. Someone has to do it, so why not me? Even if it means sacrificing my own mind and soul, it's worth it. Because the world... can't go on like this. I wonder... what if someone else had picked up this notebook? Is there anyone out there other than me who'd be willing to eliminate the vermin from the world? If I don't do it, then who will? That's just it: there's no one, but I can do it. In fact, I'm the only one who can. I'll do it. Using the death note, I'll change the world.

author: Alis Color
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: Wishes shouldn't be granted. They're better off not coming true. When their wishes aren't granted, people actually put in effort. It's because they don't come true that people make progress. But if all their wishes come true, people won't be able to move forward anymore, you know?

author: Hampnie Hambart
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: Violence, greed, slaughter, corruption, defeat, failure, immorality, humiliation… These are everywhere. As long as you live, you will face them.

author: Hampnie Hambart
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: I do want to die. But I want to die happily. Like I have for others, I want someone to wave me off. My friends, my wife, and my children... Making them mourn for me, making them long for me, and leaving things that I should have done behind... That is how I want to die.

author: Mei Tachibana
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: Someday, maybe you'll find someone like you to share your pain with. I can't tell you when that will happen.... But the important thing is to not reject them.

author: Aiko Mutō
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: But there's nothing wrong about worrying. It's like a wall you need to overcome, to make it to the next level. If you're running up against that wall, it means you're moving forward. I wonder how many walls I've broken up until now, but if you won't move yourself, you will never get anywhere.

author: Yamato Kurosawa
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: In the end no one's going to protect you but yourself.

author: Jiro
title: Toriko
text: Life is like a playground swing, the higher and farther forward you go as you swing, it carries the risk of falling just as far back.

author: Mei Tachibana
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: When you trust someone and get to know them, you eventually learn about their wounds too.

author: Kurapika
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: A beast in human's clothing understands better than anyone how people want to be treated.

author: Mei Tachibana
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: I tried to carry on, while rejecting any relationships with others, but once you reject people, you're stuck. You lose the opportunity to meet someone and change.

author: Mei Tachibana
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: It's like a doll house. You hang out together and pretend to be friends, but when it doesn't suit them they abandon just you.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: If you haven't changed, that means you haven't improved.

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: How did you learn of the reality that you speak of? The entire world is governed by the reasoning of dirty-minded adults. We're able to obscure reality according to our obsessions. We're never actually shown what reality is. In this case, the reality that you speak of is a half-baked nonsense that has been altered. Trying to conform this bullshit reality into the one you want is like trying to join two pieces of a puzzle that do not fit.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Working hard alone doesn't assure you that you'll achieve your dreams. Actually there are more cases where you don't. Even so, working hard and achieving something is some consolation at least.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Anime - it's not something that can be thought of in a hall for conferences. It is made out of strange juices current from the brain of animators.

author: Hanamichi Sakuragi
title: Slam Dunk
text: It's not too late to change ourselves and have a meaningful life.

author: Akihiko Kayaba
title: Sword Art Online
text: A person is very strong when he seeks to protect something.

author: Amano Yukiteru
title: Mirai Nikki
text: If there's a miracle that can be reached by fighting to the end, then I want to see it.

author: Akise Aru
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Not knowing everything in this world is fun.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Become strong not just for your own sake, but for your friends.

author: Suzaku Kururugi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: A victory won through dishonesty means it's no victory at all.

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: Even if your feelings or wishes do not come true, or if things don't go as you planned - on another road grows another flower. A new flower blooms there.

author: Deerhound
title: Rave Master
text: It doesn't matter what you achieve in life. It's how you live that really matters. Countless men have lost their lives in war without fulfilling their life's ambitions. Shiba stood by his convictions, no matter how lonely he got. So I think that in the end, he must've been happier than anyone.

author: Ryoji Kaji
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: If you know pain and hardship, it's easier to be kind to others.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: To take responsibility is to take the pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistake.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: People who grow up in different environments will invariably have different tastes and preferences. Therefore, could one say that the subsequent marriages necessarily lead to happiness?

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Though possessing two eyes, most creatures can see but a single thing at a time.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: An idiot that knows he's an idiot, is even harder to deal with than an idiot that thinks he isn't.

author: Margery Daw
title: Shakugan no Shana
text: Love is like a mirror that reflects your bad side. Especially when it's unrequited, you get envious, jealous, prejudiced, and resentful. You have to face all sorts of emotions, but there's no reason to find that shameful. It shows how serious you are. Oh yeah, do you want me to tell you how to break that mirror? It's not anything hard, understand the other person. That's all. Don't make any quick judgment and let them do the same.

author: Mio Nishizono
title: Little Busters!
text: There are people in this world who don't understand that what they consider a harmless prank can deeply hurt someone else.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: Having someone saying you're okay as you are and being needed by that person... It was nice to have someone like that.

author: Kazuma Yagami
title: Kaze no Stigma
text: Death is the end of everything. Your past and future will be lost in an instant where there will be no second chance. However as long as you live there will be a chance of pulling a win.

author: Akise Aru
title: Mirai Nikki
text: If you want to know what others think, you first have to say what you think.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Just by living, people hurt others without even realizing it. So long as humanity exists, hate will also exist. There is no peace in this cursed world. War is just a crime paid for by the pain of the defeated...

author: Sonozaki Mion
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: I know everyone has their stories of pain and sadness or things that they don't want to bring up, but if you can't be a good friend without telling that, then I don't need any friends at all!

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: By depending on others and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: A normal person looks away from what they don't want to see even though they know there are things they can only acquire if they face the things they hate.

author: Tatsumi
title: Akame ga KILL!
text: The reason doesn't matter. As long as tiny bit of hope exists, that's all that matters.

author: Hayashida Nana
title: Golden Time
text: Once you miss the opportunity to say something, the words become increasingly toxic. The best thing to do is to just say everything.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: A farewell is like the other side of a coin. It will only happen when there is an encounter. Rather than dreading the day we have to part, shouldn't we be happy that we had the chance to meet today instead?

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.

author: Meliodas
title: Nanatsu no Taizai
text: No matter what lies you tell, you can't fool your own heart.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: There are many different ways to solve a problem. But once it's solved, we must live our lives. Which means we should choose not the simplest solution, but the one that will allow us to feel the most at peace once it's done.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Even if it's small, take a step forward.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Change will never come about if you don't make it happen.

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: The second humans lose their comfort zone, the more simplistic their actions become.

author: Liu Cheng-Long
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: If you have memories no one else remembers, what's the point in remembering them?

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: Your past shouldn't stop you from achieving your goals and dreams.

author: Itsuki Minami
title: Air Gear
text: Let me teach you a thing. Normally the weak person's weakness is the strong person, but the strong person's weakness is also the weak person.

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: Sometimes, the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run, I'll lose something important.

author: Ōnoki
title: Naruto
text: Never give up without even trying. Do what you can, no matter how small the effect it may have!

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Being hurt on the outside is better than being hurt on the inside.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I'll admit that you're stronger than before. But because of that, you seem to have lost sight of what's truly important. Now listen carefully. The people of the village, who once abhorred you, have begun to admire you. They think of you as a comrade. It's because you fought hard for their acceptance. You once said it was everyone who cares about you who helped you get where you are now. If you forget others because you have power, and become arrogant and egotistical, you'll eventually become just like Madara. No matter how powerful you become, do not try to shoulder everything alone. Becoming the Hokage doesn't mean people will acknowledge you. But when the people acknowledge you, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends!

author: Shiro
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: The always naughty woodpecker. Today, too, you open holes and ruin the forest. The angry wood god turned your beak to poison. Poor woodpecker, your nest has been poisoned. Your food has been poisoned. If you touch your friends, they all die. The sad little woodpecker. Your tears of poison sparkle brightly...

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The ones who aren't able to acknowledge their own selves are bound to fail.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I understood that killing people was a crime. There was no other way! The world had to be fixed! A purpose given to me! Only I could do it. Who else could have done it, and come this far? Would they have kept going? The only one who can create a new world is me.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: Everyone makes mistakes. What's important is how to make up for it.

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: The world has too many heroes. It needs a monster.

author: Tsuchimikado Natsume
title: Tokyo Ravens
text: The truth is the truth, regardless of whether it comes out of a genius' mouth or a commoner's.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Marriage, the institution where one's existence goes to die. All married people prattle on about their so-called marital bliss about how they love saying "I'm home!" to their spouses, or how seeing their sleeping kids motivates them for tomorrow. But think about it: you can say "I'm home!" if you live your parents, you can even buy some mouthwash and say "I'm home!" to the hippos on the label. And if they're talking about seeing their sleeping kids, that just means they're working hellish overtime hours. How is that in any way blissful?

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: No one cared who I was until I put on a mask.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: [Last words to Hashirama] As comrades, huh... well... if that's how... we... will.... *smiles*

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: ....Would you consider dying together "Teamwork" as well?

author: Nobuchika Ginoza
title: Psycho-Pass
text: If you look away and just turn your back on those you don't understand, you'll regret it someday. Accept what's happening before your eyes as a fact. That's a shortcut to becoming an adult.

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: I don't understand you! You said you don't love me, but you act like you do! Then you tell me to stay away. Do I have a chance or not?!

author: Kai Takemura
title: Sukitte Ii Na Yo
text: Try relying on others once in a while. No one asks what's wrong without wanting to hear the answer.

author: Chiaki Shinichi
title: Nodame Cantabile
text: No matter how painful, no matter how much solitary struggle awaits us, because we have joyous moments like this, we can face the challenges over and over again.

author: Papillon
title: Busou Renkin
text: A choice isn't something someone gives you, it's something you make for yourself.

author: Itsuki Minami
title: Air Gear
text: Whether you walk or run, the destination won't change. So then... You might as well run there!!!

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: The scariest and the most painful thing is to be hated by someone you truly love.

author: Naoki Irie
title: Itazura na Kiss
text: People's feelings can change. You may hate someone today, but you might come to love that person tomorrow.

author: Yokodera Youto
title: Hentai Ouji To Warawanai Neko
text: It's difficult to make a girl smile, even as a grown-up. But you should never, ever, make a girl cry. And if you ever see a girl crying, help her. You might not be able to make her smile, but they'll know how you feel.

author: Hampnie Hambart
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: The probability of you remaining yourself until the day you die is extremely low. The hopeless spark you have now will be corrupted and in the most awful way there is.

author: Nyanta
title: Log Horizon
text: Recklessness is the way of the young and tolerance is the beauty of adulthood.

author: Choji Akamichi
title: Naruto
text: You can steal the very last bite of my very best food. You can mock me all you want. But if you insult my best friend, I will obliterate you.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We've hurt one another. We've hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created ME. I was a Jinchuuriki, the embodiment of hatred and power. And I hated this world, and all the people in it... I wanted to destroy it with my own hands. The exact same thing Akatsuki is trying to do today. But one man, one ninja from Konoha stopped me. I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki... He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will! There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! SO THERE IS NO SAND, NO STONE, NO LEAF, NO MIST, NO CLOUD! THERE ARE ONLY SHINOBI! And if you still hold a grudge against the Sand, then when this war is over, come and take my head instead! Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: Love requires no reason. That is what makes it love!

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: I lost all of what you could call feelings of love. They weren't sealed, so they can't be released. They weren't broken, so they can't be fixed. That which is lost, cannot be recovered.

author: Daichi Sawamura
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Even if we're not confident that we'll win, even if others tell us we don't stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that.

author: Nyanta
title: Log Horizon
text: Any kind of life can go wrong, or sicken or suffer. Lives get old, decay, and finally die. Disliking that fact because it hurts, isn't any different than disliking life itself.

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: A world where everyone is equal and receives the same treatment. No such place exists. If there was a world of equality, where talent and aptitude didn't matter, we would all be equally snubbed there.

author: Mizore Shirayuki
title: Rosario Vampire
text: Whether you're a monster or human there's no difference in the value of someone's life.

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If you're going to dig, dig to pierce the heavens. Even if it's my grave I'm digging, I'll keep going! When I break through, that means I've WON! Who the hell do you think I am? I'm Simon. I'm not my bro, Kamina. I'm ME! Simon the Digger!

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: Everyone is watching someone other than themselves, someone important to them...

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: All for one, one for all! There are times when a man has no choice but to act!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Now there's something I understand a little better. Hate, sadness, even joy. To be able to share it with another person... Naruto Uzumaki. From fighting him I learned that. He knew pain like I did and then he taught me that you can change your path. I wish that one day I can be needed by someone. Not as a frightening weapon... But as the sand's Kazekage.

author: Hideki Hinata
title: Angel Beats!
text: I'll marry you! No matter what kind of sickness you have! Even if you can't walk or stand, or even when you can't have kids! I'll still marry you! No matter where or how I meet you, I'll fall in love with you. If I can meet you again, against the 6 billion to 1 odds, and even if your body can't move, I'll marry you.

author: Renton Thurston
title: Eureka Seven
text: Don't beg for it, earn it. Do it, and you'll be rewarded.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.

author: Jin Mitaka
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: You know, with talented people... They draw people to themselves, and without even trying to, they tear them to shreds. The closer you are to them, the more viciously you'll be torn apart. They're living in a completely different world above us. One that us normal people can't reach. In a world that we'll never see. A world above the clouds. That's the kind of world they live in.

author: Shinobu Nunotaba
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: A sin, once committed, is never forgotten. It haunts you for all eternity.

author: Henrietta
title: Log Horizon
text: They want to believe that's true and when someone wants to believe something is true, they usually will.

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Don't try to excuse yourself by saying you're doing it for someone else's sake.

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: No one's more aware of discrimination than the ones being discriminated against, huh?

author: Ittetsu Takeda
title: Haikyuu!!
text: Being weak means that there is a room to grow.

author: Kyōko Sakura
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Hey God, if you're there, my life has really sucked. So please, for once, let me have a sweet dream.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Even if I can't see. Even if I can't hear. I have light inside me. The path I walked with my friends, is bringing light to my future. I don't fear anything! This isn't even worthy of being called pain! The worst pain is.. The pain of losing your light.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Don't mistake borrowed power for your own ability!

author: Rize Kamishiro
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: All of the disadvantage in this world stems from a person's lack of ability.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: Real pain is the result of losing someone you care about.

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: Old man, everyone!! And you.. Luffy. Even though I've been good for nothing my whole life, even though I have the blood of a demon within me... You guys still loved me! Thank you so much!!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: If fate is a millstone, then we are the grist. There is nothing we can do. So I wish for strength. If I cannot protect them from the wheel, then give me a strong blade, and enough strength... to shatter fate.

author: Elfman Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: It's only the end if you give up!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text:
Maybe we can't help feeling scared alone! But we're all right here, together! We've got out friends close by!
Now there's nothing to fear, because we are not alone!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text:
We know our weakness. Now what will we do?
We'll get stronger! We'll get up and fight!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: "Checkmate" doesn't mean you've simply cornered the enemy king. It's a declaration that the enemy king is yours. That's why I said it the first time I met you. "Checkmate."

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: What kind of king makes his men fight at the front line while he sits behind them relaxing?

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Huh? In a real war, what fool waits for their enemy's "turn"?

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: It's better for a man to be slow than fast.

author: Shiroe
title: Log Horizon
text: Being strong on your own is meaningless. To have power you need other people, and they need a world where they can be at their best.

author: Ymir
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others?! You're you, and there's nothing wrong with that.

author: Shiroe
title: Log Horizon
text: If you can't do something, then don't. Focus on what you can do.

author: Inaho Kaizuka
title: Aldnoah.Zero
text: What does it take to end a war? Well, if both sides wish for peace and set aside their hatred... No. Warfare is nothing but a means of negotiation between states. Wars break out even when there is no hatred. Territory, resources, or interests that you are determined to own. Ideology, religion, pride. Wars are fought over those objectives all the time. Meaning that when those objectives are met, the war will end. That, or the war will end when the human cost outweighs the gains. Anger and hatred are only tools to tilt a war in your favor. I'm not interested in those emotions. So I wouldn't hate anyone just because they're Martian.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: If lives were lost today, then lives were also born. How important each day is... Depends on how important you feel it is to you.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: When there is evil in this world that justice cannot defeat, would you taint your hands with evil to defeat evil? Or would you remain steadfast and righteous even if it means surrendering to evil?

author: Naotsugu
title: Log Horizon
text: You're either an open pervert or a closet pervert!

author: Cloud Strife
title: Final Fantasy VII
text: I pity you. You just don't get it at all... there's not a thing I don't cherish!

author: Smoker
title: One Piece
text: Why did he smile? Why? Did he know he would be saved? No. In that instant, he must have understood that his life was going to end. Death. He accepted it. He was fully prepared for it and smiled.

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: I lost my mother when I was 8...and killed my father when I was 10. Those with the title of "Executive" or above...are my "family", with whom I've shared my joys and sorrows. They're the only thing I have! I won't forgive anyone that laughs at my family. Understood?

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You can't change anything unless you can discard part of yourself too. To surpass monsters, you must be willing to abandon your humanity.

author: Juvia Loxar
title: Fairy Tail
text: It doesn´t matter what day it is as long as you are happy.

author: Pain
title: Naruto Shippūden
text: Feel pain, think about pain, accept pain, know pain... Shinra Tensei!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: It's not because I'm lazy, it's just because I don't care.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: You're right, all efforts are pointless... If you don't believe in yourself.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: If love is just a word, then why does it hurt so much if you realize it isn't there?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil's fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.

author: Monkey D. Dragon
title: One Piece
text: Someday, I promise you, they will all watch as I change the world.

author: One Piece
title: One Piece
text: Inherited will, the swelling of the changing times, and the dreams of people. These are things that cannot be stopped. As long as people seek the answer to freedom, these will never cease to be!

author: Kuzan
title: One Piece
text: The thing called "justice" changes its shape... Depending on where you stand.

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: To define true madness. What is it to be nothing else but mad?

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: We don't have to know what tomorrow holds! That's why we can live for everything we're worth today!

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: Everybody can fight. It's just a choice of whether you should.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: It's our job as normal people to ensure the potential of those misunderstood ones are realized.

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: About Whitebeard "Even in death, his body did not fall. His figure, taking down enemies while losing half of his head, was truly monstrous. The total number of sword wounds he received in this battle was 267. He was shot by 152 bullets. And was hit by 46 cannonballs. And despite all this, his proud back, over the course of his entire life as a pirate, never received a single scar from running away!"

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I'm no one. I don't want to be anyone. All I care about is completing the moon's eye plan. This world is completely worthless. There is nothing left in it but misery.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Either people change or they die before they do. It's one or the other.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
