text: Even if I can't see you... No matter how far away you may be... I will always be watching you.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.

author: Filicia Heideman
title: Sora No Woto
text: There's no point in the world. But isn't that wonderful? Because if there isn't one, then you can decide what it is for yourself.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: "Time" is proof that people have lived. Every person lives the time that has been given to them... that is life.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: If I were to lose a friend...then I couldn't die in peace!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Your so called "hope" is to throw the past into despair?

author: KyÅko ToshinÅ
title: Yuri Yuri
text: If I can do it tomorrow, I won't do it today!

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I have told you before, I'm an avenger. I don't care about this test, Chunin or whatever. 'Am I strong?' that's the answer I want.

author: Don Kanonji
title: Bleach
text: Every week, when it is time, they stick to the TV. They watch my actions in the comfort of their families after dinner. Children watch my actions and their hearts leap. They see me stand up to evil spirits and... they know what courage is! Do you understand, boy? With them watching, I can't run away from the enemy

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: I can't deny, I don't know very much about Rukia. That's not the point, I might not risk my life for her, but Ichigo wants to save her life and that's all I need to know. What may seem like an unworthy cause to you is more than enough reason for me.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I am strong. Stronger than all of you. Extremely strong. I can kill all the titans out there. Even if I am alone.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You're either incompetent or you're spineless cowards. How pathetic. You can just sit here and suck on your fingers. Yeah, do that.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I'm still Konoha's Itachi Uchiha.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, the more you realize that in this reality only pain, suffering and futility exist.

author: Tobi
title: Naruto
text: It's too late to regret. Reality is just cruelly moving forward.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Abandon your fear. Look forward. Move forward and never stop. You'll age if you pull back. You'll die if you hesitate.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The difference between your decision and ours is experience. But you don't have to rely on that. CHOOSE... Believe in yourself, or believe in the survey corps and me. I don't know... I never have. I can believe in my own abilities or the choices of the companions I trust. But no one ever knows how it will turn out. So choose for yourself, whichever decision you will regret the least.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: It's not about being right or being wrong. There are more important things than that. That's why apologies and forgiveness become necessary.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Helping other people is the best way to make up for your mistakes.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: There is no such thing as "truth" or "lies" in this world; there never has been. There are only plain, hard facts. And yet, all beings who exist in this world acknowledge only those "facts" that are convenient to them, and take them to be the "truth". They do so because they know no other way of living. However, for those powerless beings who comprise the majority of this world's population, inconvenient facts that affirm their very existence, are their only truth.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war... Those are the two realms belonging solely to man. Thinking of peace whilst spilling blood is something that only humans could do. They're two sides of the same coin... to protect something... another must be sacrificed.

author: Mayoi Hachikuji
title: Nisemonogatari
text: I know love. The convenience store was selling it. For 298 yen.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: We can't live if we don't keep running forward.

author: Nico Robin
title: One Piece
text: Before the heart of truth, there is no need for words.

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: You are defeated yet you will not step back, why not?

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: An island from a dream within a dream? I could never pass up a great adventure like this!

author: Hideki Hinata
title: Angel Beats!
text: Even if you can't walk or stand and even if you can't have kids, I'll still marry you, I'll always stay by your side.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If you hurt somebody... or if somebody hurts you, the same red blood will be shed

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: There are people in this world who prefer solitude. But there is no one who can withstand it.

author: Chitoge Kirisaki
title: Nisekoi
text: Everyone has an ability. And it means that everyone should use that ability to the fullest.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: If you don't have the courage to change things then you might as well just die!!!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: There's no more trusted observer than someone who suspects you.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: If you married someone, that means you love every side of your significant other that you already know. So if you find a new side after to love, doesn't that mean you'll love your partner even more?

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: If that bullet could also kill a player in the real world, and if you didn't shoot them, you or someone you loved would be killed, could you still pull the trigger?

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online II
text: I don't even know the real names of the two... no, three that I killed back then. I just close my eyes, put my hands over my ears and tried to forget it all.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: People are stupid. If I don't do this, there will be no peace. Eventually, time will pass and the pain will heal. Eventually, checkmate's power will weaken and people will begin fighting again. This time, they will use the weapon themselves and once more know true pain. And for the short time, peace will come again. It will give birth to short period of peace within this endless chain of hatred. That's my wish.

author: Kuroko No Basket
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: There is no meaning to victory, if you win alone.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: We'll worry about the future once we get there.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Isn't changing yourself the same as running away? Why can't you just accept who you are?

author: Tachibana Marika
title: Nisekoi
text: You can't achieve anything if you don't make a move. Love is an all-out assault.

author: Gasai Yuno
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Maybe the future is bad. But there's a future beyond that, right?

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Do whatever you think is right. That's the way of the Fairy Tail mages.

author: Juvia Loxar
title: Fairy Tail
text: If I have to hurt someone, if I have to injure a comrade, then I might as well hurt myself.

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It's not about what you should do, it's about what you want to do.

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You won't know if you don't give it a try.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: The point of life isn't to be perfect. It's to do what you want to do. To be who you want to be.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: When you give up, your dreams and everything else, they're gone.

author: Hideki Hinata
title: Angel Beats!
text: No matter where I might have met you, I'm sure I'd come to love you.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Pain is the way to bring peace.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Hurting people won't help you regain your pride!

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Small animals have their own ways of surviving.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: You can believe in anything. But it's your heart...That ultimately decides.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Humans have faith too. It's important not to lose oneself. The strength to think, the courage not to run away.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.

author: Ruri Miyamoto
title: Nisekoi
text: There's no law that says you can't go after someone just because he's already in love with someone else.

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You cannot restrain me with logic.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: The more painful the memories one recollects, the better the laughter.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Once you taste poison, you might as well finish the meal. If it comes to that you would make as fine a dish as any.

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: Even if things are painful and tough, people should appreciate what it means to be alive.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: No matter what my heart will be forever yours and I will fight until the day I see you again.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Don't improvise what you cannot handle.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: If miracles only happen once, what are they called the second time?

author: Mei Misaki
title: Another
text: It's sad when people die.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Although my life hasn't been very fortunate until now, I'm glad if I caught your eye because of that misfortune...

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Success comes only to those who have dared to stand up without fear!

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: This is the world I live in. The dirty world of the adults.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: I don't need a reason to save someone.

author: Haruko Haruhara
title: FLCL
text: Yeah I lied; so what is the truth? Underneath the band-aid?

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text:
I really hate violence ...

I just want to get stronger, 
strong enough so that someday 
I can contain my anger!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: You donÂ´t need a reason to cry. All you need to feel the warmth that dwells in your chest.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Sorry. Our world isn't as nice a place as yours. When it comes to war and killing, we have far more expertise than you do.

author: Kazuichi Arai
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: Blaming others isn't going to resolve anything. There'll be a lot of things that are injust throughout your life. You will have to stand up by yourself.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.

author: Coach Kamogawa
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: The moment you back down is the moment you lose!

author: Hiroshi Kido
title: Barakamon
text: Being able to work hard is the best talent of all.

author: Yoshimura
title: Tokyo Ghoul
text: It's not because we can't take vengeance that we should feel sorry. The real reason to feel sorry... is when one is hung up on revenge and can't live their own life.

author: Kenji Yamaguchi
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: People who say they don't know their own feelings are deluding themselves. It's because you refuse to accept what you're thinking deep down in your heart, you think you don't understand.

author: Eustass Kid
title: One Piece
text: Compared to the "righteous" greed of the rulers, the criminals of the world seem much more honorable. When scum rules the world, only more scum is born.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If you don't risk your life, you can't create a future. Right?

author: Christina Mackenzie
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Everyone has to decide for themselves which choice to make. If you fight, people may die... but if you don't fight, people may still die. There's no "right" or "wrong" choice to make.

author: Muguruma Kensei
title: Bleach
text: Courage is being scared to death, but doing it anyways.

author: Atsushi Murasakibara
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Do you think everyone can make their dreams come true through hard work? Hard work isn't always rewarded.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Life is like a mountain - you can say you've reached the top, but only after climbing back down.

author: Minori Kushieda
title: Toradora!
text: My happiness can only be made by my own hands. My happiness doesn't depend on anyone but me!

author: Outlaw Star
title: Outlaw Star
text: A man has the right to dream. There are endless possibilities stretched out before him.

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Some of us don't have time to die.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Even if you're weak, there are miracles you can seize with your hands if you fight on to the very end.

author: Outlaw Star
title: Outlaw Star
text: Believe in yourself and create your own destiny. Don't fear fate.

author: Jellal Fernandes
title: Fairy Tail
text: The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don't wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.

author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: We have to fight in order to live. That's what will make us strong.

author: Riki Naoe
title: Little Busters!
text: If you turn your eyes away from sad things, they'll happen again one day. If you keep running away, you'll keep repeating the same mistakes. That's why you have to face the truth straight on.

author: Kougami Shinya
title: Psycho-Pass
text: It's not a matter of real or fake. These avatars are idols on the net. in other words - icons. Icons cannot solely exist through their own will. Neither Hayama nor Sugawara established their status on their own. They were able to become Talsiman and Spooky Boogie because their fans idolized them based on their own distorted perceptions. Their true feelings and colors are not the same as the ideals their characters represents. It's not surprising that a fan could do a better job than the real owners of playing the idol the fans expect to see.

author: Oryou Rikako
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Everyone here is the same. They don't notice anything. They don't say anything. And they don't think anything. They are merely a shell of their former selves and soon they will disappear like the melting snow. This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths, and yet, its pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity - a form of death that people have wished for.

author: Misato Katsuragi
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: So fucking what if I'm not you?! That doesn't mean it's okay for you to give up! If you do, I'll never forgive you as long as I live. God knows I'm not perfect either. I've made tons of stupid mistakes and later I regretted them. And I've done it over and over again, thousands of times. A cycle of hollow joy and vicious self-hatred. But even so, every time I learned something about myself.

author: Oryou Rikako
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Chastity and grace - traditional virtues that have been lost. They comprise the educational ideology of Ousou Academy. They're priorities that are not valued in boys, only in girls. After having them instilled in us, we're shipped out as brand-name product, refined, sheltered maidens, and purchased by men who seek a classic piece of furniture called "a good wife and mother" in a formality known as marriage. Students in this school are all components that will be processed into an artwork called "the lady". They are rough stones waiting to be polished and finished up. They live sad and boring lives, even though there are many other possible ways they could bloom.

author: Toyohisa Senguji
title: Psycho-Pass
text: When you entrust so much of your everyday life to those electronic devices, the argument that you aren't a cyborg isn't very convincing. To you, those portable terminals are already your second brain. Isn't that right? It can be said that the history of science is a history of the expansion of the human body's functionality, in other words, the history of man's cyberization. That's why it's a matter of degree.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: You sure say some funny things. Solitude? Does that only apply to me? Who isn't alone in this society? The time when our connection to others was the basis of our selves is long gone. In this world where everyone is watched over by the system and live within the system's standards, a community isn't necessary. Everyone just lives in their own cell, and the system tames them by giving them each their own personal serenity.

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Isn't using the net just like using knives for cooking or using paper to write things down? It has nothing to do with good or bad. It's like, it's there, so we accept and use it.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Some people want power and they get mad when they don't get it. They take their fury out on everyone else. You don't want it, it becomes you.

author: Tomoko Kuroki
title: WATAMOTE
text: I read in some book that sad and painful things are the spices of an enjoyable life... But I seem to get nothing but spices!

author: Ross
title: Senyuu. 2
text: "I would die for you" is what the weak say. If you're in love with someone - live for them.

author: Chichiri
title: Fushigi Yuugi
text: There is no such thing as a perfect person. That is why we cannot live alone.

author: Ross
title: Senyuu. 2
text: Can you not be something unless you're already somebody else's something?

author: Galilei
title: Galilei Donna
text: Until now, I had never felt any need to be understood. I had never felt lonely. Not until I met you.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I'm Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies... I have lots of hobbies.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Those who cannot acknowledge themselves, will eventually fail.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Look around you, and all you will see are people the world would be better off without.

author: Galilei
title: Galilei Donna
text: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered. The point is to discover them.

author: Galilei Donna
title: Galilei Donna
text: Everyone has an equal right to live. If you have more than others, you should share with those who have less. If you feel happier than others, help those in need. That is the duty of those who are given so much.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Admiration is the furthest thing from understanding.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Nisemonogatari
text: No matter what bonds you forge with others, time will tear them apart. Well... Doesn't thinking about it make you sick?

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.

author: Jūdai Yūki
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
text: There are things you can't turn back, even if you want to.

author: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi
title: Hentai Ouji To Warawanai Neko
text: Communication is the only way people can move ahead.

author: Azusa Azuki
title: Hentai Ouji To Warawanai Neko
text: Do you know about the Happy Prince? It's such a happy story. The Prince helps everyone together with a little swallow, then he dies happily. But I wonder how the swallow felt? His wish wasn't granted because he helped the foolish Prince. Was the swallow really happy? It's always like that. The Prince and all the people he helped are happy, but what about the swallow? He helped the Prince more than anyone, so why is he ignored completely?

author: Yato
title: Noragami
text: Man, kids these days. They think it's a competition to have the most friends. One is enough. Find someone completely unique.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: We all have the right to choose our own future. We should be able to walk the paths that we choose, not the future youÂ´ve decided for us.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: A real man is someone who forgives a woman for her lies!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: In every time, in every world, the strong polish their fangs while the weak polish their wisdom.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I've forged my own way alone. While you were consoling and fighting with one another, I faced everything myself, head on. Now look at how strong I am.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: People don't give damn about reasons, but nobody can resist miracles.

author: Juvia Loxar
title: Fairy Tail
text: If you have love in your life, you must keep living.

author: Yoko Littner
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Your back is your one big blind spot.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: We are Partners. If you are a Witch, then I am a Warlock.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: You think you're special? You're not. Everyone lies, everyone hides things... Nobody makes it through this life being completely honest.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something, and has lost something.

author: Gajeel Redfox
title: Fairy Tail
text: Care to little, you lose them. Care too much, you get hurt.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: We are all different from each other and that's what makes us all special.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Bring on the hardship. It's preferred in a path of carnage.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: I don't sit like this because I want to. I have to sit like this. If I were to sit normally, my deductive skills will immediately be reduced by roughly 40%.

author: Akito Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's frightening that there's no guarantee that I'll ever be loved.

author: Akito Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain my beat down on me.

author: Akito Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: It would be nice to live in a kind world without any fear, without any troubles, without hurting anybody, without ever being hurt; only doing the right thing. I wish I could reach this kind world by the shortest path possible.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Talking about peace whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.

author: Ikusaba Marco
title: Mirai Nikki
text: I guess we won't be living together forever as gods. But still... This is forever, too.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: If the truth is a cruel mistress, then a lie must be a nice girl.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Keep fighting on, even if it ain't worth much.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: I wanted to be saved too...

author: Nagisa Hazuki
title: Free!
text: It works better if you don't try as hard, just like in real life.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: I've been trying so hard... Even though you rejected me, I've been trying my best. But if I go on liking you like this then nothing will change.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: Only idiots start fights they can't win.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Now that just looks horrible. It's like some feudal society. If that's what it takes to make friends in this world, forever alone is fine by me.

author: Mei Misaki
title: Another
text: There's no point. Would apologizing serve any purpose? If it will, I'll do it.

author: Klein
title: Sword Art Online
text: Just consider hardships as another part of training and keep working hard.

author: Stephanie Dola
title: No Game No Life
text: A temporary defeat is nothing if it leads to ultimate victory!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: One of the things Blank loves best is saying 'No' to people who think they've got an absolute advantage.

author: Tendou Kisara
title: Black Bullet
text: Even if the world doesn't accept you, I'll always be right by your side!

author: Shiro
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Know what makes Ganta so amazing? He always gets up again.

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Life hurts, you think we don't know that? But some of us choose to go on regardless. Some of us don't have time to die cause people count on us to survive.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I don't have time to worry if it's right or wrong, you can't hope for a horror story with a happy ending!

author: Ryuugajou Nanana
title: Ryuugajou Nanana No Maizoukin
text: Happiness is only happiness when everyone shares it.

author: Ami Kawashima
title: Toradora!
text: Adoration never leads to a balanced relationship.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Getting dumped always makes a man stronger. But then again, men aren't meant to pursue happiness.

author: Kurami Zell
title: No Game No Life
text: A way for the weak to stay weak, but still defeat the strong. A way to stay who you are but surpass your limits. To soar through the sky, even if you can't fly. He's always found a way, inside despair, suffering and darkness.

author: Sumire Muroto
title: Black Bullet
text: Humans tend to think logically, but their actions are driven by emotions...

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: I was just dreaming a little. About my old world. It's strange. In the dream, I wondered if everything here, in Aincard, if everything that had happened with you, was only a dream. I was really scared. I'm happy this wasn't a dream.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: I cried alone every single night. It felt like every day that passed here stole another piece of my real life away. After I cried, I'd go and fight as hard as I could. My only thought was winning, moving forward and getting stronger.

author: Lisbeth
title: Sword Art Online
text: I too, was looking for something. Something real in this world. For me, it was the warmth of your hand.

author: Sachi
title: Sword Art Online
text: Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see the end of this world, and to see why it was born. Live to see why a weak girl like me ended up here. And the reason you and I met.

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: The spring of my heart surges upon the sight of your fresh smile, my love.

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Do you think you could tell me what true strength is? I may be out of line, but hiding your true self and putting on airs doesn't seem any different than running away to me. I would think that embracing the things you truly like and being able to enjoy them is worth more than anything. To just be yourself… I believe that's what true strength really is.

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: I'm not stupid enough to use a cannon to hunt a rabbit.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Either in belief or doubt, if I lean to one of these sides, my reaction time will be dulled if my heart thinks the opposite of what I choose.

author: Rufus Lore
title: Fairy Tail
text: Memories are, in a word, learning. And there's no shame in learning from a formidable enemy!

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: The world...what a glorious place! Seek freedom, and it will lie stretched out before your eyes. If the endless dream guides your restless spirit, seize it! Raise your flag, and stand tall!

author: Sarutobi Ayame
title: Gintama
text: It's as if you are stuck in some predetermined program, following some predetermined script. If you really want to live in reality, then fight against it. Break through destiny with your own hands, and build your own reality!

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: There is no need for any proof. There is no need to create any. We just have to live every second to the fullest, and the traces of the path we lived will burn into the ground. That will serve as proof of our existence.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: The hole in one's heart gets filled by others around you. Friends won't flock to someone who abandons the memory of his friends and gives up on the world just because things don't go the way he wants them to. That won't help fill the hole in your heart. And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up, there will always be salvation.

author: Tetsuya Yūki
title: Diamond No Ace
text: Be daring in the midst of caution, you can't win if you're afraid of taking risks.

author: Daiki Aomine
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The only one who can beat me, is me!

author: Tetsuya Yūki
title: Diamond No Ace
text: Even when times are at their hardest, don't let it show on your face. If the captain is shaken, the team will waver.

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: Change is never easy in this world. I can't even change one friend, let alone a whole country.

author: Isashiki Jun
title: Diamond No Ace
text: No one would intentionally set an easily accessible place as their goal. It's a challenge, because it's difficult. It is a dream because it can't be achieved easily.

author: Fuji Shuusuke
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: A great calligrapher doesn't blame the brush.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Flattery will get you everywhere.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: We are NOT asking him where the treasure is hidden!!! We're not even asking him whether there IS any treasure or not!! I'm not sure, but... ...everybody set out to sea, risking their lives to search for it!!! If you ask this old man anything about it here and now... Then I'll quit being a pirate! I don't want to go on a boring adventure like that!

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: They say people can change, but is that really true? If they decide they want to fly, will they grow wings? I don't think so. You don't change yourself, you change how you do things. You have to make your own way. You have to create a way to fly, even while you stay the same.

author: Sora
title: No Game No Life
text: There is no such thing as luck in this world. Rules, prerequisites, psychological states... There are any number of invisible factors that combine to produce an unpredictable, but inevitable result. The winner of each game is decided before it even begins. Chance is never a factor.

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: We evolve beyond the person we were a minute before. Little by little, we advance a bit further with each turn.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: If you believe in your dreams, I will prove to you, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.

author: Murasaki
title: Hamatora: The Animation
text: Feelings aren't black and white. Even if they're fuzzy and contradictory, if they're sincere, they are what they are.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: There's no such thing as useless effort.

author: Takasugi Shinsuke
title: Gintama
text: The only people who say that money doesn't matter in this world are the ones with lots of it.

author: Reisi Munakata
title: Project K: Days Of Blue
text: Family is the society that you came into contact with first; The people who influence you first. But if that first society banishes you, there will be another society that accepts you.

author: Shimura Tae
title: Gintama
text: No matter how beautiful a person may be, they will still age and ultimately - die. But even so, even if appearances change, don't you believe that we have, in us, things that don't change? Even as our bodies crumble, even as the months and years take their toll... don't you believe that we all have something that time can't spoil? Even if you cover us with wrinkles, we won't lose to you. That's because we know what beauty truly is.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: People need to live their life with a clear conscience. When you want to walk on a straight path, somehow you get yourself stained with mud. However, as long as we never give up, one day the mud on you will dry up and fall off.

author: Silvers Rayleigh
title: One Piece
text: Maybe nothing in this world happens by accident. As everything happens for a reason, our destiny slowly takes form...

author: Nakiami
title: Bounen No Zamned
text: Accept that your life will be painful, bite back your grief and find the power to stand again.

author: Kenji Makabe
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: What took a very long time to build up takes mere moments to destroy. But you can always start over. Next time around, you'll do a better job.

author: Piandao
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The way of the sword doesn't belong to any one nation. Knowledge of the arts belongs to us all.

author: Tobi
title: Naruto
text: Not one wish ever gets granted in this world.

author: Katakura Kojūrō
title: Sengoku Basara
text: We will not just fade away, thought there's no way to know how long it may last. We WILL leave our mark on this world!

author: Hibiki Tokai
title: Vandread
text: The Time is now for us to start something new. Everybody's struggling, you think you're special - you're not. Forget it, there's no time. Don't try to hide in the corner barking and don't take your aggression out on others. If you got time for that, step forward and stand tall, it's our future and no one is gonna give it to us. It's a future that we're gonna build for ourselves, with our very own hands. What's the point in being at the mercy of others. You can't lose as long as you don't give up. No matter how trapped you feel, no matter how unfair you think it is. The only thing that matters is what you see, with your own two eyes. What hope do you have if you turn away from that? What can you hope to achieve without facing the cold hard truth? A person has to have a reason to live, but you don't need any excuse to die.

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: There are two kinds of fights. As long as we place ourselves in battle, we must always know the difference, a fight to defend life or a fight to defend pride.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Death no longer terrifies man, the smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums. So, he creates slavery and savagery... which surpasses the horror of dying.

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: The worst part about being strong is that no one ever asks if you're ok.

author: Tamaki Tsunenaga
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: Good is predicated on corruption and evil.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: After all, justice in this world is just a bunch of principles, made by those with power to suit themselves.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Yes, I'm the nice twin, but this conversation bores me. Go play in traffic, please.

author: Megumi Yamamoto
title: Special A
text: Game over. If that's the case. I just have to play again.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: No matter where you are, you have to have the energy to keep on doing the things that you like until the final moment.

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: You've got to enjoy life, or else you'll end up wasting it.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Learn to make your own decisions, instead of relying on others to make them for you. Otherwise, those decisions will never really be made.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If you don't want to die - think.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Laws exist only for those who cannot live without clinging to them.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Even if you can't move anymore, or your back gets bent out of shape, it doesn't matter! What matters is what's inside! Not what someone looks like, dammit!

author: One Piece
title: One Piece
text: Even if armed with hundreds of weapons... there are times when you just can't beat a man with a spear of conviction in his gut.

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I just want the weak, who do get swept along with the flow, be considered human too.

author: Amu Hinamori
title: Shugo Chara
text: No matter what changes, I'll still be me. And I can be whoever I want to be.

author: Binboda Momiji
title: Binbougami Ga!
text: You're your own worst enemy. If your worries and doubts torment you, then just stop thinking about them.

author: Shinku
title: Rozen Maiden
text: The world is full of choices unseen. With the willingness to notice, anyone can choose a world of their very own, from an infinity of choices.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!

author: Tatsuya Shiba
title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei
text: It's a nice thought to believe in a "next time". If it was a real battlefield, there wouldn't be a "next time".

author: Kunio Yaobi
title: Tamako Market
text: If you think music is only made of sounds, you're mistaken. Silence is also part of music.

author: Motoharu Yano
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: I hate memories. Because reality is better than memories. A reality where I exist and you're here right next to me.

author: Tsumugu Kinagase
title: Kill la Kill
text: Victory isn't determined solely by who has the superior physical abilities.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: It's over when you give up.

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.

author: Haruka Nanase
title: Free!
text: I've seen this before. This sensation... I get it now. This is what I wanted. No need to rely on or work with other people. I just want to drift through the water alone in silence.

author: Teppei Kiyoshi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: For living creatures, Victory if Life, and Defeat means Death.

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: We have to live a life of no regrets.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: If there's no one happy, is it really a victory?

author: Riki Naoe
title: Little Busters!
text: Nothing good can come by rejecting yourself.

author: Alis Color
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: We simply cannot see the world as it is. The world people see is nothing more than how our brains translate it. In other words, it's subjective.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: The same thing as always. No matter how many times I reach game over and no matter how many times I must pathetically hit continue, I will not stop moving forward.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: The real sin is averting your eyes and failing to believe in anyone.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: Comrade isn't simply a word. Comrades are about heart. It's the unconditional trust in your partners. Please, feel free to lean on me.... And I, too, will lean on you as well.

author: Kaoru Yamazaki
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: Feelings of romantic love are, in the end, just some chemical reaction. Under the right conditions, they occur no matter who the other person is.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: In essence, language accounts for a mere 30% of human communication. The other 70% is made up of information collected from eye movements and other body language. With that, even a loner who never takes part in conversation can pull off 70% of what we consider communication.

author: Hampnie Hambart
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: Remember this. The only words that can keep you alive are "I want to live."

author: Manjoume Jun
title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX
text: Sorry. I don't believe in fate. I explore my future with my own strength. Good or bad, it's my own choice.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I don't like the terms "good person" or "bad person" because it's impossible to be entirely good to everyone or entirely bad to everyone. To some, you are a good person, while to others, you are a bad person.

author: Eddie Lee
title: Beck
text: If you live life by other people's standards, then your life is no longer yours.

author: Yuji Sakurai
title: Beck
text: There are two types of people in this world - those who do what they're told and those who stay true to themselves. Most people think you're supposed to follow a predetermined path, keep your head down, obey the rules, do whatever's popular. But some prefer to follow their own path in life.

author: Ogami Rei
title: Code:Breaker
text: Giving into the pain and thinking you want to die just means you've been spoiled by life. If you don't want to die, then don't act spoiled. Suffer through life; crawl through life. Stick it out till the very end. If you still want to die after that, come find me. I'll end you.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: This is how culture spreads. When someone has a new idea, it is immediately copied.

author: Aoi Asahina
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Real strength only reveals itself when one is faced with great turmoil! Therefore, I shall always tread a thorny path!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Life is basically like a soap bubble. It rides on the wind, flying here and there... and before you realize it - pop! It's gone. When it's about to disappear, you think that you could've flown a little higher. But by the time, it's already too late.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: That's what I call smallness as a human being. No matter how much I'm irritated by it, I can't do anything about it. It's not complex, just stunted. Because as a human being I'm small, or something.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Everyday was the same. Deep down, I felt bored. But it wasn't the days that felt boring. It was being just like everyone else.

author: Nanashi
title: Sword of the Stranger
text: Those who have no skill, require harsh instruction if they are to have any hope to get any better.

author: Izumi Curtis
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: When you live, your life will end sooner or later. The body will return to the earth. Grass and flowers will grow on top of it. The soul will nourish the hearts... and it will live on in the hearts of other people. Everything in this world flows around and circulates. That goes for human lives too.

author: Hei
title: Darker than Black
text: Spilled water will never return to its container.

author: Yuzuki Eba
title: Kimi no Iru Machi
text: As long as you do not give up, nothing is over.

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Listen up, kid. There's one thing you need to understand. Human life is a fragile thing. So weak that I can destroy it with a touch of my finger. So watch what you say. If you don't, I may break something I shouldn't.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Nothing can suppress a human's curiosity.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: There's no meaningful difference between a real and a virtual world. It's pointless to ask anyone who they really are. All you can do is accept and believe in them, because whoever they are in your mind, is their true identity.

author: Makoto Naegi
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: If the world outside is void of hope, and if despair is contagious, then I'll just have to infect everyone with my hope. Living in despair really isn't living at all.

author: Aoi Asahina
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: Sakura-chan would probably say "Strength can only be obtained by standing up to adversity. So I choose to walk down the path filled with thorns."

author: Nino
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: I want to hear who you are, not what you have.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become... as strong as they can be.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: There's no advantage to hurrying through life.

author: Okajima Rokuro
title: Black Lagoon
text: I'm no saint. A sense of duty, a sense of righteousness - they're just nuisances in life.

author: Dune
title: Casshern Sins
text: I want to live... I want to hold something in my hands and feel its warmth.

author: Akoes
title: Casshern Sins
text: Anyone can make a mistake. If you feel bad about it, will that sin disappear?

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Good and bad are human concepts, so something that is not human cannot be classified as neither good nor bad.

author: Akashi Seijuurou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: When I tell you to leave, leave. In this world, winning is everything. Winners are affirmed completely, and losers are denied completely. I've never lost at anything before, and I never will. Because I always win, and I'm always right. I show no mercy to those who oppose me, not even my own parents.

author: Charles Beams
title: Eureka Seven
text: Don't worry about being so considerate of adults. You can only be a kid for so long, so you might as well enjoy it.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Even though there's such a thing as an impossible game, there's no such thing as an impossible reality.

author: Kajoumaru Hidetomo
title: Bleach
text: If one side was just, it would be called a defense or a suppression. But this is war. And wars happen because both sides are just.

author: Litonar
title: Suisei no Gargantia
text: To someone who bears responsibility, there's no greater treasure than experience.

author: Reiji Nitta
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: If you're felling like there's nowhere you belong... That you're trapped in a small world. It's those feelings that drive us beyond our world.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: People have to save themselves. One person saving another is impossible.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: It's difficult to change the world on your own, but twisting it a little might not be all that hard.

author: Sawako Kuronuma
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: The longer you're with someone, the tougher it is to part ways.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: All I need is the power to be able to protect my comrades. So long as I can have the strength to do that, I don't care if I'm weaker than everyone else in the world.

author: Winry Rockbell
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: There are some things in life that will only be understood through words.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I don't know which option you should choose. I could never advise you on that... No matter what kind of wisdom dictates you the option you pick, no one will be able to tell if it's right or wrong until you arrive to some sort of outcome from your choice.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: This is our show. We're the ones who are writing the script.

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: People's feelings are memories that transcend time.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The trick of real combat is that everyone is human.

author: Jinbei
title: One Piece
text: Don't just think about the ones you have lost. You can't get back what you have lost. What is it that you still have ?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: What is right? What is wrong? In this mixed up world, deciding what is right and wrong is not easy. You can't just go by somebody else's rules. If you let yourself be controlled like that, you'll just become a puppet that can't make decisions on it's own. You have to live by your rules.

author: Genjuurou Tsukishima
title: Mushibugyou
text: If we are frightened, the people behind us will be, as well. You must be a shining star... that washes away fear, so that those behind you wil not be afraid!

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: How you change is up to you.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: If we're unable to climb down the mountain, then we won't know whether there's another mountain to climb up.

author: Coach Kamogawa
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: Why are you punching? What are you chasing? You should already know the answer to that. To become strong.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts beside us.

author: Rain
text: Being frightened of a strong enemy is perfectly natural. Confidence is something you build up, triumph upon triumph.

author: Konan
title: Gekkou
text: Bare emotions tell the truth much eloquently than any justification.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The past and the future are not the same, but they're not completely separate either.

author: Yu Fujikura
title: Princess Lover!
text: For people like us, we do not have a choice over the environment we're in, but we get to decide what we will make of it and what path we will take from there.

author: Naota Nandaba
title: FLCL
text: When you're on a bike, the ocean's a lot closer than you think. The autumn salt wind went right through to the back of my nose. And maybe it's because, like Haruko said, my head was empty.

author: Riki
title: Ai no Kusabi
text: When extremes are reached, evil turns to virtue.

author: Hajime Ichinose
title: Gatchaman Crowds
text: It's scary to decide, isn't it? But we have to decide something. If we make a decision, things might change.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Our injuries will heal as long as we're alive. But the scars will remain.

author: Ousawa Akatsuki
title: Hagure Yuusha No Estetica
text: If we only believe when the odds are with us, then that's not believing at all.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: I pretended it was someone else's fault that nothing happened. But I was wrong. If you put your mind to it, you can change the color of your world in an instant.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: I realized why I was lost. It's not because I didn't have a map... It was because I didn't have a destination.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: I'm not stupid. I'm just too lazy to show how smart I am.

author: Alicia Florence
title: Aria The Natural
text: When I was a child, whenever it snowed, I would play and make snowballs. When you start rolling a snowball, someone will always appear out of nowhere and help you make it bigger and in the end, everyone goes home satisfied. It was then that I suddenly thought “This is what I want to grow up to be like”.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I am not going to take sides, I am neutral. I am talking about standpoints here, that is all. Miss Class Representative (Hanekawa Tsubasa) has her point of view and her parents have their own. There is no way for an outsider to know which of them is right. Actually, there is not a right one in the first place. It is just about who is easier to agree with.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: Do not lose to the obstacles that you will meet in the future. I have my own set of goals but do not pursue them because of my laziness.

author: Coach Kamogawa
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: Run until you can't run anymore, and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut.

author: Kotori Kanbe
title: Rewrite
text: A garden retains its beauty as long as it is tended to and cared for. Life in general, is the same. Once it becomes pretty, it mustn't go back to being the primitive mess it started out as.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Although I'm weak and full of flaws, I will never stop moving forward. No matter who I am, no one other than myself will create my own existence. No matter what others may think or feel, I will still move forward as myself.

author: Ryougi Shiki
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: A person can only murder another once. The act of murder is giving up the humanity that is within oneself. What is left is just emptiness. You can not lose humanity if it is already lost. The act of murder turns into the act of slaughter. They are two different things.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.

author: Sumino Hikage
title: Koko Ni Iru Yo!
text: On the internet, we only know each other's usernames. If we were talking face to face, I probably would never talk to them this way. They look at the "Real Me". They support me a lot... I wish there were more people like them.

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: You only understand the true value of things after you've lost them.

author: Yuusha
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: Words alone, can make an entire army withdraw.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Moping around with sadness and sorrow... what will come of it? Even dead people can do that. However, I'll live and stand on my own two legs. If we are going to die one day, wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The world is destined for even greater chaos.

author: Princess Emeraude
title: Magic Knight Rayearth
text: Remember this... no matter where you go, the strength of your mind and spirit is the most powerful magic of all.

author: Shura Kirigakure
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: You didn't raise a weapon. You raised a son.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: You should keep your distance from me if you want to live. My place is in the shadows, yours in the light. We walk opposite paths, Aberline. It's best that you remember that.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: You want to keep everyone from dying? That's naive. It's war. People die.

author: Oogumo
title: Guilty Crown
text: When you confess your feelings, you should do a proper job.

author: Senator Figaro
title: Kakumeiki Valvrave
text: I'm neither a soldier, nor a brave man. Not to mention that running away isn't the same thing as losing. You only truly lose by dying. So as long you're alive, you win!

author: Saiyuki
title: Saiyuki
text: A past will chase you if you try to escape from it, but once you confront it, it's just an old memory inside you.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Is there truly any human who is not arrogant?

author: Annie Leonhardt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You are saying that innately, all people are good, and if they were to just assume their nature, this organization wouldn't be so rotten, right? But in my opinion, the structure of the organization, the way it is set up is what provides insight into what the true human nature really is.

author: Ludenberg Celestia
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: I'm rather proud of my ability to tell lies. I can trick not only others, but even my own heart.

author: Setsuna F. Seiei
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will.

author: Maka Albarn
title: Soul Eater
text: It's not that you don't know how to interact with people. It's just that no one ever came to interact with you.

author: Taichi Yaegashi
title: Kokoro Connect
text: When you're hiding a secret from the whole world, it puts a weight on your shoulders.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Everything doesn't have to be decided by life and death. Just think about the future.

author: Misaki Kamiigusa
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: We found ourselves in conflict with each other many times. There were hard times when we wanted to run away or give up. But it was only because that rain fell, that the seeds of our emotions could sprout. And the flowers of deeper friendship could bloom.

author: Sorata Kanda
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Opportunities wait for no one! If you let an opportunity slip through your fingers with an excuse like, “I wasn't prepared.” You'll never get another opportunity like that again! But it is your life. Live it the way you want.

author: Akasaka Ryuunosuke
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Dividing an impossibly large task into smaller solvable problems, is a programmer's job.

author: Hampnie Hambart
title: Kamisama no Inai Nichiyoubi
text: Schools are facilities where human society secludes the troublesome children by age criteria.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Opportunities and success come only to those who do not fear to stand in the batter's box. Who want to hit the ball more than anything, and swing with all their might!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Before creation there must be destruction. If my soul stands in the way, then I'll toss it aside. Yes, I have no choice but to move forward.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Everyone can make a choice after they have learned what it will result in. It is so easy to say we should have done it this way afterwards. But you can't know what your choice will result in before actually choosing.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You must look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self reveal itself.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: I'm not against socializing, so long as it's not tiring.

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: Rock, if you think about it, other than this, what do we really value in life? God? Love? Don't make me laugh. When I was a brat, crawling around in that shithole city, it seemed God and Love were always sold out when I went looking. Before I knew better, I clung to God and prayed to Him every single night — yeah, I believed in God right up until that night the cops beat the hell out of me for no reason at all. All they saw when they looked at me was another little ghetto rat. With no power and no God, what's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money, of course, and guns. Fuckin' A. With these two things, the world's a great place.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: If you're lonely, you should say something! If you're worried, say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you, you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself, you should still say something!

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I haven't lived all that long yet, but there is something I firmly believe in. The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all without exception, have the guts to abandon things important to them if they have to. They are those who can abandon even their humanity.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Why are you staring at me? Are you annoyed that I am the only one who has cake?

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: To climb a hill on a difficult road, you need to be walking steadily.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Gohan, you showed me that power is nothing without being guided without love.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't think anyone is born knowing the reason why they're here. It's just something you have to find as you go along.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: To become a monster like me, is to admit you were too weak to remain a human.

author: Shana
title: Shakugan no Shana
text: Those who rely on "someday" will only grow weaker and lowlier.

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: "I long to see someone who died", "I want to be rich", "I want women", "I want to protect the world"... They're all desires. In other words, wishes. If you ask me, there's neither "right" or "wrong" when it comes to greed. You humans go around ranking certain types of greed in order from good to bad, which makes you so hard to understand.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Sometimes, we have to look beyond what we want and do what's best.

author: Charles Zi Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The world lies! Thou shalt not commit murder, thou shalt not bear false witness, thou shalt not cheat, thou shalt not steal, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife. All of these are lies! Mere illusions and nothing more! They don't want to be killed, they don't want to be robbed, using the twin lies of justice and morality, the weak are endeavoring to protect themselves. But the first truth is that the strong devour the weak, so let us feed upon people, upon wealth, upon riches and power! We, at Britannia, shall feast upon the raw flesh of the world itself! We will crush this deception and bring forth the truth! All Hail Britannia!

author: Alcor
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Denying possibility is denying thought.

author: Soichiro Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Laws aren't perfect, because humans who created laws aren't perfect. It's impossible to be perfect. However, the laws are evidence of the human's struggle to be righteous.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: It's stupid to talk about things you're not. Be yourself and you'll be fine.

author: Kawamura Sachiko
title: NANA
text: We are all farsighted, we give importance to those things that are far from us, while neglecting the things that are close to us... only to realize their value later, when they are out-of-reach again.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Manga endings might always end the same. However, if it comes to life. Neither you or I are mere readers. We are writers. We can change the ending.

author: Black Lagoon
title: Black Lagoon
text: People are like dice, a certain Frenchman said that. You throw yourself in the direction of your own choosing. People are free because they can do that. Everyone's circumstances are different, but no matter how small the choice, at the very least, you can throw yourself. It's not chance or fate. It's the choice you made.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Murder doesn't necessarily mean evil, right? The world being what it is, a lot of people out there deserve to die, don't they? But those who do take it upon themselves to kill others, have to be prepared to have others try to kill them as well. And that's what they call the law of Karma, my friends. That's why good or bad, the only ones who are going to be left standing are the ones with the strongest wills to survive.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Time flows constantly, it doesn't care about the people who are struggling.

author: Priest
title: Kekkaishi
text: The world is not meant just to be looked at, it's important to get the feel of things. Don't be captivated just by what's in front of you and neglect the rest. Free your mind from evil and accept everything as it is. This is what we call enlightenment.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart.

author: Ohnoki
title: Naruto
text: It's because I've experienced pain in the past, that I can even consider what would be best for the future!

author: Deadman Wonderland
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: What do you suppose the most irrational thing is? - It's humanity.

author: Ikazuchi Akatsuki
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: The world consists of "choices", in other words, it consists of continual gamble. Other guys are not aware of this. Thus they moved about in confusion.

author: Ganta Igarashi
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: There's nothing that won't change, every day things will change a little bit more.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: Resignation is what kills people. Once they've rejected resignation, humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: A certain scripture mentions that humans are superior to angels. Why? Because there are people who know of evil, but do not become evil. It's different from angels, who know only of good since birth. Humans have evil, but can live as good, so they are superior to angels, who know only good.

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Reject common sense to make the impossible possible!

author: Deneil Young
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: Some things can't be prevented. The last of which, is death. All we can do is live until the day we die. Control what we can... and fly free!

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: God is emotional bullshit.

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of it will be acknowledged by others.

author: Miho Azuki
title: Bakuman
text: I think having a dream, working hard, and never giving up couldn't possibly bring misfortune.

author: Hunter X Hunter
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: You must be prepared to face the worst possible scenarios. Because harsh reality strikes without warning.

author: Trisha Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: We really are weak creatures, but that's why we can strive to become stronger. Even if you feel it's useless, each step we take leads to something great. That's why I'm sure we'll be able to change. Because we're weak... and because death is inevitable. Humans try their best to live and end up becoming stronger.

author: Scar's Master
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Enduring and forgiving are two different things. You must not forget the unjustness of society. As a human being, you must hold the event in contempt. Yet, you must endure. You must put an end to the chain of hatred!

author: Shinobu Sensui
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Nothing worse than being strong, but not strong enough.

author: Hodaka Murakami
title: RDG: Red Data Girl
text: There is a reason one wears make-up on stage. Applying color to one's face is almost a spell. When one's face is different, one's personality can change.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Don't start a fight that you can't finish.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I don't care what the society says. I've regretted doing anything. I will survive and do what I want to.

author: Soul Evans
title: Soul Eater
text: The fear of interacting with people...even I understand that one.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: You can never tell what'll happen next in life. But so long as you have faith in your feet, the road you walk will be a part of you.

author: Yoki
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: There's nothing that's entirely black or white.

author: Shinobu Sensui
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Drop ink on the finest snow-white paper and it will inevitably absorb into black. Its purity demands it. Tainted men have immunities. Black does not absorb black.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: We're nothing like God. Not only do we have limited powers, but sometimes we're driven to become the devil himself.

author: Crocodile
title: One Piece
text: "If I do this, I can stop the rebellion", "if I do that, I can stop the rebellion"... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!

author: Sayaka Miki
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: The balance between hope and despair keeps itself to zero. When was it you told me that? I understand what you mean now, I did save quite a few people, but in exchange hatred and jealousy filled my heart, I even hurt my best friend. Someone has to be cursed to balance out a wish for someone else's happiness.

author: Nonomiya
title: Gekkou
text: Sometimes the truth can hurt others more than a lie.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Regardless of our limitations, we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes, because if an opening arises, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!

author: Souda Manatsu
title: RDG: Red Data Girl
text: Humans have the ability to actively put things to an end rather than simply accept what's in store.

author: Miyuki Sagara
title: RDG: Red Data Girl
text: I want to find a path that no one else had taken into consideration.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: There are three conditions to terrify someone: One, the monster can't speak. Two, the monster has to be unidentifiable. Three, it's meaningless if the monster can die.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: It's not possible to save everything. Prioritize your goals.

author: Ergo Proxy
title: Ergo Proxy
text: Even if I was someone, people couldn't comprehend me. And even if they could, they wouldn't be able to communicate it to those around them. I do not belong to the world. That is the world's limit, the boundary between the world and the self.

author: Seta Soujirou
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: When you are trying to rebuild a build that was made incorrectly, you first have to destroy it. I thought this was the true.

author: Vincent Volaju
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: No one can draw a clear line between sane and insane. You move that line as you see fit for yourself. No one else can. You'll understand soon... that the one that's insane is this world.

author: Atsuko Chiba
title: Paprika
text: Don't you think dreams and the Internet are similar? They are both areas where the repressed conscious mind vents.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: If fighting could provide us with the truth, nobody would make any mistakes in their lives. A person's life is not that easy. The truth you must learn from yourself, from how you live your life.

author: Ergo Proxy
title: Ergo Proxy
text: From the perspective of others I am part of the world, but when I observe the world from my perspective I am nowhere to be found. To observe is to create perspective. I can never cease to be the point of origin from my perspective. I observe that which is not myself. This is the first principle to find.

author: Hoody
title: Ergo Proxy
text: A lie is truth, until you recognize it as a lie. To see the truth behind those lies is probably the right thing to do. However, it may not necessarily bring happiness. Lies are Happiness.

author: Vincent Volaju
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Know much about purgatory? It's the place between heaven and hell, where those who were left behind, unable to get into heaven continue to suffer, a place of struggle and pain. In other words, the world that we're in now.

author: Deneil Young
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: Do what you can until you learn what you need. If you're going to try something, you may as well aim for the top.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Real power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart. It fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity scarcely imagined to be possible.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway, then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!

author: Ergo Proxy
title: Ergo Proxy
text: Remember. You can feel it if you hold your hand against your chest. It belongs to no one. It's our pulse, yours and mine. This is what brings us to the truth. It's what proves that we are the very world itself. Follow your instincts. The answer is already there.

author: Rosette Christopher
title: Chrono Crusade
text: Let me ask you the reverse. How is it that you can give up so easily? [exaggerated sigh] I can't understand that…attitude! “It's bad luck! I have no choice!” People who passively accept their fate…because no one knows their future, least of all me, so I don't dare put things off. I have to do what I can, while I can still do it, so…I'll be kicking and screaming, 'til the very end.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: I want to know if it is a crime to live as you are, when you are different from others.

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: There's nothing special about being born. Not a thing. Most of the universe is just death, nothing more. In this universe of ours, the birth of a new life on some corner of our planet is nothing but a tiny, insignificant flash. Death is a normal thing. So why live?

author: Rosette Christopher
title: Chrono Crusade
text: What is important is to know fear and yet take a step forward.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: No matter what I attempt, even if it's the most simple of tasks, it always ends in failure. Unfortunately, I find that my life is one big regret after another. Yet, after all these years, I still don't know when to give up. Is it my fault to keep trying when the results are always the same? Is it impossible for me to make things right? Even if I'd try to give up, I don't think I could. It's not in my nature to submit in the face of disappointment. In the end, I guess I'm just a glutton for punishment. I really am an idiot.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.

author: Rosette Christopher
title: Chrono Crusade
text: Because my time is limited, I don't have any time to waste hesitating. That is why I can walk straight ahead. That is why I never stop.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: Who are you again? Sorry, I have a bad memory for ugly faces.

author: Kagetoki Kariya
title: Samurai Champloo
text: Only hope can give rise to the emotion we call despair. But it is nearly impossible for a man to try to live without hope, so I guess that leaves Man no choice but to walk around with despair as his companion.

author: Kuroko No Basket
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: No matter how hard you practice, "someday" and "maybe" aren't good enough. I need to know if you have ambitious goals and the will to accomplish them.

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: Trying without the winning intent is meaningless.

author: Saber
title: Fate/zero
text: Of what worth is a king who fails to protect the powerless?

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education... Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: Do you understand how to handle cards now? I win as long as I can make you think "there's no way he will play that card".

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Sinful? Corrupt? I don't understand your logic. Why must pleasure and sin be connected? Pleasure gotten through evil means could be a sin. But pleasure can also result from good deeds. What kind of philosophy calls pleasure itself a sin?

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass
text: It's not the final judgement of "good" and "evil" that's important. What matters is that you come to that decision yourself. That you agonize over it and eventually accept it.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text:
Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value 
of living.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Did you know every time you sigh, a little bit of happiness escapes?

author: Charlie Staz
title: Blood Lad
text: The ones who do what they want and enjoy the most of their lives are the ones who win in the end.

author: Hoshimura Junichirou
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: If you dislike the situation, use your strength to change it.

author: Shinsekai Yori
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: The power of imagination is what changes everything.

author: Caster
title: Fate/zero
text: Fright is about the feeling that you will die. The true meaning of terror doesn't lie in a static condition, but in a change.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.

author: Matou Kariya
title: Fate/zero
text: Children's minds are immature. They do not possess a firm resolve and the strength to turn their misery to anger. Confronted with a cruel fate, they were not provided with the choice of having a strong will. Moreover, as they have not lived through and comprehended life, ideals such as honor and hope are yet to be completely nurtured in them.
