Therefore, in moments of despair, children are more prone than adults to seal away their own mind, lock up their own heart. Because they have not tasted the joy of life they can afford to discard. Because they have not understood the meaning of future, they can sink into despair.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: Even if no one in the world believes you, stick out your chest and scream in defiance.

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: Discouraging, isn't it? It's always easier to tear down than to build... And much more difficult to tie than to untie.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Why don't you buy paper books? E-books lack character.

author: Suzaku Kururugi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The best way to remove your lies is to make them come true.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Things like protecting the world are no more than moral reasons that sound good.

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: If you run into a wall and pretend it doesn't exist, you'll never make progress. The wall will never change, so you're the one who has to change.

author: Kotomine Risei
title: Fate/zero
text: One's true worth shows as hardship increases.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what's happened and continue living.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: You wanted revenge? You're just making other people as miserable as you. Revenge is just the path you took to escape your suffering.

author: Maou
title: Maoyuu Maou Yuusha
text: The freedom to do better than you do now, to be better than you are now. The spirit did not create us perfectly good. She gave us the freedom to keep trying to be better everyday.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: When people have different opinions, you should apply the majority vote.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I think the best disciplining is pain.

author: Mikoto Suoh
title: K Project
text: Our bodies get bigger, but our hearts get torn up.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Any man who has the brains to think and the nerve to act for the benefit of the people of the country, is considered a radical, by those who are content with stagnation and willing to endure disaster.

author: Millions Knives
title: Trigun
text: If you let the fly live, the spider is going to die. You can't save both without one suffering.

author: Zeniba
title: Spirited Away
text: Once you meet someone, you never really forget them. It just takes a while for your memory to come back to you.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Is it that you get the power, then you choose to protect someone else? No! We first want to protect someone, that's why we try to get stronger in the first place.

author: Akise Aru
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Whether I win or lose is up to me.

author: Yoichi Karasuma
title: Asu No Yoichi
text: There is no match that you know that "you can't win". Even if a match like that exists, the thing that decides the defeat is your heart. That makes you think you've "lost".

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: So what if the government collapses or the country is ruined? I'm not civic-minded! All I want to do is stand tall and live on until the day I collapse and die!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.

author: Aladdin
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: The bonds we have with those close to us, keep us connected always.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs, nor muscles - it's my soul!

author: Minori Kushieda
title: Toradora!
text: If you trip while running down a hallway, you'll get a nosebleed. If you trip in life, you'll cry.

author: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
text: Time waits for no one.

author: Count D
title: Pet Shop of Horrors
text: True destiny cannot be changed. The reason is actually quite simple. True destiny isn't granted - it is earned.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father.

author: Virgo Shaka
title: Saint Seiya
text:
The flowers bloom, then wither... The stars shine and one day become extinct. This earth, the sun, the galaxies and even the big universe,
someday will be destroyed. Compared with that, the human life is only a blink, just a little time. In that short time - people are born, laugh, cry, fight, are injured, feel joy, sadness, hate someone, love someone. All in just a moment. And then, are embraced by the eternal sleep called death.

author: Yoshitsune
title: Air Gear
text: Then I ask you, what do you define as the beginning of the sky? At one hundred meter or even one thousand meters, it isn't much different from right here. The sole difference is the air density and water concentration. So, this is where sky begins. Anything above the earth belongs to the domain of sky.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: When I was at the brink of life and death, I used all of my will to survive. I drew upon a different power than that of self-sacrifice and mastered an ultimate technique. The will to live is stronger than anything else. That was the ray of light that my master risked his life to show me. As Hitokiri Battousai, I have committed so many crimes that I cannot possibly repent for them. That is why I had secretly believed that it didn't matter when I died or was killed. However, now... even if I am formally punished or restrained. I will never lose the will to live.

author: Yozora Mikazuki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: It doesn't matter if you can make 100 friends. Instead, make real friends who are as important to you as 100 is to them. It doesn't matter if you have one, as long as it's a friend that you care about.

author: Kuroyukihime
title: Accel World
text: No need to be afraid of the end, because this world is infinite!

author: Eru Chitanda
title: Hyouka
text: If someone didn't have any pride, wouldn't they also be lacking in self-confidence? If someone was free of greed, wouldn't they have trouble supporting their family? And if people didn't envy one another, wouldn't they stop inventing new things?

author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: If you have friends - you'll have a full life. And if you don't, you can still manage somehow.

author: Setsuna F. Seiei
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: You want to kill me? You couldn't even kill my boredom!

author: Tony Tony Chopper
title: One Piece
text: I realized that back then, the reason I wanted to become human, was that I really just wanted to have friends. Now, I just want to be a monster that can help Luffy.

author: Coach Kamogawa
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: There are times when working hard may not be enough. But those who succeed worked hard.

author: Fujimoto Shirou
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: If you don't like to be treated like a kid, then why don't you try showing how much you have grown up.

author: Itsuki Minami
title: Air Gear
text: A frog in a well does not hope to swim in the ocean, or go to dive in deep sea. What they're looking at since they are born, isn't the ocean, but the sky.

author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: People can live without friends. Friends are not oxygen or water, they're more like luxury goods.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Hey! I'm totally an adult! I bitch and whine, lie through my teeth, and do things that are unfair.

author: Mikiya Kokutō
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: Pain isn't something you have to feel, it's something you have to express.

author: Uryuu Minene
title: Mirai Nikki
text: Doesn't matter if you're weak. If you struggle hard enough, you can make a miracle happen.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Living should mean no do-overs. This is for the best.

author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: People's mind are like alien existence. We don't know where they are, and we can barely scratch the surface of what they really are.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: You sure can talk the talk, but you're not quite ready to walk the walk. Time's up, it's my turn.

author: Coach Kamogawa
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: Sometimes, no matter what kind of effort you put in, it just doesn't really pay off.

author: CLANNAD
title: CLANNAD
text: The world is beautiful. Even if you're full of tears and sadness, open your eyes. Do what you want to do. Be what you want to be. Find friends. Don't be in a hurry to grow up. Take your time.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: You'll only realize that you truly love someone if they already caused you enormous pain. Your enemies can never hurt you the way your loved ones can. It's the people close to your heart that can give you the most piercing wound. Love is a double-edged sword, it can heal the wound faster or it can sink the blade even deeper.

author: Alcor
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Living is anxiety and pain. It's continuing to think, continuing to choose.

author: Hamrio Musica
title: Rave Master
text: If something has a strong core, it won't break. That's true for both - swords and people.

author: Haru Glory
title: Rave Master
text: Is fighting right, or wrong? Does winning in the end mean justice? Truthfully, I don't know. But I know we must fight this battle! Or we will never save the world.

author: Hikari Hanazono
title: Special A
text: The first person to love the other, is considered as a loser.

author: Shirley Fenette
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Nothing is unforgivable. So if you cannot forgive him, it means you do not want to.

author: Yozora Mikazuki
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: Humans love hurting others when they can´t be hurt themselves. Like killing animals, or flaming people online. And if the target makes a mistake, it fans the flames even more, and the bully gets even more fun out of it.

author: Setsuna F. Seiei
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: While we are talking of peace, people are dying.

author: Lockon Stratos
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: You people, are you satisfied with this kind of world? I'm not.

author: Teppei Kiyoshi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: If you wanna climb a mountain, you obviously aim for the top, but you gotta enjoy the scenery too.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Are we friends? Or are we foes? That kind of thing you decide for yourselves!

author: Toki Fujiwara
title: Code:Breaker
text: I could kill you, but I wont become like you, who uses power for his own egoism.

author: Ludenberg Celestia
title: Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou No Koukousei
text: It is not the strong or the smart that survive, but the ones who can bring about change.

author: Ohtorizawa Akatsuki
title: Hagure Yuusha No Estetica
text: Transfer students, no mater what world or time they're in - exist to be stared at.

author: Haruto Kirishima
title: Kimi no Iru Machi
text: The more exciting it was to meet, the sadder it feels to say goodbye, right?

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Our world is like a terminal cancer. Saying you'll change things through individual will is rambling of a peace-loving fool.

author: Winry Rockbell
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: There are some things that can only be conveyed through words.

author: King Bradley
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: The life of each human is worth one life, that's it. Nothing more, nothing less.

author: Sunako Kirishiki
title: Shiki
text: If I was the protagonist in this story, I'm sure someone would come save me. It would be like a miracle. But I have no one to save me. There is no god who would grant me a miracle. I'm a murderer, after all. But I've done nothing bad. All I did was feed myself. If I hadn't, I would have starved to death. Would it have been better that way? Am I evil because I didn't let myself starve to death? Give me an answer, Muroi-san! I didn't willingly become such a creature. But if I have a life, shouldn't I treasure it? Is that a sin? Muroi-san! This is what it means to be abandoned by God.

author: Kenji Harima
title: School Rumble
text: The moment of one's confession, is the moment of another's dumping.

author: Ein
title: Phantom: Requiem For The Phantom
text: Dreams are illusions. All they do is interfere with reality.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: I want you to understand something. If you should lose, not only does your future end, but also the future of the one you are trying to protect. Defeat isn't an option for the sword that protects others. You should keep that thought engraved in your heart.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: It is foolish to listen to one who will not listen to you. Do as you wish.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Why do people lie? It isn't only because they struggle against each other, it's also because there is something that they're seeking.

author: Tatsumi
title: Shiki
text: It's not a matter of a creature's individual worth. It's a matter of a creature's personal feelings.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing
text: *to Alucard* Demons do not cry... You became a demon, because you couldn't cry anymore, right? Humans cry, and when their tears finally run dry, there is nothing left, but a demon, nor a monster, and one finally prayer for death...

author: Olivier Mira Armstrong
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: If a man will not work, he shall not eat.

author: Tatsumi
title: Shiki
text: Everything eventually faces destruction. Everything eventually disappears.

author: Haruka Nanase
title: Free!
text: When you're ten, they call you a prodigy. When you're fifteen, they call you a genius. Once you hit twenty, you're just an ordinary person.

author: Van Hohenheim
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: We're all lost... That's why we're sad.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: I can't stray from my path for those I've left behind.

author: Ryuuguu Rena
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: Friends are nothing more than the people who you spend the fun, yet meaningless times with. When those times get rough, they aren't there to support you.

author: Sai
title: Naruto
text: It's because Sakura loves Sasuke that she doesn't want him to sink any lower. It's because she loves him that she wants to rescue him from the evil path he currently walks. Even if the only way to do it is to kill him with her own two hands, I believe, she's prepared to do it because she loves him.

author: Kenji Harima
title: School Rumble
text: Even though one is dumped, no matter how one shows his misfortune and seeks kindness, the world doesn't give a damn about it.

author: Yakumo Tsukamoto
title: School Rumble
text: Rather than not doing anything and regretting it, we should do something and regret it.

author: Inori Yuzuriha
title: Guilty Crown
text: You might be able to do it if you try. But if you don't try, you definitely can't.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Cherry blossoms in Spring. Stars cover the sky on Summer. Full moon shines on Autumn and in Winter, the snow covers the ground. All these things make sake taste good. If it tastes bad, it's because there is something wrong in you.

author: Hajime Kanzaki
title: Beelzebub
text: You can't keep something without fighting for it.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: We shouldn't blame ourselves for bad things that happened to us. Sometimes, no matter what we do, we are victims of the circumstances. We should just have to pull ourselves out.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: When a person loses their sense of belonging, they want someone else to hand it back to them on a platter.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Murder is the only art a swordsman may practice. No ornamental words can change that. You want to protect people with murder? You'll slaughter legions so that a few may live. Many years, long before you were born, my sword was tearing asunder the lives of men. Yes, all of those men were evil, but they were human beings first and foremost, Kenshin. The world you ardently desire to enter will not know what to do with you. It will deceive you into believing that you are saving lives even as you destroy them. You will accept these lies all the while, your hands will be stained with the worst of offenses.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: The dead don't desire revenge, but the happiness of the living.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: There are things that cannot be taken back. But the world will keep on spinning whether you laugh or you cry. High school life will eventually end too.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Here, my armies once rode across the land. The place all the heroes who stood with me, through joy and sorrow, will never forget. I can make this world real because it still exists within our hearts! Behold my endless armies! Their bodies destroyed, and their souls offered to the world as Heroic Spirits. And still, these legendary heroes pledge their loyalty to me! My bond with them is my greatest treasure, my path of kingship! The ultimate Noble Phantasm that I, Iskandar, possess. Ionian Hetairoi!

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: It is a simple story. There is nothing that brings me happiness. It does not matter, let it be believing in people or having people believe in me. What other people called happiness did not bring me any joy.

author: Souichirou Kuzuki
title: Fate/stay night
text: It is fine to assume that the Master's role is to support the battle from the back. But there are always exceptions. There are Masters who can only fight head on.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Hughes, just a bit of advice. The soldiers who never shut up about their girls back home... They don't make it.

author: Kaze no Stigma
title: Kaze no Stigma
text: I'm going to evaporate every molecule this scumbag is made out of!

author: Detective Conan
title: Detective Conan
text: Oh right, most talented artists become famous after they're dead, I'll make you great by taking you to the cemetery called prison!

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Celebrations are more fun if there are more people.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: There are two ways to escape: escape without a purpose, and escape with a purpose. I call the former "floating", and the latter "flight". You are the only one that decides which of the two your view of the world from on high was. But you don't choose these paths because of the weight on your soul. We don't choose the path we take because of the sins we carry. But we carry our sins on the path we choose.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: This era is not so simple that you can put everything on your shoulders and be the only sacrifice. And, at the same time, one person's happiness isn't that simple, either. If you should fall as a sacrifice, one girl who came to Kyoto with the one wish to see you will definitely face misfortune. Remember that. No matter how strong you get, you are just a human being. There is no need for you to either become Buddha, or a murderer.

author: Kaoru Kamiya
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Everyone has a past they wish to erase.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Accepting one's own strength, and the strength of others, is an important quality of a swordsman.

author: Kizaru
title: One Piece
text: Without strength, you won't be able to save anyone.

author: Seishin Muroi
title: Shiki
text: No one knows when they will die. Neither you nor I may be able to live that long. But no life is so little as to give up, to think "I don't care when I die."

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: I suppose having your name recorded in the history books is a form of immortality. But if that just means your name gets passed down for two thousand years and nothing else, I'd have preferred to have even a hundredth of that added to my actual life.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: How does one figure out if they're in love with a member of the opposite sex?

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: When one person kills, resentment is born. That resentment makes a person kill again. To sever that vicious cycle--that is the purpose of this sword that cannot kill.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Urushibara Ruka, delicate as an orchid, fair as a cherry blossom, the personification of feminine grace and also... a dude. Tall as a willow, slender as a reed, a dude. Radiant in shrine vestments, dude. The sun dips low in a rosy sky, secateurs buzz, Ruka is a dude.

author: Gokou Ruri
title: Ore No Imouto Ga Konna Ni Kawaii Wake Ga Nai
text: Having someone to lean on is an amazing thing. Some things that can't be done alone can be achieved with the courage of two. And in times when you try your hardest and still can't make it work. When it's so tough you're ready to cry... if you have someone there to support you, you can make it through. The smallest words of support can save you.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: There's no point in incapable people pushing themselves. You're better off calling for an expert in the field.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: No matter how strong one may be, no one can stop the flow of time.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: No matter how hard you blow, you can never extinguish our fire. As long as a single flare remains, the others can be relit.

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: In this world, there are things you have to protect even if your hands get stained with blood.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: "The important thing is to take part." Famous words spoken by Pierre de Frédy, Baron de Coubertin during a speech. However, this quote tends to be frequently misused and serves as kind of a threat to force participation. There are tons of wild-goose chases in this world, y'know. If the most important thing is to take part, then surely one could find meaning in not taking part as well. And if everything's worth experiencing, then there's little doubt that the feeling of not experiencing something is, in itself, worth experiencing. In fact, you could even call it a valuable experience to not experience something everyone else does.

author: Ronaldo Kuriki
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: If someone starts doing the right thing, the others will follow.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Everything we see, everyone we meet, is caught up in a great unseen flow. But it's bigger than that. It's the entire world, the entire universe even. And compared to something as big as that, Al, you and I are tiny, not even the size of ants. Only one small part within a much greater flow. Nothing more than a fraction of the whole. But by putting all those "ones" together, you get one great "All", just like Teacher said. The flow of this universe follows laws of such magnitude that you and I can't even imagine them.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Never forget who you are, for surely the world won't.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: It is important to draw wisdom from different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale.

author: Lion Turtle
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The true mind can weather all lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can touch the poison of hatred without being harmed. From beginningless time, darkness thrives in the void, but always yields to purifying light.

author: Midou Ban
title: Getbackers
text: Being prepared to die doesn't mean shit. The real hard part, is being prepared to live.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: In the darkness, hope is something you give yourself.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You may not always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you keep moving, you will come to a better place.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Humans can possibly exist without actually having to fight. But, many of us have chosen to fight. For what reason? To protect something? Protect what? Ourselves? The future? If we kill people to protect ourselves and this future, then what sort of future is it, and what will we have become? There is no future for those who have died. And what of those who did the killing? Is happiness to be found in a future that is grasped with blood stained hands? Is that the truth?

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: If you only face forward, there is something you will miss seeing.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: But we're alive, aren't we? We don't have any magic power, but we're alive! We have the strength to overcome the weakness and the fear! That's what it means to be alive!

author: Saki
title: Steel Angel Kurumi
text: Water is mysterious, isn't it?. It can become vapor. It can become snow. It may take various forms, but in reality - it's all water. Even if it's invisible to our eyes, it cannot disappear from this world.

author: One Piece
title: One Piece
text: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: The curtain that falls down at the end, shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!

author: Daiki Aomine
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: For a winner, there is nothing to say to a loser.

author: Haruka Nanami
title: Uta No Prince Sama
text: To me, friends are people who feel each other's passion up close.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Life is something that can never be lived twice. Even this pointless act will eventually end. And while thinking that one day, I'll surely regret its end...

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I've been thinking about this for a long time. We put all our trust in alchemy but in the end... what is it? "Alchemy is the science of understanding the flow of matter and its laws. The process of comprehension, deconstruction, and reconstruction. The world flows too. It must also follow laws. Everything circulates. Even death is a part of that circulation. You must accept the flow." Hmm, Teacher sure drummed that into our heads, didn't she? I thought I understood it. But I don't understand anything... Mom proves that. Now here I am again, trying desperately to figure out a way to do the impossible. I'm such a hopeless idiot. All this time and I haven't grown up one bit. I thought maybe the rain would wash away some of this gloom that's been following me... but right now, every drop that hits my face is even more depressing.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I don't think ignorance is necessarily a bad thing. The more you know, the more problems you have.

author: Knov
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Whenever humans encounter the unknown, they tend to lose perspective.

author: Tsukitachi
title: Karneval
text: Choose the best thing you can do now, in order to get a step closer to your dream.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Rules exist to make the game more interesting. You, who don't know basic things like that, have no right to create the systems people play by.

author: Kanako Watanabe
title: Star Driver
text: To be able to forgive those who have wronged you... only the truly strong can do that.

author: Gankutsuou
title: Gankutsuou
text: Everyone has a sword within their hearts; the purer the heart, the sharper the sword.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: A wandering soul in isolation, has no need for a place to belong.

author: Skull Man
title: The Skull Man
text: One face is given to us by God. The other - we make ourselves.

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I want Dr. Verde's intellect. In all honesty I wish he were just a brain and nothing more.

author: Motoharu Tsuchimikado
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: If you follow the rules, there's no way you can outdo them.

author: Dot Pixis
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If it means mankind will live on, I don't mind being called a murderer

author: Urushihara Hanzou
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: Heaven is a six-tatami, one room, second floor apartment on Earth. Being a NEET is the best.

author: Maou Sadao
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: If you feel the ends justify the means, how does that make you different from us demons, exactly?

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: [about Verde] His head is a bit off and he's a pervert scientist.

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The real me is super cool!

author: Kisaragi Shintaro
title: Kagerou Days
text: I can stand not eating or sleeping, but I absolutely would not be able to live without my computer.

author: Soichiro Yagami
title: Death Note
text: The real evil is the power to kill people. Someone who finds himself with that power is cursed. No matter how you use it, anything obtained by killing people can never bring true happiness.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Are flaws really bad? Because they are not perfect, they become worried. They don't stand still and instead move forward. After they become perfect, they will stand still. Incompleteness is the ideal.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: What does someone who´s lost their standing want the most? That's simple. They want someone to find them, where they're standing.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: You can certainly fulfill your wish to "save someone". But a wish for you to save yourself, does not exist. You will embrace a borrowed ideal that is not yours, and you will probably pursue it until you die.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: The world doesn't get to decide whether my life is boring, fun, or ordinary, because that's my decision to make. As long as I have the will, nothing is impossible!

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: A joke only lasts for a moment, if it leaves a misunderstanding, it becomes a lie.

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text:
One person needed courage to face the past.
Another person needed effort to make a dream come true.
Yet another person needed time and friends.
What about you?

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I don't want other people to mention my "self". Besides, if I can be changed with a few words, then that wouldn't be my "self", would it?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Nobody can take anybody's place. There isn't a person in this world that could take your place. It doesn't matter if you were based on me or have the same face.

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Helping someone out is not a justifiable reason for you to get hurt.

author: Ryougi Shiki
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: Everything in existence has a flaw. Not to mention humans, but air, will, and even time. It's natural to have an end if it has a beginning.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: People share only one common fate... death.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: That's all I wanted to say. There is nothing at the end of helping people. It is a false life that can save neither yourself nor others.

author: Soul Evans
title: Soul Eater
text: As a cool guy, I'm used to seeing naked women.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: I envy you people. What I sought, but could not obtain. What I obtained, but could not obtain. Many things slipped out between my fingers, no matter what commandment I used.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: [To Waver] The path of devotion is a great labor. Do not ever mar it.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: Blue sky is in the distance. It feels so close. Yet, I cannot grab it even if I reach out with my hands. I looked up at the stars before. The stars that I cannot reach and the wishes that will not be granted. There is nothing we have been able to leave behind for each other. Therefore, traces and memories will disappear someday. But still... Even if it will not reach her, there should be something that will remain in our hearts. There is nothing that remains in our hands, but we lived the same time and looked up at the same things. If I can remember that. I can believe that we can be together even if we are far apart.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Betrayal demands revenge. Sin must have punishment.

author: Mutta Namba
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: When you build something, you must be ready to spend time and money on failure. The best materials won't always yield the best results. However, if you build something by improving on failure, you'll end up with good results.

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: It's always a lot easier to let something fall apart, than it is to try to hold it together.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Loyalty to someone is different from depending on them.

author: Kaito Kirishima
title: Ano Natsu de Matteru
text: They say those who die, go to heaven. I don't think so. I think when we die, we go to live on in someone else's heart. We live on in their memories. Just like how our parents stay in our hearts. But with time, memories fade. That's why people wish to leave something behind. They don't want to be forgotten. Nobody wants to be forgotten.

author: Shikaku Nara
title: Naruto
text: Legends from the distant past are always exaggerated, but eventually, someone outdoes them... that's when new legends are born!

author: Gamabunta
title: Naruto
text: What's your wish? Peace? Money? Or the world? Whatever you wish for, it's something you have to get with your own strength!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.

author: Mitsuzaki Yosuga
title: Deadman Wonderland
text: People fear death because they don't "understand" it, and we're afraid of strangers because we don't "know" them. Not being able to understand the one you love... is the worst fear of all.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: And there you go. You heard her, Iri. Our Heroic Spirit thinks a battlefield to be something better than Hell. What a joke. It's Hell itself. There is no hope on a battlefield. There is nothing but unspeakable despair. Just a crime we call victory, paid for by the pain of the defeated. But humanity has never recognized this truth. And the reason is that, in every era, a dazzling hero has blinded the people with their legends, and kept them from seeing the evil of bloodshed. True human nature has not advanced a step beyond the Stone Age.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Indeed. I wanted to see Oceanus with my own eyes. Unfortunately, my dream never came true. Oceanus is still my final destination. A dream that never ends. Go ahead and laugh. Two thousand years later, and I still have the same dream. Every bit the fool as well. And so boy... a pact with a fellow idiot seems ideal.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: That is why I will keep running for now. If I aim for the distance, there should come a day when I would be able to reach out to what I have been aiming for.

author: Lancer
title: Fate/stay night
text: It should be natural for you to drink until dawn with someone you get along with, even if he may be your enemy.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: [To Gilgamesh] That's right. I don't create swords. I create a world that contains infinite swords. This is the only magic allowed for me. There's no need to be surprised. These are all imitations. As you say, these are all trifling swords. But there is no rule that says an imitation cannot defeat the original. If you say you are the original, I will surpass every one of your weapons and destroy your existence. Here I come, King of Heroes! Do you have enough swords in stock?

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Impossible, right? Compared to the enemy we're facing, you and I are the same, no more than dots! What's the point in comparing our heights? That is what makes this exciting! The smallest, the weakest - it doesn't matter! I should still wish to go and take over the world, with nothing more than my tiny dot of a body! Within my chest, beats the heart of the King of Conquerors!

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Emiya Shirou! Listen, you are not "one who fights". You are nothing more than "one who creates". Don't think of irrelevant things. There is only one thing you can do, master that one thing. Do not forget. The thing you image is always "your strongest self." You don't need any other enemies. The opponent you have to fight is none other than "your own image".

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Making his presence felt on his favorite piece of work - this is an oppurtunity no otaku would miss.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: I won't give up, I will fight til the bitter end, cause there's no way I will back down after what you did to my friends. They are what made me the person I am today, that's why I'll keep fighting... For my friends!

author: Bertha
title: Darker than Black
text: Bearing the sins of the children of earth, the moon begins to consume its light.

author: November 11
title: Darker than Black
text: Secondhand smoke kills, you know. It's far worse than the fumes you inhale directly. Take diethylene, one of those nasty carcinogens your doctor might have warned you about on your last visit. Firsthand smoke has between 5.3 and 43 nanograms of diethylene, whereas, secondhand smoke has 680 and 823 nanograms.Then we've got quinoline, another effective one, secondhand smoke has 18,000 nanograms; 11 times more than the amount you're sucking down firsthand. You can make the choice to blacken your lungs, but don't expect to enforce that on me.

author: Larry Bison
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: Confidence is a temporary condition, that lasts until you actually understand the situation.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: If strength is justice, then is powerlessness a crime?

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Don't judge me unless you have looked through my eyes, experienced what I went through and cried as many tears as me. Until then back-off, cause you have no idea.

author: Tezuka Kunimitsu
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: When pressured, people tend to choose the decision that is best fitted to the situation, but they usually realize later on, that it was a mistake.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: It's a mistake to choose your path based upon the sins that you carry. We don't choose our path based on the sins that we carry, but we must bear our sins on the path we choose.

author: Anri Sonohara
title: Durarara!!
text: What do you think a truly unusual life would be like? Something really unique. It'd be the kind of life where every single day, nothing new ever happened. Nothing changed. That kind of a life is truly unusual.

author: Shima Katsuki
title: CLANNAD
text: Love is like a firework from the past... it's more beautiful for it to go to pieces and scatter far off.

author: Dune
title: Casshern Sins
text: The Sun does not ever give, almost all choose to take from it selfishly.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: The heart becomes scratched and dented and repaired over time, and with one glance, you'd be able to tell your own from others.

author: Anji Yūkyūzan
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: The world is not so simple. You can't save people with kindness only.

author: Rico Brzenska
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Of course, every soldier is prepared to die. But these people aren't just pawns on a chessboard. They all have names, families and feelings in their hearts too. They are all humans who live and bleed. You have the responsibility to ensure their death will not be in vain. No matter what may come, remember this in your naive heart, and be ready to die to fulfill that duty.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Someday, I just want to marry a regular girl who isn't too ugly and not too pretty. Have two children, first a girl, then a boy. Retire after my daughter is married and my son becomes a successful ninja, and spend the rest of my life playing shōgi or Go. Then die of old age before my wife.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: No matter the journey, when you come to a fork in the road, you must decide in an instant which path to take.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: He, who knows how to do something, is the servant of he, who knows why that thing must be done.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: They say that if you change yourself, you'll change the world. but that's a complete lie. They're just forcing you to compromise, by feeding you a convenient little fib.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The stronger the light, the darker the shadow.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: If you're looking at a single withered tree, it can seem like a big wound to the forest. But from the forest's perspective, that tree's remains will nourish other plants, acting for the good of the whole forest. If you change your perspective, a situation right in front of you, can reverse itself.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: We do not live in a fairy-tale world. We cannot simply take revenge on those who have betrayed us and say "the end". We have to live on after this. And taking revenge for betrayal only invites more revenge.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: What do you think killed the most people in history? It wasn't explosives or drugs. It was information. To know is to die.

author: Fleur Boland
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Money can buy companionship, but not its quality.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Even if a question has a proper answer, sometimes one cannot simply give it away.

author: Hibiki Kuze
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: A wounded heart needs time to heal.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: A traveler does not leave regret behind in a village, but good memories.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Relying on someone, helping each other out, and supporting each other. Most would say that's the right thing to do. However, that's just idealistic. In reality, someone always gets the short end of the stick.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Even if you're not interested, just read my recommendation. Putting aside disliking the food before trying it, I won't forgive you if you dismiss manga without giving it a chance.

author: Deneil Young
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: Well, life is like the weather. It can be sunny or cloudy. Sometimes it rains, and sometimes it storms.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Excuses are meaningless. The tougher things get, the more likely people are to come to their own conclusions.

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: Hell is in human heart.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Forcing their interest on someone else, that's a legitimate previlege of an otaku.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that could be destroyed at any moment.

author: Sharon Kaneko
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: When in doubt, don't worry about what's right. You'll run out of time. Don't use your head, you'll find the answer lower. Your heart knows what's right. Choose the answer that will be fun.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: I don't want to regret anything. I want to make all the tragedies that happened into meaningful things by believing that my path is right.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Your own feelings are the most important, when it comes to enjoying the interesting things in life. If you just follow what someone else says to do, or just do what you're told, you won't even be able to enjoy the things you like.

author: Kurama
title: Elfen Lied
text: People who think that they can make up their past follies with regret, cannot be forgiven.

author: Kousaka Kyousuke
title: Ore No Imouto Ga Konna Ni Kawaii Wake Ga Nai
text: This world is full of things that defy all common sense.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Stress makes you bald, but it's stressful to avoid stress, so you end up stressed out anyway. In the end, there's nothing you can do.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Doing something you want, isn't doing something you are good at, nor is it doing something you are able to. If it's to fulfill your wish, even if you're weak in it, you'll do it.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Tomorrow's promise will never come. I wonder how many of tomorrow's promises have disappeared as though they have never existed.

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: All meetings must end with partings.

author: Aladdin
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: Everything in the world is actually connected. That means, even if we get separated, we'll never be alone.

author: Kanoko Naedoko
title: Warau Kanoko-sama
text: To become an observer, you shouldn't have someone you like or dislike, because special feelings or bias info would make it difficult for one to judge a situation.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Honest feelings can sometimes lead to cruel endings.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Paying the price for something valuable, that's the pride of an otaku.

author: Suguru Daimon
title: Digimon Savers
text: There will come a time in a man's life, when he must accomplish something at the risk of his life.

author: Nyarth
title: Pokémon
text: We do have a lot in common. The same earth, the same air, the same sky. Maybe if we started looking at what's the same, instead of always looking at what is different... well, who knows?

author: Grimsley
title: Pokémon
text: There are bad ways to win and good ways to lose. What's interesting and troubling, is that it's not always clear which is which. A flipped coin doesn't always land heads or tails. Sometimes it may never land at all.

author: Hidetora Toujo
title: Beelzebub
text: There's always someone better. That's why I can't stop fighting.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Just because of your angry, childish actions, do you know how many will suffer from it? Don't you go thinking that lives are not connected, you idiotic brat!

author: Minako Kanou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: It's not because the game was so interesting, that everyone's trying to ask sensei about it. But it's because sensei's interesting, so the students are talking about the game with him.

author: Mutta Namba
title: Uchuu Kyoudai
text: An earnest failure has meaning.

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: I'm going to kill you, have a beautiful laugh, then dance until I go mad.

author: Takeshi
title: Pokémon
text: It doesen't matter how far away a leader is from it's group, a leader is always a leader.

author: White Rabbit
title: Are You Alice?
text: People who've lost their dreams, don't need a place to go.

author: Goose Perkins
title: Baccano!
text: We have no reason to fear death, for we have become ghosts while still alive.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I don't really like people who go around brandishing the banner of justice. No matter the reason, where human's are involved, there is no black or white, no justice or evil. There is only our will.

author: Yashamaru
title: Naruto
text: Love is... care and devotion you feel for the precious ones around you.

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: It doesn't matter what you do, if you live and die as you like. However, no matter what road you end up taking, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: In life, nothing good comes out of hurrying.

author: Jirobou
title: Naruto
text: I don't know which is more pathetic; the fool, or those who follow him.

author: Sasori
title: Naruto
text: What's the point of something that disappears as soon as it's born?

author: Sai
title: Naruto
text: A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value.

author: Nagato
title: Naruto
text: War brings death. And wounds and pain to both sides. There's nothing harder to accept, than the deaths of those you love. So you believe they could never die. Especially those who haven't known war.

author: Shimura Danzo
title: Naruto
text: Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.

author: Minako Kanou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Isn't chasing our dream our job right now?

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Heroes might be lonely, but they aren't fighting alone.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: Because of our broken instincts, we are in pain. We continue living in pain, because our instincts have been twisted by reason. So, what are we supposed to do? Should we abandon knowledge? Throw away reason? In any event, that wouldn't be possible. For better or for worse, we ate the fruit of knowledge long, long ago.

author: Fujisaki Yusuke
title: Sket Dance
text: The bully always says it's a joke. But to the one being bullied, it's dead serious!

author: Master Masuda
title: Dengeki Daisy
text: If something gets in the way of your job, get rid of it. That includes your feelings, your beliefs, and visions of that guy. [referring to Soichiro Kurebayashi]

author: Alder
title: Pokémon
text: Even if we don't understand each other, that's not a reason to reject each other. There are two sides to any argument. Is there one point of view that has all the anwers? Give it some thought.

author: King Bradley
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: [To Lan Fan] Brat, quit blabbering on about trifling topics such as love and sadness. Don't underestimate us. She's the woman I chose. A will is unnecessary between us. That's usually how it is between a King and his companion.

author: Van Hohenheim
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: [To Father] You've certainly mellowed out... you used to be fun, full of life and emotion. Lust, Greed, Sloth, Gluttony, Envy, Wrath, and Pride. Of course, excessive want will destroy anyone, but those same desires are necessary to understand what it means to be human. Why did you rid yourself of them?

author: Solf J. Kimblee
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Ah... what a beautiful sound. It doesn't get any better than that. I can feel it deep in my bones, like a part of me I never noticed before. That sound is an extension of my being. And this land - this land that's governed by death - I will paint it red with this shard of destruction.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: This body comes with many inconveniences. But inconveniences don't make me miserable! There is no reason for you to pity me! My life was put back together with alchemy by my brother. If I deny myself, that would mean I'm denying my brother, along with alchemy. I believe in the potential that alchemy holds. I want to believe in it!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.

author: Sasori
title: Naruto
text: True beauty lies in things that last forever, never rotting or fading.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Don't think that by abiding the rules you'll automatically be useful to society. Rules are not there for us, they are there for the "person who made it" and the "reality" and "future", which are bound by these lies. They are preventing you from reaching your full potential. Which is why, if there is a future that you want, fight for it! Fight for it and pin down your own "reality".

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Is it wrong to do stuff by yourself? If someone worked hard on their own until now, why do they have to face rejection here?

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: I am who I am and there is nothing wrong with that. The days continue like they always have, bringing neither excessive desire nor despair, nothing's changed. Yet I'm overwhelmed by this sense of fulfillment. I'm over here, you're over there. If I'm your savior, then you're mine.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: No human beings, regardless of who they might be, want to look directly at their own shortcomings.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: People who can't throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Live by your own rules. And have reality accept your own rules. If you are able to do that, the future is all yours.

author: Fujisaki Yusuke
title: Sket Dance
text: I bet it's not easy to persevere in one's goal. I never tried, so I wouldn't know. But to achieve a goal, one must work hard even when no one is looking. Having a dream might not be all that great.

author: Victor Talbot
title: Baccano!
text: Imagine what'd happen if I let someone like you loose on a bunch of politicians and scientists. You'd have them brainwashed in three days flat. First, you'd whisper your promises into their ears, getting them interested, and before they knew it, they'd be eating out of your goddamn hand. One of those scientists would say, "Hey, this Huey fella, I think he's a really swell guy. We should talk to him and see what sort of information he might share with us". And you can bet your ass by that point his brain would already be dribbling out his ears. Then oh, look, a strap on your straight jacket came loose, and oh, the next day they walk in and find out everyone in the lab is dead, and oh, Huey fucking Laforet is nowhere to be fucking seen! Oh no, oh what ever shall we fucking do Mr. Talbot, please do something even though you told us this exact thing was going to happen and we ignored you like the fucking idiots we are... and then they'll try and get me to find you, but you know what? I'll say no! Lemme say that again! No! Once more for good measure! Read my lips! Enn! Oh! No!

author: Hibiki Kuze
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Everybody's weak. That's why we rely on others. We live by helping one another. We can say, we need one another. I've been able to survive because I have you and the others.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: The human mind is uncertain things. Within mind, even contradictory thoughts may coexist.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: When you someday find a way of life that you can truly be proud of, you'll be forced into your own battle whether you like it or not.

author: Lust
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Memories... of the people we were. They're subtle, but they're real. It took me a lot of time to understand what I saw. Books say we shouldn't have memories. Or at least that they're only the memories and emotions of the alchemists who made us. But they are wrong. Those memories are mine.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: But you're thinking on too large a scale there, kid... If we don't want to drive ourselves crazy, we can only deal with what's directly in front of us.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Educating a heterosexual person about anime, is a joy for an otaku.

author: Hyoudou Kazutaka
title: Gyakkyou Burai Kaiji: Hakairoku Hen
text: If you ever reach the point where you need to pray, you're already a failure of a man.

author: Shinobu Takamiya
title: Beelzebub
text: In manga, there's always a character who gets a sudden boost of power, right? Usually, it's when they're driven into a corner. Readers actually call it a "convenient power up", but it actually does happen in the real world as well. We humans only truly show our mettle when we're pushed into a corner.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: Being alone is best. I mean, it's true, isn't it? In the end you'll be absolutely alone; therefore, being alone is natural. If you accept that, nothing bad can happen. That's why I shut myself away in my six-mat one-room apartment.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: A database can't draw conclusions.

author: Tatsumi Oga
title: Beelzebub
text: Crying is the same thing as pouring all your frustations and regrets out of your body. You may use it as a weapon, but that's just too easy. Whenever you feel like crying, just smile instead. That's what it means to be a man. You get it?

author: Hildegard
title: Beelzebub
text: Humans are so voracious, though. They eat everything from plants to animals... almost as if they think they are the top living creature to roam the earth. No being is more full of themselves as the humans.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: The inferiority you feel is actually the quality of a king. You may grumble a lot, but you know how small you are. And yet you still struggle to reach heights greater than you can imagine.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there, that lives outside of ourselves and our dreams.

author: Lust
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Maybe you are right. Where did I come from and where will I go? When I die? Maybe all this time that is what I wanted: the freedom to find out.

author: King Bradley
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: You think surrendering, and offering yourself will stop the war? How arrogant. The life of each human is worth one, that's it. Nothing more, nothing less.

author: Father
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: When you notice an insect on the ground, do you stop to consider it a fool? The life of an insect is so beneath you that it would be a waste of your time to even consider judging it. That would be an accurate summation of my feelings towards you, humans.

author: Riza Hawkeye
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: If the ways of this world are based on equivalent exchange, as alchemy says, then in order to allow for a new generation to enjoy good fortune, the price that we must pay, is to carry the bodies of the dead across a river of blood.

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: Love is based on unpredictable events.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Using a simple method to accomplish something impressive, far outshines using a complex method to achieve the same thing.

author: Seiji Yagiri
title: Durarara!!
text: A name has nothing to do with loving someone.

author: Gantz
title: Gantz
text: Fear beyond rational limits, forces people to cling to normality.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: On the day we left, we burned down the family home and all the familiar things inside. Because some memories aren't meant to leave traces.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: [To Envy] Now I see. You're Jealous. You're jealous of humans, aren't you? According to you, humans are supposed to be a lot weaker than Homunculi. And yet, even if they get discouraged after being beaten, and even if they get close to falling down after losing their paths, they continue to get up and fight. Everyone around them helps them get back up. And you're envious of that.

author: Miles
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: The death of a culture, is the death of a people.

author: Ultear Milkovich
title: Fairy Tail
text: The time known as "LIFE", cannot be rewound.

author: Chamber
title: Suisei no Gargantia
text: In a conflict between creatures that are fundamentally the same, defeat is equavalent to annihilation.

author: Dot Pixis
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I wouldn´t mind being eaten, as long as it was by a scorchingly hot lady titan.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I want to see the splendor of people's souls.

author: Gustav St. Germain
title: Baccano!
text: Cast aside the illusion that there is a beginning and end to the story. The story has no beginning. And it has no end. All there is, is a performance of people connecting, living, influencing each other, and departing.

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: You don't have any power or technique like Jack Johnson or Jack Dempsey either! You know any boxer names? You know I'm right? If you're an American, of course you know! If you say you don't know, or something, I won't forgive you! I will never forgive you! And even if you know them, I still won't forgive you, though!

author: Maria Oosawa
title: CANAAN
text: Canaan is still alive. Her existence is shining so brightly. Too bright for the naked eyes to look at directly... I'm a bit scared, but I want to touch it. I want to touch her radiance.

author: Siam
title: CANAAN
text: Canaan. You're a victim whose past was taken away by war. And she's a defeated person who lost her past in a power struggle. Soldiers who are born within destruction, take hatred as their weapon. Even though you and her became soldiers for the same reason, you both live differently. Listen Canaan, you cannot counter hatred with hatred... ever.

author: Crona
title: Soul Eater
text: Trusting someone not to hurt you... how idiotic is that?

author: Izayoi Sakamaki
title: Mondaiji-tachi Ga Isekai Kara Kuru Sou Desu Yo?
text: If I could sell boredom, I would make a fortune out of it.

author: Amamiya Yuuko
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: Breaking a bond is every bit as painful as being physically torn apart. Can you endure that?

author: Graham Specter
title: Baccano!
text: Let me tell you an incomprehensible story! What is it for the actions of men to be incomprehensible? It would seem to me that if it can't be comprehended, one should not even bother trying. It is useless to even think about it, I think. That said, I don't know exactly what's going on but may we continue fighting please?

author: Ren Hakuryuu
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do... is erase the ones you hate!

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: Let me tell you how important it is to keep your mouth shut. Me, I've seen so many damn people going on and on about "these will be the last words you ever hear" and "take these words with you to the afterlife", and then that gives whoever they're fighting an opening to strike back. Crazy, isn't it? I see it all the time, in books, in plays, even in real life! I don't even know why, but somehow the more comfortable someone is with killing, the more they flap their mouth when it comes time to do the deed, yakking on and on and on. As you might have guessed, I myself happen to be such a person! And therefore, as such, in light of that revelation, I'll say that one is enough, and since that one is of course myself, I want you all to shut up. You're boring. Swallow those words and take them to the afterlife yourself, if you want them delivered there so damn much.

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: [Talking to Riki] We've spent time together that made our hearts dance. But every story has to come to an end. No one can stay a kid forever. Time passes, and people grow up. There will come a day when we will no longer be together.

author: Ayumu Aikawa
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: There are a few things that people can't avoid while they live. People can't avoid misfortune. There are lots of hard things in life. There might even be times when you want to die.

author: Sawako Kuronuma
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: There's no knowing how others are feeling unless you ask them. And your feelings can't get through to others unless you tell them directly.

author: Jeanne
title: Kanashimi no Belladonna
text: No... this is wrong! Didn't I fall into hell? This can't be hell! Surrendering my body to the devil, I should have become a wrinkled hag! My hair should be full of hateful snakes, my skin should be the color of a vile frog's! And my blood should be burning with the jet black flames of my grudge..! A lie. This form, it's a lie! I've been tricked! I wanted to become a terrifying woman, one that just a look from, would send anyone running. I have to be such a woman! I don't want to forget my anger and hate!

author: Father
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: You can't change reality, just your perception!

author: Trisha Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: You see, I'm sure we can change, because we're weak. And because we die. We have to fight in order to live, and that is what will make us strong.

author: King Bradley
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Open your eyes. "God" is nothing more than a construct created by man to inspire fear and promote order.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: No matter how messed up things get, you can always figure out the best solution.

author: Pride
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Appearances rarely share the whole truth.

author: Envy
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Don't kid yourself, Mustang. You know how humans love to watch other people suffer while making fools of themselves. I mean, why else would you constantly be at war with each other?

author: Alex Louis Armstrong
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Destruction and creation are two sides of the same coin! You must destroy to create! That is the law of the universe!

author: Olivier Mira Armstrong
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Love for the dead is pointless. We fight to keep them alive, that is all.

author: Yoshii Akira
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: It's all right to grieve over your defeat. It's important to admit when you've lost. Not being able to do so makes it impossible for you to climb back up after a fall, and even more impossible, for you to move forward. So go on ahead and grieve to your heart's extent. But after you're done grieving, be sure to set your eyes upon your next goal and move towards it.

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: A peaceful every day life hides its fragility. Fear and violence aren't just something in another world, completely unrelated to us. If a disaster happens, we can't change it. But as long as we small gears are linked together, we can keep moving forward, even if it's only one small step at a time.

author: Dante
title: Devil May Cry
text: What would you ask for if you could have your wishes granted? Would you ask to be rich? Or to have the woman you're in love with be yours?  You can wish for whatever you want, it's your business, but to have one's wishes come true always comes with a price. Every deal has a catch. You'd better be nice and careful.

author: Maria Oosawa
title: CANAAN
text: I believe there are many things in this world that people haven't seen yet. If you really want to see something, there's nothing you can't see. You can't see it because you're closing your eyes on purpose. Because if you use your eyes to see it, it'll be painful, and sad. That's why they're closed in the first place. I think photography is like borrowing someone else's eyes. So even if your eyes are closed... you can borrow someone else's.

author: Bokura ga Ita
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: It's not that you can fall in love with someone new because you forgot the old. It's because you fall in love with someone new, that you're able to forget about the old. Only love can heal a heart that was hurt by love.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: It doesn't matter who they are, I won't forgive anyone who tries to stand out more than me.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: There's no reason a fake can't do what the real thing would. And it's possible for a fake to be more real than the real thing.

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: People become stronger because they have things they cannot forget. That's what you call growth.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: “Expectations” are what you have when you have given up. Expectations are born from a despairingly large difference in skill.

author: Wataru Kurozuma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Your home is the place where you can be yourself.

author: Yoshino Yūsuke
title: CLANNAD
text: At a place where you feel most restful… Next to the person you find most dear. People's lives are repetitions of inflicting pain on each other. It's understandable to doubt others. But being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to feel other people's love. Aren't you, perhaps, feeling lonely? Aren't you, perhaps, living slavishly? Are you able to laugh with an honest heart?

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Guys are simple creatures. Just by talking to them, they get the wrong idea.

author: Kunio Yaobi
title: Tamako Market
text: There are some things you can gain by letting some things go. Happiness isn't just what you have here and now.

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That's how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.

author: Yoshii Akira
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: Effort is nothing but a means to an end. Being proud of the fact that you tried is just putting the carriage before the horse.

author: Trafalgar Law
title: One Piece
text: The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: You want to bring back someone that you've lost. You might want money. Maybe you want women. Or, you might want to protect the world. These are all common things people want. Things that their hearts desire. Greed may not be good, but it's not so bad, either. You humans think greed is just for money and power! But everyone wants something they don't have.

author: Gustav St. Germain
title: Baccano!
text: Depending on who you place in the same situation, the characteristics of said incident change kaleidoscopically. In other words, there is one incident; however, there are as many stories explaining it as there are people involved in it.

author: Claire Stanfield
title: Baccano!
text: It doesn't matter who I am. You can just think of me as the talking air.

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: Now, dear Uncle, there's a certain person that I'd just love to kill. It doesn't even matter whether they're weak or strong. The people I live to kill, that really get me jazzed... never see it coming. Never. They're in some happy place where they're sure nothing can get them. Dying is the furthest thing from their minds. Maybe they're thinkin' about what they're gonna have for dinner. Just like you were. Right before I walked in.

author: Graham Specter
title: Baccano!
text: [to Chane] Sorry about this, young lady, but not being able to verbalize might be a lucky break for you in a way. People can waste an awful lot of energy by putting sadness into words. Or maybe joy into words. And then of course, there's putting anger into words. And the words can double when it comes to fear or pain. In that sense, being so afraid that you can't find any words may save your life. Being unable to speak in extreme stress, in a body that is obligated to control energy consumption, is an act of, OH, I don't know, maybe, self defense? Oh boy, I went and said a thing of actual intelligence there. Time to show me some love, boys!

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: This world is merciless, and it's also very beautiful.

author: Nino
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: The whale leaps. As high as he can imagine. Piercing the water from peak to peak. Is a yearning for the sky reflected in his eyes? What if this high point wasn't merely the sky, but something far higher? If he knew of the infinite glitter of the stars, would his dreams soar even higher? Even if one doesn't know why, to live is to constantly reach out. Not to a nervous restlessness, but to a constant motion of the heart.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: First, we are born in the same galaxy. Born of the same species. Our lifetimes overlap. The meetings between humans are so unlikely as to be miraculous. To laugh, to cry, and to fall in love... Everyone is made up of a collection of 1% chances. Thus, I'm dazzled by the fact that there are so many miracles in this world.

author: Grand Elder Guru
title: Dragon Ball
text: Death is simply another stage of our life.

author: Noe Isurugi
title: True Tears
text: On this earth, there are lots of difficult and painful things. I want to fly away and escape from it all. I want to flap my wings freely.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: If you can't get along without putting someone else down, it can't be real friendship.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: No point in wondering who someone really is, all you can do is trust them and accept them for who they are. Because the person you come to know is who that person really is.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.

author: Griffith
title: Berserk
text: It is my perception, that a true friend never relies on another's dream. A person with the potential to be my true friend, must be able to find his reason for life without my help. And, he would have to put his heart and soul into protecting his dream. He would never hesitate to fight for his dream, even against me. For me, a true friend is one who stands equal on those terms.

author: Kagura Mikazuchi
title: Fairy Tail
text: Sometimes, mermaids can devour tigers.

author: Godo
title: Berserk
text: If you desire one thing for so long, it's a given that you'll miss other things along the way. That's how it is... that's life.

author: Jellal Fernandes
title: Fairy Tail
text: Life and death are the very basis of all things. They intensify every emotion. Or, to put it in a rather different way, there is nothing quite so dull as "life".

author: Aladdin
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: Destiny isn't something to make you as you're told. By overcoming difficulties, life and this whole world can advance forward. That's what destiny is for. A world that has lost the power to advance forward, will be destroyed.

author: Gantz
title: Gantz
text: Humans believe their lives and ants lives are weighted differently. This is profound arrogance.

author: Furukawa Nagisa
title: CLANNAD
text: Life can bring lots of hardships, but it's always important to keep in mind that there are people around you who care for you, and are willing to help you through whatever you're dealing with.

author: Fujibayashi Ryou
title: CLANNAD
text: If a prediction is right, then it's like you only have one future. Like that future has been decided. But if it's wrong, then you have an almost infinite number of possibilities. And that means that even the tiniest twist of fate can change your future. I want to believe that I have choices - that the path I walk has many different turns, and many different roads to follow!

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Lovers don't need words to communicate.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all, without exception, have guts to abandon things important to them if they have to.

author: Nishi Joichiro
title: Gantz
text: Anyone who points a gun at me dies. Got it? Point a gun at me, you die.

author: Void
title: Berserk
text: If fate is a principle beyond Human comprehension which capriciously torments man, then it is karma that man confront fate by embracing sorcery.

author: Godo
title: Berserk
text: Hate is a place, where a man who can't stand sadness, goes.

author: Kagura Mikazuchi
title: Fairy Tail
text: I haven't relied on luck since the moment I was born. Everything has been the result of my choices. That is what leads my existence towards the future.

author: Yoshihisa Manabe
title: Kotoura-san
text: People who want to leave are going to leave. But not everyone is like that.

author: Aladdin
title: MAGI: The Labyrinth Of Magic
text: I've learned that from a war ignited by revenge, nothing can be born, but sorrow.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Hard work betrays none, but dreams betray many.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: If you want to grant your own wish, then you should clear your own path to it.

author: Loke
title: Fairy Tail
text: Do you understand the sorrow of a star that cannot return to the heavens?

author: Rea Sanka
title: Sankarea
text: I don't know what's happened to you, but you shouldn't suppress your feelings if you're angry or sad. It's okay to let it all out.

author: Laharl
title: Disgaea
text: You have no effect on me because you are flat chested!

author: Okazaki Ushio
title: CLANNAD
text: Sanae-san told me, places that I can cry are in a toilet, or in daddy's arms.

author: Kaoru Yamazaki
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: People like us aren't qualified to be involved in a dramatic incident such as a suicide. No matter how depressed you are or how much pain you're in, you have to return to your routine, daily life. Even if you don't come back, you'll just end up dying in vain. A dramatic death isn't befitting of us.

author: Gintama
title: Gintama
text: Do you have any idea how stupid we are? Don't underestimate us!!!

author: Maes Hughes
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Okay, here's the plan: We go in, start hitting people, and see where it takes us.

author: Okabe Rintarou
