title: Steins;Gate
text: The"'present" is a leaf floating on top of the river. It moves along with the flow from past to future.

author: Lan Fan
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost as well!

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: There's no such thing as no such thing.

author: Yamamoto Tsuyoshi
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It's not an issue of what you should do, it's an issue of what you want to do.

author: Batou
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: I guess once you start doubting, there's no end to it.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: People have emotions. A troublesome attribute that's not only invisible, but also changes easily. If it's friendship or love, then that's fine. But if by some trigger it changes to malice and vengeance, then that could bring forth thoughts of murder.

author: Lisanna Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: All living things eventually die. It's unavoidable. But as long as you remember, it will live on in your heart forever.

author: Evergreen
title: Fairy Tail
text: I love flowers. They look so good... On me.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Magic is anything you can think of. It can be felt in infinite ways... As light, as darkness, as red, as blue. It is living freely, together along side Fairy Tail.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: I wonder how long... How long will I remain anchored at this harbor known as battle?

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: I don't care where I get hurt, as long as my injuries are visible.

author: Chiriko Tsurumi
title: Ano Hi Mita Hana No Namae Wo Bokutachi Wa Mada Shiranai
text: I'll never dream about things that I know won't come true.

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: Is the world too peaceful? Is the future bothersome? Is reality your enemy? Don't worry, even if it is - LIFE IS EPIC.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Well, I don't see what's so funny. I'm honest, I speak my mind, and I don't hold back. It's sneaky people like Kaoru who are the troublemakers.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Ignorance is bliss, isn't it?

author: Yamato Hotsuin
title: Devil Survivor 2
text: Surviving means continuing to shoulder one's burden. When you can't handle that strain, then you'll be the one to die next.

author: Riza Hawkeye
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: The heroes during times of war, are nothing but mass murderers during times of peace.

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Just because I've gotten weaker, it doesn't mean that you've gotten stronger, right?

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: The King lives to the fullest! He needs to live more fully than anyone else. He is a figure of admiration to his people!

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: When humans are faced with truly terrifying circumstances, they don't think about other people around them. They're even willing to sacrifice those around themselves. By exposing that unsightly part of them, they can no longer get along.

author: Lina Inverse
title: Slayers
text: Give a man a break, and you'll end up broken.

author: Eda
title: Black Lagoon
text: God's not at home. He's on vacation at Vegas.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: Even if I am to carry all the evils of this world, it won't matter. If that can save the world, then I'd gladly accept it.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: The only way to truly escape the mundane is for you to constantly be evolving. Whether you choose to aim high, or aim low. Enjoy each day for what it is.

author: Griffith
title: Berserk
text: In this world, some people born are like keys that move the world and exist having no connection to the social hierarchy established by man.

author: Umibouzu
title: Gintama
text: I like fish, biiiig FISH. I also have a crap haircut, kinda like Naruto.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: "You can't run away" is an ideal for the strong. You're not always wrong. Society, the world, the people around you - often someone else is in the wrong. To think that you can change is adapting to this cruel, indifferent, trashy world. It's admitting defeat and servility. You're simply deceiving yourself by dressing it up with pretty words.

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: I have a simpler motive. Experimentation and observation - that's all a true scientist cares about. And I am a scientist. Everything in the world is an experimental test subject, of course, that includes myself as well.

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I thought that I was, to a certain degree, an intelligent person. When I realized I was an idiot, I was really shocked!

author: Kaname Tsukahara
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: Chizuru, you shouldn't be laughing too much. It was just a youthful indiscretion. Don't treat someone's first love like a mistake!

author: Meryl Stryfe
title: Trigun
text: All of life's journeys come with meetings, partings, and reunions.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: If there are no heroes, become one yourself.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: What is your drill for?

author: Kimi To Boku.
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: I thought growing older would turn me into an adult. I believed I'd find work, get married, and become an adult. But none of those things have happened. Even though I've grown older, I feel like nothing's changed.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: ADW is a severe, incurable ailment that makes the patient Able to Do only what he Wants to do.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: The devil made me do it. It was all his fault. Yup, all him. Look at them shake. I don't blame them. The second I spotted them, I put a lid on the tin and ran away. In other words, I kidnapped them. Is there any way to spin this? I mean, any way to solve the problem?

author: Chihaya Ayase
title: Chihayafuru
text: If I can be the best in the world at something, then I think it's worth a shot.

author: Sanosuke Sagara
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Oh well, I guess all those who are in love do crazy things.

author: Ewan Remington
title: Chrono Crusade
text: I am not strong in the least, I merely started walking steps earlier than you. The only difference between you and me is the distance between us at this moment.

author: Yoshioka Futaba
title: Ao Haru Ride
text: I like you. I came here to get rejected properly. To end this, so I can move forward. To make me convinced of this broken heart, I want to get rejected properly.

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: [talking about food] The last bite. It is the final one, and the most suitable one to enjoy the most. No matter what it costs, I will not give it up.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Yes! One small candy for man, one giant candy for new mankind.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: Those who use cheating as their weapon, will be strangled by cheating in the end.

author: Akasaka Ryuunosuke
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Love is simply an electrical bug in the human neural circuit.

author: Sunabouzu
title: Sunabouzu
text: Real men know when to run like a little bitch.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I woke up feeling refreshed, after dreaming about a long shower. But of course, it was an illusion.

author: Guy Cecil
title: Tales of the Abyss
text: People aren't so simple that they can accept anything and everything.

author: Rosette Christopher
title: Chrono Crusade
text: What's important, is to know fear and yet take a step forward.

author: Kaname Tsukahara
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: Now that the rainy season has started, it rains quite a lot. I don't like the rainy season. As the humidity rises, so does the misery. And recently, more things that contribute to my misery have sprung up around me...

author: Asaba Yuki
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: I wouldn't learn German just to apologize, that would be too much work.

author: Asaba Yuta
title: Kimi To Boku.
text: Whenever I see tulips, I'm always reminded of when we learned that these precious little flowers, have the strength to endure harsh winters.

author: Luke Fon Fabre
title: Tales of the Abyss
text: Helping people has nothing to do with being royalty or nobility or whatever.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I've never been so grateful to have walls to shut the world out.

author: Kento Miura
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: She was stolen away before I even realized I liked her.

author: Yu Yu Hakusho
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: And so it all begins. This boy's name is Yusuke. He's 14 years old and is supposed to be the hero of the story... but oddly enough, he's dead.

author: Guy Cecil
title: Tales of the Abyss
text: It's so much easier to believe that only your own thoughts and beliefs are absolutely correct.

author: Luke Fon Fabre
title: Tales of the Abyss
text: All I ever did was pay attention to myself. And I'm not even sure I saw myself clearly.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Items to invent: Bed, massage chair, humidifier, rubber band, Rube Goldberg Machine, religion... Religions are invented? I've learned something new.

author: Edel
title: Princess Tutu
text: May those who accept their fate be granted Happiness, may those who defy their fate be granted Glory.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: I won't ever be the best at anything. Or rather, you might say that I've stopped trying to be.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: I've already made up my mind, to the statement: "The most important thing in life is money". I answered "No".

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Oh, guilds are organizations where wizards gather to share information and find work. You can't be considered a full-fledged wizard unless you're in a guild.

author: Ushiromiya Jessica
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: People are capable of creating another part of themselves inside themselves at any time. A part that they can truly like.

author: Ushiromiya Battler
title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
text: Something as shady as a witch couldn't possibly exist.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: Whatever I do, I'll always be me. I won't tone myself down to fit in.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one's heart.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: The toilet is a wonder of civilization. It is a grand invention. It preserves human dignity.

author: Yuri Nakamura
title: Angel Beats!
text: What does it mean to be reborn? That isn't the life I had anymore. It's someone else's life. Everyone only gets to live life one time [Yuri places her hand on her chest.], and it's right here. I only get it once. This is my life. I can't entrust it to someone, I can't steal a new one, I can't force it on others, I can't forget it or erase it. I can't stomp over it, laugh at it, or beautify it! I can't anything! I'd have to accept my one shot at life no matter how cruel, merciless, or unfair I thought it was! Sir, don't you understand? That is why I must fight. I must keep on fighting! Because... because I can never [slams her desk with her hands] accept that kind of life!

author: Tsukasa Amakawa
title: Shugo Chara
text: Nothing disappears from the heart.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: They say if you change yourself, you'll change the world, but that's a complete lie. When people judge somebody, it becomes a fixed idea and an impression that lasts. A loner is forced to stay a loner. If you do your best at something and stand out, that'll only get used as fodder for criticism. Those are the rules of the Kingdom of Children.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: Winning a game is not dependent on surpassing your opponents with your strength or waiting for lucky breaks. Conquer the opponent, crushing them, and stepping over the fallen ones ruthlessly. Winning means dominating over countless dead bodies.

author: Chaos
title: Sora no Otoshimono: Forte
text: [after stabbing some fishes] That's it! This is love! Little fishies, does it hurt? I'll teach you. This is love, you know! I have to eat lots and grow big! And this time, I'll teach everyone what love is. Everyone! Everyone!

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: God, if this world, this story, is moving ahead according to the system you created... then I first need to destroy that illusion!

author: Menjou Hare
title: Guilty Crown
text: Hey, Shu, have you ever read a picture book called "The Kind King"? The king was really kind, he gave everyone money and land, until finally... the country was gone. The people were all mad at the king. But I really loved him. I think he was my first love. You're like that king, Shu. The way you lose because of your kindness. You know what? I think you're going to be a great king.

author: Otonashi Maria
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Someone that really can't kill others, has no reason. It is unnatural when you are able to find a reason why you can't kill, and can tell others smoothly.

author: Nobutaka Oda
title: Btooom!
text: The first one to move wins. Stay on the defensive and you'll lose your chance.

author: Yukari Hayasaka
title: Paradise Kiss
text: I'm alright. All I did was lose a love. Even without George, this city is still overflowing with people. My days are busy. Nothing will change. But... why do the lights look like they're in black-and-white? Just because one person isn't here.

author: Nakagawa Ken
title: Tenshi Nanka ja Nai
text: When I look up, I see a gloomy, cloudy sky. Today is another tiring uphill climb. I get sick of it all. Then... I think of the girl I love, and I put back on those worn down shoes. Her smile is like a ray of light that shines down from in between the clouds and warms up my heart. My girl has the smile of an angel.

author: Ginko
title: Mushishi
text: Simple yet mysterious. Distant ancestors unlike any plant or animal we've ever seen. These groups of odd creatures have induced whispers of fear among man since ancient times.

author: Keiju Tabuki
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: Yuri, I finally understand why you and I were the only ones left in this world. You and I were already lost children, but most children in the world are the same as us. That's why, even once was enough: We both needed someone to tell us "I love you".

author: Himari Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: As it turns out, living was a punishment. I've been punished in small doses, living as a Takakura. But, still, we were together. We took all the punishments, no matter how small and trivial. They're all precious memories. Because the only reason I felt alive was because you two were there.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text:
Question: The world will not change, but you can change yourself. So then, how will you change? 
Answer: You become the god of a new world.

author: Bridges Yuuya
title: Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse
text: Life's never been easy! What you abandon, and what you take. Even I know that repeating that choice is what it means to be alive! But... If that means I have to keep losing everything over and over... I'll risk my life to try and take it all! I won't give up! Ever!

author: Eucliwood Hellscythe
title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka?
text: The beauty of the stars never changes. However, stars that change are beautiful as well.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: People cry, not because they're weak. Its because they've been strong for too long.

author: Kuze Shuuichi
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: To fulfill your dream, you need to have a dream first. You can have an image, a desire, or a wish of what you want to become. Don't forget about it, and keep wishing for it. That's the first step to fulfilling your dream.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: I can't lose against myself. There's no element that would make me lose if our powers are equal. To admit defeat against such an enemy is to declare that I'm wrong.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Let's face the truth, without relying on any dreamlike power.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: You don't stand a single chance to win, unless you fight.

author: Castor
title: 07 Ghost
text: The road of life is never without trials and tribulations.

author: Rima Mashiro
title: Shugo Chara
text: Sure there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!

author: Bando
title: Elfen Lied
text: I pull the trigger. The gun goes off. Your brains splatter all over the sand. The beach gets bloody and you get dead.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Youth is a hoax. It's evil. People who make a big deal of their "youth", are just inviting trouble. They try to keep everything going on around them. For them, if there's something that has to do with their "youth", they jump at it without a second thought. From normal daily life, to rebelling against the view of society. If you fall in with them - lies, secrets, failure, and even crimes await you. But for them, it's just a spice of life. And if failure is also a mark of "youth", then isn't it ironic, that a person who failed to make any friends, is also technically leading his "youth"? Though I wonder if they would agree. Everything runs on their schedule. Let me be clear. The people who enjoy their "youth", will eventually fall apart.

author: Toua Tokuchi
title: One Outs
text: A low possibility means it's not zero.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Peace under an illusion is not true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: Sad memories are a part of what makes me who I am.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: My power isn't the Rasengan or Sage Jutsu or the Nine Tails chakra. My power is right here. [points to the center of his chest]

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: It's because you're so fucking honest that you're so easy to fool.

author: Nobuchika Ginoza
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Hey, it's been a while. I came to talk to you today, since I decided what I'm going to do next. My Crime Coefficient went up to 140. There's no longer a chance for recovery. But it's not in my nature to sit around and mope in the isolation facility. So I decided to go back to where I used to work. You told me to take a different path. Guess I didn't live up to your expectations. I'm a bad son in every respect, aren't I? But strangely enough, I have no regrets. There's nothing good about being a detective. Even so, it's a job that someone needs to do. Right, dad?

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Forgive my rudeness, but to hide your true self and make a vain display... I think that's just running away from reality. To know what you are really like, and acknowledge it... A positive thinking of enjoying yourself... isn't that what true strength is?

author: Nui
title: Mushishi
text: Don't let yourself be blinded by fear or anger.  Everything is only as it is.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: It's never been "The one who becomes Hokage will be acknowledge by everyone", it's "The one who is acknowledge by everyone, becomes the Hokage".

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: You gotta love humans. When everything sticks to the script, they can put on a great act. But as soon as something unexpected happens, they react completely true to their nature.

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: In my memory, I link fragments of the past when we were together, to create a clear image of him in my mind. But I no longer know if that image is really him. The moment I see in my mind, may have never existed.

author: Mei Misaki
title: Another
text: Death is not friendly. It's dark, black where you look at it. You're all alone. But it's no different when you're alive, right? No matter how many relationships we seem to have, we're all alone.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: "Trust". The act is without a doubt a very noble one. But you know, what many people call "trust" is actually giving up on trying to understand others. And that has nothing to do with "trust", but is rather apathy.

author: Tohsaka Rin
title: Fate/stay night
text: Those who aim further for other's sake. Those who think of others before themselves. ...And those who hate themselves more than anyone. These are the qualities of a Magus. This is a contradiction you can only have if you are born broken.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: What's past is past. I cannot redo it, nor go back to it. I have escaped from that scene and still continue to live. All I can do is look forward.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: We must demonstrate that we took action, even if our action was meaningless.

author: Azaka Kokutō
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: I have a confession. I love special things.

author: Mikiya Kokutō
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: I guess it can't be helped. I'll bear your sins in your place.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: What exactly would change if I wanted revenge, was consumed by hatred, or went insane with rage?

author: Ryougi Shiki
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: I can kill anything that exists - even if it's a god.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: People do not cease to exist immediately after dying, as long as there are people who remember them.

author: Naota Nandaba
title: FLCL
text: When you're in a town like this, all covered with smoke - you forget that there's a world outside. Nothing amazing happens here. And you get used to that. Used to a world where everything is ordinary. Every day we spend here is like a whole lifetime of dying slowly. But now Haruko is here. That's how I know there really is a world outside.

author: Yuri Nakamura
title: Angel Beats!
text: When we were still in the world of living, death was something that came indiscriminately and randomly. So, there was no way to fight it.

author: Iwasawa
title: Angel Beats!
text: I heard that when things were painful for her, she'd cover her ears with headphones and escape to the world of music. I tried it too. It was like everything was blown away. The vocals screamed for me. They grieved for me. The ones who put on the act of common sense were wrong. Those who cried were right. We, the lonely were more human. They screamed at the absurd, beat it down, and destroyed it. They saved me.

author: Ooyama
title: Angel Beats!
text: Oh man, my heart is pounding. I'm eating snacks in the middle of class! I ate it! I totally ate it! Boldly eating snacks in the middle of class! I'm being so reckless!

author: Tenma Tsukamoto
title: School Rumble
text: Rather than regret doing nothing, regret something that you've done.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Things like heroes are unnecessary. Can't you save someone if you're standing right there, at that very spot? In front of your eyes are people that don't wish to cry that are crying! In front of your eyes are people that can only clench their teeth while struggling and can't even say the words "please save me"! Is that not enough?

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: It hasn't withered. I won't let it wither. We might just be little branches, but if the branches break off, the tree really will wither. That's why I won't break off. Even if winter comes and the leaves fall off, even if the wind comes and all the other little branches break off... Even if I am the last branch left, I won't break off. I'm sure we'll be together till the end.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: People SHOULD be doubted... Doubting people is simply a part of trying to know them.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: I don't think it's completely such a bad thing to cling to one single person, but you have any number of people all around you. People are always connected to one another. You see? Just reach out your hand, and there's someone right here. It's when people realize how lonely it is being on their own, that they start to become kind.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: If there is a pure wish in this world, it must be the desire to be born.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: If you have a wish, don't go back to the past and redo everything. If you want to change yourself, don't change the past, but change who you are now!

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: Devils don't ask favors from God.

author: Sakurai Tomozo
title: Sora no Otoshimono: Forte
text: Good women flow like water.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: It is love that can make us strong, but it is also love that can make us weak.

author: Kou Ichinomiya
title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
text: If there is a creator, he surely made this world too large. This is inconvenient for us small, fearful humans. For all the world's vastness, we can't measure the distance between ourselves. There are 6 billion of us, yet still, everyone is alone. That is why we are all frantically searching for that one person we need no distance from.

author: Narumi Anjo
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Every power can be a poison or medicine depending on the user's intention.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: I don't have any wishes that won't come true or that are impossible. Because if it's a dream I can't reach by myself, I won't even dream it in the first place.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: People cannot change the past. All we can do, is accept our own actions. If you still wish to be burdened by your sins, let it show in your future actions. It is your choice how to perceive something that has already happened.

author: Richter Abend
title: Tales Of Symphonia
text: Courage is the magic that turns dreams into reality.

author: Kagami Junichirou
title: Denpa Kyoushi
text: Games aren't meant for competition. They're things to master.

author: Kirisaki Hana
title: Nisekoi
text: Time is not money. You can't buy time, now can you?

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: The true evil is becoming apathetic about other people.

author: Hades
title: Fairy Tail
text: The mistakes people make are eventually labeled as experience. But with a true mistake, there will be no experience to be gained. Because the mistake you made taking me as your opponent will leave you with no future.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Hurt me with the truth. But never comfort me with a lie.

author: Jellal Fernandes
title: Fairy Tail
text: Tears are how our heart speaks when your lips cannot describe how much we've been hurt.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Inside my memories lies sad thoughts and it's hard to forget, but I try everyday to keep moving forward in life, so why can't you, living in saddness isn't living at all.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Do not think about other things, there is only one thing you can do. So master that one thing. Do not forget. What you must imagine is always that you, yourself, are the strongest. You do not need outside enemies. For you, the one you have to fight is none other than your own image.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: If you walk down the path that you believe is right, you cannot be wrong.

author: Saber
title: Fate/stay night
text: There are no regrets. If one can be proud of one's life, one should not wish for another chance.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: There are worthless things, but there are no meaningless things.

author: Himura Yuu
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: Besides, miracles don't exist in this world. There are only inevitabilities and accidents, and what you're going to do. That's it.

author: Kraft Lawrence
title: Spice and Wolf
text: We are both merchants, and I'll promise you one thing. We will not laugh until we get the money, and we will not cry until we go bankrupt. And guess what? We are going to laugh.

author: Kanako Sasa
title: Hourou Musuko
text: When I think too much, my brains get itchy.

author: Tenma Tsukamoto
title: School Rumble
text: I don't think I'm cut out for manual labor. I need to get a more creative job, like saving the whales.

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Just because my reasoning is childish and wrong, and just because my argument can be easily defeated with a bit of cleverness, does not mean your reasoning is completely correct.

author: Akiyama Shinichi
title: Liar Game
text: Doubt them. Question them, suspect them... and take a good, long look into their hearts. Humans are the kind of beings that can't put their pain into words, after all.

author: Kanzaki Nao
title: Liar Game
text: People can believe in one another if we keep trying.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I just want to relieve my sexual frustrations. All I feel towards a cat eared high school girl in her underwear... is lust.

author: Samejima Mirai
title: Gekkou
text: There must be something wrong with those that are delighted about other people's happiness. Every one of them is either a hypocrite or just scheming something.

author: Tsukimori Youko
title: Gekkou
text: If you are afraid to get hurt, you won't obtain what you really desire.

author: Nonomiya
title: Gekkou
text: Life's interesting because there's a limit to it. The thrill of not knowing when it ends is what gives you the awareness of being alive.

author: Konan
title: Gekkou
text: Choosing another way of life means throwing away all you've done so far and becoming a new self...

author: Mark
title: Spice and Wolf
text: Poets say love can't be bought with money. Preachers say that there are things more important than money. So even though we work hard just to earn money, how can we obtain something more important than that?

author: Cal Devens
title: Phantom: Requiem For The Phantom
text: Please tell me, if I could never have happiness in real life, can't I at least get to dream about it sometimes?

author: Kamijou Touma
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Damn it, I really don't want to follow her to hell... Looks like I'll just have to pull her out of it!

author: Oomine Daiya
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: Boredom - there are people that blast their own brain away just to escape from this beast.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: I learned that no matter how much you want something, no matter how much you scream for it, sometimes it's out of your reach.

author: Todo Shizuka
title: Hana Yori Dango
text: Wear the best shoes you can, because those shoes will take you to great places.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: A flower can't choose the place where it blooms and a child can't choose the parents he's born to.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: I want to see and understand the world outside. I don't want to die inside these walls without knowing what's out there!

author: Kirara
title: Gintama
text: I think that in the end, I just care a lot about myself. I was the only one that I loved and respected. That's why I was scared to know what the others thought about me. I was afraid to get hurt, so I ran away and locked myself into my shell.

author: Obi Hajime
title: Gintama
text: Tears are handy for washing away troubling and sad feelings. But when you grow up, you'll learn that there are things so sad, they can never be washed away by tears. That there are painful memories that should never be washed away. So people who are truly strong laugh when they want to cry. They endure all of the pain and sorrow while laughing with everybody else.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Trying to shoulder the burden all by yourself? Don't be a stranger. Weep and ask for help. Lean on me with your runny nose. Cry when you feel like crying. Laugh when you feel like laughing. When you're tearing up with an ugly face, I'll give you a good cry with an uglier face. When you're laughing so hard your stomach hurts, I'll laugh in a louder voice. That's how it should be. It's far better to get dirty while living true to yourself, than to throw away yourself and die a clean death.

author: Izumo Kusanagi
title: K Project
text: Strength always comes with responsibilities.

author: Mito Freecss
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: If you want to get to know someone, you need to make an effort to learn why they're angry.

author: Anezaki Mamori
title: Eyeshield 21
text: You listen carefully, Sena. That's the one person you definitely do not want to associate with! That one called Hiruma, he's like a demon! Once he gets his eye on you, he'll drain all the life out of you until there's nothing left but skin and bones!

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: Those who do not fear the sword they wield, have no right to wield a sword at all.

author: Kurosaki Karin
title: Bleach
text: Regardless if you see them or not, if you don't believe, then it's like they never existed.

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: Oh, well. No matter what path they take, people without guts have nothing ahead of them.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The difference in judgement between you and me, originates from different rules derived from past experience.

author: Kuroyukihime
title: Accel World
text: I envy you. You've been betrayed and hurt, yet you can still forgive each other. I envy you for having such a great friend.

author: Pierce Aogami
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Ha, you're too naive, Kami-yan. I have a wide range of acceptance when it comes to women: not just fallen female main characters, but also foster sisters, foster mothers, foster daughters, twins, widows, senpais, fellow classmates, teachers, childhood friends, ojousamas, blondes, brunettes, brown-haired, silver-haired, long-haired, medium-haired, short-haired, girls wearing bobby pins, wavy-haired, twintails, ponytails, one-sided ponytails, twin braids, ahoges, curly-haired, girls in sailor clothes, blazers, kindergarten nurses, maids, policewomen, witches, shrine maidens, nuns, military women, secretaries, lolis, shotas, tsunderes, cheerleaders, stewardesses, waitresses, goth girls wearing black, goth girls wearing white, girls in China dresses, frail girls, albino girls, fantasists, girls with split personalities, queens, princesses, thigh-high socks, garterbelts, girls who cross-dress as guys, girls who wear glasses, girls who wear an eye-patch, girls who wear bandages, girls in school swimsuits, one-piece swimsuits, bikinis, V-shaped bikinis, bikinis that barely cover anything, ghosts, animal-eared girls, etc.- any female is within my area of acceptance.

author: Miyazaki Ryuu
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: A lie yields hope when you realize it's a lie. On the other hand, when you feel that a cruel fact is reality, you fall into despair all the more.

author: Oomine Daiya
title: Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria
text: No matter what you do, no matter where you go, you can't get away from your nature.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Eternity is instantaneous, and an instant is eternal.

author: Kouta Tsuchiya
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: ...A human's belief can make the impossible possible.

author: Rob
title: Fairy Tail
text: Freedom can be found at the bottom of your heart.

author: Sakurai Tomozo
title: Sora no Otoshimono: Forte
text: Who cares? Who cares if they're human or if they're something else? If they have boobs, what's the problem?

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: [after kissing Okabe] There was a scientific rationale for that! Because... important memories, including, but not limited to, one's first kiss, are stored in the hippocampus, which makes them harder to forget. So I figured...

author: Yukari Hayasaka
title: Paradise Kiss
text: He turns the black-and-white landscape into brilliant colors. That's what George was to me. Even if our paths don't ever cross again, that will never change.

author: Nana Komatsu
title: NANA
text: Hey Nana, if Cinderella's glass slipper fits so perfectly, I wonder why it fell off along the way? I can't help but think that it was on purpose, to attract the prince's affections. No matter what I do, I'll still have the fate of a girl who just keeps getting hurt, wondering if she can be happy in this pointless, one man show?

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: Before meeting you, I didn't know what it was like to feel lonely. I never even considered myself to be alone. That's because when you feel lonely, it means that there is someone for you to miss.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Don't give up, the beginning is always the hardest, so let's keep on going till the very end.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: That's the kind of people they are. Whether it was me or not doesn't make a difference. A person falling to their doom, and without a second thought they would jump in to save them. It's impossible to just sit and let it happen. Without thinking of the consequences their bodies just move. That's what kind of idiocy is gathered here. That's the Yorozuya. Even if you forget everything else, as long as you remember that much, we're good. As long as you remember that, whomever your leader is, you guys will do fine.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: In the shinobi world, those that break the written and unwritten rules are deemed trash... but be that as it may... Those that would desregard their comrades so easily are even worse than trash. And those who don't have the decency to respect the memories of their comrades are the worst.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Sometimes, forgetting is a type of happiness.

author: Machika Balfaltin
title: Immortal Rain
text:
Somehow, the sea at night seems terribly dark. As if right beyond this point, the world might end.
But I'm not afraid. Because mornings without you are much scarier.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: If you want to be free from your suffering, make up your mind. If you give up on your dream, you will suffer more.

author: Jormungand
title: Jormungand
text: I devour the five lands and drain the three seas, yet only the sky is impossible to reach. With this body lacking wings, hands, or legs. I am the World Serpent. My name is Jormungand.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Take it, that courage you have locked in your heart. Awaken it, wipe your tears, be strong and use that courage.

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Clean up after yourself. If you want to be accepted, you must accept yourself first.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Only victors are allowed to live... this world is merciless like that.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: [referring to a group of thugs] I disposed of some dangerous beasts. Mere animals that just happened to resemble humans.

author: Leorio Paladiknight
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: For the right price, you can buy not only treasures, but dreams, hearts and even people's lives!

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: The voice, the smile that still remains in his heart... all of it was a long time ago. Humans live such short lives.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: We reset, and return to our separate lives. You can't reset your life, but you can reset your relationships.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I really am... shinobi trash. But the one thing I still learned is this. That void is something that everyone helps you fill. Just because you face adversity and hardships, is no reason to give up on this world. A person willing to throw away all those memories... of their friends and comrades, will never find peace of mind. Resorting to something like that isn't going to bury that hole. If you persevere and endure, someone will be there to support you!

author: Shizuka Hiratsuka
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Didn't your mother ever tell you that mentioning a woman's age will get you killed?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: You STILL don't get it? When you tossed all of that away, a few important things were discarded as well. You abandoned your friends? More like you were afraid of BEING abandoned. You fight by yourself? More like you hid yourself in solitude from the beginning. You abandoned yourself? No... You just couldn't bear the pain of having a heavy load place upon you, or being a heavy load, so you ran. Like the coward you are. If you want to live your life abandoning one thing after another, that's your choice. But to try to incite your student to join you because you can't handle being alone, makes you a fool.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The only thing we're allowed to do... is to believe that we won't regret the choice we made.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: I've been through so many meetings and partings. They were like a heavy secret, but when I started to talk about them, they seemed to sparkle... I couldn't put them into words.

author: Mikasa Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If you think it's natural for people to sacrifice their own lives to save others, surely you understand that sometimes a single death can save many lives.

author: Armin Arlelt
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: The strong feed upon weak. It's such an obligingly simple rule. Except in this world, my friends tried to be strong.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: You have three choices, you can give up, give in or give it your all.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: I won't run, I will stand and look ahead to what I must do, I must face the fear, I won't let it control me anymore, I will use my heart that holds my courage and my bravery to move me forward to what I must do.

author: Sayaka Miki
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Someone has to be cursed to balance out a wish for someone else's happiness. That's how we, magical girls, work.

author: Medaka Kurokami
title: Medaka Box
text: People do not exist to follow rules. Rules exist to protect the people.

author: Kouki Akune
title: Medaka Box
text: If you're going to make a wish, you must put forth the effort to ensure that it comes true!

author: Myouri Unzen
title: Medaka Box
text: If you claim to love humans, that should include their lies and betrayals, their sins and ugliness, their jealousy and immaturity, their hatred and conflicts.

author: Takashi Natsume
title: Natsume Yuujinchou
text: As I had encountered kindness, I wanted to be kind myself. I wanted to be able to do something, just like others had done for me.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: I wish I could go back to my childhood. It went by so quickly I feel like it was robbed from me.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: What is truly good about a person can't be expressed in words, that it can not. What matters is the feeling of trust one gets after spending time with him.

author: Teppei Kiyoshi
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: You keep working HARD in order to win and you get better little by little. To IMMERSE yourself in something you like, that's what it means to enjoy something fully.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: It's not the goodbyes that hurt, it's the flashbacks that follow...

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Anyone can die. It's living that requires courage.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: We think the flower on the precipice is beautiful, because our fear makes our feet stop at its edge, instead of stepping forward into the sky, like that flower.

author: Ludwig Kakumei
title: Ludwig Kakumei
text: Real love... if such a thing existed, would not be something as stupid as a woman's looks or the size of her bust.

author: Misuzu Kamio
title: Air
text: This is the end of my dream. My wings forgot how to fly, since I only kept pretending to flap them. Is there a meaning to wings that can't fly?

author: Guts
title: Berserk
text: Even if we painstakingly piece together something lost, it doesn't mean things will ever go back to how they were.

author: L-elf
title: Kakumeiki Valvrave
text: Happiness isn't something you divide in halves.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: In order to escape a road of solitude, one has to work hard, and forge a new path with their own power.

author: Kanata Nanami
title: Starry Sky
text: Since childhood, my body was weak. There was a limit to what I could do. A weak body... A life which I don't know how long I would live for. Well, life has its limits. I felt like my limit was exceeding faster than others' limit.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: When life changes to be harder, change yourself to be stronger.

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Don't give up! There's no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Sadness is just another wall that blocks you from moving on. I know it's hard to get past it, but you got to break through.

author: Levi Ackerman
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: This is just my opinion, but when it comes to teaching somebody discipline... I believe pain is the most effective way.

author: Wendy Marvell
title: Fairy Tail
text:
If I haven't had fear, then I also wouldn't have been able to know what it's like to have bravery in my heart.
Bravery that awakens when you're being consumed by fear.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: A strong person is not the one who doesn't cry. A strong person is the one who cries and sheds tears for a moment, then gets up and fights again.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Feelings are connection. They surpass time, and find their way back to the people you love.

author: Satou Tatsuhiro
title: Welcome to the N.H.K
text: It's natural for a person to deny he's a failure as a human being. That's why he searches for somebody who is more miserable than himself. That's why so much animosity exists on the internet. Those who aren't able to find a more miserable person, turn to the internet and call other people losers, even though they've never met. Just to make themselves feel superior. Isn't that pathetic? There's a sense of security that comes from speaking badly of someone else. But that isn't true salvation.

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: It's not like I'm pessimistic or anything... I'm just moving forward without looking back.

author: Rei Ayanami
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: Those who hate themselves, cannot love or trust others.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: I hate nice girls. Just exchanging greetings with them will get them on your mind. Start texting each other, and your heart will be set a flutter. If they call you, you're done for. Enjoy staring at your logs and grinning like a fool. However, I won't get fooled again. That's what your kind calls kindness. If you're nice to me, you're nice to others. I always end up nearly forgetting that. Reality is cruel, so I'm sure lies are a form of kindness. Thus, I say kindness itself is also a lie. I always ended up with these expectations. And I always ended up with these misunderstandings. And before I knew it, I stopped hoping. A highly trained loner is once bitten, twice shy. As a veteran on this battlefield of life, I've gotten used to losing. That's why I always hate nice girls.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Then you swear that, once I defeat an enemy, you will buy me pants?

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: On that day, mankind received a grim reminder. We lived in fear of the titans, and were disgraced to live in these cages we called walls.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: We once fought together for an ideal with our swords. It wasn't for power or for glory, but to create a peaceful world where people could live without fear. And if you should forget about that, then what did we fight the revolution for?

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: You can't pick up water once it's spilled, so handle it carefully.

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: A person can change, at the moment when the person wishes to change.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Somewhere inside of me?! Take a good look, there's nothing inside of me anymore!!! I don't feel pain, I don't feel anything! You need to let that guilt go Kakashi. This wind hole wasn't your doing... It was made by this evil, cruel world.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Everyone's carrying something that matters. You just don't realize when you're carrying it. It's only after it slips out of your hand that you realize how heavy it was in the first place. So many times I thought that I'd never carry a load like that ever again. And yet, before I realized it, I was carrying it again. I'd feel so much better if I just got rid of it. But I just can't bring myself to do it.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I consider everything that happened to be precious moments of my life. The pain. The suffering. The fun… And I am here right now, because everyone was there for me. I couldn't have accomplished anything by standing still, without anybody's help. I treasure every moment I have spent here. Unlucky? I feel pretty lucky. This is my resolve.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I am a supporting actor, a shadow. But a shadow will become darker if the light is stronger and it will make the white of the light stand out. As the shadow of the main actor, I will make you, the light, the number one in Japan.

author: Reinhard von Lohengramm
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: No matter the era, whichever the society, people always gaze at the stars when young. Then they stretch out their hands and try to catch them. And then one day, they realize their arms are not long enough to catch the stars, and that's when they grow up.

author: Eikichi Onizuka
title: Great Teacher Onizuka
text: You know, when I was in high school, I was a troublemaker. I hardly went to school. Before I knew it, I was expelled. When I couldn't go anymore, was when I first realized, that school was a great thing. There's a lot of friends and lots of fun things. When I got this old, I wanted even more to go to school. That's why I became a teacher. Because, if I become a teacher, I could stay in school until I die, right? That's why I'm really happy now. I want you to be like that too. I want you to like school. Once it's over, it's too late.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Family is other people. No matter how close your blood relationship is... no matter what your relationship may be... anyone other than you is not you! And so you have to think it over and decide for yourself! Take away other people's wants and needs, and decide if this is something that is necessary for you! It may cause hardships to others, but you want it. That's your free will right there! But you ignore that and decide based on someone else's advice, because decency demands it, because people say it's awful, you will fail and quit. No one could succeed that way! You don't understand what you're trying to do. With that as your background, how do you expect to make a promise to yourself? But the opposite way... there are risks there too, of course. If you decide to take the action that best suits you, there will be people who won't understand. People will be saddened by your actions.

author: Frieza
title: Dragon Ball
text: There are three things I cannot tolerate: cowardice, bad haircuts, and military insurrection. It is very unfortunate that our friend Vegeta possesses all three of these.

author: Shiori Misaka
title: Kanon
text: It would be enough for the depressing things in life to only exist in reality. It is because that I think the birth of a story is from people dreaming of a happy ending.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: We as humans have the power to do such, but whether we grab on to the thread or not is a choice we make.

author: Spirit Owl
title: Wolf's Rain
text: When are we born? When do we die? Why are we born? Why do we die? The world has been destroyed and we've fallen countless times, always resurrecting from the ashes as Paradise. It has happened before, and it will happen again. An endless cycle of life and death. The world is a Paradise that was opened by someone, but this era too is almost at an end. We have acquired the means to exceed our natural span of life, never suspecting that the world itself was finalized in its existence. This knowledge has left me in despair, my fate has fallen and scattered like the petals of a dying flower, like the blast from a sand storm it has been worn down and weathered away. As if to be purified, the world will be encased in ice so that it can return to the beginning once more. Paradise is a world that is opened by someone...

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: If sorry could solve anything, we wouldn't have a need for the police.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Rumors, at times, can be more severe than the truth.

author: Maou Sadao
title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
text: I've never seen a hero fall down stairs, cry, and get first aid from demons.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: The choice we're making might be one of evil as well. For we call for peace, but with weapons in our hands. Nevertheless, allow us to break of endless conflict. Give us strength.

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Maybe it would be just like in the mangas. I'd tell him I love him and then we cut to the happy ending.

author: Narumi Anjo
title: Gakuen Alice
text: Life sometimes deals you a bad hand and you make a lot of mistakes along the way, but as long as you believe in yourself and walk along your chosen path with a smile, everything will be alright.

author: Gendou Ikari
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: Mankind's greatest fear is Mankind itself.

author: Arisu Mizuki
title: Serial Experiments Lain
text: If you aren't remembered, then you never existed.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: Unwavering Faith and Resilient Bonds will bring even miracles to your side.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Just because it's illogical, that doesn't make it wrong.

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: Let´s see how many people you can kill with the power of love.

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: However, I can't be happy. I feel I can't have that experience, I can't assume I will have that experience. I'm free, but feeling lonely and disheartened. I hope there's happiness out there. Besides, the future is approaching and waiting for me. In the future, I will be a part of the world. I will finally live my life.

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Look what happens when you're not fast enough! You get CUT! It's more fun when it hurts a little bit though, isn't it?

author: Ritsu Onodera
title: Sekai Ichi Hatsukoi
text: Usually, he just abuses everyone. Normally, he's so sarcastic. But now he's holding me as if I were something precious.

author: Akito Takagi
title: Bakuman
text: I think manga and life are the same thing. A weekly manga lasts for a week, and life lasts until you die. It's making the best of whatever time you're given. So, you can't hold back. "Conceit" and "Luck" are important, but the most important one is "Hard Work".

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: You believe that the strong exist to cull the weak. To use them as food. But you are mistaken... The strong exist, not to feed off of the weak, but to protect them!

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to believe that memories, even sad and painful ones, should not be forgotten forever.

author: Mami Tomoe
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: You shouldn't want to be like me, I'm... just trying to act cool. No matter how scary it is, how hard it is, I can't talk to anyone about it. I always cry alone. Being a Magical Girl isn't good at all.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: When a person lies, what is important is not the lie itself. No, it is their reason. Their why.

author: Shun Aonuma
title: Shinsekai Yori
text: We ultimately fear what spawns from within us.

author: Kazutaka Muraki
title: Yami no Matsuei
text: Because I love you, I want to rip you apart. I want to pile corpses before you.

author: Mewtwo
title: Pokémon
text: I now see that the circumstances of birth are irrelevant. It is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are.

author: Satoshi Fukube
title: Hyouka
text: Even if I did win, it was boring. How can it be interesting unless you win in an interesting way?

author: Eru Chitanda
title: Hyouka
text: If you can never get angry at anything, that probably means you have nothing that you like, either.

author: Misawa Kyouko
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Humans will wither away if they're always alone. The only remedy would be to seek out other people.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: But even if I acted sad over it, nothing would change. Even if I cry, nothing would change.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: The subtle light that is born when people's feelings come together. That light embraces felicity, evil, sin, and happiness. The light blazes forth... illuminating the whole truth.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: We don't know if this world is real or a dream. Maybe the world until now has been a convenient fake. But magic will probably disappear now. The dream is over.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Rejection makes a man stronger.

author: Mavis Vermillion
title: Fairy Tail
text: There are walls that can't be broken through power alone. But if there is a power that can break through those walls, it is the power of feelings.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Once you've recognized your mistakes, it's easy enough to correct them.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Miracles are irrational by nature.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: The actors on stage cannot ignore their scripts and do as they wish. If they make a beautiful exit, I feel they fulfill their role.

author: Kuroyukihime
title: Accel World
text: You are really red. It would be fun to hang you from a traffic light, and stop cars.

author: Ooe Kanade
title: Chihayafuru
text: A woman must always move with grace, whether you're wiping a table or drying sheets. Or in the fight for your life.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: I hate humans. I find the thought that I'm from the same species to be depressing.

author: Belldandy
title: Aah! Megami-Sama
text: People have the strength to overcome their obstacles – everyone can.

author: Anthy Himemiya
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: You really don't know what happened, do you? It doesn't matter. By all means, stay in this cozy coffin of yours and continue to play prince. But I have to go now. She's not gone at all, she merely vanished form your world. Farewell.

author: Lust
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Blood calls for blood, while hatred begets hatred, and the energy that comes forth begins to take root in this earth and engraves a crest of blood. They never learn, no matter how many times history is repeated. Humans are foolish, sorrowful creatures.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Only sadness can counter sadness.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: It might be for the better if there are amusing people around me. Because any tragedy may seem a comedy, as long as I am with them.

author: Kenji Yamaguchi
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: If you can't give up one, learn to balance both at the same time. Why does it have to be all or nothing?

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Studying was fun. I enjoyed solving problems quickly, and I was rewarded for the effort I put in. Studying made me feel complete.

author: Celestin
title: Aah! Megami-Sama
text: The gods have, since ancient times, created methods to test humans. The system God has created... it opposes all living creatures and splits the world. It condemns people to roles. Heaven pretends they can't see the suffering of the people. Only the lucky few find the way. The pain of those beings reaches deep into my heart. I want to counter this discrimination and extend a helping hand. In order to do that, the only thing that can be done is to create a new system! See... this is what God has wrought... I cannot allow such a system to continue! This is the will of my quarrel with Heaven. I would like you to come with me. If I had your help, even the weak-of-heart could have their wishes fulfilled. So that everyone can be equal and happy, I wish to reach out.

author: Misawa Mitsuyoshi
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Love is good. It changes people, for better or for worse. You could look at it as a chance for you to change. The best kind of love helps you grow up.

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: The beginning is the end, and the end is the beginning. Well then, let us begin again. And to each, their own tale.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: It most certainly isn't pleasant being called a "traitor" by creatures you've never met.

author: Renmei Communicator
title: Haibane Renmei
text: To know your sin is to have no sin.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Nine-Tails, you are merely a momentary life, a temporary existence of coalesced energy... energy that once was a single, ultimate form! An unstable force, lacking in intelligence or sapience, you require a guide to show you purpose. That guide is the Uchiha! The tailed beasts are but slaves to those with blessed eyes. Obey!

author: Montana Max
title: Hellsing
text: Very well. Then krieg(German for "war") is what you shall have. We are a clenched fist, ready to strike down all who oppose us with our might. But, after enduring over half a century wallowing in the darkness, for us, a simple, "ordinary" war will no longer be sufficient. We need a massive war! A war beyond any other that man's history has ever known! We are but a single battalion, the remnants of a defeated army numbering less than a thousand strong. However, I believe that each of you old warriors is worth a thousand of their sickly soft children! We represent a force that could easily defeat an army of a million and one men!

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: You see, there was this girl and she just appeared out of the blue. To my surprise, she was the same kind of person as me, and she had the same kind of eyes, at first sight, I realized I wasn't a solitary existence in this world, I was so happy. That's right, until I met her, I was all alone in this world, I had not a soul with whom to share the scenery before my eyes, and not a soul with whom to share the music in my ears. But...I heard the voices all over the world, I could hear the whole world crying out, "save me". It's true, thus I could see the optimal path of the world. But it saddened me, because the moment I saw her - I knew we were never meant to be, yes, she refused to side with me. She rejected me - the only person who could see the same scenery.

author: Soichiro Arima
title: His and Her Circumstances
text: People who know how painful it can be to be alive, are fascinating.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: At least in academics, you can control the outcome, whether it's good or bad.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: I felt like I was watching a dream I'd never wake up from. Before I knew it, the dream was all over.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Aside from the fact that I don't have any friends or girlfriends, I'm still a high quality product!

author: Akito Takagi
title: Bakuman
text: I don't mind the regret, if I fail in attempt to achieve my dreams. What I don't wanna regret is not chasing those dreams.

author: Eren Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: If you think reality is just living comfortably and following your own whims, can you seriously dare to call yourself a soldier?

author: Hakaze Kusaribe
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: When you do something for the man you love, instead of for the world, it's easier to decide what must be done. Ultimately, it's better to do things for someone rather than something.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Hamlets mistake is that he believed in something like a ghost, that doesn't exist. The second he believed in something irrational, he was doomed. Those are just delusions imagined by the living. Once you're dead, that's it. The dead don't return, nor do they hear our wishes. It's all an illusion. Things you forgot to say, things you couldn't say... they want ghosts to hear them, so they dream one up. It's also possible that people imagine their desire as ghosts.

author: Yoshino Takigawa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: A girlfriend isn't something you get just because you want one. You meet someone you like, and you want to spend time together. That's why you'd want that person as your girlfriend, right?

author: Aika Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: Everything happens for a reason. The daily tragedies and misfortunes are all meaningful events, leading toward an ideal conclusion. With that in mind, there probably isn't really any meaningless misfortune.

author: Kazuya Hiramaru
title: Bakuman
text: Why do people have to work? I just want to eat and sleep. I should have born as a panda at the zoo.

author: Moritaka Mashiro
title: Bakuman
text: I prefer to be a humble dreamer, with visions to be realized, rather than the ruler of people with no dreams or desires.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: Bears are creatures that feel no insecurity in living alone. They're an animal that lives in isolation. Plus, they can hibernate. What a fabulous thing that is. If I were to be reborn, I definitely want to be a bear.

author: Kodaka Hasegawa
title: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
text: Judging things based on looks alone... That's just cruel.

author: Sana Hidaka
title: Myself ; Yourself
text: You're so silly. Even adults cry from a broken heart. It's okay to cry.

author: Lida Ayano
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: The best way to write a realistic romance is to first be in love. Everyone can write a love story from their life.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: To you, life was just something you acted out and ended, all according to someone else's script. That's why you were always quoting Shakespeare. However, Aika, I say that you were wrong! You did what you shouldn't have, and didn't do as you should have. Because you relied on someone else's script, you were wrong. I won't live my life by another person's script. Not by Hamlet or The Tempest. I don't know how many years in the future it will be... but I'll write and act my own ending.

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass
text: The law doesn't protect people. People protect the law. People have always detested evil and sought out a righteous way of living. Their feelings, the accumulation of those peoples feelings are the law. They're neither the provisions, nor the system. They're the fragile and irreplaceable feelings that everyone carries in their hearts.

author: Tohsaka Tokiomi
title: Fate/zero
text: From the moment a magus is born, he is someone that has "power". And some day, he will achieve a "greater power". This responsibility was already flowing in his "blood" before he realized this destiny. That is what it means to be born into this world as the child of a magus.

author: Montana Max
title: Hellsing
text: At last, the sea lion has crossed the ocean and is heading up the hill! Attention soldiers of the Millennium battalion, this is a message from your commander! Friends, let's bring them Hell.

author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I like people who put in effort, even if they're not good at it.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Your guilt will be your past and that will be your God.

author: Motoharu Yano
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: Human memories aren't reliable. Your brain will add something or just glorify it, memories make you believe what happened was better than it actually was.

author: Moritaka Mashiro
title: Bakuman
text: A dream isn't something that someone tells you to go for. It's something you fulfill of your own will.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: It would be so great if it was possible to go through life without making a single mistake.

author: Drosselmeyer
title: Princess Tutu
text: There's nothing more boring than a perfect heroine!

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: What's so special about studying? Every problem has an answer. How hard can it be?

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Are you saddened by your lack of power, young one?

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: The old me would never have known how blue the afternoon sky looks from the roof. My world is growing. What I once considered background noise is now comforting.

author: Kazuki Fujisawa
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: Sometimes, your future is already set, and there's nothing you can do about it. There are some things you just can't change, no matter how hard you work. Unfair, don't you think? It isn't an easy fact to accept, and I'm not telling you to, but that's just how life is. Unfair.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Only a man brave enough to ride into battle at my side could ever be my Master. A coward lacking the courage to even show himself is nowhere close to being worthy!

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: In the human world, truth and reality aren't always one and the same. Humans just call their desires and ambitions as "truth". Humans will even kill other humans if they have "truth" as an excuse.

author: Misa Amane
title: Death Note
text: What do you mean I use my sexual charm?!

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: If you leave, I'll probably be sad. However, if there's somewhere else you'd rather be, you should admit it. Don't lose sight of what you really want.

author: Kenji Yamaguchi
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: You can't feel lonely if there's no one else around.

author: Laetitia
title: Madlax
text: "Falsity" is changing the truth. "Ignorance" is not realizing the truth. "Incompetence" is being unable to fully grasp the truth.

author: Montana Max
title: Hellsing Ultimate
text: Then let me ask you, if your God would allow my madness to flourish across the globe, then wouldn't it seem to you that any god like that would be just as mad as I?

author: Grisha Jaeger
title: Shingeki no Kyojin
text: Karla, nothing can surpass a human's curiosity.

author: Faye Valentine
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: The past is the past and the future is the future. A man is a man and a woman is a woman. The present is the present. I am who I am and you are who you are. That's all there is to it. Does it really matter? Or do we just think it does?

author: Laughing Bull
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Do not fear Death. Death is always at our side. When we show fear, it jumps at us faster than light. But, if we do not show fear, it casts its eye upon us gently and then guides us into infinity.

author: Drosselmeyer
title: Princess Tutu
text: And so, the prince and the princess lived happily ever... Happily!? Happiness in stories is, at most, a trifling matter of a couple of lines at the end — the epitome of boredom. Now, show me a magnificent tragedy! A cataclysm of tears from which not one of the players is saved, and to which a happy ending never comes!

author: Faye Valentine
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Survival of the fittest is the law of nature. We deceive or we are deceived. Thus, we flourish or perish. Nothing good ever happened to me when I trusted others. That is the lesson.

author: Jet Black
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Men always seem to think about their past before they die, as though they were frantically searching for proof that they truly lived.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I think the only time people really have value is when they act according to their own will.

author: Shana
title: Shakugan no Shana
text: No matter how much everyone loves me, and no matter how much I love everyone - if I don't like it, I just can't do it.

author: Nanoha Takamachi
title: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha
text: Nothing is forever. Everyone changes. They have to! Even I and so do you.

author: Jodie Hayward
title: El Cazador de la Bruja
text: Hearts are fragile. But hearts that support each other are as strong as steel.

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: I never had anything this good before. I guess everything tastes good when I'm with you.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: It's a waste of time to bother with anything uncertain.

author: Tea Gardner
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: *to Kaiba* Yugi may have lost one lousy Duel Monsters game, but at least he hasn't lost his heart! Not like you - you've spent so much time with your machines, you've forgotten what being human is about! Yugi has a heart, Kaiba. Yugi has us. And what about you, Seto Kaiba? What do you have at the end of the day? Tell me. Tell me!

author: Yukino Yukinoshita
title: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru
text: People who don't work hard don't have the right to be envious of the people with talent. People fail because they don't understand the hard work necessary to be successful.

author: Momoka Oginome
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: I think everything in this world is beautiful. The sky, birds, bugs, frogs, flowers, and even rocks. Because, if God created this world, could there really be anything dirty and ugly in it?

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: I'm no expert, but I think people mope when their expectations are too high. It's tiring when you always have to overachieve. Don't overdo it. Just work on achieving what you can.

author: Shizuku Mizutani
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Real friends wouldn't use you for your money. I don't have any friends, so I'm no expert, but I'd rather have no friends than have friends like them.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: There are two types of dreams. Dreams from when you're awake and dreams from when you sleep. And both of those can become reality, if you strongly wish for it.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: I have two rules: First, I'm never wrong. Second, if I'm wrong... back to the first rule.

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: None of you will ever escape the curse, as I could not. Residents of the boxes like you could never gain anything. You will all simply disappear without leaving anything behind in this world. You won't even leave a fleck of dust behind - you will never be happy!

author: Himari Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: It's no use. It's akin to love. Akin to the first kiss. It only works once.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Everyone is alone. Everyone is empty. People no longer have need of others. You can always find a spare for any replacement. Any relationship can be replaced.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm afraid when something is truly lost, one can never get it back again.

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: What do you think of the word "fate"? Does the concept of fate exists in reality? To put it simply, are people's futures set in stone when they are born, never to be challenged? Do you believe in such a rule?

author: Kazuki Fujisawa
title: Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo
text: To create something that appeals to the emotions of users, you need to make something that sways your own heart. You can't move others hearts, unless you can move your own.

author: Kayneth Archibald El-Melloi
title: Fate/zero
text: (to Kiritsugu) I shall not let you die easily. I shall use healing magic to regenerate your heart and lungs, while I rend every inch of your flesh. In pain and despair, you will die as you suffer. And while you die, you will curse them... You will curse the cowardice of those who hired you! You will curse the Einzbern's for disgracing the Holy Grail War!

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Fail to strike the enemy once you know their location, and it'll be too late to even regret having missed the chance.

author: Tohsaka Tokiomi
title: Fate/zero
text: Strive to consistently maintain the proper flow. That is the Tohsaka family motto. It means always remaining reserved and elegant.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I'm not short, I just live in a big world.

author: Okazaki Tomoya
title: CLANNAD
text: You should cry while you still can. When you get bigger, sometimes, you can't cry even if you have something you wanna cry about.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Rarely does one have the chance to exchange blows with heroes from another age. And with the chance to fight as many as six, I can't allow one of them to fall right now. Look at Saber and Lancer. Both are valiant warriors I would love to duel with. It'd be a pity to let either die.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Men who can't wipe away the tears from a women's eyes, aren't real men.

author: Lancer
title: Fate/zero
text: Before I am a Servant, I am a knight. I can only serve but one lord.

author: Duo Maxwell
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
text: Why did I rescue this guy in the first place? He's anti-social, thinks he's evil kenevil, and hardly speaks. You've got such a gloomy personality, why don't you stop pretending to be human.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: It's amazing how every time you open your mouth, you manage to prove you're an idiot.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: Don't judge people from the outside. Like any rose has thorns, the more the person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.

author: Truth
