title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: Who am I? One name you might have for me is the world, or you might call me the universe, or perhaps God, or perhaps the Truth. I am All, and I am One. So, of course, this also means that I am you. I am the truth of your despair, the inescapable price of your boastfulness. And now, I will bestow upon you the despair you deserve.

author: Roger Smith
title: The Big O
text: This place, Paradigm City, is a town of forgetfulness. One day, forty years ago, every person here lost all memory of anything which had occurred before that day. But humans are adaptable creatures. They make do and go on with life. If they're smart enough to figure out how to operate machinery and get electricity, they can still have something of a civilization even without a history. People can survive without knowing what did or didn't happen in the past, and each day they try their hardest to do just that. The only ones who regret the loss of these memories are the city's elderly. But memories, like nightmares, sometimes come when you least expect them.

author: Maes Hughes
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: In general, men prefer to let their actions speak instead of words. When they're in pain, they don't want to burden anyone with it, not if they can help it. They don't want anyone to worry about them. That's how they are. Even so, there may come a time when they'll ask for your help. And when they do, I know that you'll be there for them. Isn't that enough?

author: Milly Ashford
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Things that don't change go extinct.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: There are times in life when you have to distance yourself from those you love, because you love them.

author: Nagi Sanzenin
title: Hayate no Gotoku!
text: SLEEPING is the only TALENT I have.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Books are not something that you just read words in. They're also a tool to adjust your senses.

author: Roger Smith
title: The Big O
text: We have choices. Some people like to stand in the rain without an umbrella. That's what it means to live free.

author: Michael Seebach
title: The Big O
text: I've lived my life as a newspaper reporter. I uncover the truth and write my articles. But then I learned, all too well, that a mere reporter like myself can't ever get to the truth in this city... it's nearly impossible. And it's unsure! No one here is even interested in learning the truth - a truth that must be known. But I want to know! I want to learn what must be known!

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: It's a rule that I've had in my life. Kill anyone who calls me "Dirty Red".

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text:
A king without greed is even worse than a figurehead! Saber, you said you would become a martyr for your ideals. In life, you must have been a pure saint. A proud and noble figure, certainly. But who can truly admire the martyr's thorny path? Who dreams of such an ending?

A king... The king must be greedier than any other. He must laugh louder and rage harder. He must exemplify the extreme of all things, good and evil. That is why his retainers envy and adore him. And why the flames of aspiration, to be as the king is, can burn within his people.   

Proud king of chivalry... The righteousness and ideals you bore may indeed have saved your nation once. However, I'm certain you know what became of those who were saved, but left to themselves.

You saved them, but you never led them. You never showed them what a king should be. You abandoned your men when they lost their way. Then, alone and untroubled, you followed your own petty little ideals.

Thus, you are no true king. You are only a little girl, enraptured by a false idol of the king who serves others, but not themselves.

author: Berserker
title: Fate/zero
text: I am the alienated, the ridiculed, the despised. No need to praise my name. No need to envy my body. I am the shadow under the radiance of heroic spirits. Birthed of the darkness of glorious legend. And so, I hate, I resent. Nourished by the sighs of the people precipitated within the darkness, people that curse the light. This is my disgrace. Because of her unsullied glory, I must forever be belittled. You are, the sacrifice. Good, give me more, your blood and flesh, your life. Let them ignite my hatred!!

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Love is the reason why there is pain. When we lose someone precious to us, hate is born. Vengeance is the product of that hate and so death follows. But in death there is only more death. This will give rise to more pains. In this cursed world we live in, it is a cycle of hatred that will not cease. You and I seek the same thing that Jiraiya-sensei wanted. Let me ask you this: How will you confront this hatred in order to create peace?

author: Michael Seebach
title: The Big O
text: Humans who lose the capacity to think become creatures who's existence has no value. Think, you humans who are split into two worlds, unless you want the gulf between humans to expand into oblivion, you must think!

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: If I were to live out life without any mistakes that would be great. But... there is no such path. Falling, tripping, losing the way, making mistakes, little by little, walking one step at a time, this is the only way to live out life.

author: Scorpio Kardia
title: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas
text: Life will someday extinguish. Why don't you start burning it now?

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: I hate perfection. To be perfect is to be unable to improve any further.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Strength begins in understanding your own weakness.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: In a business like this, there are times when you need to change as the situation demands. I switch my personality depending on how I view things.

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Our contracts are completely dependent upon you agreeing to them first. I think that, in and of itself, is quite kind of us.

author: Akio Ohtori
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: You remind me so much of myself from the past. I also used to think that perseveration had some credits, that it was the best way to change the world... but with that alone you cannot accomplish anything. Without power, you're doomed to become dependent on others, that's the way the world works.

author: Shimura Tae
title: Gintama
text: *To Shinpachi* When your friend is crying, cry with him. When your friend is worried, you should worry with him. And when your friend has an awkward bowel movement, then you must have an awkward bowel movement too, Shin-chan. If you are a friend, you should be able to share the other's pain, no matter what. And Shin-chan, if your friend goes down the wrong path... Then, you must stop your friend, even if it ruins your friendship. That is true samurai friendship.

author: Tomomi Masaoka
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Everything you've been taught is based on theories and logic. Soon, you'll come to realize how pointless they are.

author: Kougami Shinya
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Being a detective isn't about bringing someone down, but rather protecting someone.

author: Hakaze Kusaribe
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: There are no convenient miracles, and there is logic that should be inviolable.

author: Natsume Asako
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Who cares about school?! The real me lives on the Internet!

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Do you know how many civilizations are crowded together in the universe and how much energy is used up in one second? Eventually, you humans, will leave this planet as well, and join us. You wouldn't want to be handed an empty, desolate universe then, would you?

author: Ikusaba Marco
title: Mirai Nikki
text: If today is the worst day ever - tomorrow has to be better.

author: Akio Ohtori
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: Women who cannot become princesses have no choice but to become witches.

author: Setsuna F. Seiei
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: I wanted to know why was the world so twisted? Where did this twistedness come from? How can people be so wicked without needing to be? And why don't they realize their wickedness? Why are there things that bring chaos to so many lives? Why do people rule and let themselves be ruled? And why do they hurt each other? And why despite all that do people still want to live their lives? I was just looking for answers. I thought that if I met with you, you'd give me those answers... because you're looking for the same thing along a different path from mine - from the path where people can understand each other.

author: Sakamoto Yuuji
title: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
text: There's one good thing about being an idiot. When they really get into something, they can simple-mindedly devote all of their attention to it. I guess some people would just call them obsessed, but to them, that's high praise!

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: A writer once said that "a designer knows he has achieved perfection not when he has nothing left to add, but when he has nothing left to take away".

author: Casshern
title: Casshern Sins
text: If you've forgotten death... then you've forgotten what it truly means to be alive.

author: Koenma
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: In addition to knowing the secrets of the universe, I can assure you, I am quite potty trained.

author: Mamiya Chida
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: I wonder if the flowers themselves are happy, being forced to last so long. Eternity doesn't exist in this world, does it? It's just that one could think that a heart that longs for eternity is beautiful.

author: Kyousuke Natsume
title: Little Busters!
text: If the world is full of things we never wanted to know, is our only option to look away? You won't solve anything by looking away.

author: Charles Zi Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: All men are NOT created equal! Some are born smarter, or more beautiful, or with parents of greater status. Some, by contrast, are born of weak body or mind, or with few, if any, talents. All men are different! Yes, the very existence of man is discriminatory! That's why there is war, violence and unrest.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Often times, people simply deny the existence of what they do not understand, and anyone who tells them otherwise is a liar.

author: Touya
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: It's simple. Even the strongest tree will die if left in the dark. I find that to be the best way to describe us. A giant oak, crashing through a dark soil, bringing order to an otherwise chaotic land. The Shinobi have done their job for centuries, and done it well. But in recent years, we have caught glimpses of the outside world, and asked: "Why not us? Have we not earned the privilege others take for free?".

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: When something dies or is lost, that thing doesn't truly disappear, as long as someone remembers it. And that remembering it is to acknowledge its existence, and because of that, it can sometimes be seen again.

author: Les Soldats
title: Noir
text: A sinner once passed away will never return, but sins will never vanish and the love will never die.

author: Carrot Glace
title: Bakuretsu Hunters
text: I'm in the mood for loooooove! *Hot nurse walks in.* I'm in the mood for seeeeeeeeex!

author: Michiru
title: Air
text: Humans can't live without memories, you know. Still, they can't live on memories alone. You have to awaken from your dreams eventually. Because dreams you don't awaken from eventually become sadness.

author: Tadashi Karino
title: Special A
text: Is there a different sorry for simple and complicated situations? Whether it's a simple or complicated problem, if you think you've done something wrong, then in the end you'd say sorry either way.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: The words “fly” and “fall” are tied together. But the more you're hooked to flying, the more you forget about that fact. As a result, you end up trying to reach the skies even after you die. Not falling to the ground, but falling toward the sky.

author: Okajima Rokuro
title: Black Lagoon
text: There's a noose that hangs at the entrance to the city. It's a message to be read by all who encounter it. For the cautious, the sane - it's a warning. For the reckless, the wild at heart - an invitation they cannot refuse. The worst of the criminal underworld gather here. They come here from across the world to butt heads and jostle for power. An evil city caught between the east and the west founded during the Cold War and nurtured by many who came here to ride the wave of the illegal drug trade sweeping across the continent. The edge of the world, the crucible of hypocrisy, a place where those whose souls have been destroyed in the relentless search for money and power reside. A final stop on the way to hell. How have I managed to stay alive this long? With the help of three people: Dutch, Revy and Benny. Also known as the Lagoon Company. The name of this city is spoken of among the villains of the world. Many who come here to make a name for themselves are swallowed by the darkness, never to return. A cruel fate awaits any half-assed small time crook, who accidentally stumbles into Roanapur. Right now another sacrificial lamb has wandered too far from home. The city awaits.

author: Casshern
title: Casshern Sins
text: Even though there is life, no one here is living it. Life is overflowing and they are merely drinking their fill. But Dio and all the people I've met on my journey aren't like that... they're.. they're more... they were blazing with fire. They were torches burning with life.

author: Fujou Kirie
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: It wasn't the pain that hurt me. Rather, it was the feeling of me being ripped apart, and the sound of the knife plunging deep, deep into my heart. That incomparably bittersweet fear. My body shook and trembled at the thought of it. My silent weeping contained my uneasiness, my loneliness, my will to live. My tears aren't from the pain either, or from the fear of the encounter. It was for the brush of death that I had never before experienced, but had now fallen in love with, even though I pray every night for the strength to live.

author: Bai Ji-Shin Chang
title: Black Lagoon
text:
It's been 35 years... since this rotten harbor town became a den of vice. Roanapur has managed to stay out of CNN's evening news or the dinner topic of housewives only because... from the past to the present, the motives of those who've gathered here have always been consistent. That is, it's in our mutual interest to lead the public eye away from our more stimulating businesses, for the peace of mind of those who are crooked.
...
Please remember this. If we continue suspecting each other, continue pursuing our own self-interests... who do you think will be left standing in the ring in the end? There won't be anybody there, ladies and gentlemen. Not you, not me... Not even the ring itself.

author: Sophie Hatter
title: Howl's Moving Castle
text: A heart's a heavy burden.

author: Faye Valentine
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: They often say that humans can't live alone. But you can live pretty long by yourself. Instead of feeling alone in a group, it's better to be alone in your solitude.

author: Fumito Nanahara
title: Blood-C
text: What do you think people are made of? I'm not talking about blood or flesh. We do care about what's on the exterior, but we want to focus more on what people even now still call the "inside." You can also call it "nature". I guess you are either born this way or raised to act this way. Are people born like this or do they become like this? The answer is...

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends.

author: Howl
title: Howl's Moving Castle
text: Sorry, I've had enough of running away, Sophie. Now I've got something I want to protect. It's you.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: The scar of my past will determine my future!

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy.

author: Gai Tsutsugami
title: Guilty Crown
text: Do you think I can shoulder everyone's lives and not feel any weight? I don't want to be indifferent. I want to be worthy of everyone's feelings.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: I was younger then, I wasn't afraid of anything, I didn't think about dying for a second. I thought I was invincible. Then I met some girl. I wanted to live, I started to think like that; for the first time I was afraid of death. I had never felt like that before.

author: Iori Nagase
title: Kokoro Connect
text: I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: When I say it doesn't hurt me, that means I can bear it.

author: Judeau
title: Berserk
text: Whether it's good or bad, it's so unfortunate to wake up during a dream.

author: Gai Tsutsugami
title: Guilty Crown
text: A life with no adventure in it is boring. The least a friend can do is stir up a little trouble in your heart.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Naruto... Just so you know, there will be a war to protect the Eight-Tails and Nine-Tails. In other words - you. For the sake of the ninja world and as the Kazekage, I will guard you with my life. If as a member of Akatsuki, Sasuke Uchiha stands in the way of the ninja coalition... I will show him no mercy.

author: Chiaki Shinichi
title: Nodame Cantabile
text: It's my own business what I decide to do and where I decide to do it.

author: Hiruma Youichi
title: Eyeshield 21
text: Don't get too close to him, his stupidity is contagious.

author: Yoshida Haru
title: Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun
text: Make one peep and I will rape you.

author: Shuusei Kagari
title: Psycho-Pass
text: No matter where you are, people find a way to entertain themselves.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: You have gone and taken all those lives, and not even because you were thirsty! Is it fun... Huh! Is that what it takes for filth like you to get off..? Cheap little two bit terrors.

author: Akane Tsunemori
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I was the only one who got an A ranking for the Public Safety Bureau. There were more than 500 students and I was the only one. So I thought that there must have been something that only I could do at the Bureau. If I went there, I thought I could find my purpose in life... I thought I'd be able to find out why I was born here and now!

author: Eru Chitanda
title: Hyouka
text: You don't have to worry about being special or normal compared to everyone else! It doesn't matter who it is. So as long as they think you're special, then you're special.

author: Amu Hinamori
title: Shugo Chara
text: No matter what changes, I'll still be me. And I can be whoever I want to be!

author: Jet Black
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don't desire, but they're inevitable. We have to face them. It's what being human is all about.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: Sadistic? I don't mind you calling me that. If you don't want to get hurt, don't attack me when I say not to.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: His soul was as pure as snow.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: What would you have me say? "Don't worry, I'm sure he's still alive."? Ridiculous. I am not here to comfort you. I don't understand why are you so fixated on life and death? At any rate, your friends will soon be annihilated. So what if that's one step closer? They should have seen this coming from the start. If they couldn't see it coming, the fault lies in their own foolishness. Laughing them off as a group of idiots would be sufficient. Why can't you do that? If it were me, and my friends entered Hueco Mundo without first gauging their strength, I'd be infuriated by their stupidity.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: It's always like this. The only things I can ever do for Naruto are the little things anyone could do...

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Rush in there right now and break his hands and legs so he'll never be able to use them again. Make it so he won't be able to do anything without you anymore. Then he'll be yours. His heart, body, everything.

author: Hyuuga Junpei
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Listen to your seniors once in a while or I will kill you.

author: Togashi Yuuta
title: Chuunibyou Demo Koi Ga Shitai!
text: Accepting something is easier said than done.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: You keep imposing your ideals on them. Don't worry about other people. You only need to do what you think is right.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: Everyone exists for a reason. As small as it can be. I'm sure you have a meaning too.

author: Yoite
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Night is good. Appearances lose their meaning and get swallowed up by the darkness.

author: Sanetoshi Watase
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: I realized one morning... That I hate this world. This world is made of countless boxes. People bend and stuff their bodies into their own boxes. And stay there for the rest of their lives. And eventually, inside the box, they forget: what they looked like; what they loved; who they loved. That's why I'm getting out of my box. I'm one of the chosen. That's why I'm going to destroy this world.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance... I did not want you to get involved. But now... I think you could have changed father and mother. Perhaps even the entire Uchiha. If I would have stood in front of you and looked you in the eyes from the very beginning... talked to you instead of down to you... and been open about everything. But I failed, and speaking to you now, like this, isn't going to undo the permanent damage that's already been done to you. That's why I wanted to show you the truth. Even if it's just a little. And no matter what you decide to do from here on out, you never have to forgive me - I will always love you.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: A detective who corners a culprit with their reasoning and drives them to suicide in front of himself - is no different than a murderer.

author: Shun Izuki
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Fear isn't a bad thing. There are some things that can only be done by cowards.

author: Heero Yuy
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
text: Let me tell you something about dying. It hurts like hell.

author: Mamoru Kusanagi
title: Blue Seed
text: Hmm... never noticed those before *after accidently groping Momiji's chest*.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: Beautiful flowers, too, eventually wither and fall. That's the fate of all living beings.

author: South Korea
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Quotes were invented in Korea, you know!

author: Y
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Children aren't sweet or innocent. The weird ones are left unchecked. It's rare to find anyone you can trust!

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Forget what hurt you in the past, but never forget what it taught you.

author: Nobuchika Ginoza
title: Psycho-Pass
text: They say that fools learn from their experiences, while the wise learn from history. I hope you're not a fool.

author: Anemone
title: Eureka Seven
text: I'm still very very young. I want to go shopping, and I want to eats lots more of all kinds of yummy foods, you know? And of course... Of course... have a wonderful romance too. If I could have something like that, it would be the best. Yeah... That really would be the best.

author: Himura Yuu
title: Ef - A Fairy Tale Of The Two
text: Because she learned about happiness, she feels lonely for the first time. And because she knows unhappiness, she understands happiness for the first time.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Always skillfully manipulate your pieces, that's how you survive. Use me and madam red, any piece within your reach. Even if the bodies of your pawns pile up in front of your thrown. Because if the king falls - this game is over.

author: Sakae Jinnouchi
title: Summer Wars
text: There's no lack of painful things in this world, but hunger and loneliness must surely be two of the worst. Thanks to you, I didn't know a moment of either of them.

author: Annelotte Kreuz
title: Queen's Blade: Rebellion
text: People must continue to fight for their fate. Unless they fight for the future they wish for, they will never know whether or not they can attain it.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Words are very powerful. That's why you have to watch everything that comes out from your mouth.

author: Hiyono Yuizaki
title: Spiral
text: They say when you fall, it's best to fall straight to the bottom, and the farther you have to crawl back up, the stronger and greater you'll be as a result.

author: Sonozaki Mion
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: Life is like a tube of toothpaste. When you've used all the toothpaste down the last squeeze, that's when you've really lived. Live with all your might. And struggle as long as you have life.

author: Kougami Shinya
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I'm sorry. I couldn't keep my promise. I wanted to go into a line of work where I could protect people. That's why I became a detective. But Makishima changed everything. That man will continue to kill people. And yet, the law can't judge him. As long as I'm a detective, I can't touch him. This case made me aware... that the law can't protect people.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: It's a beautiful night. It almost makes me want to go out for a bite to drink.

author: Fujou Kirie
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: The flash of light I felt when I was stabbed in the heart. The overwhelming torrent of death and the beat of life. I always thought I had nothing, but there is still that simple thing left in me. This fear that sends a chill down my spine. I have to feel the most death I can to feel the happiness of life. For everything in my life I have ignored until now. But it probably would be impossible to die like I did that night. I probably cannot hope for such a striking end. That death pierced me like lightning, like a needle, like a sword. That's why I will try to come as close to that as possible. I don't have any idea right now but I still have a few days to think about it. And I've already decided on the method. I don't think I even need to say this, but I think my end should be a long fall from a place overlooking the world.

author: Alexander Anderson
title: Hellsing
text: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and for thy possession, the ends of the earth. Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron. Thou shalt dash them in pieces, like a potters vessel. Be wise now, therefore ye kings. Be admonished ye judges of the earth. Serve the lord with fear, and rejoice with trembling. Kiss the son lest he be angry, and ye perish in the way, though his wrath be kindled but a little.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers. The selfish desire of wanting to maintain peace causes wars, and hatred is born to protect love.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Life isn't that sweet. That's why everyone wants sweet things.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: It's easier to crush a dream than realize one. Forming a bond is infinitely more difficult than breaking one.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: Entire civilizations were built and destroyed between now and the last time you said "we'll go soon"! I'll have rotted and turned to ash by the time this "soon" of yours comes!!

author: Kanami Yuta
title: Scryed
text: It's not that I hate the person in front of me. If I had met him under different circumstances, this never would have happened. But I did meet him that day, and now there is no turning back. I must distinguish the difference between past and present. Everything must be left behind, and the man in front of me is the wall; the wall that I must break through. There is only one direction for me to go. I have to move forward. That's what I'm thinking...

author: Sora
title: Kingdom Hearts
text: Memories, even important ones — don't come back to us whenever we want them to. But that doesn't mean the memories are gone.

author: Shiki Misaki
title: Subarashiki Kono Sekai
text: Sometimes all people need is a good listener.

author: America
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Check it out yo, how kick ass is my new fighter plane of doom!? Dude, it blowin your mind yet or what?

author: France
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: *To Russia* You were such a cute country when you were born and now your all grown up...

author: South Italy
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: As long as I'm with you, I get fed and nobody picks on me! I like being here!

author: Dera Mochimazzi
title: Tamako Market
text: The year may end, but some things never do. You may not see them with your eyes, but when you look with your heart, you can.

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: I don't have anywhere to go back to. All we can do is keep moving forward.

author: Crocodile
title: One Piece
text: "If I do this, I can stop the rebellion”, “if I do that, I can stop the rebellion”... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!

author: Akito Wanijima
title: Air Gear
text: My plan was perfect, but there was one thing I overlooked, one factor I failed to calculate. He's a dumbass. And there is no accounting for Dumbass...Ness.

author: Little Demon
title: Soul Eater
text: Come with me. Overwhelming madness and power await.

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: The moon peers down on a diseased world... There is no cure for the disease, an entire race walks mindlessly into destruction. Not even a man of colossal power, would be able to prevent the inevitable.

author: Little Demon
title: Soul Eater
text: Wouldn't it be nice to have a strong mind, one that can get rid of the fear you feel?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The human heart is the source of all our power... We fight with the power of our hearts.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Listen up, I don't care what you punks do around the universe. But with this, my sword… anywhere it can reach, is part of my country! Asses who blunder in and violate my things… whether it be a Shogun, whether it be space pirates, whether it be a meteorite - I'll destroy them!!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: You must live life as long as you are still strong. Never look at your life as something insignificant.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: I'm telling you, it's just that it's soooooo lolilolilolied that it smokes. Come on, girls. One of you loan me your whistle. I'll lolly it up!

author: Youko Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I consider your class of demon very worthy, worthy to fight, and worthy to die.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: You don't need a driver's license to hit and run!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: I've told you, this isn't a cigarette. It's a lollipop!

author: Misaki Ayuzawa
title: Kaichou Wa Maid-Sama!
text: The aura of offensive smell has come to such a strong extent that you can even see it!!

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: False tears bring pain to those around you. A false smile brings pain to one self.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: The future is not a straight line. There are many different pathways. We must try to decide that future for ourselves.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: But men are always boys at heart until the die.

author: Rima Mashiro
title: Shugo Chara
text: How worthless. Why are you saying things are impossible? You just decided that to make yourself feel better! Sure, there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!

author: Donquixote Doflamingo
title: One Piece
text: Pirates are evil? The Marines are righteous? These terms have always changed throughout the course of history! Kids who have never seen peace and kids who have never seen war have different values! Those who stand at the top determine what's wrong and what's right! This very place is neutral ground! Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!

author: Killua Zoldyck
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: Assassination — It's the family trade. We all take it up. My folks see me as an exceptional prospect. But I don't see that I should have to live up to their expectations.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: If a girl chases after you, it's likely a trap.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: But hating something you love is a painful feeling.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: True, I've given up on the real world. However, I haven't given up on myself.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Well, hurting girls isn't one of my hobbies. That's why I'll make it my hobby to stomp on their cell phones. Hahahahahaha! I'm so bored of it now... it's no longer my hobby to stomp on cell phones.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Detective, don't waste your time trying to change their minds. Fight by their meaningless rules and you'll be pulled down with them. There's only one real law of the dark tournament: the strongest man prevails. I've retrieved enough energy to rip my way out, let's show this entire stadium a new definition for victory!

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: Smiles and laughter are always good, but never forget your Poker Face!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes, Children can be quite demanding about their games.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: It's probably a lie. The reason why I only stay for three days in any country. I'm afraid I'll settle down, if I stay too long. Because if I settled down, I would cease to be a traveler.

author: Kurapika
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.

author: Nanami Takahashi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: I wonder why people make promises they won't be able to keep.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Hatred and sorrow are power; they are yours to control. All you have to do is turn them into strength, and use that strength to move forward.

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: You are right. I am not a detective, but a thief. And stealing is what thieves do best, even if it's a persons heart.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Unfortunately, in reality there is no situation where one can win merely by following the rules. There will be knights that break the rules, and even chess pieces that betray him.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: Justice is not something that you can express in words.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: A man who raises his hands on a woman is trash. If I have to become trash in order to survive... It'll be just like dying.

author: Labrador
title: 07 Ghost
text: You can never tell a good seed from a bad seed until it blossoms.

author: Raiko Shimizu
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Unwilling to listen or see anything else, you lost yourself in your own world and became incapable of seeing the things around you.

author: Ling Yao
title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
text: If you turn your back on something you wanted, you don't deserve to call yourself greed!

author: Frau
title: 07 Ghost
text: If you're going to hide a tree, put it in the forest.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: I guess it's only natural for inferior beings to ride on the coattails of their superior counterparts. If they wish to keep their lives, they have no choice but to obediently comply. It's a never ending chain... as the ones who are burdened with that trust, in order to escape that burden, seek to find someone even greater than themselves. These greater beings then seek others even greater than themselves to shelter them. This is how Gods are born. But make no mistake. They all still abide to me. Because from this point onward, you will witness first hand, the power of the God they foolishly placed their faith in. I will become that God they have no choice but to believe in.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Mysterious things are everywhere. So bizarre as often as you can hear of them. Without witness, with sight unseen, without a care it is simply a phenomenon. Merely not of concern. In this world, mankind itself has its own fantastic wonders.

author: Frau
title: 07 Ghost
text: We aren't flying away from everyone to leave them, but rather so we might see them again someday.

author: Fumito Nanahara
title: Blood-C
text: It's difficult to change someone's emotions, no matter how they are, so long as they are deeply engraved in the heart. I suppose hatred would be the hardest. Many people will say that hatred fades over time, but that doesn't mean it ever really goes away. It's still there. It's just hiding where you can't see it, and given the slightest chance, it will reassert itself. Now then, given hatred's persistence, what should you do if you can't get rid of it? The only possibility is to overwrite it with an equally powerful emotion – with an emotion as strong as hatred… Yes, those would be love and trust.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: I've been looking out at the world through windows I've opened across the net. It's an extremely close-minded and twisted world.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: NEET is not a stereotype. It's a way of life.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: You can use whatever technique you like, but now that I said I will kill you... your death tonight has been assured.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: *after Misa-chan says that she can't imagine a world without Light* Hmmm... Yes, it would be dark!

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: I can't help you. I belong to a world where all is death. Your world of choices was not meant for me to interfere with.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: That dog is neither man nor monster. Only a man can truly hope to kill a monster.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: Rather than leaving someone to die, I'd much rather die together with them.

author: Prussia
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Look at my soldiers and their mean faces! I taught them that face!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Leave this guy's key to me, I'll do what you cant do; you do what I can't do. Think carefully! Read the situation. If you're here, there's got to be a way Robin-chan can be saved! Usopp!

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: I won't live my life by another person's script.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: Normal people don't become authors to begin with, Hermes.

author: Alucard
title: Hellsing
text: To reign over the kingdom of the world, to make its peace and write its laws; to be generous to the obedient and merciless to all who would stand against you. Nothing ever changes; two thousand years and you still act like the world is yours.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Pain tends to heal as time passes, but personally, I don't want time to heal my wounds. You may think you've escaped the pain and forgotten it, but that's nothing more than stagnation. You can't move forward without the pain.

author: Griffith
title: Berserk
text: Is he living his dreams in death? Or.. is death the end of dreams?

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: I am a scientist, I have to act on my own theory. I can't let my emotions get in the way. But it's impossible to forget everything... because I've known you for longer than we've lived. This is reality. This is the world.

author: Elliot Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Are you telling me to flee from my foe!? The blood of a coward doesn't flow through these veins!

author: Kaitou Kid
title: Detective Conan
text: A thief is a creative artist who takes his prey in style... But a detective is nothing more than a critic, who follows our footsteps.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: It is at the moment of death that humanity has value.

author: Guts
title: Berserk
text: One who does something he hates just because he's told to.. is called an errand boy.

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: It doesn't matter who your parents were. Everyone is a child of the sea.

author: Y
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I found a job after graduation, but it was at the school. So much for sentimental farewells.

author: Mahiro Fuwa
title: Zetsuen No Tempest
text: I'll do whatever it takes to have everything make sense again!

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Don't concern yourself with what those tasteless idiots say.

author: Alan Humphries
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I was born alone in this world and alone I will die. If this is my fate, why are tears coming out of my eyes?

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: There's no one who can live their whole life being completely uncorrupted.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Say, how about we put an end to all of this? The two of us could become Witches and destroy everything! Everything in this world that has ever made us hate, everything that has ever made us cry, will turn to ashes until nothing is left, like it was all just a bad dream! We'd have no worries! Isn't that nice?

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Aah... I said I'd "answer you" ... Not that I'd "give you a straight answer".

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: You can play any character and yet in the end, you yourself are nobody. Your core personality is null. It's empty. That's how you could wear any mask all over your smooth, featureless face and have it fit perfectly.

author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: I really don't know what I should believe in anymore... Even if I believe I'm doing the right thing... Nothing goes well at all.

author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: I am the Defender of the pride of New Hell...!!

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: ...Have I... Stumbled upon a brand new shitty game again...?

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Water is the greatest enemy of games.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: In the first place, the logic that says "those who play games are kids" is itself an allusion, therefore one might say that shoehorning reality into your stubborn dualism is already a criticism of the self. In short, humans can only recognize reality through the filter called "me" and so they are unable to escape the constraints of their uncanny existence.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Humans shouldn't just disregard something they cannot comprehend while also trying to define it.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Maybe, just maybe, there is no purpose in life... but if you linger a while longer in this world, you might discover something of value in it.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: True power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart, it fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity one scarcely imagines to be possible...

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: An unforeseen situation... An unexpected turn of events... In the face of those, you too will face your true self.

author: Makishima Shougo
title: Psycho-Pass
text: I wonder what sort of criteria you use to divide people into good and evil.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: The world is lucky! Despite of how much I hate the world, I have decided to mend it rather than destroy it.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I always thought of humans as intelligent dominoes, since they tend to follow each other.

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: Dying or getting killed isn't something unnatural. Living aimlessly without a purpose is.

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I did say that you could ask, but I didn't say that I would answer.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: If the ideal world can be found in a bad game, it can be found in the real world as well.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: The game design for life is flawed.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Being happy is not a right, but a duty. A duty to yourself. Waiving rights is one thing, but failing in your duty is downright irresponsible.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: No fair, sky. I'm the one who feels like crying.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I should use a cheerful joke to lighten the mood. Would you like a snack? Or, maybe I should snack on you instead?

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: If you cling to life, you live in fear of death. And that fear will cloud your judgment.

author: Chiaki Shinichi
title: Nodame Cantabile
text: You can't sit around envying other peoples worlds. You have to go out and change your own.

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: They weren't my friends, they were my possessions! Money, women, henchmen... they're all possessions! So killing my henchmen is the same as stealing from me, and I don't let people take what's mine!

author: Solf J. Kimblee
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that's what it means to be alive!

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I am not a friend of justice. I am an enemy of evil.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: The sun is my enemy, but the moon has been good to me.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Any betrayal you can see is trivial,  what is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal you cannot see.

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Stories where love and courage win in the end always turn out like that, you know? When I think about it, I became a magical girl because I always loved those stories.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: There are... many types of monsters in this world: Monsters who will not show themselves and who cause trouble; monsters who abduct children; monsters who devour dreams; monsters who suck blood, and... monsters who always tell lies. Lying monsters are a real nuisance. They are much more cunning than other monsters. They pose as humans even though they have no understanding of the human heart. They eat even though they've never experienced hunger. They study even though they have no interest in academics. They seek friendship even though they do not know how to love. If I were to encounter such a monster, I would likely be eaten by it. Because in truth, I am that monster.

author: Souji Mikage
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: Ancient creatures died and left naught but fossil fuels, like coal and petroleum. Without that sacrifice, our present energy civilization would not exist. That sort of sacrifice is what is always demanded.

author: Akio Ohtori
title: Revolutionary Girl Utena
text: This device paints the illusion of fairy tales for those with naive wishes in their hearts, who say they wish something eternal existed, who say they wish the power of miracles existed. But, there's no place higher than this room. This room is the summit of Ohtori Academy, and of the world.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text:
It's often said, "People who are similar can be called friends", right? You haven't been making a good life for yourself, have you? Well, I guess I'm no better.. People don't try to make a life that they can't be proud of... They have the intention of staying on the straight path, but out of blue, they're in the dirt. But, even so, with heart and soul you try to brake through. There will be a day, that even dirt will dry and fall off.

(Gintoki to Catherine
"Gintama chapter 24, page 19")

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: A normal detective eavesdrops, goes on stakeouts, and gathers information by foot to find out what they're looking for. But a NEET detective can search the world over to find the truth without stepping out of their room!

author: Makoto Niwa
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: The summer continues to make me wonder. So my head, boiling like a pot, will never cool. With the heat. With the cicadas buzzing. With the twinkling of the myriad stars floating in the sky.

author: Lockon Stratos
title: Mobile Suit Gundam 00
text: The only thing you can change about the past is how you feel about it in the present.

author: Fumito Nanahara
title: Blood-C
text: When a person encounters that which they cannot understand, what do they do? Why, they think. But you know, the more you think about something, the further you get from the truth. Yes. Your thoughts get in the way of what your instincts desire. In the way of the real answer.

author: Kanoe Yuuko
title: Tasogare Otome X Amnesia
text: People don't realize they aren't able to choose whether or not to believe something. If they subconsciously believe something, therein lies the potential for a curse.

author: Togashi Yuuta
title: Chuunibyou Demo Koi Ga Shitai!
text: I am the Dark Flame Master. Perish, enveloped in the flames of darkness!

author: Makoto Niwa
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: To have a name. To remove one layer of the unknown. To be painted in reality. If you have your feet firmly planted to the ground, you may have a chance to pull someone down.

author: Yashiro Hoshimiya
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: If you don't trust the boy who cries wolf - in other words, a child who lies, your sheep and goats will all get eaten. But who gives a damn about moral lectures. The important part is that because the boy believed in his lies, he really brought a wolf to the village. You can't deny that! *to Niwa Makoto*

author: Maekawa
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: For questions where your chance of being correct is 50/50, it's best to go with your gut response.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: True detective work is beyond the general masses. After all, we're advocates for the dead. We dig up what was lost to the grave and hurt the living to defend the honor of the dead. And we humiliate the dead to comfort the living.

author: Himeko Inaba
title: Kokoro Connect
text: There won't be any pain if you don't do anything stupid.

author: Kazutaka Muraki
title: Yami no Matsuei
text: Humans are weak. For every cure found, another disease is uncovered. It's a game of chase.

author: Mariemaia Khushrenada
text: You could say history is like an endless waltz. Three measures of war, peace, and revolution continue in an endless cycle.

author: Pesche Guatiche
title: Bleach
text: You're proud of your white clothes?.. It sounds like a laundry detergent commercial.

author: Tsutomu Komano
title: Chihayafuru
text: You have to do the things you don't want to do, before you can do the things you truly want to do.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: The Other Side of the Other Side of the Other Side would be the Other Side.

author: Greed
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: They don't call me Greed for nothing! I want money, I want women, status and power! I want everything this world's selling and eternity's topping the list!

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: People can wish for anything. Happiness or unhappiness. No matter what kind of choice you made, it was the result you chose... As long as you're not regretting the result, it is all right.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But... if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge... and trigger a cycle of hatred.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: The world is not beautiful; and that, in a way, lends it a sort of beauty.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: How can you say that you will never change? That you will not change, no matter how great the pain you face? Can you continue believing in yourself forever? Can you guarantee it? Can you have such faith in yourself?!

author: Taichi Mashima
title: Chihayafuru
text: Men don't get touchy-feely with each other.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: When I become Fuhrer President, all female personnel in the military ... will have to wear mini-skirts.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Behind this mask is...Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?

author: Yuki Saegusa
title: Dance in the Vampire Bund
text: What is eternal? ...Eternal life. Eternal love. Eternal flow of time. Instinctively, they all seem wonderful, but in reality, they are also cruel.

author: Kojima Mizuiro
title: Bleach
text: My smile is nothing more than a pose, I can give it to anyone, anytime, anywhere...

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: A sword is a weapon. The art of swordsmanship is learning how to kill. What Miss Kaoru says is nothing but sweet and innocent talk, only those whose hands have never been stained with the blood of man can believe.

author: Hajime Saitou
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: I would think that he's already seen through your heart, and is simply playing the fool to use you. He yanks on the strings of your cheap pride and you dance like a little marionette.

author: Mina Tepeş
title: Dance in the Vampire Bund
text: In this world, filled with violence, blood and scheming, the promise we made on that day was my one and only refuge.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Different conclusions are reached when one fact is viewed from two separate points of view. When that happens, there is no immediate way to judge which point of view is the correct one. There is no way to conclude one's own conclusion is the correct one. But for that exact reason, it is also premature to decide one's own conclusion is wrong.

author: Mifune Ryouko
title: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko
text: I find it fascinating how we can see something with our eyes, hear with our ears and speak from our mouths. Although science tells us how they work, I just really can't grasp it. I don't know how everyday items like phones work. I can't even explain why a bicycle is fast. When I think like this, I wonder how many things I really understand. Yet I can live on. Because all these mysteries have joined together to keep me alive. Sometimes I admire that before I go to bed.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: You will not touch these innocent people with even one inch of your dirty blades, if you require an opponent, I will fight you. If you wanna taste the ground, feel free to attack me.

author: Hajime Saitou
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: A man that can't hold on to his beliefs can only be pathetic, dead or alive.

author: Ichii Tooru
title: A Channel
text: Run-chan was chasing a butterfly and was about to get hit by a car...

author: Abel Nightroad
title: Trinity Blood
text: Trust me, you don't want to make the whole world your enemy. At the very least, you have a friend in me.

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: A true warrior would never beg someone for his life.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim! You can whimper all day for all I care, you're nothing but a coward!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: One day I'd like to become something precious to others.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: My motto is to be stronger than yesterday, if I have to I'll be stronger than half a day ago, even a minute ago!

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: Battles aren't supposed to be heroic affairs. They are not supposed to be fun or exciting, to us every battle is filled with despair, they are dark, horrifying, grizzly. We should fear warfare, avoid it always and whenever possible choose the path of peace.

author: Starrk
title: Bleach
text: How I envy the feeble and frail... If I were inept, I could simply blend in, not stand out, and get lost in the crowd. I yearned to be just another sheep... And if that was asking too much I'd settle for... walking among the lions.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: There are only two professions in the whole world that give meaning to those who have died and what have been lost... They're writers and detectives. Writers are the only ones able to revive what was lost through their visions. Detectives are the only ones able to dig up the grave and bring back lost information. But the information us detectives dig up is nothing more than the truth as recorded in Heaven's Memo Pad.

author: Tsutomu Komano
title: Chihayafuru
text: When you find yourself wishing that a certain person was also here, that person is like family to you. Regardless of how long or how well you know them.

author: Narumi Fujishima
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: The crowd of people looks just like pixels in a picture to me. A single pixel is meaningless. But add two, three and four... They pile up rapidly until they ultimately form a picture. But I've never seen that picture.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: NEETs aren't people who can't do or won't do things. The only difference is the rules. Because we're playing with different rules, we're forced to do things differently. The participants are disoriented. They frown. Then they are discouraged by labeling and stereotyping and find comfort in isolation.

author: Gai Tsutsugami
title: Guilty Crown
text: There are only two paths you can choose. You can sit quietly and be selected out of this world, or you can adapt and change.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart... A Fullmetal Heart.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: A detective must become nothing more than an advocate. We must never put words to the feelings that failed to take form.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: The world... is a very small place, but... for those who know it, it is very, very large. And the world... when it is viewed by those who know... is far larger than just one world can hold.

author: Miharu Rokujo
title: Nabari no Ou
text: You won't be able to achieve anything if you worry about everything.

author: Shijima Kurookano
title: Nabari no Ou
text: Everyone is sacrificing something precious to them in order to save something else. Is that the reason for human action?

author: Makoto Shishio
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: In this world, the weak are the sustenance of the strong. The strong live, the weak die.

author: Mikage
title: 07 Ghost
text: Revenge never does anyone any good. Killing the person you hate will never ease the pain. Always look forward! Follow the path of light!

author: Kazuhiko Yukimi
title: Nabari no Ou
text: There are three kinds of secrets. Something that you hide at the bottom of your heart because you don't want it to be mentioned. Something that you can't say even if you want to and something that you hope someone asks about even though you're hiding it.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: This is the world you've stuck yourself into, if you aren't strong enough to lead, then you lose the privilege of getting what you want.

author: Shionji Yuuko
title: Kamisama No Memochou
text: Human emotions are ambiguous. A person can have contradicting feelings. I know how they are capable of creating lies and pain when reflected in the real world. That's why we have words. Words are brutally precise. They give form to feelings while mercilessly killing anything left unsaid.

author: Kenshin Himura
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: New eras don't come about because of swords, they're created by the people who wield them.

author: Kaoru Kamiya
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Ugly? I'll have you know they call me The Rose of Martial Arts around here!

author: Mayaka Ibara
title: Hyouka
text: Oreki, you're strange!

author: Yashiro Isana
title: K Project
text: Well, it's not a big deal or anything... but I was almost killed.

author: Sanosuke Sagara
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: Hey, I'll have you know that I almost really did kick the bucket during that training, so don't you dare sum it all up in one word, even if it is a nice one like "potential".

author: Midorima Shintarou
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: A man who cannot play by himself, cannot improve by himself.

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: Once the revenge is dealt, you are required to pay the compensation.

author: Myouri Unzen
title: Medaka Box
text: Rule breakers should be punished. If you go easy on them, they'll think explaining their circumstances will get them forgiven, and the same thing will only happen again.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: I'd rather trust and regret, than doubt and regret.

author: Myouri Unzen
title: Medaka Box
text: It's not justice if you don't go overboard.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: While you're alive, you need a reason for your existence. Being unable to find one is the same as being dead.

author: Kurapika
title: Hunter X Hunter
text: The only principle is that there is no principles.

author: Hilda
title: Outlaw Star
text: No one's going to give you a map. You've got to walk your own path.

author: Takumi Usui
title: Kaichou Wa Maid-Sama!
text: Your sudden smiles always surprise me. But are dangerous enough to make my heart race.

author: Yukio Tonegawa
title: Kaiji
text: Normally, those people would never wake up from their fantasy worlds. They live meaningless lives. They waste their precious days over nothing. No matter how old they get, they'll continue to say, "My real life hasn't started yet. The real me is still asleep, so that's why my life is such garbage." They continue to tell themselves that. And they age. Then die. And on their deathbeds, they will finally realize: the life they lived was the real thing. People don't live provisional lives, nor do they die provisional deaths. That's a simple fact! The problem... is whether they realize that simple fact.

author: Myouri Unzen
title: Medaka Box
text: Justice and charity don't mix.

author: Masafumi Takeuchi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: After all this time, after being by your side and always looking after you I failed to make a place for myself deep within your heart.

author: Kanzaki H Aria
title: Hidan no Aria
text: I am a single bullet. It has no heart. Therefore, it does not think. It just flies straight towards its target.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Death and pain are just a small price to pay for the enjoyment of battle!

author: Noriyasu Seta
title: Love Hina
text: Excavating won't always get you what you want. Maybe after digging, nothing will come out at all. That's why I love it. Because if we don't try, we would never find anything.

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: If one side is putting all their efforts into killing a normal high school student and the other side is putting all their efforts into saving that normal high school student, which side do you want to be on? Which side could you proudly say you were on?

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: A boss is someone who puts his life on the line for his subordinates.

author: Asuna Yūki
title: Sword Art Online
text: If we make it back to the real world, I'll find you. And fall in love with you all over again.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: I don't have anything anymore, but if there's something on the floor, I'll pick it up.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: You and I, our levels are as distant as the earth from the heavens. Must I spell it out for you? I have discarded my left arm, discarded my left leg, and yet even then I have not nearly lowered myself to your level.

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: The more inexperienced you are, the more you want to show off.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: For everything you wish, you have to pay an equal price in return. You can't get more or give more. You can't get less or give less. It must be in balance, or else there will be chaos.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: No matter how unimportant the meeting... how small the outcome... it will always have some later effect on you. It can be the smallest of things. It can be the shortest of moments. It may never be remembered. It may have never been recorded. But a bond of fate never disappears once tied.

author: Hermes
title: Kino
text: The world is constantly changing. And you can't expect it to stay the same, even for a second. If that's true, there's no need for you to go on a journey, Kino. Even if you stay in one place, you'll be able to keep experiencing the world.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Look at this world, so many people deserve to be killed. At the same time, a murderer must be ready to be killed as he lives. That's what retribution is. So, in this world, evil or whatever, a person strongly determined to live is the one who survives in the end.

author: Himari Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: As it turns out, living was a punishment.

author: Kanba Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: Let's share the fruit of fate.

author: Mirajane Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: When people realize just how lonely they are on their own, they will become kind.

author: Yang Wenli
title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
text: Alcohol is humanity's friend. How can I abandon a friend?

author: Haruyuki Arita
title: Accel World
text: We all live in the space between one moment and eternity. We meet and part. Everyone lives their lives to the fullest in a world where things change with the passage of time. But I'm sure some things won't ever change. There also things that change and can never be gotten back. But we already now. Even if things change, they'll begin anew. And as long as we have the will, humans will always move on forward. For we can accelerate.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Sincerity with respect to yourself! No matter what your objective... no matter who you are... if you are going to do something or not do something, that is a promise to yourself. And the one who keeps the promise, or breaks the promise, is you. No one else can be burdened with holding you to a promise that's made to yourself.

author: Elhaym Van Houten
title: Xenogears
text: It's okay not to feel "whole". Even if you feel only partly complete, if you repeat that enough, it'll eventually be "whole". A part... is better than zero.

author: Fei Fong Wong
title: Xenogears
text: But its power goes beyond what is necessary... Does one really need the power to destroy everything?

author: Citan Uzuki
title: Xenogears
text: Childish ideals pale when placed before reality.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If you are doing it, I'm doing it. If I don't do it, will you? If you don't do it, I'll do it. I'm doing it so that you'll do it too!!

author: Dark Schneider
title: Bastard
text: My obvious charms and god-like powers always dazzle the simple, ordinary folk.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Do you think it's possible to send Flame Alchemy through the phone and burn someones ears off?

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Nisemonogatari
text: Even if the truth is as one suspects, it may still be worthless.

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: The zipper is a window to society.

author: Mayoi Hachikuji
title: Nisemonogatari
text: I'm sure there's a reason that, even after I stopped being lost, I stayed here. I won't leave until I know what that reason is.

author: Suruga Kanbaru
title: Nisemonogatari
text: Any time one isn't familiar with something, it all looks the same. Knowledge and education are required to properly judge a thing.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: There's no point in having physical strength alone. The real deal needs to have mental strength and will.

author: Shinobu Oshino
title: Nisemonogatari
text: We can't let the past be mere water under the bridge. Even so, there's no reason that we can't come together.

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Nisemonogatari
text: The past is just the past. There's no inherent value in getting over it or catching up to it.

author: Mayoi Hachikuji
title: Nisemonogatari
text: In a way, the supernatural is what's behind the curtain. Normally, you only need to see what's happening on stage. That's how reality works. If you don't know, it's best that you don't. Actually, learning about the supernatural only increases the number of things you don't know.

author: Karen Araragi
title: Nisemonogatari
text: You can lose the match and the game, but if you don't lose to yourself, it isn't a loss.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: People who kill too much, turn into dragons one day. Beasts that rule the land atop piles of money and fly the skies with authority. They become more and more violent, until they can no longer understand the language of men. We cannot allow dragons to remain in this world, even though we are the ones from which they are spawned. To slay a dragon is the greatest of honors.

author: Tsubasa Hanekawa
title: Nisemonogatari
text: I don't know everything. I just know what I know.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: A fake with more power than the real thing is more dangerous than the real thing.

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Nisemonogatari
text: Just as there isn't a problem that can't be solved by being right, there isn't a problem that can't be solved by money.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: The first requirement of being a hero isn't being right. It's being strong. That's why the hero always wins.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: Weapons are used by soldiers on the battlefield. If you have never used them yourself, you have no idea what you're selling.

author: Mayoi Hachikuji
title: Nisemonogatari
text: Sharing your secret with someone means you involve them in your problems. It may make things easier for you, but your family could end up suffering for it too.

author: Kino
title: Kino No Tabi
text: The world is not beautiful. Therefore it is.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: Whether doing good or evil, I will be the boss.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: You can't direct armies from your bedsheets.

author: Tsukihi Araragi
title: Nisemonogatari
text: In their own way, fights are also a valid form of communication.

author: Yozuru Kagenui
title: Nisemonogatari
text: Whatever you value... What you consider right is up to you. But don't force those ideals onto other people.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Those who get fooled are partially at fault.

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Nisemonogatari
text: The fake is of far greater value. In its deliberate attempt to be real, it's more real than the real thing.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: If you pick a fight with a god of death, I can't guarantee your soul's safety.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: I'm an arms dealer anyway. There's no point in fearing what I sell.

author: Duo Maxwell
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing
text: Stop making me repeat myself! Its bad for my health!

author: Sayaka Miki
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text:
It really shouldn't be all that uncommon - having a wish you'd go so far as to trade your life for. I think there are a lot of people in the world with wishes and desires like that. If we can't think of anything, it just means that we really haven't had anything that bad happen to us. We've had too much given to us and have become dull and stupid. It makes me wonder: Why us?

Don't you think it's unfair? I'm sure there are other people who'd really want a chance like this.

author: Deishū Kaiki
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Oh, right, Senjougahara. I've got a great story to tell you. It's about that man who tried to rape you way back. He was hit by a car and died in a place with no connection to you, in an event with no connection to you. Without any drama at all. [...] That's the lesson for you here: You shouldn't expect your life to be like the theater.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I thought that everyone in Japan had to be packed in there. So I turned to my dad and asked him,"Do you know how many people are here right now"? He said probably fifty thousand, since the stadium was full. I was only one little person in that big crowded stadium filled with people, and there were so many people there, but it was just a handful out of the entire population. Up till then, I always thought that I was, I don't know, kind of a special person. It was fun to be with my family. I had fun with my classmates. And the school that I was going to, it had just about the most interesting people anywhere. But that night, I realized it wasn't true. All the stuff we did during class that I thought was so fun and cool, was probably happening just like that in classes in other schools all over Japan. There was nothing special about my school at all.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Idiots in their idiotic way have their own idiotic worries.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: It is man's heart which sets the world aflame.

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: By experiencing both, victory and defeat, running away and shedding tears, a man will become a man.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: It's amazing how much you kiss your own ass.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: It's impossible for someone to replace someone else.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.

author: Akira Takizawa
title: Eden of the East
text: I think society where people prefer earning to spending is a healthier one.

author: Furude Rika
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: You can never win if you're afraid to lose so much that you refuse to put up a fight.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.

author: Chikane Himemiya
title: Kannazuki no Miko
text: Your darkness and hopelessness are like vapor. They're nothing more than shadows that shall melt away and disappear under the moon's light

author: Excel
title: Excel Saga
text: Come on, scribbles on the bathroom wall, please show me the path that I must follow!

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Something as useless as emotions, I never had them to begin with.

author: Renton Thurston
title: Eureka Seven
text: Don't beg for things, get them yourself or else you won't get anything.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Whatever happens, happens.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: My name is VASH THE STAMPEDE!! Forgive the lack of warning, but it's time for my daily massacre! If you do not believe I am the real thing, take a good look at me and start freaking out!!

author: Xelloss Metallium
title: Slayers
text: If you can fool your friends, you can fool your enemies.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: No matter what we learn, no matter what we obtain, nothing ever changes! People are amazing that way! They become envious, hate each other, and destroy each other! If that's what they truly desire, why don't they simply exterminate each other!?

author: Lucy
title: Elfen Lied
text: Aren't we all monsters inside?

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Rely on your Instinct, rather than Logic.

author: Takamura Mamoru
title: Hajime no Ippo
text: Fact is genius's can take all the hard work of the common folk and turn the whole entire thing around, so that it's like it was all for nothing. As one of those with talent, let me apologize. I know it's unfair but... TOUGH SHIT, SUCKER'S!!

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Every human being thinks different things are right, and different things are wrong. Whether something is normal or not, it is still different for every person. Happiness is the same – everyone has their own definition of it.

author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu
title: Fate/zero
text: The world might seem boring. But, if you just look, you'll find all kinds of crazy stuff. The world is the best form of entertainment. Something like this couldn't just have happened by chance. There must be a writer writing the stories of more than five-billion people. And the only thing we could possibly call this person is God.

author: Lordgenome
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Laggan
text: The probability of success was zero percent. But I've learned that probabilities are meaningless when it comes to you guys.

author: Chihiro Ogino
title: Spirited Away
text: Listen, Haku. I don't remember it, but my mom told me... Once, when I was little, I fell into a river. She said they'd drained it and built things on top. But I've just remembered. The river was called the Kohaku River. Your real name is... Kohaku.

author: Kise Ryouta
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Once you look up to someone, you can't overtake them.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Living things are restrained by Chains: The laws of nature, the flow of time, the vessel known as your “body”, and the existence called your mind. There's only one chain that people can wield: WORDS.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: There's no such thing as a coincidence in this world. What does exist is only the inevitable.

author: Da Cider
title: NG Knight Ramune & 40
text: Hey! Don't you know the rules!? When heroes transform, ride in their machine, or stand in their main pose, no one should attack them!

author: Akihiko Chuuzenji
title: Mouryou No Hako
text: Attaining happiness is quite simple. All you have to do is cast away your humanity.

author: Imadori Kyousuke
title: School Rumble
text: I CAN DO THAT TOO!" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*

author: Pain
title: Naruto
