text: You think you're the only ones who matter. You think you can put off death. But that peace made you foolish and thoughtless. If you kill someone, someone else will kill you... this hatred binds us together.

author: Ryōhei Sasagawa
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *To Lambo*  Smile... I said smile! Smile! Damn you!

author: Ayumu Kasuga
title: Azumanga Daioh
text: You have a swimsuit tan. You could jump in the pool naked and no one would know you weren't wearing anything.

author: Riza Hawkeye
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Master Sergeant Fuery, during your last physical it was discovered you have Athletes Foot, and we now believe it is affecting your brain.

author: Soldier Blue
title: Terra E
text: Jomy is still young, he doesn't know that there will be problems that he can't overcome with just will.

author: Pain
title: Naruto
text: Do you understand pain a little now? If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them. But just because you understand them doesn't mean you can come to an agreement. That's the truth

author: Soldier Blue
title: Terra E
text: You'll never know what's right or wrong until everything is over.

author: Cho Hakkai
title: Saiyuki
text: It's awfully quiet back there. Are you two making out?

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: The ticket to the future, is always blank.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: A fallen angel banished from heaven, arises into the light to be recieved by the benevolence of God...

author: Daisuke Aramaki
title: Ghost in the Shell
text: There has never been a report about a stomach ache or any other related medical trauma from swallowing your pride.

author: Sion
title: No.6
text: And your eyes were a strange colour that I'd never seen before. And they drew me in.

author: Vicious
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: Angels banished from heaven have no choice but to become devils.

author: Aisa Himegami
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Lend me 100 yen since I'm beautiful.

author: Happy
title: Fairy Tail
text: Don't think, Natsu! It's not like you!

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: Knights cannot save the world.

author: Shouta Kazehaya
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: If you can tell me what you want to say, tell me then. I want to hear it... Because no matter what you say, my feelings won't change.

author: Alexander Nikolaevich Hell
title: Seikon no Qwaser
text: You've set fire to my frozen heart, I shall engrave this anger and sadness that's running through my blood onto you.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: They call certain methods of fighting good and others evil, acting as if there were some nobility to the battlefield. Such illusions, perpetrated by heroes throughout history, have led countless young men to their bloody deaths, all for the sake of this valor and glory.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: Righteousness cannot save the world.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: Life is all about challenges, There's no point in living if there's no one strong to play with, It's better if I can't win.

author: Konata Izumi
title: Lucky Star
text: How come you wear glasses? I mean, you're really pretty but you can only appeal to a tiny section of the fanbase. *To Miyuki*

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Why don't you understand? Nunnally was blinded! My own sister was crippled! She knew... she knew that there were things in this world that she will never be able to do by herself! So her smile... Nunnally's smile... was her way of expressing gratitude!

author: Accelerator
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: I strive for something beyond the strongest, that challenging me would be the most ridiculous thought ever, that fighting me would be a sin! *To Imouto 10032*

author: Mikoto Misaka
title: Toaru Majutsu no Index
text: Really, what's with that? Such a power doesn't even appear in Academy City's databank. If I am a 1-in-328,571 prodigy, then aren't you, the only one in Academy City, a 1-in-2,300,000 disaster?

author: Shouta Kazehaya
title: Kimi ni Todoke
text: When you talk properly, you get your feelings across properly, right?

author: Eri Ninamori
title: FLCL
text: You're Puss in Boots, the one who tricks the prince. He hides who he really is and pretends to be someone else forever. So in time he becomes that person, so his lie becomes the truth, see? He transcends the mask. Don't you get it? That's how he finds happiness. That's pretty good, right?

author: Shinoda Chiaki
title: Darker than Black
text: Are you looking at the stars?.. In the middle of the city? Even though the only stars you can see from here are fake?

author: Lacie Baskerville
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Jack* If you accept everything you're told without question, you'll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.

author: Shū Ouma
title: Guilty Crown
text: I wonder if it's the selfish people who get ahead in this world, after all.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: Levels are just numbers. In this world, strength is just an illusion. There are more important things.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: Maybe I got something wrong, but it doesn't matter because the thought of wanting to help others definitely isn't wrong.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: It's simply fun to be part of a group sharing the same interests, regardless of what those interests are.

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Reim* It means that you have no affinity for chains with fighting skills. You try to avoid violence even when you fight. That's a very good thing.

author: Fujitaka Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: The world you can see isn't all out there. In the world there are a lot of fascinating things that no living soul has ever seen! And just in knowing that is one cause for happiness. I'm sure you can find happiness meant for you! It might be something you might not quite understand yet. But you'll find it, that much is certain!

author: Jack Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: To me... This world is like a dark night that swallows everything.

author: Naota Nandaba
title: FLCL
text: Nothing amazing happens here. Everything is ordinary. The huge factory that can be seen from our town, the Medical Mechanica Plant, all the adults got excited when it came here, like it was really a big thing. The white steam that blows out every day at the same time, it looked to me like smoke that signified some kind of omen. Smoke that spreads out and covers everything.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If you are still determined to take your own life, please do so outside... *To Grell*

author: Leo Baskerville
title: Pandora Hearts
text: You're wrong... You're wrong about that as well, Oz! We're just two people who met through someone called 'Elliot'. You're quite mistaken thinking we were friends through him. Because I don't know a thing about you!

author: Elliot Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: How could I burden that brat with the weight of my life? *about Oz*

author: Crona
title: Soul Eater
text: I've never talked to a girl before. I don't know how to handle it.

author: Will Of The Abyss
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Those who come to the Abyss are all the same. They're all desperate to get something back. But everyone goes mad partway. It seems being with the dear dollies - the Chains - is no good for them... Fu fu.. but you were different. You didn't lose yourself, not even at the end.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it! ... Oh, and he's attacking Aang.

author: Jacuzzi Splot
title: Baccano!
text: The times when you want to cry are when you have to try your hardest. That's why I decided I'll cry in general. Then, when I have to shed tears for a time when I really want to cry, my tears would have run dry.

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: I just know you are all my newest enemies... and you have really nice guns. You people are all the same. You think you're so special! "Oh yeah, with all of our wonderful guns on this pathetic train, there's no way anyone can stop us! We are invincible and unbeatable! We are so strong with all of our men and our guns!" *laughs*

author: Graham Specter
title: Baccano!
text: Tedium is such a crime. It takes the limited amount of time that is given to man, and rather than spending it in indolence or drowning it in pleasure it just sits there sucking, eating it up. I can't put up with that, tedium is a crime! Death to tedium! Die!

author: England
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: No surprise...the meeting ended once again without any resolution. Blast all. I really do wish there was someone around here who I didn't always fight with. ... Flying Mint Bunny! Did you come to try to cheer me up, huh? ...This is great! All my magical friends at the same time! But let's have no murders go around, okay? I'm serious guys! Hey, no fair chewing on my sleeve, Uni! I'm too ticklish, so stop the snuggling! You're naughty, Captain Hook, Tinkerbell's not big enough. Take that big, goofy, kissy face back to your little leprechaun friends, since they're the only ones who care! Kidding! Seriously, you're all nutburgers! What am I to do with you?

author: Celty Sturluson
title: Durarara!!
text: The world isn't as bad as you think.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I will be the Man who surpass God.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Well, if I had to give a reason for my actions, I guess it's because I love people. I guess I wanted to see the faces that mankind has to offer.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: People who call others stupid are usually more stupid. But I'm stupid, so I'll say it anyways...YOU'RE STUPID!

author: Austria
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: I shall now express my utter disgust and anger with you through the piano.

author: Poland
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Stop being such a bitch, Sweden!

author: Poland
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Risking my life for European politics would make me grassy!

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: Don't care anything and do not do anything that's a waste of energy.

author: Shima Kinzou
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: I can only tell the fortune of girls.

author: Su
title: Shugo Chara
text: Keep reinventing and polishing yourself, and who you want to be can be reborn over and over.

author: Nagihiko Fujisaki
title: Shugo Chara
text: How worthless. Why are you saying things are impossible? You just decided that to make yourself feel better! Sure, there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!

author: Oreki Houtarou
title: Hyouka
text: If I don't have to do it, I won't. If I have to do it, I'll make it quick.

author: Su
title: Shugo Chara
text: The prince's ice cream - it's an indirect kiss!

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: One shot is for all you did to everyone here... And all the rest are because you messed up my clothing.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You - Idiot! Go ahead and cry! When I'm with you, you don't have to hold back. *Usagi runs into his arms, sobbing*

author: Su
title: Shugo Chara
text: You are from a world Su will never understand.

author: Misa Amane
title: Death Note
text: Careful what you do, cuz "God" is watching your every move. Hold my hand in the dark street, for if you do I know that I'll.. be safe. Even if I'm far away and alone, I can be sure that you'll find me there, this I know. You told me close for a while, so quite. You tell me everything. If I forget what to say then you'll come to me and tell me again, yes you'd tell me once again. But what happens when I know it all and what should I do, after that, what then?

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Hey Kaiba, maybe we should duel sometimes.

author: Eru Chitanda
title: Hyouka
text: We don't know if trying our best will help, but we do know, that if we don't try our best, it won't help for sure!

author: Android 16
title: Dragon Ball
text: Gohan, let it go. It is not a sin to fight for the right cause. There are those who words alone will not reach.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Well, nothing in life is ever certain.

author: Lee Yunlee
title: Nineteen Twenty-one
text: Look at the sky, it's so far away. But right here, right now, it seems so close.

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to a dying Elliot* I really liked you. It was only thanks to you that Gil managed to live in that house without forgetting how to smile.

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Gilbert, I know everything about you... because we are connected by an extremely deep bond. No matter how far apart we are, we will surely return to the same place. Because that is our fate!

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Duke Nightray* You've let your own son die for the honor of your household and other such rubbish. You've lost almost all of your family, and yet all you can think of is your own interests.

author: Elliot Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I am Elliot Nightray and I will not let you take that away from me!!

author: Xerxes Break
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Reim* Like I said before!! To me, being blind is nothing! It's only because I had just woken up, that's why Oz found out. Give me 3 more days. By then, I'll have assimilated. Then I'll be recovered and everything will be like normal. Even if I were thrown in a midst of Pandora members, I have faith that I will be able to kill them all!

author: Elliot Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Humpty Dumpty. I reject you.

author: Vanessa Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Eliot* Fred, Claude, Ernest... The Head Hunter killed all of them! Because of that, our mother lost her mind... And... Fell prey to the lies of that foreigner. And our father still pretends to not notice what's going on!..

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: It doesn't matter where I look, it's always idiots as far as the eye can see.

author: Sha Gojyo
title: Saiyuki
text: This is the first and last time I bring a dude to my bed.

author: Saiyuki
title: Saiyuki
text: Eat until you can't anymore, play until you drop, sleep the day away, it's okay to laugh, cry or yell, just live, live, live!

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Apparently Goku hasn't eaten in 500 years, his body's making up for lost time.

author: Charles Beams
title: Eureka Seven
text: Freedom is something you have to fight for, rather than something you're given. Being free means being prepared to carry that burden.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Ninjas are revolting, they stole my idea. I'll have to kill them now.

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: When I left Syrup Village, I left everything behind! Tranquility… Safety… They face hardships every day, and they laugh like they're really having fun! That's why I decided to go out to sea! I want to laugh 'til I cry, too! But if I don't fight with everything I've got, there's no way I deserve to be on the same boat as them! There's no way I can laugh with them!

author: Lina Inverse
title: Slayers
text: Don't tell me he wants to conquer the world? Can't he come up with something more original?

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: High school girls, high school girls, all for me, high school girls!

author: Yuki Nagato
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Problems that cannot be solved do not exist in this world.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: They say that we should love ourselves first, before other people learn to love us, but it's not as easy as it seems. Sometimes, we need someone to accept us and love us first, then we would learn to see ourselves through that person's eyes and learn to love our-self.

author: Kyoya Ootori
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: *To Tamaki* It's easy to feel sorry for him, but the hardships that he endured as a child, molded him into the person he is today. He'll be fine, the Host Club is his refuge, which means when all is said and done... he still has us.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I'm not short! I'm fun-sized!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *To Captain Kuro* So, you don't like to get hit, huh? Well, you're about to have a very bad day.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: I'm watching a dream I'll never wake up from.

author: Lina Inverse
title: Slayers
text: I know that we can be foolish and make mistakes and we get hurt so easily. But with each mistake, we improve ourselves and with each wound, we don't want to be hurt again. We keep moving on. We cherish the past, the present, and the future.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *To Tayuya* How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint. It's the most basic thing, to land a hit with the second move.

author: Lina Inverse
title: Slayers
text: The world you want can't be built after destruction. We build it everyday -step by step!

author: Konata Izumi
title: Lucky Star
text: I wanted to see your homework from the other day. And I got to see your face while you were sleeping... so don't sweat it.

author: Kagami Hiiragi
title: Lucky Star
text: *To Herself* Hah. You know you're happy about it. Is she worried about me... because of the new virus going around? I figured she only ever had games and anime on her mind. I'm a little touched.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *To Temari* It really doesn't matter to me if I ever become a chūnin or not, but I guess I shouldn't let myself be beaten by a female, so let's do it.

author: Yuuko Ichihara
title: xxxHOLiC
text: Our relationship has already been formed. No matter how trivial a meeting and the incidents that follow may seem, a relationship is made. Even if it is just for a short amount of time, a knot that has been tied does not unravel. It means that during your lifetime, every incident that passes has meaning. The meeting between you and I also has meaning, so remember it.

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Oh look at that. My tea has gone cold.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Someday you'll let go of my hand. When you finally look to the far, far sky, I'll kick you from behind and laugh at you to hurry.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: I'm so hungry, I can't even move.

author: Lina Inverse
title: Slayers
text: You guys are free to have a fight anywhere you want to, but interfering with an innocent girl's meal is unforgivable. And, if it happens to be Lina Inverse's meal, you're lucky to be alive!

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Prince Zuko, pride is not the opposite of shame, but rather it's source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Pride is not something you can surrender.

author: Vongola Primo Giotto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you're still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials, and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn't change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family, and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi, I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *To himself, while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: *To Gajeel Redfox* You guys are complete idiots! I feel so sorry for you, I think I\'m tearing up. Phantom Lord? The spirit ruler? What a joke; I\'m not afraid of you at all!

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: We don't die for our friends, we live for them.

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I would solve a friend's problem... then also find a way to keep them from ending up with a new one.

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It is sky that allows the cloud to move about freely. But someday, I will even bite up the sky itself.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I'm the only one who can bear the full brunt of your hate! It's my job, no one else's! I'll bear the burden of your hatred... and we'll die together!

author: Chiaki Shinichi
title: Nodame Cantabile
text: The root of all evil is the kotatsu.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Even your gravest mistakes shouldn't stop you from moving forward.

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: If I wouldn't have tripped, you wouldn't have stopped, now would you?

author: Masafumi Takeuchi
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: Whatever you do or don't do, you're the one who always makes the decision.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: There's something wrong with people who seek reality in fiction.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: I am known as Valentinez Alkalinella Xifax Sicidabohertz Gombigobilla Blue Stradivari Talentrent Pierre Andri Charton-Haymoss Ivanovici Baldeus George Doitzel Kaiser III. Don't hesitate to call.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes, but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it, but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: I could say I'm not sad, but I'd be lying. The problem is the world won't let me stay a kid forever, so I can't lie around crying about it either.

author: Rin Okumura
title: Ao no Exorcist
text: I'm not smart enough to figure out answers no matter how much time I spend thinking. All I can do now is to empty my head and dash forward.

author: Taiga Kagami
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: You'll always stand by the light. That is your basketball.

author: Hyuuga Junpei
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: I'm going to teach you how to talk to your seniors, baldy.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: *after touching Misa's butt and getting away with it* This is an outrage... taking advantage of this situation! I assure you, I will get to the bottom of this!

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: And what's the real lesson? Don't leave things in the fridge.

author: Souryuu Asuka Langley
title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
text: You're thinking in Japanese! If you must think, do it in German!

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: So, who should we hold responsible? Compensation. Punishment. If you didn't want any problems you shouldn't have taken risks.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: The chickens have earned their right to live, while the humans will go hungry.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I bet that when they run out of delicacy points, girls turn into old ladies.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: It's quite educational, seeing the thought process of someone in charge.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: They have no faces, no mouths... Their slimy bodies are completely hairless! They are... the skinned chickens!... Or you could just say they're chickens.

author: UNESCO Director
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: I've done it! After years of climbing the ladder, I've finally made it! Now that I have control of all good, no one can stop me! I now rule the human race! First, I will restore all the long-abandoned customs! Control the people! Control the goods! Control the economy! Once that's done, I can easily take over the nation! I'm in position to wield all of the power! Time to implement a dictatorial democracy! I can be a tyrant!

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Hide the truth. Manipulate information. Use intimidation.

author: UNESCO Director
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: A politician in the past once said: "My secretaries did it all."

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: And so... I have written down the lesson I've learned from this vital experience in form of a title suitable for a business reference book: "Never hold meetings. The outcome is determined before the meeting begins."

author: Loaf
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: If you pity my existence, please eat me.

author: Watashi
title: Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita
text: Necessary murder. Man must kill to live. That hasn't changed, even with humanity's decline. The situation has reached the point in which escape and refusal are no longer options, so I must act.

author: Kazuto Kirigaya
title: Sword Art Online
text: You can go anywhere you want in this world with a single blade. This may be a virtual world, but I feel more alive here than in the real world.

author: Aoi Toori
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: If someone you care for is ever in the eyes of danger, don't hesitate to save him/her.

author: Aoi Toori
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: Shinto, Buddhism, Catholic, Protestant, Murasai, Anglican Church, Russian Orthodox Church, Dunhi, Oat, Techno-magic, swordplay, martial arts, gunsligning, mechanical beasts, phoenixes, dragons, aerial warships, civilians, knights, musketeers, samurai, ninja, warriors, kings, nobles, sovereigns, dynasts, emperors, popes, Far East, K.P.A. Italia,  Hexagone Franchise, England, Svet Russia, P.A. ODA, Qing, Union of India, money, rights, negotiations, politics, public opinion, armed forces, information, Divine Weapons, Armaments of Deadly Sins, Testament Arma, Summit Five, Eight Great Dragon Kings, Chancellor's Board, Student Council, men, women, those who are neither, the young, the old, the dead, and the living, the emotions, the logic, the resolve, for those here who have the power to be able to duel those on the Musashi, all of us, and all of you, and others, many others, many more, so very many more things that I still don't know about, among all of us! Let's find out who's the strongest out there!

author: Fuyumi Irisu
title: Hyouka
text: No amount of passion can overcome a lack of technical expertise.

author: Fuyumi Irisu
title: Hyouka
text: Every individual must be aware of themselves. If not, those who watch them think fools of themselves.

author: Tsutomu Iwamura
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: The strong don't win. The winners are the strong ones.

author: Horizon Ariadust
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: It's where all parallel lines meet. Where conflicting ideas are reconciled. It is... above the horizon.

author: Aoi Toori
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: Once you get everything back, you'll be down to having nothing but loads of fun left.

author: Mackenzie Glen
title: Fate/zero
text: When you look back after a long life, you'll realize there's nothing that's really worth risking your life for.

author: Inspector Sayama
title: Zetman
text: It's when things are tough that you have to keep your head up high. You won't find hope lying on the ground.

author: Tokie
title: Sakamichi no Apollon
text: You can't just wait. You need to make things happen yourself.

author: Aoi Toori
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: I may be inept, but at least I don't forget to aim high!

author: Kaminski Natalia
title: Fate/zero
text: If you act only on what you should do without heed for what you want to do, you're nothing more than a machine, a phenomenon.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Our mom put us in one of those *points to dresses* when we were little. We still get called 'her darling little girls' at our family reunions.

author: Takashi Morinozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: *To Haruhi, when at her home*  You like strawberries, right? Here, you can have mine.

author: Futayo Honda
title: Kyoukai Senjou No Horizon
text: Loyalty is only given meaning through one's actions.

author: Waver Velvet
title: Fate/zero
text: I'm scared. Or should I borrow your words and say this is exciting?

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: The wish of wanting everyone to be happy is merely a fairy tale!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: A path not chosen is the same as a path that never existed.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Ephemeral and brilliant one, fall to my embrace. That is my decision.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: People like you walk your paths, believing that something you desire is waiting for you. I walk it to confirm that there is nothing there.

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: *To Kaoru* Even if I searched the world over, no one could compare to you.

author: Takashi Morinozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: It was my fault. It was my carelessness that led to Mitsukuni's cavity. I forgot to tell him to brush his teeth before napping... twice.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: *To Pantherlily* We'll stop it, even if my body crumbles to bits, I'll stop it with my soul!

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I think it's fun to get to know a person little by little, through looking at their personality.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Then let me ask you, do gods of death love apples?

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Besides, it doesn't really matter, does it? Why should I care about appearances and labels anyway. It's what's on the inside that counts.

author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: *To the twins* We've had enough of this! You're both to blame for this fight! Hika-chan and Kao-chan, I want you to make up and go halfsies on this cake, okay? But, I want to have a piece too, so I guess we're gonna have to go thirdsies. We're not going to be able to split the strawberry on top though. What should we do? Maybe I should just take it. After all, strawberries are my favorite. Oh, I forgot to ask, Hika-chan, Kao-chan, do you like strawberries?

author: Koizumi George
title: Paradise Kiss
text: I'll make you so in love with me, that every time our lips touch you'll die a little.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: The result is the most important thing.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: There probably isn't any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: My face feels heavy, and I can't walk in these shoes.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: If I can, I'd prefer nobody to be sad.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: *To Kuchiki Rukia* Are you any different!? You sacrificed yourself to save me that time!! At that time were you thinking about complicated stuff like "this is my Shinigami duty"!? That's not what sacrificing yourself is! At the very least... I'm different! I haven't accepted any commitment. If things get bad I might run away... since I'm not a good enough person to be able to sacrifice my life for total strangers. But unfortunately I'm also not trash that can live happily without paying back his debts!

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: An ideal is only an ideal after all. As long as you embrace that ideal, the friction with reality will continue to increase. So you will someday face reality and will have to pay the price for your compromises.

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I hate all these damn rich people.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/stay night
text: I was reckless when I was young. I educated myself by cursing the heartlessness of the world. The world was cruel - so I made myself more heartless and used that as a weapon, trying to follow through on my ideals.

author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: I'm sorry! I'm sorry, Takashi! I won't forget to brush my teeth again! I won't forget!...

author: Haruhi Fujioka
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Mom... Mom in heaven.... Does love come suddenly like this

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Know that the only people you can save like that are the ones that survive.

author: Fuji Shuusuke
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Even if we are far apart. We'll always be united by tennis.

author: Fuji Shuusuke
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: It's still too early for you to win against me.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Hinata... this is the unalterable difference in strength... the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn't run, your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair... Withdraw!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I'm gonna kick your ***.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: [To Sarutobi] What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, you're nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the "Leaf Village"! In time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing...

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: [To Hinata At Chuunin Exams] So you're not going to withdraw? Then don't blame me for what happens to you.

author: Sophie Hatter
title: Howl's Moving Castle
text: They say that the best blaze burns brightest, when circumstances are at their worst.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: Oh sorry, my hand slipped.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: I think running a restaurant would fit you better than being an assassin.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: {TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: You're a hero to other poor people, Fujioka. You've shown the world that even a poor person can excel at an elite private academy. It must be hard for you to constantly be looked down upon by others... Spurned, neglected, but that doesn't matter now. Long live the poor! We welcome you, poor man, to our world... of beauty!

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing... that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands. But don't you see? It's an empty existence, to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!

author: Kagami Hiiragi
title: Lucky Star
text: Could you stop skipping the thinking process when you respond?

author: Suoh Tamaki
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: *To Haruhi Fujioka about him helping her search for her wallet in water* A little water never hurt anyone. Besides, people are always telling me that I'm dripping with good looks.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.

author: Yuri Nakamura
title: Angel Beats!
text: I put a propulsion engine under your seat just in case you messed up.

author: Konata Izumi
title: Lucky Star
text: And the TV show ended by saying how young people are becoming increasingly illiterate, but doesn't browsing the Internet and blogging actually improve your literacy?

author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Don't make it sound so easy! Don't you realize how hard I had to study? I worked hard... I worked so hard!

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: Bye-Bye now.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Their mistakes were simple ones. Gouki's mistake was being overconfident and Kurama's... sympathy for his human prey.

author: Konata Izumi
title: Lucky Star
text: Sounds like a lot of work, I think I'll pass. I'd rather play and I'll ask for help when I get stuck.

author: Spike Spiegel
title: Cowboy Bebop
text: I love the type of woman who can kick my ***.

author: Revy
title: Black Lagoon
text: All they saw in me was another little ghetto rat with no power and no God. What's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money of course. And guns. Fuckin' A, with these two things, the world is a great place.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Finally I saw... A world so bright I almost wanted to cry... It was then, that my consciousness was engulfed in darkness.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: In my mind this jacked-up sideways ridiculousness is the normal state?

author: Ladd Russo
title: Baccano!
text: Depending on your request, whether I will laugh or get angry - that will decide your lifespan, boy.

author: Graham Specter
title: Baccano!
text: Incomprehensibility is a part of human life. But what does this mean? I just can't understand it.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Legend Of Korra
text: When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.

author: Amon
title: Avatar: The Legend Of Korra
text: I'm impressed. No one has ever gotten the better of me like that. It is almost a shame to take the bending of someone so talented. ALMOST.

author: Mako
title: Avatar: The Legend Of Korra
text: We didn't even know each other then. And now, I can't imagine my life without you in it. You're the most loyal, brave and selfless person I've ever known.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: All people have sanctuary which mustn't be touched. A scar of sadness which mustn't be entered. The living confront each other to achieve their ideals. In a quiet voice, the man in the white coat told me... that he had finally found me, that he wanted my life. That man smiled a smile deeper than darkness. Legato Bluesummers, a man fascinated by Death...

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Between being eternally unable to wake from a dream, and being eternally unable to dream, which do you think would be more unfortunate? Still, both the dream that we deemed eternal, and this very reality, are destined to end someday.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: I think it's good if someone smiles when you smile at them. The beauty of voluntary acts can foster goodwill in the hearts of others. Love which doesn't ask for collateral gives us respect as people. However it's wrong to sustain that. In time, the strain will bloom into the flower called Lie...the thorny flower which hurts people.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Can a world this interesting actually be reality?

author: Claire Stanfield
title: Baccano!
text: So what if I'd spare him? In my mind it's the certainty in myself that I possess which allows me to have that kind of mercy or compassion. There's no wavering on that point. It's fixed like the stars. The fact is I'm never gonna be killed! So remember this: mercy and compassion are virtues that only the strong are privileged to possess. And I am strong.

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: The power of one man doesn't amount to much. But, however little strength I'm capable of, I'll do everything humanly possible to protect the people I love, and in turn they will protect the ones they love. It seems like the least we tiny humans can do for each other.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: There's no need to change the past. Because of the past we are who we are now. Every second, every action from then is linked to us here and now.

author: Irisviel von Einzbern
title: Fate/zero
text: I have no parents, and I'm not a product of love. Therefore, I can't understand what a 'good wife' is. Even so... the love he gave me is my entire world. No one can humiliate that.

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Why is it that when humans regret the decision based on a misunderstanding they feel resentment toward the other party?

author: Little Demon
title: Soul Eater
text: You are calm and composed. You are able to see through things clearly at this age. You are outstanding. And... Always being able to make the correct judgments, not falling into darkness. Outstanding. "That won't do", "This is wrong". You reject any number of paths... Choosing your path with cynicism. What do you want to do? How are you going to do it? What is your motive? Where do you want to move forward to? Say it. Hmm? Fine. Then stick to the ground forever to move forward, you creep. You little coward who can only move forward by using the method of elimination. Until you found something to reject... You shall just lie on the ground helplessly.

author: Claire Stanfield
title: Baccano!
text: I won't die no matter what. That's what I believe, so stay silent and believe in me. I am a guy who will never die.

author: Graham Specter
title: Baccano!
text: Oh, life is fun! Try sayin' that ten times fast ten thousand times a minute every day for the rest of your life and it'll screw with your head so bad that all problems will disappear like MAGIC! Okay okay okay, I've gotten past the sadness and as of now I'm evolving to a HIGHER STAAAATE! Right? Tell me you all think so! Life is a magnificent beast, and it excites me!

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: I can see the ending!

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text: Our lives were real! Not a single moment of them were fake! Everyone lived the best they could! We carved those memories into ourselves! Memories of living as hard as we could! No matter what kind they were, they're the life we led! Erasing them in the blink of an eye like that... Wasn't your life also real to you?!

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: There is always a chance of success, and if there isn't any, I'll just have to make one.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: I don't think it's possible to save everyone. I just want to save as many as I can.

author: Yuri Nakamura
title: Angel Beats!
text: I only have one chance to have my life, and it's right here. It's the only life I have. This is my life. I can't give it to anyone else, It can't be stolen, I can't force it on anyone, or forget it, or make it disappear, or trample on it, or laugh it away, or beautify it. I have no choice but to accept this one cruel, meaningless life! That's why I will fight, and why I will continue fighting.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Celebrating Mr. Jesus's birthday (Christmas) was fun, why don't we celebrate Buddha's and Muhammad's birthday next time?

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: That's why people hesitate. In front of all the choices, one could lose hope and try to run away, because no excuse could be used. No matter how dangerous the long journey in life was, or how one admits to being dealt the short end of the stick, everything was the result of one's own choices, it was a road chosen by oneself. Even if this path is hard, and there's no chance of changing past choices, one cannot place the blame on other people. No matter how angry or frustrated one was, one would be alone on that path, for no one to replace you.

author: Claire Stanfield
title: Baccano!
text: This world is mine. I think this world may even just be a long, long dream I'm watching. You guys may just be illusions, and it can't be proven whether or not you really exist either. In other words, this world was created with me at the center. So what will happen if I die? I don't know. My imagination isn't very creative; I just can't imagine myself dying. In other words, there is no way this world can completely disappear. But if I die, then everyone will disappear. I am the only one in this world who won't disappear. The rest are just people I see as if in a dream.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: I dreamed that you were a dog. And the dog was my husband. Anyway, it was the worst dream ever.

author: Fujibayashi Kyou
title: CLANNAD
text: If the results come true, it's as if there's only one future. If it fails, we can think that other futures exist... I want to believe that in our future there are many possibilities waiting.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: You get free hatred for everything you sell. I've amassed a real supply of it, so I'd like to sell it too... But no one wants to buy it from me!

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Don't be upset because of what you can't do. Do what you do best, live as carefree and optimistically as you can, because some people aren't able to do that.

author: Taiga Aisaka
title: Toradora!
text: Well, I'd better get back to my seat. The unmarried woman with her unmarried face is about to come to start the unmarried homeroom.

author: Yuzuru Otonashi
title: Angel Beats!
text: Even if we forget the faces of our friends, We will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.

author: Saber
title: Fate/zero
text: I only joined this war to avoid spilling rivers of blood. Fight for the Holy Grail, no meaningless bloodshed, minimize sacrifices, one person taking up the mission of fate instead of armies of men and competing here! This is what we Servants should do.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/stay night
text: You should know. Your wish will not come true unless there is a clear evil. Even if it's not something you approve of, a hero of justice requires a villain to defeat.

author: Keima Katsuragi
title: Kami Nomi zo Shiru Sekai
text: Reality is just a crappy game!

author: Saber
title: Fate/stay night
text: Anything edible is acceptable. Extravagance is our enemy.

author: Haruyuki Arita
title: Accel World
text: Strength isn't just about winning. Even if my attempts are pathetic and comical, and even if I'm covered in the mud of my defeat, if I can keep fighting and look up at the sky as I lie on the ground, that alone is proof of true strength!

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: The world as it is, the human nature as always, it is impossible to eliminate battles. In the end, killing is necessarily evil. If so, it is best to end them in the maximum efficiency and at the least cost, least time. If you want to slander that as foul and demean that as nasty, then do as you wish. Justice can not save the world. I have no interest with things like that.

author: Tetsuya Kuroko
title: Kuroko No Basket
text: No one knows what the right decision, to make in life, is, and that is not why I made this choice.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: In the battlefield, there is no place for hope. What lies there is only cold despair and a sin called victory, built on the pain of the defeated. All those people who met there have wholeheartedly admitted the evil and foolishness of this act called war. As long as people don't repent and don't regard it as the most evil taboo, then hell will endlessly reappear in the world.

author: Kotomine Kirei
title: Fate/zero
text: Conflict is humanity's primal instinct. Eliminating it would mean eliminating humanity itself.

author: Emiya Kiritsugu
title: Fate/zero
text: Justice cannot save the world. It is useless.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Up until now, have you not faced the same enemies as I? That means you are my friend! So hold your chest high, and consider yourself my equal.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: If you truly want to continue escaping from everyday life, you've no other choice but to keep evolving. No matter whether you're aiming higher or lower.

author: Erika Karisawa
title: Durarara!!
text: If you make fiction just as valuable as reality, then any reality you don't need can be a delusion.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: I don't have have much time. It's not that I'm busy, but I'm only willing to give you about two and a half more minutes of my life!

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: I don't believe in god. There's no proof he exists. In a world where there isn't even proof of the future, the past exists. Even if it's tainted with misunderstandings and delusions, if the people themselves believe in it, the past is the truth to them. And, if you base your actions or your life around it, in a way, it's a type of god itself.

author: Ryuugamine Mikado
title: Durarara!!
text: I don't have the strength or wisdom to stand up against someone who is insusceptible to reason. You won't even give me time to make an effort. That's why I'm going to rely on numbers!

author: Erika Karisawa
title: Durarara!!
text: Reality is such a pain. And for those of us who get fed up with that kind of reality, we simply choose to make a new one. We create little walls, and separate the trash from the stuff we like, and when that's all done we keep the things we care about and kick the rest to the curb. You'd be amazed how well it works! A whole world made out of just moe, tsundere, and BL, it's the best discovery ever! If you ask me, that really is the best way to separate reality, from fiction.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Well, hurting girls isn't one of my hobbies. That's why I'll make it my hobby... to stomp on their cell phones. Hahahahahaha!

author: Saya Otonashi
title: Blood+
text: Our hearts beat in the same rhythm, so why does time flow differently for the two of us?

author: Motoharu Yano
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: I've always been asking myself this question. Am I a memory? or is the memory... ME? Are we nothing but a collection of memories?

author: Sion
title: No.6
text: If I hadn't met you, I never would have realized what kind of person I am. I would have grown into an apathetic, clueless, obedient adult. However, after spending time with you, in tears, laughter, and anger, I now know that I have all these emotions inside me, too. And that makes me proud. I'm glad to have known you.

author: Eru Chitanda
title: Hyouka
text: I find myself hard to understand sometimes.

author: Kasper Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: Now you know what fear does to you. In the face of death you thought.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Madoka. My only friend... If... If it's for your sake... I don't mind being locked in this eternal maze!

author: Tsuchimiya Garaku
text: If you want to protect humans and remain human, you shouldn't throw away your feelings, no matter how painful it is.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: So how about we become monsters together?.. And turn this world upside down? So that... nothing bad... or sad... would remain. Destroy, destroy, destroy it all!

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: I don't want... to run away by myself. Because no matter what, I'd rather be together with everyone...

author: Elfman Strauss
title: Fairy Tail
text: How can a snake fly? It's not even a man!

author: Kagura Mikazuchi
title: Fairy Tail
text: I never rely on luck. It's all my own choice. It leads me to the future.

author: Takakura Shouma
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: I hate the word "fate." Birth, encounters, partings, success and failures, fortune and misfortunes in life. If our lives are already set in stone by fate, then why are we even born? There are those born to wealthy families, those born to beautiful mothers, and those born into the middle of war or poverty. If that's all caused by fate, then God is incredibly unfair and cruel. Because, ever since that day, none of us had a future and the only certain thing was that we wouldn't amount to anything...

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Make a contract with me, and become a magical girl!

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Even though I've lost my way, I will save you.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: My companions make my heart strong. If I'm fighting for those I love, I care not what happens to this body.

author: Ringo Oginome
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: I love the word "fate". Because, you know how they talk about "fated encounters"? A single encounter can completely change your life. Such special encounters are not just coincidences. They're definitely... fate. Of course, life is not all happy encounters. There are many painful, sad moments. But this is what I think: sad and painful things definitely happen for a reason. Nothing in this world is pointless.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Kindness can bring you even bigger troubles.

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: In our culture, the phenomena known as emotion is considered a mental disorder.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Repeat. I'll repeat it for however many times I have to. Until I find the only way out.

author: Kyubee
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: If you ever feel like dying to help the universe, just let me know. I'll be waiting.

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Miracles aren't free. When you wish for hope, it creates an equivalent despair. That's how the balance of this world is preserved.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: It's all useless.

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: We're fighting for our own wishes. It's normal not to get noticed or remembered.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: As long as you laugh at people's suffering, your goal will always be out of reach. If you never want to be defeated, you must first learn your own weakness, and always be kind.

author: Junko Kaname
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: You need to learn how to make mistakes before you grow up. When you are young, you can recover quickly when hurt. When you get older it's harder to make mistakes. The more responsibilities, the less mistakes you are allowed to make.

author: Himari Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: Listen up, you lowlifes who will never amount to anything!

author: Kanba Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: Why are people born? If people are born only to suffer the hard life, is it meant as some kind of punishment? Or a cynical joke? If that's the case, animals that adhere to the survival strategies programmed in their DNA are far more elegant and simple. If there really is an existence worthy of being called a God, I want to ask him just one thing: Is there really fate in the universe? If a man ignored fate, and ignored his instincts and DNA to love someone else... Dear God, is he really human? Just wondering. I hate the word "fate".

author: Homura Akemi
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: With kindness comes naivete. Courage becomes foolhardiness. And dedication has no reward. If you can't accept any of that, you are not fit to be a magical girl.

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: If you're just living for your own sake, it's all up to you. No hard feelings. No regrets.

author: Madoka Kaname
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: If someone says it's wrong to hope, I will tell them that they're wrong every time. I could tell them that countless times!

author: Himari Takakura
title: Mawaru Penguindrum
text: That's when I realized! That I had become a child who would be found. So I broke into tears of happiness. No matter how far we're separated, you two would definitely find me. It's nice knowing someone will find you.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: I shall grieve, and I shall weep. But I shall never regret.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Glory lies beyond the horizon. Challenge it because it is unreachable. Speak of conquest and demonstrate it.

author: Sakura Kyouko
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: Protect the one thing you want to protect until the very end.

author: Sayaka Miki
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: I don't regret using my wish for another's sake. If I regret my decision now, the feelings upon which it was based will be for naught.

author: Junko Kaname
title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica
text: It sucks, but you can't reach a happy ending just by doing what's right all the time. Actually, the more people get stubborn and insist they're in the right, the further away happiness gets.

author: Isayama Yomi
text: Those who hurt her, put her in danger, those who caused her misfortune, I eliminate them. Even if the cause is me.

author: Kaminski Natalia
title: Fate/zero
text: Killing one man won't change anything. Kill every last person in the world. If you could do that, it might be possible.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: There's nothing happy about having your fate decided for you! You have to grab your own happiness!

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Weaklings will stay weak forever. But weakness is not evil, since human beings are weak creatures to begin with. Alone, you feel nothing but insecurity; that's why we form guilds, that's why we have friends. We walk together in order to live a strong life. The clumsy ones will walk into more walls than the others, and it may also take them longer to get there. If you believe in tomorrow and put yourself out there, you can naturally obtain your strength. That's how you will be able to smile and live strong.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: In this world, guns are always within arm's reach, and sadly they are more trustworthy than kindness.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.

author: Rider
title: Fate/zero
text: A cowardly thief would sneak away in the night; the King of Conquerors leaves with his loot amidst songs of victory!

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: You can run away, but that'll just make it worse!

author: Kaminski Natalia
title: Fate/zero
text: Choosing your calling based solely on your talents won't always guarantee you happiness.

author: Suzuha Amane
title: Steins;Gate
text: Everyone gets help from someone else at some point in their lives. So someday, you should help someone too.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: History dictates that it is the wise who are most foolish.

author: Suzuha Amane
title: Steins;Gate
text: To rule time is to rule the world.

author: Horo
title: Spice and Wolf
text: All men are jealous and stupid, and all women are stupid to be happy about it, idiots are everywhere you look!

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Theories are nothing more than words. Accept what you've seen.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: What I want isn't money or pretty dresses, but a place that recognizes me as who I am. Fairy Tail is my other family, and it is a far more warming family than here!

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: Conspiracy's evil influence is much closer than you think, and is always ready to deceive you!

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: I've only lived 18 years, but I don't want to change any of them. They're all part of my life, even the failures.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: 99% of perception that normal humans have are closed off. Those who don't think of themselves are quite foolish beings.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: Did you not understand? All dreams eventually disappear when the dreamers wake.

author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu
title: Fate/zero
text: God loves human virtues like courage and hope, but he loves screams, blood and despair just as much!

author: Johnathan Mar
title: Jormungand
text: Even peaceful people, given a gun, can go crazy. Afterwards they can't even understand what led them to do it.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: What kind of mad scientist worries about not getting enough vegetables?

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Your darkness...I will...seal it...

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: The Santa that showed up at my Kindergarden Christmas festival? I knew he was fake. And I never saw Mommy kissing Santa Claus, either. But I have to say, even as a little kid I knew better to believe in some old man who worked only one day a year.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: Whether fairies have tails or not, or whether they even exist, nobody knows for sure. So it's like an eternal mystery, an eternal adventure.

author: Johnathan Mar
title: Jormungand
text: When the hunger seemed to kill me, I was wondering if the world hates me. I can't explain it, but I still love the world.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: There are times in a man's life when he must STRIP

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: There are people in this world that enjoy being alone, but there isn't a single person who can bear solitude.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: Someone who could shed tears for their friends... could never be rejected from Fairy Tail!

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: You must not change the past, once it's been established.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: Modern-day saints carry assault rifles, and spread the word of God with their bullets.

author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu
title: Fate/zero
text: Sometimes you can't see what's right in front of you.

author: Gilgamesh
title: Fate/zero
text: What you speak of at greatest length is what interests you the most.

author: Mayuri Shiina
title: Steins;Gate
text: We should work towards world peace. Like giving everyone in the world an Upa cushion...

author: Itaru Hashida
title: Steins;Gate
text: There are two types of lies: Lies that hurt, and lies that don't hurt.

author: Saber
title: Fate/zero
text: If you do evil out of a hatred for evil, that rage and hate will merely birth new conflict.

author: Okabe Rintarou
title: Steins;Gate
text: No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.

author: Koko Hekmatyar
title: Jormungand
text: Kindness is weakness. Your weakness will delay the trigger by a moment. This world doesn't treat kindness kindly.

author: Happy
title: Fairy Tail
text: You're useless, Lucy. You can't understand a woman's heart.

author: Makarov Dreyar
title: Fairy Tail
text: No one can decide what someone else should do with their life.

author: Irisviel von Einzbern
title: Fate/zero
text: What we call the human heart... It's such a mystery, isn't it?

author: Gildarts Clive
title: Fairy Tail
text: Fear isn't evil, it only allows us to learn our own weaknesses. When we learn our weakness, people can grow stronger and kinder.

author: Kurisu Makise
title: Steins;Gate
text: Even if the world line changes, as long as you don't forget me, I'm there.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Ice can even stop the time of life itself. So, you'll never be able to catch up, for eternity. You'll always be stuck there, staring at the fairy's tail.

author: Lancer
title: Fate/zero
text: You're as good as naked before my spear.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: Being alive...is a sign of strength!

author: Eikichi Onizuka
title: Great Teacher Onizuka
text: We cannot go back to the past, no matter how hard we try. No matter how wonderful it was. The past is nothing but the past.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Darkness. When everything that you know and love is taken away from you so harshly. All you can think about is anger, hatred and even revenge. And no one can save you.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Never look at your life as something insignificant. Never forget those friends of yours that you loved.

author: North Italy
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: I'm the tomato box fairy!

author: Anarchy Panty
title: Panty And Stocking With Gaterbelt
text: But that's why I can't let myself be weighed down by fuckin' regrets. A bitch lives as free as a bird that can never be caught.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: He turned a room full of strangers into a room full of enemies with just one sentence.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: If you were to turn into a snake tomorrow and began devouring humans, and from the same mouth you devoured humans, you cried out to me, "I Love You!" Would I still be able to say "I Love You," the same way I do today?

author: Furude Rika
title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni
text: Perhaps living without sin is a sin in itself.

author: Ami Kawashima
title: Toradora!
text: It's difficult to like me when I'm being myself.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!

author: Ryougi Shiki
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: A terrible premonition can bring about a terrible reality.

author: Takashi Komuro
title: Highschool Of The Dead
text: But our world as we knew it had already been completely destroyed.

author: Johann Liebert
title: Monster
text: The big secret to breaking the rules is to make it look as though you're following them.

author: Kenzo Tenma
title: Monster
text: When you're in the darkness, you only sink deeper into it. Keep the light shining.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: The strong one doesn't win. The one who wins is strong.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: Your name sounds like an air conditioner.

author: Leo Baskerville

I listen to the pain of the forest and feel the ache of the bullet in my chest and dream of the day when I will finally crunch that gun woman's head in my jaws... She is my daughter. One of the wolf tribe. When the forest dies, so does she. I caught her human parents defiling my forest. They threw their baby at my feet as they ran away. Instead of eating her, I raised her as my own. Now my poor, ugly, beautiful daughter is neither human nor wolf.

author: Aozaki Touko
title: The Garden of Sinners
text: What does a view from a high place remind you of? The impulse you feel when you look down at the world you live in. A violent cognition that attacks you even if you refuse it. An emotion created by an overlooking view - That's "far". The scenery you see from a high place is magnificent. Even an ordinary landscape looks beautiful. But a vision that's too large creates a boundary between you and the world. It's more correct for you to recognize the large world you see as the world you live in rather than as the small space around you. But you can't feel that you're living in this big world no matter how hard you try.Your reasoning, represented by your knowledge, and your experience, respresented by your realization, will crash against each other. And eventually, you will lose yourself and confusion will begin. And then you will fall. Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends. Our vision is protected by our common sense. Humans cannot live outside their box... under normal circumstances.

author: Ryougi Shiki

A light that will never fade.

Because of the wistful actions of those idiots and their refusal to admit that bloodshed is by itself evil, the essence of humans has stayed on the same spot since the Stone Age!
