author: Excalibur
title: Soul Eater
text: Young ones! Do you want to hear the legend of me? Do you want to hear a heroic tale?

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: I think I'd like to dissect you now!

author: Crona
title: Soul Eater
text: The doors here only open one way. They open inward.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: You're disgustingly hideous! What the hell kind of thing are you? I've never seen anything more messed up in my life! Do you know nothing about symmetry? Whoever made you should be dug up from his grave, shot and reburied! You make me violently ill.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: Tornado Flip!

author: Blair
title: Soul Eater
text: Oh! My little scythey boy!

author: Eruka Frog
title: Soul Eater
text: Next time I really am going to kill you Medusa ribbit!

author: Medusa Gorgon
title: Soul Eater
text: It will be alright, have faith in yourself. Crona, you will be a Kishin.

author: Excalibur
title: Soul Eater
text: No autographs!

author: Excalibur
title: Soul Eater
text: Welcome. Welcome to my cave young ones. Please forgive the belated salutations I am the holy sword Excalibur!

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: All the more reason to dissect one, before the whole species dies off.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: Symmetry is key everything must be esthetically pleasing. That's why I use the two of you as twin pistols in order to preserve symmetry. When I hold you both I'm completely balanced on the right and left. It isn't perfect because your human forms are so different from each other though. Your hair styles and height for example. Even your boobs are different sizes!

author: Blair
title: Soul Eater
text: I never said I was a witch did I? You just made that assumption all on your own. I'm really just a cat with a ridiculous amount of magical power.

author: Eruka Frog
title: Soul Eater
text: I can't stand that witch, stupid snake woman.

author: Eruka Frog
title: Soul Eater
text: Ribbit.

author: Medusa Gorgon
title: Soul Eater
text: Um well Miss Maka? Can you do me a favor and help me out with your father? I can't get him off my leg.

author: Medusa Gorgon
title: Soul Eater
text: Nake, Snake, Cobra, Cobra.

author: Excalibur
title: Soul Eater
text: My mornings begin with a cup of coffee with cream at the cafe. My afternoon begins with hot tea with two lumps of sugar. And my evenings... In the evening I change into my pajamas.

author: Excalibur
title: Soul Eater
text: My legend dates back to the 12th Century thank you very much.

author: Franken Stein
title: Soul Eater
text: I can't seem to get my head on straight.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: No, it can't be 7, say 8 damn it! 8 is better! It's physically impossible to cut the number 7 in half and make it symmetrical! It has to be 8 instead! 8 cut vertically or horizontally stays perfectly symmetrical! Take it back I beg of you! Please say 8, PLEASE!

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: I'm an abomination! I'm filthy and dirty! And unbalanced! Why is there only one set of stripes?! I'm garbage! Asymmetrical garbage! I deserve to die!

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: Symmetry is what makes the world beautiful.

author: Dr hiluluk
title: One Piece
text: When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. When they drink a soup made from a poisonous mushroom!? No! It's when... they are forgotten.

author: Enel
title: One Piece
text: I am lightning. No matter how hard they try, mankind can never overcome lightning. Since ancient times, mankind has labeled the unknowns of nature as God. And anything they could not understand, they feared. Everything which befalls mankind is said to be the work of God. Mankind accepts that it cannot defeat natural disasters. And I am one of them.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: If I told her how I feel, she'd miss me even more. Afterall, I'm the guy who keeps breaking her heart by making her wait an eternity... even though I'm always by her side. I don't wanna see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer have a place in her heart. Seems pretty childish of me, doesn't it?

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Are you scared? I understand. The first time I saw my reflection in the mirror, even I was frightened by how BIG my reflection was.

author: Death the Kid
title: Soul Eater
text: I'm worthless garbage who can't even write a straight looking K!

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: Human is an existence full of sin.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Any technique is worthless before my eyes.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: The human world is a boring place with boring people doing boring things.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: The bells are very loud today.

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The word "discipline" is something that I would never give up, no matter what. But it's not because it is my pride that I will not give it up. It's because I cannot give it up, that's why it is my pride.

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: This is vengeance, so I am to ferry you to hell.

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: When one person is cursed, two graves are dug.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I will become a bigger badass than my father. And a stronger shinobi than my mother!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: You don't understand anything, do you?! The most important thing isn't power, it isn't courage, it isn't even having friends! The only thing that matters is that you can rely on ME.

author: Crona
title: Soul Eater
text: Do you know where hell is? Inside your head.

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It's the sky...that allows the clouds to move about freely.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: If it's something I can only cry about in my heart, it's almost like a sin.

author: Sousuke Sagara
title: Full Metal Panic!
text: Yes I've used a condom before. They can store up to 1 liter of water.

author: Sousuke Sagara
title: Full Metal Panic!
text: [pulls a gun on a boy harassing Kaname] I'll let you go this time but if I see you doing this again, I'll come after you and all your relatives.

author: Sousuke Sagara
title: Full Metal Panic!
text: [to a dating simulation that has just dumped him] Wait! If you cut off negotiations, it can only lead to war. Accept a truce, and I will listen to whatever you have to say. Let's work toward a compromise!

author: Kaname Chidori
title: Full Metal Panic!
text: I don't have any regrets. I'm glad I met you, Sousuke Sagara.

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Using a rescued civilian as a hostage? So do you still feel justified in fighting by their side with these cowards? Kira?

author: Dearka Elsman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Seems appropriate for Nicol. A weapon fit for a coward.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: What the hell can you hope to protect when your feelings are the only weapons you've got?

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You always seem to get in my way, Mu La Flaga. Though I imagine you'd say the same about me.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: If I have the power to make a difference, I should put it to good use.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: But your kindess doesn't come from being a Coordinator... it's because of who you are Mr. Yamato

author: Sai Argyle
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: What a lovely voice! But I have to wonder though... is that voice a result of fiddling around with her genes?

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I can't exactly fight a war with a big smile on my face.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Nicol was fifteen. He loved the piano and Kira just cut him down.

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [to Athrun] What is it you believe in? What is it you're fighting for now? Is it for that medal you received? Or your father's orders?

author: Lacus Clyne
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: From now on, Lacus Clyne will be singing the song of peace.

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Athrun Zala. Justice. Launching!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [about Rau] But are you sure that's me? Oh well. He will be my successor in any case. Why should that woman's child be my heir? Keep a close eye on him and educate him well. Whatever you do, don't make him into another weakling.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [Kira thinks he has just killed Andrew Waltfeld and cries] It didn't have to end like this.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I don't know how to give up!!

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: In the end, aren't they just a bunch of weaklings?

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I HATE LEEKS!!!

author: Muruta Azrael
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: It's simple. Even a single Coordinator is a threat to the Earth's survival, and our goal here is to get rid of them all!

author: Dearka Elsman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I can't just quietly follow orders when it looks like all we're trying to do is wipe out every last Natural alive.

author: Natarle Badgiruel
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You're a monster who deserves to die, right here, with me.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Why torment yourself saying, "Eventually, someday?" How long have you been fighting with your thoughts clouded by that brand of sweet poison?

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [as he prepares to fire on the Eternal with Lacus Clyne on board] It's a shame really, I did enjoy your songs. But the real world isn't as kind as the one in pop songs!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I'll give it a try. Anything that man can do, I'm sure I can do just as well.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Do you think you can change what's going to happen? Nobody can do anything about it. The whirlpool of hatred is engulfing the universe!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I am the only one who's earned that right in the entire universe! I alone have the right to judge all of humanity!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: The final door is about to open! And I am the one opening it! Then the world that we know of will come to an end! This world of insatiable desires will end!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I am He, that arrogant fool who thought he could fool death itself with his money. Al Da Flaga, your father, but I am merely that man's defective clone.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: They thirsted for knowledge! They sought to fulfill their desires! And ultimately, they forgot why they were doing it. Even as they proclaimed their reverence for human life, they began toying with it, and then they began destroying it!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [To Kira] You are the dream of humanity, the Ultimate Coordinator. It was in pursuit of that dream that Dr. Hibiki created the artificial womb. And you are the only viable child it ever produced. For that result, a very large number of your siblings were sacrificed.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Aren't you the least bit curious? About the ultimate extent of humanity's insatiable desires? About the fools who pursued their insane dream in the name of progress? Because after all, Kira, you're a child of this too.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: If it's my fate to be shot down by you, I thought this place would be appropriate... However, it doesn't look like there's any chance of that happening. After all, how could the "child" ever hope to defeat the "parent"?

author: Shani Andras
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Why you little... nobody takes a shot at me!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Nobody is ever born into this world as a soldier.

author: Yzak Joule
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: What's so fun about firing at targets that aren't moving?

author: Cagalli Yula Athha
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: [to Athrun] I bet your head is like a hamster running in its wheel right about now.

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Kira... what are you thinking about, now?

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I went with raven for a long bathroom break.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: It's something that appear on the chests of illegal contractees.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Illegal contractees kill people to be able to change the past.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I wonder why illegal contractees try to kill people?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Hey, Oz. what are you lazing around for?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Don't tell me what to do, you seaweed head.

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Irony abounds in warfare.

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I may be able to operate the mobile suit... but that doesn't mean I know how to fight a battle!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Athrun! Show us that same spirit that made you defy orders!

author: Kira Yamato
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: What you say may be correct, that there is a war going on outside our world. But we don't agree with it! We dislike war! And that is why we chose to be here, in neutral territory!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Mu, I'd actually be pleased if you'd vanish right about now!

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You always seem to get in my way, Mu La Flaga! Though I imagine you would probably say the same about me!

author: Murrue Ramius
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: You kids don't understand anything! By declaring that you're neutral and have nothing to do with this, you can still distance yourselves from what's happening? You don't really believe that, do you?

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Tell me, do you feel my presence? Do you sense it the same way that I sense yours? A rather unfortunate twist of fate, wouldn't you say... Mu La Flaga?

author: Rau Le Creuset
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: It seems we have an unforseen problem. A rather annoying fly buzzing around.

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Damn piece of Earth trash!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Trying to pilot that mobile suit? You're in way over your head, Natural!

author: Miguel Aiman
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: It doesn't matter how good your armor is... if you can barely move!

author: Cagalli Yula Athha
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: I knew it. The Earth Forces' new mobile weapons. Father, I knew you'd betray us all!

author: Athrun Zala
title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed
text: Kira... fails to see he's being manipulated by the Naturals! Brilliant as he is, he is also naive and good-natured. They're exploiting him, but he's blind to it. That's why I have to go back! I have to reason with him! Kira is still a fellow Coordinator! I'm positive that he'll come around to our way of thinking.

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I coulda been a contendah...

author: Seto Kaiba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Let me get this straight. You're going to defeat me with a creampuff and an elf?

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: [sounding like Marlon Brando] I'm the Godfather of Games. Capsice?

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Ready or not, Spirit, this is where you take over.

author: Tea Gardner
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: No matter how dark things may get, the special bond I share with my friends will always find a way to shine through! I may be scared, but that fear won't keep me from dueling!

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Exodia, OBLITERATE!!!

author: Joey Wheeler
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I found out I hate virtual dogs.

author: Underwood Weevil
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: Say good-bye to The Unstoppable Exodia!

author: Underwood Weevil
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: I'm gonna take you out in one giant bug blitzkrieg!

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: My grandfather's deck has no pathetic cards, Kaiba. But it does contain... the unstoppable Exodia!

author: Seto Kaiba
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: *after Joey offers him to duel* No thanks, I think I'll have much more of a challenge playing solitaire.

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: You've fought a valiant duel, my friend, and this is the hardest move I've ever had to make. But this ends now!

author: Yami Yugi
title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
text: It's game time!

author: Homura
title: Saiyuki
text: Power rules the Heavens just as Power rules in the Lower world.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Quiet down or I'll shoot you bastards!

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Maten Scripture binding force of power where light is darkness and darkness is light I call upon your power to cast my enemy back Into OBLIVION!

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Life is basically a fuedal struggle until you die.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: If you meet Budha - kill him, If you meet the father - kill him. Never be captivated by anyone, just live for yourself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: I dont need to believe in God to believe in myself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: I don't believe in anyone, nor do I believe in God. I just believe in myself.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: From the time I was born, till the day I die...The only side I am on, is my own.

author: Genjo Sanzo
title: Saiyuki
text: Consume wine, don't let the wine consume you.

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: I can't see Kyoko-san...anymore. But she left me something. Her advice, her feelings... and Tohru. They all... all become fertilizer to help me grow.

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: But even though she's gone... she's not really gone, right? That the light won't go on in that apartment... is a lie, right?

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: Maybe I was lonely. Maybe I've just... always... been lonely.

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: Hmm... you can go anywhere you want? Cuz' I'll go... anywhere with you, y'know. (To Kureno)

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: HANAJIMA, MY SPEAR! GET ME MY SPEAR!

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: This may have been a useless time for you... but I really wanted to see you!

author: Arisa Uotani
title: Fruits Basket
text: Is that the kinda attitude you show to someone concerned about you?! What's gonna happen to the person who wants to see ya, huh?!?! Its obvious... Its obvious you wish to see each other... SO COME AND FREAKIN' SEE ME ALREADY!!

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: I...think that my performance today was a success because he played opposite me. Kyo-kun...Thank you. (To Kazuma)

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do...want to be with you...I want to be with you...! (To Tohru and Arisa)

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: ...If Tohru-chan were to die, I...I wonder if I'd be able to smile again one year later? Or if I'd wish that I could forget ever having met her. ...Tohru-chan... has tried really hard...

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Please stop adding to my misery. (to Ayame)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's over between Kana and me. We're not going to get back together. Even if we were together, I would only miss her... (To Shigure and Ayame)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: He's just...he's still a child. There are still a lot of things he can't give up. There's no rush. (To Ayame about Yuki)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: I started crying. It was the first time in my life that I felt forgiven. Like I was saved. Like the frozen snow that's melted by spring, the tears wouldn't stop.

author: Saki Hanajima
title: Fruits Basket
text: A sixth sense cannot make up for a total lack of common sense.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: [thinking] I only take family as patients and I still get worked to death.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: Since when did the "Cat" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Often times in memory, we have the tendency to overly romanticize the people we care about.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: So, what are you saying? You mean if your wife wasn't controlling you, you wouldn't be a villain? You mean you've never thought it's just because you're incompetent? And what's that supposed to mean anyway? (To the story, "Mogeta")

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's not the fun and games you think. It's bizarre... sinister... cursed. (speaking of the curse to Tohru)

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: You're so gullible! Don't you have any standards? So if I told you to spin around, you'd do it? If they told you to jump off a cliff, would you do that, too? I can't stand people who have no individuality!! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Please... even if I die surrounded by snow that never melts... please let her be happy.

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: Waah, Kyo's picking on me! (Repeated line)

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: I've gained freedom...and yet... it's so lonesome... (after declaring he was leaving Akito's side)

author: Sohma Ayame
title: Fruits Basket
text: Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. "When this happened, I should have done that." "When that happened, I should have said this." Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to "The Most Foolish Traveler" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: And if when everything ends, nothing is left in my hands...that's alright.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Your happiness is in a much more vast world. Look for it. Find it. (to Hatsuharu)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: (to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say "Shigure you perv" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do intend to pay you for your services.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to "womans intuition")

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Another story of Fruits Basket manga has begun. I have something very important to tell everyone. Yuki is actually...A GIRL!

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Eventually, someday, whatever! If it will break, and we'll be free then that's good enough for me! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: So this is how...it feels... (After just being released from the curse)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: We've just witnessed a classic example of what I like to call "misdirected rage". Though I believe the technical term is being an ass.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't need someone as unreliable as you for a partner! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: A bond may seem like a beautiful thing from the outside...but if those involved see it as a burden, it's nothing but a shackle.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: You're trying to break the curse. Stop it. What are you trying to do? Do you look down on us? Do you pity our wretched state? Don't bother! We never asked for your sympathy! (To Tohru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: People aren't born social. Sure it comes easier to some people... but most people, like you, need to work at it. Some more than others. You're just inexperienced. For example, as a martial artist, you have the strength to break the table with your fist. But you also have the self-control to stop your fist right before it hits the table. You weren't born with that control, were you? You had to refine it. It's the same as interacting with people. But training for that isn't in the mountains - it has to be in town where people live. Mingling with people, hurting them, getting hurt by them. That's how you learn about people and about yourself. If you don't, you'll never care about anyone but yourself. You may be a black belt fighter, but you're still a white belt in dealing with people. For the sake of the girl who will one day tell you she loves you... Don't turn away. Keep training.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I have nothing but me. I'll give you myself. You can use me however you like for the rest of my life. (To Shigure)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: You reject your femininity... yet at the end here you are using it.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) Haru understood me. He cared for me. He loved me.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I do love Akito... I love her then... I still do now.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: (thinking) I can't stand up...on my own. I can't go...any further. Not...all by myself.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I yearn for you more than anyone else. I love you Akito... And that is the irrevocable unwavering truth.(shigures answer to akitos question "do you like me?" during a child hood flashback)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: The biggest idiot is you! So why don't you go back to school or whatever it is that idiots like you do and don't ever bother me again! You piece of shit! (To Yuki)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Even I... know what it's like to be jealous. (referring to Kureno and Akito's relationship)

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: You talk big yet you're nothing but Akito's toy! (To Yuki)

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: I love you!! Even if you go bald or like underage girls, I can handle it! I'm crazy with love!! (Young Kyoko talking to Tohru's father/her husband)

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: For there to be pain, there has to be kindness. For darkness to stand out, there has to be the sun.

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Hippo.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: (to Kyo) oh, shut up. shut up! shut up! AAHHH!! AAHHH!!

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: We're all born with selfish desires so we can relate to those feelings in others. But kindness is created individually by each person... So it's easy to misunderstand when someone is trying to be kind to you... But, Tohru, people's differences are something to celebrate.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: DON'T LEAVE ME!!

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: Tohru, you must always be yourself and do things at your own pace. Someday... you'll catch up.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Is it okay for me to have my own life now, father, now that I'm not "special" anymore?

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's you that I want. Do you not want me? Don't you want to be together? (to Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I still can't control my wish to see her. I never thought of how important she was to me. (about Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to possess her...to make her belong to me, and only me. (about Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Sometimes when I'd go to visit her in the hospital...she would purposely avoid me. Then I didn't know what she was thinking about anymore... (to Yuki, about Rin)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't try to be a hero, stupid cat. (to Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm creating trouble. Can't you see?

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: If you don't let me see Rin... I'll kill myself! If I don't kill you, I'll kill myself! (to Akito)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'll always love you. (To Yuki)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's Valentine's day, silly! It's the day when lovers are together!

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't judge me based on the same story and laugh.

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: I thought that, if I could shorten the distance between us, and if you would like me back, then the me that ran away - the dirty me - would be washed away. (To Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Shut up. Quit shouting like you're king of the figgin' world. You're making my ears bleed you bastard. Now I've got some common sense for you... If I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am. If I had no piercings, it wouldn't mean I'm nice and if my hair wasn't black, it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass! Who do you think you are anyway? You think you're God huh?! What's the matter?! Run out of things to say? No more advice?! You're not so hot anymore right now are you?! (Black Haru yelling at student council president for shouting at Momiji)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: ...There's nothing to feel sorry for on my behalf. I've been a very selfish girl. For the first time, I was able to see that. Thank you for worrying about me, mama. (to her mother)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: So stupid! Stupid, Stupid! You're so stupid! You want to live your life scared of being ratted out?! Screw that! I'd rather let everyone know everything!! (to Yuki, Tohru, Kyo, and Momiji while destroying a classroom)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: I was... relieved. I realized that, compared to the cat, I had it easy. (To kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: A mystery... (Haru says this a lot, usually when it's not a mystery at all)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: SHII-CHAN, YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!! (after learning that Shigure invited Akito to the summer house)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Why..? How can she say things like that so easily? If we hear that from our parents, what are we supposed to do? Rin thinks that she's been "bad". But who do you think is the one who's being "bad" here!?! Having people take their anger out on us, being laughed at, not being taken seriously. We kids get hurt just like you do! Why can't you understand something so simple?! Apologize! APOLOGIZE! APOLOGIZE TO RIN!! [Rin's mom shuts the door] HEY!! I TOLD YOU TO APOLOGIZE!!

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's just that I'm fighting the pain of lost love. I guess it's what you'd call a rude awakening... or, maybe... the weight of responsibility? But I'm fine. I'm fine. Caring for someone isn't based on logic. You can't really rationalize emotions. Once I think "I like him"... it's all over.

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's amazing no one's locked you up yet (to Shigure)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Kyo-kun! Kyo-kun! I do love you, Kyo-kun! I love you!!!

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Oh, you know... I'm gonna do this, and a little of that... and I'm definitely gonna do THAT...! (to Kyo about Tohru, after calling her Kyo's girlfriend)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: Starting today... I'll be with you! I'll always be by your side! (to a young Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: You pansy! What kind of girly punch is that? I didn't even feel it! (to Kyo)

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: Especially Yuki... He was my first love after all... [Tohru stops walking]

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: You sicko...I knew you were depraved, but I never imagined how low you could sink! (to shigure)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Tohru] Ever since you left I've been getting pissed off about everything, and because I couldn't understand why, it just pissed me off even more!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Yo...time to pay the piper rat boy...I'm here to collect

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Tohru, I can't stand not being with you... I... because I love you.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I love you. When did I start to love you so much?

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: [to Kyo after they trip] What can I learn from a stupid cat like you? You didn't even know that Jason isn't really a bear! He's a character from a horror film!

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: ...As they played the game...I waited for someone to call "onigiri". But no one called. I was very little then. I had almost forgotten about that. But they knew...there would never be room for an onigiri...in a fruits basket.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Yuki] Liar! Moping around like a sad rat who lost his cheese!

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: STOP IMAGINING ME!

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Being away from everyone else may be lonely, but being away from you will be even lonelier.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: [referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Don't you ever talk about Miss Honda that way again, you low life.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's not always easy to see the good in people. In some people, you might even doubt that it's there at all. But if you can somehow, find a way to believe...sometimes that's all it takes to help someone, to give them the strength to find the good in themselves.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Be selfish, say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: My mom told me, it's better to trust people than to doubt them. She said that people aren't born with kind hearts. When we're born, all we have are desires for food and material things. Selfish instincts, I guess. But she said that kindness is something that grows inside of each person's body, but it's up to us to nurture that kindness in our hearts. That's why kindness is different for every person.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: Mom taught me that people's differences are something to celebrate. When I thought of all the different shapes of human kindness -- imagining them as round or square...I got really excited. Your kindness is like a candle Sohma-kun. I can feel it light up, and I just want to smile. It's that kind of kindness.

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Maybe I'm not perfect. Maybe I have a long way to go. But someday... someday I'll be able to stand and walk on my own. Without hurting anyone... and without being a burden. (to Kazuma)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: A woman who can talk tough while completely naked...amazing. (about Rin, the horse)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I don't want to be anyone's burden. I don't want you to be my dad if it's going to hurt you. (thinking about Kazuma)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Perhaps if you'd just die you'd be reincarnated as something more pleasant.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [On first seeing Kyo] The ceiling... Is he hurt...? Wh-who... Well, hello, orange-head...

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: ou know you're a real wise ass, you know that?! (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: It's a mystery. Just because of a simple sentence... I get shaken... or I get happy. Kyo-kun is mysterious indeed. (After Kyo says, "You wanna kill some time... with me?")

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Ha ha! Eat my dust, rat-boy! (to Yuki)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: As long as you live things will keep happening! As long as you're alive wishes will keep being made!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: You know... you really are something... (to Tohru)

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: Skin him. Now. Barbeque the bastard!! (referring to Ayame)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Ritsu Sohma] Sometimes living can be hard, but it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry...be happy! [thinking] If that's not the reason for being born in this world...I don't know what is!

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Yo... Are you ready for me to break your neck... Rat-boy?

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: (referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to "like yourself". But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [in her head] My happiness comes from the kindness of those around me.

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo] Seriously... Must you break something every time you come home? When are you going to learn? You're too weak.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Ritsu Sohma] I'm sure that inside your heart...you're trying with all your might to find it on your own...the reason you were born. Because...because really...there might not be anyone who was born with a reason. I think that everyone might have to find one on their own. [in her head] A reason for being born... A reason that it's okay to be alive... A reason to exist. [aloud] I think everyone might have to find it themselves...and decide for themselves. It could be your dreams...your job...or a person. ...The reason you're looking for...might be vague, unclear...and uncertain. [in her head] And you might lose it. [aloud] But as long as you're alive...you have to keep searching for that reason.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [To Kyo Sohma]If you think of someone's good qualities as the umeboshi in an onigiri, it's as if their qualities are stuck to their back! People around the world are like onigiri. Everyone has an umeboshi with a different shape and color and flavor. But because it's stuck on their back, they might not be able to see their umeboshi. "There's nothing special about me. I'm just white rice." [in her head] That's not true. There is an umeboshi -- on your back. [aloud] Maybe the reason people get jealous of each other, is because they can see so clearly the umeboshi on other people's backs. I can see them, too. I can see them perfectly. There's an amazing umeboshi on your back, Kyo-kun.

author: Sohma Hiro
title: Fruits Basket
text: I want to be the only one... who can help the one I care about.

author: Sohma Hatori
title: Fruits Basket
text: Someday... no matter how cold it is now... the snow will melt. Without fail.

author: Sohma Ayame
title: Fruits Basket
text: NOW, SPARKLE, MY HOUSE OF LEARNING!!

author: Sohma Momiji
title: Fruits Basket
text: But I think... I want to live with all my memories. Even if they're bad memories. Even if they're memories that only hurt me... that I'd rather forget. If I keep them and keep trying, without running away, then someday I'll be strong enough that those memories can't defeat me. I believe that because I want to think that there's no such thing as a memory that's ok to forget.

author: Sohma Shigure
title: Fruits Basket
text: Sometimes I think the whole world is conspiring to destroy my house.

author: Sohma Rin
title: Fruits Basket
text: Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)

author: Akito Sohma
title: Fruits Basket
text: Idiots should do what idiots can to be quicker.

author: Kyoko Honda
title: Fruits Basket
text: True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we had to work on... (to Tohru)

author: Sohma Kagura
title: Fruits Basket
text: I just told you what I think, now say something DAMMIT!

author: Sohma Hatsuharu
title: Fruits Basket
text: You make me sick, you and your pathetic girly whining... You're not a MAN! You're just a little kitty-cat who's afraid to fight! Know what?! YOU CAN GO TO HELL! HAHAHAHAHA! UGH! (gets kicked by Kyo in the face)

author: Sohma Kyo
title: Fruits Basket
text: Stupid ocean!!! Ya want me to kill you? Huh??

author: Sohma Yuki
title: Fruits Basket
text: I won't ask what you wish for. I only hope it comes true by your own two hands. (to Kyo)

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: [After Hatori asks what snow becomes when it melts]Ah...um, well...hmm. It becomes spring! No matter how cold it is now, spring will come again! Without fail. It's strange isn't it? But it's true.

author: Honda Tohru
title: Fruits Basket
text: A lot of people are too scared to admit that they're still children. They do everything they can to avoid it. So people who can admit that have a lot of courage.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You must believe in yourself, follow your path without fear.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: A poor choice seals our fate.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I'll help you... But not by death, this world has enough of that. You can keep your life as long as you change the way you live it. It's never too late, believe me.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Does he really believe we would turn around after all that we've been through?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Underestimating an opponent is the first step towards defeat.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: We've gone far past the stage of fighting for our honor.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You do them one favor and they think you're their best friend. This is why I could care less if their entire species was swallowed up.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You try to sound like you think things through, when in fact, you're not thinking at all.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I've been under too much stress lately. Killing you should be a good remedy.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I'm not a fighter of good. I just hate people who are bad.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Being lucky seems to be your greatest tactic.

author: Risa Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: I can't lose to my older sister! Right now she's ahead of me by 2 millimeters in chest size!

author: Risa Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: *to Riku* At least I'm the cute one!!

author: Riku Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: Mom, dad, Risa became a delinquent!

author: Riku Harada
title: D.N.Angel
text: He wouldn't notice if I got a crew cut, shaved my head bald, or even grew an afro!

author: Argentine
title: D.N.Angel
text: You'll break. Humans are so fragile.

author: Argentine
title: D.N.Angel
text: Are you, what they call, a heart?

author: Argentine
title: D.N.Angel
text: He told me...that which is incomplete seeks completion... yet...that which is incomplete is no better than that which is complete. Do you understand?

author: Masahiro
title: D.N.Angel
text: I'm scared to go over there!

author: Masahiro
title: D.N.Angel
text: His stupidity is 50% above normal levels.

author: Krad
title: D.N.Angel
text: My name is Krad. But you do not have to remember it, because here you will die.

author: Krad
title: D.N.Angel
text: Risa is a bitch.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Yuusuke... Dammit Yuusuke, listen to me! Everyone has to fight with time to find their place before their inevitable death. Toguro... he ran away from that fight. Don't you ever do the same. No human is ever a one man show. Every decision that you make will affect the countless people who care about you. Do you understand? You can't be a cocky kid anymore.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Thanks for the real vote of confidence. You two should be cheerleaders, you'd look cute in skirts!

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You've trapped yourself in a body you hated hiding in the pain, and now you want to torture yourself again for eternity...haven't we both paid enough?

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I fight to get what I need, and I kill whoever gets in my way. I always have.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Oh, silly me. I must have forgotten to turn on my hearing aid. When you're a washed up old hag like me, the memory is the first to go.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: What a silly little girl I was, thinking you would change. I should have known how you would turn out. You had it written in ugly black letters all across your soul.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I know you play by higher standards, but at least give me credit for the nose.

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Don't make me slap you upside the head, just shoot the damn thing!

author: Genkai
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Use the Spirit Wave to float on top of the spike. Good. Now we'll hold this for twelve hours.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: (To Sensui) Here's a one way ticket straight to Hell! YOU BASTAARD!

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Obviously you are underestimating Kurama. Do you know why I chose him to be my partner? To avoid fighting him myself. Watch, he's more cut-throat then I am when it comes to battle, and unbelievably precise.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: My arm did not obey a certain command I gave it, so I decided it needed to be punished.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I'm warning you. You so much as bruise what you hold in your hand and I will show you pain. The hue of your soul will cease to matter, because you will not be judged when you die, you will no longer to exist.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: What repulsive creature makes my eardrums bleed?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Nerd violence...

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Even as a child, I found tremendous pleasure in spilling my enemy's blood. Their screams of agony were my music. Once I learned that my mother's frozen tear drop was valuable, I began wearing in open sight of everyone, hoping their greed would entice them to challenge me, thus giving me the opportunity for my next kill.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Agh, it penetrates my brain!

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Do I have to kill you to stop you from being foolish?

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: What irony. Such beauty, sprung from such an ugly soil.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: This is the second time today I hold your life in my hands. I somehow doubt that Sensui will be more merciful than I am.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Logic is panic's prey.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: This is pure offense. They gave up fighting with their brains a long time ago.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Tired hands are better than none.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I know as much of games as I do of hugs and puppies, and care for them even less. Wake me for the end of the world.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I think Monster Beast Doughnut is a perfect name.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Kurama, do not make me come over there and remove that precious thing you call a voice box.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: You should know better than to corner an animal like a fox... We have a tendency to show our teeth.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Don't worry fool, we've entered into an alliance and I'm not the type to break it. Of course, after we win the tournament I can't guarantee anything.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: I thought clowns made everyone else laugh.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Kurama, there is no person who does not carry scars upon their heart, and if there were such a man, they would be a shallow soul.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: All the while we've been thinking you were a brilliant strategist when really, you're just a lucky fool.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: He's swinging his sword with the grace of a flyswatter. That's no way to survive.

author: Kurama
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Regret is a different beast when you live for centuries.

author: Hiei
title: Yu Yu Hakusho
text: Tell me, how does it feel to live in a constant haze of stupidity?

author: Kurama

text: Yusuke Urameshi, age 14. Survived by his mom and everybody. After going through a big ordeal to get his life back, Yusuke had a brief second chance until he was eaten by a fish! That's right! No heroic death! No fighting evil villans! Fish food!

title: Detective Conan
text: You're always away during the important times and all you do is call. There are times when you are finally here, but then you disappear unexpectedly. Every time... every time... always, always, leaving me behind alone. What do you think I am? I love you Shinichi!

title: Detective Conan
text: She should want to see me. If I had said how I feel about her, she would miss me even more. All this time, I've been breaking her heart by keeping her wait, yet I can't still appear before her eyes. I never want to see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer exist in her heart. How immature of me, right?

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: The only ones that can miss a kick draw match are those who have enough courage to kick it.

author: Ai Haibara
title: Detective Conan
text: Flowers are fragile and ephemeral... Even if you meant to protect them with a surrounding fence from wind and rain, they would die without sunlight...and a spindly fence has no power against a strong wind. Are you fully aware of that, Kudo-kun?..

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: Even if you are facing a bitter aspect of life... Drugs and murder are foul, without any excuse. Deserve a red card, for a loser.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: There is only one truth.

title: Detective Conan

I've gone my whole life without being helped by anyone else, and I'll be damned if I'm gonna let you help me into my grave.

author: Mugen
title: Samurai Champloo

author: Mugen
title: Samurai Champloo

text: Forget all that formal crap 'bout comin' at me one at a time. I'll take all you bitches on!

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: You are a hateful woman. You oppose me to the very end. But I shall forgive you.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night

text: ...Yes, the desire to protect something... is, at the same time, none other than the wish for something to violate it.

title: Fate/stay night

title: Fate/stay night

author: Lancer
title: Fate/stay night

title: Fate/stay night
text: That's right! I admired his desire to save people because it was beautiful! But none of that feeling is my own! What else can you call it but hypocrisy?! I was driven by my obsessive need to help someone. I kept running, neither noticing the pain nor how wrong I was! But it's all a fake. Such hypocrisy can not save anything. No, first of all, I didn't even know what I wanted to save!

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text: Defying me till the very end, huh? But I'll forgive you. Some things are beautiful exactly because they are unobtainable.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: The weakness that had accepted death now became the strength of wanting to live.

author: Archer
title: Fate/stay night
text:
I am the bone of my sword. Steel is my body, and fire is my blood. I have created over a thousand blades. Unknown to death. Nor known to life. Have withstood pain to create many weapons. Yet, those hands will never hold anything. So as I pray,
'Unlimited Blade Works'

title: Fate/stay night
text: The things we can't obtain are the most beautiful ones.

author: Saber
title: Fate/stay night

title: Fate/stay night
text: Yes, I saw it over and over... Meaningless massacres. Meaningless suffering. Meaningless happiness! I was forced to watch it all. Even when I refused to look, it surrounded me. That isn't what I wished for! I didn't become a Guardian for this!

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: People die when they are killed.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: Do you have enough swords, King of Heroes?

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: It feels so close to me, yet I can't reach it even if I hold out my hands. But even if I can't reach it, there are things that will stay in my heart. Being in the same time and looking at the same sky – if I can remember that, then even if we are far apart, I believe we can still be together.

author: Emiya Shirou
title: Fate/stay night
text: Someday, my memories of her will fade. Her voice, her actions – I might forget them as well. But even then, I will always remember that I loved her.

text: You suddenly appeared in front of me in this hell. The day that I would get to meet you...I always wanted to apologize to you...I only endured because of that! I kept on living.

author: Lucy
title: Elfen Lied
text: I hate these horns.

title: Elfen Lied
text: When you are miserable, you need something that is even more miserable than you to feel good about yourself.

title: Elfen Lied
text: I was going to let you go. After all, there aren't many of us out there, but you're just such a pain in the ass.

author: Lucy
title: Elfen Lied
text: Everyone in this place is unhappy. And since they're unhappy, they're probably looking for someone worse off than they are.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: I was afraid of the me that didn't know what he wanted to do. And the days just keep on moving. But even then If I keep on going like this, will I be able to see it? Maybe someday.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: To have the one you think is your ideal self standing in front of you, it's tough...

title: Honey and Clover

title: Honey and Clover

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: When we were together, my heart felt tight, too tight to even drink water. If that's called love, then it was really just me who was in love. Just me.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: A day when everything is perfect, when everything will turn into memories, will eventually come.  But I'll probably remember over and over again you were there and everyone else was there. The day we all searched for just one thing.

author: Rika Harada
title: Honey and Clover
text: I pushed him away and hurt him yet he still stood by my side.  It's not a sane relationship. To be saved by seeing his hurt expression.

text: I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...

author: Ai Enma
title: Jigoku Shoujo
text: Pitiful shadow cloaked in darkness. Thy action cause men pain and suffering. Thy hollow soul drowns in thy sins. How would you like to see what death is like?

text: Yeah, it's still a nameless sniper. It's become quite a topic among us. She's still a cadet from the military academy, but at any rate she's got a good arm. text: A normal guy like me isn't going to be part of some "believe it or not" episode with nutcases like you guys!

text: Are you telling me to go back and put a corpse on trial?

text: If you use your head, you won't get fat even if you eat sweets.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Let me tell you about the difference between you and me. It's like the story of the monkey trying to capture the moon. However close he thinks he is to the moon, it's still just the reflection of the moon in the middle of the lake. No matter how he struggles to capture that "moon", he inevitably sinks to the bottom of that lake to no avail. You will never reach me.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: If the pride of a senshi means hurting each other, I don't want it. Nothing will come out of fighting. Fighting isn't the only way to solve things.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: One day, we will vanish. New senshi and new stars will be born. But you, Sailor Moon, you will forever be immortal. You will be the most beautiful star shining in the sky for eternity.

author: Maes Hughes
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: I'm as normal as they come and this is a contest of freaks! What do you want me to do, shoot my slingshot at him?

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: If your opponent is of choleric temper, seek to irritate.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: The great flow that maintains the universe, call it the cycle of life, the course of nature each one of us is just a small part of that part. One in the all. Yet without all the individual ones, the all can't exist. This world flows by following grander laws that we can't even imagine. To recognize that flow, to work in it. To decompose, and recreate, that is alchemy.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I wasn't always fighting for love and justice. I was fighting for my friends and loved ones.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Some memories... aren't meant to leave traces.

author: Kurogane
title: Tsubasa Reservoir Chronicle
text: Don't look back. If you got something to do, then only look forward.

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: [about Vash] The way he looked at me... it was as though he had shot the kid...

author: Meryl Stryfe
title: Trigun
text: Vash the Stampede... every time I observe his actions I can't help but sense something hidden deep within him, something we can't being to understand. But this much is certain: everyone who has become involved with him has somehow regained an emotion which was once lost.

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: I picked up my first gun at the age of seven. And I shot. I remember how strangely easy it was to pull the trigger. Ha. I actually laughed. Because that one shot was all that was needed to silence that sickening piece of garbage who had the nerve to call himself my guardian. Ha. It was that simple. And so I was free. Yes, tomorrow would be different. Hm. Tomorrow. As much as I wanted to believe, it only went from bad to worse. A vicious cycle... I didn't want other kids to grow up like me, so I started my own orphanage. It was gratifying work, I was actually doing something for the good of others. It was my place of peace and happiness... yet sometimes, I still think to myself "there's no place worse than this planet. It's horrible here."

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: NEEDLENOGGIN!

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: Dangerous toys are fun, but you can get hurt.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: Those who make mistakes blame themselves and close their hearts. It's impossible to fix the mistake. Men can't return to the past. That's why they drink. Lushes, drunks, sliding alcohol down their throats to try to dilute the memories that can't be forgotten. Frank Marlon, the gunsmith, does nothing but drink, and questions the glass after it's empty. "Am I wrong? Was I wrong?"

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: Come again, Needle Noggin?

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: [singing] Total slaughter, total slaughter. I won't leave a single man alive. La de da de die, genocide. La de da de dud, an ocean of blood. Let's begin the killing time.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: I meditate diligently every morning. The subject is Life and Love. I quit after three seconds.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: I don't let anyone in my sight get away, and my bullets never miss their mark. Especially if it's the heart of a beautiful lady... BANG.

author: Meryl Stryfe
title: Trigun
text: Does this man look like the legendary gunman Vash the Stampede? That droopy-eyed, weak-looking, bristle-headed, promiscuous-looking donut freak of a man?

author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood
title: Trigun
text: I always knew you were no mere mortal... but I had no idea that you were a cat.

author: Vash the Stampede
title: Trigun
text: Hey, "Thou Shalt Not Kill", remember? What kind of church man are you?

author: Naraku
title: Inuyasha
text: You're not as slow as you look, monk.

author: Naraku
title: Inuyasha
text: Well, well, if it isn't the holy monk.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: *to Inuyasha* Your stupidity knows no boundaries. Run and hide while you can.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: All that for a memory and a dead mortal girl. If I've known that this is all it took to make you fight, I would have killed her sooner. (to Inuyasha)

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: *to Inuyasha* You fight as though you're still a child.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: This scheme of yours is beneath me.  Should it fail, Jaken, you will die.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: *to Inuyasha* I quite miss you as well, little brother.

author: Sesshomaru
title: Inuyasha
text: Can it be that I'm afraid or is it merely I know not my own limit?

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: I wish for a heart. A heart of the man whom I'll never allow to forget me.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: Tragic he said. I'm tragic?

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: Stop coming after the jewel. I do not wish to waste more arrows.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: I despise you with my last breath. My spirit will not forget that all consuming hatred.  So long that you live, my spirit can not be free. *to Inuyasha*

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: You vile beast. I despise you. You loathsome half man.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Say please, before asking for favor.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: That's pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps. *to Kagome*

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Are you going to keep staring at me because it's ticking me off. If you got something to say, say it.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: It's nice not to be alone.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: He's thanking me? That can't be good. *about Inuyasha*

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: I was wrong, kill him.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: Maybe it's just the morning light, but he looks pretty cool standing there with his sword. *about Inuyasha*

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: You sent me into a battle armed with a mere hunch?

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I'd rather give up my eye, than give up his sword. Maybe I'm not so worthless after all.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Don't be stupid. You're just a human. So back off, shut up, and butt out. *to Kagome*

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: That's why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being protected by him.

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: Kagome, what do you have in your bag? Rocks?

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: Six innocent peasants down, hundreds of thousand more to go.

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: Aahhh someone saves me.

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: You shouldn't talk to yourself. People will wonder.

author: Shippou
title: Inuyasha
text: Why am I always the one handing out apologies?

author: Sango
title: Inuyasha
text: But is it necessary to keep stroking my leg while you talk. *to Miroku*

author: Miroku
title: Inuyasha
text: *while stomping on Inuyasha* Lay down, be silent, sleep, rest, sleep... how many times do I have to tell you...

author: Miroku
title: Inuyasha
text: This may come as something of a surprise, but I'm a sore loser.

author: Miroku
title: Inuyasha
text: You're a real sight for sore eyes. *to Kagome*

author: Miroku
title: Inuyasha
text: I must find a place to pawn this off.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: Someone the exact opposite of Inuyasha.  That's the perfect guy for me.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I didn't say get naked, stupid. I just can't stand seeing you in those clothes.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Think you're pretty smart, you old hag. (to Kaede)

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I would come up there and finish you off. If you didn't look half dead already.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: *guilty voice* Because of my carelessness Araragi-kun realized that his brain is slower than others.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: *to Araragi* A creature like you having a brain residing in his skull...is already a miracle in and of itself.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: *to Araragi* I'm suprised you know such useless things. This is the first time since birth that I've admired you.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: You.... Could it be that you're just an idiot? *to Senjougahara*

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I don't want that kind of twisted love.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: She's been like that ever since I bought a box of donuts and had one more than her.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: No one cares about Araragi-kun.

author: Meme Oshino
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I don't think much of you for sending a girl your age to the place where a wierd man lives.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Right now, I'm afraid of losing you. Although my life hasn't been very fortunate until now, I'm glad if I caught your eye because of that misfortune. Because of that, I was able to fall for you. So we'll definitely do something, but I want to wait just a bit. So, right now, the last thing I can offer you... Is this starry sky.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm worried about you. But if you don't come back I'll never forgive you.

author: Nadeko Sengoku
title: Bakemonogatari
text: You're all grown up, so you won't feel dirty looking at my body, right?

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Don't move. Oh, my bad. I mean, you can move if you want, but it'd be very dangerous.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: I told you, anything is OK, like saying you want me to end all my sentences with "nyu" for a week. Or that you want me to not wear underwear to school for a week. Or that you want me to wake you up every morning for a week, wearing nothing but an apron.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Anything at all. Just this once I'll fulfil whatever your wish is. Whether is world conquest, or eternal life, or to defeat the saiyans that are coming to earth.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Don't call me "this chick".

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: By the way, Araragi-kun... I've never broken up with a man before. Hence, I won't be breaking up with you either.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Come on. I don't like this trend of explaining anything and everything about my love life. It's impossible.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If anyone else kills you, I'll kill that person.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Being kind to everyone, simply means there's no one special.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: No one's gonna save me. People just accept help selfishly, for their own sake.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Even crabs have to go on a journey sometime.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: You've got nice solid childbearing hips, so I think you're sure to have healthy babies. Uwehehehe

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: And, Araragi-kun....I love you.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Sunday, May 14th at 14:15:30--the moment I got Senjōgahara's phone number.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I fail to make my every-minute reports, a gang of 5,000 brutes will attack your whole family.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: My abusive language is alchemized through 40 kg copper, 25 kg of zinc, 15 kg of nickel, 5 kg of ice that keeps my cool, and 97 kg of spite.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Fine. I'll correct myself. I have no experience. I'm a virgin. More to the point, the only kind of girl who'd talk to an unappealing virgin like you are late-bloomer virgins like me!

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Idiot! Don't spit while you talk! Your virginity might be contagious!

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I may suggest, I recommend my waking you up every morning wearing nothing but an apron. Then I can cook you breakfast. Isn't it a man's fantasy to watch that from behind?

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Is that so? Then I'll just use "pathetic" next time.

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: The word "ignorant" has a nice ring to it, so I don't mind being called that, but "incompetent" is going just a bit too far...

author: Koyomi Araragi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: There stood a high school boy, who for selfish reasons had twice beaten an elementary school girl unconscious, and had gotten all nihistically worked up about it. Actually, that's still me.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: Copper, 40g; Zinc, 25g; Nickel, 15g; Hiding Embarrassment, 5g and Spite, 97kg.

author: Senjougahara Hitagi
title: Bakemonogatari
text: If I kill you, that means I'll be the one closest to you when you're on your deathbed. Isn't it romantic?

author: Wakashi Hiyoshi
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Gekokujou.

author: Conrad Weller
title: Kyo kara Maoh!
text: Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us.

author: Conrad Weller
title: Kyo kara Maoh!
text: [To Yuuri Shibuya] Does your Majesty believe in Time? Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us. During the 15 years that I waited for your Majesty to grow up and for the day when you would come to this world, Time gave me happiness every day. And after you came to this world... This is my conclusion, made during all the time that I have been with you.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Sorry, I saw an opening that just screamed 'ATTACK,' so I did, ha!

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Kakarot! Dodge this next attack, if you can!.. But even if I miss you... THIS WHOLE PLANET'S GOING UP IN SMOOOOKE!

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: [Vegeta's last thought before he dies fighting Majin Buu] Bulma, Trunks. This is for you.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: What's wrong Frieza? Is your brain another one of your weak and under used muscles?

author: Krillin
title: Dragon Ball
text: Hey hun! I've got a great idea, let's trade! Yo take my spot and I'll fight Hercule!

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: My ears do more than just frame my face.

author: Android 17
title: Dragon Ball
text: Tell me, are all you Saiyans so full of yourselves? Is this how you hide your incompetence? We androids will always be superior to your kind.

author: Android 17
title: Dragon Ball
text: [clapping] A beautiful speech, I can see it now, you truly are a prince with the royal blood of a Saiyan.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: How can androids have babies?

author: Trunks Brief
title: Dragon Ball
text: Father, you're so tough and proud, hard and cold like a rock. But still, deep down, your heart beats like mine does... I know you feel... I'm your son and I will always love you.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: While I was with you guys, I became more human. I didn't like that. I even have a family and started to like living on earth.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Trunks, I never hugged you as a baby... let me hug you.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster. (To Frieza)

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Don't remind me. I'm mad enough to hurt somebody and pounding you just might be the therapy I need.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Let me ask you. Does a machine like yourself ever experience fear?

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: I'm not going to lie to you, Vegeta, although the answer may be difficult for you to hear. This is the truth. Goku devoted his life to protecting the lives of other. Because of his selflessness, when he died, he was allowed to keep his body and travel to King Kai's Planet. You, on the other hand, have spent your life in pursuit of your own selfish desires. You've caused too much pain. When you die, you will not receive the same reward.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: I could go one step farther if I wanted to.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Not bad, for an early prototype.

author: Piccolo
title: Dragon Ball
text: Even with the energy you took from me, my power is still far greater than your own.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: You never thought to kill, or fight for revenge. Only to test your limits, and to push yourself beyond them, to become the strongest you could possibly be. How can a Saiyan fight like that, and at the same time be so gentle that he wouldn't hurt a fly? It makes me angry just thinking about it. But perhaps it is my anger that has made me blind to the truth for so long. I see it now. This day has made it all too clear. You're better than me, Kakarot. You are the best...

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: Are you ready now, to witness a power not seen for thousands of years?

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: It looks like they only want me, and that's exactly who they'll get.

author: Vegeta
title: Dragon Ball
text: You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keep... his PRIDE!

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: That's what you think, Captain Cocky!

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Well, this blows.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: We'd rather die than abandon our comrade!!!

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: Sorry, but it doesn't matter if you're a woman or even a child... I don't go easy on anybody who hurts my nakama.

author: Gray Fullbuster
title: Fairy Tail
text: I am an ice sculpture mage. I can make anything.

author: Erza Scarlet
title: Fairy Tail
text: It is always sad to part with those whom you love, but your companions will help you bear that sadness.

author: Gajeel Redfox
title: Fairy Tail
text: Keeheehe. I like him. I'm going to make him my cat.

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: What's the point of magic to begin with... if I can't use it to protect my friends?

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
text: It's not a crime! Caring about your friends is not a crime!

author: Lucy Heartfilia
title: Fairy Tail
