text: Stellar Spirits are not "Shields".

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Why do you find it easy to kill? These are lives dammit!

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: Mages of Fairy Tail... specialize in property damage!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: To become Hokage is my dream!

author: Roy Mustang
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.

author: Tezuka Kunimitsu
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: The ones who suffer from the loss of the game, become stronger. They will challenge us by throwing away everything like their pride and past glories.

author: Cho Hakkai
title: Saiyuki
text: Even if you destroy the world, the world you wish for won't come.

author: Krillin
title: Dragon Ball
text: It looked like it was going to be germ warfare, but the Bacterian fight got me ready for that.

author: Krillin
title: Dragon Ball
text: First it was that sewer-face and now I'm up against a superhero.

author: Bulma
title: Dragon Ball
text: Yamcha, I was worried about you. For all I knew, you were dead in a ditch in a country you can't pronounce. You'll have to make this up to me. And you're going to enjoy it.

author: Krillin
title: Dragon Ball
text: (after Goku moves a huge boulder all by himself) Krillin wants everybody to know he's speechless right now.

author: Krillin
title: Dragon Ball
text: (after Master Roshi tells him they have to dig in a farm) First we're the milkmen, and now we're stinkin' farmers. We never did this in Orin Temple.

author: Master Roshi
title: Dragon Ball
text: But, you will not go in there with hopes of winning the tournament the first time you compete. To do so would be arrogant! And arrogance is for fools, not warriors! So you will enter the tournament with the sole purpose of improving your fighting skills.

author: Master Roshi
title: Dragon Ball
text: (Master Roshi is reaching for Launch's buttocks as Krillin barges in and makes him angry) Do you time this?

author: Bulma
title: Dragon Ball
text: Look Goku, you can go out in public and have your hair sticking out in every direction if you want to, but not me!

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Hey! It looks like now is a good time to do a little tail fishing!

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Where is your tail? (Searching for tail in Bulma's butt)

author: Galatea
title: Claymore
text: This might come a little late but... you people make me sick.

author: Galatea
title: Claymore
text: Don't cry. It will make your face even uglier.

author: Galatea
title: Claymore
text: Looks like most of what you say immediately vanishes from your head once you say it. I really envy you for a brain with such a lively metabolism.

author: Riful
title: Claymore
text: Sorry... I really... want to let you savor your moment of glory a little longer. But I really can't be having this. After all is said and done... he is still my man after all.

author: Riful
title: Claymore
text: My goal isn't your death. I will just torture you, make you awaken and then make you my friends!

author: Riful
title: Claymore
text: Being thrown away by humans, devoted to them even though you aren't one of them... and once they are finished with you, they have you end your life yourself... and not even an ounce of gratitude for all that. On the contrary: for your whole life you are hated and reviled. It really is idiotic. We are a different species after all. Once you start seeing things that way, it all becomes very easy to accept. Do humans shed tears for the birds, pigs, cows and sheep that become their food? Of course they don't. They are a different species after all. That is nature. That is the truth. That is Providence. Your way of thinking up to now was the warped one.

author: Irene
title: Claymore
text: Live, Clare! Your staying alive is the only proof that Teresa ever existed.

author: Irene
title: Claymore
text: Teresa had plenty of chances to kill Priscilla. The reason she didn't was that after being with you, Teresa's heart lost the toughness of a warrior. The Teresa I knew would have dispatched Priscilla without hesitation at their first encounter. After she met you, she was no longer fit for battle. That's why she died. That's the truth. But I think Teresa was happy.

author: Irene
title: Claymore
text: Seeing the same thing at that time and place, either moving forward or running away... I suppose that's what separates those who are fit for battle from those who are not.

author: Ophelia
title: Claymore
text: [Last words] Well done. You win. As promised, I entrust you with everything. After all I can't do any more at this point anyways. Man, this really annoys me. I really hate people, who put their life on the line like you. Now quickly, finish me off. If you don't hurry, I'll regenerate again. Since you will be fighting in my stead, I won't stand for it if you lose, understand?

author: Ophelia
title: Claymore
text: The idea that you can't die yet because you still have something to protect... that is the foolish illusion of the weak.

author: Ophelia
title: Claymore
text: This is called the "Rippling Sword". "Rippling Ophelia"... Great name, don't you think? But it's not too well known yet. Because most of the people who've seen it are dead.

author: Ophelia
title: Claymore
text: Really! How marvellous! You two are simply marvellous. Which one of you should I kill? Which one of you would be more fun to watch as you wail in agony?

author: Ophelia
title: Claymore
text: Don't you think it's beautiful? That rosy red that spreads only where the body is wounded. Shall I paint you in that lovely red... little boy?

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: [Last words] All right then, I'll put you out of your misery. [Her hands are sliced off] Eh?

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: You can come after me as many times as you want. I'll cut you down every time.

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: Say your prayers, wretches. Filth like you is even lower than Yoma. I'm going to kill... every last one of you.

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: This little girl, who's not even half my size... taught me that tears can flow even from these silver eyes.

author: Teresa
title: Claymore
text: Even if it's a rule... whether or not I follow it is up to me. Whether I obey the rule or break it and get killed by my comrades... is my choice.

author: Clare
title: Claymore
text: Don't be so quick to throw away your life. No matter how disgraceful or embarrassing it may be, you need to keep struggling to find your way out until the very end.

author: Clare
title: Claymore
text: You said I should have forgotten everything and lived as a human, but... there's no way I could do that. At that time, Teresa was everything to me. Everything I lost... my life, my voice, even my joy in living... Teresa gave those back to me. Teresa gave me everything. So I had no choice but to move forward. I wasn't strong enough to forget all that and continue living.

author: Clare
title: Claymore
text: My existence was nothing more to her than a stone by the side of the road. I wasn't enough to fill her belly. Or perhaps I didn't even get reflected in her eyes. I couldn't even hate the beast that killed Teresa. It was me, overcome by fear, that I could not forgive.

author: Johann Faust VIII
title: Shaman King
text: It's okay. There's no pain. [something snaps inside Morty] Oops! [grins maniacally at Yoh] I'm sorry.

author: Yoh Asakura
title: Shaman King
text: No one can predict the future, so it's pointless to fear the unknown.

author: Anna Kyoyama
title: Shaman King
text: I don't wear these beads just to make a fashion statement. These are my spirit beads - my link to the afterlife.

author: RYU
title: Shaman King
text: Boys, am I not always telling you to get in touch with your feelings, your inner gangster? Okay, actually I don't care about your feelings, never did, never will.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: I will protect Hinamori.

author: Natsu Dragneel
title: Fairy Tail
text: I love adventures.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: I'm the afro-hair guy.

author: Nico Robin
title: One Piece
text: They call me the "demon child".

author: Franky
title: One Piece
text: I am crazy and stubborn.

author: Tony Tony Chopper
title: One Piece
text: I want a devil fruit.

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: I'm the smartest member in the Straw Hat group.

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: I'm the sniper king, sogeking.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Black leg!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I'm a pirate hunter.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: There is something mysterious about the life of a pirate.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Even if I DO sacrifice my own life, I will only do it to save my friends.

author: Mikami Teru
title: Death Note
text: Kira is a god.

author: Kiyomi Takada
title: Death Note
text: I am Light's girlfriend from university.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: I love chocolates.

author: Rem (Death Note)
title: Death Note
text: I am a complete opposite of Ryuk.

author: Misa Amane
title: Death Note
text: I am a famous model.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: I stole a death note.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I have a mind of a genius and a strong sense of justice.

author: Tao Len
title: Shaman King
text: *referring to Jun* Look at her! Because she hasn't got any boyfriends around she fawns all over her guardian ghost.

author: Horohoro
title: Shaman King
text: What are you talking about, Ryu?! That's no damsel, that's a dude!

author: RYU
title: Shaman King
text: When you get a piece of Ryu you get the whole pie!

author: Yoh Asakura
title: Shaman King
text: There is no sense in worrying about something you cannot control, so why bother?

author: Manta Oyamada
title: Shaman King
text: Don't enter a mans bath like that!!!

author: Yoh Asakura
title: Shaman King
text: Many things can be achieved, as long as you believe in it.

author: Tao Len
title: Shaman King
text: Are you a coward...OR ARE YOU A MAN OF AMERICA?!

author: Johann Faust VIII
title: Shaman King
text: I'm Faust VIII, your opponent. Please be gentle.

author: Johann Faust VIII
title: Shaman King
text: How rude! You knocked his block off, and you didn't even have the courtesy to yell 'Heads up'!

author: Johann Faust VIII
title: Shaman King
text: And now it's time for formal introductions. Eliza, my darling, meet Yoh Asakura. Yoh Asakura, meet your doom!

author: Tao Len
title: Shaman King
text: Your friend thinks he can win the prize crown, but he has no hope whatsoever. He is a mere shadow of a true shaman and he will be the first in a long line to perish in my hands.

author: Johann Faust VIII
title: Shaman King
text: Let's see what kind of heart you have!

author: Amidamaru
title: Shaman King
text: I will stay by your side, my friend. Know that I am here, and that I am sorry. I am sorry that... I failed you. After waiting 600 years I made a beginner's mistake. I underestimated my enemy.

author: Manta Oyamada
title: Shaman King
text: [thinking] Step awaaaay from the psycho...

author: Manta Oyamada
title: Shaman King
text: That was the sound of the last train back to my house. And once again, I missed it. Our English class always gets out late on Tuesdays, so I have to walk home. But that's OK, because I like English. And the walk home's not so bad. Usually.

author: Yoh Asakura
title: Shaman King
text: The easiest way to test a person's real ability is under extreme conditions. Therefore, it's appropriate to choose the Shaman King through fighting.

author: Anna Kyoyama
title: Shaman King
text: *to Yoh* Because I aim to be the First Lady of the shaman world... You will become Shaman King, whether you want to or not.

author: Manta Oyamada
title: Shaman King
text: *referring to Yoh* [annoyed] Why does he always seem so carefree? He doesn't study... He listens to his favorite music... He even watches the rivers and stars!.. I wish I could live like that...

author: Bismarck Waldstein
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Strength that knows no boundaries is merely violence.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Only once every hundred years can a Firebender experience this kind of power.

author: Roku
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: If I had been more decisive, and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin, and stopped the war before it started. I offer you this wisdom, Aang, you must be decisive.

author: King Bumi
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I didn't know what or when, but I knew I'd know it when I knew it!

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I am not Toph! I am Melon Lord! (Toph laughs maniacally)

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air, water, earth, fire- (grabs a bunch of leaves) fan, and sword! (his leaf limps)

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *referring to the man that took her mothers life* I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him. But... I couldn't. I don't know if it's because I'm too weak to do it, or if it's because I'm strong enough not to.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: (to Katara) I know who killed your mother.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The past can be a great teacher. (trips over a wire, opens a spike trap, and manages to blow himself over it just in time and looks back fearfully) Zuko? I think the past is trying to kill me!

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: (to himself, after revealing to Aang that he was the one who sent Combustion Man) Ugh, why do I have to be so stupid? How could I tell them that I sent an assassin after them? Couldn't I say that Azula did it? They would've believed that! Stupid! (Hits his head)

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Uh, Toph, I think your feet need their eyes checked.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: (gazing at Zuko with a dark look) You might have everyone else buying your... "transformation", but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past. So let me tell you something right now. You make one step backward, one slip up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore. Because I'll make sure your destiny ends, right then and there. Permanently. (exits the room, leaving Zuko shocked)

author: Shinobu Takatsuki
title: Junjou Romantica
text: To be loved out of sympathy is more devastating than to be rejected.

author: Yoh Miyagi
title: Junjou Romantica
text: I wonder... isn't it that when you become an adult, you have freedom to explore such a large world. I wonder why is it I feel that the world is so constricted at this moment.

author: Yoh Miyagi
title: Junjou Romantica
text: Why is it that I'm anxious when I love him?.. No. I love him, that's why I'm anxious. It's because I love you that even if I take off the armor I've worn all my life, I'll still chase after you.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: I'd been wondering all this time, whether there's any meaning to a failed love. Is it something that will disappear, the same as something that never existed. Now I know, there is meaning...there was a meaning...right here.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: To cry because there is something you want to do and to cry because you can't find it. Which is more painful? The only thing I can say is even with all the words I have now, I can't stop her tears.

author: Yuuta Takemoto
title: Honey and Clover
text: To wish for your own happiness is sometimes coupled with another's unhappiness. Since I couldn't pray for my own happiness, I prayed to the moon in the night sky for the happiness of the one whose warm hand I held.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Why am I so bad at being good?

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Please tell me you're here because the Firelord is a big wimp and you didn't need to take him down.

author: Pathik
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Chakras, chakras, everybody loves chakras! Chakras, chakras! Chakra sandwich tastes good! Yum!

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You're not the only one who draws power from the moon. (Hama is shocked that Katara managed to resist her bloodbending) My bending Hama, is more powerful than yours. Your technique is useless on me! (draws water from the ground and forms a ring around herself before directing it at Hama)

author: Sozin
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: With Roku gone and the Great Comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad so I wiped out the Air Temples, but somehow the new Avatar eluded me. I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. I know he's hiding out there somewhere: the Fire Nation's greatest threat, the last Airbender.

author: Sozin
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Without you, all my plans are suddenly possible. I have a vision for the future, Roku.

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: (Zuko is standing before a huge portrait of Fire Lord Sozin)It's never too early for a sitting with the court painter, Zuko. (Sarcastically) Make sure he gets your good side.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Bad skin?! Normal teenagers worry about bad skin, I don't have that luxury. My father decided to teach me a permanent lesson... ON MY FACE!

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [after winning a game of beach volleyball/"Kuai Ball"] Yes! We defeated you for all time! You will never rise from the ashes of your shame and humiliation! [pause] Well, that was fun.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Ladies and gentlemen, THE FLAMEO'S!

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, "stay flamin'!"

author: Ty Lee
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Nice speech, Azula! It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way!

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I've seen enough of Ba Sing Sei. And I can't even see!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Looks like Long Feng is long gone! (laughs) Oh, I've been waiting to use that one!

author: Pathik
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I know I am not the person you expected...and I did not expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now.

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Don't you know that fans only make flames stronger?

author: Ty Lee
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [Ty Lee unleashes a furry of jabs into the back of a Kyoshi warrior, dropping her, and unleashes a final taunt] You are not prettier than we are.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: It's always best to believe in one's self but with a little help from others can be a great blessing!

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You call it dirt. I call it a healthy coating of earth.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text:
(singing) Leaves from the vine
Falling so slow
Like fragile tiny shells
Drifting in the foam.
Little soldier boy
Come marching homeBrave soldier boy
Comes marching home...

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: It won't work. You country-bumpkins will stand out a mile. [Eats food with her hands]

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but (sniffs) it's just so sad!

author: Ty Lee
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [looking through a periscope at the dust cloud Toph made] Hey... Look at that dust cloud. It's so...poofy! [Mimes by closing and opening her hand] Poof!

author: Mai
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *referring to Azula* She can shoot all the lightning she wants at me, I'm not going into that wall sludge juice. [shudders]

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it tastes like sand. I never thought I would miss the taste of mud so much.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I'm going to spend my vacation AT THE LIBRARY!

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Gooood morning earth-bending student!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Aang, this is my friend Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Aang.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [yelling angrily toward the sky] You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it, and now I can give it back! Come on! STRIKE ME! You've never held back before!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [aiming at a small prey animal] You're awfully cute, but unfortunately for you, you're made of meat.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The stars sure are beautiful tonight. [angrily] Too bad you can't see them, Toph!

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Azula always lies, Azula always lies.

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Somebody's a little light on his feet. What's your fighting name, the Fancy Dancer?

author: Toph Bei Fong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [after Aang enters the ring] Do people really want to see TWO little girls fighting out here?

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [after finding his stolen boomerang] Boomerang! You do always come back!

author: Mai
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [About Omashu] There really is no fathoming the depths of my hatred for this place.

author: Mai
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Azula] Please tell me you're here to kill me.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: No! Bad Fire Nation baby!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Look, I hate to be the wet blanket here, but since Katara's busy, I guess it's up to me.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You make a fine octopus, Pupil Aang.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [as Zhao threatens the moon spirit] Whatever you do to that spirit, I'll unleash on you tenfold! Let it go now!

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to an unconscious Aang] I finally have you. But I can't get you home because of this blizzard. There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight, and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Katara] You rise with the moon. I rise with the sun.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [after Princess Yue unexpectedly kisses him] Okay, now I'm really confused. Happy, but confused.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I laugh at gravity all the time. Hahaha, gravity...

author: Jeong Jeong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: To master the bending disciplines you must first master discipline itself, but you have no interest in this so I have no interest in you.

author: Jeong Jeong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Water brings healing and life. But fire brings only destruction and pain. It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor's edge between humanity and savagery. Eventually, we are torn apart.

author: Jeong Jeong
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Destiny? What would a boy know of destiny? If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny? No! Only that it runs on and on out of his control. He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end. He cannot imagine the ocean.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You want to walk into a Fire Nation town when they're all fired up with their, you know, fire?

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Zuko] You know what the worst part of being born over a hundred years ago is? I miss all the friends I used to hang out with. Before the war started, I used to always visit my friend Kuzon. The two of us, we'd get in and out of so much trouble together. He was one of the best friends I ever had, and he was from the Fire Nation just like you. If we knew each other back then, do you think we could have been friends too?

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: That's how Sokka started. Now look at him! He thinks he's an Earthbender!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I'm too young to die!

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Sokka, you're supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent. You know, so we don't get rained on?

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [soothing Appa] Sokka's just jealous 'cause he doesn't have an arrow.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Katara* Try to understand. I need to capture him to restore something I've lost. [Katara jerks her head away from Zuko] Perhaps in exchange, I can restore something you've lost.

author: Anissina von Karbelnikoff
title: Kyo kara Maoh!
text: The disturbance in the stitch, is a disturbance in the heart.

author: Gian Carlo
title: Lucky Dog
text: I like playing with my hair.

author: Gian Carlo
title: Lucky Dog
text: I'm a devilish and talented butler.

author: Gian Carlo
title: Lucky Dog
text: La lang natamad na ako.

author: Motoharu Yano
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: Listen carefully because I'm only gonna say this once, I love you.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *singing* It's a long long way to BaSingSei, but the girls in the city they look so pretty~!

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The coin is appreciated...but not as much as your smile.

author: King Bumi
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Aang* You need to find someone who WAITS and LISTENS before striking.

author: King Bumi
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Neutral Jing is the key to earthbending. It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *talking about King Bumi* This isn't about finding a teacher. This is about finding my friend.

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: A small mistake can make a huge difference.

author: Sai
title: Naruto
text: The best way to escape reality without running is smiling even if it is obviously fake.

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: It's always a lot more easier to let something fall apart than it is to try to hold it together.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Learn to treasure your life because unfortunately, it can be taken away from you anytime.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: I don't care how pathetic or embarassing I look in front of everyone. My love for him...only that...is my bitter sweet treasure.

author: Takumi Nomiya
title: Honey and Clover
text: ‎[to Takumi Myama] Why are you blocking us when you have someone else that you like? We can easily see her feelings towards you so there's no way you haven't realized what's there. Yet you just leave the situation half-finished. Aren't you just saving her for when things don't work out with your favorite?

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: Its ony one simple thing, but why do I feel like forever I cannot reach it. Only keep on and on, staying at the same spot.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Look what I found! These are packue berries, known to cure the poison of the white jade plant... THAT, or makaoli berries that cause blindness.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Hmm... *puts on a happy face* Delectable tea... *changes to serious face* or deadly poison?..

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Zuko* You're looking at the rare white dragon bush. It's leaves make a tea sooo delicious, it's heartbreaking... THAT, or it's the white jade bush, which is poisonous.

author: Roku
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: In the avatar state... You're at your most powerful, but you're also...at your most vulnerable. If you're killed in the avatar state, the reincarnation cycle will be broken and the avatar will cease to exist.

author: Roku
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The avatar state is a defense mechanism - designed to empower you with all the skills and knowledge of the past avatars. The glow is the combination of all your past lives. Focusing their energy to your body.

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Zuko* Why would father want YOU back? Except to lock you up where you can no longer embarrass him!

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Zuko* You know, father blames uncle for the loss of north pole... and he considers YOU a miserable failure for not finding the avatar.

author: Azula
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [sarcastically] In my country, we exchange a pleasant "hello" before asking questions.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: *to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Are you stupid?

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Don't you faint on me, you stupid girl.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Windscar!

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Hey, Shippo. Your village called.They're asking for their idiot!

author: Naraku
title: Inuyasha
text: I am not going to kill you - I am going to break you.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: [with a bow and arrow ready to fire] Not as pretty as his, huh? What would you know about it? You live in a time where they don't even have SHAMPOO.

author: Kagome Higurashi
title: Inuyasha
text: [repeatedly] Inuyasha, sit, boy.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Mighty Katara..? I like that.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Who knew that floating on a piece of drift wood for three weeks with no food or water... and sea volchers waiting to pluck out your liver could make one so tense.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I was in the avatar state... But I was outside my body watching myself. It was scary. I was scary...

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: There are reasons each of us are born. We have to find those reasons.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Zuko about Aang] It was not by chance that for generations people have been searching for him, and now you have found him.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *to Aang* Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: You are not the man you used to be. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you ever used to be. And now you have come at the crossroads of destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Iroh, while he's bathing] Enough. we need to leave now! Get out of the water.

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child of my water tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders. Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless. Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend, but they can't take away your courage and it is your courage they should truly fear! Because it runs deeper than any mine you've been forced to dig, any ocean that keeps you far from home. It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are, hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away. The time to fight back is now! I can tell you the Avatar has returned! So remember your courage, earthbenders, let us fight for our freedom!

author: King Bumi
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: The guards will show you to your chamber. The one that used to be the bad chamber, until the recent refurbishing that is. Of course, we've been calling it the new chamber, but we really should number them. Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad!

author: King Bumi
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: There's an airbender in our presence and not just any airbender, the Avatar! Now what do you have to say for yourself, Mr. Pipinpadaloxicopolis?!

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *referring to Sokka* He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Relax, Sokka. Where we're going, you won't need any pants!

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: Simple: girls are better at fixing pants than guys, and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. It's just the natural order of things.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: This whole Avatar thing... maybe the monks made a mistake.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *after Zuko defeats Zhao* So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat? Disgraceful. Even in exile, my nephew is more honorable than you. Thanks again for the tea. It was delicious. [Iroh and Zuko leaves]

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to himself as he chops at the ice] I'm just a guy with a boomerang. I didn't ask for all this flying and magic.

author: Iroh
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: *after meeting Aang for the first time* Good news for the Fire Lord. The nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [after Zuko calls him a child] Well, you're just a teenager.

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Aang, who is playing around] Stop! Stop it right now! What's wrong with you? We don't have time for fun and games with the war going on.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Katara] If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.

author: Aang
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [to Katara] Come... closer... closer... Will you go penguin sledding with me?

author: Sokka
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: [sarcastically, after Aang tells him about his flying bison] Right, and this is Katara, my flying sister.

author: Zuko
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: I don't need any calming tea! I need to capture the Avatar!

author: Katara
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
text: My grandmother used to tell me stories about the old days, a time of peace when the Avatar kept balance between the Water Tribes, Earth Kingdom, Fire Nation, and Air Nomads. But that all changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, only he could stop the ruthless firebenders. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years have passed and the Fire Nation is nearing victory in the war. Two years ago, my father and the men of my tribe journeyed to the Earth Kingdom to help fight against the Fire Nation, leaving me and my brother to look after our tribe. Some people believe that the Avatar was never reborn into the Air Nomads and that the cycle is broken, but I haven't lost hope. I still believe that somehow...the Avatar will return to save the world.

author: Keigo Atobe
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Ore-sama no bigi ni yoi na!

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: All humans die the same, the place they go after death isn't decided upon by a god it is Mu (nothingness).

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: It's impossible to feel exactly the same as someone else... but when you both care for each other, your hearts are able to draw a little closer together. I think that's what it means to make your hearts as one.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: There's a lot of products that you can buy with money...but my love is the only limited product that only you can have.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: There was no place for me, so I had to make one for myself, and then I realized, I had a place, but I was the only one in it. I didn't know any other way to live.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: I've heard similar threats from a number of poor fools whose memories I keep alive by dancing on their tombstones!

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.

author: Kikyo
title: Inuyasha
text: To live is to die, to die is to live. Pure is unpure, unpure is pure.

author: Tezuka Kunimitsu
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Yudan sezu ni ikkou.

author: Ryoma Echizen
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: Mada mada dane.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: If history repeats itself, and moves in a circular path, then believing that whatever force is turning it is perfect, is all we can do as we move ahead. Pushed along by forces beyond our control, waiting, for the blade to be swung.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: If I really liked him I should hope for his happiness. But like you said in the car, I actually hoped they would break up.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: The person you like the most, likes you back the most. It seems so simple. But why is it? It feels like it will never come together...forever like this...

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: So shut up about "destiny" and...how people can't change! 'Cause... unlike me... you're not a "failure".

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Sasuke, I always knew you were alone. In the beginning I was glad because I thought you were like me - I wanted to talk to you! But you... didn't speak. You always had everyone watching you. You could do everything and we were too different. So I decided that you would become my rival. I didn't want to lose because I was called a loser all the time. Even when we became Team 7, I still thought this way. I always tried to lie but... but the truth is... I always wanted to be like you. I aspired to be like you. Because of that... I was glad that you wanted to fight me.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: When I'm with Iruka-sensei, I think if that's what having a father is like... *to Sasuke* When I'm with you, I think if that's what having a brother is like.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Sakura-chan, you sure do love Sasuke, don't you?

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: DYNAMIC ENTRY!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: [after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Hmhmhmhm, I think I will play with you a bit before killing you!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Hmm... Itachi... it would be annoying if he moved around a lot. Perhaps we should cut off a leg or two?

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: I'll enjoy shaving you to death.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: [after Naruto does his Shadow Clone Jutsu] Oh, there sure is a lot of garbage scattered around here. But, trash is just trash after all. It simply needs to be cleaned up.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I've been wondering... There must be a purpose for people being born into this world. Why are we here? What does it mean? I've been thinking about it a lot lately. I realized that finding our purpose IS the meaning. That's why we're here. And the ones who find it... They're the only ones who are truly free.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: *referring to Orochimaru* I am not his pawn..! He is the one, the only one who ever gave my life meaning!! But how could the likes of you EVER UNDERSTAND THAT?!?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: I see...since I am no longer going to be Lord Orochimaru's vessel, my duty is to protect the vessel.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: You've only seen one of my dances.

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Lets see, how should I kill you?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: [to the Sound Ninja Four] Which do you prefer? To die, or to obey?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?

author: Kimimaro
title: Naruto
text: If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Akamaru, what's wrong boy? Have you forgotten my scent? We've always been together haven't we? We grew up together. Akamaru please, somewhere in there, there has to be a part of you that remembers. Show me that you remember. AKAMARU! Forgive me. Can you? I know that I've brought you nothing but pain and suffering. I broke my word. I swore I'd always protect you. Akamaru I'm sorry. Sorry I wasn't a better master. I'm here. Here for you. Forever.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: I called you an idiot, idiot!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: It's not bad enough they buried us alive in the oversized dung heap, but now they're stealing our chakra. You gotta give these guys credit for thoroughness!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: A wall's a wall and there's no wall I can't punch a hole through!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Hinata, untie the ropes before you faint.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: I must be a pretty pathetic owner for you to have bitten me, Akamaru....

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: [Thinking] What a sucker. He doesn't know I can re-establish control over my puppet within a blink of an eye. It's what makes me an expert puppet master. And so what if Crow's body is out of commission? I don't need his body. Every part of him is a lethal weapon. [To Shino] Looks like you underestimated me, bug boy. For the last time! There's enough poison on that to drop an elephant, so you're dead.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: But I want to play around before some noisy people come!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, I probably couldn't have stopped him, either.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I don't know what this boy means to you, Gai, but I shouldn't have to tell you that we never bring our personal feelings into play. I didn't think you were capable of it.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I've lived longer than you. And times have been bad. I know the pain of loss. You and I haven't really been fortunate. It's true. But it could be worse. For me, and for you, too... We've found good friends, haven't we? Because of your losses, you should understand.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: [thinking] If I'm still sane by the time I finish their training it'll be a miracle!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I will show you my own move.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: A ninja must see underneath the underneath.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: [about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Mm, she's strong and scary. I bet she's single.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: [About Naruto] Well that's typical. Not happy unless he's giving people a heart attack.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: [when Naruto transforms into a woman in front of the whole class] CUT THE STUPID TRICKS! THIS IS YOUR LAST WARNING!!

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: [as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, and I'm the son of those heroes! If I cry, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: It seems like the small leaves in the Village of Konoha have inherited that "will of fire" you spoke of, Third. The fire on the leaves will eventually burn greater and stronger... It will flash its light and protect this village.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: When a person dies, he disappears, along with his past, current lifestyle, and his future. Many people die in missions and wars. They die easily and in surprisingly simple ways. Hayate was one of them. Those who die have goals and dreams. But everyone has something as important as those. Parents, siblings, friends, lovers... people who are important to you. They trust and help each other. The bond between the people important to you ever since birth and the string that binds them becomes thicker and stronger as time goes by... It's beyond reason. Those bound to you by that string will do that because it is important.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: Billboard brow!!!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: Oh, I'm sorry. Her head's so empty, so I mistook her for a vase and put flowers in her. You might want to spit that out quick, though. Those can be quite poisonous.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing...that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands... But don't you see? It's an empty existence... to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: That is when I realized that in all of the world no one needed me. I was alone.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: I'm sure that the boy I killed, who shared that skill, must also have grown up knowing the pain of which I speak. We are special. We are powerful. And we are feared.

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: I want to make his dreams come true...

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: Is there... somebody precious to you?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born... in order to become the world's strongest shinobi... I became the incarnation of sand...

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!! MY BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: People cannot win against their loneliness.

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: [When Ino visits him in the hospital] Hehe. I'm also the type that gets girls to visit him. Take that, Shikamaru!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: This punch is heavier than life itself!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: Chubbies rule!

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: *to Ichigo* I thought you were interesting before, but now you're just a creepy kid.

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: There ain't a single coward who'd turn tail and run from just that! Not among the men of the Shiba clan!

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: *to Ichigo, after he released his bankai for the first time* What is that? Are you saying that this small thing is a bankai? Isn't it just the sealed form of your zanpakutō? I see. First the execution, and now Bankai. I can see that you enjoy treading on our pride. Very well, then. I will carve into your body...The punishment for injuring our pride!

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Though you fight a fierce battle on the outside, your inner world trembles not the slightest.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: To fight...Or to live...Choose.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo... I hate the rain. Rain falls in this world, too. When your heart is in chaos, this sky becomes clouded. When you are sad, rain falls so terribly easy. Can you understand...the horrible feeling of being pelted by rain when you're all alone in this solitary world? If only to stop that rain, I shall lend you any strength. If you trust in me, I won't let a single drop of rain fall from that sky. Ichigo, trust me...you are not fighting alone.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Just how many times must I strain my voice before it will reach you? And yet, nowhere in this world can there be anyone who knows me better than you.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: *referring to Ichigo* I see. So I still haven't reached you...

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: [When she hops into the bath with Ichigo, but in cat form] What? Are you a little disappointed? Come on, be honest. You are, aren't you? You little pervert!

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: That's enough, Soifon. You remind me of myself. I even think of you sometimes as my little sister.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Kisuke and I used to play here when we were kids. We modeled the one under his shop after this one. It was our own secret playground.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: [thinking after Soifon asks why she didn't take her with her] You've gotten stronger since the last time we were together, Soifon.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: No matter how many times I do this, it results in a wonderful reaction from you, Ichigo!

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: It looks to me like you've completely lost your touch.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Are you sure you don't want to see this smooth skin of a young woman? This will be the last time...

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Do you remember the first time you walked? No. So you weren't conscious of it. Then why did you walk? Everyone was born knowing how to walk. It's called instinct. That's what this boy reminds me of. He knows he can achieve bankai, so he continues.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: In three days, I will make this boy stronger than you.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: It's been a while... Byakuya-bo.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: You shy, little boy.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Can't you tell, Aizen? You no longer have a place to run away to.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo...We can't...Watch any longer...Eachother's backs...I just can't...I just can't help you out anymore.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: I will defeat him. It may cost my life to do it. However, if I survive, I'll make a promise. The same promise as that time, on the same thing as that time.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: [in reply to Shunsui Kyōraku] It's true, I know nothing about her (Rukia). It might not be quite enough for me to risk my own life over. But...Ichigo wants to save her. That reason is enough for me.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: I don't believe that an absolute power really exists in any world. Power is unstable. It changes constantly. Small differences will always appear, as one has between you and I. So the one who widens that gap will be the winner!

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: [to Arrancar Gantenbainne Mosqueda] It seems that my power is more akin to yours than that of a Shinigami or a Quincy.

author: Yasutora Sado
title: Bleach
text: Abuelo... That means grandpa.

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: [thinking to self about her past, and when she first met Kenpachi] I had no name. I had no parents. I was from District 79, "Kusajishi", of the North Alley of Rukongai. I had never seen anything in colors other than the bloody red... Everyone was more beast than human. It wouldn't have been strange to have a baby get stepped on and die. But then you appeared. From District 80, "Zaraki", of the North Alley of Rukongai. You appeared to me from even deeper in the darkness. You demolished the chaotic world that was dyed in blood... And then, you gave me a name. If it wasn't for you...I wouldn't be alive today. Yes...Since that day...You've been everything to me in this world.

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: [to Ichigo] Try to stay alive, okay? That way, you and Kenny can play again some day!

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: Ken-Chan!

author: Kusajishi Yachiru
title: Bleach
text: Someone get this creature off meeeeeee!

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Sorry, but...believe it or not, I'm a male too.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Hey, all it did was go around in a full circle.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: As a rule, they say humans haunted by a shinigami have nothing but misfortune.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Apples taste so much better indoors.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: For me, apples are like cigarettes and liquor for humans. If I'm deprived, I go into withdrawals.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: That was worth an academy award, Light.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: I feel like I'm watching a sitcom.

author: Ryuk
title: Death Note
text: Humans are so... interesting.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: That may be so. What is right from wrong? What is good from evil? Nobody can truly distinguish between them. Even if there was a god. Now, supposing a god and his world existed, even then I'd stop and think for myself. I'd decide for myself whether his teachings are right or wrong. After all, I am just the same as you. I put faith in my own convictions as to what I believe is right, and consider them to be righteous.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Seriously, enslavement is funny...

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I've wanted to make him taste his own pathetic failure with all my heart.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Does she understand what she's doing, this stupid woman?

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: For me and Mello, L has been the only person we adore, and the only person who deserves our respect.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Making such a sleazebag a spokesman...

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: People in supervising positions in investigation are supposed to give too much of their opinion, and if they are wrong, all it would take is an apology.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I don't know what to say. Now, I think it's just best to observe closely.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: To Mello, it's like playing a videogame against me, I think. "See who gets to Kira, the last boss, first."

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: It's not whether it's feasible or not – it's what I'm doing.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: You let them take it from right under your nose.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: Things are getting interesting now.

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: And that's precisely why it's so convenient, don't you think?

author: Near
title: Death Note
text: I'm pleased to meet you at last, L Number Two.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: Near and the others told me that this woman was supposed to be the second Kira. But could it really be this unbelievably stupid girl?..

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: Matt... I never thought you'd be killed... I'm sorry.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: It's my turn to use you.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: *to Near* Which of us will get Kira first... it's a race!

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: I'm not just a tool for you to use in order to solve your puzzles, you know!

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: So, how about you tell me right now whom you'd like me to kill, and how. I'll treat'cha to it.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: He's terribly reasonable, this new L.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: In the end, there is no greater motivation than revenge.

author: Mello
title: Death Note
text: It's time I started living my own life.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: If you keep my secret, this strawberry is yours.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: I haven't said anything about letting them commit murder...yet.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Actually, if you're smart, you can eat sweets without gaining weight.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Let's show him...that the good guys always win.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Kira is childish and he hates losing... I'm also childish and hate to lose. That's how I know.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Let's value our lives.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: This world is still rotten!.. With too many rotten people.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: That's right, I am Kira. And what can you do? Kill me right here?

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: Our battle will be concluded, and I will begin my reign from the summit of victory!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: In the end, L is indeed the greatest detective on earth...

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: But you know the saying, "play with fire, and you'll get burned". I'll make you regret underestimating L...underestimating me.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I must protect my fledging Utopia.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: No matter what the world, the god of that world creates the rules. In truth, you have been defeated by the rules I created. And as punishment for defying the God of the new world, you will die...

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I've won. Exactly as planned.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: For murderers, there is no good or evil. I know that.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: The thing I hate the most is to trample on other people's good will.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I've never considered finding that notebook and gaining that power a misfortune.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: You can't ever win if you're always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack!

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: This is the first time in my life that I've been provoked to hit a woman.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: L, do you know gods of death love apples?

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: He was someone who deserved to die.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] Am I frightening... woman?

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] You're just in time. Watch closely. This is the moment that the man you've put your hope in will lose his life.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: If it is because of what you call a heart, then it is the heart that causes you humans pain. It is because of your heart that you will die.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Kurosaki Ichigo, those are the words of someone who does not know true despair. So I will show you. This is what true despair looks like.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Ichigo] So you can withstand my Cero even without your mask... You've gotten stronger. Is it because you defeated Grimmjow? Or...Is it because of her? [Motions to Inoue] Or maybe because of your friends, still fighting down below. That girl is already one of us. Even if you manage to rescue her, that won't change. Rescuing her...Is meaningless.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] Your heart? You humans say that word so lightly. As if it were something one can hold in the palm of one's hand. But my eye sees everything -- Nothing can escape it. What it doesn't see doesn't exist. That's how I've always fought. That's how I've always lived.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Yammy] They're all trash...kill them all.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Even saying they were just a bunch of fools would suffice. So why can't you? Were it me... I would be angry at the ignorance of those who would enter Hueco Mundo... without even testing their own power.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: It seems I have overestimated you quite a bit. Your evolution did not even satisfy my expectations. This is the end.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Kurosaki Ichigo, you have no chance of defeating me. Even if you somehow manage to defeat me, there will be three more powerful than myself for you to fight. It doesn't matter if you stand up again a thousand times. The road to victory does not exist.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: I was not capable of stopping it even while using both hands. That surprised me a little. Was that your full power? Well, it seems to be... disappointing.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: And it seems you've acquired a new power. However, is that all you are capable of achieving with it? This is the end. You will no longer interfere. The sun has already set in our hands.

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime, when she refuses to eat] Shall I force it down your throat? Or would you rather be strapped down and given IV's?

author: Ulquiorra Schiffer
title: Bleach
text: Therefore let me inform you...All of your dreams are to be thrown away.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: I am calm. That's why I can fight you!

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to Yammy Rialgo, as the Espada grips the edge of a hole in the floor] Mala Suerte. I pity you. [shoots the floor just before Yammy's hand, causing him to fall] Oh, and I broke the pillars on every floor on the way up. So, you'll probably fall all the way to the bottom.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to Renji] I assure you, my gratitude is sincere.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor. And the victor of this battle is me.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Seele Schneider isn't a sword. [strings the weapon on his bow] A Quincy's only weapons...Are bows and arrows. [fires the Seele Schneider]

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: That's right...If I'm the first one here, I can save Kuchiki-san. Kurosaki must've wanted to rescue her himself...If I did it, he'd get really pissed...Heheheh...

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: I hate Shinigami.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to Mayuri Kurotsuchi] It's a good thing Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see what I'm about to do to you.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [lying about coming to save Rukia] Just passing by. No big deal.... Well, if you must know, I felt a sudden urge to go to Sunflower Seams, that 24-hour dressmaking shop. There's a branch near here. That's where I was headed at this late hour. I certainly didn't bring this bag with me just so I would have an excuse for suddenly leaving the house because I sensed the spirit energy of a shinigami, all right?

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Calling me a coward, eh? At least say it so I can hear it...

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: [to an arrogant projectile-specialist Shinigami] Apparently, on this side, "ultimate master" means a windbag with diarrhea of the mouth.

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Ah, Kurosaki. I'm glad to see you've finally realized the importance of a cape.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: [to Luppi] Hyourinmaru is the strongest of all ice-type Zanpakutoes. Your weapon may have eight arms, but mine is all the water in the atmosphere! Sennen Hyourou!! [causes several pillars of ice to form, before using them to crush Luppi] Sorry. Eight wasn't enough.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: I didn't come here to fight! I came here to hack at you violently!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: We are all like fireworks. We climb, shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even if that time comes, let's not disappear like a firework. Let's continue to shine... Forever.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Stand back? [To Kira after Gin asked him to stand back] No, Kira...Run. Run until you're out of my sight, and keep running. Otherwise...I can't guarantee you won't get dragged into this and be killed.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: I'M﻿ NOT AN ELEMENTARY STUDENT!!!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Aizen, I will kill you.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Don't come back... "Bed-wetter" Momo.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Dummy. I'm not gonna dwell on what happened forever. All that junk... it's the furthest thing on my mind. You should especially quit worrying about it and get some more sleep. Hurry up and get rid of your Panda eyes, got it?

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: No, not yet, now that you've made me this serious. Regret as much as you damn well want!!

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: [to Gin Ichimaru] If you make Hinamori shed even one drop of blood, I'll kill you.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Sit upon the frozen heavens! Hyōrinmaru!!

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Seek not beauty in battle. Seek not beauty in death. Consider not your own life. If you wish to protect that which must be protected, then strike while your opponent's back is turned.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: All creatures want to believe in something bigger than themselves. They cannot live without blind obedience. And to escape the pressure of that trust, those in whom faith is placed in turn look for someone higher than themselves. And then those people in turn look for someone even stronger. That is how all Kings are born. That is how all Gods are born.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Trusting someone...means relying on them and only the weak do that.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: I never ask them to trust me at all. I told them to come with me but I never told them to trust me. And I always tell them not to trust anyone, including myself. But sadly, there are not many strong enough to do that.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: [To Barragan, before he was recruited by Aizen] Isn't it ironic, king of Hueco Mundo? Dressed in black and poised to attack, you look just like a shinigami.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime, after she had being taken from Ichigo once again] A girl like you should smile more often. Overcast skies blot out the sun, and that always brings people's spirits down. So why not let the sun shine...For just a while longer?

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: No matter what may happen... As long as you walk by my side... There shall be no enemy that can stand before us.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Good evening, Espada. There has been an enemy attack. But first...Let us brew some tea.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: [After Gin offers to kill some Arrancars] No thanks, for that would be boring.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Oh? I thought I severed your body from the waist-down, but...It seems the cut was too shallow.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: In my eyes, there is no difference between wiping away one speck of dust or two.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: "No longer the Aizen you know," hm...? I'm afraid you've been deluded, Abarai-kun...The 'Aizen Sousuke' you knew never existed to begin with.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: It's very difficult for me to step on an ant without crushing it.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Don't use such strong words -- It makes your weakness all the more apparent.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: I had no intention of deceiving anyone. It's just that none of you could understand...My true self.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: [To Hitsugaya, after stabbing Hinamori] Aww...You found her. Sorry, I didn't want you to find out this way...No. I should have chopped her into little pieces and hidden them away where you would never find them.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: I've liked him for so long. So long. But Mayama likes someone else. But I wanna hear his voice. I want to hold his hand. I feel like this.

author: Ayumi Yamada
title: Honey and Clover
text: Never once did I say it.  But just as he knew my feelings and couldn't return them. She will probably realize his and probably his heart wouldn't have a chance either? When I think about things like that, my tears won't stop.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: I'll show you a real assassination. No... Maybe you won't even be able to see it.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: I thought I told you. If you see your allies losing, that's your chance. Don't step between them. Take the enemy down from behind. And if the enemy's so strong, you can't even do that, then just watch your allies get killed. That's what it means to be Special Forces.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Of my five older siblings, two died on the first mission, then two more on the second. Then on the sixth mission, the last one... Died as well. I felt sad, somewhat, but more than that, I felt ashamed of their incompetence.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: I'm inadequate in everything.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Such words are wasted on someone like me.

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Showing your back in a battle? You've become a fool Yoruichi!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: You know the power of my zanpakuto, Suzumebachi. If someone gets hit twice in the same spot... They die!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: The one hundred years we were apart were meant to bring me power and make you weak! Yoruichi!

author: Soi Fon
title: Bleach
text: Why didn't you take me with you!? Yoruichi?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Only underlings get caught up in the matter of style and lose the battle. A captain can't afford such indulgences. Don't try to be a good kid. Whether you own somebody or they own you. The moment you start a fight, you are wrong in either way.

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: [To Starrk, about Lilynette] That child with you... Can you send her somewhere else? I can't really go all out with her there.

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Why so cold, Nanao-chan?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Do we really have to fight, Yama-jii?

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: I placed this blade of grass in my mouth thinking I'd look cool. But it must be poison 'cause ith makinth ma mouth numb.

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Cute, cute Nanao-chaaaan. Lovely, lovely Nanao -- AHHHHHHH!!!!

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Nanao-chan is last place!

author: Shunsui Kyōraku
title: Bleach
text: Flowers are disturbed, god of flowers weeps, winds of Heaven are disturbed, demon of Heaven laughs. Katen Kyōkotsu!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: I was glad you did not pretend to be a saint and claim to love the world despite everything. That is why I decided that I would be your true friend. I would accept your sorrow. And I would share my joy. If you strayed I would reprimand you. If you made mistakes, I would forgive you. And when you found yourself in trouble, I would be there for you. So that you who learn to hate the world, would come to love it once more.

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: Back then. I felt a kernel of untruth in your words. You talked about "The world she loves" many times. But made not a single mention of "The world I love".

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: You destroyed those Menos Grandes. That's enough for me! I have decided to fight by your side! I won't accept no as an answer, masked ones!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: You are right. I have not yet introduced myself. I am Captain of the Seventh Division Komamura Sajin. And though it shames me, I am just as you say -- A meager worm of a man.

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: [to Choe Neng Poww, as the giant Arrancar charges a Cero after making a comment on Komamura's strength] I see...Then I shall stop that yawn in its tracks. Bankai.

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: Don't retreat, Tetsuzaemon. No matter what. You stand firm right behind me!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: [thinking at the grave of Tosen's friend] O' anonymous friend of Tousen... If you had been there...What would you have said to stop him?

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: Let us commence, Zaraki! Your favorite game of carnage!!

author: Komamura Sajin
title: Bleach
text: [during Tosen, Gin Ichimaru and Sosuke Aizen's escape from Soul Society] Get down here, Tosen! Why did you become a Shingami? Was it not for your deceased friend? Was it not to carry out justice!? Where is your justice now!?

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: [holds up juice box] How do you drink from this?

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: You can see me? Rather, you kicked me...

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: I see. I feel a strong pulse.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Have you been out on the window ledge all this time, in plain sight? What if the neighbors report a silver haired elementary student burglar?

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I already told you...you can't kill me with that sword anymore!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: If you wanna talk to me, do it while I cut you to pieces. But, I'm not gonna hold back one bit! Bankai!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Don't just blame yourself. You're not tough enough to withstand everything. Split the load, to my shoulders, and to Ichigo's. Just stack it little by little. That's why we've become stronger. Believe in him, Rukia.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I've always been afraid...Always been pretending to follow you closely, always pretending to sharpen my fangs, when the truth is...I'm scared to death just treading on your shadow.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short, so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Ichigo...I know this is shameful, but I'm begging you -- Rukia...Please save Rukia!!

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: The stray dog in me is dyed into my bones... All I do is howl at the moon, but I don't have the guts to bite...

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: Howl, Zabimaru.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: I knew it. You can't even ask your own zanpakutō its name.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: You're just an overnight shinigami. You couldn't put one scratch on us real ones.

author: Abarai Renji
title: Bleach
text: *to Ichigo* So you're the human who got his powers from Rukia?

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I'll tattle-tale to Yachiru if you keep that up, Ikkaku!

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I don't know if you noticed, but you just called him "Captain."

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: I hate talkative guys... They gross me out.

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: Growl, Haineko!

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: [Rangiku steps out of the bath naked to comfort a crying Orihime] There, there! Cry, cry, you poor thing. Drown all of your sorrows in my chest!

author: Matsumoto Rangiku
title: Bleach
text: [to Momo on Aizen's final letter] As a vice-captain, I think it's a great honor to be the receiver of her captain's final words. Read it well.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: [thinking as Nel tells her to cheer for Ichigo] That's right. To begin with, I came here just thinking I wanted to protect everyone. But when I heard they had come to save me, I couldn't help but feel a little glad, just a bit in my heart. When I look at Kurosaki-kun in that mask, I think that he might not have come here to save me at all. Even though it's wrong, they shouldn't be going that far for me.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: Kurosaki-kun... I'm weak, so it's always like I turn back to look to you for help. But now I won't turn back and I'll go forward. The next time we meet I won't look to you for help, Kurosaki-kun, I'll be able to fight on my own.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: We don't look any different from those shinigami. We just dress diferently.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: It's just that... It's just that not being able to fight with everyone makes me feel lonely...!!
