But what would make me feel worse than being lonely is getting in everyone's way... that would make me feel worse!! If it means getting in the way of Kurosaki-kun and everyone... then I would rather be lonely, very lonely.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: I'm a terrible person, aren't I? "If only Kurosaki-kun would cheer up, I'd be happy." At least, I thought that was how I felt. Then Kuchiki-san came back and cheered Kurosaki-kun up. I should have been really happy, but... but... [starts to cry] but instead I'm jealous of Kuchiki-san!

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: If I were the rain, that binds together the heavens and the earth, whom in all eternity will never mingle, would I be able to bind two hearts together?

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: [to Nemu about Uryuu. Nemu is currently attempting to restrain Uryuu so Mayruri can heal him, but she is unknowingly smothering him with her breasts] Yes, Nemu. Just smother him with those things. Worst case, he dies happy.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: [to Szayel Aporro Grantz] Immaculate being... Was it? In this secular existence, perfection is an illusion, regardless of those who utter the contrary. This is the reality. Common man seeks it out, they strive to achieve it, as if it were some tangible thing... But... The fact of the matter is, perfection is a hollow shell. It is devoid of any substance. I spit on perfection. Perfection, after all, implies you've reached the summit. No trial and error, no ability to conceptualize. An omniscient being would have no need for such superfluous things... Am I making myself clear? For people who dabble in the sciences, such as ourselves, perfection would make us obsolete. Many magnificent things have been, and will continue to come into existence... And yet every last one of them will fall short of perfection's finish. Our function as men of science relies on their many shortcomings. Then, and only then, can we apply the fruits of our labor. To put it simply... As soon as you began spouting that nonsense about being an immaculate being... your fate was sealed. How dare you call yourself a man of science?

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: [upon arriving at Szayel Aporro Grantz's location] Arrancar, Arrancar, Arrancar... Espada! Hueco Mundo is quite the treasure trove.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: Oh, you know what I'm talking about. That stupid line that all you Quincies keep saying up until the moment you die. By the honor of the Quincy I cannot do this, by the honor of the Quincy I won't allow that. Quincy this, Quincy that! Every last one of you! It's so annoying!

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby.

author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri
title: Bleach
text: A grenade that's thrown should not come back.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [to Chad and Orihime] Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it... You can still decide not to pass through.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Awaken, Benihime.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [Singing to Yammy] Aizen-sama will get maaaad at youuuu!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Oh, it IS a chore. Risking your life and keeping busy are all the same!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Noooo, there's no way I, a mere handsome and sexy shopkeeper, could possibly have bankai!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [To Yoruichi] It's alright! Kurosaki-san's potential is greater than mine!

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [Sees Yoruichi in cat form] Yes! It's Yoruichi! You've come back! Ha ha ha!! [Picks her up] Come here you little devil, let me take a look at you! You're my fuzzy little troublemaker, yes you are! Now who's your daddy? Hmm?

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: I'll drive you into a corner and make you remember that attack.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: [Urahara writes Ichigo a message in blood] Please meet at Urahara shop immediately. [After Ichigo freaked out] P.S: If you look at this message and think that it is the message of a person before his death... then you have no sense of humor.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: A warrior who has lost his ability to fight is only going to be in the way.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Lately, I've been looking at these two guys only. As expected, I see flowers when there are women in the workplace... the atmosphere!

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [In his Resurrección form] I can see! I can see! I can see!!! So this is the sky!! So this is blood!! So this is the world!! ...So this is what you look like. Komamura. You are uglier... than I thought.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [to Hisagi after stabbing him] I am afraid. Then and now, my fear has always been that I would die a shinigami like you.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [to Komamura] Don't make me laugh. Aizen-sama has given me something far more powerful than a bankai.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [to Hisagi] Open my eyes? You? Open my eyes? You never change.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [after Hisagi thanks him] Aren't you clever? Is that supposed to be sarcastic?

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: I knew it would. Someday we would cross swords and one of us will die.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: It must make you sick to know an underling like me is going to kill you.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: I was trying to chop off your head from the eye up. A little scratch counts as a miss.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: Justice without a great cause begets nothing more than slaughter. That same slaughter in a great cause...Is Justice.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: I told you before, Komamura. The only paths that I see with these eyes are the ones not dyed with blood. Those paths are the paths to justice. So whichever path I choose...Is justice.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: If it's not enough to believe in justice, then I will become justice. I will seek out all evil in this world and wipe them out like the clouds in the sky. I swear I will...For justice.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [about his deceased friend] I never overcame my shyness and told her that I actually liked clouds.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [to Kenpachi Zaraki, after Tosen's senses-robbing Bankai still does not discourage the Eleventh Division Captain from fighting] I see. It's understandable. You are a demon. You belong in the darkness. So of course you do not fear it.

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: I do not hate you. However, to protect our peaceful existence, there is no other way!

author: Tousen Kaname
title: Bleach
text: [to Kenpachi Zaraki] I did not say that I hate you. What I mean to say is that you are unforgivable!!

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: When we die, our bodies disintegrate and become part of the reishi that make up Soul Society. And when that time comes...where does your heart go? It gets passed on to your nakama (comrades). If you pass it on to them, then your heart will always live on within them. Kuchiki, that's why...you must never, ever, ever die alone. Got it, Kuchiki?

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: Whenever you fight from this point on, there is one thing you must never do. Which is...to die alone.

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: Every time you and I interact...a bit of "heart" is born between us. Heart isn't something inside you. But whenever you think, whenever you remember someone, that's when heart is born. I mean, if you were the only one alive in the whole world, heart wouldn't exist, now would it?

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: The fight to protect life and the fight to protect honor——that's Captain Ukitake's policy. But you know, Kuchiki...I think that in the end, those both end up being the same thing. ...Heart.

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: [when Rukia asks why she is in the Gotei 13] What the hell?! That's so obvious! To "fight" and to "protect"!

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: [dying] Kuchiki, I dragged you into this...I'm sorry. You must've been scared. Thanks, Kuchiki. Thanks to you...I can leave my heart here.

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: [possessed by a Hollow] Why do you keep calling my name so? Are you that worried about me? Are you that much in love with me, little girl? If you love me so much...I'll eat you first!

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: Uncoil the seas and heavens, Nejibana!

author: Shiba Kaien
title: Bleach
text: But don't forget... as long as you're in my division, I'm on your side until death and beyond.

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: The Commander-General's rather violent today, wouldn't you say?

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: If you were in this situation, what would you have done? You would run after Byakuya...And then kick him in the butt, right? No matter how one captain complains, the Central Government won't change their decision for one person. But if it was you, you would still run around appealing to save Kuchiki...No. You would probably do something completely different. You always chose the path that lead to the most danger. Am I right...Kaien?

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: My, my. So dangerous.

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: If you save Kaien, then what becomes of his pride? If you go to his aid now, his life will be saved. But... at the same time, it would end up killing his pride for all eternity.

author: Ukitake Jyuushirou
title: Bleach
text: All waves, rise now and become my shield, lightning, strike now and become my blade! Sōgyo no Kotowari!

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: You may be able to save us. If you stay and protect us. But what's good is that everyone else dies! Please go!! Captain Komamura!!!

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: It increases the weight of whatever it hits, until my opponent can no longer bear the weight and falls to the ground. And then they bow their head as if in apology. That's why it's called "Wabisuke".

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: War is not heroic. War is not exhilarating. War is full of despair. It's dark. It's dreadful. It's a thing of sorrow and gloom.

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: Farewell, warrior of the sky. I pray... you don't forgive me.

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: Raise your head, Wabisuke.

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: [in reference to Mizuho Asano, Keigo's sister] I owe this crazy woman.

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: You can't carry me AND dodge at the same time, Tetsuzaemon!

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: Awww maaan, and I really didn't feel like using it this early either. Better watch closely, and make sure you don't tell a soul! Bankai!!

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: Well, you sure have weird ways of doing things. The one who taught me how to give your name out to he whom you are about to kill also said... that it was always the last lesson he taught his students. That way, if you do end a person's life... at the very least, they will know the name of the one who slashed their mortal coil. I'm of the 11th Division, 3rd seat, Madarame Ikkaku! You're right, there's no reason for me to hear your name, because the most important thing is that you know mine. After all, it is the name of the man... who will send you to your death!

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: I got no intentions of becoming a captain. Becoming a captain would mean that I can't fight under Captain Zaraki. If your wish is to surpass Kuchiki Byakuya... then I just have one wish: to fight and die under that man's command. That's all.

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: Live well, Ichigo. Live well, age well, go bald well, and die after me. And... if you can, die smiling.

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: I didn't hate it as much as I said. That hollow, that is. If there's anything that I've truly hated for 20 years without thinking twice... it'd have to be the fact that I failed to save Masaki on that night.

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: It's one of the basics... So I will teach you. A shinigami at the rank of Captain can control the size of his zanpakuto got it? Otherwise everyone'd carry around ginormous swords... just like you. Remember this well. You can't fathom the power of your rival simply from the size of his zanpakuto. You shouldn't give lectures about Shinigami until you understand that.

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: [to Yuzu] Ah! It's okay, Yuzu, don't cry! Daddy will show you something really hilarious!

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: [to Karin] Do as your heart desires! Jump into your father's bosom!

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: It's not anyone's fault that Masaki died. It's just that... the woman I fell in love with... was a woman who could die protecting her son. And don't forget. You are the guy... the woman I loved gave her life to protect.

author: Kurosaki Isshin
title: Bleach
text: GOOD MOOOORNING ICHIGOOOOOO!!!!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: We can't waste time worrying about the what-if's. Rukia's execution date has been changed to noon tomorrow. So what? If the deadline has been changed to tomorrow... I'll just have to finish today!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: The moment I came out of that hole was the moment your luck ran out!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: I see. So basically, you're a shinigami? And you came all the way from some place called Soul Society to vanquish evil spirits? Which means that monster earlier was one of those evil spirits? And it attacked that little girl? Okay, I belie- NO WAY I'LL BELIEVE THAT, DUMBASS!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Dammit, is that how you greet your son who went out of his way to help a ghost on the way home?!

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [about his Hollow group prior to them becoming Arancar as he eats pieces of them] You sicken me. You're all just a bunch of bloody cowards. Alright, I'll eat all of you. You'll see how it feels on the next level, as a part of my own flesh. I am... I am the king!

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [To Orihime] I've repaid my debt to you. Now, you're gonna accompany me on a little errand.

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [to Ichigo] I don't care if you're a human, a Soul Reaper or even a Hollow! I'll crush anybody who looks down on me! And you, Kurosaki, will be the first to go!

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [to Ichigo] You're a Soul Reaper and I'm a Hollow. Whichever side loses will be massacred! It's been that way for over a thousand years! Who needs any more reason than that?! Now bring it! The last man standing gets to go home alive! That's all there is to it!

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [about Ulquiorra Cifer, after he takes out Ichigo] I'll teach him what happens when you steal someone else's prey.

author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques
title: Bleach
text: [to Ichigo] Don't forget my name, Soul Reaper, and you better pray that you never hear it again! Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez...because the next time you hear my name, you'll be a dead man...I promise.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: [as a child, to Rangiku Matsumoto] I've decided. I'm going to become a Shinigami. Become a Shinigami and change things. So that they'll end...without Rangiku having to cry.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: Emotions? Nope, I've got nothin' like that. I told you when we first met, didn't I? I'm a snake. With cold skin, no emotions, that slithers around searching for prey with its tongue, swallowing down whatever looks tasty.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: [Talking about Hueco Mundo] There isn't even water! Huh? Then how'd we have tea earlier?

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: [Referring to Tosen] He's such a boy scout, wouldn't you agree?

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: Oops. They found us.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: [To Rukia as she is taken to Sokyoku Hill] Bye Bye, Rukia chan! See 'ya at the execution grounds.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: If you pull your sword in a place like this, I'll just have to stop you, won't I?

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: Sorry, Aizen-sama. I got caught.

author: Ichimaru Gin
title: Bleach
text: A gatekeeper ain't supposed to open gates.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: No matter how strong a defense, a stronger offense will always shatter it.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: "Control"... you say? When you stand before me... that word holds no meaning. Bankai. Senbonzakura Kageyoshi.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Exactly when did I say that I do this because I am a shinigami? My killing you is no other reason than the fact that you... Pointed your blade [view shifts to Rukia] at my pride.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: The arrogant one is you, Espada. But rest at ease. The reason for your loss is not due to that arrogance. It is simply due to a difference in power.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: You and I...our levels are as distant as the earth from the heavens. ...Must I spell it out for you? I have discarded my left arm, discarded my left leg, and yet even then I have not nearly lowered myself to your level.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: It is a thousand years too early... for you to become worthy enough to die by my Bankai.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Well done. That time, your fang definitely touched me.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Be proud as someone who, after being struck by this power, is still able to retain the shape of a body.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Your blade will never be able to touch me. Ever.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Put away your sword and you shall live...unless you're still dreaming about defeating me. Did you forget, or did it just never occur to you...that I have Bankai as well?

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: The curtain that falls at the end...shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: That's not possible. With your ability, you couldn't even make one of my knees touch the ground.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: The Kuchiki clan is one of the four noble houses. We must set the standard for all shinigami. If we do not abide by the code...then who will uphold it?

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: No choice, then. Before you become intoxicated by your own power, I shall show you a decisive power gap that you could not overcome in a millennium of struggle.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Are you telling me to exploit an opening for the likes of you? Do not speak out of your league, boy.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Disappear. My sword does not exist to crush insects like you.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Scatter, Senbonzakura.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: You're slow, even when you're falling.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: Gin-chan told me to pay people back double for revenge!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Shinpachi, just remember this... We aren't friends with justice or even your sister. We're YOUR friends.

author: Sarutobi Ayame
title: Gintama
text: Gin-san, aren't you gonna make fun of me? Are you just gonna ignore me?!

author: Sarutobi Ayame
title: Gintama
text: I watch over Gin-san to protect him. Just like a fairy, like Tinkerbell!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: *about Katsura, who apparently got his head hit very hard* Forget his name, this guy's questioning his own existence!

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: *while eating Super Spicy Senbei* It's spicy... It's spicy. Damn it, why am I... It's so spicy I have tears in my eyes.

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: I just...    ...want to make the woman I love happy.

author: Isao Kondō
title: Gintama
text: *to Okita* I don't care about that gap you created on your own. I'll jump across it as many times as it takes, and punch some sense into you.

author: Isao Kondō
title: Gintama
text: If someone went the wrong way, the other two would beat him up until he got back on track. That's how it always been. That's why we'll always stay on the right path!

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: *talking about Shinsengumi* Every time I'm with all of you, there's always a gap. I'm different from all of you.

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: I smelled something: The scent of a Lunar Flower. It was coming from this city.

author: Hige
title: Wolf's Rain
text: [talking to Kiba, who is being held in a cage] Man, you really screwed up. I mean, I've seen one of us get hurt before, but never this badly. And you're caught, too.

author: Tsume
title: Wolf's Rain
text: [to Toboe] I wanted to take you to paradise.

author: Tsume
title: Wolf's Rain
text: I finished Hige off. I don't want to move any more either. I knew it from the beginning, I knew it somewhere in my heart. That's why I led a spontaneous life. I was confident after having met you... that I wasn't the one who would open Paradise. [groans]

author: Hige
title: Wolf's Rain
text: [tsume bites into his neck] Let's meet up again in Paradise.

author: Hige
title: Wolf's Rain
text: Can you do me a favor? Could you kill me with your fangs? Can you still not forgive me? Am I still a traitor?

author: Hige
title: Wolf's Rain
text: That hot dog must've fried your brain!

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: *to Hige* Coming from you, that sounds kind of fishy.

author: Cheza
title: Wolf's Rain
text: We would not have met, and the flowers will protect you. Kiba, because you protected this one, the flowers will return and bloom once more. So when the world is reborn, and Paradise opens, we will meet again. This one will be waiting for you. Find this one. And this time, the Paradise you hoped for will be...

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: They say there's no such place... as Paradise. Even if you search to the ends of the Earth, there's nothing there. No matter how far you walk, it's always the same road. It just goes on and on. But, in spite of that... Why am I so driven to find it? A voice calls to me... It says, "Search for Paradise."

author: Kiba
title: Wolf's Rain
text: Why? Why do humans always look to the sky? Why do you try so hard to fly when you don't have any wings? We'll run on our own legs.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: I hate sweets.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Even if my left arm can transform into a monstrous claw and can destroy Akuma, im just a normal person with a promise...

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: Inside your mouth, it's rat-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta, wonderful.

author: Ryoma Echizen
title: Prince Of Tennis
text: I don't like lectures from someone who plays fixed matches.

author: Konata Izumi
title: Lucky Star
text: As time goes by without anyone eating it, it starts getting dry and looking anything but appetizing, and no one's willing to make a move, but when the busboy takes it you go 'wait, we're not done with that yet.' kinda on reflex. But then you end up leaving without eating it.

author: Kagami Hiiragi
title: Lucky Star
text: Can you stop guessing if they got the question right based on the amount of time left when they cut to commercial!?

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: Hijikata-san. I forgot my flute at the headquarters, so I'm gonna go back and get it real quick.

author: Hiroki Kamijou
title: Junjou Romantica
text: Is there a limit to how much you can love somebody? No matter how much I hurt him or get hurt by him, I find myself far from hating him, actually hoping that those wounds will scar, like burns...because then you can never forget me.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: What is it, you? Bang bang banging on people's heads like that. Are you hoping to become a tambourine player? If you don't like Shin-chan, then how about Sen-chan from secret operation?

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: He won't play up to anyone. He won't be led astray by anything. He simply places himself in a clear space.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: To me, the world is not only the shape on the map. On the battle field, all I see are the faces of the order and my friends... I am an awful person aren't I? Instead of the real world, all I care about is my friends. That's because they are my whole world... Even if just one of my friends dies, to me, it's the same thing as part of the world being destroyed.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: The best way to live a full life is to be a child, no matter your age.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: I'm not eating early. In my country, we always ate hot dogs during class.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Do you really intend to lose even more of your friends for something like that? I'll pass on that. As long as I'm alive, I'll live by my own rules. I'll live as I see fit and protect that which I hold dear.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Katsura, just stop this. No matter how elegant you think dying is, your death won't appease your conscience and won't change anything.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Shut up you! What's with that TV drama attitude?!

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: We could drive them off the entire earth if we had your strength, Gintoki!

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: No matter how gifted you are... You, alone, cannot change the world.

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: If I sit like a normal person my investigative abilities are only working at 50% efficiency.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one that will become the god of a new world that every one desires!

author: Midou Ban
title: Getbackers
text: Humans are things that don't know the true value of something precious until they lose it...and if somehow, they get that precious thing back, they'll forget its value again.

author: Kazuma Yagami
title: Kaze no Stigma
text: I'll always be by your side, just like the wind that flows through your hair.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Unless I grip the sword, I cannot protect you. While gripping the sword, I cannot embrace you.

author: Syaoran Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Though we had to part, though we could never be together again. We had no regrets. Even if she returned to her world, married another man and had children with him. If the woman I loved was happy, then I could be happy. And I am. Our hearts had joined and so, even if she lived in a different world, that time, we really were together always, always. I would never let go of this feeling, or my love for her.

author: Inuyasha
title: Inuyasha
text: Heh, I guess somehow without me knowing, it just feels so natural now, to have Kagome by my side.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Sebastian, you know what to do.

author: Elizabeth Middleford
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Ciel, how are you?

author: Kotarō Katsura
title: Gintama
text: Gintoki, will you take up your sword once again to cleanse this rotting nation? Lend me the strength of the fearsome white demon once again. [flashback to when they were fighting together] Is this it? Rather than falling into enemy hands, we should kill ourselves and die as warriors.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: I'm on TV! I gotta call my folks!

author: Hijikata Toushirou
title: Gintama
text: *to Okita, who tells him that he should take his job more seriously* Shall I put you to sleep, ingrate?

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: You mean that we failed again to prevent a bombing? What are you doing, Hijikata-san? You should take this job more seriously.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: It might be dog food. Take it.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: *talking about a nosebleed* And why would a girl your age pick hard enough to get a nosebleed?!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: We've got nothing left at home but salt and sugar.

author: Shimura Shinpachi
title: Gintama
text: [Shinpachi and Kagura are stuck in a trashcan, and have been pushed onto the train tracks. Shinpachi sees a train coming]This timing's just like some manga!

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: I don't like men with glasses.

author: Shimura Shinpachi
title: Gintama
text: Who the hell are they? Pedophile yakuza?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: In this country, we don't call someone who can stop a scooter with her bare hands a girl. We call her a mountain gorilla.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: [after hitting Kagura with his motor scooter, Gintoki looks inside a vending machine slot] D-don't worry. A-all we have to do is find a t-t-time machine.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Oh crap! Today is Jump release day! I forgot it comes out on Saturday this week! We have to go back!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Shut it! Do you know the pain of having a permanent perm?!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: A samurai doesn't need a reason to do what's right. If you want to protect her, you must draw your sword.

author: Shimura Shinpachi
title: Gintama
text: Damn that sister of mine! She's always talking about our father, but what did that baldy ever do for us?! He just played Othello with us from time to time!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Leave it at that. Even though she was raised by gorillas, she's still a woman.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: *to Shinpachi* Was your sister raised by gorillas?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: *after Shinpachi caught up to him, while running from the police* What a nice boy you are. Have you come to return my wooden sword? That's all right. It was just a souvenir I bought on a school trip.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Blah, blah, blah, blah… quit your blabbering. Look at this. [holds up an empty glass] Thanks to you assholes, my chocolate parfait [hits one of the amanto with his bokuto] fell to the ground!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Ah, I wish I could have a bankai like that.

author: Isao Kondō
title: Gintama
text: Hey, if you take a step over that line, your territorial law won't mean shit!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: You can't just run away, especially from the things you want to forget!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Don't go thinking you're my rival, you circus freak!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: [crashing through the gate on his motor scooter] Thanks for the support! Here come the real heros!

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: That's like what an evil organization in some anime would do.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: We're not going to sneak in, we're gonna bust in. To bust in means to go in from the front, guns blazing.

author: Isao Kondō
title: Gintama
text: I've told you before, he's not one to trust, Otae-san. No trustworthy man has eyes that look like a dead fish's eyes.

author: Kagura
title: Gintama
text: *talking about Gintoki* It's the same as always. He doesn't pursue those who leave, and ignores those who come.

author: Shimura Shinpachi
title: Gintama
text: [Shinpachi is tied up, hanging from a tree, and the rope is held by the client] What kind of training is this? What kind of potential does he have?

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: *after Katsura asks him about what he is doing* Well, I suppose I'm doing something odd, like jogging or taking a walk or something like that.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: [after the client asks Shinpachi, Kagura and Ayame to get him stronger] Well, whatever. At any rate, raise his hit points another hundred or so.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Hey, what's that natto for, anyway? If you intend to seduce me with it, you're way off base, you know.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: The earth's rowdier than a group of five high school guys living under the same roof.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: What are you, some tantrum throwing brat who forgot to buy his Jump? Having no money is like having a sinus infection. You just have to ignore it and not pick at it, and it'll go away.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Yeah, I know. It's not good to be reading Jump at my age.

author: Okita Sougo
title: Gintama
text: Goodbye, vice captain. Why don't you suck on some mayonnaise in the afterlife? [he shoots, blowing up the whole wall]

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: What are you talking about? We LET you corner us.

author: Gintoki Sakata
title: Gintama
text: Oi, oi, why are you letting them chase you, idiot?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You will never be able to love anybody else until you love your self...

author: Alto Saotome
title: Macross Frontier
text: The sky is so low.

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: Our souls, together till the end!

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: I'll admit, Black Star makes some dumb calls from time to time, but the important thing is I'm here to back him up no matter how big a fool he is. If we're fools, we're fools together, that's the kind of team we are.

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: You guys are a team, you have to work together if you want to do anything! One person can't make a decision without the other, you decide together and you fight together!

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: I have a friend who has helped me realize something. He's helped me see that a Camellia does have a fragrance!

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: When I fall it will be silent and tragic.

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: The Camellia Blossom also know as Tsubaki, is a flower without fragrance. It proclaims nothing, blooming in silence. When the blossomed pettles scatter, it's quietly tragic. I am Tsubaki. A silent flower without fragrance.

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: Silence means approaching quietly!

author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa
title: Soul Eater
text: Excuse me... I'm not a microphone! I'm a chain scythe.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: As long as I don't admit defeat, then it'll never be a loss!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: It's Me with a capital M! I'm the only one big enough to capitalize Me!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: London bridge is falling down dude!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Who cares about snow? Snow can't touch me, I could be naked out here and it wouldn't bother me at all.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I'm not going to let myself get beaten by a jar!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I'm Black Star. I'm on a whole different level than you. I'm a big man! I beat death! Who else can say that?!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: My soul wave length just got taken away. I'm gonna miss it.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: What's the point of worrying about the past? A real star keeps moving forward.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Hey, Tsubaki, come out of there already. You haven't lost to him, have you? You can put on a better show than that, come back out on stage. Encore, encore. Tsubaki encore, give us an encore!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Alright then! Come here! Come over here, Black Star's giving you a big hug!

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: I'm just a dude who's way ahead of his time you know? Does that mean I was born too early because time can't keep up with me?

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: You can lean on me, Tsubaki.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: The tattoo is a symbol of my family, the Star Clan. They were a clan of assassins. Everybody knew they would do anything for money. After a while killing people wasn't enough, they were hungry for even more power so they began hunting human souls. But now it's just me, I'm the last member of the Star Clan. 13 years ago their souls were taken by Lord Death and the Meisters from the Academy. At the time I was still a baby, so they didn't take my soul. That's when the school took me in. That's it. The end.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Stars. Don't. Clean.

author: Black Star
title: Soul Eater
text: Soul! Soul! Are you okay?! You are going to be alright - Black Star is here for you now!! Open your eyes! One look at my big handsome face and you'll be cured for sure!

author: Black Star

author: Black Star

author: Black Star

We don't believe in unprovable concepts like "God". *Rose looks angry* We strive to uncover the principles of creation in the matter of the world, to pursue truth... *gazes at Leto statue* it's ironic that we scientists... who don't believe in God... are in a sense the closest things to him.

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Alchemy: The science of understanding the structure of matter, breaking it down, then reconstructing it as something else. It can even make gold from lead. But alchemy is a science, so it must follow the natural laws: To create, something of equal value must be lost. This is the principle of Equivalent Exchange. But on that night, I learned the value of some things can't be measured on a simple scale. My brother and I knew the laws of science, of Equivalent Exchange, that gain required sacrifice, that something had to be taken from us. But we thought there was nothing more we could lose. We were wrong.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: The Philosopher's Stone: those who possess it, no longer bound by the laws of equivalent exchange in alchemy, can gain without sacrifice...create without equal exchange. We searched for it... and we found it.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *thinking* Normally, one would call an ambulance or ask for help from one of the nearby residents, but this particular boy decided to carry the unconscious, innocent girl... and where the hell are you taking her, bastard?

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Remote islands are all about strange incidents, right?

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *to Haruhi* Are you a moron?

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *commenting on Haruhi's naming of the SOS brigade* Haruhi's incomprehensible words settled the matter. Oh, joy. Just do whatever you want.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *referring to Haruhi* She must have been born dumb.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Emblem? Looks like a grumbling, drunken tapeworm to me.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: And without any buildup or fanfare, we now see Nagato Yuki. Even if she were ordinary, she sure doesn't look like a normal person and naturally, she was actually an evil magician. And an alien on top of that.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: If your face gets any closer, someone who isn't supposed to be in this scene is going to come over there and kick your ass!

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: A picture of you sleeping with a stupid look on your face totally oblivious to the dangers of this trip serves as a warning to future generations!

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *referring to Haruhi* It would appear that she views guys on the same level as potatoes.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Anyone accepting defeat will be punished by running ten laps around the school, naked! And you'll have to yell "Green Martians are chasing me!" for the whole ten laps!

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Let's calm down. The enemy is shooting at us.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: It's time to launch the dams!

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *thinking* Every day, I hang out with an alien, a time traveler, and a Esper...and I'm still as sane and objective as ever. Hmm...I wonder if that makes me special or something.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: ... After all, our goal each year should be to increase the NUMBER of goals we set for ourselves!

author: Tsuruya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *mockingly* That's amazing, Mikuru! We're counting on you! The Earth is in your-- *breaks into uncontrollable and hysterical laughter*

author: Tsuruya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I can't take you seriously when you're dressed like that! I'm sorry, Mikuru, but I'm being controlled by the alien right now. Here goes nothing!

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Well, I don't think we can deny the distinct possibility that the world we are in now was freshly created, by Her, last night! In any case, it's an honor to meet you and Miss Suzumiya again. *laughing softly* Be seeing you after class!

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: You're the new Adam and Eve. Go on, procreate, increase the population.

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: The top brass at the organization is seriously panicked, right now. Nobody knows what will happen to the "real world", now that we've lost our Deity. If Miss Suzimiya is feeling merciful, we might get to keep on living, on this side of the bubble.

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I don't know how I know, I just know that I know, y'know?

author: Itsuki Koizumi
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Sometimes I get the feeling that we're all just a bunch of clowns standing on our tiptoes at the edge of a great abyss.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: If there's really that many people in the world, then there had to be someone who wasn't ordinary. There had to be someone who was living an interesting life. There just had to be. Why wasn't I that person?

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: You know, Kyon...have you ever realized just how insignificant your existence on this planet really is?

author: Asakura Ryouko
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Oh please, won't you just give up? You're going to die no matter what, so let me kill you.

author: Asakura Ryouko
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: You think it's a joke? Huh. You don't want to die? You don't want me to kill you? I'm sorry, but I just don't understand the concept of death regarding organic lifeforms.

author: Kyon
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Stop kidding around! You're gonna hurt someone with that! Even if that's a rubber knife, you're scaring the hell out of me!

author: Asakura Ryouko
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: *to Kyon* I'm getting bored and just fed up watching something that doesn't seem to be changing at all. That's why...I'm going to kill you and see how Miss Suzumiya reacts.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Listen! This isn't fun and games! You mess around and I'll kill ya!

author: Yuki Nagato
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I am not referring to the absence of universally accepted personality traits. What I mean is literal, that Haruhi and I are not like other organic lifeforms such as yourself.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: It's exactly what the SOS Brigade needs! We need something like a mysterious transfer student!

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Then I'll tell everyone at school that all you geeks ganged up on her and ed her.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: Feelings of love are just a temporary lapse in judgment. Like a mental illness.

author: Haruhi Suzumiya
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: I'm Haruhi Suzumiya, from East Junior High. First off, I'm not interested in ordinary people. But, if any of you are aliens, time-travelers, or espers, please come see me. That is all!

author: Mikuru Asahina
title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
text: That's classified information.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: *to Yammy after recieving his punch*  I barely feel a thing. Now I'm sure you think I'm a big fly or something. But if you are going to punch, you better put in some effort you great big worm.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Never admit defeat and ask for a quick death! Die first, then admit defeat! If you are defeated but didn't die, it just means you were lucky! At those times, think only about survival! Survive and think only about killing the one who failed to kill you!

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: You idiot! There's always shadows wherever there's light!

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Oh, shut up. I was just thinkin'. With four arms, you're just gonna keep on blockin' my blade. That's no fun at all. So, while I was layin' on the ground, I was thinkin' about how to stop you blockin' all my attacks. But, you know...I couldn't think up a single good idea lying down there. So I figure...I'll just have to take out those arms, one by one.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Finished? It'll never be finished. A battle isn't like some stupid argument. As long as someone's still breathing, the fight isn't over.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Playing comes first, you can work later!

author: Miranda Lotto
title: D.Gray-man
text: The reason that I'm no good... Even though I can't do anything well, I will attempt it anyways. Even though I decide not to try anymore, I regret it, and end up trying again. After all, I can't do anything right, it's better if I just don't try at all. I'm an idiot, aren't I...

author: Miranda Lotto
title: D.Gray-man
text: The old clock that nobody could budge. The sound of the chime moved my heart. It seemed like the clock had approved of my clumsy self.

author: Miranda Lotto
title: D.Gray-man
text: I've never had anyone say "thank you" to me. That means I've never been helpful to anyone. I wanted somebody to say "thank you" to me and I wanted them to accept me.

author: Miranda Lotto
title: D.Gray-man
text: You know how there are people who aren't good at anything? Well, that's how I was.

author: Komui Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's not a sacrifice. We're helping each other so we can can live.

author: Komui Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Wait Lenalee! Komurin is not evil! The coffee is evil!! Hate the crime, not the person. Hate the coffee, not Komurin, Lenalee.

author: Komui Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: In this world, the only organisms that get cursed are humans.

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: Seeing you like this, you don't look like a villain who's turned the whole world against him.

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: As expected, you've gotta be evil to have fun.

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: We only look immortal...because you guys are weak!!!

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: Haha... He was my enemy. Shouldn't I kill him?

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: If I'm not careful, I won't be able to go back. I don't want to lose it. Just... the white side of me... and the black side of me... having both of them is what makes it so enjoyable!

author: Road Kamelot
title: D.Gray-man
text: I guess Noah's can cry.

author: Road Kamelot
title: D.Gray-man
text: Allen has presumably exorcised Tyki's Noah.

author: Road Kamelot
title: D.Gray-man
text: You know, though I like Allen, my family is also special to me... This kind of feeling is the same as yours, Allen. Don't move. I am not quite myself at the moment. Do you want to see holes open up in the bodies of your companions?

author: Road Kamelot
title: D.Gray-man
text: You're so nice, Allen~ You hate me, don't you? Don't shoot. Your hand is also a weapon, Allen. But an Exorcist crying because an Akuma disappeared is a big no-no. If you act like that, no one will like you. Let's play again sometime, Allen.

author: Millenium Earl
title: D.Gray-man
text: Do not underestimate the Innocence... They will do anything to defeat us... for they are demons.

author: Millenium Earl
title: D.Gray-man
text: There's a famous saying in the East. Even with a crappy gun, shoot a lot and you'll hit something. I have a hell of a lot of Akuma.

author: Millenium Earl
title: D.Gray-man
text: I'm creating Akuma for people's sake.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: You can't just keep quiet and watch anymore, right? You are a failure.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: The time spent in the Order passed on. I soon came to a point where I didn't know whether my smiling face was a lie or not.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: No matter where we go, it's just battles, battles and battles. I get it already, humans are stupid.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: *to Allen* We're not their allies. We're only involved... in order to record history. A Bookman has no need for a heart.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: That's it! I've had it with this. YOU'RE SCARY!! You're freakin' scarier than the Akuma!!

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: I don't know, yeah? I'm suspicious of everything. I'm always suspicious of everyone around me. Someone I met yesterday could be an Akuma today. Cause that's the type of thing we're up against. You should understand that, Allen. We are at an overwhelming disadvantage. We're different from you, yeah? Not having that convenient eye. Akuma are mixed in with the humans. The other Exorcists and I... we end up looking at all humans as the Earl's minions.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Innocence... Please take these feelings and change them into strength to protect everbody. If you do that, I will follow you. I will follow you till the day it all ends. Wherever you take me. But...please, at the end... At the very end, you must promise me you'll let me return to my brother's side.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Please, God, I hate so much. Grant me power. For the first time, I want the Innocence so much.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: That day, when Brother came for me...that was when I thought I can't run from this place anymore. I stopped running away, back then. I stopped running...and I became an Exorcist.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: You shouldn't treat people's lives like toys. It's as if you're still kids, even though we're about the same age..! You're simply fools trying to look strong! For someone who treats this as a kid's game, Allen-kun who knows the importance of life is much, much stronger than you!!

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Move...Move! You are my legs! SO MOVE!!

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: ...we will. We will definitely win. I swear.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Miranda... Don't bear the burden alone, ok? You are not the only Exorcist. We are all in this together. We are all walking this road with you.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: We can't just go back from here. If we turn back now, we are trampling down on the lives of those that got us this far.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Lavi, when I got back to the ship, I was going to apologize. Allen, you've suffered so much. Yet, you're always looking out for me, thank you. I really shouldn't have borrowed this, Anita's precious hair band... Allen, I... I know you'll come back to us, that's what I decided to believe in.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: I said I'd kill him. Now get lost. Or should I start with you guys first?

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: You're naive. We're destroyers, not saviors.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: There are sacrifices that must be made, rookie.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: This coat isn't a pillow for the wounded..!! It's the uniform of an Exorcist!!!

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: Die? I...I cannot die before I find that person.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's...it's... gross. Knowing there's something inside me I don't understand. It's gross.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: When there's something you can't understand no matter how much you think about it, you can't just let yourself brood over it forever!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Tyki Mikk. There is something about us, Exorcists, that you do not understand. You think Exorcists are mere humans and by destroying their anti-Akuma weapon which is the Innocence...they will become powerless since they are mere humans. But the opponents you should really be afraid of are those humans.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: If it could come true, this is all I'd want. It would have been good if we just played poker and nobody died.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Stupid master... If you die, I'll hate you for it.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Because I am a small man, my heart is moved by what's in front of my eyes, not by what the world needs. I just can't abandon what's there in front of me. I want to protect everything I can!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Finally... I have come here, Mana. Finally, I am at the starting line.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: Hey, you, don't you dare call me by my first name or I'll slice you up!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Bring salvation to this poor akuma's soul!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: I will shave your entire body.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Kanda, isn't your long hair in the way? You should cut it. *after that Kanda tells him to GO DIE*

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: As If I'd go down that easily, dumbass.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: He's a she!

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: *beating his hammer in the sand* It's just like whack-a-mole and of course "Strike"!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: General Cross is worse than an akuma.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: *to Allen* Bean sprout!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Wow you guys are slow.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: Allen, you know you're bleeding, right?

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: *after Lenalee hits Lavi* Wow, Lenalee's punch of love.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: The only home that a man should ever need is within his heart.

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: I'd rather get whipped by a pretty girl like you, than fight this pesky war.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: This world is dark and it's so hard to breathe... but in this instant, when I laughed along with you, I felt that breathing just got a little more easier.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: My left I give you to the Akuma. My right I give you to the humans. Both are a part of me. And equally important. So neither side be disappointed. Humans as well as Akuma will be saved!

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: Kid, we came to pick you up, y'know ?

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: I am sure to choose my own path and walk down it, right? This path that I'm walking down... It's not the path that was chosen for me, is it?

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: God? I don't care about that. I've made an oath to myself that I would destroy the devil! To my friends that I would fight alongside them! To my Father that I would keep walking until the end..! I Made An Oath To All Of Them!! This is the only path that I can take to feel alive.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's because of you that we're here now. That is more than enough. I'll bear my own injuries. As long as I live, I'll be able to recover. If I live, I can heal. Although scars will remains.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: Even if I can no longer see out of my left eye, I intend to continue being an exorcist... Just like my friends. I have made the vow.

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: This is bad, Lenalee! You have to think more sexy thoughts, or else, you'll never find a lover!

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: What would you do if I told you that you would have to kill someone you love when you become the fourteenth?..

author: Komui Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: Hate the game, not the player. Hate the coffee, not komurin II.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: I want to be a destroyer who saves.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: *to Lavi* Get of your high horse!

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: Kitchen Knife-kun!

author: Komui Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: I'm a master of science.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: If you're going to fall, do it by yourself!

author: Timothy Hearst
title: D.Gray-man
text: Boobie squeeze!

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: *to Allen* If it gets cold we're gonna have to cuddle.

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: I ain't your son!

author: Yu Kanda
title: D.Gray-man
text: You fake gentleman!

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: *after Road suggests to make a farewell party for Skin* Don't you mean a funeral.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's just as you say. I wanted to tell you, that I'd come back. I knew you'd come for me, Brother... This time, I will kill you. I will kill you and become the Millenium Earl!

author: Lavi
title: D.Gray-man
text: War is sorrowful. The flames of war burn away life and dreams and bonds, leaving behind countless sorrows. So sorrow gives birth to tragedy. And tragedy gives birth to Akuma.

author: Lenalee Lee
title: D.Gray-man
text: If there's nobody left, even if the real world is saved, I'll be destroyed...

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: Let's overlook everything you did to the members of the Order... I'm not that cruel of a man after all. But then again, you went and messed up my clothes.

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: Oi! You! You're in the presence of a beautiful being! Filthy things shouldn't get near me!

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: No matter how faint our hopes are, even if we don't have anything we can rely on...I will NEVER give up!

author: Cross Marian
title: D.Gray-man
text: A path is something you create as you walk it. The ground you've trodden hardens, and that's what forms your path. You're the only one who can create your own path.

author: Yukito Tsukishiro
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *Laughing* Touya, you can't help but think that Sakura is really, really cute.

author: Yue
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I see you have a determined spirit, Sakura... however... I am not as sentimental as Keroberos.

author: Touya Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I'm really lucky to have a dinosaur for a little sister!

author: Meiling Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: If he can fly, I can fly! I can do anything he can!

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: You really loved Mr. Clow, didn't you? It hurts, doesn't it? It hurts to lose someone you love.

author: Clow Reed
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Water... is a thing that flows.

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Syaoran* No matter what you are thinking, if you don't say it, you won't be able to express it.

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Kero* Our relationship chart has gotten rather complicated.

author: Eriol Hiiragizawa
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I didn't know everything. There were a couple things that happened that weren't expected by myself or Clow Reed.

author: Eriol Hiiragizawa
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: In this life, I'm known as Eriol Hiiragizawa. In my past life, I was known as...Clow Reed.

author: Eriol Hiiragizawa
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Sakura* A smile suits best on your face.

author: Syaoran Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Sakura* I... I love you.

author: Syaoran Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I'm going to get all the Clow cards.

author: Syaoran Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Even if I lose this feeling, I'm sure that I'll just fall in love with you all over again.

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I am not a monster!

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Yue*  I don't want to be your master. I want to be your friend.

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: The person he loves, I love that person too, and I'm sure that person loves him too. So it's okay that he doesn't love me.

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of them will be acknowledged by others.

author: Touya Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Yuki, have some antidote before you leave. *to Yukito, as he eats Sakura's cooking*

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Kero* Stop eating snacks so mindlessly and think of what we can do!

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: *to Li* In the elevator, when you called me "Sakura", it made me very happy.

author: Yukito Tsukishiro
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I know! You must be hungry! No wait, that's me.

author: Kero
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Get my cool pose as well!

author: Spinel Sun
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I know our magic is hidden in these forms and he can't sense a thing. But a FAIRY?! How would YOU like to be called a fairy?!

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Men are complicated!

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: The greatest happiness for me is to let the person I most like have the most happiness.

author: Eriol Hiiragizawa
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: You always look at me with such a scary face.

author: Tomoyo Daidouji
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I have never dreamed that I would be chased by a piano...

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Yue-san is handsome, but Yukito-san is... schweeeet!

author: Kero
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: If that brat had become the Master, I'd have lost all my confidence to live!

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Living in a world without the feeling for the person you love most is too harsh!

author: Sakura Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Niichan, you really do work part-time everywhere...

author: Kero
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: I'm always where food is!

author: Touya Kinomoto
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Sakura's head is as hard as a rock.

author: Meiling Li
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Do Japanese panthers have wings?!

author: Kero
title: Cardcaptor Sakura
text: Girls are scary when they're angry!

author: Will Of The Abyss
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I always thought that red would suit Cheshire.

author: Will Of The Abyss
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Hey, hurry and come pick me up. I've prepared many different kinds of dolls for you. Let's play together. Let's chat until we feel sleepy. And also... and also... yeah... my beloved ones.

author: Will Of The Abyss
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Hurry. Hurry... come pick me up.

author: Will Of The Abyss
title: Pandora Hearts
text: You will definitely regret... choosing the Black Rabbit over me.

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: The sky, the people, and me... it's all so red.

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: No one needs to know what happened 100 years ago.

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I... I could never hate you!

author: Vincent Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: You don't remember?.. That's good.

author: Jack Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Glenn* I don't want to kill you!!

author: Jack Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Humans...are weak aren't they?

author: Jack Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Be careful. You're being watched by the Will of Abyss.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: She is me, and I am her. Our existence is both the same and different. Alice. That was the name we were given.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: In the book Sharon showed me, there was a man who became more energetic after his cheeks were bitten!

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: What is jealousy? Can you eat it? Is it sweet?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I'm in a contract with you. You are my manservant, and as a manservant, what were you thinking, leaving me behind!?

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I'm scared that I'm not human. I'm scared that I'm different from other chains... I fear the things I don't know. I fear the things I already knew... and at every moment... I always... more than anyone... fear myself the most!

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Shut up, Seaweed Head.

author: Alice
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Nobody touches my PROPERTY! And Oz is my manservant - therefore, he is my property!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Gilbert* Don't think that I will abandon you!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Break* Perhaps Break is a lot weaker than I always thought he was. However, I'm sure that he's a whole lot stronger than he thinks he is.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I feel so...warm. We know... This calm won't last for long, but...we can't help hoping... That this dreamlike moment... will last.. Forever..

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: There's no reason... I'm just merely, obeying what I believe within me!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: So... Alice just has to remain Alice!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I was rejected, never given any expectations... Then at least, I won't be a burden to others. It's alright if the only one who hurts is me!

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: It's fine, dummy! Since you're the one wearing it! *to Gilbert, while giving him clothes for the coming of age ceremony*

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: I want to know what it is, this "sin" they say I've committed.

author: Oz Vessalius
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Alice is my sun.

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: He makes you unhappy?...well then, Cheshire will destroy him!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Liar, liar, LIAR!!!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: You might as well let Cheshire eat you!

author: Cheshire Cat
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Everything that made you sad, everything that hurt you, Cheshire will destroy them!

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: In other words, it's fine if you die.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Alice* Shut up, you stupid rabbit.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: *to Oz* No matter what happens, I will be beside you.

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Protecting the master... is supposed to be my job!

author: Gilbert Nightray
title: Pandora Hearts
text: Young Master!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: *after Kain asks him if he getting slapped by Kaname was worth thinking about Yuuki's blood* Shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up!!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: BANG!

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: The nice smell is your blood, Yuki.

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: Hey baby, what's your blood type?

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: I wish to erase the past but I have killed too many vampires to let that happen.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: His and my passionate oath!

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: I want to put an end to the war between humans and vampires – a war that has been continuing in the darkness of history since ancient times! I want the young vampires, with their natural intelligence and unfettered hearts, to become a bridge between the two species!! I'm educating them for that purpose! That is why I created the Night Class!

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: What is beautiful is not the world, but your beautiful eyes that embraces it.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: *to Yuki* You have stopped opening your heart to me. That's the only thing about you that has to change.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Are you sure? Even if the hidden truth is drenched in blood... Do you still want to know?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I've been wondering ever since before, why do you always look so sad whenever you're with me?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: It's all right, for now. Yuki will eventually come to me.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Humans should never be turned into vampires. But in the old days, hidden from history, when the war between vampires and vampire hunters was at its peak, vampires turned many humans into vampires to use in battle. And now the aristocrats have the duty to manage those survivors. Sometimes we have to kill them off...

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: It's all right. You be just the way you are, Yuki. You're different from the Night Class students who wait on me... You're a warm-hearted girl, Yuki. That's more than enough.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: The blood has stopped flowing, but the puncture wounds...he really pierced you deeply. Yuki...does it hurt? Are you afraid of vampires now?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You devoured her mercilessly. She can't even stand up. Was her blood so delicious?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: A human bitten by a pureblood vampire transforms into a vampire. When that happens, there can be only one of two results, dying from the loss of blood, or unfavorably surviving and suffering the pain of slowly transforming into a vampire. Other vampires don't possess this dark power that purebloods have. I respect his strength of will, he was only a human, yet he resisted the powerful vampire instinct for four years.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Headmaster Cross, how much longer are you going to keep Zero in the Day Class? That time is approaching for him.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: After we turn around, the next time we see each other, I will kill you.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Listen up, brats! Get the hell back to your dorms! Why do I have to deal with you running around screaming "Kyaa! Kyaa!" every damn day?! Why?!

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: But you thought it would be okay to become a vampire, right? I will never let you turn into something like that. Even if it means I have to make Kaname Kuran my enemy...and even if it means you will hate me.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Former humans eventually fall into the Level E category, Yuki. They gradually lose their sanity, reaching their "end" - their destruction.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: I borrowed it from the Headmaster. It's a gun to use against vampires. If I lose the human part of me, and go mad as a vampire...shoot me with that gun. Not yet, but that day will eventually come. Kill me by your own hand then.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: I couldn't stop myself from devouring you. I may kill the next human I target as my prey. Shoot me. You're afraid of me, aren't you? Hold the gun with both hands, and aim straight. Aim for my heart. It's not a crime to kill a vampire.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: You heard it too? The sound of your blood being sucked in by me. After such a hair-raising experience you can't act as if nothing has changed. So don't interfere anymore.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Come on vampires. I've been pissed off lately.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: The Headmaster talks about the Night Class like they're good vampires who support his pacifism, but I don't trust them. I won't let my guard down. I'm cooperating so I can find the most effective way to kill those beasts in human form.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I will keep running away so Zero has a reason to live.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Both of us understand, but neither of us will say it. It's a sin to keep a vampire alive by offering my own blood as bait. We are doing something that is forbidden. No one must find out about this.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Being like this makes me feel like we've returned to the old days somewhat. Yeah. Zero is Zero. Even if you are a vampire now.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I didn't understand anything. Zero suffered and suffered for four years. What were you thinking, all by yourself? He loathes vampires so much, he wants to kill them all. All this time, Zero wanted to kill himself too.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, I can't accept it after all, that my most precious girl was bitten by another.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: When I think of him, I feel so much love and such sadness...is it a bad thing that the same feeling makes me want to latch onto his throat and devour his blood and even his life to taste his feelings in it?

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: I refuse to breathe the same air as those creatures. I refuse to wear the stupid uniform full of buttons that those creatures wear. If I am imprisoned in a classroom full of those creatures, I will certainly lose it, I will massacre every single one of them.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You are the only one who brings color into the dull gray ashes that my heart is.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: If my only option I have is to lose you, then I would prefer death instead. Be it yours, by my hand, or could you please kill me then yuki..?

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Her warm hands against my face like that... They were like a plank I would hold on to, so I wouldn't drown.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: It is the vampire hunter's duty to kill vampires.

author: Hanabusa Aidou
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, who made those wounds on your neck? In our classroom the night before last, we suddenly smelt blood, we were surprised. I was the only one who noticed right away that it was your blood.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: That's right...you should run away. Yuki...you make me cruel.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I didn't think that the day would come where you would talk about other guys. How unfair.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, don't cry. For this day to come, I have waited impatiently for a very long time.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You've finally fallen to the blood lust of beasts, Zero.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You could never betray her, because you are under her obligation. You are being let to live because of that, Zero. By me.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I'm a bit annoyed that you bit me without any restraint.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do not ever forget...who gave you this blood.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: A glimpse of what I saw earlier was something so distant from me. And yet right now, this man is lying here in my arms. It's such a strange feeling.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: I still think about protecting you two...even if it's considered as an act of taboo by "humans".

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Go Yuki... Go and be by the side of the man who can spend an eternity with you.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I long for him...but I understand. There's a line that vampires and humans can't cross.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: Because Yuui was there, I might have been able to live on...

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki is my dear girl. The only one in the entire world.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: You're a disgrace to all vampires.

author: Kaien Cross
title: Vampire Knight
text: If you need to, Zero, you can drink my blood... *blush blush*

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: I want these gentle hands... and this kind smile...Even though I should not want such a thing.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Yuki, the safest place is beside me.

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: I love you Kaname-sama. You are the beginning of my world, and everything in that world... So even if I couldn't remember my past...I wasn't scared.

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do you want to be a vampire Yuuki, become a blood sucking monster like me....and live for eternity by my side...?

author: Kaname Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: Do you want to be my friend..?

author: Nia Teppelin
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I can't know about somebody who isn't here. But, you shouldn't depend on people who aren't here.

author: Nia Teppelin
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Do you want to die? If you're scared, it's okay to run.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Yoko* If your fat ass slows us down, I'll leave you behind, Undergrounder.

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I have no reason to listen to anything a human says!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Kamina* However, surprise attacks need more than surprise. It won't work again.

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Kamina* Boasting like that is just asking for death.

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I'll tell you two things: First, any human on the surface will be completely annihilated by our Human Eradication Army. Second, that is my dinner - give it back!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: This-Is-The-Real-Spirit-Of-Men' Cannonball Attack!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
