text: How-Dare-You-Do-That-To-My-Precious-Underling' Punch!!!!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Well, Well, Well, Well... Listen up, big guys! I'll only say this once... Undefeatable, untouchable, with no regrets! Never looking back, never wavering! You can't win against this man's will! Gurren Brigade's Kamina-sama will be your opponent! Believe it!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If you become a wall that stands in my way... I'll tear open a hole and break through you every time! That's... MY DRILL!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: We'll break through the heavens and dimensions!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Our burning blood will cut through fate!

author: Viral
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Now then... I've come to reclaim my helm! That's what I wanted to say, but before that... put on some damn clothes!!!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: *to Nia* I don't fully understand, but it doesn't matter why you were born, or if you're a princess. The Nia right here is you. So it's okay if you just be yourself.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Who-The-Hell-Do-You-Think-I-Am kick!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: My-Wife-Is-The-Best-In-The-Universe throw!

author: Yoko Littner
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I keep telling you I'm a girl!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If there's no road, we'll forge it with our own hands!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: If there's a wall in our way, we'll destroy it!

author: Simon
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Bro is dead. He's no longer here. However, on my back, within my heart, he continues to live on!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: When I feel weak, or when I lack self-confidence, I remember Simon's back as he dug tirelessly. I wanted to become a man who's back would never break. That's what I thought.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: When we were trapped in that hole...there was nothing I could do. But Simon just kept on digging. Believing in my show of courage. In the end, he was the one who saved me.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I didn't have any confidence. I thought I was living the wrong way. Impatiently. Why couldn't I go where my father could? Truthfully, I wasn't strong enough.

author: Yoko Littner
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Kamina told me before. "He's the one that always saves me.", "He's the one that doesn't give up, even at the end.".

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: Listen up, Simon. Don't forget. Believe in yourself. Not in you who believes in me. Not in me who believes in you. Believe in yourself!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: I can't even rest in peace, can I..?

author: Shinku
title: Rozen Maiden
text: In the eyes of the weak, everyone is strong. But I am truly strong.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Meatball head, don't go in there alone! You'd probably get lost in your own closet!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Psst, hey Rei, major question. You didn't forget to kiss Chad goodbye, did you?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Come on you pastey-faced two-timing nega-twit!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You want trouble pal... you're lookin' at it!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Hello? Planet earth to player b.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I'm alright, but the big ugly thing isn't.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: *referring to Tsukino* Are you stupid, or just incredibly lazy?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You know, Darien. Even in a dream, you're just toogood to be true.

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Stupid weatherman, he NEVER gets it right!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Who needs sunshine anyways...

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: I am Darian, Prince of Earth.

author: Ami Mizuno
title: Sailor Moon
text: The future is something you build by yourself.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Who wants that? I'd rather choose to fall in love and be hurt. Sometimes I can't even sleep because I love someone too much. And there's always sadness in our lives. It's that sad feeling that keeps us going.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: It's sad that a selfish woman like you will never know how wonderful being in love is! Your beautiful world of ice will just be a dark land of death! How could a world without life be beautiful?

author: Rei Hino
title: Sailor Moon
text: We're gonna chew you up, and spit you out!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Whoops! Froze the whipping cream!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Jupiter Thunder Crash!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Venus Crescent Beam!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You use you power only for evil, Jedite. Big mistake.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Give it back! Give it back to Raye right now! You'll pay for your rotten ways!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Bullying little kids, how far you go, pal? Are you just a schoolyard bully?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I won't let you take her... do you hear me? Nobody takes her without facing me first... YOU'RE DUSTED BUSTER!

author: Rei Hino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I've had it with this itchy costume! We were supposed to be dwarves, remember? Not animals! I feel like some little five-year old back in kindergarten!

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: That's as good an excuse as any. Now it's my turn. You better take some notes, 'cause you're gonna get beaten and beaten badly.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: Very impressive, you didn't land a single punch.

author: Mamoru Chiba
title: Sailor Moon
text: You've got guts, Jupiter. But it takes more than guts to beat the Negaverse. Give up now, you'll never win.

author: Rei Hino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Mars Fire Ignite!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: You've got to stop reading so many romance novels!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Look who's talking! You think the paperboy likes you just because he rides by your front door every morning!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I was just warming up, hotshot.

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Better enjoy that laugh, Beryl. It's the last one you'll ever have.

author: Ami Mizuno
title: Sailor Moon
text: Mercury Bubble Blast!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: *to Sammy* You're cruisin' for a bruisin'!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I am Sailor Moon! I stand for love. And I also stand for justice. And in the name of the Moon, I will punish you!

author: Minako Aino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Venus lovechain encircle!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Moon Prism Power! ...And make it fast!

author: Makoto Kino
title: Sailor Moon
text: But I'm the one with the most talent here!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: A talking cat! Oh man, I have been studying too hard!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: Ow! That hurt! I don't want to do this anymore!

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: *while being chased by a jet* How will I ever explain to my friends why I have tire tracks down my back?

author: Usagi Tsukino
title: Sailor Moon
text: I am Sailor Moon, the champion of justice! In the name of the Moon, I will punish you! I will right wrongs and triumph over evil and that means you!

author: Hikaru Hitachiin
title: Ouran High School Host Club
text: Good God, is she in the running for 'brattiest princess ever'? Must've been spoiled rotten when she was growing up

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: People are able to hold onto hope, since death is that which cannot be seen.

author: Allen Walker
title: D.Gray-man
text: It's not luck, I'm cheating.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You're such a child. You talk of nothing but pipe dreams... there are times when people must make painful choices.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: That's why for you, you have the right to be cruel to me. No matter how much you make me worry or how much danger you put me in, just as much as you like. But these are not enough "compensation". Even if I have to sacrifice my left over life for you, I would not utter a word of complaint.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: You said it yourself once...The reason why they look like humans...is so that they can hunt us down more efficiently.

author: Zero Kiriyuu
title: Vampire Knight
text: If you go one step ahead of me, I'll make you cry...

author: Shinichi Kudou
title: Detective Conan
text: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost. That is alchemy's first law of equivalent exchange. In those days, we really believed that to be the world's one and only truth.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If he made a ripple in the long, long lazy life of a demon, then Alois Trancy's soul also was worth cracking open, per...haps.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Passion to insincerity, lies to reality, a stray dog into an Earl. That is...'s but...ler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Ciel Phantomhive, I will pierce your soft skin with my needle... and slowly suck out your sensual soul.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Say, have your demonic senses weakened after devoting too much to that human's soul?

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Passion to calm, hesitation to resolve, love to gravestones. That is the Trancy butler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I simply have a hell of a desire to devour you, Master.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: For a mere butler, to go that far... Don't worry, Young Master. The menial soul that can give love to one is only a butler.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *teasing Sebastian* A demon and a butler... I am one too.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Master.. I will always stay by your side. Day and night, sugar and salt, living and dead, impure and pure.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* To touch something that is meant to transport food with one's shoes is a disgrace for a butler!

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Alois* I am your loyal servant. Even if you do not try to attract my attention, I want to greedily devour you to the very end.

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes, Your Highness.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Everyone, everything is happy!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* Oh, so we were not going to the restroom together?

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Luka* They should all die! All of them! Everything, annihilated!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: My heart was entwined in a spider web. You'll always be my Highness. I wanted your love.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: How does my blood smell? Do you want to devour me now?

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* Then show me those eyes. Not the eyes of those villagers who looked as if they'd seen a pile of vomit. Not the old man's greedy, inflamed eyes. That day, those eyes. Those eyes that longed only for me, Claude.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* You are...you yourself are...My Highness!

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Hannah, don't you think a sunny-side-up egg is pitiable? Its shell is broken and it's forced to publicly show an indecorous appearance. Then it becomes an eyeball, internal organs, or a plume. And I rob it of any and all possibilities.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: How pitiable.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: In this world, Earl, there're people who can't survive because of the cruelty of reality. I sell those people dreams.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: The spider's web has already been woven. The more you struggle, the harder it becomes to escape from those bonds. Whatever the prey, once they get involved with me, catching them is only a matter of time.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I've got to exterminate the bad rats infesting my city, don't I? So I keep a cat. Meow!

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: The earl said there's no point in going after the small fries, but someone who tries something once will try it again, right?

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Meh, Ran-Mao is my little sister. Yeah, my sister. Even though we aren't related by blood.

author: Lau
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* That means you will steadily sink into mud. Even if you step toward a place from which you can't return, you choose not to reveal your screaming for help to other people, eh?

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *referring to Vincent Phantomhive* I came to love my red hair that was just like my father's. I came to love red. I came to love you.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I used to hate my red hair that was just like my father's. I used to hate red.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You want to take revenge for my murdered sister? Sister would definitely have not... we would not have wanted you to be like this.

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *when Ciel questions why he's dressed up as a female for Aleister's party* Because I've always wanted a daughter! A cute daughter who would look lovely in those long flowing dresses!

author: Madame Red
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *referring to getting into Aleister Chamber's party* Aren't you underestimating me? Aren't I rather popular? A few words here and there and it'll be arranged.

author: Maylene
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'll keep to what the young master has told me. To face the master with a clean mansion every day. That is a maid's job. I wipe away the mansion's dirt.

author: Maylene
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: These are my precious glasses that the young master bought for me! These maid outfits as well. Before I'd come here, I'd never worn anything like a skirt. I'm so happy I'm a maid now.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: The young master doesn't give me injections every day. The young master doesn't kill my friends. The young master doesn't lock me up. I love it here. That's why I decided I'd protect it.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Agni, who tells him to be nice to the trees* Treat them kindly,' huh? Before I came here, I don't think I would have understood. But now, I feel like I can do it!

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It used to be that I couldn't go outside like this. So now it's fun to do it every day. I can touch trees and bugs and people.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *when Agni asks him to mash potatoes* It requires strength? Since that's the case, I might be able to do it! I wanna do it! Please allow me to do it!

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: But my strength is too large, so Mr. Sebastian forbids me to touch anything in the kitchen.

author: Finnian
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *after Sebastian tells him to design the garden* Then... then ... I'll make a cool garden that looks like a transforming robot! Can I?!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Do not-arrogant people exist?

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I ... humiliated as a pet ... my house was burnt, my family was killed. I was such a... powerless kid. Therefore, I returned to this place in order to make those people who put me through such fate taste the same humiliation. The successors of the generations killed three years prior would come to me as long as I am the head of the Phantomhive family that stands in their way. I'm waiting ...for them to come and try to kill me here.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: So what? You're another person, so of course you look different. What do you need to be ashamed for? Besides, I'm free to be with whoever I want. No one has the right to say anything about it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Listen when people are talking to you!!!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: He is nothing more than one of my pawns. However, he is not a normal pawn. He is a pawn that can get across the whole board in one move.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: What are you lazily standing around for? You obtained me my revenge. This is an order! Come and eat my soul already! Until the very moment when you eat all my soul you are my butler - Sebastian Michaelis!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Let's go, you cat-obsessed moron.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm sorry. Seeing Sebastian's corpse so many times... is just too much for me...

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm a human being, Sebastian!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm arrogant, but not so much that I'd irresponsibly save someone just to brag about it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* I don't need your "fawning". It's disgusting.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Prince Sohma* Who's my best friend? Don't say such ridiculous things.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It's in bad taste to play games that make me feel like throwing up, Demon!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Enough already! I'm going to feel queer if I continue to live like this!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Father, Mother, God, please... Why? Why is there no one? No one comes to our rescue.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* You shall never betray me. You shall never leave my side. No matter what!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm afraid today's game was quite uninteresting.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: To smile happily, I've... forgotten.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* You idiot!! Do you think I'd dance with a big, male partner like you?!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It's not like I became her fiancée. I was forced to do it.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes, "kids" have a great greed for games.

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Ah, I can finally appear before you in my real form! Because isn't it embarrassing to appear before a handsome guy without makeup?

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Such an ice king you are! A beautiful tyrant! An angelic devil! A raven with the wings of a dove! My little lamb with the appetite of a wolf... My very own Sebastian DARLING!!!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* Ally? What's with that cliched word? Supreme love is always a battle to death!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I am the queen of all fruits!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* This is great! I'm getting goosebumps all over my body, Little Sebas-chan! If I have your child, I will definitely give birth to it!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm going to use the heels of my shoes to step on this cold, uncaring face of yours! I want you to lick my shoes clean!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: A good man's past makes people curious! But if he's a bad man, then it makes me wanna see even more!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* Don't say that. I'm sure you'll become addicted to the taste of my "death scythe".

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Even if I'm like this, I'm still the butler of death!

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Lately, I've only been encountering unsophisticated prey. My scythe and I are unsatisfied.

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Oh, Little Sebas-chan, I do love red the most. Hair, clothes, lipstick, I love them to be red. That's why I love using fresh blood to do make-up for those ugly women. The more flamboyant a woman is, the more she's as beautiful as a poisonous flower, right?

author: Grell Sutcliff
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Sebastian* I really wanna do some vigorous exercise with you.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Those round and innocent eyes that know no filth or foulness, those tails that lovingly swish as if they belong to nobility, those paws in the soft shade of warm light pink!

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Grell* You really have no standards.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Yes...I am a demon. There's no way I could understand my prey, a human's sense of taste. What I understand is...only the taste of a human's soul.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Grell* Isn't it a hot day?

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Hannah* I have a contract. Even if you steal him from me, he is still my Young Master. The lot of you aren't fit to even lick his soul.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Forsake the future, sacrifice your dreams, while stained with deep despair, elude the past, fight the reality, and never relinquish your nobility. Just like that, Young Master. That is the soul I wish to consume.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude, teasing him* This is your way, right? Day into night, sugar into salt, dark blue into gold. Then I will turn the gold... into black.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Young Master... It's time to wake up.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Now I can show you my true nature.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Claude* How can you say that. I'm one hell of- wait, it's still early for that.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I do not need a thousand souls, I only need one, which is my master's.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I'm a butler. I can't let my master see the form that speaks badly of my reputation.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* I shall make it as gentle as possible.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Heaven? That has no hold over me.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* I am your knight, after all.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Unseemly... ugly... vicious... My true form.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Cats are great. They don't talk about useless things. Or do them. Nothing is cuter. They are something that don't exist in my world. They have pets over there as well...but...it doesn't quite compare.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Beast*  Wouldn't it be good to forget everything even if it's just for tonight? Indulge in pleasure...breathe a sweet poison deep into your lungs.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel*  In your current state...you are even more like...My Lady.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: For a king to survive it's good for him to be able to skillfully manipulate the other pieces using both the knight and the queen. Beneath the throne the bodies of your pieces will pile up along with your sins. You must not lose.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You're a child when it's convenient, huh.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Any game becomes boring when it lacks thrills.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: As long as there is the contract, I will protect your life. However, if you make a mistake of your own accord, you will possibly suffer a painful experience while alive. You already know that, don't you?

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to William Spears* My, my. How difficult to handle alone. But this large quantity of souls, shall a demon like me offer you assistance with them?

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It has nothing to do with England or India. No matter where or when, it's the same. Humanity, that is.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* Well, aren't you a very young master. You have summoned me. This fact will not change for all eternity. What has been sacrificed will never be returned. Now... choose.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *talking to other servants* Why don't you all kneel down on the ground and beg for even a mere scrap of Agni's talents? Perhaps it would even improve you a little.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: However, when trying to reach your goals, you need to learn how to eat some humble pie occasionally. If you don't, one small trip one day might mean your fall.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Humans cannot reject temptation. When they are plunged into the depths of despair, likened to hell, they will hold on to anything that may help them escape from the situation they are in, even if it's merely a spider's thread, no matter what sort of humans they are.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Heaven? I don't have an affinity with that place.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *about Finnian* I have lived for a long time, but this is my first time meeting a space alien. What kind of counter-attack is that sparkly, smiley face expecting from me?

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: It seems your talent for dancing is non-existent. It must be crushing, young master.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Now... Earl, give me that!

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* You don't need to tell me, I know why you came, with just one look I can tell what's on your mind.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I wonder, if the butler isn't here, is the earl just a child who can't do anything?

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Victoria, aye? I'm not a fan. She sits herself up so high above everyone else, and leaves the painful dirty work to the earl.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Today is a particular woman's special gala. The final great ceremony in each human's life. A funeral.

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I don't want any of the queen's money!

author: Undertaker
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: *to Ciel* Welcome, Earl. Do you want to see how it feels to sleep in my custom-made coffin?

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: This is super-dimensional soccer. (he's not freaking kidding)

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: My presence is thin.

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: It's been a long time since I talked this much, so I felt really nervous.

author: Kageno Jin
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I came here because I want to be a man with a more visible existence.

author: Ichinose Kazuya
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I want to play soccer with you Endou!

author: Ichinose Kazuya
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Endou! Show me the soccer I came to love!

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I need to be faster.

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I need more power to beat Aliea Academy.

author: Kazemaru Ichirouta
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'm not as strong as you, Endou.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Fideo* Thanks for bringing that man back to his old self.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Kageyama* So this is the real you.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Endou* Maybe when I join your team, I may find the soccer I'm trying to find.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: When I kick the ball, I feel like I'm playing with my father.

author: Kidou Yuuto
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Haruna* I never stopped thinking about you.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Being perfect doesn't mean I had to become Atsuya. It was to fight alongside my friends...To become one with them!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I swore with Atsuya that I would become stronger with him.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'll become perfect through this match. For everyone's sakes, I have to!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I want to be useful to the team!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Coach please let me play in this match!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: I'm not perfect, I can't help anyone.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: If I stay here, nothing about me will change.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Why am I sitting here? I chose to stay with the Captain and the others so I could become perfect.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: We're getting goals, right? Just leave it to me!

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: You can't win without good defense.

author: Fubuki Shirou
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Let's run like the wind together.

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: On Earth, there aren't any allies or enemies when the match is over.

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: *to Gouenji* You're always late!!

author: Endou Mamoru
title: Inazuma Eleven
text: Don't mind! Don't mind!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Oh, a headband! *runs off in that direction*

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: In the manga, when I wasn't in the picture, even if I didn't sing nobody noticed, but if I don't sing in the anime...

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Make sure you don't mistake soy sauce for sugar.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: He's so cute, I want to put peanuts in his nose.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: We'll follow her BUTT and find out what kind of guy she's dating!

author: Jun Suzuki
title: K-ON!
text: MAN! I'M SO JEALOUS!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I want to be able to snap my fingers!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: The Cake is a Lie!

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: Where on earth would you find such a hot fifty year old?

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Wait, does that mean you're in your fifties?

author: Ritsu Tainaka
title: K-ON!
text: Thou art not good! Thou shalt not become a great actress at this rate!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: You and Mio-chan...you're hitting each other and bonding through bodily contact, right?

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Ritsu~! Don't do this~! MEN ARE ANIMALS!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I have one last request. Please slap me in the face with that wad of cash.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I'm tree G! Pose of a tree!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: I'm FLYING!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: High schoolers are kind of amazing!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Mugi-chan, you have really thick eyebrows.

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: *to Ritsu* If you were a boy, I am sure you would be very popular with the girls!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Jello is nice...

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: We didn't call you because we thought you have a date with your boyfriend or something.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: All your sweets are belong to me!

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: Do you want me to transform you into someone that even you won't recognize?

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: *joyfully* I've never caught a cold! *they say only idiots don't catch colds*

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Tapping!?

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Speed shredding!?

author: Ritsu Tainaka
title: K-ON!
text: Teeth shredding!?

author: Sawako Yamanaka
title: K-ON!
text: I'll go out with you if you want.

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Not joining a club means you become a NEET?!

author: Yui Hirasawa
title: K-ON!
text: Squishy~!

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: I've always wanted someone to ask me if I would like fries with that.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: Would something like that make her feel better... - OH, IT DID!

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: There are only two kinds of rock guitarists: Jeff Beck and everyone else.

author: Tsumugi Kotobuki
title: K-ON!
text: Yes, but I'd rather be friends with fun people that I don't meet often.

author: Mio Akiyama
title: K-ON!
text: So we're like rare animals?

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *about Shikamaru* Amazing. This slacker-clown outsmarted me!

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: Sharpen your kama at sunset.

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *to Lee* Get yourself and that loser out of my way.

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: *to Shikamaru* You are awfully fragile. What kind of man are you?

author: Temari
title: Naruto
text: Wasn't much of a match...kinda boring.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! So there is no Suna, no Iwa, no Konoha, no Kiri, and no Kumo! There are only "shinobi"!

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: He was the one who taught me to deepen my bond with my people. Thanks to him, I was able to regain my true self. That village has him, the one who cherishes a friend's bond more than anyone I know. Naruto Uzumaki... Knowing him and the friends he holds so dear, they will overcome this disaster and grow even stronger from it.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: This is where it all starts for me. Starting with this small bond. I too want to become someone who is needed, instead of a weapon that is feared. And as the Kazekage of Sunagakure.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I know him well. He takes too many risks when it comes to his friends...that's why.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* I think of you as a friend. I used to think "friend" was just another word... Nothing more, nothing less. But when I met you, I realized what was important was the word's meaning.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* If you're truly prepared to take up the mantle of a Kage, then as Sasuke's friend, you know what you have to do.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Peace under an illusion is not a true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: When did you forsake yourselves?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Up until now, my bonds with others have only been ones of hatred and murder. But, seeing him fight so hard made me wonder what a bond really is. I think I understand a little now. Suffering, sadness...and joy. To be able to share it with another person. Naruto Uzumaki...when I fought him, I feel that is what he taught me.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: You're the same then. When you feel the honor of your idol under scrutiny... you become enraged, as if it were your own honor being questioned. The more precious your idol is to you... the harder you fight for him.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* You have the same eyes as I do...the eyes, filled with hatred and death, that long for strength... Just like mine. Your eyes tell me how badly you wish to kill the one who put you through the hell called loneliness.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I am a relic they want to get rid of, so why do I exist and live? In order to exist you need a purpose, to exist for no reason is the same as being dead... I would love only myself and fight for only myself. If all other people exist to magnify that love, then there is no more a splendid universe than this one...

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: The corpse's bitter crimson tears flow and mingle with the endless sand, filling the chaos within me - and making me stronger.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I finally understand... I'm alone. I won't believe in anyone, or love anyone. I'm alone.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: What does pain feel like?

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: I wasn't cast aside. It was my choice, and mine alone.

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru* But why? How could you do this!? I don't get it, I've looked up to you more than anyone in the world!

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *about Sasuke* I don't care what the heck he is! If he stays, he's a danger to everyone! Don't you see!? As he gets stronger, so does the Curse Mark! That thing is feeding off his chakra! It's a Forbidden Jutsu that devours the one who bears it! It's incredible the kid's still standing. By now, he...should be dead.

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru* This is no time to reminisce, you're an S-class criminal, top of the most wanted list. You've got to be taken down, and it's only fitting that I'm the one to do it. 'Cause after all, you're the one that taught me everything, right, Sensei?

author: Anko Mitarashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Tough guys like you usually leave their blood all over this forest.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: He was a worthy opponent! A man who lived and died like a real shinobi! Kisame Hoshigaki! I'll remember that name for the rest of my life!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: *to Kisame* A failure will win even at the cost of their own life!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: That's it, Lee! Let the power of youth explode!!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: When a man struts around like a peacock, acting like Mr. Big Stuff, he should keep his promises. Even if it kills him.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: Gahh! Kakashi! You make me so mad! Why do you have to act so cool?!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: You have the gift of perseverance, and that's what makes you a genius too!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: Don't let anything stir you up the path you have drawn for yourself! Forge ahead in the end! Stick to it Lee! Make me proud! Be everything you can be!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: You worked hard Lee, there's no doubt in my mind the surgery will be a success. You have the power to shape your own destiny. And on the one-in-one thousand, no, one in a million chance something to happen to go wrong, I will die right along with you. Since the day I met you, my nindō has been to train you to become the most splendid ninja possible. That's a promise!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: *to Neji* I was a failure when I was your age, but now I can even beat Kakashi, the elite genius. It's only a matter of time until Lee finally surpasses you!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: People call me the Leaf's Noble Gentleman!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: That's it, Lee! Run...run towards the setting sun!... But don't mess up your hair!

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: Look deep into my eyes and accept my sincere apology! Also notice my handsome manly features.

author: Might Guy
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* What is with your attitude?! We'll never be young like this again!

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: I kind of hate him.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: If you fight me, you won't be able to recover. Forfeit and withdraw.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: Never underestimate your opponent, no matter how small they may seem.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: Even if it's been a while, you should remember your comrades faces. Why? Because otherwise you will hurt their feelings when they call out to you.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: I hate explaining the same thing twice.

author: Shino Aburame
title: Naruto
text: This is what a real trump card is.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: If I kick enough asses I might even end up Hokage!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Let's die together.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You? Hokage? You can't even beat me! No-one's deluded enough to think that you have what it takes to become the next Hokage, not even you! Tell you what, though... I'll become Hokage in your place!

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Don't think you can run away from my nose.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Heh, I don't know what's going on, but I'm always up for getting wild.

author: Kiba Inuzuka
title: Naruto
text: Yahoo! Akamaru, let's do this!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: I'm gonna eat until I can eat no more!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: I can't forgive you for calling me fat! But even more than that... Not just for stealing the last chip... or calling me fat... most importantly I won't forgive anyone who insults my best friend!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: Fat!? I'm big boned!

author: Chouji Akimichi
title: Naruto
text: *to Shikamaru* I won't let even YOU eat the last barbecue chip!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: My master entrusted me with a lot, from big things to little things. It's the same for you an unlimited number of things, don't you think it's about time for us, to be the ones who entrust not the entrusted, it's a pain in the ass but I can't say that. Someday you'll be the one to treat others to ramen and you'll be called Master Naruto... We can't stay kids forever, like Asuma and Jiraiya, I wanna be as cool as them.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Temari* Subtle as a rhino... she might even be scarier than my mom.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about women, to his father* If women made you a better person, I wouldn't want to know what you were like before.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about girls* C'mon. You know what they're like. You can never figure them out. You never know where you could stand with them. The smallest things could put you in their bad side. Always playing little mind games with you. Trying to make you do what they want. They're just a big pain basically.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: When you have that kid, I'll have to protect it. So I've gotta grow up to be a cool adult too!

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: We're not stupid enough to go out there planning to die.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Hidan* That pathetic Lord Jashin or whatever isn't your God anymore. I am. The only one bringing down vengeance is me.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Hidan* See, you and I have different beliefs. I believe in the Will of Fire.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Ughh. Great. What's the point in setting the alarm if I'm going to wake up before it goes off? What a total waste. Now I've gotta shut it off but I don't feel like moving. But if I don't shut it off it will just keep ringing and ringing. Sigh. It makes me tired just thinking about the whole thing. Some mornings are such a drag...

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: You would think just this once, when it was life or death, I could pull through.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: I never really liked Sasuke, but all the same, he's a member of the Hidden Leaf village, he's a comrade and I'll put my life on the line to help him, that's the way of our village. I know I usually seem like a pretty lazy guy, but not today. Because now, I'm responsible for your lives too.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: Sometimes I wish I was just a cloud, floating along.

author: Nara Shikamaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Ino* What a drag... I say a single thing against Sasuke, and I have to get that evil look from her eyes.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: Who're you calling "pig", you billboard brow?!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: *to Sakura* You bloomed into a beautiful flower.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: *talking about Naruto* I could almost fall for him.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Wise words, Guy sensei! So simple but filled with such profound meaning!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: The lotus of the Leaf Village blooms twice.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: I want to show I can be a splendid ninja as well even if I don't have ninjutsu or genjutsu... I want to prove it to the whole world!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Sakura, please go out with me! I'll protect you with my life!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: A rock thrown at a pole will not hit, but if one does not aim at the pole, it will hit! That is the law I used!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: Amazing... The brilliance of the blade... the design. They're all beautiful! I want to take them all home!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: Three members of Team Guy specializes in Close-Contact battles so I often render aid from the distance. I don't mind providing back up, but I was hoping to find new ninja tools that would enable me to fight on the front lines.

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: You're gonna fight Sasuke alone? And you think all of us are just gonna stand here and let you?!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: Let's just say I don't like being kept in the dark!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I'm not running away and I'm not giving up. I will save this child.

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I won't let that happen. You're not getting off that easy. No way! The people you and Raiga killed, they all wanted to live but you didn't leave them that choice! You decided for them! Well you don't get to decide this time, ok?! You're gonna live and you're going to take some responsibility for all those people's lives you cut short!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I can't stand weak and indecisive people!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: I want to be a great and powerful ninja! To walk in the footsteps of the legendary kunoichi, Tsunade!

author: Tenten
title: Naruto
text: It's not because they're girls you know, Neji. It's just that those two are using kid gloves. It doesn't matter if you're a man or woman in battle.

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: *last words* When the tree leaves dance, one shall find flames. The fire's shadow will illuminate the village, and once again, tree leaves shall bud anew.

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: It is a place where every year shinobi are born, raised, grow old, fight, and die to protect their home. These people are precious to me. We share a home, we share a life, and though we may not share ties of blood, they are precious to me. They are my family. And if I do fall, you still will fail. I am only one of a long line. I carry this title in trust for those Hokage who came before and those who will come after. I am the Third Hokage!

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: I wonder...do you have it, young as you are... the Will of Fire?

author: Hiruzen Sarutobi
title: Naruto
text: He has combined Shadow Clone with his own invention, the Sexy Jutsu. What a foolish ninja technique...and he could probably get me with it, too.

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: I am the Fifth Hokage... You've trampled on our ancestors treasure...their dream...and you will pay the price! As the Hokage, I will put a stop to you here and now!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: *talking to the advisers* People like Jiraiya...and Sarutobi, and Elder Chiyo of the Sand possessed something you two sorely lack. Do you know what that is!? ...Faith! My grandfather, the First Hokage, believed in you and entrusted you with the village. Now it's your turn to believe in these children and entrust it to them!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: Grow up... Death comes with being a shinobi. There are times when death is hard to accept, but if you don't get over it, there's no future...

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru about Naruto* "I will die before I let you touch him!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: Why am I putting my life on the line? Because now... I am the Fifth Hokage of the Village Hidden in the Leaves!

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: Jiraiya, are you the one who taught him the Rasengan? Are you acting like a teacher by teaching him something he can't master? Don't give him any ideas! That's why this kid likes to daydream that he's going to become Hokage someday.

author: Tsunade
title: Naruto
text: *about to fight Naruto* One of the Legendary Sannin taking on a snot-nosed Genin... I oughta be ashamed of myself.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: *last words* Itachi-san... It seems that in the end... I'm not so terrible after all.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: I get stronger in direct proportion to how strong my opponent is. I do not tire, and cannot be defeated.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: *to Asuma* My massive blade, Samehada, doesn't slice... It shreds to ribbons!

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: Sharks start out as eggs, but incubate and hatch in the womb. Sometimes the number of pups is less than the number of eggs that were fertilized. Do you know why? Cannibalism. The pups start eating each other within the mother's womb the moment they hatch. They start killing their siblings the moment they enter the world, viewing everything they see as nothing more than prey. As of today you and I are fellow members of Akatsuki. So be careful... of me.

author: Kisame Hoshigaki
title: Naruto
text: I knew that from the first time I had to kill my comrades... Kill a Kiri ninja as a Kiri ninja. What does that make me? Am I a friend or foe? What is my purpose and my position? Where do I go? Where can I go? I'm well aware that my entire life has been a one giant lie.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I died as a human!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: *last words* You were always at my side, the least I can do is to be beside you at the end. I know it cannot be, but I wish I could go to where you have gone. How I wish I could join you there, Haku.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: I can't think of a more fitting destination for a demon ninja, can you?! I'm told there are many demons down there - of all shapes and sizes! Oh yes, I should fit right in! You, on the other hand, Gatō... Well,I fear you're in for a long and very painful eternity!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: Even the unremarkable Demon of the Hidden Mist can die and become a real Demon in hell!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: Uh uh...I won't be joining Haku. Where he's gone I cannot follow. We wouldn't be welcome where Haku's gone to. Hell's where WE'RE going, Gatō!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: Well? Cat got your tongue? Are you so surprised to discover that I'm human? Even shinobi are human. No matter how hard we try, we always fail to escape that simple fact. Well at least, I have failed.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: When you've hovered between life and death so many times that it doesn't faze you, you may be called a ninja. When you've become so deadly that your profile has been entered into my bingo book, then you may have earned the title ninja.

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: You're right. Those little people and their little dreams, why should I care about them?! I have my own dream!

author: Zabuza Momochi
title: Naruto
text: When I was your age, my hands were already soaked in blood...

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: I used to always cry and give up... I made many wrong turns... But you... You helped me find the right path... I always chased after you... I wanted to catch up to you... I wanted to walk beside you all the time... I just wanted to be with you... You changed me! Your smile is what saved me! That is why I'm not afraid to die protecting you! Because... I love you...

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: I won't let you lay another finger on Naruto!

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You make mistakes... but... because of those mistakes... you get the strength to stand up to them. That's why I think you are truly strong.

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* When I watch you, I feel strong, like I can do anything - that even I am worth something.

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: You're wrong, Neji... Because I can see that you are suffering more than me... You are the one who is confused and suffering inside the fate of the head and branch families.

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Was I able to change myself...even a little, N-Naruto-kun?

author: Hinata Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: I will never go back on my word, because that too is my ninja way!

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: By the way, I'm a boy.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: My name is Uzumaki Naruto. I like ramen. I hate the three minutes you have to wait while the water boils. And my dream is to one day become a Hokage. Then everyone will have to respect me at last.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: Sasori...your strength came because of your soul, not in spite of it. You tried to erase it, to become a puppet yourself, but couldn't change completely. Now you've got your immortal body, but you've fallen, sunk to the level of the puppets you used to control. You were supposed to be a top class ninja puppeteer, not a worthless nobody who lets someone else pull the strings.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: How well or poorly we execute our ambush will have a huge impact on this war and how many casualties we suffer. If you wanna protect your friends and family, the only thing you should be thinking about is how to make this operation a success!

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Aww, don't sweat it. Women always go weak in the knees for that cool, elite type of guy. So what can you do, am I right?

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: Naruto... please save my little brother.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: I'll show you the real power of the battle puppet Crow.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: I can't back down when they show me no respect.

author: Kankuro
title: Naruto
text: *thinking about Naruto* This brat...I'm going to kill him.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *last words* Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kisame* Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The people of this clan are all the same. You focus on the trivial, and lose sight of what's most important. Change is impossible, in this fog of ignorance. How can we evolve when regulation is all we know?

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I've had enough, there's no hope left for this pathetic clan.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Don't cry, Sasuke. Your big brother is here to protect you, no matter what happens.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You and I are flesh and blood. I'm always going to be there for you, even if it's only as an obstacle for you to overcome. Even if you do hate me. That's what big brothers are for.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *last words* Just when me and Kakashi were becoming friends... I couldn't bring myself to confess to Rin... I wish I had more time with everyone...

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I'm about to... die... but I'll become your eye.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I believe the "White Fang" is a true hero!

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Kakashi* I am Uchiha Obito and I will surpass you once I awaken my Sharingan!

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I have already awakened.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I don't understand what's going on, but I'll just pretend that I do. *nods head in agreement*

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Finding a new me, that is the lesson you taught me.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: I decided I wished to be like you as well, Naruto-kun, and for that reason...with Orochimaru-sama now intregrated into this body, I plan on finding a new "me", one stronger than Orochimaru-sama himself!

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Hehehe...you can't beat me. You have no skills, unlike Sasuke.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You've just thrown it all away! Dreams don't come true when you're dead!

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Little kids think life is so easy. That's why they go on and on about their dreams. That's why they never give up.

author: Kabuto Yakushi
title: Naruto
text: Oh you look so beautiful... We're not here for a picnic you know.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Don't worry, this will be over in five seconds.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: We're just some normal ninja, we don't want to see what's under your mask.

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Lord Jiraiya only had praise for you. He was always boasting about you, saying you were like his own grandchild. He had faith that you were the one who would inherit his will, and truly believed that you would one day be a great Hokage. Lord Jiraiya will always watch over you. Even this very minute, he's watching from somewhere. He wouldn't be happy seeing you sad like this. So...be your usual self, the one he praised so much. Don't stay depressed forever. For Lord Jiraiya himself, one of the Legendary Sannin...acknowledged you as his promising student!

author: Iruka Umino
title: Naruto
text: So I acted like an idiot. It was tough, has it been lonely for you Naruto, was it tough Naruto??

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: We are humans, not fish. We don't know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths. As death comes to embrace you, you will realize what you are. That's what death is, don't you think?

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You are weak. Why are you so weak? Because you lack... hatred.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: If I can't do 400 push-ups, I'll hit the dummy 800 times! If I can't hit the dummy 800 times, I'll do 2000 jump ropes!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: I am the Handsome Devil of the Hidden Leaf Village! My name is Rock Lee!

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: Guy-sensei is the coolest! He practically GLOWS with cool!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Stop calling me Ero-sennin!!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Baka, baka, baka!! They found out I was peeking! Now my research is ruined!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: The only thing that can keep a fire from dying and give it more power, is wind.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: If I become as strong as you, will I really become like you? To die as a tool...that's...that's just too sad.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *last words* The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki... yes... that has a nice ring to it.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: There, that ending...was a little better. The frog at the bottom of the well drifts off into the great ocean. Heh heh ...yep. Pretty damn honorable... pretty damn honorable...

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* I think we all have to acknowledge you. Gamatatsu, Gamakichi, Sakura, Tsunade...and I... We all admit you've worked really hard. But I wonder what's pushing you forward.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Never go back on your word...and never give up. That's your ninja way...and as your mentor ... I have no business whining! Because the student's ninja way should be the master's too! Isn't that so, Naruto?!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives, but how he dies.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru about Sasuke* Because it's no fun to train a genius!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru* You're wrong, that's not what makes a shinobi. You never did get it, a real ninja is one who endures no matter what gets thrown at him... Let me explain something to you, there is only one thing that matters if you are a shinobi, and it isn't the number of jutsu you possess. All you do need, is the guts to never give up.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* Even I can tell that hatred is spreading. I wanted to do something about it...but I don't know what. I believe... that someday the day will come when people truly understand one another!! If I can't find the answer, it will be up to you to do it!!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: When people get hurt, they learn to hate... When people hurt others, they become hated and racked with guilt. But knowing that pain allows people to be kind. Pain allows people to grow... and how you grow is up to you.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Wherever someone thinks of you, that's where home is.

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: I'm not a pervert... I'm a super pervert!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Die! Just Die! You have no talent at all!!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: Shut up you flat-chested bitch Tsunade!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: You are the strongest enemy I have ever fought.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: No one can determine another's destiny.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: The heavens will not allow a pawn who can only seek victory at the cost of himself to advance...

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *about Gai* He's so childish. He acts like a seven-year-old!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *about Lee and Gai* As usual, I can't keep up with their craziness.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Because Naruto... you saved me from the darkness.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: All this time I've been called a genius, so I cannot lose.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Sasuke's out there right now, heading toward Orochimaru. We can't allow such evil to take someone from our village... that is not our way.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Naruto... Sometimes, your eyes are even better than mine.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Father, is a person's destiny a thing like a cloud flowing with an inescapable flow? Or can a person choose the flow he wishes... I still don't know the answer to this. Either way the destination may be the same in the end. However by choosing to live like the latter, a person can live and strive towards a goal. And in this match I have finally understood those who have that are truly strong. Father, I have but one goal, I want to become stronger... Enough not to lose to anyone... That's how I feel. Father, the birds are flying freely today... They look so happy.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: There's no method but death to escape this horrible curse.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: The curse represents a mark of the bird in a cage... It is... the symbol of being tied down to an inescapable destiny.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* These eyes of mine show me many things. One thing they've shown me...people's limitations are set, fixed, and unchangeable. Only a fool wastes his time trying to become something he can never be!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Do you understand now? You have no way of beating me!

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Once a failure, always a failure. You can't change that.

author: Neji Hyuuga
title: Naruto
text: Right now, Sasuke is in the darkness. The only one who can save him is you, Naruto.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Try it trash! I'll return the pain a thousand times over!

author: Jiraiya
title: Naruto
text: I am, Jiraiya, the epitome of manliness! I shall fall for no woman's wiles! When you're me, you only need to flash that sexiness to have women fall at your feet.

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: WHAT?! Why wasn't he affected by my sexiness?!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: SHIKAMARU! Beat her up with a 16 HIT COMBO!

author: Ino Yamanaka
title: Naruto
text: There's no meaning to a flower unless it blooms.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: A soul needs a purpose to live...and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself. I felt alive...

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: I fight for my sake only and live to love no one but myself.

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: *young Gaara attempts to slash his wrist* It's no use, the sand gets in the way.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: The Uchiha is a clan destined for revenge...

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *to Minato, about his reason for attacking Konoha* Oh, you know...it's fun, it's part of my plan...to start a war...to bring peace...

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: It will be a new world... A world of truth, not lies.

author: Madara Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* No matter how far Orochimaru fell, he still loved him... Now I know how the Third Hokage felt.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Sakumo* Regardless of what happened, you did the best you could. I understand that now...you broke the rules for all our sakes - I'm proud of you now...

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Pain* The people from this village are different from your average village. Even if it means dying, there's not a single one of us, who would sell out a comrade.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Naruto* You've become as strong...if not stronger than me.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Like the fate of the two who founded the village of Konoha... Naruto and Sasuke...your fates are like theirs.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: This place makes me think about the mistakes I've made in the past... and I've made a lot.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *to Orochimaru* I don't care if you are one of the legendary Sannin, the great shinobi of legend, I swear take one more step towards Sasuke and one of us will die here!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I'm Kakashi Hatake. Things I like and things I hate...I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future...never really thought about it. As for my hobbies...I have lots of hobbies.

author: Rock Lee
title: Naruto
text: A genius, huh? What does that mean? "Genius"? So I was not born with a whole lot of natural talent, not gifted like Neji ...but I work hard and I never give up! That is my gift, that is my ninja way!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* I refuse...to let this happen! I am Orochimaru! I am immortal! I will not die here! Destined to discover the true meaning behind everything! Destined to take control of everything in this world!!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong... That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Everything will be mine.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *about Sasuke* When I watch this boy, I look back to the time I was called a genius, and think how ridiculous it was.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* How impressive. A thousand foes stand before you and you don't even bat an eyelid.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *talking about Naruto* This child... intrigues me to no end!

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: Hate only gives birth to even more hate.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: I want to obtain all the jutsu and gain a true understanding of everything in this world. The first one to mix blue and yellow called the new color "green". I want to do something similar to that. If blue is the chakra, then yellow is the seal, and green is the jutsu... Just as there is no end to the variety of colors, there are so many thousands...tens of thousands of jutsu in the world as well. But in order to obtain every possible jutsu and truth, it would require an eternity. Only one who understands everything after spending such time on this can be fittingly called the Ultimate Being.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: *to Kabuto, talking about Tsunade) The best medicines always taste bitter.

author: Orochimaru
title: Naruto
text: There probably isn't any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: Naruto's here because he's made up his mind. My resolve is nothing compared to his now! I'm supposed to be a ninja, but all I've ever done is lean on him and cry... I was supposed to change that... I came here and I thought I was ready. But I can't do anything... I can't say anything. The only thing that remains for me...is to believe in them!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *about killing Sasuke* I... Sasuke... I... I thought I could do this...

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: I'm the one who made Naruto suffer the most... I've just been getting it wrong. Just been messing it up... I don't want to get it wrong anymore...don't want to screw it up anymore.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *talking to Yamato* Same as always... I can only do the dumbest of things for Naruto...

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *to Sasuke* I... I love you with all my heart!.. If you were to stay here with me, there would be no regrets...because every day we'd do something fun, we'd be happy I swear..! I would do anything for you! So...please, just stay with me!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: I've always considered myself to be a true ninja...but those were just empty words, because Sasuke and Naruto were always in the lead! But now it's my turn to take the lead, and all of you can watch me from the background!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *to Ino* Didn't you know? Women have to be strong in order to survive!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: All I've been doing is watching you two from behind... Now, get a good look at MY back!

author: Sakura Haruno
title: Naruto
text: *talking to Sasuke* On that day, you taught me that solitude is painful! I understand that so well right now. I have family, and I have friends but if you're gone... To me... It will be the same as being alone.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: I won't allow my comrades to die. I'll protect you with my life. Trust me.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It's one of the never-ending cycles in life.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *making excuses for being late, as usual* Hello students, today I got lost on the road of life.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: *making excuses for being late, as usual* A cute girl stopped me on the way, so I danced.

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Naruto, it's nice that you removed the poison so spiritedly, but you'll bleed to death if you lose any more blood... Seriously...

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define "reality". But what does it mean to be "correct" or "true"? Merely vague concepts... Their "reality" may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: If you want to kill me, despise me, hate me, and live in an unsightly way... Run, and cling to life, and then some day, when you have the same eyes as I do, come before me.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: If you think I'm just a foolish kid ruled by his emotions, that's fine. Following Itachi's path would be childish, the whispering of fools who don't know hatred. If anyone else tries to ridicule the way I live, I'll slaughter everyone they ever cared about. And then maybe they'll understand what it's like to taste... a little of my hatred.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *Talking to Naruto* Just shut up for once! What the hell do you know about it?! It's not like you ever had a family in the first place! You were on your own right from the beginning, what makes you think you know anything about it?! Huh?! I'm suffering now because I had those ties, how on earth could you possibly understand, what it feels like to lose all that?!

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: *Introducing himself to Kakashi, Naruto and Sakura* My name is Sasuke Uchiha. I hate a lot of things, and I don't particularly like anything. What I have is not a dream, because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan, and kill a certain someone.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: I have long since closed my eyes... My only goal is in the darkness.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: Hey, you stupid fox! You're in my body and you owe me rent! So for payment, I'll take your chakra! You got that?!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: The pain of being alone...is not an easy one to bear. Why is it...that I can understand your pain? But...I already have many people who are important to me now...and I can't let you hurt any of them. Even if I have to kill you!

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!

author: Portgas D. Ace
title: One Piece
text: Thank you... for loving me!

author: Gecko Moria
title: One Piece
text: Fine! Go see for yourself, Straw Hat... What a real nightmare is... In the New World!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: A dumbass is still a dumbass. *looking at Duval's new face*

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: A place where you can never ever EVER enter? *Luffy, in Skypea*

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: The name of this era is WHITEBEARD!

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: I am only one man with one heart... Call me a demon, call me a monster... but I can't be the strongest forever!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I am going to save you even if it kills me.

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: I wonder if it'll be fun to see mermaid-san's panties.

author: Whitebeard
title: One Piece
text: These fools... thinking that this might truly be enough to take my life... I need no help! I AM WHITEBEARD!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *talking to Zoro* The world's greatest swordsman, that's great! And it's fitting since your new boss is going to be King of the Pirates! Anything else would make me look bad!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Just shut up with your god crap, already!!! What kind of GOD... CAN'T SAVE A SINGLE DAMN THING??!!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: A wound that'd make an ordinary man unconscious... I won't lose to it. A wound that would kill an ordinary person... I won't lose to it! To face one who is extraordinary, Hawk Eyes... I can't allow myself to be ordinary!

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: Let the heavens deal with life and death, even the most fearful lose to that. Let's live for another moment!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: It's not like "thanks" are something I can eat.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: There should be a limit to how similar a couple looks like.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: When I decided to follow my dream, I had already discarded my life.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If you kill yourself, I'll kill you.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *to Captain Kuro* If you want to compare ambitions, mine is bigger!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Well, how about this. My "luck" versus this thing's "curse". Wanna see what's stronger..? If I lose, then I'm just that much of a man anyways...

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If I get reincarnated.... I wanna become a clam.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: There is someone that I must meet again. And until that day...not even Death itself can take my life away!

author: Crocodile
title: One Piece
text: Weakness is a sin.

author: Enel
title: One Piece
text: People don't fear god, fear itslef is god.

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: You selfish people! Can't you see that he's hungry? Why do you hurt him? I think he is sick, so he can't find food by himself. Am I right? Here! Eat this food. *Luffy tries to eat Sanji* Die!!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: A cow? A cow can swim? I think it's a hippo!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Let's continue eating.

author: Nojiko
title: One Piece
text: Since 8 years ago, that girl has never cried again, and she's never asked anyone for help. Because she doesn't want to die like our mother. She was 10 years old, and Nami decided to fight alone in that situation. Have you ever realized how much pain she's been going through?

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Any person who hurts Nami-san's feelings! I won't let them live peacefully!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: *talking about Nami* Because it was the only way to save the village, she decided to join the people who killed her mother.

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Just one more time and everything will be the same. Everything will come back to me. And I will be free from Arlong. Bellemere-san. Finally, I can laugh with all my heart.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Why does that man have a pinwheel on his head?

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Everyone is expecting help from you, but you come here and don't think about doing anything to help those people?

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Why? The work that the marines should be doing now...there are many things that you have to take care of. Don't know that Arlong has killed many people and destroyed many villages? Under his control, everyone was treated like a slave! And you didn't do a single thing about that!! And now you just want to find the treasure of one thief? Is this a real government?

author: Nami
title: One Piece
