text: Don't touch Bellemere-san's orange with your dirty hands! I won't give that money to you. That money is...

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Don't you dare make my navigator cry!!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Moron! I'm not worried about you. I meant that you shouldn't take all the credit for yourself.

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: There is no such thing as impossible in this world.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I don't know. I'm not sure why myself. But if I were to take even one step back, I believe that all those important oaths, promises and many other deals 'til now, will all go to waste and I'll never be able to return before you, ever again.

author: Gecko Moria
title: One Piece
text: A true pirate should fear nothing, not even death!

author: Nico Robin
title: One Piece
text: Sometimes the only thing you have to doubt is your own common sense.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Being alone hurts worse than pain.

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: Your honor isn't worth your life.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: If you don't want the negative reputation you shouldn't be a pirate.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I won't let you touch him. Young master would be sullied if an inferior, dirty person like you were to touch him. *says to Alois*

author: Kizaru
title: One Piece
text: Victory or defeat can be determined in a single moments misstep.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Under one of your orders, I am to be your pawn and your sword. So please, young master, move me into check.

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Even though I dislike being kicked by others, I do enjoy the feeling of kicking others.

author: Coby
title: One Piece
text: We shouldn't worry about being able to achieve our dreams, as long as we have the desire to do it!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: So what if you're a girl.

author: South Italy
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Listen to this! I woke up earlier than Germany for once!

author: Alphonse Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Oh this is perfect! Now my arm's fallen off too! Today is a terrible day!

author: Don Krieg
title: One Piece
text: When a guy gets flustered, because someone calls him weak, it's proof that he recognizes he IS weak. Let the outcome determine the weak and the strong.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I want you, Ciel Phantomhive. That's all there is to it.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk...

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for! Only weak men would die after someone spared their lives!

author: Dracule Mihawk
title: One Piece
text: I don't remember the name of every weakling I crush.

author: Bellemere
title: One Piece
text: No matter what happens, don't be sorry you were born. Even though nobody praises us, don't forget to smile in any situation. As long as you're alive there will be better things later...and there will be many.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: When you decided to go to the sea, it was your own decision. Whatever happens to you on the sea, it depends on what you've done! Don't blame others!!

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: Hopes for the future..? Yes. However, getting there with you...is not much different than being alone..! What good is the treasure if I'm alone? After sharing so much of our dreams. Instead of sacrificing them and leaving with you I would rather... HAVE NOTHING AT ALL!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I don't care if you're a god. If you lay even one finger on Nami-san, I'll become the Devil of the Blue Sea!

author: Boa Hancock
title: One Piece
text: Fufufu.. I think I like you.

author: Marshall D. Teach
title: One Piece
text: A man's dream never dies!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!

author: Silvers Rayleigh
title: One Piece
text: *talking to Luffy* Can you really do this..? The Grand Line is just going to keep going on...surpassing your wildest imaginations! And the enemies will be strong. Can you really conquer this ultimate ocean?

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: Yohohohoho!

author: Kizaru
title: One Piece
text: Have you ever been kicked at the speed of light?

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: You'll never understand...your swords will never be as heavy as mine!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: You can spill drinks on me, even spit on me. I'll just laugh about it. But If you dare to hurt my friends... I WON'T FORGIVE YOU!

author: Brook
title: One Piece
text: Would you let me see your panties?

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: If you do anything that would cause me to abandon my ambitions... You will end your own life on my sword!

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: Inherited will. Destiny of the age. The dreams of the people. These are things that will not be stopped. As long as people continue to pursue the meaning of freedom. These things will never cease to be.

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: There... Comes a time when a man has to stand and FIGHT!! This is the time when his friends dreams are laughed at. Luffy wont die... I KNOW he'll be the pirate king one day. I WONT LET YOU LAUGH AT THAT!!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: Then stand up right away! And don't act like you're about to die! It's not like you! Even if there are billows of smoke, we can still see the sky. We can still see the ocean! It ain't like it's hell here! So don't act like you're about to die!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I'll never kick a woman, even if I die!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: A man forgives a woman's lies.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I have Nakama who're not strong... But I still want them to be with me..!!So I have to be stronger than anybody else... Or I'll lose them all!!!

author: Franky
title: One Piece
text: Existing Isn't A Crime!

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: *talking about Usopp and Luffy* It's never ending with those idiots. HEY! Lay off the sob stories! You know how dangerous this island is! Let's not give it any help in killing us!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: That's no way to treat a lady!

author: Nami
title: One Piece
text: I'll have mapped out the entire world!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: I'll be brave!

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: I'll find the All Blue!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Soon I'll be King of the Pirates!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: *after his "5 ton's hammer" breaks* Of course it was fake! I can't lift five tons! I quit after five pounds!

author: Tony Tony Chopper
title: One Piece
text: *after seeing Ussopp's 5 ton hammer break* You mean it was a fake?!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *after seeing a skinny woman claiming to be Alvita* Don't you mean you're like half of her?

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: It's time to get a girl.

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: Bear conviction under your flag!

author: Usopp
title: One Piece
text: Protecting what we cherish most as men is the reason why we formed this pirate crew!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: *after saving Luffy and losing one arm* It isn't worth much. It's just one arm. I'm glad you're safe.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Fine! I'd rather be a pirate than die here!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I am always serious.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I want to eat meat!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I do things my own way! So don't give me any lip about it!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: *to Luffy* Keep this hat safe for me?

author: Gol D. Roger
title: One Piece
text: My wealth and treasures? If you want it, I'll let you have it. Look for it, I left all of it at that place!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: *talking to Shanks* One day, I'll have a ship and a crew better than yours!! And we'll have the biggest hoard of treasure in the world!!

author: Shanks
title: One Piece
text: I'm saying it's not safe to point guns.

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: I'm going to be the world's greatest swordsman! All I have left is my destiny! My name may be infamous...but it's gonna shake the world!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: I've set myself to become the King of Pirates... and if I die trying... then at least I tried!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Well, ya see... I'm gonna be the unbeatable pirate!!!

author: Monkey D. Luffy
title: One Piece
text: Being killed by marines, or coming with me. Which one do you pick?

author: Sanji
title: One Piece
text: Cooking is a gift from the gods. Spices are a gift from the devil. Looks like it was a little too spicy for you.

author: Smoker
title: One Piece
text: With my own hands, JUSTICE will be served.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: *laughs after Risa starts to cry and complain about him stealing her heart again* How many hearts do u have?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: *cries* You're stealing my heart again...

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Stop it, you're stealing my heart...it's so unfair.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: *Otani gets a rare Umibouzou ticket*Yeah, I'm awesome, praise me more!

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: How's that? Did you die?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: I like who I like, got a problem with that?!

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Everyday, there are many unremarkable encounters, but...later on, there will be an encounter big enough to change your life. That's why, I want to treasure each of those. I started thinking that...when I first met Otani.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: I was also happy because you tried hard.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Thank GOD I didn't give up! Thank GOD I tried hard!

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: It doesn't matter if he's shorter than me...because I like Otani.

author: Atsushi Otani
title: Lovely Complex
text: Well... I do like kids and all. Elementary kids and such...

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: I'll be happy as long as I have Otani's love.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: *talking to Otani* Hey, Hey! If there's a muscle guy who wants to snatch me, what are you going to do?

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: Otani's hand is small, but it still feels like a guy's.

author: Risa Koizumi
title: Lovely Complex
text: It's such a small difference...but to me, it's a huge wall. A huge wall that I can't overcome.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Let's play this democracy game, shall we?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I shall gamble on the geass known as people wishes. For the sake of the world's future.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Don't you think wishes are the same as Geass? Things you can't accomplish with your own powers, you ask assistance from others.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: It's not over yet!... Carve into your memories "Jeremiah Gottwald", the memorable name of the man that made you taste defeat!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I am Lelouch Vi Britannia, son of the late Empress Marianne. The prince abandoned by his empire. If there are any that think they can go beyond my despair, then let them try.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: If happiness had a form, what would it look like? It might be something like glass, because one doesn't notice it normally. However, it is actually there. As proof, if you look at it from a different angle, the glass will reflect light. It will state it's presence and existence more eloquently than any other thing in this world.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: If you had the strength, you could live. This is our contract. In return for my gift of power, you must grant one of my wishes. If you enter this contract, you will live as a human, but also as one completely different. Different rules, different time, a different life.... The power of the king will make you lonely indeed. If you are prepared for that, then...

author: Euphemia Li Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I order you to love me!..

author: England
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: BLIMEY.

author: England
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Oh I hate terrorists, they're so ugly.

author: Germany
title: Axis Powers: Hetalia
text: Dear diary. Today, Italy was attacked by England and France while I was out. *cut to England hitting Italy on the head*

author: Claude Faustus
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Day into night, sugar into salt, living to dead, and dark blue into gold.

author: Alois Trancy
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Hoheo taralna, rondero tarel!

author: Edward Elric
title: Fullmetal Alchemist
text: Awww!! There are just so many people whose asses I have to kick!

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: If you are crying, fight against it! If you're regretting, walk forward! Only complaining on your misfortune, you're nothing but a common pig!

author: Vincent Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: There is nothing shameful about being different from others. This is your character! Ann's red hair is really beautiful, just like the color of red spider lilies in their full bloom. Red really suits you. You should have more confidence in yourself.

author: Nunnally Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I see... You're taking things awfully fast, but like they say, "to each his own". I suppose that's just how you operate---*Lelouch drops a teacup on the ground*

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Win through, Lelouch. Ignore your past, and the consequences of your actions.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *to C.C.* It's a contract, this time coming from me to you.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You foolish impostor, who tried to take Nunnally's place, I will use you until you dry up, then throw you away like a ragged cloth!

author: Kallen Stadtfeld
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You know what this badass mother can do so back off!

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You revealed it much too fast. Such a bad sport, girl.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Fuhahahahaha, this is how you create panic.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Compete, fight, take, control. Beyond that lies the future! All Hail Britannia!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I don't want to hear that from an eternally young and immortal witch.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: From this moment on, this room shall be the very first territory of the United States of Japan!

author: Kaguya Sumeragi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Once you have won this war, you will need a wife someday, right? For you to have a life where you cannot reveal your identity to the world, I believe that there will be someone who can calm your soul?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The world will change. I will change it.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I would like you to answer a question before you dispose of me. If being powerless is evil, is having power justice? Is revenge Evil? Can friendship coexist with justice..?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I've made a contract with the devil, so I can't be friends with a god.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You've had only two choices ever since you joined the Order of the Black Knights. Either live with me, or die with me!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I don't know why snow is white, but I find such white snow beautiful, and I don't dislike it at all.

author: Cecile Croomy
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Lloyd-san, shall I teach you the proper way to communicate with others?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: What are you doing, C.C.? Now you're all wet. Come on, we'll have to go to the washroom. I'll get you a change of clothes.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Terrorism is nothing more than childish harassment.

author: Suzaku Kururugi
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: F*CK OFF!! *to Kallen while he's trying to kill Zero*

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: ...supposed to be dead? I have returned, your Majesty. In order to change EVERYTHING.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I am the 17th successor, the second in line to the throne. Lelouch Vi Britannia.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Why must I search through other people's underwear? You Owe me Big Time for this.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *holding a hand to his face as he steps out in front of a car* I...I..I am not ORAAAAAAAAAAANGE. *falls and fails*

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I was just checking, you horny little punk.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Tss, useless terrorists!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: You are not alone. We are accomplices. If you are a witch, I will become a warlock.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Within the endless flow of time, I am alone.

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *after a giant pizza is thrown into the air**Gasp* Pizza!

author: Euphemia Li Britannia
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Everyone who calls themselves Japanese:I have a request. Can you all die?Erm...I hoped that you would all commit suicide, but is that impossible?Then can all the soldiers please annihilate them?

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That's right, I'm Zero. The leader of the Order of Black Knight. The one who declared war on the Holy Britannia Empire. And, a guy who is about to take over the world!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Perhaps this is what I have always wished for since that day. The loss and destruction of all. That's right, one must destroy before creating. In that case, if my conscience becomes a hindrance to me, then I will simply erase it. I have no other choice but to move forward...therefore!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Since that day, I've always been living a lie. The fact that I'm alive is a lie. My name is a lie, my background is a lie. It's full of lies. Fed up with the world that does not change at all, but I can't even let everything go because of this despair called "lies". But now I have in my hands...this power, therefore!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Or have you realized it? That only those who are prepared to be shot have the right to shoot...! Lelouch Vi Britannia commands you all...to DIE!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: What's wrong? You aren't going to shoot? Your opponent's a student.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Hey, tell me, how should a Britannian who hates Britannia live?

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That's not necessary. It's a waste of time. Let's get married.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Those with power, fear us! Those without power, seek us!

author: C.C.
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *to Lelouch* No matter how great you make yourself sound, you're still just a naive boy who's all talk and who only dreams of victory in his head.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: *Milay describes Lelouch as a subordinate* Subordinate..? Yeah, I guess I am.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That's easy. If someone wins, the fighting will end.

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Ah, I'm sorry. Sorry! *is punched by Cecile*

author: Lloyd Asplund
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: That contradiction might kill you someday.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: O-O-O-range?! DIE !!!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Oh it has been a while. you are still in the army? But I don't have the time to deal with you, Orange-kun.

author: Jeremiah Gottwald
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Is Zero here? If you are around, fight with me...fight with me, Jeremiah Gottwald!

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Those who are allowed to shoot are those who are prepared to be shot.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I was dead until the moment I met you. I was a powerless corpse pretending to be alive. Living without power, without the ability to change my course, was akin to a slow death.

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: What a fierce fire.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I got ran over a few times on my way here!

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I don't need this kind of power. If you want me to inherit such mistakes then I will wipe out the Vongola!!

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: There's no time. Just do what he says for now. If he's lying, then we'll just blow his brains out.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't underestimate the Vongola!

author: Superbi Squalo
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't think. Feel.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Both hands to the front! Raise left hand!Raise right hand too!Haaaaa~~OPEN!

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *Fran asks if he can remove his hat* No way! You'll die wearing it!

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: But the thing is, I can't lift my arms because of this hat. So what I'm saying is, can I remove it?

author: Belphegor
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I'm going to kill you. Or better yet, commit suicide right here.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *talking about poses*  Don't all the heroes who transform and magicians who cast spells have those?I'm the type of person for whom doing that is necessary.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *Bel asks about Fran's box weapon* I did my best, but ... I couldn't think of a pose so I couldn't open it.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Don't you ever spare a thought for the environmental crisis?

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Bel-senpai, can you pull the knives out of my back first? Your renowned knives have such a weird shape, it's kind of embarrassing to have them sticking out my back like this.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Geh, please stop it, enough with the stabbing.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You know, I've been thinking, senpai, your head isn't really screwed on right. You were probably chased out of your homeland, right?

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Ahh, you made me cry. I'm reporting you to our long-haired, idiotic commander and asking for permission to kill you, senpai.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Because I took Mammon's place, I was forced to wear this stupid hat. I didn't agree to wear this hat, you know.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The way you used 'but' there is all wrong, lightning pervert.

author: Fran
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: In that case, Mr. Levi, why don't you go ahead and take them down yourself, please. I'll stay here and watch.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Anyone older than me is an enemy.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Are you nothing without your wings?

author: Colonello
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: One who loses their calm, loses the fight before it even starts.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Stupid cow.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Shouichi's a remarkable person and what's even more remarkable is that he doesn't look like one.

author: Hayato Gokudera
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: You should just do as you please, like you always do.

author: Vongola Primo Giotto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Decimo, go scare the hell out of that Mare youngster.

author: Ryōhei Sasagawa
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: This box is extremely yellow!

author: XANXUS
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: In times of crisis, we stand united!

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Didn't you hear, we don't have time to play with you.

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Do I look the same as yesterday?

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: It's not that I can't drink, I just choose not to.

author: XANXUS
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Regardless of our internal strife, in times of Crisis, when we are attacked by scumbags from the outside... We, the Vongola, are always as one!

author: Tsunayoshi Sawada
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: *training during the battle for the rings* Reborn! REST AS IF I WERE TO DIE!!

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: To increase the flame of the ring is to be pissed off.

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: An illusionists illusion countered by another illusion, has already lost it's own perception.

author: Dino Cavallone
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: What's with the tuna?..

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: A game about mafias? Cool!

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I only want you for your body.

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Do it with your dying will!

author: Hibari Kyoya
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: I'll bite you to death!

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The reason you lost, was because you had me as your opponent.

author: Ryōhei Sasagawa
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: The dolphin has guts. I want him in my club!!!

author: Reborn
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Wow Tsuna, you got some skills out there, getting yourself hurt in the hospital.

author: Rokudou Mukuro
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Illusions... or real illusions. Hidden in an illusion is the real illusion. From one illusion will sprout another illusion. Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.

author: Takeshi Yamamoto
title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
text: Yo, lambo, did u bathe?

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: I swear by the pride of the Quincy...I will KILL you!

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: If it was me, I would probably give up in a beautiful way...

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Kurosaki Ichigo, my sword has been broken by your freedom of spirit.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: I'm going to have to ask you to stop now, Abarai-kun. I can only step on an ant so hard without crushing it.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: What are you doing? Why do you run Ichigo? You still have not called me. Face forward, Ichigo. You should be able to hear it now. That which blocks your ears is worthless fear. The enemy is one, you are one. What is there to fear? Cast off your fear. Look forward! Go forward! Never stand still. Retreat and you will age. Hesitate and you will die. Shout... my name is... ZANGETSU!

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Your brain must have been constructed wrong.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Admiration is a feeling furthest away from understanding.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: How about I give you an advantage. Cut me anywhere you want.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Dude, that name is so lame.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: *Rukia talking to Renji* Hit a nerve, did I? Well, don't worry Mr. Officer. Now you have the rank, and the pompous attitude, and weird eyebrows to go with it!

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: This twisted spritual pressure... that white mask... Are you a Hollow?

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: *Ganju offers Yumichika to kiss his ass* An ugly thought... That's truly ugly.

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: You can kiss my ass!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Z-A-N-G-E-T-S-U!!

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: Why, you...! You punched my ruggedly handsome face! Not once, but twice!

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: Are you kidding me? You really don't know who I am?

author: Ayasegawa Yumichika
title: Bleach
text: And you better get this street clean enough to eat off of, or I'll kill you both.

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: Warriors aren't supposed to beg for their lives.

author: Kira Izuru
title: Bleach
text: A grounded bird is nothing more than dinner.

author: Kariya Jin
title: Bleach
text: A battle without risk is simply a child's quarrel.

author: Kuchiki Kouga
title: Bleach
text: It seems that I was born under a star that forces me to watch young people, with futures ahead of them, die.

author: Kuchiki Kouga
title: Bleach
text: Desiring power is dangerous.

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: If you two are gonna goof off, try not to be so obvious about it.

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: I've breathed enough sewer air to gag a hippo!

author: Uryuu Ishida
title: Bleach
text: Did I just get nick-named Pencil?

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Think about it this way: a person picks up a sword when he's trying to protect something. Perhaps it's your life or your social status, maybe a reputation, a loved one, or personal beliefs. The motives may be completely different, but in the end, it's the same desire to protect something.

author: Shihouin Yoruichi
title: Bleach
text: Quit it. Stop whining. Unless you're able to activate your powers at will, you will die, like a dog, in the Soul Society.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And, to us, that simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.

author: Ganju Shiba
title: Bleach
text: Ya gotta wonder about someone who'd be dumb enough to follow a person as crazy as he is. Wait, I think I just insulted myself.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: If you want revenge, do it on your own! Don't draw innocent people into it!

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: When people constantly show their affection for you, you start taking it for granted. If you don't realize how much they care for you until they're gone, you'll only be left with regret and remorse.

author: Inoue Orihime
title: Bleach
text: There were a lot of things I wanted to do. I wanted to become a teacher, and an astronaut, and a baker... I wanted to go to a bunch of different donut shops and ask for one of everything! And I wanted to tell the ice-cream man to give me one of everything, too! I wish I could have five different lives! Then I could have been born in five different towns, and eaten five lifetime's worth of food, and had five different careers, and... fallen in love with the same person, five times.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: Those who are left behind in a fight or are in the way aren't the ones who lack power. They're the ones who lack resolve.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: Training hard, risking your life... what's the difference?

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: It's been a while! Or something like that...

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: Shut up. Don't talk and keep running!

author: Madarame Ikkaku
title: Bleach
text: Hey... whoever just called me bald, get over here!

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: Revolving... If fate is a wheel, we are the cogs that drive it. We have no choice but to believe that this wheel is flawless and forge on ahead. The power of the individual cogs and their destinations... And the blade that is brought down upon them.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Revolving. And each time it's touched by the light of the sun and moon... The world is always changing into something new.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Kariya sought the power to change his fate. What I sought was... a turn of fate.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Because he attained so much power, he could only be controlled by it. And in the end, maybe his only option was to destroy himself.

author: Toushirou Hitsugaya
title: Bleach
text: Authority never goes anywhere without a fanfare.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: Whatever she is, it doesn't change the fact that she's here now. She still experiences anger, happiness and pain.

author: Senna
title: Bleach
text: When you're up high, all the stuff that looks confusing and messed up...suddenly becomes crystal clear.

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: Arrogance destroys the footholds of victory.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: That wasn't very nice. I do believe you've killed my hat.

author: Zangetsu
title: Bleach
text: Abandon your fear. Turn and face him. Don't back an inch. Now, Ichigo, advance! Never stop! If you retreat, you will age. Be afraid, and you'll die.

author: Arisawa Tatsuki
title: Bleach
text: You'll find that Ichigo has an uncanny knack for forgeting people's faces, and the names to go with them.

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: *yelling at her pager, which is laying on the ground* Urahara! Why don't you ever pick up when I call you in emergencies like this? You call yourself a business man! Then why do you show up when you're not wanted, and then when I really need you, you won't answer?!

author: Kurosaki Karin
title: Bleach
text: Isn't she awfully happy...for someone visiting a grave?

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: You nuts?! What kind of sick twisted freak attacks his own son while he's laying in bed, sleeping?!

author: Rukia Kuchiki
title: Bleach
text: We stand in awe before that which can not be seen... And we respect, with every fiber, that which can not be explained.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: I've heard that stalkers don't realize they're stalking. Apparently, they believe that they're "protecting".

author: Simon Brezhnev
title: Durarara!!
text: *Simon to Celty, who's wearing a super revealing bikini*You are more transparent than you think.

author: Celty Sturluson
title: Durarara!!
text: I am trying to seduce you. *Celty in a super revealing bikini*

author: Ryuugamine Mikado
title: Durarara!!
text: All the cards are in my hand.

author: Izaya Orihara
title: Durarara!!
text: *jumping on a guy* So you brought your boyfriend because I don't hit girls?How admirable of you.I'd like to make you mine, but sorry, you're not my type.So go home!

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: My family was normal.

author: Seiji Yagiri
title: Durarara!!
text: *Seiji talking to Mikado* If you really do love her, don't look away, no matter what happens. No matter what you see, no matter what you learn about her, don't look away. Once you got her in your embrace, don't let go. Once you decide you love someone, that's your responsibility.

author: Kyohei Kadota
title: Durarara!!
text: No matter how much you try to escape it, you can't get away from what you were part of.

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: "What is life?", "Why do people live?". Someone asked me that and I beat him within an inch of his life...

author: Shizuo Heiwajima
title: Durarara!!
text: Listen. Looks can kill. There's at least a 0.00000000000000000000675% chance that a curse or a stare can kill someone. So if you glare at someone, you can't complain if they kill you!

author: Celty Sturluson
title: Durarara!!
text: The world isn't as cruel as you take it to be.

author: Ryuugamine Mikado

title: Bleach
text: I'm sure it's just some pretty girl talking about me somewhere.

author: Urahara Kisuke
title: Bleach
text: I'm so disappointed, Ichigo, so very disappointed. Sadly, your sword exhibits only fear. When you counter, it's because you fear being killed. When you attack, you fear killing. And when you protect someone, you fear you could let them die. At this point, the only thing your sword speaks is senseless fright, and that's not good. What you don't need in battle is fear. Nothing will come of it. When you counter, you don't let them cut you. When you protect someone, you don't let them die. And when you attack, you kill.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Everyone who searches for power, without exception, searches for battle. Do you fight in order to become more powerful? Or do you want more power so you can fight?

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text:
If he rips my arms off, I'll kick him to death.
If he rips my legs off, I'll bite him to death!
If he rips my head off, I'll stare him to death!
And if he gouges out my eyes, I'll curse him
from beyond the grave..!

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: You know why big brothers are born first? To protect the little ones that come after them.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: I am strong because I have people to protect.

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: With a man's soul and a strong back, go beyond the impossible and kick reason to the curb!

author: Kamina
title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
text: A true man doesn't die even if he's killed!!!

author: Motoharu Yano
title: Bokura ga Ita
text: I want to go back and change the past. If I could - I would, if that would stop you from crying.

author: Itachi Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: Foolish brother, if you wish to kill me - hate me, detest me, and survive in an unsightly way. Run... run and cling to life.

author: Obito Uchiha
title: Naruto
text: In the ninja world, those who don't follow the rules are trash. But, those who abandon their friends are even worse than trash.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: And my dream is to be the greatest Hokage! That way, people will stop disrespecting me and start treating me like I'm somebody. Someone important!

author: Hatake Kakashi
title: Naruto
text: Because you're the only shinobi in the world who can surpass the Fourth. Thats what I believe.

author: Ciel Phantomhive
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: Kneel like a worm and beg the demon to do it.

author: Zaraki Kenpachi
title: Bleach
text: Sanity... what would I do with a useless thing like that?

author: L Lawliet
title: Death Note
text: Will you be eating that cake?...say what you want, but I will be taking the cake.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Since the beginning, no one has ever stood in the heavens. Neither you, nor me, not even God himself. But that unbearable vacancy in the throne of Heaven shall be filled. From this day forth, I will stand in heaven.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Ever since that day my heart simply couldn't accept it. This fake life I was never able to fit into. All the time that was lost. These false memories planted in me giving me a life as one of the herd. And yet, the truth continues to guide me toward itself. That's right. It wasn't me who was wrong. It was the world. The world has to change so I will change it.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Why are you putting so much distance between us? If you want to make sure it hits me, then you should get close and fire. Or is it that you're afraid of letting even a part of me out of your field of vision by getting close? If that's the case, then it's a foolish thought. Distance only has meaning in a fight between equals. With you and I, distance holds no meaning at all. Watch... If I do this, my hand is almost instantly at your heart.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: The betrayal you can see is trivial. What is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal that you don't see.

author: Aizen Sousuke
title: Bleach
text: Reason exists for those who cannot go on living without clinging to it. Now let's go... to the edge of reason.

author: Kallen Stadtfeld
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: Come on! You know what this badass mother can do!

author: Kuchiki Byakuya
title: Bleach
text: As you pass into the next life feel honored that you have perished by my bankai.

author: Light Yagami
title: Death Note
text: I am the god of the new world!

author: Sebastian Michaelis
title: Kuroshitsuji
text: I can use my tongue to make a sakura branch into a butterfly knot.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: The world cannot be changed with pretty words alone.

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: My butt's on fire!

author: Haku
title: Naruto
text: When people are protecting something truly precious to them. They truly can become...as strong as they need to be!

author: Son Goku
title: Dragon Ball
text: Why do women have butts on their chests?

author: Gaara
title: Naruto
text: Not enough... blood.

author: Kurosaki Ichigo
title: Bleach
text: From this point on, all your opinions are rejected!

author: Yuki Kuran
title: Vampire Knight
text: The world is dyed with the color of blood. It will never be able to go back to the way it was before...

author: Naruto Uzumaki
title: Naruto
text: BELIEVE IT!!

author: Chii
title: Chobits
text: Panties, Panties, Panties!

author: Seijuro Hiko
title: Rurouni Kenshin
text: No matter how much you hurt inside, the dead can never return.

author: Hei
title: Darker than Black
text: If you pretend to feel a certain way, the feeling can become genuine all by accident.

author: Tyki Mikk
title: D.Gray-man
text: Having a light side and a dark side is what makes life interesting.

author: Eimi Ohba
title: Comic Party
text: You stupid hairy little stink'n... PANDA! PANDA! PANDA! PANDA!

author: Roronoa Zoro
title: One Piece
text: Bring on the hardship. It's preferred in a path of carnage.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
text: I am not the one at fault, the world is.
